review: Love the app and the interface.  It is sleazy to use and has good features and functions.  Drivers are mostly good all depends on the city and availability.  But no significant issues.  The price!   The take advantage of the time of day and season like no business.  Todays trip to the airport is generally $20-25 bucks.  Today it was over $50.  I get it, but 2x is ridiculous.  I have been taking good old cabs more and more these days.
title: Prices have gone up.

review: My pickup was at an address on 5th St. I waited and even sent a message saying “I’m here. “ Didn’t get a response and kept waiting. Then I walked a little and saw the car on the side street. When I got the bill saw I was charged a waiting fee. Not fair since I was at the place stated for pickup. The driver was in the wrong place. The address was on both 5th St (where I was) and on the side street where the driver was. He could have called.
title: Unfair wait fee

review:
So Uber took ny request for a scheduled ride for a 5 am pickup and never showed up. The ride showed status “on time” until the pickup time then poof!  I got a message that “no drivers could be found” !
Almost missed my flight, was able to get a Lyft instead - and wondering if the only driver drop me from Uber just to picked me up for Lyft at 3 times the amount .
title: Don’t trust scheduled rides
developerResponse: {'id': 29139162, 'body': 'Hi! We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you, we will fix this for you. Please fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343HNsE . We shall get back to you at the earliest.', 'modified': '2022-04-13T04:57:53Z'}

review:
In 2020 (the beginning of the pandemic) I ordered food. The restaurant didn’t have what I ordered, and asked me to cancel my order. Uber Eats charged me the full amount. I disputed the charge via email with Uber Eats. I was told I’d receive a full refund. That never happened. So, I called my bank and told them I was charged incorrectly.

It’s 2022 and I have not been able to use either uber accounts due to this charge. I called customer service recently, and was told to make a new account! Instead of seeing they made the mistake, and just delete the charge.

Uber and Uber Eats has the worst customer service!
title: Unsatisfactory

review: I would have used Uber in DC in March, Savannah today and again in Chicago today.  BUT when I look at the cars and have 4 passengers, how can I grantee luggage will fit into the car without a call number.  I’ve never used the service for there is no way I feel confident you will perform. And there seems to be no way to have contact with Uber.  So many companies hide numbers so unless you know some special site, thus answers are not available when you need them.  I’m disappointed is the lack of customer support!
title: Wish I could use the system - but they have no customer support!

review:
Pretty undependable when trying to get rides around Kauai. Every driver we’ve had has been fantastic in Hawaii but it’s been very difficult to get rides in the first place. Drivers have cancelled our scheduled rides while here and abandoned us on saint patricks day. 

Low volume of drivers on Kauai, making it very difficult to plan fun activities. Taxi’s here have been much more dependable although slightly more expensive. Getting a cab now for this exact reason, no driver wants to pick us up 10 minutes outside of poipu.
title: Not many drivers on Kauai

review:
Why is there no page for your current ride in Uber?
Why is it a pain to open your “upcoming” ride? It’s fewer clicks to open a ride from a week ago!
I have a ride in five minutes, and if I don’t let Uber send me notifications all the time, I get one notice of my upcoming ride. (with notifications turned on “only while using app” because I don’t need your ads.) If I touch my phone it disappears.  I have to then rely on the drivers to tell me they have arrived, and what vehicle they are in. 
Stupid. And dangerous. 
Fix it.
title: Why can’t I see my ride?

review: Apparently I had two Uber Passes active on accounts with the same phone number and different email. I didn’t even know this other account existed, and both activated Uber pass at the same time, which I just find really suspicious. Mind you, I can’t even log into this other account because Uber doesn’t let you log in with a different email. Scummy on their end not to let me know, since I was double charged for MONTHS. Refused me a refund on past months, even though they could see on their end that the account was never used. I won’t be coming back.
title: MAKE SURE YOU DO NOT GET DOUBLECHARGED

review:
Literally have had a few creepy drivers but I’ve had one that literally drop me and my little sister off in some weird empty parking lot.. and I told him to stop going higher bc we’re trying to go to the mall not stay in the parking lot and he stopped the car and told us to just get out and didn’t even unlock the doors, had it reported and hope he isn’t working for Uber anymore… all I know is he won’t ever be my driver again. 

Another thing, I get charging over $30 when it comes to super fat destinations but for rides that are 3-5 miles and charging me $40?!?! Are you kidding?
title: Prices & weirdos

review: From their ride service to their food delivery Uber is god awful trash. Can’t tell you how many times I’ve had a ride cancelled when the driver was less than 5 min from me. Today I ordered off their food app and had an item that couldn’t be made, took Ubers customer support over two hours just to respond. It took a consistent 15-20 messages in 5 minutes for someone to finally respond and get my refund. Worst customer service ever. Oh and you can’t even call them because they know they are horrible and people would flip out on them. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME WITH UBER ON ANY LEVEL
title: WAITED 2 HOURS FOR CUSTOMER SERVICE TO RESPOND

review: The app will randomly change to reflect “offline” during an active trip. Upon reopening the app it will sometimes resolve and return to navigation, other times it won’t and it glitches when trying to swipe to see delivery destination. Then at delivery, the app won’t allow to mark as “delivered” even with skipping the photo. A call to support - sometimes a struggle - usually resolves, but other times the 8min timeout occurs first and the trip auto-ends, fixing. It’s a costly wait in a competitive trip area. Please update the app ASAP so people don’t have to downgrade from iOS 15!
title: Recently updated to iOS 15

review:
Multiple articles have been written about this, but Uber’s ability to provide reliable coverage has plummeted. I was stranded the other day because of a traffic jam that slowed drivers in the area.

Uber wanted $180 for a 20 min ride. Are you kidding? People were piled up at this particular stop with nowhere to go. Ride-sharing has effectively eliminated conventional taxis and now they can’t service our area.

This app cannot reliably provide service and continues to rely on an increasingly strained workforce that drives dangerously and doesn’t get properly compensated. I’m out.
title: Uber fought to not have employees and now they don’t,

review: Start paying your drivers more, maybe you’ll actually have people willing to work for you. You should also let your drivers pick people based on their drop off location. There’s been multiple times I’ve waited for an Uber just for it to get there and abandon me because they didn’t want to drive to my drop off location. I’ve been left stranded without a ride multiple times on multiple nights. Inconvenient and unsafe for both the driver and the rider.
title: Pay your drivers/Show location

review: We were vacationing in Seattle and we decided that we wanted to Uber to downtown. But when the Uber arrived they would not allow our family of four. He declined us and left. There was no where on the app when ordering an Uber to enter the amount of people in your group. There was not anything that said there can only be three people due to social distancing. We only know why now because we searched it up on google. He still charged us for doing NOTHING! I think when you make decisions like this, you should let costumers know. Thank you.
title: Lacking Information to get a ride

review: this is horrible, every time i try to order a ride it gives me 1 out of 2 problems, The first one is My payment options, i clearly put a gift card on there and it still wouldn’t take the money, keep in mind i could afford it but if it’s not that then it’s the “problem detected” and it gives you no explanation or nothing, i tried to call uber and use uber help but nothing came up, worst part i was in a schedule for a good job interview but i completely missed it, all thanks to this app witch looked promising, I still have problems to this day so don’t ever rely on this app
title: Not useful

review: The driver I had was speeding while it was sleeting and snowing. I used the service once because my car was down and the ride was awful and for some reason my card kept getting charged. I’ve had fees and even went as far as getting a new card because the process of getting in contact with customer service is awful. I finally did figure out the only form of contact is email but it was months later when I finally found an email to contact someone. Overall awful experience from the ride to the poor customer service.
title: The worst

review: I downloaded this app yesterday and was checking our prices for a ride. The cheapest was around $30. Then in 5 minutes it went up to $117 which was more than the premium. 5 minutes later it dropped back down to $30. Went to book a ride the next day, today, and no matter how I tried to book a ride there wasn’t any prices available! Went to Lyft and they had prices for the same cheap price, rides faster than Uber and they arrived in 3 minutes of booking even when I booked a ride for a 10 minute out. Sorry Uber, you lost your chance!
title: The prices!

review: My dad was scheduled to take the Moderna vaccine today but his car got wrecked two days ago & I started work the same time as his appointment. I was going to pay $42 dollars to get him to & back but had remembered that it said on the news that Uber was giving these rides for free !! Thanks to you, my dad was able to get there to & back free of charge!! Thank you so so much !!
title: Thank you so much

review: Uber has recently been sending drivers up to 30 minutes early for scheduled ride pick ups. I have had conversations with numerous drivers about this issue and was told on the DL, that drivers are supposed to wait until the scheduled time. They get around this by reporting the rider for having no mask after the imposed wait time so they can make more money on other rides. The rider then is flagged and it is their word against the drivers. I am going back to Lyft. People should know to be ready 30 minutes before your pick up time. It also may be 30 minutes after. Bye UBER👋🏻
title: COVID concerns
developerResponse: {'id': 10122747, 'body': 'Hi! Sorry to hear that your experience with our team was not up to the mark and we’d want to improve the same for you. Drop more details regarding the same and we’d do the needed.\r\n', 'modified': '2019-08-12T09:05:21Z'}

review: I’ve been a loyal Uber user for years and I’ve noticed a drastic change in price and convenience to get a Uber. I live in Orlando so it’s ridiculous that I have to wait 16-20 minutes for a ride because another driver that’s in the middle of a trip picks up mine therefore making me wait longer. That never used To happen and  now it happens all the time. Also the prices are incredibly ridiculous. I’m not spending 40 bucks to get to my destination which is 5 miles away. That is robbery. Then you expect us to tip???? Finding other apps to use
title: Getting too expensive ; longer waits

review:
I have rented my vehicle out 8 times. They do not back there vehicle owner. I have tried several times to get reimbursements from customers having animals in the car, binging the car back without fueling it up, effective dirt in the car, and vehicle scratches. They make it very difficult to get reimbursed. Even though they it is clear in the policy. First of all, you really have to dig to  find the damage reimbursement form. You never win. They only care about the renter.

I have clear fees for airport delivery and they did not charge the last customer for it.

I also specified no discounts PERIOD. And they rented my car with a discount. They must have been changed with the last software posted. This platform is not to be trusted. I would give them “0” if I could. They do not deserve a “1” rating. Run from this platform!!!

Do not trust Turo unless you are renting. DO NOT list you vehicle for rent with them.
title: Do Not List Your Car for Rent!!!

review: I waited 27m+ for a ride that showed up near my location but couldn’t be seen. I attempted to call and sent multiple texts and then my ride was cancelled and I am still being charged for their time! The price had then surged and doubled and was anther 30m wait. I have now been waiting over an hour and paid three times the amount. There is no customer service phone line or chat support of any kind, all you can do is submit a form and wait for them to reimburse your cancellation fee. This is not the first time this has happened and as soon as I am home I will be deleting this app and permanently switching to Lyft.
title: Customer Support Nonexistent

review: In the past day, when I would request a driver Uber will say “connecting you with a driver” and will display their location and ETA. But it stays this way for a minute or two and then expires and says all Uber drivers are currently busy or unavailable. I have attempted to connect numerous times I’m sure with different drivers and haven’t been able to get a ride. It seems nearly impossible to receive in-app assistance from customer service. Any other time my rating would be fulfilled 5/5 stars. Can a customer representative please help me resolve this issue?
title: Won’t connect with driver.

review: Could not be more disappointed by Uber. Twice in a week Uber has shown a price and then modified it along the way multiplying it by 5x. The notification is very hard to seen and it was made intentionally by Uber in order to charge its users more. Several of my friends have complained about the same problem in the last couple of weeks. I was charged $120 for a 5min trip last weekend when my friend paid $15 with Lyft for the same trip. This weekend, the same happened and I did not even see the surge. Could not be more upset. I encourage other affected users to complain and to delete the app.
title: When Uber lost complete Trust

review:
But too expensive considering the situation people have with inflation and the other thing is in my case you always calculate the distance to my house through the longes way which cause cost me more and take it longer to get here
I should say the last 2 weeks the prices started getting reduced and that is helpful
title: The service is good

review:
Big fan of Uber! Highly recommend! Just reporting a software bug

Hi there! Just around to report a UX bug in which I’m being prompted twice to rate and three times to tip. The big bug is a set of overlapping “pop-ups/IAMs” (likely one or both are native) following a ride asking to rate and tip. When I tip during a ride, I am asked again to tip when the ride is over and am afraid I’ll tip twice or not tip at all. Feel free to reach out if you need more info! Happy to help replicate the issue.

Sorry for the one star! Just trying to get your attention. Happy to remove the review after you see the UX bug bit 👍
title: UX Bug

review: While our driver was perfect for the 10 min. ride down, my only complaint is that when assessing a future ride price (around $10) when it came time to schedule a pick-up at 6:15 pm the ride was suddenly $37. That’s quite a mark-up. That bait and switch technique would give me pause to schedule future rides with Uber.
title: Trip from Geronimo to the Train Statiom

review: I would never recommend this service to anyone as my driver dropped me off in the hood because he had an attitude after I wouldn’t flirt back to him. Wrong location was picked up by the app, his GPS took him to the wrong location and refused to drive me AROUND THE CORNER to the right destination and told me I would have to pay for another ride because he wasn’t going to “drive around all day”. Dropped me off in the ghetto and made me walk a block away. I will never use Uber again and wouldn’t suggest any woman to either. Just use Lyft! My experience with that app was 100x better than Uber
title: Unsafe!!!

review: I keep getting all my cards decline and its really annoying because when am on a quick situation I have to use other apps because uber just don’t want to accept any of my cards…. Please fix the problem, is not a bank problem I have call many times and a transaction don’t even appear… uber can’t provide me a better answer then “please call you bank to verify” and is really stpd that a customer service can’t deal with what they are suppose to do…
title: Love uber but they need to fix too many issues

review: Could not have gone better.  I was worried about making an appointment and Uber was there to pick me up within 3 minutes of contacting them.  Honestly I had tried Lyft first and they couldn’t arrive for at least 25 minutes and I would have missed my appointment.  As I said, Uber was so much faster.  I highly recommend them.  Thanks!
title: Excellent!

review: I’ve been using the Uber app for 4 years now. My rids always show up on time. Almost every driver was professional, except for one, he had his radio on way too loud, at least he turned it down when I asked. I put this in his rating. It’s good that we have the option to rate each ride experience.
title: Easy, quick and efficient

review: Iggy was so helpful and kind. This was my first time using Uber and I wasn’t aware of how to use the app. I’m an disabled person with partial blindness so I didn’t know that every stop you have to make an reservation. He went out of his way to make sure that I got home from CVS pharmacy 700 West NORVELL Bryant HWY in Citrus Hill. And he told me that anytime that I needed a ride to call him. I will not forget his kindness
title: My Uber driver

review:
Both my husband and I have the Uber app on our phones. We both have had several experiences with scheduling in a Nuber and then it being canceled in route, more than once for the same trip. Very frustrating. 
For example it happened last week to my husband five times ( for one trip) in Denver, and he finally had to rent an electrical scooter for 7 miles back to his hotel.
title: Trouble getting an Uber

review: We encountered another irate driver who insisted we caused a tiny scratch on his car, while opening the door to get into Nicolette’s car. The car door didn’t even reach his car when we took a second look. She handled it well and we talked to multiple witnesses in the area to confirm her innocence. She was calm and collected and still got us where we needed to go!
title: Nicolette is very thorough

review: When the driver came to the meeting spot but turned away and left, I waited for a few minutes, then called the driver, then texted with no response. Then I decided to cancel - only to find out that for some reason I would be responsible for paying a cancellation fee! When I declined, nothing was happening, finally I accepted the fee because I needed to find another ride. The system informed me that it was too late for the original cancellation fee and now my fee would depend on how much time the driver lost!?! Are you f…ng crazy?!!! What kind of policy is this?!
title: Driver’s not showing up should not result in cancellation fee!

review: We had heard Uber is wonderful when one needs a ride in a city where you are not familiar.  We will be visiting Chicago and will need a ride from downtown to Wrigley Field to see the Cubs baseball game.  So this first Uber trip was a trial.  We can not praise the app enough.  Our driver was friendly, efficient, and explained everything.  We will be using Uber more and so should you.  Thanks Uber
title: First Uber Trip

review: Terrible experience from Tesla to go eat afterwards. It was very apparent the driver was stalling and driving around in circles until hopefully we cancelled because they could make twice as much with current pickups. How do I know this? They showed up right after THEY cancelled to pick someone else up. We are here for a very short period of time so a half hour plus for that was a big deal and we ended up paying literally twice as much when we rebooked. It’s not cool in Texas while you’re waiting. Guess what? After the driver canceled there was no way to rate them. Hmmmmmmm
title: First Uber my friend booked cancelled

review: Alpha was very kind and professional, and told me some of the reasons he loves being an Uber driver. Aside from the excellent money he is making, being an Uber driver provides many freedoms for him, such as; to work when he wants, and travel when he wants and/or needs to. For ME, an Uber ride is cleaner, and way more cost effective than paying for a taxi ride!
title: Trip to Nissan of Latham

review:
She picked me up from a doctors appointment. I had broken ribs and am on oxygen and have to use a walker. Natalie went above and beyond what I was expecting. She got me and the oxygen tank into the car then loaded my walker into the back.  She even helped me buckle my safety belt since I can’t bend that way to put it on. Once home she helped me to the door and made sure I got safely in.
Thank you so much!
title: Great service

review:
The drivers that I’ve experienced with Uber over the past 15-20 years are generally pretty good…..respectful, courteous, and good conversationalists. 
The problem I have is with the company itself. They charged me some bogus fee for 9.99 for Uber eats. I’ve never used that service & never intend to. And you can not reach them with any degree of ease….No email address, no phone number. Never heard of a business that has No listed phone number. Even my credit card company doesn’t know how to reach them. I have to file a “fraud” claim, cancel my credit card & wait for a new one. This is awful!!!
title: Con job

review:
I love Uber for traveling abroad.  It helps keep us foreigners from getting charged many times more than the regular fares.

But...here in Alexandria Egypt...the Uber navigation for my driver was awful.  It was trying to navigate us down dead end roads and all kinds of impossible directions.  This area needs some updated maps.
title: Uber is great while traveling to avoid taxi scams

review: App shows the vehicle allows 6 people and 3 bags. I booked two vehicles and none of them were have that capacity. One Driver was very rude he asked me to cancel the trip. For cancellation I paid $5, which is completely ridiculous. Another driver came with big vehicle and driver said it won’t fit for 6 people but it is a XL vehicle. It allowed only three passengers and 3 bags. I paid $75 for 3 miles trip. I need to book another vehicle for 3 more people. It became a robbery, cheating people with wrong information, cancellation fees and charging too much.
title: Booking experience-Worst

review: Driver Marquis was friendly yet professional, it was too bad my commute was so short! Great communication skills. I didn’t have to wait long. I haven’t used Uber in a while but I’m glad I kept the app on my phone. My gym closed early today and I wasn’t going to get picked up for another hour.  You never know when you might need a ride.
title: Excellent Service

review: Thank you so much for the early morning availability. That in an of itself is a big plus, the second thing I really enjoyed was being able to get your honest advice on a topic and your view. It helped open my eyes for an issue I was dealing with. If I could personally request you in the future I would! 5 stars plus on being a superb driver!
title: Ride

review: I booked an Uber after a concert. The app showed that my driver was three minutes away, but the driver apparently parked several miles away and stayed there for more than 10 minutes. I canceled the ride and tried to book another driver, after which the app crashed. It took 20 minutes until I could book another driver and I had to wait 15 more minutes for him to arrive. In all, I had to wait more than 30 minutes for a driver when the app initially showed my ride was three minutes away. If I could give Uber zero stars, I would
title: Lousy and unreliable

review:
My son was sick and I need a few things from the store. I couldn’t get a delivery from Instacart so I called him at Uber and asked if she would go to the store for me and without questioning he did and came right back and was a very good attitude and sweet and just I highly recommend this driver!  Thank you for doing that for me. I appreciate you and I wish you a blessed 2023!

Dr. Miller
title: Amazing customer care..

review: yesterday I wanted to trip through the app, I set the route, but changed my mind and exited the app, the trip was not created, and I, of course, did not go anywhere. later in the evening, I found out that Uber debited the amount from my card, 10 minutes later returned the amount for the trip that was 3 days ago. which is less than he wrote off yesterday. as a result: I did not take advantage of the trip and was left without money from their service. I can't dispute this trip - because it didn't happen. there is no history in the app.
title: uber scam! never link a card!

review: I have never had an unpleasant Uber driver nor a driver not willing to help me with my luggages. I am a senior citizen that travels frequently to visit my daughter in Washington, DC and while in Washington, DC we use Uber for dining out because of traffic and parking. The Uber driver is always on time and polite. I will continue to use Uber because I don’t like driving, and never have to worry about parking.
title: Uber Ride

review: Realllyyyyy bad customer service. My account had a glitch where it gave me a promo for Uber One, and I cancelled it so I wouldn’t be charged when the promo ended. The app told me it would stay on my account until the end of the promo, instead it kicked me off immediately. Emailed customer support for them to fix the glitch - it’s now been three days with ten different people giving me the same prewritten response. They say things that don’t even make sense based on my issue lol - clearly none of them even read customer help requests. It’s embarrassing honestly haha.
title: Horrible Customer Service

review: Scott was awesome. We had a flat tire tonight on New Year’s Eve, and ended up in a gas station as we were waiting forever for roadside assistance to get back to us. Scott came to our rescue right away and was so comforting as he listened to our adventure. Great experience and terrific person…one of those special ones you get that trusting vibe from, from the get go!
title: Incredibly kind and wonderful driver!

review: Luis is an example of reliability of why you should use Uber for your important trip as even though there was heavy traffic and easier to him just cancel the trip, he didn’t. He remained in communication with me and assured he would pick me up and get me on my way, which he did. Thank you for your commitment and getting me to my business meeting you rock.!
title: Uber driver Luis

review:
They have stolen me 1,300€ on my account with my credit card for another account. They’ve recognized that someone else has been using my credit card cause of an issue on their system BUT they told me that they can’t refund me. I’ve be provided all the requested proof.

I’m advising you to use other provider that are more trustworthy. I’ve been using these options for more than 6 months and I am glad that I’ve change because Uber has not ethics regarding its clients neither the drivers, they’re only looking for money.. it’s a shame
title: Don’t use UBER at all, they’ve stolen 1300€ on my account

review: I was on the phone with a Uber Customer Service Representative and I got my Uber Glitch Resolved. Apparently I had to many over booked Uber Rides in Advance. Thank You Uber for Fixing My Problem. I give Uber a 5 Star Customer Service review for working hard during these hard times. Thank You For Your Help Uber. I will be continuing to use Uber for Ever.
title: Out Standing Excellent Customer Service

review:
It was very frustrating trying to get a ride in South Bombay - the first driver took off even though I had booked a ride for 11 hours! The second never reached my address. The third was very good but I had to wait for 45 minutes till I got the good ride! 

Getting a ride is very tough but once you get one, everything works fine - I had the car for 11 hours and the driver was fantastic.
title: Problems getting a ride!

review: The app works as long as you don’t have a problem. The only way to contact customer service is to send an email through the app. Also no way to ask for a different driver is your driver doesn’t show. I reserved a ride for 4:00am. A driver accepted. However, they never showed up. And never left their location. And of course, there is no customer service to help. I had to cancel the ride to ask for another driver and was charged 60% cancellation fee. I was charged $33 for canceling a ride that was supposed to cost $56. Uber is not my first choice. I prefer to use a taxi.
title: Bad customer service

review: I luv this app so much but we do have a slight problem with racism , about 2days ago i was standing out inna cold waiting for ride when i had 3 different drivers cancel on me , bc of my skin color all of them where white . N the only person who felt comfortable enough to take me home from work was an Nigerian male. That made me feel sum typa way bc if ur a driver u should expect to encounter other races . So i took that pretty personally.
title: Slight problem

review: One of the drivers shared that Uber now shares the pick up and drop off locations of the rides before they have to accept. Because of this, it’s getting harder and harder to count on Uber when you need it.  Despite Uber claiming they had a ride 4 minutes away, I waited for over 15 minutes trying to connect to a driver. I tried all levels of car to see if that helped but no luck. Finally got one to connect and they canceled less than 30 seconds later.
title: Less and less reliable

review: I used to use Uber every day to get to and from work and school. I’be gotten drivers who can’t follow simple road laws and are extremely rude. I’ve had to sit and wait multiple times for half an hour waiting for a driver to take my ride. Still got charged for cancellation because I couldn’t find a driver and was late to work. Now I have to “verify my purchase” every time by scanning my card in the app and then it cancels my ride. This is outrageous and I’m tired of the foolishness.
title: Used to love. Now won’t be using unless I have to.

review: Our driver mistakenly told us that our drop off point was a boarded up building in Lisbon. Instead of carefully looking at our destination, he was ready to drop us off and let us find our hotel as opposed to making sure that we were safely dropped off at the correct location. He kept insisting that his drop off point was correct, and if the building was boarded up that was our problem. Fortunately I noticed that the hotel was right across the street and there was no issue after that point.
title: An uncertain arrival

review: I have used Uber for about 4 years and it’s always been great even after covid but more recently I, a person with a 4.9 rating, have been having issues getting a ride no matter what side of town I am on. According to drivers they are able to see where you’re going before they accept the ride and how much it will pay. As a result drivers have been denying rides.  Meanwhile the rider still have to pay surge prices just to probably not get to their destination on time. I can call my ride an hour early and I’ll still be late. Unacceptable!
title: Needs actual employees (please read)

review: I always have a good experience with Uber drivers, but the company is mediocre. The app doesn’t accept discover for payments which is aggravating. And the rewards system is not rewarding. If you want to redeem your points for a ride then they limit how much of your reward you can use per ride. Also, they require that you only use those rewards on comfort. So using your rewards doesn’t give you a discount because they force you to use the more expensive ride option.
title: The drivers are great the company is average

review:
It feels great to be able to connect with drivers through uber. But its disappointing tha I find the same location out of the reach of uberx in different times. In Bangladesh and more specifically in chattagram, I called uberx earlier in the cantonment. But now it shows only intercity , cng and the motos. I hope it gets fixed and uberx can be availed in the Cantonments area without hassle since its well within the city. 
Thanks.
title: Needs to include the Cantonment in UBERX

review: My husband has to take our kids to school and then head to work. The drivers are always canceling when they see that we have more than 2 stops and it’s getting tiring already. It’s always a back to back thing. Then we have to wait longer for someone who is 15 mins away making my kids and husband late to work. If they don’t want to do more than 2 stops maybe they shouldn’t be working for Uber. They shouldn’t have the option to cancel once they have accepted the ride, it’s really inconsiderate and it’s getting ridiculous.
title: Drivers are always canceling

review:
Until Uber offers more options on the app, it's a one star. 
Tipping - I obligatory tip even when I've been in vehicles with stoned/drunk/careless drivers.  I am a good tipper when deserved. But with the ride apps there's a "they know who I am" feel. Make tipping anonymous like our driver ratings. I don't want to tip someone who's falling asleep on the way to the airport. 
Lyft now offers options like quiet ride, help with bags and I think a few more. This would be nicer than asking the driver to please turn down the music they're blasting (I rarely do this).
How about an option that says, "please do not pair me with this person again" without rating the driver? In some instances, it's a preference (I just don't like the way some people drive. I myself hate driving). Or no rating is for not pair me instead of a 5 star. 
Price gouging - well known. I don't need to say more. 
Breathalyzers? Speed tracking?
title: Everything should be anonymous including tips

review: I’ve been using Uber to get to and from work for like 6 months now. Multiple times I’ve been late because of driver cancellations. For example, just yesterday I started trying to get a ride at like 7:35. Didn’t get to work till 9. And now again today I have been lookin since 7:15. It’s now 8 and my driver is still 15 out. If you don’t care what time u get places or it doesn’t matter, then this isn’t a problem for u. But also watch out with those cancellations, I’ve been charged a few times.
title: Wouldn’t suggest it

review: The app is ridiculously bad at providing proper support. I had a wrongful charge to my card, and after clicking through some steps to get in touch with a representative, I just get this automated message that my charge has been (very very minutely) adjusted and there is nothing else that can be done on this receipt. There is no way to contact support and no way to tell them that this was a wrongful charge and a mistaken resolution. I am very disappointed in their manipulation and lack of avenues to reach them about it. Can’t find a number or email anywhere. Anyone else have this issue?
title: Support is gone

review: I payed $35 for an Uber that they later tried to charge me for again even though the transaction went through on my card. I reached out to “premium support” for help and they sent me the same copy-pasted message twice, both responding to a different question that I didn’t even ask. If you’re going to bother offering “premium support” then at least have your employees actually read what the customer is saying. I don’t know why you would bother providing a support function in your app if you’re not even gonna bother to try to be helpful with it.
title: Disregard for customers

review:
I used Uber to reserve a ride to the airport.  I received a confirmation the night prior that a guy named “Kevin” was going to come get me.

15 minutes after my driver was supposed to arrive I got a push notification that no one was coming.  I live in Denver Metro so getting a new driver shouldn’t have been an issue but they didn’t send one.  Missed flight. $10 consolidation is Ubers response.

If you actually need to get anywhere, don’t use Uber Reserve.  Idk if Uber does anything to their drivers who confirm they’ll do a pickup but cancel last minute but I suspect not if drivers are pulling this.
title: Uber Reserve Cancelled On Us After Pickup Time

review: My card I’ve been using is restricted. I’ve asked why with only very general responses with a link for terms of service like I’m supposed to guess! Fix your customer service and get a hotline. I’ve given them different payment methods. Just terrible! 0 stars if I could just purely based off the customer service… My account has been overdraft even AFTER I contacted customer service. They stopped responding! I have no clue why my original card was restricted nor was able to change the card! Ok UBer lol I’ll just take it off the top no tips… until my 35 is paid off
title: Customer service

review: Charge top dollar paid drivers under dollars for a 10 minute drive from where I live is $50 if you don’t schedule a ride cars are always unavailable if possible I will now use this app unless I really really had to if I did I will schedule a ride just because I might have the time if I don’t do anything but catch a ride on Lyft or Uber Currently
title: Overrated

review: Pick up times and fares are getting worse and worse. I’ve had several drivers cancel on me while they were on their way-only to wait for another 30 minutes for the next driver to come pick me up. If I’m lucky, I will get the typical price for a trip. But during rush hour/when there aren’t any drivers available fares are marked up 5x. What should be a $10 trip should not end up being a $50 ride (not even including tip)
title: Worse pickup times+fares

review: How is it not possible to order a cab to pick someone up from an address that is not your gps location!? TWICE, I order a cab to pick up my sister-in-law to send them home from their location, and TWICE the app decides to send the cab to my location better! Then charges me the cancellation fee! Last time I use this trash!
title: Uber app has become garbage!!
developerResponse: {'id': 13072873, 'body': "Hi, we are sorry to hear about your unpleasant experience with the schedule ride. We will have a look into this for you. Please send us a note to t.uber.com/contact or via the in-app Help section and we'll connect. Also, we understand your concern related to the driver-partner arriving at the wrong pickup location. However, in order to assist you any further, we request you to confirm if the pickup location is reflecting incorrectly on your device or not. Drop more details here.", 'modified': '2020-01-23T05:29:16Z'}

review:
I have loved uber rides, but I have had it with the food side. I will not support this company until the issues are fixed or they simply stop trying to be greedy by “providing a bunch of GREAT services,” when those services barely work.

That aspect of the app is complete garbage. The problem boils down to one thing: it is a giant waste of time disguised as a convenience. Issues to fix before it is viable:
1). Since you are required to input address first, TELL THE CUSTOMER ITS OUT OF RANGE IF IT IS. That way they don’t waste their time typing in like 10 orders. 
2). If you can’t order because there is a “surge” or “there are no drivers in the area” THAN TELL THE CUSTOMER FIRST! Once again, don’t make your customers waste time typing in 10 orders.
3). Allow tips to be removed after or there to be like a “pay upon arrival” tip or something. We have had so many milkshakes delivered after 2 hours of waiting to be completely melted and warm.
title: Removed App Because of Food Service

review: Uber is the worst app. They over charge you and don’t respond to the issues you have. Honestly, I stared using Lyft last month and the way they help make the rides more affordable is tres magnifique. If you’re still riding with Uber and you think they’re saving you money, they aren’t. I had an issue with ubereats where I had a drink delivered to me with no covering. It was a large drink that I paid for. I told them the part where you insert the straw wasn’t covered but they said they had a “process” and couldn’t compensate me in any way. I detest this company. I only use Lyft and DoorDash. DoorDash always listens and provides a response. I hope this company tanks.
title: The Worst App

review:
I can no longer find the family profile I set up - it’s not in Settings, it’s not in Wallet (where I can see my personal profile and open up a business profile). This is really inconvenient because the family profile was specifically set up to help out someone who is in a tight financial spot. 
I don’t know in which update this might have happened but the UI and navigation have gone a bit sideways. Please stop making it difficult for people to find the basic functions.
title: Good, not great

review: It has been well over a year since my initial complaint. I have about $2 in gift card balance on my account. I bought another gift card to load onto the account, but I don’t have the option to add it, just to view the balance. There have been countless app updates since then with no fix. I’ve ask many times for help with this issue, and all I get is the same instructions over and over, which DO NOT WORK. I have sent screenshots, I have exchanged emails, and more than a year later, this STILL is not fixed??? What a terrible company and a terrible app. I’d rate 0 if I could.
title: Still can’t add additional gift cards
developerResponse: {'id': 14254035, 'body': "Hi, this certainly sounds frustrating. Let's make sure we follow up with you regarding the issue you are facing with adding a gift card. Send in a quick note to t.uber.com/contact and we'll connect.", 'modified': '2020-03-26T04:29:32Z'}

review:
Angelo was a great safe driver. I arrived at my location for pick up very much on time.
He was courteous. His car was very clean inside and out. We arrived at JFK in an hour which was perfect for check in. He helped us with our luggage and wished us a safe trip. 
I would be happy to recommend Angelo as a driver any time. I have no problem giving him a great review.
title: Great driver.. timely and smooth

review: It had been a long stressful day. First time flying in 25 years. Flying is in my category of the things I really hate. Yes it is a strong word and not something I use often. Anyway, back to the review. Charles was great and made the stressfully day end well. Uber will be something I will use again when I need a ride. Thank you Charles for been so kind and reassuring.
title: My first Uber trip

review:
Why frustrated? I may be the only person to have this happen, but I sometimes need to modify my reservation. The app doesn’t seem to allow that. Instead, I have to cancel and start all over. Why? Lyft makes it easy. 

Why very upset? The absurdity of charging $10 to $40 to reserve a ride, on top of the cost of the ride, is outrageous. I will never pay that fee. I can live with modest rate changes due to peak demand. But reserving the ride should be a benefit to the company since it can better allocate its drivers.
title: Very frustrating and very upset

review: Our first experience utilizing Uber in Mexico was excellent! We were not sure where we were but the driver found us, and we were so grateful after a very long day of walking around the city of Merida! He even gave us recommendations of some places to eat since we asked. Thank you, Luis Rogelio for a great ride back to our hotel.
title: First time user in a foreign country.

review: They don’t have control over drivers what’s so ever, after you request a ride the driver will text you with a whole different price like 500 liars different minimum that’s so crazy and the wait time for them to accept your request is a whole different problem you will be luck if one driver accepts your request and came to pick you up with the meter it will has to be an new driver who will take you old account drivers forget it if you see the driver been doing this job more then 5 months just cancel better and faster for you
title: Worst app to use in Turkey

review: I enjoyed my ride with Sherman tremendously! He is a fascinating man who has lived all over the world and has many stories to tell. He helped me take a step closer to solving the meaning of my Norwegian family farm name and that made my day! I had a hard fall and broke 5 ribs recently and he was careful to take corners and starts and stops gently to prevent any painful events. Wonderful, considerate driver.
title: Sherman is a top driver

review: Every weekend my mom Ubers to my house usually Sunday but sometimes Saturday. Every driver she has had has been kind helpful polite and has made her ride feel safe and comfortable. She’s 83 and needs assistance with her walker and every driver has helped her with her walker which is not always easy so I’d like to thank you all the drivers my mom Ann has had this far
title: Professional drivers

review: App is slow, constantly deletes part or all of my grocery list while I’m adding stuff. Also frequently changes the drop off location to spots near our house so the drivers get confused. Messaging with the driver works inconsistently, oftentimes I don’t receive their messages and the conversation appears totally blank on both the driver and my end. Incredibly frustrating app, but I’m disabled so I need to depend on it to get my groceries and I don’t have a car so I don’t have another way of getting around.
title: Terrible for groceries

review: I’m very unhappy with how this app has been, it seems to be an every day issue, I submit for my ride which ranges around 10 to 12 dollars, and then I wait…and wait….and wait, no one grabs my ride or someone who’s doing a ride the next town over does and I can’t wait for that long or they cancel me. Here’s the kicker, Uber will cancel your ride after awhile saying drivers are too busy, when you reorder again, the price jumps to 25 or even 30, horrible service, really annoying, I like Lyft because they’ll save your previous price, will not use Uber ever again.
title: Needs fixing

review:
My ride was fine. It’s a relatively short drive but the route Uber sent my driver on was pretty ridiculous. I did not intervene of course but idk how that route was delivered to he driver. As I said it was a pretty short drive so it added only 5-10 minutes. 

Also I always look at this first:  the child locks were locked and that makes me uneasy. Uber please instruct your drivers to disengage the child locks. Thank you.
title: Circuitous route

review: I forgot my wallet in the back. Called George and he dropped it off where our activity was going on, and even took a picture of the person he left it with, should there be any problems. He went above and beyond!  He was also very informative on the way there. We would ride with him a anytime!
title: George went above and beyond for us today!

review: He’s literally the best! Gave him the wrong address and he was so understanding and turned right around to take us to the correct one. We were taking his Uber to find a Turo car, but we’re given a wrong address. So he kindly drove us around the block/surrounding streets where it could’ve been to make sure we found the car. So thoughtful and over the top driver!
title: TOP UBER DRIVER!!

review: I have always had good luck with Urber until this morning. Last week I made a reservation and this morning when I was ready to leave I checked for my drivers info and it said my trip was in 13 minutes, no driver info. Then I went to the site and a very tiny blue ball showed and next to it no drivers available!!! Why wasn’t I notified earlier so I could make other arrangements which is tough to do at 4:45 in the morning.
title: Early morning problem

review: My brother left his bag inside in the Uber car, with passport and everything. UBER REFUSED TO GIVE DRIVER PHONE NUMBER, Uber don’t help and the bag still with the driver, Uber give the driver my brother phone number but he is not calling and Uber completely ok with the driver keeping the bad. We have gps inside the bad and we trying to find the driver but because it’s AirTag no success. We are going to try order bunch of Ubers till we can possibly get same driver and get the bad. Police can’t help with it also. I will never drive Uber again in my life and I’m very hope this company will shut down like it’s deserve!!!!!
title: UBER NEEDS TO BE SHOT DOWN!!!

review: At this point the majority of Uber eats drivers are trash. Most of the times when I place an order I never receive it because the driver assigned to my orders says it’s been picked up by someone else . The drivers are literally taking the food for themselves. Recently I had an order estimated that the latest arrive time was 2pm it was 3 almost 4pm an the map showed the driver still “on his way” , and support said the same thing . I repeated to them that no order should take almost 2 hours to arrive , there solution was to give me 20% I’m credits on an order I paid $40 .
title: Trash delivery drivers

review: Your app does not work on lower iOS version not even that old. It says it will download the last compatible version then sends me to the App Store, it downloads, then the app says its time to upgrade when opened, the app then sends me back to the App Store to download the last compatible version & so on & so on. You app doesn’t work. Also your mobile browser website does not work. It keeps rejecting my Thursday scheduled time of 5:10am & it changes it to 12:10am. I am truly disappointed in my experience with Uber. 1 Star review
title: Forces my phone into an Update loop and then sends me back to App Store

review:
The drivers are ALWAYS phenomenal. The issue here is that the app tries to place your pickup point a block away from you instead of calculating a better location.

For instance, I was at home in the apartment address registered on my account and even after I tried to edit the pickup point to be closer to me, the app led my driver to an incorrect location (which made me late for work). 

I’m sure there are ways to fix this issue.
title: App Programming could use some work.

review: Was charged $8 going to the restaurant then they wanted to charge me $20 for the trip home cancelled with in 10 minutes but didn’t get a response from the driver it was raining so I’m sure the driver got another fare right away but they want to charge me $20 also the driver was 20 minutes away not good maybe I’ll use lift next time
title: Same route different price
developerResponse: {'id': 34103829, 'body': "Hi, We're extremely sorry to hear about your concern regarding your recent experience. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve your concern, fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343HNsE. We shall get back to you at the earliest.", 'modified': '2023-01-05T07:32:36Z'}

review: My car broke down as I was leaving New Orleans to go home to Texas for Christmas. The mechanic couldn’t fix it til the next morning, so I had to book a hotel. My car was packed full of presents and bags, and Solomon helped me get them all out of my car and then helped me unload at the hotel. Absolutely fantastic! Such a kind and gentle person and was truly a godsend. Thank you!
title: Solomon was fantastic!

review: Just released from the hospital. Ordered an Uber, took 20 mints to find a driver. Whatever. While 10 min away cancels. This happened twice. I used to call a taxi service and they follow through when they say they are going to pick you up.  But all the taxi services are out of business because of Uber and Lift. We traded making a phone call for an app and what we got is substandard service. I should be compensated for being canceled on. If I cancel while the driver is on the way, I get charged. Should work both ways. Terrible company.
title: A taxi service wouldn’t cancel while you wait

review: Uber is so lucky to have the driver I had today! I told him I needed to get to Mercer Island fast and he said “safety first”.  His car was very clean, and I told him I get car sick if I ride in the back. So he cleared the front seat and let me sit in the front. This was my first experience with Uber and I am so very pleased with the service. A special thank you to my exceptional driver! Merry Christmas
title: The nicest drive for Uber!

review: Thank you for the great service! My niece had to be picked up late at night, and the driver was a great driver, he had to wait for her for 8 extra minutes and he did, she was coming of a building to a dark parking lot so I was very thankful for him waiting and making sure my niece arrive home safe. Thank you for going the extra mile.
title: Great experience and confiable service

review: My last ride was with a fellow named Oscar. I was at the ER at Saint Mary’s for something like seven hours. I was so ready to get out of that place and Oscar showed up within about 11 minutes, and it was the middle of the night or early morning. I was having trouble walking so he pulled up close to the door. And he was a real nice fella. And I was never so glad to see an Uber driver.
title: Quick pickup

review: Been using Uber for years and really have never had any issues with drivers or other passengers. Whenever I travel the app with the most availability of drivers has been Uber. This even includes when I went to Europe. I have yet to try their food delivery service but I’m positive it will get better and better.
title: Just what I need when traveling

review: I spent 15 minutes unsuccessfully trying to add a comment about how outstanding my drive and his vehicle were. I could only find many ways to complain. I know that is indicative of ourselves as a whole, but as I am not here because of the rest of the world I decided to write only the second review I have ever written. The first was another situation we’re services rendered where what I could have only considered the best anyone could have experienced. Please make it easier to compliment the drivers
title: Easy to complain/ impossible to be positive.

review: During my ride I tapped a tip percentage and the app acknowledged the tip. After the ride ended I happened to look at the ride summary and it showed I hadn’t added a tip. It’s pretty maddening that the Uber app took the tip away. They make it impossible to contact Uber unless I am looking for a refund or trying to punish a driver so I couldn’t even contact Uber so that they can clear up this unfair glitch. I think I need to stop using Uber, it feels like they don’t care about their drivers or the quality of their app or the ability for customers to give feedback.
title: App wouldn’t give a tip, impossible to contact Uber

review: This review isn’t about the service which is generally fine (except for frequent cancelations by drivers) but the app which constantly forces me to update to the latest version which then also forces me to update to the latest IOS or it won’t work. Great. I really love having risking making my old phone useless or slower just so i can use a car service. Keep this up and I’ll will switch 100% over to your competitors who somehow manage to avoid forcing me to choose to update or not be able to use their apps
title: Always requiring me to update app and IOS is ANNOYING!

review: App works fine. Despite a ton of privacy options and notification options that you can turn off (and I did turn them all off, everything that wouldn’t directly impact notifications pertaining to my ride status), I continued to get notifications for UberEats ads. The only way to disable completely it seems is to use the phone’s notification settings, which would interfere with notifications with rides also. Will be deleting the app and just redownloading on an as needed basis. Maybe there would be better luck with a competitor’s app.
title: Notifications

review: I booked two rides for an event, to and from.  I booked these over 10 hours before the event.  The first ride notified me they would be arriving 55 minutes past the pickup time.   I cancelled this ride and called friends until I found a ride as I would have missed my event.  On the ride home my driver was set to get me exactly on time.  They never arrived, never contacted me, and 15 minutes after my pickup the ride was cancelled and Uber charged me a cancellation fee.  They completely ruined my night and had the audacity to charge me for it.  I called for a Lyft and promptly got a ride home like promised.
title: Do not rely on Uber

review:
I scheduled a ride to the airport two days in advance. Then come the morning of, my ride is taking longer than stated. Out of no where it switches to saying that there are now no available drivers, even though I reserved days prior. So at 4am, now running late, I had to find a way to make my plane. I downloaded Lyft and was picked up within 30 minutes. 

Also, how can drivers keep 4.9 and 5 star ratings when they just drop rides they agreed to pick up. I feel like that should count against them. 

Anyways, don’t waste your time with Uber. Lyft saved my day and money.
title: Not reliable

review: Signed up with Uber per a friends request. It took them six months to do a background check. I’ve done other background checks with companies that took three days. So many issues starting off. I also have a Tesla model S. Luxury electric car. They will not add” Lux” option it to my account. Telling me I have to sign up again with a different email and go through the process again. Not doing it. This company doesn’t seem to know what’s going on. Issue after issue after issue. Deleting the app sticking with Lyft
title: So many issues before I even have my first ride

review: The wheelchair accessible rides are completely unreliable. On more than one occasion, I’ve been stranded in a major city, unable to secure a ride for over an hour. I rarely leave my house because handicap rides with Uber are such a nightmare. I’ve had so many problems with the app presenting inaccurate or false information. Problems with drivers accepting rides but never showing up. Problems with Uber saying drivers are available when they aren’t. The service looks good on paper but the user experience is a joke. It’s an insult to people with disabilities.
title: Terrible for people with disabilities

review: Over the course of three years, I have been trying to order Ubers. For some reason my account won’t allow me to pay for anything. No matter what payment info I put in it says my payment cannot be processed. Unfortunately, Uber does not believe in customer service. This company does not even have a hotline to call for help on how to give them freaking money. You all should download Lyft, it’s cheaper, the drivers are friendlier, the app is more intuitive and they have great customer service. Uber can rot and die in the profitless pit and sexual assault scandals they are in.
title: Worst Company on Planet

review: The latest version of the app for iPhone left out the "past rides" feature. This is needed in order to get receipts for rides.  I deleted and reinstalled the app, and the previous app version came up with the receipt function.  Later, it reverted to the new version of the app without the receipt function.  I deleted and reinstalled the app again, and got the receipts function back.  It then reverted back to the latest version.
title: New app for iPhone has problem

review: I’ve been using Uber for a while to get to and from work. However, after my experience today, I will not be using it anymore. My driver made an unnecessary stop to get coffee while I was waiting to get to work. After complaining and requesting a refund due to my lost wages because I was late for work, they responded with $5 Uber cash (for a $15 trip) and an apology. All I want is my money back, but Uber is refusing, instead giving me Uber cash to ensure that I have to use Uber again if I want it to be worth anything.
title: Not worth the money

review: Unfortunately in recent years it has been rare that I have had a good experience with Uber or Uber eats. Nearly every ride or delivery there is some issue- sometimes big, sometimes small. Uber Support used to resolve these issues with ease, but now I have found that they only respond to a portion of my question and ignore the true issue at hand. I have trouble continuing to support a company that is so obviously trying to nickel and dime it’s customers.  I have personally had much better experiences with its competitors.
title: Gone down hill..

review: I was leaving my brothers wedding got an Uber it said 1 minute away for like 15 minutes I tried to call this guy 2x direct thru the app and 3x to his cell number never picked up once and you still tried to charge me for a driver who never showed up to the venue with multiple wedding guests waiting on rides that’s sickening. The Uber hiring strictness over the years has become a joke, you used to need a recent make and model car a good driving record and now they will sub contract any person with license or even a learners permit. I can’t believe how sad this company has become.
title: One star because you hire idiots
developerResponse: {'id': 11367081, 'body': "Hi, we're sorry to hear that you were charged. Let's make sure we follow up with you regarding this. Send in a quick note to t.uber.com/contact and we'll connect.    ", 'modified': '2019-10-21T08:30:44Z'}

review: Got a ride to a store, asked the driver if I was able to add the trip home to the current trip, it was only gonna take 5 minutes, he said just request another when I was done, and I’ve been waiting for an hour and a half for another driver to be available, which there still aren’t any. Got someone from my local Jeep group to pick me up instead. What a joke. If you can’t give people rides then close down your business because I have better things to do than sit outside of a store for an hour and a half.
title: It’s great, if you like waiting hours for a ride

review: If only I could give this app a negative star I would. I have been using Uber for years and been using this in different countries but now I guess it’s time to delete this app since price surge goes up to 4x the regular price is and they kept glitching showing me the right address when on the map but when the driver is here the address changes to where they pick you up and the price can go from twice to 4 times the regular price. How is that fair to the riders. I guess time to delete this very misguiding app that just loves to trick their customers with their surges.
title: Price surge are ridiculous!

review: Truly, If you actually cared, like about being efficient and delivering food, you wouldn’t allow drivers to take multiple deliveries and let other customers orders fester and rot.  What is that service fee even for?  Truly, if you cared about customer service, you would make it mandatory for drivers to share their location, because as customers we care about our food and safety and don’t really want wait outside or have to run in the street to meet your drivers.    This is the short list. GYST. You’ve got one job!  Good delivery!  That’s it.   One job.
title: Food app, that doesn’t really respect food?

review: Just got a bogus charge after a month of not using the app with a very vague and poorly written explanation as to why. I’ll be contesting the charge and never using this service again. It’s just a bunch of impatient drivers who try to push you to make deals with them for trips outside of the app.  ZERO actual customer service is available if you have an issue and you can FORGET getting a sense of being a valued customer when they have robo emails to which you can’t reply giving drive-by notices about random charges you can’t get an explanation for.
title: Deleting account and app

review: I was using only Lyft but I don’t get a ride with them sometimes so I decided to download Uber. Got a ride in a flash. But NOW they’re getting to be just as bad. Never any rides so they say but you can jack up the prices and a driver will get to me in 15-20 minutes!! I would rather call out from work than pay 20 bucks for a ride. Especially when the ride only cost 5 bucks at the most!! Y’all need to do better with these rides. I request my rides while I’m getting ready for work an whole hour or two early and sometimes still can’t get a ride!! It’s very frustrating. Y’all need more drivers!!
title: Almost Getting like Lyft

review:
I have used Uber twice first time had over $500 stolen including all mine and my family’s  passports car keys etc. Uber said it wasn’t an emergency wouldn’t call the driver and would only help if and I quote “we were raped or murder” 

Second time I ordered for my son to get a ride home from his job 15 min away and surged me to $68 all the while kept saying there is a higher fee, I’m thinking a couple bucks cause how convenient it didn’t say the amount till my kid was picked up and it was $66-$70. What could I do have my kid get out. Uber is the worse company with the shadiest drivers. Use at your own risk.
title: Stolen items and $60 rides 15 min down the road

review: This is a HUGE thank you to Mr. Gustavo for his professionalism in driving me to my 2 hour destination.  The ride was enjoyable as Gustavo’s driving was relaxing, smooth and safe from start-to-end.  Gustavo was pleasant throughout the trip and we completed our trip sooner than the original  drop-off time.  Thank you Mr. Gustavo for your outstanding driving service.  Kind regards.
title: Re:  Driver Gustavo

review: This is the second time with 6 days I have been charged for a ride and the driver did not showed up. I was given the notification that the driver canceled my ride. I have to order another ride and was charged for them again. On top of that it makes me late for work. Please refund my money to my account
title: Driver did not show up

review: There was a time when Uber was a great alternative in transportation. Nowadays it’s become increasingly difficult to secure a ride in a timely way. Several drivers were within 5-7 minutes and didn’t accept. I ended up with a driver that was nearly 20 minutes and 7 miles away, which nearly made me late to work. Drivers canceling because they want to cherry pick high value ride requests is a growing problem for Uber. I’m not sure if Uber can or will do anything to fix the issue.
title: Turning into an inconvenience

review: The  app is excellent, but one area that could use some improvement is the process of editing a pickup location. It was quite challenging to locate this feature, and it took me a considerable amount of time. Enhancing the visibility and ease of use for this feature would greatly enhance the overall user experience.
title: Pick up location option not easy to find

review: My kid was being a so-n-so (brat) but our driver made no big deal about it. I appreciate that. It’s stressful enough dealing with embarrassing behavior issues as it is. We took the fam to enjoy bowling, movies and games. Always Uber home if we decide on a drink, our driver was great. Had a VERY CLEAN and comfortable ride which means a lot! Thank you for getting all of home safely!
title: Just a family night out

review: Thanks so much for getting my pops to his place safely, he said you were great to talk to and have done some cool jobs, hope he didn’t talk your ear off to much. He’s the best thing that’s ever happened to me and my mom, I love him so much, he just doesn’t know how to use cell phones that good, so your hospitality went above and beyond and I really appreciate it. Thank you!!
title: Jamal was great!!

review: I do not recommend anyone to buy the gift card online from the app, you may have my same experience, I bought a gift card and I sent it to a person next to me, and since the person tried to put the funds in his wallet the card said it had no funds, and for the expensive Uber services these things should not happen, I wrote to technical support and they did not help me or gave me any explanation of the possible error, they only reinforce the idea that someone else used it but that is impossible. I hope it doesn't happen to you
title: Gift card

review: Denise was the best driver I’ve ever encountered. I had a few issues this morning which caused me to run past the time of my pickup. She waited so patiently and was so friendly throughout the entire time. I had my 8 month old granddaughter with me, which slowed me down a bit… but Denise didn’t complain not one time. Thanks for being so polite and professional!
title: Best service!!!

review: I was a Lyft customer for several years, never used Uber. I left my phone in the Lyft and without my phone had no recourse to find my phone. Contacted Lyft they were absolutely no help in assisting me in finding my phone. I decided I would not use them again and would try Uber. Had my first ride today with a very pleasant and helpful gentleman. So far so good!
title: So Far So Good

review: Sometimes i have app issues. Currently for about a week now i can’t get the app to find rides. If i click on a previous destination the app will not be able to find any rides and i can’t choose new destinations. The app stays stuck on the screen where i enter pickup and drop off location. App won’t determine my location so i have to manually drop the pin, but even after putting the info the app does nothing to move the order forward and find rides. Lyft seems more reliable
title: Unreliable app.

review: It’s no surprise that Uber is a money grubbing company that seems to be unable to convince public investors they’re a successful business. The truth is they’re not. As we all know they have some of the worst customer support lines out of any app I’ve ever used. I still don’t even know how to call them directly. Lyft is unfortunately no better so the only solution is if cities form government subsidizes ride sharing services and employee people full time to finally get rid of these godforsaken services. Uber is no better than WeWork.
title: Awful customer service with no clear way to contact support.

review: This is a point hard to fix cause living in the border line between Nassau county and NYC there’s a lot controversy and also differences in the price, by law NYC drivers doesn’t have to pick up passengers out of the town thing what is not been fixed for UBER, as a company is bad to offer to the passenger a driver when he doesn’t know where is the passenger’s destination, at least when is out of the fully right is not right for the drivers been in that position
title: Driver’s cancellation

review:
I am a person with disabilities.  I use the help of my service dog.  Every single time I send the driver a note saying I have a service dog with me the drivers always cancel and pass me along to a different driver and then I end up paying almost twice the price of the original driver.  

This company hires drivers who discriminate against people with disabilities.  Their drivers DO NOT follow federal laws and rules regarding the American with Disability Act.
title: Extremely hard to figure out how to report discrimination

review:
The service is great when everything works.
Unfortunately, the app constantly switches the screen display with advertisements.  If you accidentally tap in the wrong place trying to get back to see when your driver is arriving, you may find that your pickup place has changed.  I wish there was a place where I could tap to just see the pickup and destination point and time to driver arrival.  After more than 150 Uber trips, I should not be having so much trouble.
title: Too many distracting ads

review: Nathaniel is a man of excellent character who was kind, considerate, and a gentleman. I am a senior citizen and he helped me carry some heavy items up to my door. I told him it was my first time using Uber and asked if I should leave a tip. He said, “No, no. It’s not necessary.” That’s why I left him 25%.  We need more people of high character in our world today.  Thank you, Nathaniel.
title: Character is important!

review: I’ve used Uber for a few years with minimal problems. However, on my last few rides, I’ve had issues with the app. I will request a ride, and as soon as I do so, the app will buffer for several minutes, showing a different status every time I refresh the app. You cannot cancel a ride while it’s in this stage, so I have no choice but to wait it out. This has caused me to be late for work a few different times now. Support does absolutely nothing and is very hard to contact.
title: Getting worse?

review: All the drivers that I I have had the pleasure of meeting and conversation with them have been very lovely people. Up until now they’ve always been extremely friendly, and go above and beyond my needs of service while on our way to my destinations! Thank you UBER for providing your customers with outstanding drivers! I love UBER SERVICES!!❤️❤️❤️
title: Drivers

review:
I came BD after 4 years. Before that I was a frequent users of Uber and the service was awesome. But now when I request for a ride it will take time and no cars are available. Drivers call and ask for location and reject the ride. My family and friends also share the similar experience. Now we use Pathao and when the don’t get the cars then only we are bound to use Uber. Hope Uber will sort out this issue and we will be satisfied using their services just like before. 

Thank You.
title: Availability

review:
Our family uses the service and it has been reliable and safe. I do hope you will get the assist program in our area. I use a very lightweight wheelchair, 13.5 pounds, and it easily disassembles to put in a car or trunk. I could easily use Uber if 
the driver could put my wheelchair in the trunk and get it out for me at the end of the ride.
title: Good service

review: Uber is super unreliable if your not in or close to a city. I live 6 miles outside city limits & it often takes drivers upwards of 20 mins to get to my house. I end up having to order a ride an hour ahead of whenever I’m supposed to be somewhere because they advertise that there’s a driver 15 mins away, if they don’t take the request it gets pushed back to 20+ min wait for them to even GET HERE to pick me up & take me where I need to go. As someone who cannot drive due to disability this is extremely frustrating.

May God continue to a less this man. I was at one train station that the inside was closed and had to use the restroom but couldn’t. He picked me up and allowed me to restroom while traveling to another Amtrak
Station that was open. Wonderful thing to do as a Human
Being and a kind man. Also found out we’re both from the south. Have an awesome rest
Of your day Sir.
title: Amtrak to Amtrak

review:
I spent several hours in the emergency room on my first day in Palm Springs.  When I called for an Uber ride back to the hotel he was prompt in responding and arrived just when he said he would be there. 
I found Shawn to be a very pleasant,polite and friendly level headed young man.  He was very accommodating and made an easy end to a very difficult day
Thank you Shawn
title: Shawn was an excellent driver

review:
Just like many “First Time” things we have done in our life’s. You really never forget the experiences you had doing them. Such as,
First Kiss
First Time Love
First Time driving a vehicle 
First Time Flying 
First Time drinking and partying 
On and on it goes….Therefore, at age 53 I just had my First Time UBER Ride and I have to tell you that I had to download the App and create an account and I was hoping that I did it correctly as I needed a ride. But belong and behold my UBER driver Derick arrived  5 minutes before the scheduled time of arrival and was polite, respectful, friendly, and wasn’t stuffy like a button up shirt.
The experience was nice and relaxing. therefore, I will check the UBER ride of my bucket list (haha). 
Joe
title: First time !!

review:
The app has NO place to send a message to the app about anything unless it’s to a driver. I can’t add any addresses to saved place. It can’t get my home address correct to save its life. It’s the absolute worst experience I have ever had. Oh, not to mention the frequency of times drivers cancel the ride. I’ve been left waiting for a ride for over an hour.

Editing. Uber has the absolute worst customer service. Can’t reach them. They ditch your chats. Tell me to get the car at Terminal 2, door 2C upper level at ORD. There’s no such door. Only 2B and 2D, no 2C. Tried to get a hold of Uber? Can’t do it.
title: Uber is absolutely awful

review: I like the road was uneventful and got me to the destination in good time. The driver was wearing a noise canceling headset and listening to something. Made communication difficult and not recommended by the DOT as you cannot hear emergency vehicles. Also, he has a sign on back of headrest stating he will not drive on toll roads. And if passengers do not like they can take it up with Uber or Lyft. This is an issue as it can inconvenience the person who is now stuck in the car and cause possible delays.
title: Ride of silence & No Tolls

review: The app is sad, and misleading. Time estimates are way off, when the driver is assigned 5-10 minutes magically added on. Worst is tonight, I order an Uber 30 minutes before I have to catch my train which was a 5-7 minute drive away. But 2 or 3 Ubers cancelled. Then the app froze in the middle of reassigning me, I had to log in again. Finally in  an Uber… 25 minutes later. Did I mention I was heading to Union Station in Downtown LA? You would think there’s tens of Ubers driving around downtown!!!
title: Drivers keep canceling, cost me 20 minutes. Missed my train!

review: I wish this could be a zero. I used to be a driver and a rider. One day I decided to change my photo to reflect my current appearance. The rider app wouldn’t allow it unless I changed my driver account. The driver account wouldn’t allow me to change it so I deleted my account. Now I’m locked out the rider account and UBER has no easy way to contact them by phone. Now I’m writing emails back and forth to an automated email system and getting no where. I’m so frustrated. There’s nothing wrong with Lyft but that’s my only option now… Uber get your $@*% together!
title: Horrible Customer service

review: I have always been hesitant to use a rideshare because you only ever hear the bad things. Well I have to say, my driver today for my first ride made me feel so comfortable! I cannot thank him enough for being so amazing and if I am ever in the Tucson area again, if it is possible to request him again, I will! Thank you so much!!!
title: First time using and driver was awesome

review:
Catalina was really conversant and enjoyable to be with during my recent trip. Uber is very lucky to have such a first class lady with a spotless vehicle .
