She likes the business and knows how to treat customers with respect. I travel all around the world with many different drivers, but Catalina is a rare exception which Uber should reward. I rarely write reviews but Catalina deserves an A+.   Thank you 
James
title: Nice Ride with Catalina

review: Even Lyft is awful. But I am commenting to bring attention to these insanely long wait times and the extortion of our vulnerability. I HAVE to take Uber or Lyft from work and after 10-11pm the ride 15mins away goes from 15-35$ in what seems like a mere minutes. After 12 don’t even try to get one unless you wanna spend 80$ to get 30 mins down the road. They take advantage of the drinkers that are trying to safely get home and they do not care about getting you to work on time, it’s more worth it to take a bus. It takes the same amount of time and cost 2$ instead
title: Fk these ride apps

review:
First time I’ve ever used Uber.   Both my drivers were great!   They were both Timely and polite.  They were fun to talk to and ride with.   
The app was a little hard to figure out for me. 
Somehow I think you can make it easier for tech challenged people like myself.   
Other than difficulty with the app, it was 5 star service.   Thank you!
title: A great experience

review: My driver Angelique arrived to find me frantic and running behind. Instead is stressing me out by huffing and Puffing like other drivers have done, she took control calmed me down and got me to my destination peacefully. This is a skilled quality person that should be driving people. This is a 5 STAR PLUS DRIVER! Thanks again!
title: My driver Angelique got the job done like a pro during a very stressful time for me…

review: Thank you Christopher for picking me up after a late flight into Houston Hobby. Christopher handled my luggage in and out of his car. His car was on Ly a few months old and sparkling clean. He had soothing jazz music playing and the perfect temperature in the car so I could just take it easy all the way home. happy holidays Christopher. So glad you were my Uber driver.
title: Christopher is Outstanding!!

review: I will make a review and give a one star everyday until this problem fixed. You guys claim there are no people in the area to just charge me more money for my ride! You guys don’t make getting rides easy at all, I have to call 45mins ahead just to at least get someone to look at my request and most of the time people are always asking me where I am getting dropped off and if I don’t tell them they will cancel my order and then waiting another 30mins! Uber i am gonna make it a habit to 1 star you everyday and I will access other accounts to do also.!
title: Caution

review: Left my hand bag in car and left for airline counter. Realized I had left it in the car or was stolen inside the airport. We’re really concerned and after walking 500 yds inside the terminal Rolando showed up with the hand bag. Would love to get in contact. If you have his phone I would like to call him. Recommended with my eyes closed!
title: Wonderful and totally honest person.

review: So while in Nashville attending the Oola Palooza I order an Uber to transport 6 of us to and fro an event. In route returning to the hotel we encountered a motorcycle ride that had us stopped for about 5 minutes. Uber promptly messaged me to report in and let them know if everything was ok because we were stopped in traffic so long. That’s very Oola the Uber community looking out for their riders like that. #oola
title: Safety

review: Uber’s ride rate is getting worse each day as they charge close to $20 for short distances and still delay your trip. Especially when the time shows 5 minutes before confirming your ride, and after confirming, it would then appear as 23 minutes. Imagine waiting for 23 minutes?
title: High Rate and Untimely arrival

review: Uber is literally a bunch of scammers, prices were getting too high on uber so i figured i’d try Uber One, it was alright for 30 days. now after the first payment cycle my rides still cost me what they were before I signed up for Uber One and they’re trying to make me believe I’m “saving money”. Which is complete rubbish. One star.
title: Would give Zero if i could

review:
I went to an imaging center and when I’m done I tried requesting an Uber, however bc of no internet connection I was unable to request an Uber for hours until I can find someone to take me home and this is not the first time. Please advise what should I do.
I tried rebooting the phone also tried using my cellular data and nothing.
title: Connection

review: I’ll tell you what makes me not want to engage with an app and get it off of my watch as soon as possible… when after a ride the pictures of the drivers taking over the entire watch screen. I scramble to get it off of my screen as fast as possible. This is a missed engagement with riders and is just uncomfortable.
title: Please remove the horrifying driver pics from the Apple Watch complication

review: When i select more driver issues to give a driver review, your app freezes and doesn’t highlight the done button. I had to delete the app to try it again or at least access the app. It needs to be fixed. I’m at Diamond level and trying to get through to someone via chat to look at an issue is like a maze that takes about 30mins to attempt. You need to make it more accessible to speak to CS via the app.
title: App needs to be updated

review: I tried out Uber Plus, which you would think should be a better service but it only caused more inconvenience. I went from waiting 7 mins to 25 mins for a ride. Now i'm left in the cold after work. I don't understand why drivers continue to pick up rides knowing that they are in a middle of a ride with more than 10 mins left and that the destination is more than like 15 mins away from my pick up spot. It's really annoying that I chose to use Uber plus expecting better service and it has literally been worse.
title: Wait times are ridiculous.

review: Quite literally the worst customer support I've ever dealt with. It's all robots sending you pre-scripted messages that do nothing to resolve your issue. They refer you to the T&C's, and after reading them, they mentioned nothing about my inquiry. I wrote them again, and again, and again, but never received any human response that addressed my issue. They offered only the most general responses that "cover all issues" but really cover none at all. My friend had a similar experience with Uber Eats. It's pitiful how bad the service is when something goes wrong.
title: Terrible Customer Service

review: I used this app to schedule a ride to the airport to catch my morning flight. Huge mistake. No car arrived, only a message that said sorry, no cars are available. This left me with no other option but to run back in the house, wake my spouse and two young children, pile in the car, and bolt to the airport - the exact thing I wanted to avoid by scheduling a ride in the first place. I understand this is a ride sharing app, but then why “schedule a ride?” You even sent me a confirmation email! What does scheduling a ride even mean to you, Uber? Never again.
title: Scheduled a ride that never arrived.

review:
Post-Covid Update -2021 I’m waiting at SD Airport. They’ve assigned me a new driver who has 5 rides in his history and has no clue how to follow the app to the pickup area. Been waiting about 30 mins. Do they train these guys???

2019 
Uber increasingly is dishonest on the time when their driver is likely to arrive for a pickup. It’s often 3X to 4X longer than indicated. This can result in perverse behavior. I’ll wait for the Uber for unexpectedly long periods when I could have used Lyft or a better alternative. Sure wish they hadn’t driven Sidecar and other better alternatives out of business with their overly generous driver reimbursements.
title: Declining quality
developerResponse: {'id': 4973435, 'body': "We really appreciate the time you took to help us improve. We understand this can be frustrating and are working towards making this better. Please note that ETA times are estimates and not guaranteed. A variety of external factors like heavy traffic or road construction can impact travel time. To know more about ETAs please refer to http://ubr.to/2hCbWFd . For any further queries, send in a note to t.uber.com/contact and we'll follow up.", 'modified': '2018-09-07T04:59:34Z'}

review:
Ordered an Uber for my aunt. She was wearing a mask, I was not as I wasn’t getting into the car and we were more than 6ft from the curb. Had two trips cancelled, no idea why. Get an e-mail today stating drivers cancelled as I wasn’t wearing a mask, & that I’ll have to prove by taking a photo that I am indeed wearing a mask as I normally do when using Uber, riding the subway, working, going to supermarket, etc, and submitting said photo the next time I intend on utilizing Uber again.
No thanks — I don’t need to prove anything. App has been removed & I have no intention of using again if I can help it. No use for your overreach.
title: No thanks!

review:
I got a ride to the airport from Serra Mesa and they quoted me 22 dollars. I was then charged 70 dollars out of nowhere. I contacted support and was only given 17 dollars back. I reached out again and they told me there was nothing they could do.

If I did that at a legitimate brick and mortar business, I would have my business license taken away. The corporate corruption of this company is sickening and I will WALK before I ever take use this company for anything. Not a ride, not a food order, nothing. I will pay 70 dollars to a complete stranger before I allow myself to ever be robbed and support a company with the ethics of this company.
title: They literally robbed me

review: I used the schedule a ride feature and booked way a head of time. Isn’t the point of booking a head of time and scheduling is to make sure you have a ride? The app confirmed my reservation more than once which was great. However, the day of my trip and scheduled time they waited 15minutes to tell me a ride was not available and still charged my credit card. Not once but twice. Then When looking there is no option to contact customer service. It’s a great feature but if it doesn’t really schedule a ride for you what’s the point??!
title: Uber schedule a Ride

review: I ordered an Uber and I’m the course of ten minutes I had 4 Uber drivers cancel on me, then I wasn’t able to connect to any driver at all. Finally a driver connected with me and arrived an hour later, now I understand traffic and car issues exist but I just found that to be a bit ridiculous. I also put clear instructions saying don’t pull into the driveway, because it’s being used by my family, I see that the driver reads my message but clearly ignores it and causes issues in the driveway. Again just a bit ridiculous to me.
title: Ride cancellation and ignoring instructions

review:
They make their web access limited so you -have to- download their app. Then the price jumps the moment you do. I got charged a “Manhattan congestion fee” for a 15 minute drive at 1am. The driver charged me a wait fee despite me telling him exactly where I was & him going to the wrong place. There’s no accurate way to report issues or communicate with Uber.
 
Being first did them favors for a while. But that charm has worn off and better options are out there. It won’t be long until Uber is just a footnote towards better things. This company and it’s greed will bury it.
title: Dishonest As They Come

review: This morning heading to work I realized that I left my car keys in my husband’s car. So I was very happy to be able to depend on Uber. My ride came to me within 5 mins and I got to work on time. My driver was professional and kind. I would definitely recommend Uber when you get stranded without no car. Many Thanks to my driver, you Rock!
title: Uber to the rescue!

review:
Lateef was very courteous and helpful since it was so late at night around 1 AM it was very foggy on the back roads. He did a great job of maneuvering the area. very cordial man. I felt safe and good being with him and having him take me home from the emergency room since my son and husband were not available at that time of night, Thanks again Lateef! Best wishes in your future endeavors!
Katherine Wagner
title: Lateef great!

review: Today I had a great ride by my driver Chris.  Chris was punctual and had a great attitude and was on point with his driving and he was very friendly.  It is my opinion that these days you rarely meet people who just seem to be good peoples, but thankfully Chris was and I greatly appreciate that.  Keep being genuine and personable and I guarantee you will do well in LIFE no matter what you do.  Thanks!
title: Great ride

review: Had a doctors appointment where they cancel you if you’re two minutes late. Got into my car on time. Little did I know my engine would not start. When on the Uber app requested an Uber, which came within five minutes and got to my appointment on time. Thank you so much for coming to my rescue. Excellent service.
title: Uber to the rescue

review:
Better. However, when I try to add my kids to the account, there is no option to add them manually. The app requires COMPLETE access to your Contacts or else your kid walks home. For reasons too boring to share, I am prohibited from sharing my Contacts with all but a few vetted apps.

Dear Uber, could you please help a parent out and fix this in the next version?
title: “Family & Teens” account creation bug

review: I have had problems in the past getting the app to accept my card for payment.  I checked last week to verify (through chat) that I was good to go.  They said I was.  At the airport, ride request was denied.  I had to take a cab.  Tried a different card for return trip, went right through.  Have no idea how to find out why my “go to” card isn’t working.
title: Problem resolution

review: Igbinosa gave me a tremendous gift - he helped get my travel day off to a wonderful start!  He arrived in a pristine Tesla, greeted me courteously, and loaded my bags quickly and carefully.  We had a lovely chat on the drive, and he stopped at the closest door to my airline.  He unloaded my bags just as carefully, helped me with my heavy backpack, and sent me off with a cheerful goodbye.  I highly recommend Igbinosa for your travels!!
title: Great Driver!!

review: I have been a long time Uber customer with a rating of 4.96 after taking many rides and spending thousands of dollars. I sign up for Uber one and since my service has been lousy. It takes forever to request cars, cars frequently cancel even for 5 min rides and food ordered through Uber delivery often has missing items and that’s if the food is delivered at all. The restaurant sends the food yet I never receive it. Uber only willing to give partial refunds. Do not use Uber any more or you will be supporting this hostile customer treatment!
title: Warning: Uber will steel your money

review: My spouse no longer drives and Marin Transit’s paratransit service does not service much of Tam Valley. Uber has filled in the gap efficiently getting her to swimming and local errands. Marin Access’ Catch-a-Ride has provided some discounted voucher’s for people with disabilities and non-driving seniors. Great and very valuable service in a county area with limited taxi service, no bus service and few sidewalks. Thanks.
title: Great Tam Valley Service

review: I planned to use the Uber Advance Reservation but somehow I failed so 10 minutes out the App said I had no reservations for today.  In a panic I looked up the Uber availability and one was only 7 minutes away.  He picked us up and we made it to the airport as we had always planned.  Thant earned him a $10 tip and I still saved $20.
title: I made a mistake but Uber came to my rescue

review: Why would a driver take a time specified pickup if they can’t arrive on time??   Preparing for an early morning flight, I reserved an Uber the night before. The next morning 15 min before scheduled pickup  I checked the drivers arrival time. 20 min late! As I tried to figure out what to do, the arrival time kept moving further out.  There is no way to contact UBER, so I messaged the driver . Luckily another, MUCH closer driver was dispatched and I made my flight. Didn’t need that stress !!
title: Reserving a ride is worthless

review:
Driver was excellent driver. Vehicle was comfortable and immaculate. Driver was courteous and professional. He even provided a complimentary water bottle. He did not play loud obnoxious music nor engage in unwelcome chit chat. 

But he arrived LATE for my pick up. My ride was to a hospital for a surgical procedure. I called for ride in plenty of time to arrive hospital at the required check in time. But he did not arrive for my pick up in adequate time. I barely made it. Driver should not have accepted ride knowing how far away he was from my pick up location.
title: Almost missed surgery appointment

review:
I arrived at international terminal 5, but was unable to make that the pick-up location. It was very confusing and not made clear in the app that pickup is only possible from terminal 2. A real pain to have to change terminals with lots of luggage and terrible jet lag. I did, because the taxi rates were triple. 
In terminal 2 all worked well, however.
title: O’Hare pick up

review: I have had several rides cancel on me and they give me drivers ridiculous distances away, causing me to be late or waiting for over 20 minutes just to get where I need to go. The inconsistency with driving skills and customer service is appalling. It has gotten even worse in the last few weeks. I use Uber to get to and from work or doctors appointments and I’ve consistently been late because of the drivers. The prices are not adequate to the quality of service. Please improve because this effects others livelihood as well.
title: It’s getting worse

review: Loved my Uber driver Hui thank you 🙏🏻  I really enjoy. My ride home from work  is a very convenient thing to do who ever invented this Uber ride is the best I will be using Uber all the time now even having a car  lol  thank you again for the ride the only thing make it less expensive especially when is local 😁👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍
title: Enjoy the ride👍

review: App extremely easy to use, includes pix of driver and vehicle about to pick you up, you can watch an animated map showing their geographic approach, arrived on-time, vehicle extremely clean, driver very personable, payment and tip options very convenient, and you get to rate the experience. Won’t hesitate to use Uber again! MAY even become a driver!  Thank you UBER!
title: My first time!

review: Fares are always changing and I understand less drivers higher wages but taking longer and coming from further? Shouldn’t the drivers think of the riders too? If you’re too far don’t even accept a ride and move on to another don’t let it take 20 minutes to go pick them up then be on your way to their destination. Not only am I late, caught some heat for it but now also being charged extra for the extra time I had to wait not a great app stupid fares that don’t make sense and it feel like they extort from both sides 🤷🏽‍♂️
title: Uber doesn’t make sense.

review: Yosua picked me up to take me to international gate for a trip to Central America. I am 73 years old and was very nervous because I had 2 suitcases weighing close to 50 pounds. I was trying to think of how I was going to handle this along with my carry on. Yosua waited for me to get a cart. He loaded the two suitcases and my carry on unto the cart. What a relief. I am deeply thankful for his going over and above.
title: Exemplary driver

review:
Mercedes picked us up at Harry Reid Airport after a exhausting trip. He was right on time. Nice
man, polite, happy, professional and interesting. Told us a little about himself and really listened when we spoke. We found him to be the best driver we have ever had. Good luck to you Buddy,
I wished we had a driver like you every time after 
we landed, especially after a long  day.
Jim and Joy
title: Excellent Driver

review: This app is a real lifesaver but I have also missed many trains of this app. The app states the driver is 3-4 minutes away but when I book the trip my driver is 15 minutes away. I have been stranded before because of a glitch in the app where it can’t find drivers but when I book the ride it still says there are drivers 3-4 minutes away. I love it but please stop saying there are drivers in my area when they just aren’t.
title: Correct Times

review:
My ride was on time and got me to my destination on time. He also pulled up as far as he could to help prevent me from having to walk on the ice because I am at great risk of falling and was concerned about that. 

The driver’s vehicle was clean and comfortable. Shayne’s driving was good, which put me at ease. He was friendly and a good conversationalist. 

Thank you very much and have a great weekend!
title: Excellent driver

review: Amma (Yilma) picked us up from BWI after we landed at a late hour from our flight. He was so kind, courteous and thoughtful. He got out of the car and opened the door for me and helped my husband with our bags. He asked how we were doing and how our flight went. I use UBER a lot and appreciate the service but I haven’t had a driver as kind as him in a long time.
title: Best Driver Ever!

review: Please to n’th power, do something about the delay on new card additions!!! I was trying to make an appointment with my therapist and psychiatrist, but I found too late that my money was too low on one of my cards, and it was getting late. I looked through my cards and saw that one of my available cards was NOT registered. I filled it out and multiple times it said something went wrong. I’ve done this many times and got the same issue and DAYS later, it went through! I needed to be there and now I have to reschedule. If my life was in danger I’d be dead.
title: Card addition!!!!

review: Uber is an alright app my only issue is most of the drivers. For example I payed for a ride and as soon as the driver pulled up to my house he left I texted thin that I was outside and he never even replied. It’s  honestly very frustrating because I work and these are my ways of transportation so when they do that it makes me late because now I have to wait for another driver to accept my request and not to mention I have to wait for them to even get to me. And this didn’t happen just once either
title: Uber is okay

review: I’ve had Uber for a few years now, but lately it’s been a cat and mouse with your deliveries. The drivers are disappearing with your food, I’ve been charged doubled for deliveries. The wrong orders are delivered. And Uber support is crickets. They are hard to get a hold of.  It’s definitely no longer the most trustworthy or convenient app.
title: There are better services out there.

review: I don’t like how. They get to cancel your ride and take the full payment from your account even if you don’t receive the ride! It think it’s unfair. If it’s a time frame for waiting make the time frame 15 mins. Let’s say I’m at a hotel on the top floor and the elevator is down…. It’s going to take at least 5-7 mins just coming down!!!
title: REMOVE THE OPTION

review: Since something changed with the Uber Map about a year or two ago, the map ALWAYS takes the driver to the street on the other side of my property.  That would be about a 10-15 min walk!   So for pickup i already have to contact the driver with the correct location (which is my post office address), and for returning home i always have to reroute the driver.  Of course the time i forgot to do that i end up a long way away from my front door.  Sheesh, wish you world just use Google maps and not cheap out on technology!!!
title: Uber map can never find my house!!!

review: Something has changed in the app. Now the uber cash toggle is permanently on. I turn it off when I am doing a ride, but after the driver has been located and I check payment type again, it has reverted back to on. I do not use uber cash. You need to make a permanent off option in settings.
title: Permanently turn off uber cash

review: I was charged $5 for canceling a ride yesterday, but the reason I canceled was the driver Never made it to our hotel location. I called him and he argued about where we were supposed to meet. I gave him the location several times and he kept telling me to go to another location.  He would not come and so I hung up and canceled the ride.
title: Canceled ride

review: I have a screen shot of a Uber driver saying in a message that he had to get some food before he picked me up you guys need to make us able to report stuff like this it’s unprofessional I’m gonna keep posting it on my Instagram until you guys fix this happened to me twice first time was a week ago and now today?! Yeah I’m very upset
title: Terrible

review: Worst company ever. Everything was fine until one of their drivers was caught stealing something of mine on camera. They have been trying to contact the driver for two days and keep sending me auto generated messages. They are hiding behind that this is not their employee because their “independent contractor”. Last time I checked your driver represents you when they are driving and delivering under your name no? Do your self a favor and do not use. If one thing goes wrong you can trust that Uber will do nothing to help you, the customer.
title: Company Does Nothing About Their Driver Stealing

review: If you want a refund or to report something about your driver/ride you have options to do it. However, their options are VERY limited. I was waiting outside for my Uber to go to a appointment and the Uber passed by my house, made a U-turn, took a hard look at me and canceled the trip. It made me upset and also late to an appointment which led me to be late to work that day. There was nothing I could’ve done because there’s no way to call Uber and it’s always har to solve a problem with them.
title: Good App But No Solution To Problems

review:
Am I the only one who’s been dealing with these outrageous pick up times? I live in NYC and I’ll almost never get an Uber that’s a reasonable distance away. It’s always 10+ minutes. And most times the driver will be like 14 minutes away then cancel the ride and I get stuck in the same situation of having to wait for a new driver to spend 15 minutes doing god knows what. 

How is there no feature to request a new driver without canceling a ride?
title: Needs an Update

review:
Uber always has always been a very good service for me. Taking me to and from work when I didn’t have a car, awesome! Usually fair pricing. 

But sometimes their prices are crazy ridiculous? I’ll quote a ride for 17$. And then when I try to call it 2 minutes later, the price jumps to 39$?! And then I’ll wait and refresh the price and it’ll jump another 5$. If I wait 10 minutes after that it’ll drop back down to 19$. EXTREMELY SHADY. That’s so lame 😒
title: Always good

review: So I use to schedule my rides well in advance to make sure a ride would be available to go to work at 5:30 in the morning. The scheduled ride would cost me about $17 and it was cheaper than Lyft for a while but, now the same scheduled ride would cost me $33, almost DOUBLE THE FREAKING PRICE! I don’t understand why the fee went so high but, the app even tells you it would be more flexible. So why the major increase? I refuse to pay that much and will no longer be using Uber’s services until they address this.
title: Now it costs double the normal rate to schedule a ride the night before!

review:
Reserves a ride the night before and I never got any notice that any ride was on the way, thankfully I noticed, cancelled the reservation and just sent for another ride. 

There should be a notification that triggers the moment that the reservation was made for sending for a driver. Plus the added uncertainty of getting charged for a ride that never arrived (and that there’s no one for us to call) doesn’t help either
title: Great app, terrible reservation feature

review: I had an appointment this morning and requested my app hours before, so I got ready with my baby to wait for my Uber and as I was waiting outside wearing a mask he just drove by and I texted him to come back that it was me who requested the ride, no answer and then he just canceled the trip, and I was still charged even though I was already waiting and he was the one who cancelled the trip. Tried to get my money back and I just received a credit which I think it’s really unfair, there’s no number or email to contact. Not using this app again. If I could give stars in negative numbers I would
title: Worst app, charges for nothing

review: He was a great character when you arrived his cars very great and condition shows great character when driving also is a great person to talk to during long drives. I recommend others I just couldn’t access his name at the moment right now, so I couldn’t give you his name I hope this works for him.
title: Frank’s Refrence on the driver on time and appearance

review: Had appointment from Target Nov. 2. Was dropped of. I shopped then walks over a short distance to Safeway there. Ordered other Uber had to wait About 20. Minutes then a drives name was change and a new drivers name showed up with a new time. John came with a White beautiful Car and I got home with  my packages I did not give enough Tip for John. Would like to give him $8*00
title: Uber

review: Sean did an amazing job helping us find an unexpected ride to the airport after leaving my cousin and daughter for an unexpected trip to the ER. Sean was very respectful, kind and gave us a lot of useful information regarding the city of Billings and how Uber provides better service for their customers and drivers. I would highly recommend this young man!
title: Exceptional Customer Service

review: To make things a lot more easier for everybody, if you can have a function on the app that allows the person to scan the gift card onto their file, And have a function for for riders with service animals to be noted on the writers profile.
title: Suggestion for gift cards and service animals

review: Uber is such a convenient service and I have had 99% great experiences with every driver and every ride. However, the one time I had an issue and needed to speak with someone, i was simply unable to make that happen. After several hours of trying to get someone both on-line and by phone, I finally gave up!
title: 99% Good

review: My recent ride from the airport was very comfortable, quick driver response, nice comfortable ride. Aaron the driver was very courteous, respectful, very good driving skills. Aaron did something else that No other driver has done, he brought my luggage from the trunk of his car to my door step. For me especially, being in the senior age , that was very much appreciated.
title: My recent ride experience

review:
It was wonderful. Matthew was so informative, and so caring and very observant in his driving.
It was our solo of ever use an Uber. We’ve had many friends that have used it and we split the cost but I have never done it on my own. What a wonderful birthday experience my 70th birthday my husband broke his foot I did not want to drive they were very caring thank you Uber.
title: Birthday experience

review: My first Uber experience that I setup myself. James was ahead of schedule and very kind and helpful! I enjoyed the drive in his clean Tesla (first time). I appreciated the conversation and it turns out that we have lived in the same locations. Great experience riding to the LAS airport. May God bless your continued adjustment to Las Vegas. I am glad that you were here to take the Uber assignment this morning!
title: Great Uber Experience

review: It’s annoying to see a request for your ride has been accepted and a estimated time of arrival along with driver details are provided only to be changed minutes later, cycling through for yet another drive until accepted again. As a person traveling and taking proper precautions sharing driver information with family and having to recant and update due to platform unique conditions poses concern.
title: Request Accepted Request Pending Request Accepted AGAIN

review: This is my second Uber ride in a few days. This experience today with Jose was a thousand percent better than the recent ride with Felipe. Jose was courteous, helped with my luggage, drove safely, car was clean and cool, music was good and he was not on his phone and we had conversation throughout the trip. Thanks for a much better experience this time around. 👍🏾
title: Great Ride—Service

review: Last night, (Friday) around 11pm, one of your Uber drivers took my son from Extended Stay America, 215 S Milwaukee Ave, VernonHills to Pacific Garden Mission in Chicago.  While I tipped that gentleman, I forgot to give him the five stars he deserved.  Since my son was in poor shape, the driver very kindly called me to tell me that they had arrived at their destination .  That is thoughtful service above and beyond.  He deserves 6+ star rating
title: Carolyn Dapier

review: Syed was our first Uber driver. we chose Uber black for a reason and Syed did not disappoint… from his brand new suburban to his professionalism. He was fantastic if we could give 10 stars we would! Next time we are in Boston I would hope we can find him again he is an asset to Uber. Class act! Because of him we will stick with Uber over Lyft.
title: Our first Uber trip

review: My phone #got locked because I had been create a Uber driver account long before during pandemic time, and deactivated soon after, but now I want to use my phone # to create an account in order to request a ride, and instead the support team updated my phone # to someone else in my family who works as Uber driver. We use same email but separate phone accounts, name,  and he can’t drive right now, and I still can’t request ride.  I never said I need to add or update my phone to someone else.  They are so dumb can’t read my request
title: Support team is so dumb

review: The wait time charge is rediculus if the driver goes to the wrong spot that’s on him . . So I take exception to the the driver who speeds thru the parking lot not looking for rider pick . Another problem is that when you ate charged the drivers have a tendency to stretch the ride out to enrich there pocket. Uber doesn’t want to help customers they only want to pick there pockets
title: My ride on June 7

review: Just a bit of constructive critique... Luis did a great job and dropped me off directly under the SPIRIT sign at the airport as requested. Nice, comfortable, safe ride to the airport.  In true Miami form, though, the Spirit Airlines gate was NOT inside the airport where that outside sign had suggested... it was a ten-minute walk in the other direction!  This is just an FYI for Luis, NOT his fault at all, completely satisfied with his service.  Thanks, Luis, good job!
title: MIA snafu

review:
This is an app for which notifications are actually important.  You need to be notified when your driver is close!

But if you turn notifications on, the app will periodically spam you with annoying ads.  It’s quite frustrating.

My solution is to just delete the app until I need it again.  Honestly less annoying than keeping notifications on.  Maybe I’ll try Lyft next time.  If they don’t do the same sort of spam I might switch to them consistently.
title: It should be against the rules to combine spam with important notifications.

review:
I was super nervous about getting to a first date with a gal who I thought was WAY out of my league. This guy helped me out by letting me stop to get flowers, added a stop for me to pick up drinks, AND when we got to her place and she wasn’t ready yet, we drove to quick trip to give her more time to get ready. 

This guy is an absolute legend.
title: The best ride I’ve ever had.

review: Our driver arrived a few minutes early, helped with our bags and was very careful in his driving. We instigated conversation and it was a very pleasant drive from downtown to the airport. I can’t say enough good things about Uber. We traveled for five weeks in Europe and started using cabs and switched to Uber when cabbies didn’t where they were going.
title: Wonderful service

review:
Our driver was the nicest young man. I was impressed with him on the ride home from the city. My wife left her phone in his car and he actually drove it all the way back to us expecting nothing. Class act employee you have there. He is an asset to your company. Going to delete my Lyft app today. Frendy just made Uber a a dedicated customer for LIFE. 
Thank you for employing him. John VanBurger
title: Frendy

review: This driver was the rudest person ever. He pulled up to the pick up spot and my husband was ahead of me and he nastily yelled at him get in and my husband told him I was coming, I was about 20 yards away, he immediately started complaining that he didn’t make any money so far that day, my husband asked him to just hold on a second that I was right there and assured him we’d give him a nice tip, he remained nasty so we didn’t want to ride with him and told him to leave. Not to mention that his vehicle was a terrible mess. Now I have to pay a cancellation fee!  Ridiculous. If I could I would rate him ZERO
title: Rudest person ever

review:
I am visiting Jeddah and the wait time for finding an Uber in Jeddah is minimum 20 minutes to find a ride 
The app either has to recruit more people( I don’t believe they have strict policies as I have ridden twice with smokers and even smelt hash in the Uber) so they look like pretty flexible with who can join their fleet 
However, it is a problem to find an Uber in Jeddah 
It is basically a hit or miss depending on your luck that day 
I am going to look for another riding app (maybe a local one would be more reliable)
title: Wait time is unbelievable

review: Robert saved us from cabin fever after the winter storm that dumped inches of ice & snow all day long! His driving skills in slick conditions deserve a standing ovation!! We not only had a great ride to our friend’s home and a nice conversation; his taste in music is top notch. Feel free to sing along for a groovy surprise! I’d give him 10 stars if it were an option! Robert, you rock!
title: “Snow” way there’s a better Uber driver!

review: The ride my girlfriend received from work was highly inconvenient and unsafe it was placed at 11:00 p.m. so it was dark the lights kept going out and the whole vehicle was shutting down and made her feel very unsafe like she was in danger. Adding to that she had to walk home because he refused to pull into our trailer court. Not the best experience it probably wasn’t the drivers fault but still all Uber drivers should be checked frequently on their vehicles to make sure issues like this do not happen. Uber management if you’d like to contact me I’d appreciate it because this is just unreal.
title: Unsafe

review: Uber don’t seem to care enough about the riders. They also need to have a more critical screening for the drivers I’ve experienced racism. I had problems getting  in touch with a driver, If you accidentally leave your  belongings and customer service is not helpful with that either. And please please please stress that Covid is still out here. Please, please please tell the drivers covid is still out here and that They’re cars need to be clean and not smelly please.
title: Poor customer service

review: My only beef is that it is hard to put or keep the pick up pin in the right place. I moved it off the street where no stopping is allowed and into the parking lot of our complex, but when I looked at it again, it was telling the driver to go next door. Thankfully the app allows me to send him instructions or call him so he was able to find my fam member (who I called the service for).
title: Overall Great App

review: Norman was so sweet! He was patient with me as I took a few extra minutes getting out to the car, made great conversation until I was ready to lean back and take a nap , which he then turned on some relaxing music and created an environment comfortable enough for me to actually fall asleep. Literally my favorite Uber ride ever lol.
title: 10/10 Would Recommend

review: Uber has always been a great way to travel wherever you need to go! I have made countless trips to and from places and have always had excellent service. Great drivers and very pleasant. Time of arrival is on spot, clean vehicles and pleasant people. I’m 77 years young and have always felt safe. Thank you Uber!😊 Tonight my ride was with Maurio, a very pleasant and polite young man.
title: Uber Service

review:
I still believe drivers should be able to speak English correctly. I also understand that some are new to the country but still they should learn English. 
My my driver was very nice and got me to where I need to be properly and safe but it’s hard when you can’t communicate to each other correctly.
Jim
title: Communication

review: My friend and I were stuck downtown on New Year’s Eve and it was raining really hard. We waited for almost 2 hours when Oday finally came through. He was courteous enough to give another couple that was also stranded a ride to their home on the way to drop us off. Oday was very polite throughout our ride. I would recommend him above any other ✨
title: Best Driver Ever!

review: Amazing driver, you are going to loose good people if they can’t make any $$$$, he has been a dependable driver for 5 years, & now has, wear , & tear on  vehicles is to much, plus insurance, sure hope we can get these people at the very least incentivize s like tires, oil change, or a raise, seems like to me we need to fix this before all the good hearted people sto driving!
title: Kejowise

review: I was quite anxious being picked up at an auto mechanic because there’s something wrong with my car. So not only did I have a pleasant ride back to my house. John was very helpful and giving me ideas about cars and resources. This helped with my very high anxiety and I hope he gets to read this, he’s very empathetic and kind. Thank you, John.
title: Today’s ride

review: The only thing I don’t like is When you book a ride it says $7.38 but after you’re done with the ride they charge you extra dollars for extra miles… which is weird because most of the time it’s because the driver went the wrong way or because they sat at a stop longer then 30secs. And also drivers shouldn’t be allowed to cancel! I waiting a whole 24 minutes just for the driver to cancel when he was like 4 5 minutes away and it’s happened multiple times…
title: it’s a great app … it’s only a few things they need to work on.

review:
Today the driver arrived 20 minutes early.  I was not even looking at notifications that early.  When I got out front at the scheduled time (noon) he had already left.  No biggie but 20 minutes is too early.  I get 5 minutes either way.

I always find it a little challenging to get to the place to schedule a ride.  I only do it 3-5 times a year so it could just be me.
title: Scheduling a Ride in Advance

review: I had to catch a flight after burying my father. I was late and forgot my phone in Andre’s car. I panicked. How was I going to get home now all my stuff was on that phone. I remembered I had my iPad and FaceTimed my wife. She called Andre on my phone. He picked up and within 15 minutes I had my phone. Thank you Andre you are such a great man and a very honest child of God. Hallelujer!!!!!
title: Andre is the best!!!!

review: Captain Bob has been using Uber to pick them up after I deliver a boat or pick me up to take me to the marina and deliver a boat for a customer. They’ve been great to me, if I had to hire an employee, use his car, or mine, gasoline, and Pam by the hour it would’ve cost me, double or triple. The Uber’s are well worth it. You can check out my reviews on Google maps, Chicagobluewaters.
title: Captain Bob

review: the past 2 days ubers stolen about 50-60 dollars from me, every time i requested a ride it would say no drivers available and tell me to try again later, yet they still charged my card and they refuse to send my money back, and when i request to have a conversation on the help section, they never respond to my messages, they're just repeating stealing money and not sending it back when i never even had a ride come out to me, ive sent countless proof and ive tried contacting support multiple times, DO NOT DOWNLOAD, THEY WILL START STEALING MONEY AND WONT REFUND IT AFTER A WHILE
title: don't downloa, they will steal youre money

review: The days of Uber being reliable seems to be over. Veteran Drivers often cherry pick what rides they want to take and Uber itself takes such a big cut that new drivers barely survive. Issue today is Uber putting a pending change on my account even though a driver could not be found. Easy fix don’t charge until a driver has been found and drivers need to be knocked offline for at least an hour for cancellations
title: How about waiting until a driver confirms before a pending charge

review: It is impossible to get customer service because they don’t have any way to contact someone. I have been charged repeatedly for the same transaction and they will not refund me. I have tried going through my bank as welll but Uber refuses the dispute. I will never use again. Lyft is so much better!!!!
title: Zero customer service
developerResponse: {'id': 33323104, 'body': "Hi, We're extremely sorry to hear about your concern regarding your recent experience. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve your concern, fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343HNsE. We shall get back to you at the earliest.", 'modified': '2022-11-23T08:52:28Z'}

review:
Kashinath - The Gentle Man who Drop me to my destination is a Thorough Gentleman, Hardworking, Always Smiling person and have an exceptional technic to win the Heart of customer. 
He also have a beautiful  mind and soul to make the commuter feel Relaxed and at peace of mind while riding with him. Kashinath has surprised me with his brilliant Witt and Wisdom on different topics. He is having all short of quality to tag him as an *Asset* to the company or the team he is / will working with. 
10/10 for Kashinath 
Also a young man - thin -Dark brawn Marathi Mulga help me at Booking station on International Airport also have zeal for elevated position. Forget to ask his name. Sorry Dost…🙏
To Both - All the Very best for years to come .
Love You Team UBER ❤️
title: Super Hero Kashinath

review: I had two drivers cancel on me and I was charged both times as if I cancelled. This is a horrible business practice. Both times I watched the two drivers circle around me, I’m waving at them, messaging, and they cancel and I still get charged?? And I lost 30 minutes? I could have taken a bus for $3 with less hassle.
title: False charges

review: DONT USE UBER RESERVE i had one reserved more than 48 hours in advance, scheduled pickup at 7:15 to go to the greyhound station because I had a 7:50 bus to catch. My uber driver was 40 minutes away at 7:00 but the app would not let me cancel without a 30 dollar fee because it was less than an hour away from the reserved time. When I reached out to customer service they said something like “we’re working on our ETA stuff sorry about that,” and sent me the reply with a “no response needed.” Nearly missed my bus and the situation was incredibly stressful because of this.
title: Don’t use uber reserve

review:
My last driver Jose was only one called me to look for me.  Other drivers even called just canceled. I have been waiting more than 20 minutes. At Grand Ave Los Angeles seems like shows to Sever “ lower “ part.  I was off at “ upper part “ East coming.  Of course I was waiting my returning car at the same spot.
However drivers map has not shown.
Hope future there is no conflict like our experience for both a customer and a driver.
title: Make sure for picking up place
developerResponse: {'id': 32702575, 'body': "Hi, We're extremely sorry to hear about your concern regarding your recent experience. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve your concern, fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343HNsE. We shall get back to you at the earliest.", 'modified': '2022-10-21T05:58:51Z'}

review: This app has been a good concept and has helped me in very tight positions, but as of late has been one of the most unreliable apps I’ve ever had. I can expect to be waiting for a ride for at least 45 minutes, have absolutely insane drivers, and don’t try to cancel a ride that takes the driver 20 minutes to get to you even after a minute for your request because you’ll be charged for THEIR time. Absolutely insane.. COVID has gutted their customer service and I don’t see any effort in making it better. SO BEWARE, because you never know what you’re gonna get.
title: BEWARE - INCONSISTENT

review: I have try a couple of times to order food thru app and from 4 orders worked just 2, so one got an item missing from order, at least it arrived! Last one never showed up! After placing order everything was fine it shows the ETA for order after 25 min driver was there to pick it up, and suddenly app just refreshed and dose not show anymore order as placed and neither the driver to deliver it, after 30 min of trying to figure it out what happened with no luck decide to give up, and already its 10PM so all the places are closed.
title: Do not use to order food

review:
First of all, please show destination to drivers, otherwise they accept drive and then waste on asking where you want to go? if they are fine with destination, they come, otherwise they waste time and cancel the drive. So please show destination to driver.

Second, please avoid frauds. One of my trip, i had a fraud. The driver show me 10 times more rent and charged me…i contacted uber help line but of no use, first you make your app hackable and then excuse to customer when the customer got suffered.
title: Please show destination to driver

review: Used to offer a excellent service. Tonight I searched for a relatively short ride and was offered prices of around $13 basic X and $20  for XL. After failing to find a ride in several minutes I resent the search. Suddenly the prices changed to about $40 or more a ride to renew the search, on what to all appearances to us was a slow week day night. Why waste my time in the initial search if that was not the real price? Chose to drive myself and pay for parking. I would have sent feedback via their application but that does not appear to be an option.
title: Switch and bait

review: For the longest time I have not been unable to tip the drivers through the app. I seldom carry enough cash to give a decent tip. Also, I haven’t been able to rate the drivers. This is terrible! Since services are used based on ratings. I saw that I have a low rate as a customer and I think is unfair since I do try to tip and be kind and courteous.
title: App Issues

review:
Attempted to schedule Uber out of LAX.  Site shows rides available however when I attempted to make the reservation the Uber site stated no pick ups available at LAX locations.  

Rode with Uber,  Uber Black,  to a wedding in Boston. Scheduled a return from wedding to hotel,  several Drivers accepted the ride then declined the ride.  Not good for the family of the groom.

Uber needs to make their Customer Service numbers easier to find and more Customer friendly.
title: Have used Uber with mixed results

review: Before scheduling a ride the Uber gps map showed me that the place I was going to was 15 minutes away, but the ride was $40. Then I finally booked the ride, the ride came, and I got in car. Then when the ride finally started it told me that the place I was going to was 45 minutes away. That made me very late to my appointment. This is a reoccurring issue, as in the Uber gps telling me the wrong time for the location distance. 🙁
title: GPS Navigation Time Estimate

review: Not 5 Star but Uber really hides the 1 stars lol Every ride is over priced now. It takes Way Too Long to even get a ride. There is ALWAYS a “no drivers available” issue when it comes to ordering food, and they make it hard to cancel ur subscriptions. Literally had to submit a reason why and I’m waiting for them to get back to me! Don’t download and DO NOT BUY THE UBER PASS! You will regret it
title: Not worth it!!!!

review: Very poor service this year. I used to rent a car for $ 7 per mile.  Now they say there are no cars for $ 7 ?!  Really ???  Always have been and now not.  But for $ 15 cars arrive and you need to wait 20 minutes.  Of course I cancel and just take the bus for $ 1.50!  And now I use Uber very rarely!  Very bad and long and inconvenient service !!!
title: Poor service

review: Since reviews are unavailable for the driver app I’ll leave it here. I was a driver in Dominican Republic and also work for a company in the US from home they opened an account to have food delivered to my home with my information and Uner closed both accounts this includes my second job as a driver now I am unable to work as a driver and they refuse to assist me and even worse they have disabled reviews for the driver app and customer service here is basically none existing they gave me no resolution but now I drive with Didi and also Indrive this the worst experience I’ve ever had. Just did screen recording to prove we can’t leave review
title: Driver

review: Uber is becoming one of the most unreliable services out there. I always get a message saying all drivers are busy and extremely long wait times when I do get a ride. The drivers seem unhappy about the job they signed up to do. The prices are completely inflated and Uber takes most of the money for themselves which creates an unhappy environment for their employees. Overall, it’s should not be so hard to actually get a ride when I spend over $300 a month in Uber. I should hdd as be priority service and a driver should always be available. What a horrible service.
title: Uber is unreliable and overpriced.

review: I use Uber to get to and from work.  There have been very few drivers during the past couple of months.  I’ve waited 15 minutes for a ride before only to have the driver cancel. This has made me late for work numerous times. I also stood in the freezing cold last Friday for 45 minutes just trying to find ONE driver so I could go home.  The prices have also gone up. I really don’t understand that when at this point it is not a dependable service.
title: Not enough Drivers

review: This app has a lot of bugs , it seems like all they care about is money (duhh) if your driver can’t find you it charges you $5.. if you get over charged they don’t guarantee you will get your money back. I was charged twice for a $20 ride I never got. It was extremely difficult to find where I was even supposed to put my claim in at. When I finally did they didn’t even give my money back...that’s $40 and I had to find a ride home that night because I didn’t have enough money left to order a lyft. Will not get another dime out of me. ..... Trash customer service!!🤬
title: Always taking money

review:
My final driver was excellent. 

However, I have a complaint about 3 other drivers before the last one, which accepted my ride, traveled a few minutes / miles in my direction, and suddenly cancelled. I had to wait for my ultimate driver for about 25 minutes, because of the wasted time with drivers cancelling.
title: Customer dissatisfaction

review:
Apparently, I’ve taken 50 rides with Uber.

Unscheduled rides work fine. Scheduling a ride ahead of time does not, leaving me with area unavailable messages.

The estimated times for pickup do not take into account traffic of any kind or stop signs/stop lights, only distance and speed limits.

Today, we were stopped near the train tracks for a train that was apparently stopped across the whole town. Instead of multiple options, I could answer that I was okay or not.

When rating the ride upon completion, it doesn’t give me the ability to say that the driver was driving erratically but only if the driver was rude or some such.

For all that the company takes for each ride, I hope that they improve the app to reflect more than the minimum.
title: Flawed but usable

review: I’ve always been skeptical of riding UBER but today I had my first Uber ride with Hanok and it was great! The car was nice and clean, and large enough for my husband who always needs extra leg room. And the driver was very pleasant! He even gave us tips on places to eat and things to do while in town! 10/10 rating for our first Uber ride!!
title: 1st Uber ride!

review: I’ve been riding Ubër since it’s 1st introduction into the ATL Market! The introductory offer through Ubër Economy, Ubër X and Ubër Share. It’s competitor did offer a mire inexpensive option, but one could tell that it was nit an Ubër‼️Now every time that I compare prices Ubër  was  cheaper & to be fare(see what I did there) I would still choose The Ubër Quality Experience‼️
title: Ubër has gone cheaper & better ride than it’s competitor‼️

review:
Wow! Just Wow! We are visiting Phoenix and used Uber our entire trip. After using several drivers that were either horrible or just ok, Jonathan renewed our confidence in Uber. 

Jonathan was very knowledgeable of the area. He shared exciting tips about the city and surrounding areas. The was the absolute best!!!!! Wish we could give him 10 stars. Thanks a bunch. We truly appreciate you.
title: Jonathan

review: First I want to say that this app used to convenance. Now, they triple charge you for almost all trips claiming higher demand. And another issue I’ve been having is drivers just follow the map, they never actually check the customers address, so most times I’m in the middle of the street searching for a cab that says it’s there waiting and it’s down the street instead. The app is getting ridiculous to use and I have been using it less and less. I find calling my cab company down the street faster and cheaper and more respectful.
title: Ridiculous

review:
I had booked Uber for a specific time. An Uber car arrived half an hour earlier. He had my name and address and my destination so I took this ride. Half way to my destination I got a notification of another Uber soon arriving at my house. 
 I replied that I already had  a ride. This  driver was called Muhammad. I saw soon after that that trip was cancelled. But then I saw that I was being charged for this second ride! The whole episode was confusing and upsetting.
title: Review

review: This was my first time catching an Uber, so I was a little nervous about catching an Uber to work, because I hate being late. Bruce was an exceptional driver, he arrived 8 minute before my scheduled pickup time, which was great; his driving was excellent and I arrived to work 30 minutes early. I definitely will be requesting Bruce the next time I need an Uber; I hope he’s available.🥰
title: Meca

review: Uber is great don’t get me wrong but it’s pretty much replaced taxis at all hotels for pick ups. When I have a 4:30am flight and pre schedule a ride for 3am I don’t feel like I can count on Uber. The drivers can cancel on you leaving you stranded in a city far from home. Passengers get charged for cancelling after being assigned a driver but there’s no repercussions or way to rate a driver for cancelling on the passenger and leaving them stranded.
title: Not reliable when you need them to be

review:
Nice driver, clean car.  This isn’t the driver’s fault because it has occurred several times in the past:  The driver parks at a house across the street, two doors down, although the correct address is shown on the app.  
I gave him a $5 cash tip for a ride that was less than $8.  I wish the app would show an option that indicates “gave a cash tip.”
title: Nice Trip

review:
your cancellation fee of five dollars although it's only five dollars, it's not acceptable. I was standing right outside of TGIF restaurant and I saw him pass by, he didn't even stop right in front of me. He just drove by and I did not see him anywhere around TGIF. He canceled without even driving by TGIF. I stood there for a long time in spite  of my bad left knee. I am a handicap person. Is this how you treat your handicap customers?  I called another driver that Uber driver came in two minutes and he saw me standing right out of there and then he stopped right in front of me.
This is not right!
title: Cancellation Fee of $5.00

review: I got charge a cancellation fee which it’s not my fault, the driver was always stop at 3-4 mins not moving towards my home, I was in a rush to catch the cruise and I’ve been waiting for him for almost 15 mins and he still 3-4 mins away, so I have to cancel him, he almost got me late for my cruise, and when I saw Uber charge me $5 I got no where to dispute the charge, what kind of services is that. I’m also unhappy with the booking fee Uber charges, it’s $10 I better go for Left or taxi might be cheaper
title: Hard to find phone number

review: We’ve heard Uber drivers in Krakpw are rude and to the contrary, ours was very professional and pleasant. We walked 5 min to the meeting point as the center square doesn’t allow cars in Krakow but the ride was smooth and inexpensive. My kids are used to driving and after days of walking and sightseeing etc this was definitely a nice break for them. Thank you Jakub.
title: Krakow

review:
I had a very bad experience this evening.  It all started when I requested an Uber for a barbershop appointment.  The ride there went fine as expected however I requested then a ride back as I knew it wouldn’t take long.

There were 2 drivers who never showed up between 6:55 and about 7:40pm!  The drivers were Jorge and Fritzner.  And I got charged a cancellation fee!  I will not be using Uber again!  Very unprofessional!  The barbershop closed at 7 and I had to wait for them in the rain.  Finally Austin showed up.
title: Friday evening, 7/7

review: I ordered an Uber on a Friday night and had to cancel immediately after placing the order due to finding a new ride. Uber charged my account $61 but removed the transaction and never refunded my money showing to the bank that I was fully refunded when I never did. I contacted my bank and they said that they refunded me even though they never did. Never use this app unless you want Uber to steal money from you. I recommend using Lyft or any other app because you will never get your money back if you cancel an Uber.
title: Never use this app unless you want to get scammed

review:
My driver Nasir was a great conversationalist and we enjoyed our short trip together. I’m a native of western Fairfax county and was explaining to him the incredible changes Chantilly has gone thru since the early 70’s - 80’s on up til now!!! 
Thanks for standing out in the crowd. Perception is reality and my perception was a great customer experience. Not many of those left in the world so Bravo to you my friend.
Bobby Sparks
title: Nasir

review: He was super sweet, great conversation and I felt very safe with him.  Such a hard worker and took the time to get to know me, felt like I was driving with one of my best friends.  Funny and kind. He alludes positive energy and really took the chance to get to know me and make me feel comfortable.  It was a pleasant drive.  If I could request him for every ride I would!!
title: Very kind and safe driver!!!!

review: On the website it says you can cancel Uber one by going into the manage Uber one menu and there will be a cancel Uber one button. Guess what? No such option exists. You cannot cancel it with Uber. I’ll probably contact my credit card company to block Uber before the next billing cycle.
title: Watch out if you are a Uber one user

review: There was some misstep and lack of guidance because I did not ask. All my fault. The location was just there in front of my location. It was like I got in the car. The very polite driver made a u-turn and pointed me to the AT&A office. We both laughed out. Ignorance is bliss on my side. Nonetheless I paid $17+. That is why I declined the $3 tip. I hope you see my point. Best regards. Gladys.
title: Thank you

review: Took a ride with Guillermo today. When we arrived at Out of the closet, I told him I was just running in and out if he wanted to wait. I gave him a 20 dollar Bill to assure him I was telling the truth, and I would order the ride from inside his car, and that he would get the ride because I was so close. As soon as I got out of his car he took off. Then he waved goodbye, what an heartless jerk! I even tipped him 5.00 dollars on the app. I used to drive for Uber before my got I’ll and I take of her now. He made all Uber drivers look bad!
title: Guillermo

review: Pre-booked a very early a.m. trip on Uber. Never booked ahead before. Nervous about not making it to the airport on time. My driver, Glen, was 15 minutes early, he was absolutely delightful, even when I had to move his pickup point by 50 ft due to building construction. We had a lovely conversation and I recommend him for book ahead - very dependable.
title: On time and delightful

review: I really enjoyed my ride, yesterday. The car smelled nice, the music was low, and she wasn’t talkative. Sometimes the drivers that I had in the past were too talkative, and played loud and inappropriate music. People sometimes want to ride quietly and collect their thoughts in a great smelling car. Yes some of the cars are smelly. However, I like riding with Uber sometimes.
title: Very nice and quiet

review: The app, the driver, they are all amazing! But we requested an XL and the type of vehicle that came could not fit a single suitcase in the back without being able to seat 6. We had to use an entire seat just for luggage and  every person had to hold all the other luggage on their laps and we were 2 to a seat. We all had small backpacks and only 2 suitcases, and were crammed in there.  If a vehicle says it seats 6, it needs space for luggage for 6.
title: Space for 6?

review:
After having to speak with two different reps I finally got my 1st Uber!
Jeffery was great and I was so appreciative of the ride! If I need help when he is available I will certainly use him again!
As for your reps it took awhile to get the help I needed (and I had to get to work somehow too) but everything came together and now I can breathe easy!
title: First time!

review: Paul, the uber driver was a perfect gentleman. Very polite & helpful. Very pleasant. The car was extremely clean. The ride was so comfy. I wish i can always request this uber driver since I go places everyday. I don’t know if there is a way to request a certain driver. Maybe the uber app can add that to their options. Over all, my friend and I give Paul and his volkswagon Atlas 5 stars.
title: Perfect Ride

review: Buenos Aires airport Uber pick up location is unorganized. No one knew exact uber pick up location. Waited at ‘supposedly’ pick up point. Driver stopped at different place. After several back and forth text messaging, driver got out of his car to find us. Appreciate his effort. We gave him cash tip for his effort. Thank you Leonardo
title: Driver took extra effort to find us

review:
AJ was the B E S T experience with Uber driver’s that I have ever had! He was an excellent driver! I can be a back seat driver sometimes! AJ handled the trip with ease! Not only was he a great driver, but what a great personality! He was kind, made conversation, big smile, just a fun ride and great conversation! Before I knew it I was at my destination!! I wish more drivers were like AJ! 
Good job man, your really awesome!
Lisa B. Little Italy
title: My Uber Trip!

review: I’m having issues with the app , seems like the app would be taking or charging my card and all drivers kept canceling my ride I find it super inconvenient especially when or if I have to be somewhere at a certain time. The driver would caused me to be late or miss an appointment from continuing to cancel my rides. Not to mention I can’t afford to keep feeding the app money & I’m not getting the quality service. And I can’t talk to nobody over the phone everything is a chat or questions that I don’t get a solution too or a refund for not receiving the service.
title: Rides

review: The app is great and everything but you can’t schedule rides ahead of time. I take the train to the closet train stop that is by my office then I Uber from the train stop to the office. If I try to schedule an Uber for the time I arrive I always get charged the amount it would be from where I am scheduling it. I.E. if I schedule it from home, it would cost me $50, if I ordered it when I got to the train stop by my office, it’s never more than $10.
title: Can’t schedule rides

review: I have been a loyal uber customer for years. Before COVID, uber actually cared about their customers and the quality of service they were receiving. When uber had the uberpass option it was great. Also, when they had the option for customers to get points and and a rewars program it was great. Now, I feel that all uber is worried about is overcharging customers. There is no reason why a 5 minute trip should be 25 dollars. I hope they come up with a better program to improve the quality of service for their loyal customers.
title: Uber Going Downhill!

review:
Heaven for bid anything goes wrong or you need to contact customer support because you can’t do it. At least for an issue that falls out side of their pre-identified problem areas. If your hand is being charged for a toll road charge when the toll road was not traveled on. The service road next to the toll road was traveled on. 
At the time of this posting I have not been able to figure out how to address this issue with Uber
title: Customer support

review:
I have been using Uber since 2018.

In pre-pandemic times, I used to get a driver very fast to drive me everywhere. Nowadays, every request I place, it takes minutes to locate a driver nearby. Furthermore, once I get a driver, sometimes I wait for 20 minutes and get cancelled within the last 10 minutes of waiting. This is not right. Then, I have to wait for another 20 minutes to get a driver. 

It is okay to wait for a driver up to 20 minutes but 40 minutes is fully unacceptable.
title: Not what it used to be!

review: I never leave reviews but uber deserves a 1 star more than any app or service I have ever used. Don’t even think about signing up for Uber one. In fact don’t even download any Uber app. Uber has done nothing but mess everything up. Customer service is just a scripted copy and paste waste of time that doesn’t resolve anything. Quality control is non existent. Every order or ride has just been riddled with issue after issue. I will highly recommend anyone and everyone steer clear from anything Uber is associated with.
title: Uber doesn’t care about their customers

review:
If notifications for the app are turned on, which is really helpful for an app like this so you can get informed when a driver is on the way and has arrived etc. You're also going to get daily notifications of promos Uber is offering. These are going to ping and show up on your phone and watch and any other device linked to your iOS device that gets notifications.

They are very annoying and can't be disabled. You can only control/disable notifications for the app entirely via iOS.
title: You're going to get spammed with Uber promo notifications.

review: The Uber app was glitching this night, and even though I had my phone out, it never updated when my driver arrived and even though we ran out, he had already left. Then, the app just does a trip for $10 3 houses down. Obviously, I never saw the driver and the driver never took me. After one more try and the app still being glitchy, I cancelled my last ride and just decided to call a friend. So I requested a refund, and even though it says it was refunded, hours later I still have 3 charges that came out of my app. Im furious.
title: Was charged 3 times and received NO ride

review: Long wait pick up times. Result in using service less frequency. You say you are a 24/7 service but it’s not really that way.  Needs better service for riders than drivers. Drivers need to focus on road then having a conversation with the riders. Long wait times is result in less frequency of service.
title: Rider demands not being met.

review: I had to go into iPhone settings and turn off all notifications for this app. Despite going into the app and turning off all ads, this horrible app continues to wake me in the middle of the night with spam and advertising notifications. I will be deleting the app and discontinuing my use of Uber altogether, as soon as I get a chance to setup an account with a different ride sharing service. I do not recommend Uber. Very greedy and disrespectful company since they continue to bombard their users with unsolicited spam and advertisements.
title: Constant Spam (Avoid this app)

review: Seems there might be a problem with Uber’s app on forcing an incorrect dropoff location. This might’ve been a simple glitch or accident, but it is pretty disappointing putting in your address only for a completely different address a block away being selected instead and not finding out until after the ride’s started. Even more disappointing is the difficulty in finding out how to properly report the incident and after doing so to be given generic and unhelpful responses as to why this happened or issuing any sort of refund.
title: Incorrect Dropoff

review: App messes up constantly, tells you you’re closer to your destination than you are. The airport is a joke you will easily wait 2 hours for a ride. They pay you hardly anything unless there’s a surge you will not make much money. Considering you’re paying for gas and car expenses definitely not worth your time unless you want to make a couple dollars here and there. I would recommend driving during holidays or concerts otherwise is a big waste of time. 2 stars is being nice.
title: Not reliable

review: Today it was snowing quite heavily; I was in a hurry and left my iphone in the car. At a strange place I found no way to contact the driver and got so nervous and almost desperate. After about one hour the Uber driver brought back my phone to the store I was in. It was not the place he dropped me off, but he walked to the door of the store and handed me back my phone. Thank you!!
title: Fast and safe

review: My iphone language setting is always English and somehow my app language is half Chinese half English which make no sense at all. Also, I always got receipts in Chinese which makes it impossible for me to submit it for my business trip expense. However, there isn’t any place I can reach uber and tell them the issue. Because they don’t bother to give their customer a phone number to call nor email address to write to nor even any input field in their help page. Horrible customer support.
title: Horrible customer support & no way to change app language

review:
The faster this company grows, the worse the user experience becomes. 

Annoying & inconvenient “pickup zones”, expected tips that saddle hidden costs on riders, unpredictable & expensive “surge pricing”, and incessant app updates encouraged by intentional user friction are among the ways Uber increases ARPU while making the customer experience progressively more frustrating. 

This company started out as a better / faster / cheaper Taxi replacement, but now that they’re a dominant player... the initial value prop has been lost.
title: Not as good as they once were

review:
Have been going back and forth with impersonal and unhelpful canned support emails all morning about a ride I took last night. 

Sequence of events as follows:

- I ordered the ride
- I opted to pay $25 with Uber Cash (the entirety of my balance) and the remainder with a card
- While on the ride, I selected a tip amount to be paid with the full payment
- The app deducted that tip amount from my Uber Cash balance before charging the full ride
- Because my balance was then “too low” to cover the ride portion, I am now being told that I am unable to use my Uber Cash for the ride for which I’d chosen to use Uber Cash, and each explanation is simply “you can’t” 😑

Disappointed to hear that Uber treats its customers with just as little respect as I’ve heard they treat their drivers. Looking forward to more thoroughly exploring my many other options here in NYC.
title: Glitchy app paired with atrocious customer support

review: This was a really good app and the best to say the least very convenient and reliable but lately the prices are ridiculous the time wait is ridiculous the app says 5 mins then drastically changes to 15-20 etc which causes frustration you can order it super early before time and they still give you the longest and furthest driver the prices are 10-15 dollars then you have to cancel cause the driver is too far and you need someone closer and all of a sudden they charge 30-50 in the span of 5 minutes worst app ever lately not reliable nor convenient
title: Time & money the worst

review: Although the driver was wonderful the app is not. As a first time user I found the app very difficult to navigate. Also, I realized late that I had misread my flight time (dealing with an extremely ill family member and my mind can get a bit off) and tried to find a way to contact someone/anyone to adjust my pick up time. There is NO WAY to contact anyone. Never could find the link to check out my driver before pick up. They also processed my charge 2 hours before pick up, not one. Extremely disappointed.
title: Hopefully won’t have to use again

review:
My best friend and I rented a car and arrived at the Memphis airport in the middle of the night to find that no one had waited for us to pick up our Budget rental car we had paid for in full.
Us, two women, we were stranded at 12:30am. Opened my Uber APP I had never even used and Kelvin came to our rescue. What a nice man!
He gave us so many tips about traveling around Memphis and staying safe. We decided to forgo the rental car and use Uber instead, during our entire time in Memphis. 
He dropped us off at our Airbnb at 1:30am and waited for us to safely get inside before he drove off.
Kelvin is a quality human being, and a real asset to Uber driving. 
Janine
title: Kelvin is an awesome driver

review: I normally don’t write reviews, but after this experience, there is no way I would let this slide. I agreed to $106 for an uber back to my place after a concert. Once I arrived home, the app notified me that $152 had been charged to my card due to a “surcharge” fee. The ride was roughly 30 minutes, with no traffic or extra stops. I did not agree to this price, and if I had known it was going to be over $106 I would’ve found another way to get home. This is absolutely ridiculous, and I am never using Uber again.
title: $106 Trip Turned into a $152 Trip Without Consent

review: I live in a major US city and while this app used to be reliable, over the past 1 to 2 years I have come to be stranded without a ride after waiting 10-30 minutes with no ultimate success. I would understand if requesting at an unusual hour, or if the app didn’t show multiple cars out on the route when requesting—but the lack of honesty with “connecting you with a driver” never connecting despite many drivers displaying on the map seems disingenuous.
