review: Uber, you make decisions for me, including cancellations without allowing me to confirm or otherwise provide feedback. I pay for premium service and you make changes without reducing my charges. I receive messages the day before a trip, indicating my driver will wait for me for 45 minutes or an hour, but at the time of the actual ride I see ‘your driver will wait five minutes for you’. When I schedule a ride you give me too few choices of rides.
title: Constant unpleasant surprises

review: Thanks for all the drivers. Who was once in my shoes to save for a car but also understand how important transportation is and being reliable to make it to us on time! For jobs and appointments etc.
title: Great drivers are always around the way to give you a lift and I very highly appreciate the service!

review: My driver could not have been better. Right from the start- he was polite, courteous, and helpful. He knew where he was going because he was very familiar with the city. We did engage in light conversation as we learned we had several things in common but he paid close attention to his driving. Great experience!
title: Super driver

review: Very efficient and friendly driver. Was running late for flight and pick up location wouldn’t allow me to set my location. Called Mohammed and he made sure to pick us up from our location and get us to the airport as quickly as he could. Definitely a great experience!
title: Mohammed was amazing!

review: Why is there no back button in the Uber Eats section of the app? If you want to go back, you currently have to close out the app entirely, reopen, and go through about 4 clicks to get back to your previous place. Are they purposely trying to make it a poor user experience to force us to download the separate Uber Eats app? That would defeat the purpose of the convenience of having all Uber products in one app. Please fix.
title: No back button???

review: We started requesting an Uber 45 minutes before we needed to meet a tour guide who was 15 to 20 minutes away in Rome. After repeated driver cancellations, the app said last car was one minute away and 850 feet from us when we received the last cancellation notice. We grabbed a cab but due to the delays and cancellations from Uber we paid 25€ for the cab, and we missed our 392€ tour. We had similar experiences in Spain with Uber. Then Uber had the nerve to change us a 10€ cancellation fee. I would strongly suggest using the local taxi apps when in Europe.
title: Uber is worthless in Italy.

review: I ordered an uber to school and I ordered the uber to the front of the school building because that is where I was located . The man pulls up in the back of the school. ( I guess Uber told him to go back there) I proceed to try and call but nope guess what the app malfunctions and I cannot click the call button when I finally get ahold of the driver he is very rude as I am walking around to see where he is he hangs up on me. Then I try to order another Uber but the app tells me there were no more rides available🤷🏾‍♀️this is why I like Lyft instead Uber is ratchet.
title: Uber gone wrong

review: We reserved a car about 2 weeks in advance for a wedding. A driver was assigned, then two minutes before they were due my app changed from the drivers name to looking for a driver then to no drivers are available.  Panick!!!!  Hailed a cab then the app changed to”Joseph is on his way”. This was my first Uber experience.  Joseph saved the day and his car was WAY better than expected.
title: Panic then relief

review: I’ve been using Uber for years and lately they’re ability to keep business addresses up to date is beyond sub-par. Multiple times in the past six months I’ve been dropped off at the “right address” only to find out that the business moved and Uber never updated it. It’s becoming quite a joke. I’m seriously considering using Lyft over Uber moving forward even though it’s more expensive just so I can get to the correct location on time. Seriously Uber, get it together.
title: Uber needs to get their business addresses correct

review:
This is the first time using Uber in months. The reason is I cannot see what vehicle I’m getting until it’s too late to cancel. 
Today, your driver Rodolfo, informed me I can request a different vehicle if I get a high profile vehicle(pickup truck).
Since I am not physically able to get into one of these vehicles it is a safety problem and the responsibility of that driver to order a different ride. That way I will not be charged for the change. 
Why was I not told this when I filed my complaint last year?
I can now go back to my Comfort rides,  with easier entry and exits due to my physical disabilities. 
I will also make sure I give each driver a proper review based on their service.
title: Getting a safe vehicle.

review:
I got a ride with Michael.  (25-30 min trip)

I walked out of the door from where my luggage was picked up, and he pulled up immediately as shown on the app.   Got loaded and started the drive.  Michael made great conversation with me.  I Am a talker and he made it easy.  The ride didn’t seem to be that long because of Michael.   

Kudos to Uber because of Michael!
title: Uber Ride from Kansas City Airport

review:
I’ve been a loyal Uber user for a decade. I now have a toddler who needs a car seat. We have reserved cars with car seats well In advance of our need only to have the driver cancel on us 15 minutes before our scheduled pickup. At that point it’s impossible to get a car seat reservation with any car service. Then we have to bring our car seat when we’ve already got one at our destination & flying with a car seat is a pain. 
 I keep using Uber due to it’s convenient app, but I will never use them again.
title: Penalties for riders but not drivers

review: We were waiting for the driver for 8 minutes out of 9, then all of the sudden the driver cancelled in us and another driver appeared on the screen with the new arrival time. This is very inconvenient!!! Why would the driver do that? However our driver Robinson was very nice, but still I don’t get it why we wasted our time waiting for the previous driver?!!!
title: Why drivers cancel in the last moment?

review:
Too much stuff. Too many distracting offers.  It’s now for people who use it often enough to know what they want to do. They can automatically ignore extraneous choices. 
Prices have gone up but the driver gets less than half the fare?
Keep it simple and put extra choices in accessible menus. 
It looks like I could have shared my ride but I had no idea how. 
The car was clean and the driver friendly and safe.
title: App has gone downhill

review: Today we needed a ride home from the Tampa Airport to Spring Hill and within 3 minutes we had the pleasure of being picked up by Ms. Melissa. Her car and drive home were impeccable. She was extremely professional and pleasant to talk with during our drive. So glad she got to be our Uber driver today. Highly recommend her!!!!
title: Perfect service!

review: We hopped into the car with both of our phones almost dead. Clifton has a convenient space in the back seat that will hold your phone on a little shelf while charging it. He has a variety of phone charging cords built right into that setup. Such a nice surprise! He anticipated riders' needs. What a pro!
title: Nice, clean car, pleasant driver AND phone chargers

review: The drivers were very nice but no one could explain why you click on a trip that says $23 and when you hit confirm it goes to $58. I asked the driver what he gets and he said $23. Was very surprised to see that Uber gets more than the driver who is paying for gas and wear and tear. Uber should have a standard fee they get for running the app and company like $5 or $10 per trip. Don’t know if I will take it again at Ubers rate, not the drivers.
title: 2 Time User

review: I was not happy with the process and how the rate changed while I was trying to confirm my ride. The rate DOUBLED while trying to confirm my ride and had couldn’t confirm my ride until I reached the lot. The fact it DOUBLED while trying to confirm my ride for me to travel 5.3 miles is absolutely insane. $64+ not including tip to travel 5.3 miles.
title: Rate change

review:
Obviously you can’t do without it…
But, when you use it on a daily basis like I do, sometimes it has it’s weakness . Waiting time never accurate , trunk of the cars are always full of junk and there is no space for your luggages…. I had few times driver that didn’t match to the profile! Can be improved !!!
It is still the cheapest app available app…
title: The New Taxi

review: I scheduled a ride the day in advance to take me to the bus so I could go to the airport for a flight. I was in front of my house waiting and it said they would be there in five minutes, then two minutes, and then at the supposed arrival time I got a message saying there was not an Uber available in my area.
title: No show

review: Why do I have to contact customer service (who is none responsive) in order to change my ***display*** name?!? Like I get it, you want my legal name in the system for safety reasons, but the current name you are displaying for me is not even my legal name, so why can’t I change it??? On Lyft, not only am I allowed to update my name, I can also put my pronouns on there so I won’t be deadnamed *or* misgendered on my ride. On Uber, I open the app and it says “Hi Deadname” and then I immediately close the app and open Lyft. On top of all of that, the prices are always cheaper on Lyft
title: Transphobic or indifferent at best

review:
Tons of drivers make you wait 15 minutes and then cancel. I almost missed a flight because I was trying to get an Uber for an hour. Will be going back to regular taxis -- more expensive sometimes but at least they're reliable and consistent. 
Oh and I also had a fake car, basically a guy spoofing his location pretending to circle my block for about 15 minutes. I think he was just hoping i would cancel so he could get the fee. Had to wait it out, so he could move on to his next victim. Really infuriating stuff
title: In 2022, full of scams

review: Tried to request a ride from San Diego Airport to Temecula. Understandably, it was busy since the flight just landed so I expected a bit of a wait. Issue was, instead of queuing you in for a spot, the app will time out, cancel your search, and just tell you to try again if it takes little over 1 minute to find a ride. Ended up taking a taxi and having 5 or 6 pending Uber charges on my account from requests that never got fulfilled, even though the app showed at least 3 vehicles available in the area.
title: App Will Time Out Instead of Queuing You In

review: The app says that a driver will wait 2 minutes before starting to charge for wait time. But drivers don’t wait at all sometimes and instead of refunding me right away or rescheduling another driver I have to come out of pocket again to find another one. Then the estimated time said that my Uber was only 2 minutes away but then it changed and said they were completing another ride 11 minutes away. Why not just schedule a driver that was already free??? This is probably the third time this has happened
title: A bit inconvenient

review: Lyft doesn’t make me wait half an hour and lie to me about having drivers to connect with. Every time I try to use Uber it takes 5 years of my life for the app to find a driver while telling me it’s totally going to find me one. It never does. I usually have to switch back to lyft and pay more (the only reason I use Uber is when lyft drivers are also busy) but at least I’ll actually get there and will actually be connected to a driver with Lyft. Unlike Uber which just wastes my time.
title: Lyft is superior
developerResponse: {'id': 3429642, 'body': 'Hi, we want to take a closer look into this for you. We requets you to write to us at t.uber.com/contact so we can take it up from there.', 'modified': '2018-05-11T05:46:52Z'}

review: Every driver I had so far had good timing, good quality vehicles, good customer courtesy, I recommend anyone to sign up for a ride with this service, one thing to be mindful of: Not every driver is always available, so some times you will have to stick with one that doesnt have complete ideal  timing  and ideal rates for your budget
title: Happy With Recent Trips

review: Used to be pretty decent, but the service is awful now. Rides take forever to arrive, the app lies about times to get you to book and then shifts it to waaaaay longer so you can’t plan properly. Usually, this means you arrive late through terrible misinformation from Uber. For example, “car will pick you up in 10 minutes,” then 3 minutes in, changes twice and now your ride is 20 minutes away when you could’ve picked a closer ride in another app. And you’ll get charged for canceling. Awful
title: Unreliable, terrible service

review: When a ride is canceled by a driver we get notified in the app that the ride is canceled, but another ride is queued without our acknowledgment. When we go to cancel the new queued up ride because we found another ride elsewhere, Uber automatically charges you their cancellation fee. While they will refund the fee once you finally get a hold of a human, this whole process makes it very easy for a driver to be sent a rider that no longer needs a ride. This should not be the case.
title: “feature”

review: I use Uber almost on daily basis related to trips and food. For some reason I tried to request a ride and happen to find out I somehow have 117 unpaid trips?? How does this even happen when Uber makes you pay before you even take the trip? On top of that, I was chatting with a CSR, the app shut down on me and said my account had been disabled. I have been using this app for over 5 years and my rating is 4.97 which is almost perfect. This is beyond ridiculous.
title: Random Cancellation

review: I am so Ill with Uber Ap. I paid the $99 membership for Uber Eats. Terrible!  My order never came yet the Ap said it was delivered. When I tried to address the issue my only option was a refund. I could not reach out to any customer support or the driver to find out where the food was. After an hour of being hungry and waiting I don’t want a refund….I WANT MY FOOD!!!  I at least want an investigation in where the problem lays. Complete lack of communication. Undependable service. Lax. Don’t invest in their delivery You will be left hanging without concern or answers
title: Uber eats

review: If you ever order an uber for a friend be wary. I did this and the driver ditched my friend mid way in her trip. Now I cant get ahold of her because her phone is dead and after contacting uber several times on different help lines none of them can get me help except for raising an incident that will get back to me in 2-3 business days. At that point she could be dead. What the **** is this. Im currently out wandering nyc streets hoping to find my friend because the uber driver ditched her part way in her trip. Who the **** charges for a service that guarantees its riders 0 safety do not use this app.
title: Dangerous Company

review: Almost every single time I’ve tried to book an Uber in the past year (which hasn’t been a lot I’ll admit), they have underestimated the time it would take for the driver to arrive until I confirm the trip. This last time, it ended up being 15 mins later than their “estimated time”. When you’re trying to get to the airport, timeliness is important so whoever is writing the estimate feature needs to come up with a better algorithm…
title: Timing is not accurate when you book rides

review:
I will never use Uber again after the multitudes of bad experiences I have had. 

Just this past weekend, I had a symphony to go to. It was a ways away from me, so I had the idea to schedule the ride ahead of time. I scheduled it at 12pm for a ride at 6pm so I could get there in time without delay. 

6pm comes around and I get a notification that the driver is on the way. I open the app to find the driver is 76 minutes away. Absolutely ridiculous. I reserved the Uber six hours ago, there is no reason why I would have to wait more than an hour after the time I reserved it as. After a 27 dollar cancelation fee, I ordered a Lyft instead. 

I will uninstall the app and not look back. The driver should be there on time, especially if one ordered the Uber hours beforehand. It is also infuriating that the cancelation fee was so high. It is not my fault Uber is completely disorganized.
title: Terrible

review: I have been using Uber for the past two months almost. There’s no one to speak on the phone to let them know the drivers are lost or they can’t find my place and I keep being charge for late fee. That really is so unprofessional even though I do get The credit after I am on my phone for an hour. I hope they fix this as soon as possible. On top of all they don’t allow you to put a nickname they all taken I already try 20 of them. Really?
title: Using Uber

review:
The Uber app was absolutely fantastic and a huge help on my recent vacation with family!!!!!! It was so easy to use and so easy to get around places on our trip!!!!! 
Thank you UBER for building such an amazing app and service!!! Truly!!!
UBER was one of the best things to be introduced to help all travel and get places easily!!!!
title: Absolutely Amazing App and Service!!!

review:
The Uber app has undergone many changes over the last several years, and each change seems to make riding more difficult for consumers. It had not gotten a bit more user-friendly or convenient. 

First, the numerous rates/fees is ridiculous. And the app’s estimation is wonky. They now have a “wait fee” that I was charged. The only reason I was less than a minute late was because the app told me the car’s ETA was 10 min away!

Second, you cannot cancel without a $5 penalty. I used to be able to contest this fee…but last time I checked that option was no longer available. So even if a driver’s ETA keeps growing from 5 to 10 to 20 minutes, you cannot cancel without penalty. 

Third, all the new options for food/package/grocery is too much. The app is crowded and complicated and expensive. 

I will not be using Uber if I can help it.
title: Quality keeps falling

review: Took a vacation to Chicago and this app is a life saver!  I used it to take mass transportation all over the city!  It gives you the bus number, L train line, or subway color you need, gives you updated schedules with pretty approximate times of arrival.  I couldn’t think of a better single place to go to get all that info in a single spot!
title: Best Big City Transit App!

review: Uber helps a lot either to get home or work or other places when the unexpected is expected I recommend it best way to ride with Uber another thing uber doesn’t let you switch photos no matter how many times or help you need so Uber please fix this as soon as possible!.
title: Uber is best way to get around!

review: Checked my bank account and found a $50 charge from Uber that I never authorized. Reached out to their customer service about it and they told me someone named “Mlyle” made the charges. I do not know anyone by that name but it looks like I’m stuck giving this clown free rides and Uber won’t do a thing about it. Uber claims I authorized this person to use my account. Uber will not show me any proof of this, won’t give me any details on the ride, the route it happened, the city it happened, nothing. Refuse to give me a refund, as well. Be careful when using Uber!
title: Poor account security

review: This is the worst rideshare app on the AppStore and it’s not even close. If you have one issue with your account then you’re out of luck because Uber does not have a customer support department. I switched my primary use ride share app to Lyft years ago but when I tried to use and Uber - saw they had a lower price - I couldn’t update my payment info and I was left without any support when trying to manage my account. For a company with so much venture capital funding you think they would have bare bone functionality. Very disappointed.
title: Awful - No support

review: I’ve used the app a good 10 to 100s of times, however the ride cancellation system has me on the verge of going back to other options. I’ve had multiple times within the last week that I’m quoted a ride to arrive within 10-15 minutes, and over an hour later the driver is still “5-10+ minutes away” I’m the one getting charged if I try and cancel for another driver. There’s no reliability for the time you’re quoted, and you’re stuck paying for the full ride if you eventually get tired of waiting.
title: Wait times

review: I use Uber a lot. It used to be cheap with pool, but now that UberX is the only option, with seemingly no end in sight, I don't know how they can keep justifying the costs to their riders. They used to offer discounts for frequent rides, and now they don't even offer that. Frankly, disappointing shift that I've noticed over rhis past year
title: Unrelentingly expensive

review: I’ve been trying to get a ride for a week now. I can pay for the ride I have the money on my account but it always says error, This payment method is unavailable at the moment choose another payment method. It never works if I try to use my debit card so I used my PayPal thats linked to my debit card and it let me get 1 ride when I tried to call another ride to get back home it didn’t work again. Mind you it’s not a problem with the money because I have more then what I need for the ride it’s something wrong with this app.
title: Horrible

review: I have been using Uber for years! One of the greatest inventions of our time! But now during the pandemic because drivers can make more off unemployment then Uber is willing to pay them, there are no drivers. And I’m not writing this from a small town, In Boston, a major US city, there is not a single driver out, and I don’t blame them. Why drive when you can get more money from doing literally nothing. Uber needs to give more incentives to drivers or else they will lose all there business
title: The app only works when there are drivers

review: I’ve used this app a million times and every single time they claim they can’t find a ride even though I live in the city. Then they over charge me by 30% if I bought a taxi it would be cheaper. Then the drivers constantly cancel on you let alone the drivers are so rude in general. I would stick to lift at least they can actually get you a driver writhing 10 minutes. I live right outside the city and Uber claims that the closest driver is 45 mins away. It’s like seriously I can just call a taxi at this point. Honestly they rip people off Uber is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded.
title: Worst app I’ve used

review: I cannot let one driver trying to sue someone who has a fixed income because he drives a high priced import for giving passengers rides. Your other drivers at least a 4.8 out of five, the driver trying to sue me in court it is bad form trying to drain someone of a check because of an honest error. He was trying to get in touch with Judge Mathes to get me [I'm from Illinois and thick Inland North accent where has slight Greater Sudbury influence when I turned 24.]
title: One bad egg 🥚

review: I must say..that this was my first Uber trip and Larry was great!!  He was at the location with in 1 min and got us home safe and sound.  His vehicle was nice and clean and great conversation til he got us to my location.  He could have just dropped us off at the front but took us all the way home.  Larry was great!!  Thank you Larry!!
title: Our driver was great!!

review: Got to my spot at the airport at 4:05 and booked a ride, my “5 star” driver that was supposed to be there at 4:10, arrived at 4:21 but went to the wrong part of the airport and canceled the ride. I couldn’t leave a review, there’s no customer support, so I guess that’s one way to preserve a 5 star rating… I asked the next driver how he liked driving for Uber and it wasn’t good, he said their customer support doesn’t usually respond. Thought after super pumps they’d try more… remembering why i use Lyft. Deleting the app for good after this.
title: No customer service, drivers cancel with no recourse

review: Earl arrived early which was a plus. His car was clean inside and out. We exchanged hellos and off wee went. We arrived at my home and made good time. Also the trip back to my place was the exact route that I would have taken. Every Uber ride should be like this one. Nice job Earl. If it were up to me I would give you a raise.
title: My Uber ride !

review: I usually hope to get to my destination without having to carry on a conversation with anyone, but I actually really enjoyed my driver, and our conversation. His car was immaculate, it was very comfortable, and he was an excellent driver. All in all, I’d say this was the best experience I’ve had between both services I use.
title: Excellent ride!

review: As a first time Uber rider, I was pleased. Michelle was very friendly and arrived promptly. I was very apprehensive not knowing a driver had been assigned until 30 minutes before pickup and needing to catch an early flight. What happens if you don't get matched with a driver? The help section does not give you any good answers or comforting statements. In that respect, it was a harrowing experience. But alls well that ends well.
title: First timer

review: Uber has stranded me in several dangerous situations. Drivers accept the ride, then if you are difficult to find or if they don’t like the area, they will cancel - no matter how long you’ve been waiting. Then it takes forever to find another driver , only for the same thing to happen over and over. There’s no way for you to cancel w drivers you make you feel uncomfortable before the ride without paying a fee. I’ve had some decent drivers over the years, but I won’t trust them w my safety anymore.
title: Stranded in dangerous situations

review:
I think it’s interesting how I can’t get money off of a ride when the original time I was supposed to be there has been changed drastically (over ten minutes). If I’m on my way to work, that means I’m losing money because your shared app system is not accounting for time.

No, I’m not scheduling by a ride a day early just to pay more.

Yes, I plan early in accordance with what traffic might be at the time. HOURS early.

This is one of those instances where I did what I was supposed to do (called my ride on time) and the app still added a rider— AND THEN KEEPING THE SAME PRICE FOR A DRASTIC CHANGE IN ETA. If I have to lose money for it, so should you, Uber. 8:02 drop off became an 8:17, and in Atlanta metro traffic you know that could easily become 8:30. Get out of here.
title: Bad “Shared Rides” System

review: The experience met my expectations. I would add that it may be a good idea not to have Politically biased radio playing as it may alienate a client of a moderate viewpoint however, I happen to be a Republican moderate so I understand the viewpoints of polar opposites. I just think it makes good business sense to remain more neutral during a ride experience as not to offend a paying client.
title: Review

review: Ok I have been using Uber and Uber eats for years. Never have I booked a ride ahead of time. It was early in the Sunday so there was barely any traffic in in nyc. He took a toll bridge he did not need to take. So I was charged a toll for that. Then I was charge a congested charge when it was a early Sunday morning! How about putting all of that in the fee ahead of time and subtotal it . Instead of getting extra charges later on.
title: Disappointing little extra tricks.

review: We haven’t had Uber in our community for long, so I don’t take it for granted. What a lifesaver: We were headed to church with our elderly parents when the tire blew out on the highway. The Uber driver arrived simultaneously with the wrecker within fifteen minutes and drove us the 20 miles to our country home. The service was efficient and excellent.
title: A lifesaver

review:
Trip cancellation by drivers after drivers head to pickup location causing re trying and eventually customers not getting to the location on time.
The reliability/ dependency definitely went down.
Please look into that. Driver’s lives matters but customers reaching destination is more important in doing business
title: Sometimes experiencing trip cancellation by driver

review: Overall the app is just fine. Would be great if the audio issues would get fixed. Sometimes voice prompts and alerts work just fine. Other times I spend way to much time connecting and disconnecting from my car, force quitting the app, and everything else I can think of to get the audio to play through my phones speaker so I can actually hear it.
title: Fix the audio issues

review: Uber used to be a pretty affordable way to get from point a->b, but it seems like the more services they add to the app, the lower the quality of service becomes. Remember when you had drivers who would have their cars kitted out with amenities just to earn a 5-star rating? Nowadays, you’re lucky if the driver even so much as greets you, assuming they even show up. Drivers will ghost you, then you get charged a surge fee when you try to rebook. Back to yellow cabs for me.
title: Fares go up, service goes down

review: I’ve used Uber off and on for at least 10 years and lately I he rides have become overpriced and there been fewer and fewer drivers. Just had an instance where arriving at an international airport at 10pm but nearest driver was 23 min away.  Price started at $38 and went to $57.  I tried multiple times and each flavour of rides but nothing would come up sooner or cheaper. So I downloaded a competitor app, got home sooner and for less than anything Uber had available.  Next time try the other options before going to Uber.
title: Really gone down hill

review: Our uber driver was amazing he helped us so much went over and above making things much easier on us  We are flying internationally and we really appreciated the fact that he started our long trip by making it easier on us. Thank you Kaster we appreciated all you did for us.
title: ride

review:
This was an awesome experience. Arthur was an awesome driver. We talked about Uber, I have been thinking of retiring and joining Uber as a driver, he took away my reservations about being a driver and now looking forward to retiring soon! 
Arthur’s car was spotless and smelled good. He took his time driving and made me feel comfortable!
Thanks Arthur for being my first Uber driver!
title: My first Uber ride

review:
I shouldn’t have to wait 20 minutes for a ride. And depending on where people are or who they around that can wind up being very dangerous. There are too many drivers for there to be a wait time like that.
Also I was trying to avoid the bus after I got off. Why is the wait time so long that when I’m finally dropped off it would have been the same time as me taking the bus? I’m spending hella money to be safe and home earlier. Failed at both.
title: Dangerously long wait time

review: We had a lot of luggage, we went to the wrong pick up spot, and through it all, Angela had a very positive-can do attitude which is exactly what we needed after finally getting to SFO after delays, cancelled flights, non cooperative airlines, etc. it was a long drive in traffic and Angela drove confidently and expertly. Most of all she had a great attitude.
title: Review for Angela

review: What a great experience having David as my Uber driver. Extremely polite, very nice, knew the area where I was going very well. I don’t think we stop talking from point a all the way to point B my house. Great great great conversation David deserves a raise. If you give raises or ever how that works he deserves that extremely thank you David appreciate you buddy.
title: Uber has the right driver!!!

review: Decent prices, nice drivers, clean cars, and most importantly, I ALWAYS feel safe when getting into an Uber vehicle! Remember to always read your 4 digit PIN number when you get in vehicle. This is for your safety and for the drivers safety as well! Oh and be sure to tip your driver if your service was good! Tips are a big part of Uber drivers earnings!
title: Uber is Awesome!

review:
Overall app works well - but today after flying 12+ hours and lugging heavy bags - called an Uber and when it arrived a pilot and I had both received Same car and driver,
Pilot rudely said it was his.  Driver left with him and at that point I realized I was being billed for his ride.  I couldn’t contact anyone.  I couldn’t cancel.  I couldn’t call another Uber because app showed me paying the $48 fare and 45 min drive.
Finally I figured out how to “add a stop” so I 
Put in my location back at the airport.

Surprise surprise that got driver’s attention and he promptly cancelled my trip.
There has to be a better way to manage problems like this in the app when they occur.
title: Still some glitches to work out

review:
I booked from Hicksville LIRR Station to my home in hicksville itself about 1 mile away on Newbridge itself. First of all the cab went to wrong place on Barclays and I had to call him twice to find out where is he. I ne we said I am T Bar lays.   I waited for him and I was charged waiting time as it’s me who waited 
It’s not money but it’s wrongly charging the clients 
Please be careful and check your  charges
Would have given one but since driver was nice n polite I gave 3
title: Excess charges

review:
Everything was great except one driver dropped us off near our hotel. We were going to the Hilton - he didn’t know where it was. He dropped us off and drove Away. A different ride - 
Share Another driver didn’t know where we should go and she would have stayed, made calls to find out. What a difference!
title: Driver Review

review: Appreciate everything about Uber other than being uncomfortable and awkward with every male driver that gives me a ride. Would love to be able to pick a preferred gender or please give your drivers education on not hitting on their passengers or asking for their numbers just because we are nice. It happens almost every time and I dread it when I need to take an Uber.
title: Uncomfortable interactions

review: I rarely use ride share anymore by choice for a few reasons but mostly because I prefer to drive. I do use Postmates quite often though which is cool but y’all have charged me $63 twice for rides I did not order and then expected me to appeal with your subpar customer support even when there is no record of the rides in my order history and y’all couldn’t provide proof of said rides. That is quite lame. I either use Uber when friends pay or if I’m desperate for transportation
title: Mediocre

review: I use Uber a lot to get to work and back, but when it gives you an estimated time of 10 minutes then you wait 5 minutes for it to pick a driver and they end up being 16 minutes away is not it. I then cancelled my ride and used Uber priority which was $8 more thinking It would get to me sooner, only for it to be 14 minutes away after waiting 3-4 minutes for a driver to be picked. I understand that they’re estimations but that is just terrible.
title: Lost time and money

review: The app does not update in real time. GPS is not reliable. Data is not protected. Categories for help or issues is not easy to navigate. There is no category for “other” help when an issue does not fit into one of their dedicated categories. When cancelling a ride for cause and entitled to a cancellation fee, the matter cannot always be resolved through the app and then a call to “support” is necessary where you speak to people who have difficulty with english in context and who are reading from a script memorized or not.
title: Too many problems!

review: We were not at the right pickup location, vegas valet and hotels pickup setting is a mess, but yet Meg was able to find us with her local knowledge. We felt like picking up by a friend not a driver. We had great conversations with her and this really set up a great start of a day! Hope we will get a ride by her again someday in the future.
title: Meg is an amazing driver!

review: We are going to take an early flight that leaves at 5:30. And our house was 1hr away. We booked a trip at 3 am that was supposed to take us to the airport. And the driver who took the reservation canceled our ride the very last minute at 2:59 am. we were left with no choice but missing the flight because there’s no other cars available around at the time. Our trip was completely ruined. And nothing from Uber was said except “there is no drivers available”. How disgusting.
title: Uber driver canceled our scheduled ride to the airport last minute

review: I hate when drivers have on their radios music I can hardly listen to. When I used to drive for Uber folks could use their cell phones to play music they like. Now it appears to be an oversaturated market of drivers who do not posses the ability to provide the paying customer with an enjoyable ride.
title: Nice quiet ride

review:
Fernando was a five star rating. Please make sure that he gets 
The rating. He was very helpful with me getting into and out of his SUV. I can’t say enough about him.

The second driver was just parked in a spot. She never tried 
To find me. My friend had to go to the car and ask her if she was my Uber driver. Did not wear a seat belt at all. That is a no with me.
title: First driver

review: Just took an Uber ride with Maria and it was the most pleasant and fun conversation I had in a long time. Maria is very friendly and fun to talk to. Found out we have couple things in common, especially our outlook on age and being professional drivers. Felt like I had known her for years… So refreshing to meet Maria as my Uber driver. Thank you.
title: Best Uber Driver

review: Uber I’m tired of y’all keep adding fees toward the end when the payment already went through. When the payment already went through and the transaction is pending. Y’all will add another fee and maybe I’m the only person experiencing that on Uber Eats. On DoorDash it’s very easy to get an agent but on Uber it’s like pulling teeth. I probably talk to one agent in my 5 years of using the Uber app and I hate that for y’all.
title: Everyday app that will overcharge you real bad

review: This was my first time using Uber app to book a ride. I had a very good experience. My driver Ibrahim was very good. He was friendly and His car was clean and we arrived safely. He made sure we were at the correct location before he dropped us off. I will definitely be using this service again. Thank you!
title: First Uber ride

review: Unbelievable that this service made it the mainstream. The app and service is amazingly easy to use and the taxi service is super convenient. Love getting quoted the price in advance, not having to carry cash or provide payment to the driver, how transparent the maps are, the customer/driver rating system.
title: Convenient and easy

review: They treat driver as slaves , low fare rate . And any complaints from the customer they deactivate the drivers app without any further investigation. Shame on this company. Their customer service are rude  and have no respect to their employees. They don’t even consider that this driver will be jobless and have family to take care of . From my personal experience and as 5 starts driver rate and worked for them for 6 years . They deactivated my app as driver for misunderstanding the issue . They didn’t even give me a chance to explain my story side . Shame on this company.
title: As driver means you’re slave .

review: Fritz arrived within 1 to 2 min after ordering the service!!! He was very professional and friendly. I had a difficult afternoon with my truck having to be towed to a dealership to get fixed and Fritz made my day. I gave him a good well-deserved tip . This was my 1st time using Uber and Fritz represented Uber well . I will be using Uber again. Thanks Fritz!!!
title: Excellent Service!!!!

review: I prefer Uber over any ride app or taxi. Lowest prices especially with Uber One subscription. Quickly gets you from place to place, friendly drivers, and always the cheapest option. If there is ever any problem with your ride or food, Uber makes it right. Very thankful for this service.
title: Uber every day.

review:
I am an Ombudsman , meaning that I advocate for Aging Seniors in Residential Care Facilities. In this position I am not allowed to transport patient/residents, but I do assist them in resources for getting to and from appointments. 

Today, I met Niurgun in San Mateo and had him drive my client home to SSF.  I had direct contact with Niurgun from the time I summoned Uber, as I did with the care facility. 

I “followed” Niurgun on the App while I continued my work in San Mateo; I let the Care-home know Niurgun’s Name, Vehicle Type and color, and License-plate , and his estimated arrival. 

Niurgun called me as he dropped off my resident, and the Care-home did too.  Niurgun is a Platinum Driver on your App - and it was proven today. 

Thank you. 

Alan Kornfield
title: Niurgun, 8XJH166

review: First time using it was today and I was scammed immediately. The app kept reloading and glitching out when looking for a ride and randomly it said I was just dropped off at my destination and that I needed to send a tip when I hadn’t gotten a driver yet. I looked at the location and the pick up and drop off are very close together but both areas were miles away from where I was. I’m already looking to get the money back but it just makes me so mad.
title: I have only had the app a week

review: He was extremely helpful and very nice. I had so many bags to transport and that wasn’t a problem to him. This was such a stark contrast to a Lyft driver I had just cancelled because he had considered my bags a real inconvenience to him, hadn’t even offered to help load them, and argued with me. It was reassuring to know there are still good people willing to help others.
title: Kareem

review: This app is great but two days ago I got a bad experience I sent a package to my brother work and the driver stole the package and I haven't heard anything about the driver and uber didn't provide me with driver's phone number, I lost 100 dollars 😓😕 at least give me the driver's number to call him and make a deal with them to return my package 😪😪!
title: A motor driver stole my pack

review: I got back from a trip and I waited over an hour and a half for an Uber ride kept saying no rides were available a driver would except my trip and then cancel the drivers do not get paid enough when I finally got a trip home I told the driver how much I paid, and he told me how much he received. Uber is taking more than half. They need to take better care of their drivers and give them better promotions. This is a ridiculous company. Their customer service is crap and their pay is crap. Shame on you Uber.
title: Waiting/pay for driver

review:
For an established company, they have terrible customer service. You can never get in contact with anyone as they prefer you to message through the app. When you finally speak to someone, they’re in a foreign call center and there’s not much they can do. The response time to solve an issue with this company is unacceptable, especially in the year 2022 
It’s useful for rides but just beware that if you ever come across an issue, you won’t be assisted properly.
title: Poor customer service

review: Driver name and license plate disappear and gets buried the moment the car appears, suddenly making it harder to check to see if it’s your Uber at the crucial moment unless you scroll way down. This causes unneeded stress, especially at knight if you’re in any way impaired. The app didn’t used to do that. Feels like it’s part of a pattern of hostile obscurantism I see in a lot of apps now where stuff you need gets hidden exactly when you need it most. Knock it off.
title: Driver info disappears when the car arrives

review: Everytime they update the app it only gets worser I bought a meal off Uber eats for 62 dollars paid for the meal and left a tip with my card the payment was authorized and I even got a email from my bank saying my card was charged 62 dollars fast forward to the next day I tried to request a ride to ace hardware and next thing you know Uber is telling me I can’t request a ride because I owe 62 dollars which I ALREADY PAID!!! So now there saying until I pay the 62 dollars I can’t request a ride nowhere so I don’t plan on paying it and I decided to delete the app
title: Horrible!!

review: An Uber driver started moving into my lane and I believed he did not see me. I tooted my horn. He blew his horn back at me. At the next traffic light I was in the right turn lane he was in the lane. When the light turned green he started driving and drove extremely close to my car, laid on the horn, then drove away. I followed him to his destination. I took a picture of his license plate and the back of his car. However, I can find nowhere on Uber to be able to report this. This is unacceptable behavior for an Uber driver.  He needs to be banned from driving!
title: Uber driver with rage issues

review: Went in my apt to drop food for my sick daughter came out belongings on the ground and driver gone. SOME of your drivers are rude and disrespectful. My last driver put my things outside the car and left no notice no question no nothing. Plus he was Unidentifiable like he’s driving using someone else’s information. Hoodie never came off.
title: No tact

review: I use Uber to get to work and out if work, but some times they cancel my ride as I am outside waiting and its frustrating because I have gotten in trouble for being late because they cancelled my ride last minute. For example, I was supposed to go to work today and I got there 30 minutes late because the driver cancelled last minute and I had to get another but it was 30 minutes away. Would not recommend it if you are short on time
title: It’s an OK service

review: I’ve been using Uber since it came out but now every time i try to book a ride the safety notice comes up and doesn’t allow you to book there is a skip button but i have to close and open the app over and over again.
title: Issues with the app

review: Some person from another country got my phone number and takes a ton of rides late at night. They start the ride, cancel the ride, start the ride, and complete the ride every night, some times multiple times a night. Yet some how I am unable to make them stop requesting I follow their ride. Support was 0 help and closed my ticket/didn’t even respond to it for over 72 hours. I cannot believe the unprofessionalism. At this point, this is harassment and Uber does nothing to stop it.
title: Unable to stop people from MAKING ME follow their ride

review: I have been trying to get the app to accept a valid form of payment (I called the credit card service to verify) and I keep getting the same “something went wrong” message when I try to use the payment.  Or any payment for that matter.  I tried to contact service via their chat support and was cut off before they actually fixed the issue.  I have tried repeatedly to contact their service again but have had no luck.
title: Color me unimpressed

review:
Hey anyone who reads this make sure you request a ride before it’s time for you to leave your house/apt by a half hour so you can be early for work and not get fired like I almost just did 
I am so angry right now I was 1 hour late and I requested the ride 30 mins before usually leave and 1 hour late for work
title: Almost got fired
userName: why a name for a review

review: Landed at San Francisco Airport for the first time visiting this City. I requested a Uber and he was there in not more than 10 min. On our ride to hotel he told us so much about the City and answered so many of our questions not to mention how welcome he made us feel to a place we have never been in our life. It was a great start to a great vacation. Love❤️my Uber
title: Love my Uber

review: I’ve only used this for less than 2 months now and I’ve already ran into some issues with it . Yesterday I was going to take a Uber to work and I planned the ride about 35-45 minutes before I had to leave and it said they cancelled and they were 3-4 minutes away . And they wanted $45 dollars for a ride . Are you kidding me ? Anyways please fix this app and make it worthwhile otherwise I’ll take my business elsewhere
title: Uber Review

review:
Uber works fairly well, but would be better if it provided more transparency as to number of drivers available and how long it may take to get picked up.  When I'm in a hurry the lack of info stresses me out.

The navigation the app provides for the drivers is terrible. It sometimes makes trips take twice as long as they should, turning an 8 minute trip into a 16 minute trip for example. If this part of the app is improved I would use it much more
title: Navigation needs work

review:
To use the app I have to uninstall it and reinstall it. Every time. Otherwise I have an error that I have no payment option set even though there is plenty of Uber cash available. 

Once I get this clunky mess to call for a ride, driver after driver will cancel after accepting the trip. One canceled after pulling up because I wasn’t going “ in the right direction “. 

This app and service are becoming a hot mess of uselessness, just when I thought maybe I could get used to using a ride sharing app. Thanks for nothing guys.
title: Unusable app unusable service

review:
Every time I try to set Uber to pick me up from somewhere besides my home I will search and then it instantly reverts to my current location as the starting point. Everytime. This has been an issue with the app for years and still no fix. 

Also, I took an Uber ride in a different country and now it sets my app to that language and constantly gives me notification for that country’s promos. The app has no way for me to change this in settings and my home location is set to my home country but this doesn’t help.
title: Does not take input. Can’t change location

review: Should say lack of ride. Never got to my pickup point. Called him and he said he was waiting at the pickup point but he wasn’t. It was Adventist Hospital Bolingbrook emergency. He still insisted he was waiting so I walked out and down to the main entrance but no Emanuel. Waited another 7 minutes nada. So I cancelled the ride after he refused to answer his phone when I tried to call him back. Ordered another ride from Uber that eventually came and got me home he was great. So why is Uber changing me 18.+ for a cancellation when my Manuel never picked me up doesn’t seem right. A lesson learned very displeased customer.
title: Ride of 3/7/21 Manuel

review: It is impressing the Uber’s Lost item system, instead of giving me their driver’s cell number, they do a COMPLETELY RIDICULOUS survey where you put your cell number and simply wait and hope for the contact between you and the driver doesn’t happen in 3/4 days, where the most tolerable situation 10/12 hours, instead of all that, they should’ve just given me the driver cell number. A is for Efficiency, congratulations Uber👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻.
title: Lost items

review: I tried adding my card many times, double checking for errors and funds, and all I ever got was a notification that my payment was not supported. This is not the first card of this type i had used in the app, same bank and card type, but it’s frustrating when I get no further details other than to check the information entered AGAIN. I ended up getting a Lyft instead, and really hope Uber can be more detailed in the future as to why a payment method is not supported.
title: Frustrating

review: This ride was for my 78 year old mom, who never used UBER.  I set-up her ride (so easy) from airport..Angel (driver )help her with bags.. His car was comfortable and clean. I was able to track his car from airport to her destination. When she arrived, she called me , she said” Wow, I’m only taking UBER from now on” . “ Can I get Angel going back to airport “… THANK YOU Angel and UBER!!!!
title: He is so kind

review: McKenzie is a great, and empathetic comedian at heart. He drove me for no more than 10 minutes and honest to god, after 100 Uber rides, this was my favorite. His energy matches yours and not only that but he will consciously make an effort to make you feel comfortable. Be careful ladies, he will blow you out of your shoes…the guy. And men, he might just turn you gay.
title: McKenzie was…because…

review:
Uber charged me for wait time when I had to wait 20 min.
Also I do not want a driver who does not speak English.  The last 2 did not & very difficult for me.  They were both fine otherwise but I want only English speaking drivers.  Is there a way to communicate this to Uber???  Do not think so.
title: Wait time

review: I had to finish a customer’s car I was working on and ran into 2am.. nobody available to help me transport, even my night owl kid wasn’t available.. Kelechi picked me up less than 20 minutes after I had the idea.. clean car, smooth ride, he’s not a talker.. so I was able to catch a 5 minute Power Nap.
title: Great short ride at an odd time

review: I did ask him to drop me in the haram and he dropped me in a ofice to sale tickets and service I didn’t ask for and try to negotiate with me in a very empty and unsafe area with no one is there very far away from what I  asked for, I was so scared, and I end up of paying  a lot of money to those People e to make sure that   I’m safe place so he is taking  me to unsafe aria  and forcing me to get  their services otherwise I will get ll be in the middle of anywhere that I know very scary and bad experience
title: He try to take   advantage of me  and take me to stringers to sale me service

review: One thing is they let anybody become a driver. Second you can book a ride at a low price and right before your driver gets to you they will cancel your ride and when you go to rebook the ride the price has been r jacked up $10/$15 dollars a normal trip from my job to my house is a solid $17 but they canceled it and jacked the price up to $65. Customer service is no help and will try to end the chat with you as fast as they can without resolving any of your concerns LYFT is a better option in my opinion stay away from this scam
title: Uber is a joke

review:
Attempted to be prudent and schedule pick up to airport night before.  App continually changed my pick up location even when manually entering address.  Cancer pick up at least a dozen times and was locked out from 3 of my credit cards because of numerous cancellations.  

Never had this type or number of problems.  Most likely my last use of Uber.  Apps should simplify usage not complicate.  No way to contact drivers until pick up so no way to correct issues so canceling was only option.
title: App Sux—not user friendly

review:
Two complaints regarding Uber:
- App always tells me there is a car a few minutes away.  But when I order a car, it now is suddenly 15, 20, 25 minutes away. Or on some occasions I have sat waiting forever for Uber to “locate” a driver after it just told me there is one minutes away
- Horrible customer service.  I’ve had numerous unrecognized transactions.  Uber agents are clueless and there is no way to escalate.  Whatever low-wage country Uber is outsourcing to is doing a horrible job. 

Uber, please improve!
title: Dishonest and horrible customer service

review: The refund policy is terrible and unacceptable. I asked for a car and the app gave me a price of 36. However, after dropping me off, they sent me an email and told me the trip will charge me 43 because of tolls. When I got into the car, the app and the driver didn’t tell me the road would have tolls. It’s insane to charge me more. But after I report the refund, they told me about the “delayed price” which I never been told about. The app and the customer service try to use some rules which are not emphasized to handle customers’ question.
title: Trash Refund Policy

review: There are a lot of options today in the rental market. Jake brought a level of professionalism, with a great comfortable vehicle. Look forward from renting from him again if our paths cross again. Give me a convenient pick up and drop off and was clear on communication. Thanks again.
title: Great service with a comfortable ride.

review: The App works well for basic functions but there’s no clear way to save frequently used destinations and it insists on defaulting to your current location to start a trip. Miserable experince on a smart phone with a small screen and touch screen keyboard. Tolerable on an iPad with a physical keyboard. Needs a way to integrae with iOS contacts and turn off default start point. I need to estimate prices while planning a trip.
title: Miserable App to Get a Quote In

review:
Juan was on time to pick me up. The car was super comfortable, freshly & impeccably clean in the sitting area and the cargo area. I had to transport my belongings from my car to my residence, he helped me load and unload it. I enjoyed conversing, he was patient and also positive when asked if ok to drive me to a second location.
Again, thank you.
Lee Gal
title: Excellent Uber Driver - Comfort

review: Uber constant takes money from me !!! I always get drives that DONT know how to drive!!! I’m always getting drivers that don’t know their directions and can not speak ENGLISH! one of the drivers I had was halfway in the sidewalk UBER needs to do better !! you guys needs to hire bilingual employees!!! Just because they speak Spanish doesn’t mean the can speak English!!!! and every single driver I ever had could not DRIVEEEEEEEEEE and another issue is why is Uber constantly taking money from me when I cancel rides so you telling me a cancellation fee is 10 ??? can’t be !!! I hate Uber
title: HORRIBLE

review: “MY MILKSHAKE BRINGS ALL THE BOYS TO THE YARD…” wow! Funny joke, Uber! 3 Uber one ads just played back-to-back with the worst ‘jingle’ songs and the least funny writing possible. I had to close the app I was using and write a review because it was so shockingly annoying. There must be a better advertising strategy. It’s annoying and not funny, and I don’t want to hear another word out of ugly milkshake girl. Figure it out. Stop being lazy. Maybe your product would be cheaper if you didn’t force this sales garbage down the throats of your customers. Grow up.
title: Fire the entire advertising department

review: The app has taken money form an aqua trance of mine several times after seemingly guaranteeing a ride and then leaving her stranded to sleep in strange places while out the money for the ride (long distance) to sleep in strange places while she is struggling. This is as bad as air bnb hosts canceling same day. Except it’s a driver deciding your not worth it at 9 pm / 8am. At the very least they should take only a small deposit for the ride and then the rest when you are riding. This is ridiculous. And if it happened to me personally I’d sue for endangerment or distress but I’d sooner not use the app.
title: Risky

review: I waited outside in 110 degrees texting the driver continuously. Driver was half hour late when he cancelled my ride without reason or warning. I had to wait for another driver to show up who was great. I had an appointment I almost missed because of the first drivers negligence. I will not be using UBER again as this happens more often than not without consequences to the driver  or compensation  to me for the disaster experience
title: Poor experience

review:
Orlando was super nice: my phone was almost completely out of charge and he let me use his iPhone charger. Also, when he saw it was difficult for me to gather my three bags (I have Glaucoma), he came around to help me out of the car. It’s great to see a young man be such a gentleman.
Also, the trip was seamless. Nice experience all the way around.
title: Orlando’s review

review: Roger , my Uber driver was very helpful. I just got out of the emergency room after being there for eight hours. He picked me up 103 am when he dropped me off at home I realized I left my cell phone in his car and he was already gone good thing my boyfriends phone was here I called myself. He picked it up and he returned my phone. God bless Roger . Good job. Thanks!
title: Roger

review: Is great,The other day I was waiting for my paycheck to go through and I didn’t  have enough money for Uber and my card declined the the ride and I got an instant message from Uber saying they would cover the transaction for a day till I updated another payment method and thanked me for being a valued customer
title: Uber one

review:
We could not secure an Uber driver after the George Strait concert ended last night.  We waited 90 minutes walking around trying to find a pick up location.  Cynthia was literally a life saver.  We were so exhausted yet she managed to lift our spirits with her great conversation and friendly personality at 1 am!!

Thank you again Cynthia😘
title: Cynthia

review: Our last phone was found after a mixup at the phone with somebody else’s and this driver figured it all out and delivered it back to us this morning way over the top for everybody. Good service can’t give them enough stars on this. Thank you again for everything Harry, and Lorraine
title: Lost phone

review: He was a hands down the Most helpful, knowledgeable and kind driver who finds out just what you need and drives a solution to meet those needs!  I feel so very fortunate to have Jackie guide my one day in Honolulu to the best possible outcomes!  Beautiful nature, delicious food and awesome accommodations!  Thanks for all your suggestions Jackie!  You are the very Best of Uber!!!
title: Jackie the best Uber driver in Honolulu!

review: Driver completely respectful very nice and conversational, car super clean !!!!! Offered mints and water, smooth ride all the way to my destination I most definitely give this guy a 5 star rating and would rather have more drivers like this one , if that was possible than the day would go a lot easier for me .
title: Review

review: Great when needed but the wait and save isn’t really waiting 10 minutes and not saving very much sometimes. Also not for noting the prices  to get to where I need everyday have gone up waaaay more and is ridiculous at this point. I understand the price sometimes but not everyday when it jumps too high when the places I go to aren’t that far and haven’t been that expensive before.
title: Fine

review: You never know who you will meet when you travel, but my Uber drivers are usually some of the most interesting. John was no exception. My husband will be pleased to know that I was able to converse with a retired commissioner from the Big 12. Thankfully, John was able to talk about family and community, not just basketball. Whew!
title: Thanks, John.

review: This was my first time using any ride service.  I chose Uber to start with, and, after this first trip went so well, Uber is who I will most likely stay with.  Patricia was all one could hope for in a driver.  Besides being an excellent driver, she was very friendly and pleasant to talk with.  She is a credit to your company!
title: Virgin voyage…

review: Uber is very terrible. I am unable to use my Uber cash after putting money on it. I’m just trying to order food and it’s been a issue for two weeks. Yo have a app like this and not have a phone number and better communication I will never use this trash app again. Honestly I think Uber should shut down. It’s way more of a hassle than it is convenient. When you message them they ignore you. I’m tired of this trash app and I’m undergoing a civil lawsuit with them right now. Will never use this trash app again
title: Terrible app(do not download)

review:
Robert was most kind, on time, and got me to my destination in good time too👍.  I can’t imagine what he has to deal with sometimes with crazy passengers that come along I’m sure, so I wanted to brag about him and his excellent Uber service.  He is so appreciated !. Very hard to find caring and professional service these days .  Thank you Robert!😀

Kimberly Z.
title: Robert was great!:-)

review:
I’ve used Uber for years, and I’m an Uber One member. In the past month or two, however, Uber removed their Apple Watch app — for seemingly no reason. It’s surprising, especially given the new Apple Watch Ultra (where I’ve seen many people use it as their primary device). My Apple Watch SE is my primary device as well.

It’s quite unfortunate that I can’t call Uber anymore when I don’t have my phone. I’m going to cancel my Uber One membership as I’ll be using Uber less frequently now.
title: No Apple Watch Support

review: Byron is a wonderful driver. His car was clean, and he was very friendly.. being that I am from New York it was very beneficial to have someone who knew the area and was able to tell me about LA. He knows his way around and is very informative about the area.. excellent service and we would recommend him highway to anyone.
title: Excellent Friendly Driver

review: Alexander was a  driver who immediately put my cousins and myself at ease after a long days travel.  He had a stimulating conversation concerning the safety of travelers in parts of SA.  He also assisted the three of us with a mountain of luggage for which we were so thankful.  A ride with him was a true pleasure!
title: A relaxing trip home after a long day of travel

review: Got a new phone and had to get a new password and after all the hurdles they still asked for more and then when I provided that and made a comment of “might as well send you some medical records too” the blocked me and told me to unsubscribe I have the email. Uber is to expensive anyway
title: Completely unsatisfactory

review: My wife and I recently visited Lisbon, Portugal, for ten days. During our vacation we used Uber many times to get around and we were very pleased with our Uber drivers as they skillfully wended their way through the hilly, often very narrow, and labyrinthine streets. The Uber prices in Lisbon are real bargains compared to rides we often take in the USA. Thank you!
title: Ed

review: Our driver received an incurrent address through Uber.  I could see in the app where he was but did not have any way to contact him until he messaged me through the Uber App. This was frustrating. The driver finally found us and got us to our destination. He was very helpful with our bags.
title: Wrong address

review: I haven’t had to get a Uber in years ..this gentleman was very kind and professional… me being a single lady ,I didn’t feel uncomfortable at all and in todays world that is very important… keep up the good work. If I need you in the future cause I’m getting my car back tomorrow from shop ,I will reach out .
title: Very professional

review: Uber is truly horrible to deal with as a driver.  I'm out alot of money and time trying to sign up with them to be a driver.  They are completely unresponsive and unhelpful, and are losing ground to Lyft and other rideshare companies who at least communicate with you.  Theyre even rude at times, completely opposite of how they present themselves online
title: horrible

review:
In Jordan drivers just cancel the ride once they reach you when they found the trip is short or the payment is credit card or for any other reason 

It happened to me many times, and why is that, because they can do that under the reason of customer is not wearing mask, although I was wearing one and despite the fact that it is not required any more 

One time I was already in the car and the moment I got on and put the seat belt, the driver received a call, and easily told me sorry I have to be somewhere else, then in front of me he just put in the app that I am not wearing a mask and said sorry someone else will come now to pick you up

And guess what, you can’t claim that, no way you can do that, I spent hours in the app trying to do that, it is designed not to

So in Jordan I don’t recommend using uber
title: In Jordan I don’t recommend using uber

review: I have been charged for “Uber pass” for months without consent. I never signed up for this, and it’s a terrible deal that does not save money anyways unless you are taking hundreds of rides. I never noticed it on my bank statement because it conveniently looks similar to any Ubers that I take.
title: Charged without consent for Uber Pass

review: I have $75 in Uber cash but I can’t use it.  The app on my iPhone is stuck on the “Get Started” screen.  I have repeatedly uninstalled and reinstalled the app; restarted my phone; and asked a tech- savvy friend to try to sort it out.  Still can’t get past Get Started.  I’ve tried following instructions on the Help page but should be renamed Helpless.  All I get from them is identical replies asking for a screenshot of the error message.  I can’t get a error message until I can move past Get Started.  In the meantime, Uber has my money and I’m riding with Lyft.
title: Uber stole my $$$

review: So I used Uber eats to put an order at chic fil a and at least 3 drivers canceled, so I contacted chic fil a themselves and they told me 3 drivers came in and asked for an order for Ventura. The chic fil a employee advised them that the order was not in their system and to resolve the issue the driver needs to let Uber eats know to resubmit the order. But the chic fil a employee told me they are not doing that they are just canceling the order and letting the next driver get the same message. I will never ever use this service again.
title: Worst app ever delete it. Just buy a car or get it yourself.

review: Normally app is fine. But trying to get picked up at the Seattle airport only works if you want to pick curbside. I stupidly went to the Uber app rideshare pickup area as the airport directed, to find that the app wont let you select that pickup location. If you try, it stubbornly reverts to an arrival door pickup. I tried anyway, and messaged the driver that I was at app rideshare pickup, but they never responded or started moving. Had to give up and take a cab.
title: Couldn’t get ride at airport

review: It almost takes me over two hours just to find a ride and I live in Memphis if I were able to tip before the driver picks me up they would make more money and more chances for people to get rides faster.
title: Can you please at tip before the driver arrives so I have a better chance of getting a driver

review: Never used something like Uber before. Hopefully never will again. Tried to schedule a ride to I could pick my car up from an auto shop. Needed time to get ready. The app kept setting the time for pickup as immediate. Had to cancel that trip and wont let me schedule a new one. Literally no one I can talk to for customer support. Uber expects prewritten answers to solve all problems for their customers, in other words, they have NO customer support at all. Do not use them, they refuse to ensure their customers know what is going on.
title: Anti customer

review: I don’t know what happened but Uber has gotten so bad. It’s to the point that I cannot plan on using this app for any work or timely function. The reality is you never know how long it will take to get a ride or if you will at all! While they’re not giving you rides, they will subtly jab you with their CA work agenda too. They will also gouge you when they know there are no other options (hypocracy anyone?). I never thought I would remember Taxi cabs fondly but I do now! Thank you for showing me that it can be worse than Taxis, Uber.
title: When did Uber get so bad?

review: Uber has gone down hill sense I started using it three years ago. All the updates make it so I couldn’t use my Venmo anymore but was still charging me, I stopped using Venmo, but now it won’t even let me pre pay to put money in my account. Also when you do put Uber cash in the money disappears, I’ll close out my account and the 30 dollars that was in there drops to 5 without using the app. It’s very annoying and I am thinking about not using it anymore.
title: Annoyed customer

review: I use this app maybe once or twice a month because they’re such thieves. They charge more than what the actual food is in store and then on top of that they charge you a convenience fee which is double what you’re paying in taxes. Then they charge you even more fees if it’s during peak hours. All these thieving delivery companies now have a monopoly on all the restaurants here to where I can’t even get a direct delivery from a Chinese take out place if I wanted to
title: Unfortunately convenient

review: Two months ago i bought 2 uber cash gift cards and haven’t been able to use it since. I have received the same error over and over, chatted and emailed for help and no matter how many times im told the same exact steps to fix it, which i do and nothing has fixed it. I can’t get a refund either because i purchased gift cards which i didnt know were non refundable so 77$ down the toilet and my Uber account doesnt work. If you purchase uber cash do not do it from a store gift card because they will not refund it.
title: What do I do?

review: Constant trouble requesting a ride, promised contact from support NEVER happened, (my issue was supposedly escalated), and a gift card with more than $80 on it my son can’t use. And now they have banned the account! Biggest rip off ever. Why they don’t have phone support is beyond stupid for a company of this size. The chat line is useless and hard to navigate to on their website. I wish I could get my money back. I might as well have lit a match to my money. I’m so frustrated that no one cares about helping me.
title: Will never use again or recommend

review: I tried cancelling a ride right after ordering, and the app froze and wouldn’t process the cancellation. The driver continued to pick me up and called me, at which point I told him I no longer needed the ride. The app charged me for the ride. I disputed that, but the app didn’t give me an option to say that I was disputing the charge due to an app crash. My only option was to say it was the driver’s fault, so then they took the money away from the driver. In short: the app crashed and tried to charge both the driver and rider instead of accepting fault.
title: App crashed and charged me

review: I travel often and live the app, however i often fly in and out of airports but not from the main terminal. The app does a poor job of selecting your location even after you u in the physical address. Recently in BDL airport I put in the address of my location and after selecting pickup, the app changed my location to the Sheraton airport hotel. The driver would not/could not adjust my pickup location. I used Lyft instead.
title: Airport woes

review: I usually schedule my rides hours before my trip and so fair none of my rides have showed up instead. when I check the Uber app it asks me how my ride was even thought they never showed up or picked me up. I am now a half hour late for my class and there is no where on the app to help with this problem. The Uber driver just sat their for 20 mins in the same spot and when I texted them where are you canceled. Please have a support tab for this kind of problem this the 3rd time this has happened to me.
title: Uber’s do not show up on time

review: Had a pretty early morning flight. Uber guarantees that within ten minutes of my pick up time I can get a car. Set a time 2 days early, time comes, nothing. They have a ten minute waiting period, so problem. At the end of the waiting period, I get a car that will arrive 50 minutes after my pickup window was set. Had to change flights day of, which is obviously incredibly expensive. Received no indication that the timing would be a problem, and all the language is a lie. Thanks Uber
title: Trying to schedule cost me 300 bucks
userName: Uber made me miss my flight

review: My app hasn’t been showing me when the driver is on their way and today I ordered one for work and wasn’t showing me they were here or anything so the driver cancelled and they still charged me 16$ for the ride that originally cost 9$? I will never be using this app again because this isn’t the only time it’s happened to me and there no way to contact customer service over the phone to explain what happened and I don’t know if I’ll be even getting my money back. JUST DOWNLOAD LYFT ITS SO MUCH BETTER
title: Doesn’t show you when your driver is on their way

review: I stopped using Uber almost 2 years ago and haven’t used it since And instead use Lyft because I noticed a while ago that when me and my friends will go out we would both be standing next to each other pulling up Uber rates trying to figure out how to get home and the prices were always simultaneously different for my friend who just so happens to be (Caucasian)and the prices will be almost $20 more for me i just so happen to be a young black female. This is sad i just want to get home at a reasonable price i don't deserve this
title: Racist Algorithms

review: I’ve been using Uber for a while and their prices where always decent but ever since January the prices have been insane I only use Uber to get to and from work and I hate that I’m spending anywhere firm 30-60 dollars just for one ride my entire paychecks go basically to Uber I haven’t been using it lately since they’re super high and I need to pay for bills. Uber please lower your price like they were before
title: Prices or horrible

review: This app used to be good to travel short or long distances with fair prices but now if I need to go somewhere that’s only 8 minutes away it charges like $19 and even if you can get a ride sometimes they’ll make you wait 15+ minutes and there’s nothing you can do about it because if you cancel you get charged. Still usable but very overpriced
title: Still functional but very unpredictable and inconvenient

review: Drivers keep cancelling after learning my destination. My trip was 2 miles, and I set my destination prior to requesting a ride. After Uber matched me to a driver and I waited a few minutes, the driver messaged me and asked where I was headed. When I messaged back with my destination, the driver cancelled. This happened 3 times, where each time I waited on and expected the driver to arrive, while standing in the cold rain. Uber has no repercussions for drivers cancelling a trip after accepting it.
title: Drivers keep cancelling after asking my destination

review: I was just trying to get a ride to my job when I am about to be late my car hasn’t been starting since yesterday and it puts me in a ride where the driver is 20 mins away as soon as he accepts it I cancel it and I am told that I was going to pay a fee when the guy hasn’t moved an inc towards my location so I just let it go. I try to see how far he is and he still in the spot. I cancel the ride when the guy hadn’t moved a single inch and paid a fee. The fact that I had to pay a fee when I’m already late for something and the driver hasn’t moved is freaking ridiculous.
title: Cancel fees

review: I tried to change the pickup time to later for a reserved trip.  Went on web to look for instructions. But could not change the time. Very frustrating. So had to cancel the trip and start again. Luckily wasn’t charged for the cancellation.
title: App Not User-Friendly

review:
Car was clean.  Driver was friendly.
