My 83 year old dad waited and had 3 different UBER drivers accept the ride from the Nashville AIrport to Bowling Green and then as he was getting ready to get into their cars they told him it was too far.  It is the driver’s responsibility to not accept trips they aren’t willing to take!  

Sawrou was wonderful and extremely gracious!  THANK YOU!
title: AWESOME DRIVER

review:
Had to delete the app because it wouldn't honor my push notification settings. Ride sharing is not an impulse purchase as the push notifications seem to encourage. Will use the app when it's needed, and won't when it is not.

Aside from the annoying notifications, the app is fine. However, since I had to delete the app, I'll be using whatever app is installed on my phone the next time a ride service is needed.
title: Way too many push ads

review: This was my first time using uber. I gave the driver the address. He took me to an ENTERPRIZE TRUCK RENTAL. He would not wait A moment to go in and check. He left me at the wrong place which left me to order another Uber. He did not speak very much English. Very inconsiderate. To get to one place I needed two numbers. What happen to your first uber free. I ended up having to take another uber home. Not A very good UBER EXPERIENCE.
title: Uber

review: My driver was very professional and cheered me up on my way home from the hospital. I know that he really and honestly wanted me to enjoy the ride. We talked about our travels around the world. We talked about food dishes we liked and our families. Every driver from Uber could learn from something from this gentleman in your employment. Sincerely, Charles Young.
title: SUPER PROFESSIONAL

review: Although I’ve been in a Uber many times before it’s always my wife who orders the car. Last night I needed a ride by myself. I downloaded the app, set up my profile and ordered a car in no time! Very easy!! Then my driver Saleem had a very clean, comfortable car. Saleem was not only a good driver but a great guy! Thanks Uber!
title: First timer

review: We use Uber to and from Logan airport often.  Michael was the best driver we’ve had.  He navigated heavy traffic easily and got us to Logan ahead of schedule.  He had soft, pleasant music on the radio.  And we had a nice conversation with him.  He helped me with my suitcase.  I recommend choosing Michael as a driver.  We were lucky to get him for our trip.
title: Michael’s ride to airport

review: Uber eats is the worst platform and app to order food from as they will not give a refund form a mistake they made on your order nor try to credit account or will do a refund if u did not get all your I items but they will tell u that would have to just be out of the money and well and no way I can get even get the driver to come back out so til this is taken care of and I get the misssa all not follow u all of he way graced. So they trying and if I don’t take care they f this . I will be reporting to the bbb and etc
title: Customer service and support team

review: Drivers have become so unreliable. I’ve got a very high passenger rating and get cancelled on 5-6 times everytime I get an Uber. I’ve talked to others who have the same experience and we’ve all seen that drivers are cancelling rides and forcing prices to go up. When it’s not busy out, it still takes me 20-30 minutes to finally get a driver. Uber was supposed to be a safe and reliable way to get transportation and now it’s extremely unreliable and expensive because of drivers trying to game the system.
title: Drivers forcing surges

review: The ability of this app to tell me what’s available, summon a rider, tell me where he or she is, and finish out the transactions, It’s just wonderful, but I can live without the need to disable app notifications once I arrive, or rather return home, because of constant unwanted unsolicited notifications. This is poor behavior by otherwise great app.
title: Works like a charm, but hold the spam

review: My first trip with Uber was great! It was so easy I couldn't believe it. Just call when you're ready to go and they give you an arrival time and you can actually track where the driver is on your phone. The driver was so friendly and very easy to talk to. A real pleasure! I'm so glad I decided to go with Uber.
title: Thank you!

review:
He was persistent and precise on pick up time. He is respectful when too my boys to school. I wish more was like him. 

The Uber driver befor him I gave south side address of apartment, so I asked if he can find the Northsode with the different and I apologized for it being incorrect and it’s for my son to go to school. He said yes thank you. He says yea your welcome RIGHT after hanging up he canceled the ride. 

I current got my Benz stolen so gas no car and the 1st driver was lied and couldn’t help at all. Poor customer service. 

Chris my 2nd driver was amazing customer service all the way around. Boys loved the ride as well. 

Thank you Chris 10 ⭐️🏆
title: BEST EMPLOYEE : Uber driver you always Wanted.

review: I would like to give a shoutout to Dylan for a great customer service.. He didn’t give up on us, even though he has to go around looking for the pick up address. It actually showed that he cared for his customers especially us that we just got off from work. I thank him and God bless him 🙏
title: Appreciation

review: Reserved a ride for my mother-in-law to get from Walmart to our house. Charles arrived early and this was perfect for her because this was her first Uber ride. So she was a bit nervous. But she said Charles was amazing! Very nice accommodations. Pleasant smelling car lol. I know I know but that’s a thing. And she said she would have given him 10 stars if she could! So, thank you Sir Charles.
title: Thank you Sir Charles!

review:
Richard was on time, professional and very attentive throughout. He was also patient with me as I had to add a stop and made me feel very comfortable even though there was a last minute change in our route. :).

He adjusted the ac to my liking and provided a great, relaxed tone for our trip. HE DESERVES A RAISE as provided excellent service! Thank you Richard!
title: Brunch Trip.

review: Our shuttle from the hotel that was to pick us up and take us to get our car was “down” so they could not come to get us at the airport. I organized an Uber and Charles was there in just a few minutes!  What a live saver he was!  Thank you, Charles! He was polite and helpful!  We so appreciate Charles and Uber!
title: Charles saved the day!

review: Now I love Uber and I have been using it for 3 years but I just don’t understand why they don’t have a future for cash most of the times people carry cash and I think we’ll need a update. Uber doesn't accept cash in most US states, with the exception of Texas and Philadelphia. Now other then that Uber is a great app I trust 100% of the drivers and never had a bad time in a Uber
title: Cash

review: Driver went above and beyond waited for us as we got out of the river with our small child, took us back to our car, since my wife wanted to forget her keys in or return vehicle lol! He definitely save the day. Hope this unload our stuff and even OK with us getting in his car wet. Highly recommended.
title: Amazing Service

review: Loc was quick to pick me up & safely got me to work. This is my second Uber ride ever & I wish I could have tapped, all the great things on the type of driver he was, but it only allows to tap one & then submit. It should let you tap on all that apply. Please work on that Uber people. Thank you Loc!!!
title: My driver this morning

review: The ap is not easy to navigate and understand. I tried to add a stop and it was taking it as two trips to the origin back and forth instead of aligning the destinations in one trip. Editing the trip for puking up the added destination was not working and after several tries, eventually went through and set up the order or destinations right. It was a headache in the era of AI. Needsto wrought out a lot of kinks.
title: It is still as confusing as ever!

review: I was in London on business in June last month. Had two drivers not show up and got pickpocketed and ended up taking a taxi to arrive safely at my hotel. Uber charged me twice for drivers who never showed. I was just departing a restaurant in San Francisco with my children, 10 and 12, and now the algorithm sends us from between 16th and 17th to 16th with the homeless vagrants on the corner to accommodate their drivers. Driver to me. Do not make me walk to you. I suppose Taxis are making a come back between Uber and Lyft’s terrible service.
title: Between London and San Francisco your app is awful

review: First a late night hero! Had flat and no service provider for a tow. Thank God she answered my call. Very personable and great conversion during the ride. Very positive person. I had some groceries and packages and she went above and beyond to help me with that! Overall great Uber driver! I would request her again and recommend as well!!!Totally 5 stars plus!!!😍
title: Barbara

review:
This version seems to be problematic when it comes to selecting locations.  I select ‘home’ and it picks an address CLOSE to the pre assigned address in the app.  Weird.  I went to correct the address and the driver accepted the change and yet the app kept the incorrect address.  
Overall, the service is fine.  The drivers have always been great.  The app is flaky.
title: Has a hard time finding an exact location

review: I have only ever used this app to commute to and from work, and until recently I had no problems, just in the last month I have had multiple charges for single trips, I have been added to an Uber One membership that I never signed up for neither do I want it. It is also beyond frustrating to not have a physical customer support number or member to speak to, as there is not line set up at all. It is extremely frustrating and beyond reasonable use to me at this point.
title: Multiple charges and subscriptions

review:
Uber charged me much higher than the upfront pricing, and they refused to adjust to the upfront pricing because I’ve requested too many refunds in the past.

These refunds in the past are related to Uber Eats, where I never received my order because the drivers delivered the order to the wrong location. If their policy is to never refund me in these instances again, then I will never be using Uber again. I already cancelled my Uber One membership and plan to delete both apps from my phone.

Stick with Lyft. Uber is trash.
title: The customer service is laughably bad

review: Signed up for a trial of Uber One in February 2023. Canceled in March when I bought a car. Here it is middle of May and Uber has attempted to charge my card repeatedly. I ended up turning transactions off and spoke with customer service. Twice! The charges are still be attempted. I was told today that eventually if it declines enough it will stop. But they can’t do anything to stop it from attempting to charge me?? They just said if it charges me they will refund. In the meantime I am having to use a separate bank account. This is unacceptable.
title: Do NOT Sign Up for Uber One.

review: I flew in from Texas after midnight. Next morning I could not locate wallet I reached out to driver . He told me he had it . He drove all the way back to drop if it off. I couldn’t retrieve it that morning Bev I was heading to a memorial service, so he graciously dropped it off that afternoon. KUDOS  to him . Amex Gold Business 3 Debit Cards License and Military ID still I take
title: Returned Wallet Next Day

review:
Harry was the most compassionate Uber driver we met! My 90 year old mom had a medical appointment but the insurance company screwed up her scheduled transportation for 2 days later!( I ordered the wrong type of Uber service and we were supposed to meet Harry 2 blocks away but there’s no way mom could make that!(

I called Harry and he turned around to meet us within 1 minute!

I also had the wrong doctor’s address since it was on file with our insurance! In the middle of the trip I got the corrected address from insurance and Harry changed to the correct destination mid trip!

He’s a saint! You’re in the best hands!!!
title: Most compassionate driver!

review: I’ve been riding with Uber for some time now. But seriously I waited for 45mins trying to get a ride I just wanted to go home😭 sometimes u don’t know if ur gonna get a ride on time or not. It can take so long until u get a ride😭 like why say “fast and affordable rides” when getting a ride can take up to an hour before u get a driver😭 Uber I love you but this is heart-wrenching 🥲💔
title: Unreliable

review: Needed a ride back from dropping my truck off at a shop downtown. Christian was there 6 minutes ahead of schedule and couldn’t have been nicer or done a better job. Will come back again in the future after seeing this is how you guys work!
title: Better than I expected

review: My Uber rides and drivers have all been extremely polite their driving has been great and I have gotten where I wanted to go in a pleasant drive! I have used the service many times in the last few months and have been very pleased with it. I am so pleased we have the service available.
title: Review Jussieu Mowris

review: I went to sleep thinking that my ride to the airport was all set the next morning. Instead instead when I went to check my trip in the morning, there was nothing there and there was no notification that it had been canceled so at the last minute I had to rebook, which was very stressful but luckily I got a nice driver. The Uber app seems not very user friendly and disorganized
title: No notification for a cancellation

review: Hi Jennifer was amazing she weeny above and beyond. My family had a departure back to Los Angeles. There was a slight mishap with the rental car had jumbo car as they didn’t have a shuttle before 7 AM, but Jennifer came to our rescue as of five minutes away and she helped us get all of our luggage and baggage into her little car. Thank you so much Jennifer.
title: Thank you

review: I recently had a situation where I was charged twice for a ride I didn’t get due to the driver not moving and when I reached out for customer support it’s been an entire day (mind you I contacted during the business week)nobody has contacted me back I called on 3-4 separate occasions and while I reached someone on the DRIVERS customer service support because there isn’t customer support for riders,  they still were not able to give me a resolution or at least a response at all. Highly frustrating
title: Customer service for riders is non existent

review: I was a relatively late adapter of ride-hailing but I glad my wife convinced me. Uber is my go-to platform for anytime I don’t want to drive. I am a huge fan of the scheduling your ride in advance option. A 5:00 am trip to the airport is significantly less stressful when you know your ride will be there.
title: If you don’t use Uber, you need to

review: Maurice, our Uber driver in Naples, FL, went above and beyond to help us resolve an issue during our trip. The driver’s license for one passenger was inadvertently dropped between the window and the inside of the car door. Maurice, on his own time, removed the inside door panel, retrieved and returned the license. Maurice was very friendly and polite, and provided outstanding service!
title: Maurice, our Driver

review: Too frequently I will pay for a ride based on the fact that it is set to arrive in a suitable time to make it worth my while, instead of waiting for bus. The app says a ride is 5 minutes away, I pay for the ride, they take my money, then the time changes to 10-15 minutes away. At this point even if I cancel the trip they still take $6.
title: Should offer full refunds if time is wrong

review:
Our first trip on an Uber with Judex. A wonderful experience. Hope our return trip home will be as wonderful and easy. Will continue to use Uber until my foot is healed and I can drive again. We may even use you for other trips if we’re feeling we need not drive ourselves.
Sonja Yefsky
title: A great first experience with  Uber

review:
With all the business Uber gets the drivers should get a higher cut. 
When you’re going th the airport or use a tollway Uber should display the cost ahead of time so riders aren’t sticker shocked and irritated at the end of the ride. App not as user friendly when it comes to add-on’s. 

My driver was friendly and safe driver.
title: Uber’s cut is too big

review: My Uber driver was fantastic. I didn’t have to wait more than just a few minutes for him. He put my heavy luggage in his car and off we went. We had nice conversation. He got me to my destination safely and carried my luggage to the door. What a courteous gentleman. All Uber drivers can learn from him. Delio is worth his weight in Gold. Thank you.
title: Uber driver: Delio

review:
Anouar is simply the best! My ride with Anouar was simply amazing. He was warm, pleasant and friendly all through and No dull moment…we talked about the weather and my trip and spent the rest of the trip talking about soccer and the ongoing World Cup and I was pleased to know he is Moroccan and his team is doing well at the tournament. He is highly recommended with utmost regards 

Godwin U
title: Ten star rating!!!

review:
Got charged cancellation fees for no reason at all I reserved a ride a few days away and then cancelled it because it was cheaper with lyft. Just got charged a 30$ cancelation fee. And I cancelled the ride about 6 hours before scheduled ride. Never using this app again. 
I tried reaching out to Uber to ask why I got charged when fee clearly states if it’s within an hour of scheduled ride. Their customer service is terrible it is so hard to reach them they only have a text on Uber app which they never respond to. Terrible experience.
title: Never use. Scam.
developerResponse: {'id': 34036540, 'body': "Hi, we're extremely sorry to hear about your concern regarding your recent experience. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve your concern, fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343HNsE. We shall get back to you at the earliest.", 'modified': '2023-01-02T05:05:20Z'}

review: The app should adjust their waiting time algorithm. You book a car thinking it will take 5 minutes to pick you up when it takes 12 minutes. If the price depends on the waiting time and one pays a higher price for waiting less, it is only appropriate to get the car at the expected time. It has happened to me very often that I arrived late due to this situation
title: Waiting time is deceiving

review: Why am I being charged a fee because the driver was at the wrong pickup location and cancelled the trip? If the driver is going to be on a different street and not where your pickup location is selected, what is the point of the pickup location? Received a fee for a circumstance that wasn't even my fault. Driver then orders me to leave the pickup place to find them, wasting even more time. I shouldn’t be getting charged a fee when I am in the right place and Uber driver is saying “I’ve arrived” but is on a whole different street.
title: Charging fee problem

review: Manhattan Uber drivers routinely accept rides then cancel to generate cancellation fees.  They cancel and Uber charges you.  At first I thought it was one off thing but it happens over and over.  So often that Uber refuses to refund the phony charges after a certain number of incidents-they made a rule to keep your money.  I switched to Lyft.
title: Scammy, anti customer, avoid
userName: okay i rated it for you

review: I used Uber to catch my daughter a ride to school bc she over slept and missed her bus. 3 mins before the driver got there. The driver cancel. The apps said I had to get another driver because  the driver had canceled. Only to get the same driver again that was 3 mins away. They charge me $5.75 for a cancellation fee when the driver canceled. What in the world going on . So he got his $12 for the trip plus my tip bc I always tip people for there time and more money for canceling just to only take the same person that he canceled smh. Please tell me  how that make sense!! 😡
title: Be Careful

review: Beware and use at your own risk. I had used Uber successfully for some time; It seems that after you get comfortable with their platform things begin to change …. We were charged over 20% more than we were initially quoted and there were no valid reasons for the change . I would understand if u we was upfront ,however they operate through bait and switch and deception. Talking to customer support ? Good luck ? Getting the actual reason from their “support menu “ … good luck . That is bot how Uber operates.
title: Beware using Uber : fares will change

review: I understand taking tolls can be a huge inconvenience for some drivers, but there is no reason I should be sitting in a car for more than 10 mins waiting in a line of cars, when the driver could’ve simply taken the toll route. My destination is not that far, but it’s over a bridge, and as much as I’d love to walk, I can’t. There needs to be some type of rule for this.
title: Tolls

review: I wasted my lunch break on this nonsense I gave the drivers specific instructions and that were not hard to follow not that hard to follow delivery, text and by phone call I want my money back and I plan to stop using this app because there’s no real way to complain Update: the customer service is terrible while I was explaining my situation to the representative they midway put me on with the the driver while I was complaining about the driver! I want refund as soon as possible and y’all need customer service training
title: Drivers do not follow directions

review: Once upon a time was a very good application and support was impeccable. Now it’s the worst. They charge you for rides you haven’t taken and insist you pay for them. Even at times make you pay for rides where the driver has accepted the ride and has refused to go to the destination or cancel the ride. Contacting customer service is a futile endeavor and they offer no solutions at all. I don’t complain or write negative reviews much(can be verified easily), however this is a company that very much deserves it. Use their application and services at your risk !!!
title: Unreliable

review: Notices continue to pop up on my phone AND my Apple Watch intended to compel me to use their product. As I am going through my life I don’t need to know Uber eats now has a special, that I have gotten credits, or that Uber would like me to come back. I will continue to rate this app poorly as long as it continues to abuse the notifications for business acquisition.
title: Stop sending ads as notices!!!

review: The end user experience just continues to get worse. Request a ride, get it confirmed at one rate, driver holds the ride for 2/3 minutes and cancels, request the same ride and now pay 2x the fee because “driver demand” has peaked due to confirmed and then cancelled rides. When a competitor is half the cost of the new ride and you cancel the rebooked trip, you pay the cancellation fee. No thanks. It’s not that hard for your product group to control these events for an optimal user experience, not an experience that seeks to price gouge the user and reward poor driver behavior.
title: Oof

review: I scheduled a ride two days in advance. Twenty minutes before it is supposed to occur I get a notification that my ride is on time. Great, fantastic. But, just 2-3 minutes before my driver is supposed to arrive I’m notified that actually my driver will be 45 minutes late. So what am I supposed to do? I obviously need a ride or I wouldn’t be using this service. Absolutely despicable. There was little to no communication to me that I might not be getting to work on time and now I’m in trouble at work and I still can’t get there. Thanks Uber.
title: Had me late for work

review: Garbage app. Too much power to the drivers. Several times now I’ve scheduled rides well in advance only for the driver to drive all the way to meet me then cancel and drive off before I get a chance to say or do anything. I’m not even given a minute to find or get to them despite the app claiming they will wait for me when they arrive earlier than scheduled. Then when I’m forced to walk to my destination in the snow the app decides it’s funny to steal my money and give it to the driver anyway. Good job soliciting and hiring thieves!
title: A network of thieves and untrustworthy people

review: Uber has been allowing their drivers to cancel rides or forcing us to cancel rides while still charging us a cancellation fee. They have done this to me 4 times already and their phone number is not even operational. This is such a big scam!! I want my money back! I will never use the car service again! I advise anyone reading this to use Lyft instead of Uber. Lyft is cheaper and where Uber has been failing on multiple accounts, Lyft has been coming thru time and again for me, my friends, family, and others I know.
title: Uber Stealing Money!!Scam!!!

review: It was first time using Uber again after pandemic and had a horrible experience. I had ride for $42 and I tipped a driver in a $10 cash. I didn’t even open the app after the ride since it was late and my phone was out of battery. When I checked my email in the morning I noticed that I was charged for $8 tip? I never tipped on app, how is that possible? I contacted the customer support and explained what happened but they said they can’t do anything about it. Really displeased with their service. Never using it again.
title: Horrible service

review: If people weren’t so stupid and paid attention to how you guys operate you’d be dead after a year. But here we are. Always updates pricing when it’s more but never changes it if it’s less. Can’t find another driver because we want you to wait 25 minutes. Even though you can find another driver literally any other time of day. Whenever I do “find another driver” it’s always half of the time the original one is. But they don’t want you to see how many drivers are right next to you. Absolutely criminal and useless.
title: Unethical

review:
I really love Uber but I just now found out I’m being charged $9.99/month for a Pass. I looked through the help section to find out how to cancel it but where they’re telling me doesn’t exist. Why am I being charged? Is this something you do secretly?

On the other hand, when I was at a wedding in Vegas, Uber was great!
title: Uber Pass

review:
I used Uber for the first time and was very pleased with the whole experience…The driver was on schedule; the vehicle was very well kept; the driver was very cordial and courteous; and I got to my destination on time without any difficulty.

I will definitely not hesitate to use Uber again when I am in need of a ride.
title: First time experience

review: I’ll start by saying I’m a Gold member who will be moving all of my business and all my recommendations to Uber’s competitor. For a single ride I have 5 different receipts of varying amounts. I’ve asked for clarity from Uber multiple times with no avail. There’s no number to call. All I want is a single receipt telling me exactly how much I was charged for this given trip. It’s not too much to ask. Useless app. Horrible service. Go to their competitor (or at least find a ride provider with a phone number). Never ever again.
title: The *worst* customer service

review: I have had the Uber app for years and recently deleted it due to a terrible experience. I had a Uber driver who lied and said he picked me up and dropped me off at a location when I never received a ride. I disputed the charge with Uber who sided with the driver and failed to acknowledge any of the proof I provided that the driver did not pick me up. The customer service is absolutely terrible. I emailed back and forth with a customer service person who just sent the same generic response to all of my emails. I felt totally scammed. I will never use this app again.
title: Uber

review: The concept of the app works just fine. The functionality of the app works just fine. The drivers are fine. What is completely unhelpful is if anything goes wrong and you need Uber to resolve a situation or answer questions. Absolutely bewildering how confused that whole process works.
title: Better Hope For The Best

review: I have used Uber for years and have never had issues. I randomly woke up this morning to see that my card was charged for a ride that I did not take. I contacted support about this and they basically said “aw sorry, someone you know probably used it. Check with them & we’ll block this payment method until you tell us otherwise.” Uhm, no. No one else has access to my card or Uber account or that email. This is crazy that a successful company like Uber couldn’t help me more than that. Very frustrating
title: Incorrectly charged

review: I’ve used Uber for a long time, but recently was charged over $200 for a $37 ride. They acknowledged that they overcharged me but refunded only the $37. So I have still paid nearly $200 for a $37 ride and all I can get from the help function is verification that they already gave m my refund of $37. I have submitted proof of my overcharge several times but only receive the same canned response every time I send proof. The support is non existent and they seem fine with keeping my money. I feel robbed. Will never ride Uber again, which disappoints me.
title: No longer happy

review: After being a loyal Uber customer since conception, I am removing the app and using alternative services. Several times I have waited 10 mins or so on an Uber only to have them cancel on me. When done in reverse, we get charged. Furthermore, I’ve had an Uber drive off and leave me (I was clearly in view and no more than 20 ft from the car) in the rain twice. These instances where not due to waiting too long, as they waited no more than 60 second. I am fed up with this unacceptable behavior that happens more often than not.
title: Terrible service

review:
My ride was prompt and courteous, however, I don’t understand why I had to collect my bags and instead of being able to meet my ride outside the arrival doors, I had to find the elevator back up to the departure doors?
My driver was very courteous and helpful.
I could not figure out how to tip on your app, so, I was thankful to have the cash to do so.
title: First time rider in ANC AK

review: Uber has no technical support phone number except for drivers, and their email version of “customer service” is beyond horrible.  They do NOT respond and are of little to no help. My Family Profile just disappeared and there is no way to uncover it.  Multiple complaints have been posted online about this same issue but the only way to resolve is to try to get their nonexistent customer service to delete your account???? That’s insane.  Good luck to those using Uber for business.  Totally disgusted by this company and this App
title: Worst App Ever!

review: Frequent user of Uber and as of lately the drivers have been the worst. From being disrespectful to recklessly driving. This morning my Uber driver was not at the pick up location. When I told him about it he said he had parked and refused to move until I explained to him the reason I requested the ride was because I HAD somewhere to be. But yet I was charged a WAITING FEE! That they refused to return! Above it all he was speeding in and out of lanes! Almost hit 3 cars! This is now getting out of hand! Definitely how I expect to spend MY money.......
title: It’s Just Ridiculous

review: This is my first time using this app, I was able to set my ride up and everything, but the thing is, I need to be able to bring my dog, and I can’t find the edit button that will allow me to tell the driver I’m bringing a dog with me. this one time I can’t bring my dog is okay, but I don’t want to be stranded because the Uber driver can’t have a dog in the car either due to health or personal reasons.
title: It’s good, but needs work

review: I have been working with Uber for over a week to allow me to use my new phone and phone number. Apparently, there must have been issues with the person who had this number previously. Regardless, just getting Uber to even respond to my messages takes over a day if at all. It’s sad but I have two choices, get a new phone number or only use Lyft. I have followed their directions PERFECTLY and they still will not allow me back in.  I never expected this level of poor service from Uber.
title: Will not renew my account after phone number change

review:
Customer Support is a joke. They will misunderstand your issue, they will copy/paste a generic response and not even read what you are asking or reporting. Finally, they’ll ignore you and close the thread once they send 1-2 generic responses. Multi-billion dollar company can’t figure out customer service... good luck if you have any issues, you’re pretty much on your own. There’s a reason this company has such bad reputation out there.

Just read the other reviews here and search online and you’ll see it’s no secret. Lol Glad Lyft is an option and Doordash and Grubhub for food.
title: Customer Support is not their thing…

review: Uber is very unreliable. It has been unreliable since the start of this pandemic. Drivers refuse to accept rides. Prices are unreasonable when there are few drivers. For instance, I once received a notification that the closest driver to my house would cost me $1,000. Drivers should not be allowed to accept rides then cancel them right away. I hate this app. It’s changed so much. Every time I request a ride it takes the app about five minutes to send me a notification saying “Your ride is now at a higher price.” It’s ridiculous at this point.
title: I wish I could give this app 0 stars.

review: It’s been about a year since I have used Uber and I really liked the new safety features on the app. I was able to share my trip with my husband so he knew where I was and when I got to my destination. I definitely felt safe and would highly recommend Uber. My driver was awesome!
title: Love the safety features

review: I am riding much more frequently with Uber these days as their rates are reasonable. I used to ride more frequently with Lyft, but their rates have gone out of sight and don’t provide service that is any better. The Uber rides have been excellent and my daughter and I used them extensively when we were in Ireland.
title: Good rides at a reasonable rate

review: We were so concerned about him being late with it being 3:15 amand missing our plane. But not only was he on time but he was a few minutes early. Very friendly! Thank you Jolbert! I am sure I didn’t spell it correctly. Sorry.  Hope he is still driving if we come back.
title: On time!!

review:
I had a fantastic ride from Montgomery airport to my hotel.  The driver was fantastic, his vehicle was clean, we enjoyed a great conversation, he pointed out a couple places I asked him about, and he delivered me safely and quickly to my hotel. 

I did not need it, but I can see that  I would really like the safety features that Uber has instituted.

The only thing that should be added is for both the driver and me to see each other’s photos when we are first meeting as another way to help us recognize each other.   

Thank you Uber for improving your services!

Thank you to my fantastic driver!  

Happy birthday, too!

🙂🙌
title: Fantastic!

review:
As soon as Carlos pulled up and saw me with a sizable tote, he left the driver’s seat and horned the trunk. He then opened my passenger-side door. 
     The trip was only a short distance, but even do, I recognized Carlos as a superior Uber driver.
     I supposed his car to mine new. He pointed to the odometer: >200,000 miles! Spotless.
     I hope I ride with him again.
title: Courteous driver with a good-as-new vehicle

review: Carlos was a wonderful driver and a great person. He was professional, friendly and easy to talk with. His vehicle was clean and comfortable and he even arrived a few minutes early. Carlos and I connected and had a great conversation. I would definitely recommend him to other Uber users. So wonderful to meet good people.
title: Great ride from Carlos

review: Very nice driver, Polite and clean car.  Uber needs to work on the app.  It doesn’t give the drivers a clear understanding of pickup locations in a strip mall.  I Wrote specific instructions so he could find me.  Had I not done this it would have taken him to the opposite side of the building.
title: Uber has horrible directions for the drivers

review: I needed a brief ride today to pick up my vehicle, which was in a workshop, and the young man which provided my Uber drive to the location, was very elegant and pleasure to be in his company. I recommend his services for anyone that needs transportation and you too will feel a pleasant experience, no matter how long your ride is.
title: Uber driver

review:
I have tried several time to schedule a pick up and ride to the airport and a couple of other places and Uber here in rapid city, SD will not allow it.
Hopefully they change that soon so that people like me can schedule a ride for when they have appointments or planes to catch.
title: Cannot schedule a ride.

review: Jamie is a bright star on a rainy day. He gives me hope for the future. He has a great respect for what he does and it’s evident in how he curates his environment. Add the personality, appearance,( real easy on the eyes)couple that with an easy and knowledgeable conversationalist and you have the ingredients for perfection. Uber management should come up with a way to ‘clone’ him!!!
title: Restored my best instinct

review: Not often do I get the opportunity to meet genuine honest faith driven individuals but I got that opportunity today. I just want to say joy cometh in the morning and this too shall pass. Thank you for allowing me the opportunity to enjoy my ride to my brother in laws wedding and for getting me and my daughter there safe and sound.
title: You made my day

review:
This was my first time using any rides as such from any company. Rossi was very professional. He represented the company Uber well. I was concerned because I was taking Uber (for the first time) at 2am, but Rossi made my first time experience pleasant. I knew I was safe (as mentioned) he was professional, and he made intentional connections with me as his passenger. 

Thank you Rossi 😉
title: Rossi

review: I had an issue with one of my trips, and so I reached out to customer service, sending a message. Within minutes my issue was resolved! I am so happy and it was such a relief to be able to get the help that I needed so quickly and decisively. Really great app, thanks, Uber!
title: Great and quick customer service!

review: Having to move around a lot without owning a car, I’ve had to depend on using this app more than I’d like to. It is easy to use. However, in Qatar, the cars smell bad, the drivers are bad at driving, too. It is extremely rare that I find drivers that drive well. Aside from that, it is the absolute worst that there is no option “find another driver”. What do I have to do to get that ** option? I do not want to have to put up with the same bad driving more than once. I believe it is not much to ask for at this point.
title: ADD THE OPTION TO ADD ANOTHER DRIVER

review: Stanley was on time (early actually). Super polite and helpful with our luggage.  Car was clean and he was a good driver.  But the pleasant surprise was his highly intelligent conversation.  So well spoken and well read.  Almost didn’t want to get out at the end of our ride.  Could have listened and chatted with him for hours!  Thanks, Stanley!  Best ride ever!
title: What a delightful trip

review: He was prompt and patient when arriving and waiting for us at an additional stop location. His vehicle was very spacious for my family. He was extremely accommodating by getting out of the driver seat to meet and greet us and offered assistance with our luggage. Thank you so much Kevin! Your kindness will forever be my heart!
title: Kevin was fantastic

review:
For a newbie - it seemed an endless circle of dead-ends. Roll about a week to finally get the first ride in: once in, it seems to be a bit more user friendly. There is no customer support or # to call… so I am a bit perturbed at how it’s been … so I’ll hope things can and/or will improve as I’ve heard much better things for this app & services than I have for any others-
So wish me luck !
title: New to using this app- but

review: My driver was on time, I’d reserved the night before,  the driver was pleasant, well spoken and knowledgeable. The car was clean but although the car was a 2022 model, the ride was hard and the road noise was profound. This was my second ride in this model car and the first was the same way. Not a comfortable ride and the route was mostly interstate. I’d never own one of these cars.
title: Tesla model 3 ride

review: Today I got my first market push notification from Uber. Screw you I don’t want to get notifications for ads! So I went to the app to disable such notifications. However, my version of the app doesn’t have a way to customize notifications!!! On a slightly older OS cuz of iPhone 12. There’s a “communications” menu to customize how drivers talk to you, but absolutely no way to change what push notifications you get. Guess I’m completely disabling all push notifications for this app 🤷‍♂️
title: Where did you hide notifications?

review:
Driver had as destination the pick up address from this AM.
He spoke no English or Spanish and was driving us against our will to the wrong destination. We had address which had been given for Thursday PM ride on a piece of paper ,but he refused to go to requested destination.
We had to get very assertive about his stopping and letting us out of car.
No idea why info was wrong.
We entered it correctly with destination to dock for boat excursion.
We will certainly dispute the charge on Debit card.
We should get refund and also have loss of $70 covered, as we had ordered Uber ride with ample time for arrival.
As driver evidently didn’t cancel our aborted ride, we were unable to re book a ride to correct location.
Hugely frustrating.
We expect Uber to act responsibly and cancel charge for false ride and reimburse us for our loss of $70 for tour in Lisboa.
title: Missed our boat excursion.

review: Stop charging my card when you haven’t even gotten me a ride yet, and then send me a message saying you’ve given up try again later. I’ll tell you when I’ve given up !! Yes you release the funds and they show up in my account a week later !! stop making me pick which kind of car to ride in if you don’t have rides just let me push the buttons on several different types of rides and give me the first one available
title: Card holds

review:
I've used Uber both in the United States and in foreign countries and have found this to be the best app on my phone. I recommend Uber to all my friends. The service they provide is far and above all others.

Especially my ride today with Ernesto.  I thoroughly enjoyed his company during my ride.
title: 5 stars all the way

review: Me and my girlfriend had Steven as our driver and keep in mind this is one of my first Uber rides and Steven made it even better. Was nice and courteous and was a very smooth ride. He also gave great food recommendations for our trip. Along with several others about the rodeo and the future ACL festival. Steven is the goat(as the kids say). Great driver and cool dude.
title: Chill dude, great ride, and good recommendations

review: It was a pleasure to ride with Gabriela!  She was professional, kind and considerate.  As a passenger with health issues I am always a bit apprehensive about my rides, but Gabriela was amazing.  It was a pleasure talking with her which really calmed my concerns over getting through the airport on my own.  Once there she got me to the best place to enter and left me with a smile!❤️
title: Gabriela was terrific!!

review:
This was 1st ride with Uber and I absolutely was pleased 100% 
My driver was outstanding, his driving abilities and amazing safety precautions in proper spacing while driving was extremely refreshing 
I’ll definitely use this service again and specifically request my driver this evening 
Thank you for your wonderful service Godspeed 
Mrs Rose M Vincent
title: My 1st Experience with Uber

review: Lately I been more disappointed with Uber then ever. This last ride was unacceptable I waited for my Uber driver for 30 mins only to have my ride be canceled and then they had to look for a new driver which took another 15 mins and all this wait time cause us to miss our flight. I try to call Uber no customer service number, can’t report it since it wasn’t a complete ride the canceled don’t show on my history. Unfortunately
title: Waiting on Uber n then ride gets cancel
developerResponse: {'id': 34739876, 'body': "Hi, we're extremely sorry to hear about your concern regarding your recent experience. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve your concern, fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343HNsE. We shall get back to you at the earliest.", 'modified': '2023-02-08T05:20:03Z'}

review:
Customer support guy literally said that customer support is only for drivers. Apparently us customers don’t matter. I was stranded in the middle of no where in an extremely time sensitive event and I was trying for over an hour to make the app work. And support only says that I could not get help from them cause I’m a customer not a driver. Thankfully Lyft app worked and I wasn’t stuck.

And then I get an email telling me my issue was resolved. Which I suppose it is… no thanks to Uber.  I uninstalled and used a different app.
title: App error and poor support

review: He is very nice , gentle and helpful. As a woman he made me safe and comfortable so I don’t feel scared because I am using Uber at middle of night around 1:00am mornings. Because of my late flight and he quickly understand my situation . I was stuck. I am very thankful to him. I give him more then 5 star and diamonds . Again thank you Warner.
title: Warner

review: My driver Henry was very kind and professional. He keeps his car in immaculate condition and the interior smelled so nice. I was able to completely relax on the drive which was great after being in busy, loud airports all day. This was my 1st time using Uber in Houston and it was a wonderful experience. I highly recommend this driver!
title: Super experience 1st time Uber from IAH

review: My driver was excellent and very friendly. He was very timely. My only challenge was in ordering the Uber. I couldn’t place my order until I literally got to the lot it kept going back to screen. The gentleman next to me was having the same issue sounds like a system or problem.
title: Observation

review:
Have been having bad experiences with address and location for pickup 
Worst was just this early morning in Geneva, Switzerland when for any reason driver ended at a far location resulting in me missing the ride (hope you will reimburse me!), and a short time ago here in Miami International Airport driver went to a different level resulting in extended waiting time.
title: App and location

review: My family and I Have been very disappointed with Uber the last few months. We live in NYC and spend a lot of money on Uber each month. I feel like there are no nice cars anymore. We are a family of five and can never get a nice Uber XL sized car when traveling to and from the airport. We are spending top dollar for Uber XL and a mid size SUV arrives. We arrived to NEwark airport late last night and could not fit in our Uber XL. We ended up taking an Uber and a taxi home which was suboptimal at 1am. Uber needs to have a Large size Uber XL option when booking.
title: Uber XL
developerResponse: {'id': 34103714, 'body': "Hi, We're extremely sorry to hear about your concern regarding your recent experience. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve your concern, fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343HNsE. We shall get back to you at the earliest.", 'modified': '2023-01-05T07:26:39Z'}

review: This afternoons driver was wonderful. I felt like she was a little gift from The Angels.  . A 10 minute ride and a simple conversation. I haven't felt that comfortable  talking to another  female  like that in a very long time. A beautiful soul . You don't get to meet people like that anymore. I vote my driver Uber driver of the year!!!!! Btw, a terrific driver also. 😀
title: The most wonderful Uber ride ever.

review: I'm surprised, but Lyft has a way better system for reporting multiple business trips for expense reports. I can’t even take a screenshot of my rights because they don’t include the tip. I have to literally screenshot every single ride to get the full amount that I paid for each ride. Left allows you to export a list that is condensed and provides all expenses. Honestly, I’m probably gonna start using Lyft from now on.
title: Not great for expense reports

review: Never really used Uber much.  Only for rides home when I was out and had a few drinks. My car is in the shop and I started using Uber for my daily errands. So far it’s been much cheaper then a rental. Great app that makes using Uber painless and great drivers that make boring errands fun. Price is so reasonable too.
title: More Then Just a Night Out

review:
It’s nice after 5 years they are finally having transparency to drivers to show us where we are going, sadly 90 percent of the work is a waste of my time , not profitable trips, operating in a loss is not a good gig, but at least I can choose now, yet still .60 cents a mile is half of what I need to operate as the deduction from IRS is .53 cent a
, so I’m marking .08 cents a mile??  No thank you!!  Everything else in app is fluff, promos, Uber pro, and cash back save it we all already have credit card companies fools!
title: Price
developerResponse: {'id': 11143334, 'body': "Hi, the feedback from our riders is vitally important to us, and we always want their expectations to be met. Let us know more about it by dropping the details at t.uber.com/contact and we'll connect.", 'modified': '2019-10-09T08:56:20Z'}

review: I do not refer Uber drivers no no one they are very unprofessional some don’t come pick you up some get to you and cancel  some don’t come get you at all they just go straight there to get the money and when you order food the place you get the food from never put everything in the bag something always missing and when you contact Uber they give you the biggest runaround or they always over charging it just really ridiculous at this point.
title: I do not refer Uber to anyone not the food delivery or the driver service

review: Is good service, I hate driving so I am a regular, but the thing is that they take forever, they match you with a driver that is more then 20 minutes away from you, and if you cancel I am sure they will charge you. So your gonna be super late to whatever place you have to be. Another issue is that after waiting for 5 to 10 minutes the driver cancels and you have to wait more time then expected. But unfortunately they will not change
title: Is good but…

review:
Three times in Sacramento Uber has stood me up. On September 6, I requested a ride to the Sacramento train station the day before since Uber had already failed us twice before. On the morning of September 6, I started watching for a driver 30” before. Uber assured me that the car was on the way all that time. Then 5” before arriving Uber told me, sorry we have no drivers.  How awful to fail me again. 
I will never use Uber again. 
After these insults, on October 4, Uber charges me $9.99 for Pass Help. What’s this?  I demand a refund for this charge!!
title: Failure to give me a ride
developerResponse: {'id': 9068274, 'body': "Hi, we are sorry to hear about your unpleasant experience with cancellation charges. We will have a look into this for you. Please send us a note to t.uber.com/contact or via the in-app Help section and we'll connect.", 'modified': '2019-06-08T10:04:31Z'}

review:
I don’t know how that’s possible but Uber isn’t like it used to be when they first launched the app. Nowadays Drivers are so disrespectful, they pick up rides and cancel them at the last minute. As drivers they should also care about the rider’s time and patience. 
I’ve had so many drivers who made me arrived late to work. This is so ridiculous!!! Especially if you’re paying a lot of money to arrive on time at your location. 

ZERO giving it STARTS!
STRONGLY DOESNT RECOMMEND THE APP!!!
title: Can we talk about the fact that the majority of the drivers are freaking disrespectful?

review: I’m out of the country and was relying on this app and Uber Eats. They are refusing to accept my credit cards. Yet, they still send me AmEx Platinum offers. I can’t take advantage of the offers because no one in their executive office or support will assist on helping. Support states they don’t see an issue even though I’ve sent them screenshots. Their support is horrible. This has been a learning lesson for me not to rely on them when outside of the US. Due to this experience, I won’t use them ever in the US. Luckily, in the US there are more options.
title: Poor Customer Support

review: If I can’t use this ride hailing app to hail a ride, it’s not a very good ride hailing app. Three drivers cancelled on me tonight. One after driving ten minutes in the wrong direction, one immediately, and one never moved. After I was assigned to a fourth driver, I cancelled the trip and found a different way to get where I needed to go.
title: Three drivers canceled on me

review: This is the second time I am charged a tip after accidentally tapping the button while the phone was in my pocket and Uber has no way for you to change that once you’ve done it. This is ridiculous and it’s unnecessarily restrictive once you tap to tip. I couldn’t remove it and getting in touch with customer service is like jumping through hoops. Uber is stupid for this set up and I’m getting tired of not being able to remove an accidental tip when I didn’t want to give it to them in the first place.
title: Unwanted charges

review:
1-star rating as you cannot turn off annoying Uber notifications that try to get you to use the app again. I will use Uber if I need to. Stop pestering me with annoying notifications that I cannot turn off. 

Before Uber responds to this review telling me to double check my settings, all of the notifications in the app have been turned off. Uber still bypasses those to notify you that they’re still here. Clearly, they don’t care about user preference or selections.
title: Cannot block annoying notifications

review: Frequently get drivers cancelling because the app redirects through an alley, that I don't have access to. I have tried giving the address of the building across the street, but no, of course that doesn't work. So hopefully you live in a two dimensional house, with no back. Otherwise you're out of luck Update: still no help for my situation.  Went their a driver who cancelled because he couldn't figure out the insane decision to go through a private alley, so now I'm waiting for another driver 15 minutes away, and will be late!
title: Alley

review: Hi, the most recent app update is an absolute battery killer for the iPhone. Lots of background activity…I live Uber, but am considering deleting the app just to save battery life…any ideas? Are you guys aware of the issue? Literally starting killing my battery as soon as the update two days ago. Thanks!
title: New Version Kills Battery Life

review: They are trying to be consistent but they are failing as the representatives through the chat feels robotic not empathic at all and not providing a resolution! They debate rather than understanding your concern and trying to address it ! Drivers are sooo unprofessional ! The only reason why i have to use this app cause i only got used to it!
title: Bad Customer Service

review: Worst customer service. They have a faulty system to report issues and they dont accept to fix it. Keep asking for screenshot that somehow never reach them. Their response is horrific and never answer the question properly and never read the problem carefully. Pathetic!!!
title: Horrific customer service

review: So I’ve been using Uber for a few years now, actually before I got my car. However, I feel as though you are spending more money using a Uber because $22 dollars to take me literally 15 minutes away or when it’s like 8 or 10 pm at night, Uber charges are through the roof. I feel as though you guys charge a little too much for a simple quick ride.
title: I’ve been using This and It’s a bit much.

review: The app it’s not easy to use. In the set up I Selected a PayPal option. When I went to set up a ride it said I had no payment option selected. I’m trying to re-enter up selected a PayPal option. When I went to set up a ride it said I had no payment option selected.  A Second payment option was required.  After re-entry with the original information I finally managed to schedule a ride. However The price for the ride increased by six dollars! I do not trust Uber.
title: Bad setup

review: Uber has to be one of the shadiest companies I’ve ever dealt with. They have the lowest level of responsibility for what happens during rides and I believe they operate on “the customer is always wrong” sort of basis. Don’t expect any compensation or accommodation for bad rides or misdelivered food. They will 1. Make it very hard to reach anyone, and 2. won’t make up for any damage made or done during your experience. So glad to finally pull the plug and delete my Uber and Uber eats accounts. GOOD RIDDANCE. I hope this company finally collapses. Long overdue. Switching over to you know who!
title: SHADIEST COMPANY EVER!

review: I ordered a ride typed in my destination and obviously it shows my location on the app when I ordered my ride it showed the driver a different location than what I put in ended up having to cancel my ride and disputing my ride and getting my money back so there must be something wrong with the app because I was way across town and he ended up at my home address which is where I was going so I don’t know what’s going on with your app but it’s not picking up the right location and my settings rite
title: Worst ride share

review: I got an Uber gift card for my son. He just got his first job and needs a way home. Apparently you can't use your Uber Cash without a credit card tied to your account no matter how much you load into it. An 11 dollar ride won't go through no matter your balance. If you ask for help, they claim their Uber Cash policy states you can't use it for Uber rides, but even that is untrue because you can use it if a card is tied to the account. So an Uber gift card can't be used for Uber. This is a fraudulent practice and needs to be addressed.
title: Unclear policies

review: I’ve used uber in the past and never had problems, but now it won’t let me select a payment method. I’ve put more than one method of payment into the app but because it won’t allow me to select one as default, I can’t use them, and therefore can’t order a ride. Anyone know how to fix this? I’ve tried uninstalling and reinstalling, reloading, removing the payment methods and adding them again, etc. Nothing has helped.
title: Won’t allow me to choose payment method

review: This app is such a joke.  I have long commutes to and from work so I regularly schedule my rides ahead of time. This last week I’ve had 3 drivers all make me wait nearly 30 minutes while they finish other rides. They show up later and when they see my destination, they cancel after I get in their vehicle. Then when I try to request another ride, the prices double ! And then I’m stuck with cancellation fees. I had an eats pass and I’m supposed to receive a discount on my rides and they’re never applied !
title: Scams left and right
developerResponse: {'id': 12862081, 'body': "Hey, this is definitely not what we want to hear. Tell us more about the concern you are facing and we'll work on improving it.", 'modified': '2020-01-12T05:00:01Z'}

review: I use Lyft for almost every thing - then a friend said he wanted to get an Uber to the airport / I said ok and after just a 3 min wait we were on our way . I was impressed by the amount of cars in the area compared to Lyft . So I guess I have to rethink using just Lyft ! Good job Uber and your prices were equal to Lyft ! I will be using them again .
title: Uber vs Lyft

review: I love Uber, I use it all the time, I’m even a platinum customer and heading towards diamond but I don’t know what happened but the prices are all of a sudden ridiculously high. I usually get an Uber to and from school every weekend that would cost about $25-$30 and now it’s over $90 and never goes below $60 at night. It says that it’s busier than normal but I know that’s not true since there’s almost no traffic after 8. If they continue with these prices, I don’t see myself using the app very often.
title: Too Expensive Now

review: This app just stopped working for me. It used to be reliable like some people are saying but now I have no way to use this app. It used to be that I would put in an address and it just wouldn’t load. The screen would stay blank no matter how long I waited. I decided to delete and redos load the app. Wouldn’t let me sign in. I then updated the app later hoping this bug was fixed but it wasn’t. I still can’t sign in and I would bet that even if I could, I wouldn’t be able to order an Uber. Please fix this.
title: Doesn’t work

review: They are ridiculous with the prices. Most of these prices that drivers wanna ask for is not what it really costs. Like I get it we all need to make money but 15 dollars for a ride and it’s near by I’d say walking distance, is ridiculous. They tried charging me 70 to the airport when regular cab service only charges 45 like that’s ridiculous. Also they don’t give out rewards or discounts that often so this app I wouldn’t recommend it. It’s over priced and most of their drivers are disrespectful especially the paki and Bengali drivers. No offense. Get on this problem and fix it guys
title: Expensive

review:
No matter what email address I use...they respond with a ghost email that is not associated with me or my phone number, and if I try to use my phone number to verify and reset my password, they want me to verify a second time using the same ghost email...then the help option customer representative merged the accounts and resets my password, and I am now unable to do anything except email screenshots only to have another email saying that it was not sent, or that in order to help they need to verify my account with screenshots of my phone number or ect...

DONE
title: No Access to account

review: Ruben pays attention to detail and makes sure his clients are taken care of. Ruben went above, and beyond the scope of just being a driver and making our trip complete. We were in a off the beaten path pick up spot, and he was relentless to make it work for everyone involved! Amazing!!!!
title: Outstanding customer service!

review: I left my wallet in Edwards car and got ahold of him 10 minutes later when I realized.  Understandably I had to wait for him to finish his current run, but he went above and beyond to make sure he returned my wallet to me.  Excellent customer service.  I would choose him as my driver anytime I had the chance
title: Above and Beyond

review: Very disappointing customer service. My mom contacted uber because two drivers she had requested kept delaying their arrival and ultimately canceled on her. The person that picked up was not helpful. They were quite rude and just responded “we don’t take care of this” and hung up on her. That individual could have at least redirected her on who to contact about this issue. Because of this  she missed her appointment which was very important. Due to this, we will be taking our business elsewhere. We will not tolerate this.
title: Disappointing service!

review: This is what I call a user Hostile app. It was the most convoluted reservation I’ve ever had to make. One should be able to enter pick up spot and drop off spot and not jump through umpteen different hoops. This is the first time I’ve used Uber in years and wow the ride was wonderful the app was a bit of a mess please clean up the app so I can just make direct point-to-point reservations all on one page or just a few clicks.
title: Awkward

review: This driver is has excellent service fast and friendly 😃, my daughter has a service dog named Bolto, and this driver had no problems with her having to ride with him in the car 🚗 . Now that’s what I call taking care of the customers needs , thank you for doing such a great job 👏🏻 and Happy 4th of July!🤩😃
title: “ Dog friendly “

review: Routinely unable to find drivers, app crashes regularly while searching for drivers, the tipping system is broken, and because of high traffic on uberX, uber is constantly pushing customers to choose premium ride options. One bright spot is most I have had have been fantastic. I’ve occasionally had drivers upset when I book a ride for 4 people, even though the app designates all uberX rides as “up to 4”.
title: Uber has been consistently getting worse

review:
It is truly insane how little this company cares about its customers. Hidden recurring charges, inability to cancel them, the customer service line is unhelpful, rude, and will just hang up if they don’t know an answer.

I want to delete this app so bad, but they are still charging me for subscriptions I DID NOT authorize, and keep saying they can’t delete it from their end, even though it doesn’t exist on mine. All I know is I’m getting monthly “recurring fees” from Uber on bank account that I did not opt in for. Disgusting
title: Ridiculously bad customer service, thieves

review: First time using Uber, so grateful that it was Roberta that picked me up from the airport. Roberta is amazing, she was so kind and helpful. She did receive a tip for her services, as I personally handed  it to her. I will definitely again use Uber  for my transportation needs during my brief time in Bozeman, just as long as Roberta is doing the driving!  Thank you Roberta🙂
title: Uber

review: The whole app is a scam. Drivers give 50% of their income to Uber while using their car and doing all the work. If you order food through Uber eats you’ll get immigrants who don’t speak a single word of english. Idk how they got the job. It’s hard to communicate and when you get frustrated and fight with the delivery person, your food may not come as you expected(you get what I’m saying). They try their hardest not to refund your money. You’ll have to go through steps after steps till you eventually give up. It’s a scam app👎🏽
title: WORST SERVICE

review: I scheduled a request to be picked up from my local U-haul 3 minutes away from my house. I typed everything in correctly before I put in the request and drove to U-haul and checked my rental in. I waited inside the building until my Uber called me saying they were here. I walked out of the building and couldn’t find my ride. When I checked my app to see what was going on my ride was at my house where the pin is at labeled as the U-haul address. I’m not gonna use this app anymore because it can messed up a request this simple.
title: Buggy App

review: I reserved my ride days ahead. Michael was my driver. He arrived 10 minutes early which was comforting since I was catching a flight and Charlotte traffic is very heavy at rush hour. Michael was friendly, nice conversation and very efficient in the traffic. It was like having your favorite brother do the airport run! Rest easy if he’s your driver!
title: Charlotte Airport run with Michael

review: Our driver tonight was great! He was very  professional and made sure that we got all of our belongings. In checking the backseat he noticed that my Mother-In-Law dropped some money and he was honest and let us know. Quite impressed with his honesty! Drivers like him are valuable  assets to Uber! Thank you for a great experience!
title: Super Nice, Honest, and Friendly

review:
I am happy with it, but they deducted $5 from my wallet for no valid reason.   They wouldn’t let me schedule my ride until I agree to it. So I had no choice and they deducted $5 for no apparent reason and then I could schedule the ride.  I need someone from Uber to contact me about this.
Then I will update my review accordingly.
title: I am happy with it, but they deducted $5 from my wallet for no valid reason

review: Imagine my surprise when I went to book a ride after I got off a plane and the app told me I had to update it and when I went to update it I was told I needed to update iOS. First off, apple slows down older devices with new updates. So no. Second, I’m not updating my phone so I can use an app to get a ride when I am low on battery, in a strange city, alone. So I got a Lyft instead. Tell your software engineers to get their stuff together, they don’t need the latest and greatest features to make a ride request app.
title: Include support for older iOS

review: According to numerous drivers I’ve had pick me up, there’s an issue with the GPS app and when they contact Uber to help, the company doesn’t do anything about it. There have been numerous times I’ve had to sit there with them and wait for the app to load the directions and I’ve been close to late on my appointments multiple times. It’s really frustrating I wish they’d fix it.
title: Drivers’ apps don’t work

review: A wonderful person- best conversation I have had in a long time. Stayed while I was locked out of my house- assisted me and gave me the opportunity to tell him about my faith- and my walk with Christ. I am sooo glad he waited at the airport and was kind enough to ensure I was safe before leaving. I pray there are more out there like him.
title: Best Experience

review: I’m new to using Uber so need less to say this trip did not come without complications on my behalf, Stephane was AMAZING. She got me where I needed to go and was very patient. We have great conversation and when i left my computer in her car she turned right back around and dropped it off. Again she’s been a life saver
title: Life saver

review: In Las Vegas plazzo, it’s such a big place and for tourist how do we know there is a fixed rideshare pick up point?  Uber doesn’t tell this or guide you. If you book a ride in other positions even though at the bus stop station or thw parking entrance,  Uber drivers doesn’t go to your exact position to pick you they just simply think you are at the plazzo rideshare pick up point. Even on the map it doesn’t look like so.  They don’t care.  Then you have to cancel the rides again and again and pay for the cancellation fee.  Stupid app!!!!
title: Stupid app!!

review: Had a great experience with Angel. He was early to arrive for my ride to Orlando airport.   He was friendly - offered a faster option when we hit extreme traffic so I could get to airport on time.  Safe driver as well.  I don't take Uber often to go to the airport but this was a great option and solution for me.  Thank you.
title: Great Uber driver - airport

review: Robert was an excellent driver and great person to talk to. He collected us at our condo, that I worried about for two days, that was tucked way down between buildings and was there before we could get down the steps. We were very, very satisfied with our trip to the airport and will use Robert the next time we are in Pensacola.
title: Trip to Airport

review: I have an allergy to vitamin K, I ordered food and asked for some  ingredients to be removed by clicking the remove it button, they added it anyways and I went and told Uber, bc I had to throw out my food, they said they couldn’t do a refund, this is clearly a injustice with people who are allergic to some foods and they do not care. Bc Ik if I was a Starbucks karen, and they messed my coffee they would’ve refunded me, but they are wrong and I deleted the app, Ik it will do nothing but it is still wrong for them not to care about allergies at all. allergies matter to, not just coffee uber.
title: “Uber eats”

review: I like to use Uber but I always have problems with the Carriers either stealing from me without even completing my ride, being rude,  and not bringing me the items that I pay for.🤦🏽‍♀️ I think every carrier should be responsible and removed off the app for stealing and wasting people’s time. Its not fair that we can’t get our stuff back because we can’t contact the carrier when they leave. So my $300 Versace bag is gone forever and my grandma got that for me as a gift💔. You guys need to do better and make sure your not letting just anybody drive.
title: FEEDBACK!

review: I have been an Uber customer for years now for various reasons, car in the shop, needing to take family to doctors appointments etc. Uber has been an incredibly convenient and flexible option for the occasional transportation need. They are one instance where technology actually works!
title: A Great Alternative

review:
I’m completely disappointed in the service. There is nothing to pay for. 

The service has dropped its standards of customer care, and I would recommend against using it for numerous reasons: 

1. Card fraud and poor UX. I have been been charged a €90 cleaning fee for the damages estimated locally as €30. The app didn’t provide any button to accept the fee before charging my card. Thus I didn’t authorise the card charges. 

2. Criminal mindset of the company. Because Uber doesn’t have customer service, I hadn’t received any explanation as to who approved this price, why my card was charged without my consent, and what they’re going to do about it. My claims through HELP had been closed four times without any solution offered from the company. 

If this kind of attitude towards customers continues, Uber should be banned from Europe.
title: Card frauds by Uber

review: Victor was wonderful!  I live in a rural area and not entirely comfortable with this type of transportation. Victor completely set my mind at ease and it was a very enjoyable trip to the airport. I was also very impressed with his attention to safety. There was still lots of black ice on the Highway and he drove under the speed limit and was very cautious. Well Done!
title: Victor w Uber Black

review: Apply Pay option is almost never available in Payment options. And not sure if it was a coincidence that after killing Uber app 5 times in two minutes and when Apple Pay option did become available, the fare increased for the same destination. For reference, all other apps work just fine with Apple Wallet on my phone.
title: Apple Pay not working on the app

review: Twice tonight Uber went to Terminal 4.  Every time I talked to a driver they said they were there.  After walking up and down the area and stating that they were not there, they said they would be right over to terminal 3.  Each time they cancelled. The next time the third car said 5 minutes out.  Then 15 and then 25 minutes out. Do, I cancelled.  Over an hour later I finally got a driver. A great driver. $120 fare.   Extremely disappointed after 7 hours in a jet.
title: Wrong Terminal

review: 1- Los viajes con esta app son demasiado costosos,  2- los conductores se van antes del tiempo de espera , llame al conductor para avisar que me esperará que estaba esperando el asensor para bajar y se fue ; LA APP ME COBRO 6 dólares igual. 3 - me hicieron un cobro de un viaje que no he hecho. Ahora debo meter un reclamo al banco . 1- The trips with this application are too expensive, 2- the drivers leave before the waiting time, call the driver to let him know that he will wait for me, that I was waiting for the elevator to go down and he did not wait and left; THEY CHARGED ME $6 FOR THAT! 3 - now a charge to my account for a trip that I did not take. Now I have to file a claim with the bank. this app is not trustworthy!
title: NO LES RECOMIENDO ESTA APP A NADIE

review: I have a job where I may get out of work at odd hours in urban and suburban areas. I also have an old car that is not reliable lately. But with Uber I have not found myself with out a ride home to my family or my Job. For this service I am indebted and greatly appreciative.
title: Late Shift, No problem

review: Mischa did a great job picking me up while my car was being serviced. She was professional, punctual and I felt safe with her the entire time. I encourage everyone to use Uber! We should be thankful this exists otherwise we’d have to sit in a car service station for hours on end. Thank you, Mischa and Uber!
title: Satisfied customer

review: Went out shopping & ended up locking my keys in my car. Even tho it was very annoying, I only had to pay $12 & change to go back home & get my spare key. That’s nothing compared to what I would’ve paid a locksmith or triple A to unlock my car. So thanks Uber & thank you to that driver.
title: Very convenient

review: Haven’t used Uber in a while, was very disappointed at the rate I was charged today. Yes weather was not great, and it was a peak time, but rate was too high. Shame on me for not making a taxi reservation the night before, but I said to myself I’d rather Uber. Will be very cautious before getting into an Uber again, for a simple trip to the airport. And it seems like the drivers get a commensurately small portion of the fee, which makes it hard to show income. The driver and the ride were both excellent.
title: Rates too high, and too small of the fee goes to driver

review: Took two trips tonight. $8 and $10, all fees included. Tipped $3 and $5. The sent new receipts with higher base fares, even though I already paid the base fares and fees. All told my $8 ride +$3 tip was charged $15 and my $10 ride + $5 tip was charged $20. Seems fraudulent to increase a fare charge I already paid for, and I still haven’t figured out how I agreed to pay $26 total but Uber charged me $35. Total scam. Not sure this is even legal, frankly. Don’t think you are allowed to increase the cost of services after the fact/arbitrarily like that.
title: They increase your fare if you tip

review: Mohammed was amazingly helpful with assisting me in navigating through the city. He provided great insight, was super friendly, and knowledgeable about New York in general. Most importantly, Mohamed helped me to feel safe in what can sometimes feel like an intimidating city. I truly appreciate the kindness that he showed during my commute from LGA to Westchester County. Thanks Mohamed!
title: Trustworthy

review: Miguel was very kind & helpful as he was driving a large car that would be a bit hard for me to get in.  He was very accommodating in assisting with my request that he pull up nearer the curb.  Once that was done, I had the leverage to get into the car.  Thank you very much Miguel & a very Happy New Year to you!
title: 5 Star Service

review: Nice conversation, funny guy. I needed a last minute Uber to work due to car troubles. Usually takes me 22 mins to get to work so I was a little worried I was going to be late (due to me having to order last minute) and the driver got me there on time perfectly in 18 mins! I didn’t even mention I was in a rush. Awesome ride. Great trip!
title: Awesome trip

review:
