John the driver is very polite and nice and talkative through the trip. He explained to us that we only ordered pickup for one but we have 4 for the ride. He’s ok to take us all. Thanks very much John!
I think Uber was a bit confused on the app that I did not know I had to specify the number of riders since I saw it indicated UberX with 4 so I thought that’s for 4 riders.
title: Ride to SFO

review:
I ordered an UberX this morning. When driver arrived, named Yong, he refused to take our party of four. Apparently he only take 3 persons at the rear seat but leave the front passenger seat empty. He then left. We texted him to cancel the order so that we can place a new order, but he texted back he cannot cancel and asked us to cancel. In the end we have to cancel as we need to order another ride so we  cancelled and got charged $5.

His behavior was rude and have us still got charged was dishonest.  I demand our cancellation fee back.

Melwin Yen
title: Driver of uberX refused to board our party of 4.

review:
MyFirst Uber ride. My driver Lee was a really solid human. Felt like the story he shared was God’s intervention to remind me HE is present in the roughest of times. Lee took me home from the ER quickly, safely and reasonably priced, but his humanity was what I appreciated most of all. Can I give him 10 stars? Can you please thank/recognize him professionally somehow?
Thanks again, feeling grateful and blessed!
title: Angel man?

review:
Considering it was a pickup at 3:30am, our driver was friendly, attentive, professional and helpful. He was early and got us to the airport in a timely fashion. His car was clean and comfortable! He did a great job.

Being able to reserve our ride in the future takes the anxiety away. Love that feature of this app.
title: Our experience

review: My Uber app shows the driver is 1 minute away and doesn’t change.  It’s been doing that the last year or so,  luckily we caught on a while back and we go check if they have arrived when we see the arriving I  1 minute.  I was inside the Uber vehicle and showed the driver because I don’t know how long they waited.  Please fix it!
title: Arriving in 1 minute never changes

review:
Network was not working. It would accept the ride but it was impossible to communicate with driver. I sent teresa numerous texts and called her with no answer but she never went to the right place. We both lost at least 15 minutes. After numerous tries to cancel that did not work, teresa i believe gave up. The system then called another driver named fatima. I tried canceling her. She did call finally but it was too late and stated we were  rude to cancel. We took a taxi at twice the cost and lost 30 minutes.
Terrible day!
title: Bad network

review: I will never use umber again and will continue to tell all I know to use Lyft. After leaving my phone in the Uber and trying to get it back after a month I have given up. I contact Uber many times and got the same message to send them details of the ride, which I did. They even found the driver and the driver admitted to having the phone but that was the end of the line. No communication to get it back from the driver or Uber. Very unprofessional of a company to allow its employees to steal from its customers.
title: No help at all

review: I was overcharged on a tip.   I kept disputing and the company couldn’t seem to understand the problem until three go arounds with different agents.  They eventually admitted there is a glitch in the system.  Meanwhile I had disputed the charge with my credit card after weeks had passed with no revolution.  Then Uber recollected the fee concurrent with another ride I took and didn’t inform me of the reason, so I disputed that thinking the same glitch has returned.  I’ll look to reduce my use of Uber whenever possible.
title: Terrible customer service

review: The help feature is broken and they charge you for a service that you never got with no way to request a refund. Stay away from this app. There are other services that are more trustworthy than Uber.
title: Don’t waste your money! There is absolutely no customer service.

review: I preordered an Uber black to take me away from my wedding and to our hotel. I had ordered it weeks in advance. All of a sudden the day of when it’s time to leave the app says no Ubers available, we wait a few minutes and then the app cancels the whole thing on us. It sucked. Why on earth would you even have a feature to pre schedule a ride if it does absolutely nothing and doesn’t actually set a driver aside or make sure one comes. Very disappointed.
title: Terrible what’s the point of preordering if they can just cancel on you

review:
Title says all- user is constantly pushed into the scheduled airport pickup page, requesting flight info, etc, as soon as the terminal transportation hub is selected. If the system cannot f’ing my flight (which happens half of the time), one is dead in the water stuck in the “schedule an airport pickup” loop. 

PLEASE add a cancel / skip option to this pop up. I simply want to be able to say where I am and book a ride without battling the app.
title: Stop Forcing Airport Pickup!!!

review: This is such a great app, I cannot for the life of me figure out why people depend on friends for a lift when they have this convience at hand anytime day or night weekend sporting event concert or just a friendly get together at your favorite restaurant tired of driving to work?No problem Uber is there such a relief and with perks as well!
title: No problemo Amigo!!

review: Consistently drivers cancel on trips they agreed to. I usually have to search for 2 to 4 drivers before I finally get one that actually tries to pick me up. There needs to be a more severe punishment for drivers that cancel. It makes the service close to unusable. Not knowing whether I’ll have to wait 10 to 20 minutes for a ride makes it a huge gamble when I’m in a rush.
title: Drivers cancel every third trip.

review: Uber used to allow riders more flexibility. Now drivers take way over their estimated time to arrive and have all kinds of issues (poor direction, phone charger issues, reckless driving) but Uber just tells you to call the driver if they are running really late or you can report them after with no other recourse. Drivers seem increasingly unhappy with Uber as well. Seems like Uber has decided to just leave drivers and riders on their own to work things out as they squeeze both for more money.
title: Driver’s are pretty confused

review: I hate to be a Karen but this is absolutely ridiculous. I always pre schedule or request an Uber an hour before work and I’m usually always late because The wait is usually over 20mins and then the get cancelled and I have to wait another 20mins or drivers drive the farther away from the rout making it a longer wait. I would honestly rather pay 80 at Lyft than 19 here with Uber because at least I’m guaranteed my ride on time and I don’t have to risk getting written up at work or even fired because of tardiness.
title: I’m deleting this app

review: App has so much issues reconnecting even with full reception like that is so bad and I had to restart my phone just so the app can fix itself since obviously closing it doesn’t and needs major work. How am I suppose to pick someone up if the app had issues connecting???? The fast route option is so dumb too that it covers the bottom of the screen and takes 30 seconds to disappear for me to get my route which it didn’t even help with a faster route just wasted time.
title: App can’t connect and makes me waste time

review: I’ve been riding Uber consistently for over a year as it’s my only form of transportation. Today my backpack was, and still is stolen. Uber wasn’t helpful whatsoever. The police did more then Uber. They won’t even give me my money back for the ride considering over $200 was stolen AND my second stop was cancelled AND I was left at my first stop. Seriously horrible service and all of those workers need to choose a new profession asap cause they were more helpful not talking at all.
title: Can’t believe Uber…

review: Over all the apps good but could use some improvement with the payment…. Due to gas prices being higher than ever it’s not worth making a delivery for 12 miles for only $8 (just an idea) and then also the drive back to your town to take more orders…. It would be better if the payments were a lil bit higher for those who have higher ratings and overall great service….
title: Uber deliveries

review: Good luck trying to update your name or any of your information that has to be updated via a support agent. I am currently on my third attempt to get it taken care of and they keep trying to start a different thread to update my Driver account even though I made the request with my Rider account as I never even used the Driver account. So frustrating! You would think a company this large would be able to handle such a simple request.
title: Account Support

review:
After an extremely frustrating too early of a get to airport time in the morning only to be delayed for 3 hours and put on a different aircraft to get home….l had a great experience with a pick up at TPA by Grant. 
Personable, professional, pleasant, on time, clean vehicle and got me home quickly and safely. Nice end to a crazy day. Thank You!
title: Superlative

review: My first experience to Uber was requesting a ride. Waiting for said ride, to not have driver show up, pick up someone else and drop them at my location. Contact driver and ask, what, who, why. Then contact support that I got charged $40 for a ride I never was allowed to take. For them to say, sorry he dropped someone off at that location. Even if it wasn’t you you have to pay. This seems like a perfect example that a driver can run Lyft and Uber at the same time and screw someone else over. Oh support is useless
title: Disappointed

review: I used to use Uber quite often prior to the pandemic, and as with everything else, then pandemic has changed the world. It has also changed Uber, for the worst. There are nearly zero cars available at any time through the entire (large) city, with massive price gouging for the few cars that are available. What was once a $10 ride (I even checked my receipt history) is upwards of $30-50. Instead of catching a ride to work, I walked the hour walk. I think that’ll be my choice from now now, too.
title: Functionally dead

review: I usually would tip. My account was low and Uber automatically tipped their driver 5$ out of MY account  which put me in the negative. Sneaking money like it’s cool without permission. I tried contacting them and am being ignored. I’m letting everyone know about this off principal. If it wasn’t for that they would’ve got a 5 star
title: Stealing money

review: Uber announced that they would be offering free rides to vaccination sites starting today, and I was hoping I would be able to take advantage of this for my vaccine appointment today. However, it seems like they’re not actually doing it yet. Don’t say you’ll do something and then renege on it.
title: False Advertising

review: Its been 2 weeks since i have reached out to them even though there is uber cash in my account and different payment options for requesting a ride the app dies not let me request a ride due to payment options i have to sign out and sign back in for it to work with the county opening back up and returning to some kind of normal there are many other options and ride share companies to work with I can only imagine if you are relying on them to get to a Dr appointment or during an emergency
title: Poor customer service
userName: late for work on a stormy day

review: I have a love hate relationship with this app they charge us a fee when we have to cancel even tho the Uber is no where near, If we are getting charged Uber drivers better be getting charged as well because there has been multiple times when an Uber driver is five minutes away from me or less and they cancel and then I would have to wait up to 20 minutes
title: Annoying

review: Uber recently has started allowing drivers to have the option of charging the rider up to 5 times the amount for a single trip. Now it costs more money to get an uber than a freaking plane ticket! Definitely only riding lyft and might as well a taxi at this point. There will be over 5 drivers within a one mile radius but since they want to overcharge for rides up to five times, they’re simply sitting in their cars waiting to take advantage of people going to school, work, etc. I’m over ur ish uber🤦🏽‍♀️🤷🏽‍♀️🤷🏽‍♀️
title: New Uber Charges and Wait Times

review: Try to click help and find a relevant criteria? Impossible to actually reach them by phone or email. Try to tell them that a pre scheduled ride was not found by the system to make you late and miss your flight and you’ll realize that you’ll be “helped” in 3 days by someone that has pre automated responses and will credit you 3$ for missing your flight. After trying to discuss and getting the same pre written responses without even a difference in an insulting 3$ compensation, leads you to come and write a review. Very disappointed in uber help.
title: Terrible customer service

review: I used Uber eats through the regular Uber app and I’ll never use the app again. Uber never brought my food and also never connected me with my driver. After a certain amount of time the tracking map shut off completely and I was no longer able to track my order. I haven’t been able to get in contact with anyone regarding this. I also had a driver leave me because they couldn’t find the apartment I was at, even with the apartment number given to them. I was also charged a $5 fee when I had to cancel it. I no longer plan to use Uber.
title: Uber Eats

review: They need to do better ! I wait forever just for them to find a Uber nearby which is never close by . Then it’s such an inconvenience when you have to be somewhere by a certain time & order it early & the person cancels last minute , you have to wait to for them to find another one & the person is always far out . Not to mention when the drivers cancel they still take your money !!! That’s not fair .
title: Inconvenience lately

review: Was preferential to Uber for a while, but the rewards program is kind of lacking and has a lot of issues—points used for rewards are not refundable even if there is an app issue preventing use of a reward; if you use Uber enough to accumulate thousands of points this is especially souring. Furthermore, my experience with customer service is that it’s essentially different people pasting the same boilerplate language into an otherwise vague non-response.  I’ve deleted the app and am not sure at this point if I’ll download it or use it again in the future.
title: Deleted Uber

review:
Uber staff was rude when trying to get support for their system not processing my card. 

They told me to figure the issue out on my own. I’m dumbfounded by the lack of customer service oriented company. I will never use them again. I highly recommend using anyone else other than Uber. 

If I could rate below 1 star I would I’ve been a first responder 10 years and never had such a poor and frustrating experience with any company simply trying to get food after a long shift. They have a lot of work to do if they want their business to stay around.
title: Do not use!

review:
Today I got picked up from Dfw airport by Saiful my Uber driver . The ride was smooth and safe but the conversation was spectacular , if I knew going Uber would have led me to such a good guy I would have used it sooner and more often . Definitely the best driver and conversation I have had so far . Thank you for getting me home safely and enjoyably .

Rodrigo . G
title: Saiful

review: I want to give Jose gratitude for going above and beyond to accommodate me and my family under the circumstances of having multiple bags wit us. After a long day of fun at Disneyland super exhausted and tired he absolutely made worth my night. Thank you so much! Me and family will never forget this experience.
title: Recent Uber Driver Jose

review: I was very concerned because it was my 15-year-old daughter, and I had never used Uber. Our driver was a total gentleman and could not have been more gracious.  I will use the service again, and I hope that my experience with this driver will be similar to my future experiences with Uber.
title: First time with Uber

review:
Thank you for your service that i availed today. However, how i badly need a user-friendly app to contact you, to cancel a trip, to switch from a regular ride to a taxi or whatever, call the taxi driver too if i prefer a call instead of messaging in the app, & a customer call center thats easy to google or access instead of needing to open the app in times of urgency . 
Thank you.
title: Thank you

review:
If I would have drove to the Atlanta airport and tried to find a parking place, I would have NEVER have made my flight on time. I cannot brag about Ms Dedra enough!!!!!!!!!
Polite, courteous driver. She knows her way around the city and keeps her customer updated about arrival time etc.  She’s a “people person” and in the right profession 💜
title: Ride to Atlanta Airport

review: Too often in life we take time to write a bad review. Some folks skip an opportunity to tell a good or great story about a service provided. I am not skipping it today. Dino is a great driver providing excellent customer service. He is knowledgeable of the area, traffic patterns and the airport. He is personable and engaging. I highly recommend Dino.
title: Dino’s Service

review: Lynda is an amazing person and excellent driver!!  I traveled from the West Palm Beach Airport to South Beach Miami. I love Lynda’s up beat personality!!  We talked and then She sensed I was tired and she was right I was extremely tired!!  She told me to rest, turned on soothing music and I was sleep for at least 35 minutes of the trip.  I highly recommend Lynda she is awesome!!  Thank you Lynda!!
title: Lynda The Fabulous Driver!!

review: The Uber drivers really do care about safety and people with disabilities like myself who can’t afford to drive a car and what’s really nice about it is that they’ve passed the background check to make sure that don’t harm any riders and they’re cheap depending on where you’re going!!! Thanks Uber for keeping me safe:)
title: Amazing app

review: Rhonda picked me up on a very rainy morning to go to the Atlanta airport.  I haven’t used Uber or been to the Atlanta airport in years and was anxious. Rhonda made the trip a super pleasurable experience.  She was delightful to chat with (my idea to chat!).  She got me to the airport safe and sound without even realizing the insane rush hour in the rain Atlanta traffic.  Great job Rhonda!!!😊
title: Very conscientious driver

review: Ride was fine but charged more than Airport destination quoted. I had a later pickup time scheduled and hit the button and it said 7 minutes! Then when I got in car it had Walmart destination which is several miles further. I was originally quoted $28. I would like a credit please
title: Ms stanton

review:
My driver was so flawless and overly beautiful because as a lady am I and I am such a lady…she handed me a flower! What woman doesn’t like flowers for no reason. Feeling special gives life more purpose and the drive to make things move right along.
Haley is MYGo2 driver for life! 
My Uber driver is soooo better than yours! Hahahahaaaa! Smooches bisheees!
title: Quick/easy ride with a flower on the side!

review:
I kept checking the rate to the airport because if I had preplanned it, I would’ve been penalized by over $20.  When I decided to order it when it was under a 10 minute wait, the rate almost doubled!
From $64 to $115.  I had gotten the Uber app a few days prior and was offered a 30% discount, and there was no option to take advantage of that when I ordered.  
My driver was EXCELLENT, but my experience with Uber itself left me feeling like I had been ripped off royally.
title: Uber Experience

review:
I live in Texas and I know the maps are all messed up. How do I send a location error? Uber and Uber eats has the wrong location for my most used address. Most drivers speak Spanish so it’s hard to let them know they are at the wrong spot. Not only that but an entire block away. The target is right behind my actual location. I have to cancel rides or go hunt for my food. 

Help?
title: Location issue

review:
Eric, is a very professional, on time and very kind and thoughtful driver and is very respectful gentleman that makes you feel like you are safe and taken care of! Thanks again Eric! You are the type of person that will not only keep Uber in business but thriving and very prosperous! Blessings to you and your family!
Sandy C
title: Review for Eric Uber driver

review: This was my first ride with Uber and I had the best driver ever! We talked the all the way to my destination and he made me feel as if we were best friends. The driver has a clean vehicle, great driving skills, and even dropped me off close to my building  to accommodate for the rain. I will be using this service from now on!
title: Driver review

review: The Uber app kept saying that my card was invalid after using 3 different cards and my PayPal account. Looked up the error online and saw multiple complaints saying that the system will randomly flag you and it’ll take between 1 day to 2 months to get it solved with support. This is very unhelpful since my family needed a ride to the airport in 3 hours. I logged into my previously created Lyft account and scheduled a ride within 2 minutes of redownloading the app. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND USING SINCE YOU’RE AT RISK OF BEING STRANDED AWAY FROM HOME.
title: Uber backend account systems are garbage

review: I’ve never had a bad driver yet or professionally or even drive knowledge if that’s such a phrase.  Just simple things like noticing. I am walking out with a couple of bags and instead of rolling the window down and screaming across the passenger seat. If I need to use their truck, they just popped the truck for me. Very nice.
title: Your drivers are great

review: I had 2 occurrences till now in India, where i booked Uber , trip was confirmed and then 5-10 mins later the trip was cancelled. This leads to delays for customer in tight situations and adds to drop in customer satisfaction. Ideally if the trip is getting cancelled after 10 mins , either there has to be some penalty for the driver OR some reward for the customer.
title: Trip getting cancelled

review: While we were preparing to enter our Uber vechicle this morning, a man smashed its rear window with a valet waiting post; the driver then pursued the one responsible.  Needless to say, we called another Driver ; however , we were charged for the trip we did not take as well as a cancellation fee.  It was not a good situation.
title: Broken rear window and cancellation charge

review:
I booked short ride from home to LAX for an international flight a little more than 2 weeks ago and received booking confirmation. Then I checked app on day I was scheduled to fly and saw they cancelled without notice. The only way to contact this company was through Twitter. Check out their app and see if you can find contact info. They finally responded to Twitter message that they couldn’t find a driver in the area. I live in Orange CA. How can this be?

I for one will not be doing business with Uber ever again.
title: Don’t use their pick up services

review: I’ve noticed over the past couple years Uber becoming increasingly unreliable. Maybe the goal is that if the service becomes unreliable enough we will all buy the subscription service.  Paying $24 to wait for 20 min to be connected with a driver and then watch as the driver didn’t move for over 5 min (probably hoping to scam me out of a cancellation fee) is truly not worth the cost of entry. Uber is great for getting home safe after a party but commuting? Not anymore.
title: When did Uber become less reliable than a bus

review:
I often take Uber to the airport in Appleton.
The rides are always excellent. I am especially impressed with my driver today.
Roy is an excellent driver. He is a wonderful person. I so enjoyed talking with him today.
I hope that he will drive for me soon. Well done, Uber, you are fortunate to have this very decent man driving for us.
title: Uber scores!

review: My driver, Winston, arrived before time and was out the car ready to take my luggage when I came out my house.  I felt safe, his driving was great and he was very pleasant to chat with. Enjoyed my experience with Uber after not having to use the service for the last couple years.
title: Orlando Trip

review: I waited 2 minutes and he was in front of my house, it was my first time using Uber and he was so friendly and polite, we had a great conversation through the whole ride. It was comfortable and quick ! Thankyou so much for my first experience with you ! I really appreciate it! Gustavo gets 5 stars from me
title: Gustavo

review: Clyde it was very kind and resourceful and most of all prompt. He picked me up in less than five minutes and got me home and just another five minutes 3 miles away. If I see Clyde again as a choice, I will certainly pick him as a driver.  Clydes Hyundai was also very clean and in great condition.
title: Clyde’s ride from Bobby’s Auto Repair to home

review: Anthony was great. His car was spacious and clean and had complimentary mints. A sign on the back of the seat prompted you to let him know if you want to change the temperature, listen to music, etc. He was quiet at first but when I showed interest in chatting, we had a nice conversation. The ride couldn’t have been more pleasant.
title: Uber- Anthony

review: The problem this time was that because Uber doesn’t ask like how many bags. I picked the XL that should have been the largest, judging only by the price and we barely fit. The driver was awesome and he made it work. We were 3 adults, 3 bags total plus two carry ons each.
title: Love the service, could be better

review: My driver was Ian. He made me feel safe comfortable and welcomed on my trip. I’ve been in a lot of UBERS and the trip with him was the very best. It was late at night and he made me feel safe and secure the entire ride.  I hope I get more drivers like him in the future. Ian was phenomenal. He was amazing. He was above and beyond what I expected an Uber driver to be.
title: Ian was amazing

review:
I’ve been using Uber for many years now, and it seems like the arrival times are way off.  I can typically expect to arrive around 10-20 minutes a later than Uber’s estimate, depending on the length of the trip.

It seems like an easy fix.  Super frustrating.
title: Arrival Times Way Off

review: Uber used to be good but in the last 6 months wait times to pick me up are outrageous waiting 10 to 15 minutes to get a driver to accept my ride then having to wait even longer because they are more then 3 miles away from me it’s ridiculous I use to use it because it was convenient to me now I have to order an Uber 45 min before I go into work even though my work isn't even a mile away from my house!! I have better luck of walking there and getting there faster then Uber picking me up
title: Uber

review:
We arrived at West Palm Beach Airport and our Budget rental wasn’t available. A long line of disgruntled renters were in a long line.  I requested an Uber from my app and in 5 minutes I was on my way to Vero Beach.  I used to rent a car to get to my house. Never again I am going Uber from now on.  

My driver was a real gentleman and excellent driver.
title: Excellent service

review: On time! App is user friendly and allows communication between driver and rider. Very handy because the gps near home is often misleading. I can see real time when driver is coming. I use both Lyft and Uber. Lyft was so busy and drivers declined request 2 times. So I went on Uber and got a driver right away. Very grateful.
title: Great ride!!

review: Our yellow cab was 30 minutes late so we decided to try Uber and we were picked up in 2 minutes. Our driver was courteous and friendly. Justin conversed with my wife and I the entire ride. He drove professionally and safely. Highly recommend Uber and Justin as our first experience was amazing.
title: First Uber experience

review: Oleg was very prompt, introduced himself and took care of our luggage. The car was VERY CLEAN and Oleg was nice to talk with. After a day in airports he was just what we needed to get us to the hotel quickly. He also drove around until we found the entrance to the hotel. Late at night I really appreciated that. Thanks Oleg, you were perfect!
title: Best of the best!

review: Uber has become a rubbish app.  They always force you to take trips with drivers who are 15-28min away (despite the fact that I am going to a place no more than 10min by car from my location) even when there are many more drivers nearby.  No matter how many times I cancel the trip, the request will always be sent to the same driver half an hour away from my location.  I definitely plan to not use it anymore and recommend my acquaintances not to use it either.
title: Terrible service

review: Had a great ride this morning from Geoffrey. He was early and waited for me, efficient and safe as a driver, and provided excellent customer service, friendly, informative and engaged in a good conversation while also keeping his eyes on the road. I would definitely request him as a driver again.
title: Great service from Geoffrey

review: I pre ordered a Uber at 8am to arrive at 10:15 as a pickup time. The Uber did not arrive until 10:23am and I had to be somewhere for 10:30. Hood thing my trip was short and I made it there exactly at 10:30am. The app should tell you when scheduling that this is an approximate pick-up time not actual time.
title: Late Uber

review: The main problems I have with Uber is almost every order I make there’s food missing and nothing I can do about it.  Especially when I’m spending the amount of money I do and have.  Additionally, there’s nothing I can do to report my issues and contact Uber!!!  That’s the sad thing about this service/platform.  People should have some recourse if things go wrong.  Thank you
title: Lack of consistency with Uber

review: I was not in a good mood when I got in the car.  However, my mood improved when I noticed how considerate Sandra was. She cracked a small joke, then kept quiet. Initially some light music was playing, but she turned it off. After an emotional night, it was nice to just have a nice quiet ride. She drove with care. Thank you Sandra.
title: Considerate & Kind

review:
Jamar was a pleasure to meet, and was very professional and prompt—the service was fabulous, and so was the Infiniti! Looking forward to working with Jamar in the very near future! 

Awesome client service for me and my daughter who went shopping after a very long week.  I am all about premier client service with a smile.  Thank you!
title: Very Professional!

review: I was totally blessed to have such an amazing Uber driver.  He was safe and courteous and helpful with my luggage.  I was so happy to hear about where he came from and what he has accomplished and what he aspires to do in the United States.  Love meeting nice and friendly people from all over the world and hearing there amazing perspectives 🙌 good luck on your future Alen!
title: Alen was the best

review: Roderick was fantastic. One of the best Uber drivers ever. He was courteous, professional and respectful. He is also a safe driver and recommend him without reservation. We were amazed to find this is fourth day as an Uber driver. We thought he had been doing this for years. It is because of drivers like him that Uber is successful.
title: Chattanooga to Nashville Airport with Roderick

review:
Uber is such a revolutionary way of individual transportation. I like the fact that there is such a safety factor built in for those who do not know their way around.
You only have to find your correct destination and the app does the rest. You can track your progress to the destination. 
I used Uber to every place I needed to go.
10 stars.
title: My Uber Trips in Accra, Ghana, West Africa

review:
If you need to go anywhere call Joe.  He was so kind and helpful today. His SUV is beautiful and extremely clean!
I am unable to drive right now due to a knee injury
I needed to go to Publix the bank and back home today and it was so nice to have a driver who I could understand ! I would recommend Joe and I give him 10 ⭐️!  Thank you Joe !
title: Best Driver Ever

review: I have had an issue where a driver has made the app charge me more 5 time the actual price of the ride. I have been trying to reach out to u we customer service and it been 3 week and no response from any representative. This is sooooo heart break and I wish I never used this app, smh
title: Unresponsive from Uber

review: Well the app is great nowadays. The cost is the problem. Comparative to other modes of transportation, it rarely makes sense to Uber anymore. Taxis are cheaper and quicker. Rental cars depending upon where I’m traveling can be a third of what my Uber costs would have been. With all of the insane city and airport costs layered into Uber charges, in some cities (eg, Chicago, Dallas), you need to have your head examined for using Uber. It’s too bad. I guess the bad juju of gaming the system caught up.
title: Cost is the current issue, app is great

review: This app is the worst. My husband and I where at Disneyland the other day. We spent 14 hours at the park. It was midnight, he’s diabetic and his blood sugar was tanking. I have a heart condition that was making walking really hard. We needed a ride back to our hotel so decided to Uber. We downloaded the app and set up payment but every time  we tried to request a ride it would say “payment unsuccessful”. We tried to use 3 different cards, PayPal, and Venmo but nothing would work. So we ended up walking to our hotel in the middle of medical issues.
title: Unreliable

review: Can NEVER get an UBER EVER! What’s the point of having an app for a car service if the car never comes? The app will say you will get there at x time and then it goes to “looking for driver” for 20+ minutes with your arrival time going up and up by the minute!  Plus they overcharge you now MUCH MORE then they did in the past! It’s absolutely ridiculous! Uber used to be SUCH a great app but now they have gone downhill SO BAD! Wish we could go back to the days of calling a cab because atleast you knew they were ACTUALLY COMING at the time specified!
title: WORST CAR SERVICE EVER

review: By far the worst customer service I’ve ever dealt with. I truly believe I would have better chance with a spam call of getting anything accomplished. I’ve had drivers cancel time and time again and every time I reach out to customer support all I get in return is “sorry for the inconvenience, please give us another shot”. I’ve given this company way too many second tries, I will gladly pay more for the inconvenience of a cab service or walk an hour instead of give them any more of my business.
title: Deleting app

review: The driver get lost, and at the end of the trip, the price was the one I book. So everything fine. Next day unexpectedly, they charge me again, for the same trip, but even more than the original price, with no notice, I find it on my credit card. They reverse immediately, but the lost of trust is already done. My friend told me they do that all the time to her. And on the app they say that the fees may vary due traffic, or other factors that they should calculate before we book. Anyway…
title: They charge you more than one time

review:
I have a high rating, but recently drivers have been constantly accepting and canceling trips, which makes it impossible to rely on the ETA.

I understand that Uber wants to be friendlier to drivers, but why is it that when I cancel I’m charged a fee, yet drivers are free to cancel with zero consequences?
title: Drivers constantly canceling trips

review:
I have been scheduling rides for months now to go to work the next day. Its a few miles away and costs $8. The reason I schedule in advance is because I work in the early hours of the morning. 
As of a couple days ago to schedule the same ride they expect me to pay $45 when requesting in the future. But if I still request at the same time its $8 I just run the huge risk of not getting a driver. Uber you are PATHETIC. You would think you want to keep customers who guarantee you rides
title: DISGUSTING price to request an future ride

review: Maureen (R26LHM) Hyundai Elantra is horrible! She accepted my ride came all the way to me I go to get in the car and she locks the door. Baggers me about where I am headed and I am confused. She is rude and yelling at me I’m just like what? I order a ride and paid for it just do your job. Horrible I will not use Uber app again! She pulled off on me while talking thru her back window leaves me in the street. That alone had me late to work she needs to be put on suspension or something. That’s HORRIBLE for business. Absolutely distasteful.
title: Wish I could give 0 stars for your horrible drivers!

review:
Wow. I love the screens that i see in the Ap store.  
In the short time I’ve had my new cellular 7, I’ve never seen them.  
Does or has this ap ever worked with the watch alone?  I’ve tried it every day for weeks and it’s always something. I know it works with the phone, but never the watch alone.
title: Watch Ap

review:
I’ve lost my AirPods in a ride. CLEARLY can track my AirPods and see that I have lost them because the are still moving and they are at the spot we just got picked up from (the airport). Contact the driver, he can easily lie and say he can’t find them and keep them. Contact Uber and they believe that he isn’t lying EVEN IF IM STILL TRACKING AIRPODS.

Long story short: don’t lose items in a ride because once you lose them uber will not do ANYTHING besides call the person and believe they can’t find them. EVEN IF YOU HAVE A TRACKER AND ITS STILL ACTIVE EVERY 5-10 MINUTES. Smh.
title: Goodbye Lost Items

review: Due to my poor mobile network at the end of my trip am unable to complete the cashless payment and I tried to explain the same to driver but he doesn’t understand what I tried to explain him . So paid the cash to him and few mins later I found that the cashless payment also got succeeded . While checking with customer support they replied that they cannot take ownership for cash payment for cashless drive . Seems like am cheated or I lost my money with Uber . Other users be careful with this app . :(
title: Worst customer support

review: I’m unhappy with the service. I have been using this app since 2018 and didn’t have any issue until today. I have been waiting for long time and they continually change my driver. I have to be at a place at a certain time and that’s why I ordered ahead of time 1 hour to be exact. This is making me angry. I’m wasting time. My first uber was 13 minutes away, I waited 7 minutes. The second driver was 13 minutes away and they changed again. Now this driver is taking 20 minutes. This is disrespectful.
title: 0 starts

review:
When ordering Uber they never showed up!
I called again, getting very anxious about missing my international flight out LAX.
  Sometime later when looking at my credit card statement I noticed that I had been charged 2 amounts, 1 after another $55 and $23.  I talked to my credit card company and they said Uber denied my claim. 
   Recently,when Using Lyft and waiting for them to arrive they called to tell me that they would leave in 2 minutes if I didn’t show- I told them that I was standing in the middle of my street and they weren’t there! I walked around to the back of my apartment building and they were all the way up the alley behind my building by the garbage cans!
   Apparently these drivers that hardly speak English, use GPS rather than going by the physical address!
   I never did get my $55 back from Uber
title: RIPPED OFF BY UBER!

review: I’ve been using Uber for a very long time and I probably use it more than anybody else, 1 or 2 rides every day but sometimes it shows me that there are a lot of driver around and none accepts my ride requests and sometimes they wanna charge a lot more than the usual amount, I would not pay $30 for a 7 minutes drive. Nobody would.

So I tried to request a ride late at night at 10:20pm and it said no cars available and this is my first time using the app and I just put money on the app with the card that I purchased at a local store where y’all sell the Uber cards and I picked the right card when I purchased it. It didn’t change me when I requested a ride at all. But why is it saying no cars are available.
title: Requesting a ride

review: Absolutely no help with customer support. Recently took an Uber and my driver drove right past the exit and had to back track. Slightly unnervingly being a solo female and him driving past your exit and continuing without saying anything. Then trying to get ahold of customer support to make sure you weren’t paying for a drivers mistake is absolutely impossible. Canceled my pass and won’t ever use them again.
title: Your driver messes up but you’ll still pay the price!

review:
Spent a week in Montreal while i had to go to events and weddings. Had to cancel 4 rides because i was always left waiting 20-30 minutes for a driver. Then would charge me when i cancel saying the driver is on his way even when they are still finishing a ride. 
Paying more just made the wait longer. 
I am getting fed up with this. Ended up taking a normal taxi on the street.
title: Always set up far away drivers and no way to provide feedback

review: The prices are ridiculously expensive. Beware that they may charge you more then what you are quoted. It’s ridiculously hard to get a hold of someone. You have to keep on clicking and looking they make it impossible for you to reach customer service. That is very disappointing it should be made easy especially with the prices . My driver was driving crazy , music very loud and wasn’t wearing a mask but I will still charge. I even took a video. Waste of time . Go to Lyft !!! It’s safe and affordable
title: So disappointed ridiculously expensive

review: This is a review of the service of Uber, not the app. In short, increasingly I dread having to order an Uber. Service has never been great but it just gets worse and worse. Today I waited 8 minutes for a ride in DC only to watch my driver/ car blow right past me and then cancel the trip. And I wasn’t even surprised. The day before I had to ask the driver to follow his own directions and avoid us getting lost multiple times. I honestly miss hailing a yellow cab.
title: Disappointing Serving

review:
Sorting is useless, tried sorting by delivery time but results were completely out of order with places that take 50mins appearing above places that take 15mins.  Filters and search are useless as well, half of the results are not even remotely related to the filter/search term. What is the point of these features if they don’t work as users expect?

Even worse than that, scheduled delivery got canceled with NO NOTIFICATION WHATSOEVER. Checked app multiple times and order only showed canceled AFTER the scheduled delivery time.
title: Food delivery from this app is horrible

review: I had great service with the rides that I made on my trip, but I was extremely surprised when I checked my bank account and find out charges for trips that I didn’t make! It shows on my bank account only, and Uber doesn’t have phone number or email that I can contact or any kind of customer service, if I use the help I could report issues regarding my trips, and I didn’t want to hurt any driver!!! If u r going any where compare your receipts and rides with your bank account :-(
title: Extra charge for trips I didn’t make

review: Uber is the worst kind of company. No way to directly speak to someone about an issue they have with credit card transactions. When I really needed Uber to get a ride from the airport, it ended up being a total fail. First they wanted me to verify charged amounts, ok done, no problem, then they wanted to verify my home address, ok done no problem, then they just said sorry, actually there’s a “conflict”. When I attempted to eventually resolve the issue a day later, their response was totally canned and completely useless. Goodbye Uber.
title: Uber is the worst…

review: GPS inaccurately reads my address. Dragging the pin does not fix this. Drivers then attempt to go to the wrong address and Uber GPS tells them they can launch their care off the neighboring highway into the complex (surprise, surprise that doesn’t work). They don’t respond to texts telling them the correct address. Contacting Uber support is a waste of time. Hopefully they’re bots and not paid people because they just regurgitate the same message despite the information you’ve provided. Hopefully Lyft is better.
title: Inaccurate GPS. Incompetent support

review: Uber is great when it works but can really screw you over when it doesn’t. I’m obviously in a situation when I am unable to drive, and I scheduled a ride to work this morning and needed to be there in the evening. I gave myself 10 extra minutes incase of traffic or something. Uber told me 15 minutes after my scheduled pickup time that there were no drivers available, making me inevitably late to work. It’s a great app when it works, but not worth losing my job over to use this service.
title: Unreliable

review: I have filed a complaint with Uber. It was extremely difficult even to find a method to file any complaint.  I found a Twitter account for Uber Support and finally sent a DM. I had scheduled a ride one full day before I needed it. I received an Email confirmation of the scheduled ride for the next morning. Driver never showed up. In fact, my reservation suddenly disappeared from the app. I received an apology from Uber with a 3$ gift, ridiculous. I continue to question their poor service and I am waiting for a better reply than “sorry for your inconvenience.”
title: Driver did not show up

review: Uber gets worse every time I use it. App says a driver is a few minutes away, confirm my ride and then it says no drivers available. Last time I used them they charged me $45 to go approximately 8 miles because of “busy times”. Guess I’ll start using Lyft.
title: Just keeps getting worse

review: I got rid of the Uber app after my driver pulled out his gun and cocked it during a recent ride. I contacted Uber afterwards and one of their agents called me saying,”oh they pulled a gun out in ‘us state’? That must be normal out there haha”. I got a refund for the ride but never heard back from Uber after that. No mention of what they were doing to keep my identify safe or if the driver was going to be removed from Uber. I’ve used ride share apps for years and understand they can’t control their drivers but the lack of concern and overall communication really hurt my idea of Uber and their values as a company.
title: Driver pulled out a gun

review: I checked my bank statements and was dumb founded that somehow Uber had enrolled me into their “Uber Pass” which is a monthly subscription for 25$ a month. The 25$ isn’t the problem, the issue is that they auto enrolled me without consent. To top it off I had scheduled a ride a couple weeks ago for 10:30, to be notified at 10:25 that the Uber driver canceled and was looking for another. About 2 more Uber driver cancellations and 30 minutes later, I canceled the ride, which costed money, and called a friend. All in all, check ur bank statements and don’t rely on Uber.
title: Unauthorized charges and inconsistent service

review: I enjoyed a safe and pleasant ride with Han who is a very empathetic human. He was a top notch driver who could handle wherever the conversation went. I felt like not only did I get a safe and reliable ride home, but I felt like my life was better when I left the car. Life hands you good people. Pay attention to their gifts!
title: Amazing Human

review: Was a pleasure to get into a clean car with a person that knew exactly where they were going and also picked you up at the time he requested time you were told and got me to my destination in 10 minutes. If every ride can be this good I would say Uber will be perfect.
title: Good Driver

review: Thomas was super friendly and helpful. So many tips on where to go and what to do which we appreciated so much being first time visitors to Oklahoma. He was on time and got out to greet us at the airport. He also sent helpful messages to let us know where the pick up point was. Mahalo Thomas
title: Wonderful experience

review:
Josue was very friendly👍. He made an effort to speak English and help with our little bit of Spanish. Talked about the places we had eaten and made a few recommendations for our next trip. He was a good driver and got us to the airport safely. Our other drivers barely spoke.  
Would highly recommend him 👍👍
title: Best Driver Yet

review: Unbelievably wonderful! First time ever used Uber. But Cecelia was so professional and super safe driver, well she changed my whole outlook about getting a ride from a stranger! I usually never have the opportunity to truly give a high rating, but if there was 6 or 7 stars, that’s what I would have easily given!
title: Patrick : For Cecelia

review: If you’re ever in a jam like we were, you want Brittney as your driver. Not only did she pick us up at the South Bend Amtrak Station after midnight for a semi long drive up to Buchanon, MI, but she helped us find our cabin (not an easy task) and made sure we were safe and sound inside before leaving. She’s a real gem. Much appreciated!
title: Awesome driver

review:
I feel Uber shuts its ears when it comes to feedback about their algorithm. There is no way to complain about general service only on specific rides and the drivers. Here is my complaint. At the airport waiting at designated area, driver cancels on me last 15 seconds. No text, no call. I try and re-book and  Uber app puts me at the back of the queue — 15 minute wait for a 30 minute ride. My wife, next to me, books and gets a ride in 3 minutes. 

Good bye Uber. Been using you since day one and have 4.95 stars.
title: Steadily decreasing service

review:
Becoming a pain day by day. If even driver wants me to cancel for some resons, I need to pay the fine. This morning, I paid the fine more than my trip costs. Why would uber app assign the trip for driver who is more than 10 minutes far? Sometimes even I book from one location, driver gets the wrong info about the location and wait for me at other location instead. 
If these kinds of problem persists then there are similar app growing and developing professionally which will surpass this uber’s legacy.
title: Ramanuz

review: My app no longer connects me to drivers since I updated yesterday. There’s either a notification that no rides are available or it connects for 15 minutes and nothing happens. Regardless of closing the app and re-starting it. I had to switch and use Lyft.
title: Yesterdays update ruined my app

review: Driver arrived on time.  He was extremely courteous.  His driving skills is rated a high ten because he was very careful maneuvering on streets that were difficult seeing.  He really made me feel comfortable in both driving and being an absolute polite gentleman.  Just an awesome experience!  Well appreciated👍
title: Outstanding service

review: I’m not sure which ride this review is attached to, but today we rode with Chris to Sherpa House Restaurant in downtown Golden,CO and with Erin to a dispensary and to the Airbnb where we are staying. Chris is outgoing and very fun. Erin is also very personable, and went out of her way to make it a  pleasant experience. They are both excellent drivers who keep their cars clean.
title: Excellent Travel Companions

review: I truly enjoyed my ride with Gina. She got me home safe, while also participating in interesting conversations. I hope I have the chance to ride with her in the future and I hope she is rewarded for her exceptional skills in communication. She did a wonderful job and I think anyone would be lucky to ride with her!
title: Regine

review: I’ve been using Uber for two years now and I always had the best experience, but it’s been a month already since I can even find a driver that respect MY ride!, a looot of them cancel the ride when they’re literally 1 minute away!!!, there should be some restrictions about it, they can’t just take the ride and cancel it 1 minute away, it’s a waste of time for me. I use Uber to get to work and for the last month I’m always late because of that inconsideration. If you take the ride, just finish it!!!
title: Idk what’s going on!

review: I was charged for a ride I never took that didn’t arrive on schedule and arrived at my destination before I even requested to be picked up. I had to pay for the same exact ride twice, customer support refused to refund me for the ride I never took justifying it with the fact that the trip is in line with my trip history. It’s completely ridiculous that they can’t easily confirm and see that I did not make it to my destination with the first trip thus requiring a second.
title: Horrible Customer Support

review: Within minutes of getting off my flight, my car arrived and it was very clean, smelled fresh and the driver was friendly and helpful. Thank you for getting my daughter and me home quickly after our long flight! Uber happy with this ride home!
title: Clean, Quick and Good driver!

review: The thing about uber is mostly I'll use it when it's absolutely necessary. However, the wait times are absurd, drivers often cancel or they don't move and wait for you to cancel so they'll still get paid. I've used it on several different countries and continents and it's same everywhere. Also there is no way to report a driver when they accept the trip and never show up. Drivers abuse this loophole, it needs to be fixed.
title: Necessary Evil

review: I selected a 6 person XL ride because I had six people. The car that arrived could drive six people but not six peoples luggage so I had to order another ride.  Previously I was able to select vehicles so I could ensure there was enough space. If an airport ride is saying it can fit six people it should obviously be able to handle six people’s luggage. Please keep this in mind as you improve your service.
title: Baggage issues

review: It was my first time using Uber, and I was a bit nervous and had questions. Ruben was a great driver. He was personable, upbeat, and a skilled driver. I felt safe and secure in Ruben’s Ford Flex, and he got me to work on time. I would use Uber and have Ruben drive me every day if I could. Based on this experience I would confidently use Uber again. It was awesome. 👍🏽😊
title: Ruben was the best!! Uber is awesome!

review: They need to fix their “reserve a ride” section. I reserved a ride over a week ago and when the time came my driver cancelled, then the next one did, then so on - until someone finally agreed to do the 2-hour trip. I was happy to pay $150 plus a 50% tip, too. They shouldn’t accept ride reservations in advance unless they TELL the driver how long of a trip it is and how much they are getting paid - with the option to pre-tip more to the driver so the driver makes the money they deserve for long trips.
title: “reserve a ride” not what you think

review: One small issue is the email receipt offers the button to click for rate or tip but when clicked it goes to a page that does not allow you to do either. In fair ess to drivers, I suggest you making the process of tipping much easier.
title: Tip issues on app

review: I’m so tired of waiting 30mins+ for a driver in the middle of HOLLYWOOD. I’ve been late to several events because I’ve relied on Uber. I’ve requested up to an hour in advance because I’ve learned how Uber is, and still nothing. It’s so annoying when I have to wait to be connected to a driver, just for that driver to cancel when they’re down the street. Lyft is even worse, so ride share is nearly impossible for me..and that says a lot when you live in LA. I requested my Uber at 3:20PM…I was connected to a driver at 3:51PM. So ridiculous.
title: Never Any Drivers In Los Angeles??

review: So if you ever wanna ride and a fast one and safe, Edward is a guy he even had things to help us out to charge our phones when we are on the side of the road with new batteries on our phones and just enough to get a Uber ride he’s the best y’all have to get him always refer them to
title: First time Uber ride driver was great

review:
Jonathan in Boise was fantastic! 🏁

He was early to pick me up at my hotel (allowing me time to check out) and was ready for me, to get me to the airport ahead of schedule… 👍🏻

Jonathan communicated that he was early and all was well, putting me at ease. His vehicle was clean & tidy/inside & out, no loud music or bad interior smells… He was a safe and courtesy driver, we had excellent conversation telling me about the area, yet gave me space and comfort.

I really appreciate his professionalism and taking his work (and client comfort) seriously.

Thank you for getting me safely to the airport (to get me back home to my family) well on time!

Warmly,  ~Jeff
title: Jonathan in Boise was fantastic!

review: I don’t write reviews often however Mr. Mohammed picked me up this afternoon for a ride to get me to work.  His car was so extremely neat & clean so instead of taking me to the train I changed the ride to take me straight to work.  He was very courteous professional and made the ride very comfortable & pleasant.  Would love to have Mr. Mohammed for all future Uber trips!!!!!
title: Mr. Mohammed

review: He took my son for his first Uber ride to get dropped off at his friends house. My son was nervous since he did not know the driver but Sergio made him feel comfortable, nice, respectable etc. I’m glad he turns my son’s nervousness and anxiety around by just being himself. So my son had a wonderful first experience. Go Sergio! Keep up the good work :)
title: Sergio

review: Kensey was friendly from the start. She was positive energy and we had a great conversation. The notification from Uber on make/model of vehicle, drivers license, the ability to share my ride plus, the consistent updates on tracking made the whole experience feel safe.
title: Felt safe/Driver great

review:
We waited for Lyft for almost 45 minutes. There was no car available. A friend asked and advised to try Uber . We did and I. 15 minutes we got a ride back home. We were saved. 
The driver the car and the driving was excellent and smooth. 
Thanks to Uber and the driver of Uber .
title: Thank you

review: I’ve been using Uber for more then 5 years now and it’s never given me a problem with using my Apple Pay like Lyft has. Lyft has always given me problems with either verifying my identification or taking my payment. I love Uber, I would never recommend Lyft or choose Lyft over Uber.
title: Prefer it over Lyft

review: My driver was Uriel. He picked me up at the CBX bridge in San Diego and brought me to a hotel near Disneyland. I left my wallet in his car. He found it and called me at 11:00 PM. He was going to drive all the way back here tomorrow morning to bring it to me. Over a 4 hour drive both ways. What a great guy. I asked him to mail it to me in Utah. I was so impressed with him.
title: My Uber driver

review:
Horrible quality and service in London for Ride and Eats.  I’m a moderately happy customer in Australia but London is shocking.

Besides consistently failing (cancelled rides) and inaccurate food delivery, Uber’s customer service is a set of bots and form letters.  One one specifically pathetic experience, the restaurant opened a ticket on my behalf (driver gave wrong order), I provided a photo of the other persons order receipt…and got an automated form letter back ‘we’re unable to help you, sorry it’s not the experience….’

Clearly they don’t give a crap.  Charging back.
title: Don’t use in London 0/5 fails

review: I used UBER 1 year ago and it was easy and understandable. Today, I could not choose a right plaice where I was. It was just put me randomly where an app wanted. I could not see information about cars that were close to me. When I wanted to cancel my order I saw that I must pay $6. Why?! I didn’t see any information. Uber took $28 from my credit card. Also, $6…Finally driver came..I think the app supposed to be more useful! More fore people! Not just take a money and don’t do a service!
title: Horrible an app system working

review:
Good afternoon,

I used your service twice yesterday with no problem. Today my credit card was charge three times for $7.77 which caused my bank to cancelled my card as they thought it was a fraudulent active. I do not know what happened? Please explained. Thank you.
title: Credit card

review: I ordered a Uber numerous times to go to work but it kept canceling on its own and the prices were higher than usual I’ve been trying to get an Uber since 2pm and they all keep cancelling the ride after I’ve waited 10-15 mins it’s now 5pm the time I’m actually supposed to be at work so I’ve now been trying to order a Uber for 3 hours now with no luck and it’s the fact I was ordering it before I was even supposed to be at work because I was going in early and now I’m supposed to be there but I can’t get a ride
title: Unacceptable

review: This is my first time using Uber.. on the way from the Austin airport we took a cab that smelled absolutely horrific and was filthy but that was not the case on my return trip to the airport.. my Uber driver was early, his vehicle was incredibly clean and smelled good.. he was incredibly polite, he played good music and it was just an all around good experience…thank you Jorge!
title: Uber driver Jorge

review: I was at Walgreens so when I tapped it thought it was the Walgreens I was in front of at the time. It was a Walgreens I was near 30 minutes early. As I wait and look for the driver, call him to find out he at the wrong Walgreens. The driver canceled the ride when I told him where I was. I was charged 5.02 for the cancellation. It was my first time using this app. And maybe my last. The other driver that came was great. I’m not impressed with the app and map!!!!
title: Map dnt work correctly

review:
Planning to switch to full time.
I like driving with Uber it’s super secured, love the Uber GPS with absolutely a great guidance and keep both driver and riders safe.
I call up on everyone out there please come try driving or riding with Uber and you will never get disappointed.
Uber is the best 
Uber my family
title: My choice platform

review: I had to take an Uber at the last minute this morning because I got a flat tire. I was so thrilled to see that they take Apple Pay now and made it 100 times. Easier to get a ride. Also, my driver was amazing she was super nice and friendly and I really enjoyed riding with her.
title: Love the apple pay option!

review:
I try to avoid using uber at all costs but sometimes I am left with no other choice. 

Uber more than double charged me a couple years ago and after countless emails and messages through the app, and hours calling phone numbers trying to talk to someone, I’ve still never been able to talk to a live person. It’s a horrible way to run a business. You took advantage of me and I literally have no recourse and no one to talk with. 

I will continue to tell my friends what a horrible company this is.
title: Still upset

review: I have to say that I enjoyed my ride greatly although the driver was not very conversational, I find this to sometimes be the case. The vehicle was clean. He was there in a timely manner and got me home in a timely manner. Pricewise the last time I rode with your competitor, I felt like they have bent me over and did that to me without kissing me first.
title: review of UBER

review:
First of all I want to truly apologize for my mistake and secondly to say I was acting in a reasonable and respectful manner…..
I was in my head and emotions and instead of being a grown adult I was acting like a child!!!
I am very grateful and ashamed at the same time.
Ty so much for being so kind and professional while providing me with such great service
title: My wallet!!!

review:
The night before my flight I scheduled an Uber for 3:30 pm from home. This was confirmed. Then at about 3:15 I received a message that the ride would be about 10 minutes late -,and with a different driver. Then I was told that the second driver had cancelled and I would have to start over again with a new request. The new, third driver arrived at about 4 pm. The ride was then okay, but because this was closer to rush hour the cost was about $10 more!  

Then I think I left my hat in the back seat. How can I contact the driver to check?
title: Cancelled

review:
Hi Uber Team,

I've been using uber for a while now and a common issue ive seen with drivers is the map view. The issue is not knowing that you can change the perspective of the map by clicking on the navigation arrow on the bottom right to zoom in on the map to change the view for when driving. The navigation arrow button that you press to change the view is the challenge. Alot of drivers dont know to press it so they stay in the high birds eye view and have trouble navigating because it doesn't show the street by street images. 

Best,
JKL
title: UI/UX feedback for gps maps view for driver

review:
My biggest pet peeve is companies that use notifications for ads. To have a good experience with the app it makes sense to enable notifications but when they start serving unsolicited ads, notifications are disabled, making the actual app less useful.

I found a spot to disable them but auto opt-in will hopefully be a thing of the past someday.
title: Unsolicited ads from random companies is annoying

review:
I just started using Uber again after a couple of years layoff. Yesterday, I tried to schedule a ride one hour in advance but was not able to do so. 

The prior week, i screen came up asking me the time I wanted to be picked up, but I didn’t use it.

No such screenncane up yesterday. The next thing I know, I had scheduled a pickup now. I cancelled immediately and did reschedule by trying again 25 minutes before I hoped to be picked up.

My guess is that there was no one available at the foe a delayed pickup the first time I tried. 
It would be helpful to have the pick time screen come up routinely with a message that schedule in advance option was not available currently.
title: Not able to reserve ride in advance

review: This is the second time I’ve been charged for a driver not picking us up. I did not cancel, the driver never showed up. We kept getting texts that they would be there in 2 minutes. We waited 15 minutes before getting a Lyft. I tried to get a hold of the driver to no avail. No one ever connected back and the trip wasn’t even on app after 15 minutes. Really bad service!
title: Charged for No Pick Up

review: Uber’s gps was outdated and we were dropped off a mile away, in the wrong direction, from where the drop off location actually was. I contacted customer service and it was like talking to a wall. I sent screenshots, wrote clearly, and still had to explain my issue to 5 people. They could not possibly grasp that something was wrong on their end, even blaming the driver who did nothing wrong and just drove where she was told. Closing my account and deleting the app. Don’t waste your time with Uber.
title: THE WORST customer service.

review: I got an Uber to take me to the south side but this guy was the worst. His name is Yousif. First I changed the pickup location because I was moving, and when I got in the car he was annoyed by that. And then when he hit confirm and saw how far I was going he basically kicked me out. He said he wasn’t going to go that far and that he already completed his 10 hours or whatever. It made me feel so bad and my heart dropped when I had to get off. Never again using Uber . Get better workers who actually want to work.
title: Never again

review: Gotta be the worst car service all time. Been trying to get an Uber for 2 hours first the app wasn’t letting me confirm it. Sent the money to my gf so she can do it for some since I was having trouble. A car finally comes while I’m walking down to come in the guy drives off while I was calling him telling him I’m here outside. Drives off and cancels the order. After that my ride gets cancelled another 3 times bro I’m telling you I rather pay extra for a cab at this point cause this service is terrible
title: Never do these but it’s necessary

review: I’ve been using Uber for almost two years now to go back and forth to work they overcharge for trips and it feels like a scam when you get charged  $45 for a $10 trip they need to do better and stop trying to get over on their customers with this scam
title: Terrible

review: at first i loved using uber because they were always quick with getting to me. but now it’s always giving me drivers that are super far away and i’m sure nobody wants to wait that long especially when they are in a rush. sometimes when i try to schedule one i’m charged way more than a regular when i do it AHEAD of time. doesn’t make sense to me how i should wait 20+ mins for someone when my destination is 7 minutes away. or we should have an option
title: hate using this app now

review: The app actually works pretty well. They send all of my receipts and messages in Spanish, though, which I can’t understand. The app itself uses your phone settings, so at least that part gets the language correct. There’s no way for me to change the language setting for their emails, texts, and notifications on their app, and they offer no customer support whatsoever. There is literally no way to contact them. This should be simple to fix, so it’s just frustrating.
title: Can’t Change Account Settings

review:
Prices rose slowly over 2 months when I started taking Uber pools to work everyday. They clearly saw I need the same ride and rose my rate up 3x. When I emailed them they just told me that "there was no error, the price we showed you is what we charged". Yeah awesome that's not what i was complaining about. I ended up just buying a car specifically because Uber is so crappy to use.

Also they spam you with notifications “hey you hungry? Get Uber eats” and “looking to take ride? Use Uber” — like no I don’t, if I do, I’ll open the app…
title: Predatory pricing & spammy
developerResponse: {'id': 3608461, 'body': 'This certainly sounds like a frustrating experience. However, please note that a ride can be cancelled by both for free of charge after a driver accepts your request up to 2 minutes for uberPOOL and 5 minutes for the other riding services.To know more, please visit http://ubr.to/2huCo7Q. Questions? Write to us at t.uber.com/contact to connect.', 'modified': '2018-05-27T06:25:03Z'}

review: Heads up to everybody who uses Uber and tries to tip on the phone. This happened to me twice. I accidentally tip the driver twice because the email receipt was very confusing. U can tip them before the trip finish. The app will ask you again. However, the receipt never has the tip money including the payment for the drive. So I thought I didn’t tip my driver and that’s why I accidentally tip again. I hope they fix this problem. So other people don’t get rip off by doing something good.
title: Really need to improve with Email receipt

review: To update my payment method. When I go to the link it’s blank. Tried everything- reinstalled app, canceled my account and reset it - nothing. The app still said I had an account.  Turned on my location to try to call a ride and the location was in the middle of Africa, tried to reset the location and the screen froze in the middle of the Pacific. Forget about customer service- no call center or live chat to correct any problems you may have. Good luck if you have an issue. Uber doesn’t give a S*%t.
title: USELESS

review: Uber used to be my go to. It was convenient, affordable and easy to use. Now Uber is letting just anyone drive for them. the driver are not professional anymore. And not to mention the prices are now ridiculous!!! Uber used to charge about 7$ or 8$ to take me home from work which is about 7 mins away. Now I’m being charged between 15$-$40 (depending on what time it is) and it’s really disgusting. I just switched over to Lyft because the prices are a bit lower than what Uber is wanting to charge.
title: Used to be decent

review: If I could rate 0 stars I would!!! They have done nothing but lie about promotions and incentives!!! I was sent to a trip 20 minutes away and the rider canceled as I was in their driveway, they refused to compensate my gas!!! I reached Platinum tier the very second I did they placed had a reason not to give it to me!!! I did this in 3 months it means I drove almost every day for 12 issues also every time I get support help and they do not like what I say I get hung up on!!!! I literally just got hung up on by a supervisor!!! My advice to you is do not do it
title: Do not drive for them

review: I was traveling and was requesting the same rides at the same time as someone I was with. Their ride prices were $10-15 while mine were $40-60 for the exact same ride - same pickup and drop off, requested at the exact same time. Uber is charging users what they think they will pay rather than a standard rate. There were no surges at the time I was given a $60 ride estimate while my partner was given a $15 ride estimate. Switching to Lyft permanently.
title: Charging different users extremely different prices for same ride same time

review:
The app looks great with all the services organized together. The Food tab is basically the Uber Eats app. The Uber Eats app works great if you want to order food. 
BUT if you go through Uber app you can’t pay for your food order with Apple Pay. It is disabled. 
For rides you can use Apple Pay. 
Use Uber Eats and you can use Apple Pay. 
But Apple Pay is disabled as an option if you order food directly through the Uber app. 
So you have to open the Uber Eats app. The order is there in the cart and you then can pay using Apple Pay. 
I would think they would want to fix this since a lot of customers will likely get stuck without a way to easily pay for their order via the Uber app and just use another app like DoorDash to order their food.
title: Uber Eats tab not working correctly

review: Besides you having us wait over 20+ mins for a driver…. Once they are near by they cancel and now we have to wait an additional 20 mins!?! At first I thought it was just my bad luck getting the best of my day. Turns out I wasn’t the only one this is happening to. Many colleagues, friends and even some drivers have shared that their previous customers mentioned a similar story to them.
title: What’s going on Uber?

review:
Scheduled ride for the first time. Enterered CC information… Got a message that the ride was scheduled, then got a message that the driver was on there way and close. Then more then 5 minutes AFTER the pick up time we received a message that there were no available drivers. !!!!!!  This cost us $ because we needed to be at our destination before it closed. If we knew Uber wouldn’t show up we would have taken cab. 
Guess what?? They STILL CHARGED our CC!!!!!!!   AND Uber is impossible to get ahold of. 
Worst. Don’t waist your time and $$.
title: Negative stars

review:
I’m so disappointed 
I take Uber a lot and I’m tired of them charging me extra the rewards don’t work my two past trips they updated my receipt but they didn’t refund my money when I request the trip it shows me the expected time as an example let say I call it right now and it shows me 8 minutes then starts to increase the time like don’t play with people time the drivers take the request and they not even close like fr it doesn’t make sense I’m about to delete this app and not use it anymore
title: Trash

review: We could not have been any more happier than we were with James our driver. He picked us up right on time to get us to the Charlotte airport in a very comfortable car. We enjoyed chatting with James during our ride and look forward to having him pick us up on other occasions when we use Uber again. James is a five star gentleman and driver!
title: A Great Ride

review: honestly Uber always was a bit expensive but this new thing where they can quadruple the price of a 10$ ride because it’s busy is insane Uber used to be convenient now there is never any drivers and for a 5 mile drive can range anywhere from 15$ - 50$ it should never be like that Uber makes a lot of money so why are trying to screw over the people who invest in your app it’s ridiculous it seems like you guys are just money hungry I rather pay a random on the street for a ride then pay 50$ to go 5 miles tuh
title: NEW APP PLEASE

review: How is it that if I’m trynna find a ride that’s literally only 10 min away but y’all charging me $20 or more?? Or how about when it finally finds me a driver, and is almost here and then cancels mid as he’s halfway here and now I would have to wait longer for another ride. How is it that apparently y’all have no drivers but this app is still running?!?! No this app has been declining the past year and a half and y’all have been very unprofessional would not recommend until y’all get your act together, no professionalism at all
title: Horrible

review: I’m supposed to get $15 credit per month with my AMEX PLATINUM, and AMEX says they are crediting it to Uber but it stopped coming to my account a few months ago. Amex is trying to help but it’s impossible to get a hold of a human at Uber to look into the issue. You can’t even chat with customer service and the numbers just go to dead end voice messages. Apparently my $15 credit is going to another account but I can’t figure out whose account it’s now going to. It appears Uber is just embezzling it!
title: No customer service! Potential fraud!

review:
Seems like over the last few weeks, I’ve been inundated with promotional notifications for both Uber and Uber Eats. I’d turn off notifications, but don’t wanna miss when my ride shows up. Marketing tip—a service like Uber doesn’t need to remind people that it constantly exists. Notify us about the arrival of the ride, and that’s it, please.

Update: I’m never going to use UberEats. Please stop.
title: Notification overload

review:
I’ve been a Uber rider since roughly 2016 and it use to be so convenient but now... what a rip off. They randomly up their prices like $20, barely have employees Bc I’m always waiting 15+ minutes for a ride and riders complain allll the time when you have more than 1 stop like they didn’t sign up for
This, why must I feel bad for simply using a feature that’s available to me. Pay the unsatisfied drivers more or just delete the app all together Bc it’s just becoming a hassle and a headache at this point.
title: It’s okay

review: There’s no other taxi service left anywhere near the town I live in as Uber took all the other companies within 30 miles out of business. They have no drivers that operate out here so there’s no way for anyone to get a ride home from the bar even if it’s only two miles away. I hope you people in Silicon Valley enjoy your money while the rest of us in the rural central Untied States walk home in the cold.
