Run the businesses that have actually done us good into the ground and leave us with nothing.
title: Ran everyone else out of business and left us with nothing

review: The payment options are becoming impossible  to deal with. When my Uber cash runs out mid trip, there is no option to switch. When you’re busy and use Uber on the go, there is no time for this nonsense. The developers must be pimple faced kids playing video games in their mother’s basement with no real life experience. Bet they never actually rode in an Uber.
title: Getting progressively worse

review: How Uber is such a rich company? It’s very easy: every time the driver can’t find you or shows up in the wrong place, or shows up 20 minutes late ( all three happen all the time)-YOU GET CHARGED. These are the money you will never get back. There is no such option- please refund my driver never came.  So you are basically paying 5-6 dollars every time a driver has no idea what he is doing. 5 dollars here, 6 dollars there- Uber still gets paid and NEVER refunds, even if it’s entirely driver’s fault. They ask you to send emails to dispute charges. Well, good luck getting a reply!
title: No refunds ever

review: First time downloading and using while sitting in a restaurant and not wanting to walk back to our hotel at night. Downloaded and set up in minutes and then our driver showed up within another two minutes. Stupid easy.
title: Uber easy

review:
Our driver was the best! He was warm, kind, friendly and funny. He educated me a lot on how Uber works so I could better understand and we had a great time together.
The vehicle was very comfortable and had phone chargers and a sign that says if I needed anything he was there to help.
I would highly recommend this driver to ANYONE and EVERYONE ❤️
title: Driver

review: It is not often one wishes a ride to the airport took longer, but I found myself wishing just that after a fascinating conversation with Caren. He was early, helped me with my very heavy bags, was a brilliant conversationalist, and we found we had several things in common. May our paths cross again.
title: Interesting, courteous man

review: Nothing worse than seeing your driver is 10 min away, then 5...then they cancel. Restart the process, get another driver and they cancel. Yet. There is no way to give them a rating for cancelling on you after they've already had the request accepted for x amount of time. So. After two cancels, wasting almost 30 min, had to get in my own car to go to the airport. Literally made it onto my flight with 5 min to spare. Without my enhanced security clearance I would've missed the flight. Never again.
title: Cancelled trips

review:
I wanted to reach a meeting and was nervous bcz there was no one to drive me to my meeting place. I called Uber. They said Uber will reach me in 9 minutes. And lo ! It came inside 9 minutes! The driver ( I think Mr Joseph ) was courteous and knew his job well. I arrived at the destination on time and happy. 
Thank you Uber, thank you Mr Joseph. ( pardon  me if I spell your name wrong.
title: On time, courteous Uber

review: I am glad that we got Ricardo as our driver. His car is nice and clean. I have noticed that some of the other drivers cars nowadays are not as clean inside. When Uber first started the quality of cars are so much better. It does not have to be really new, it just needs to be nice and neat inside.
title: Clean car

review:
I came back from a very long trip from Europe, disoriented and very tired. When I was going to get the car I didn’t realize that I’ve had forgotten my luggage. He was very kind and wait for me until I was ready. It’s not easy to find an angel when you most needed it
Thank you very much.
title: Kindness

review: Every time I talk to an Uber driver, they always tell me how little they get paid, the percentage they make is pathetic. They also charge outrageous fees when they are busy. My $65 trip turned into $185 because they were busy at the airport, and the drivers don’t get any more pay, Uber keeps the additional funds for themselves. My driver made $38 off an 45 mile, $85 ride they were supposed to be $65, one driver also tried to scam me out of $80 in cash. The owners at Uber are screwing people out of their money.
title: Uber screw their drivers and customers hard

review: The worst experience I’ve ever had was trying to use Uber in Paris. Took 45 minutes to an hour to get a driver and then Uber would cancel the trip in the middle of the drivers approach to us. We were late for everything. It happened over and over again and when I finally just canceled an order they charge me a cancellation fee which I am going to get back but I want to warn everybody do not count on Uber in Paris it is the worst organized thing I have ever experienced and it cost us a great deal of inconvenience and taxi fees
title: Paris uber

review: I dropped my car off to get work done and ordered an Uber as soon as I got there so I wouldn’t be late to work. Waited 20 minutes for the Uber, he said he was there, he wasn’t. Waited again, the cancelled. Ordered another Uber, waited 40 minutes, same thing. By this time, I was late for work and they charged me for BOTH RIDES even though they cancelled. I had to walk to miles to work in the heat and was an hour late due to their unprofessionalism. There’s no way easy way to get help, you can’t get a live purpose.
title: Ridiculous

review: After yesterday’s update, it no longer shows you the estimate on the time you will arrive to your destination while your Uber is on their way to pick you up. It only shows the time it will take to get to you. This makes it stressful for the passengers. If I get matched with someone way further away I may arrive later than anticipated and will not know how late until they actually pick me up. Please fix this ASAP. I will not be late to work because of this flawed update.
title: Please add the time estimate back

review:
24 hrs of horrible travel experience with American Airlines.  Last ditch effort to get from Dallas to Montgomery because of “overbooking and maintenance failures.” Accepted flight to Birmingham 96 miles from home. 
My Uber driver showed up in 3 minutes and did a wonderful job navigating traffic and getting me home.
title: Bad travel day ends well with Uber

review: Latexes when taking Uber they up charge the ride when you arrive at your destination. There would no traffic sometimes get to your location early but stop an up charge of 2-5 dollars every time I got from Westchester to the city. Uber was asked no answer but my receipt. It’s sad that overtime this app made it so you can’t contact them and have to go through so many screens just to get help from a bot! It’s disgusting.. If I could give a negative rating lower than 1 I would!!!
title: Why do you guys up charge on your rides

review: I had a terrible travel day, and my delayed 2:30 AM flight was canceled. The hotel that I booked and paid for was in fact unavailable. This nice Uber driver drove me around to several hotels to help me find a room that was available. I was exhausted and so thankful that somebody took the time to help a stranded, vulnerable traveler.
title: So helpful and nice!

review:
It was my great pleasure meeting Scott while he was giving me Uber ride to my home at early morning at 2:45am 
Such a sacrifice for Uber guests at late night for her daughter & praying for his daughter’s  health that God will make a great miracle in her 
Also thank you for Scott service for our great country of USA in a military!! May God Bless him & his precious daughter Amen -
 Johnnie PARMAR
title: Great & friendly & caring person

review: My account was disabled from Uber without explanation. I never had an issue with any drivers and I’ve never done anything to warrant a block on my account. I reached out to Uber via e-mail several times to ask why and they NEVER give me a reason. I cannot get through to a live person and this is such an inconvenience. I’m not sure if this is an error or a misunderstanding but either way, I cannot find out what the problem is! Customer service for Uber is the absolute worst!
title: Wish I could give 0 stars!

review: Anthony was early to pick us up and let me know when he arrived, saying there was no rush since he was early. It was a relief he was early since we were traveling to make a flight. He helped us load and unload our luggage. The car was clean and comfortable and we arrived safely and on time. Many thanks, Anthony!
title: Excellent!

review: I like Uber because they are there for you, when nobody can.  Uber makes a big difference in taking care of customers from pickup to drop off.  My experience with Alem this morning was very pleasant.  Clean car and pleasant conversation.  I highly recommend Uber to others!!
title: Dependable!

review: Joseph made mine and my daughter’s Uber ride so much fun!!!  We had such a long exhausting day, then a 3 hour flight delay, among other bumps in the road….and after getting in the Uber, Joseph made us forget all about the challenges we endured all day. He was such a delight, so personable and fun!  Thank you Joseph for a great start to our vacation 💗
title: Joseph

review: I just needed a ride to work from the mechanic shop, it was short and sweet! Only about nine minute ride, but the gentleman was very nice and we engaged in a nice conversation. Not annoying. Just friendly. And I got to work on time. He did not speed, but he was not tiptoeing around either. So for this ride, I give it five stars.
title: Great guy!

review: I understand you need a car seat to ride Uber but why do us customers have to provide our car seat when it should be the uber company that provide car seats. It’s a inconvenience for people who have to drop their kids off to school then go to work and wait a long time to get a Uber to be told we need a car seat. Over uber provide car seats so people don’t have to walk around with a car seat at work or any place they go.
title: Car seats

review: On my 2 most recent rides (one was a courtesy from Toyota of San Bernardino), drivers were sent to incorrect addresses. Not sure why this is happening. Didn’t have this issue previously. My address is on Maps (iphone), Mapquest and other driving apps so I don’t understand why Uber drivers are being sent elsewhere.
title: Sending drivers to incorrect addresses

review:
Twice you send text I had credit for $5.00 because driver didn’t check my food. 
Secondly another driver was over ten minutes late because your gps doesn’t work properly which I and the driver cancelled. You claim to have not charge me but you did! Several times I’ve been charged over due to your terrible GPS. I plan on writing the governor and transportation in Washington. The worst I was injured in an Uber accident and you didn’t have coverage. I’ll be sending all this to the transportation department in DC.
title: Over charges

review: It’s actually a pleasure to walk around San Francisco now because you don’t have to worry about getting the cab. It used to be such a hassle and you’ll get stranded in certain places even if you called a taxi they would never arrive. I am so grateful for Uber you make going to San Francisco such a pleasure.
title: Necessary for San Francisco

review: I’ve been waiting on this corner almost an hour trying to get an Uber. Every time I input my information it rejects the method of payment already authorized and requests another form of payment. Is this a scam? The first time using this to get to a destination was fine. Now I cannot return because of this recurring issue. How do you call someone at Uber to straighten this out?
title: Fails to maintain source of payment

review:
David was very polite and caring. Me and my 7 year old felt very comfortable and safe. His vehicle was very clean just perfect especially with the christian music David had on made me feel at peace. 
I thank god for allowing David to be my driver and allowing him to pray for me and my child. May god bless you David and may god continue using you in many ways 🫶🙌🙏
title: Great Uber Driver

review: Uber eats and Postmates are terrific services. However, if you live in Miami don’t ever get into an Uber or ride sharing service. Lyft you get lucky from time to time. Uber in Miami consists of NO ONE who speaks English, unsafe drivers, and crazy enough the person you wait for sometimes isn’t the person you get which is a main reason why it gets 1 star. They don’t do anything for screening. Horrible ride sharing service. CHOOSE LYFT and pay like the extra couple of bucks. They’ll even get you there on time.
title: Uber has the worst people to drive

review: I was a bit confused at the airport, and instead of making me find her, she told me to stay put and she came and found me. She was extremely personal the entire drive, which made me so comfortable, and honestly felt like someone I could’ve gone and had dinner and drinks with if I wasn’t headed to a conference!
title: Best Uber Driver

review: We requested a driver, he was 5 minutes away, he drove all over and never picked us up. He was by us many times. We called him and he didn’t answer his phone calls at all. We canceled. Called another Uber driver, he got there in a jiffy and was further away than the other driver. Makes no sense. Don’t think he wanted the money take.????
title: Uber Driver Ignores

review:
Jaime picked me up from the ER 
I was humbled and ashamed to call my family The moment he arrived he was like an Angel sent from Heaven, he was caring, thoughtful soft spoken, Loving and respectful. 
By far the most comfortable Driver I’ve had on the Application. Truly a pleasure and blessed to have him drive me back to safety 
I am forever grateful and will not forget my experience. Thank U!
title: An Angel

review: Customer service was superb. He opened the door for me when he arrived to pick me up & when he dropped me off. Such a gentleman. It was my very 1st time in a Tesla and it was a wonderful 1st time experience. Thank you Jungmin! I appreciate you for the experience and for getting me home safely in this rainy weather. Be safe out there! 🙏🏽
title: Jungmin is the “MAN!”

review: It was a pleasure driving with Fredrick today. The conversation that we had was engaging and made my ride so much more enjoyable. He is a true gentleman and i would highly recommend Fredrick to anyone needing an uber ride. He has shown me that there really are good people out there in this crazy world that we all live in now!
title: Driver

review: Thomas was an excellent driver and very kind. He put our suitcases in the trunk opened the car doors for us and he had on Christian music which we really appreciated. He was very conversational & when we got home he unloaded our suitcases and carried them to the front door & waited to make sure we got in the house.
title: Fantastic Service

review: Dennis came early for me to take my time got me to my doctors office early for my appointment. He’s an intelligent man and was a pleasure to speak with I enjoyed my morning. I’d like him to pick me up as I’ve established a 12 hour pick up today 12 o’clock pick up at dr Wilk. Same drop off address. Dennis thank you if you see this!!-Howard
title: Great job. Dennis is the best.

review: This is not about the driver who picked me up but rather the driver who didn’t. 1sr driver was within 5 minutes of picking us up when he missed a turn (or did not know the turn). He then entered the LAX maze where he became lost and confused and canceled the ride. This is not the first time where a 5 minute wait turns into 15 minutes. Frustrating and disappointing
title: LAX Delays

review:
I’m extremely pleased with my Uber driver, Mario. Oh I accidentally left my car keys in the back of his car and did not realize it. When I contacted Uber and they contacted me, he texted me and said he would deliver the keys. He was over an hour away and yet still took the time to bring them to me. 

bravo Uber, bravo Mario
title: Great Uber experience

review: My car has been down two WEEKS so I was forced to use this service I had no other options 😅 I’m beyond unhappy with the service I pay 30$ for a ride everyday for Uber drivers to come 30mins 40mins10 15mins after the time , to watch them drive  in circles 🫣🫠I live in Florida 😌🫰🏼🌴so the traffic is not so friendly today will be MY last day using this app hope this is helpful also the drivers complain a lot also about low pay not my place 🐘 to hear them vent 🫵🏽Uber are wrong ✌🏼
title: This is an outrage

review: It’s great to have the option to give my teenager access to my account but I have no way of seeing her trips before, after, or during her trip unless I click on the notification. If the notification disappears so does access to her trip history and viewing her ride. Seems like this should be an easy fix and very frustrating that it isn’t. Disconnecting her usage until you can figure this out
title: Shared account visibility non existent

review: Every time I try to order an Uber and try to pay it tells me to choose another payment method than the credit cards linked to my account. I’ve tried contacting customer service and instead my account was deactivated. My account was hacked originally and instead of fixing the problem they took the easier way out of deactivating the account rather than confirming that the actual customer has regained control of the account.
title: Will not allow credit card payment

review:
Amazing customer service, very patient & kind
I had 2 small children with me & he was very understanding that they were tired & a lil fussy but overall made a conversation with the kids & it was a smooth ride! Thank you for your kindness we need a lot more drivers like you David‼️🙂
title: Wonderful customer service‼️

review: My driver Williesha from IL changed my view of Uber.  Before, I didn’t like the ride Service but she was tip top professional and made my ride perfect.  Someone from Uber needs to look into how she conveys a positive customer service attitude and makes all of Uber look good.  I wish I could request her each time.  Thank you Williesha!
title: Mr Paul

review: We have two people in our group that often get car sick, however this driving was amazing and neither of us got sick! He answered every question we had. Loaded our bags, waited for our bags to even though it took a while for us to get him. Very friendly and polite.
title: Amazing!!!

review: A simple trip from Walmart to my house with my little girl and he was one of the most unbelievable angels I’ve ever met in my life. The blessing that he bestowed upon my family will remain confidential, but the only thing I will say is his wisdom is priceless and he is the kindest, most amazing stranger. I think I’ve ever met in 40 years.
title: Mark on January 1, 2023

review: The app usually works well, however I was charged for a ride that didn’t show up but indicated that I had been picked up and dropped off when actually the ride was cancelled and I was automatically picked up by another driver and dropped off.  The timing was so short it’s impossible to be in two places at one time.  An easy fix right? Now I have to haggle with Uber to refund my money.
title: Glitch

review: I called the 303 taxi company for 12:30 AM pick up January 1, 2023 and I wasn’t told any wait time or anything. I waited until 130 and decided I had had enough.I use my Uber app and I got picked up almost immediately. I am very thankful to the driver and Uber for your quick expedient service.
title: So much better than 303 Chicago Taxi

review: Sall provided great service to my family, who were disappointed that the car rental agency closed before we were able to get our rental. He was able give us ideas of local places to eat and things to do while in Memphis.
title: Great service even on Christmas!

review: I was stranded with my children on Christmas Day thinking no one would come help since who wants to work this day.  Ronnie came to the rescue right after we messaged him our situation.  It was a very unfortunate situation that could’ve been way worse but thank God for uber and for Ronnie who picked up the job.  Thank you!!
title: Very grateful

review: Weather problems delayed our flight 5 times today and each time I had to cancel my Uber ride and schedule a new one. My credit card flagged the transactions and alerted me to potential fraud. It would have been more convenient if I could have changed the time for my pickup.
title: App should support schedule changes

review: I am a disabled father of three girls, which all three go to different schools into my health conditions I am unable to drive and we do not have a bus to take them from home to school so every day Monday through Friday Uber in the morning Uber in the afternoon it’s been like this every day since 2020 I wish Uber would provide some type of long-term deals or rewards to help benefit people like me or low income. Overall Uber has been helpful Jess wish there were more options.
title: Rewards

review:
After this last instance I had with Uber I’m done with this app. Drivers will cancel then they do a surcharge after the fact with no message or notifying from either. 

There’s no incentive to use an app that has poor customer support and do nothing but take your money with no real benefits offered. It’s dumb to match with someone that’s 20+ mins away at the prices offered. If you’re going to automate everything at least be smart about that, algorithms and everything else used that’s not human..
title: Getting rid of this app

review:
Uber was a fail. I typically use Lyft because Denzel drives for Lyft on “The equalizer 2” but my employer sent me an Uber voucher for 2 free rides. I downloaded the app using google sign in. The thing said I was locked out of my account and wanted me to send a photo of my phone. Then to get to tech supper it’s only by e-mail. I am at the airport and desperate to get this to work. Shame on Uber. Crappy engineering. Lyft took 3 mins to set up. Never using Uber again. Took a taxi instead. Global travel service in Minnesota and it was awesome. 
Great service and super fast.  Don’t use Uber.
title: Fail for me

review:
It’s been weeks and my credit card is working fine every where else except for Uber where it’s not working at all!!!
This is very very frustrating. No customer service number to even call for help!!
title: Not taking my credit card

review: I decided to use Uber for the first time after dropping my car off at the mechanic. People told me it was cheaper. Ha ha ha. The app quoted a price of $43 for 4 people, so I figured it was a holding price. I was so wrong. I paid $50 for a 15 minute ride!! I wasn’t late or anything. When I logged back into the app, suddenly the prices were $15 for the same trip. A total rip off. The driver also took some odd routes and missed the exit. All I got from “customer service” was being told that was the right price. I will not use Uber again.
title: A total rip off

review: If you have an issue that is not listed on their finite list, there is no way to send a question or give feedback. I have had nothing but negative experiences. I tried Uber eats with a coupon and the coupon was never honored. I entered an exact address in an unfamiliar city and it indicated that is where I was going. Instead, I got dropped off a mile away and the receipt accurately indicates the address where I was improperly dropped off. I’ve never had these issues with other ride shares.
title: Feedback and help nonexistent

review:
Uber is the tech company I probably now hate the most. They intentionally operated at a loss for years to kill a functioning taxi industry that paid its trained employees a livable wage. Now they’ve done that, Ubers are more expensive than taxi’s ever were, their drivers are miserable, and there is no reliability whatsoever (I’m writing this after 2 cancelled pick ups nearly caused me to miss my flight - had to beg my neighbor for a ride).

The worst. Not remotely improving the planet, just using excessive wealth to squeeze and then monopolize an industry.
title: Destroyed a working industry and made it worse

review: When Waze is the chosen Nav app, my satellite radio remains active, but when Uber Nav is selected (for Uber Pool rides, whenever Uber Nav speaks, my radio goes off and I must do a 3-button quick push on my steering wheel to get it back - and many other issues. Also North button it is useless and we have to touch it every single time because it is TOO close of navigation button. Real time navigation have a delay. Uber have a lot of money to invest on good programmer but uber is soooo cheap to do that. They only love ez money…….
title: Sound issues and more.....
developerResponse: {'id': 11462766, 'body': "Hi, we are sorry to hear that you are facing such an issue with the sound.We're always looking to improve your experience with Uber and we would certainly like to know more about this. Send in a quick note to t.uber.com/drivercontact or via the in-app Help section and we'll connect.", 'modified': '2019-10-25T07:16:34Z'}

review: I scheduled a ride. The driver showed up 10 minutes before the scheduled range of arrival times. I got a message from the app that the driver would wait until the beginning of the scheduled range, but after waiting 3 minutes, he drove off, leaving me to wait in the cold for another driver. Obviously he believed I was late. Seems like Uber should make sure it’s drivers know the scheduled pickup time.
title: Scheduling a Ride Error

review: I redeem my points to get 20% off an ride on Uber and after I did it, the price only change to an dollar higher. On top of that, these Uber drivers not paying attention and going on different directions which can make me late to where I wanted to go. I shouldn’t be paying so much for an ride just to have Uber drivers not follow the right map and for Uber to not use my points correctly. Fix your issues!!! And your drivers
title: Lies and Uber drivers

review:
Busier than usual so fares are higher, which makes sense, but if I request a ride and cancel and do that 5 times in a row, all 5 of those drivers are not busy ???? 

Another terrible part is penalizing me for canceling by not allowing me to request. I NEED TO GET TO WORK, telling me I’m unable to request a ride is an absolute horrible mechanic.

The Uber Help situation is also the worst imaginable. I was told $11 but my ending fare was $18??? Because of fees and a route that didn’t need to be as long as it was, so I ask Uber for help but they do absolutely nothing to review or revise.
title: Terrible

review: Get ready non legitimate fees on every ride. You can be there when a driver pulls up and you will always get charged a wait fee. You will $16 reservation fees that aren’t included in the upfront price. I have had multiple drivers pull out in front of on coming traffic and almost kill us. I asked for a refund of our ride when our driver pulled out in front of a semi truck a mile from our house and we got out and walked home missing our event. Uber said we will not refund your trip. Terrible customer service. Just bad
title: Headaches

review:
Please Uber reduce the prices on your rides , I only make $16 a hour , I would like to use Uber more to travel to and from work if it was less expensive, please reconsider. Please Reduce your prices $17-18 a ride everyday is expensive sometimes it even more , Not Happy If a ride is less then 20 minutes. No reason it should be $17 plus dollars that’s ridiculous I’m sure , if you lower the prices , more people will use the Uber service Also I tip All my Uber Drivers so why isn’t my riders stars increasing ?

My first ride was $8 , I had to make another stop not far away , it add to $27 plus change 

Unless Uber reduce its rider rates for rides

I’m not riding with Uber , they rip you off 

And I tip all my Uber drivers at least 2 message thanks teach your drivers when they receive any tips to reach out of courtesy to say thank you
Seriously 😕
title: Please lower the prices

review: One of the most unreliable apps you will ever use. Do not use Uber if you are trying to be on time, they will charge you high rates with low trip times then once you are already paying and committed to the ride, they allow drivers to cancel and now you are late AND STILL paying for the promised ride time. There is no way to get in contact with Customer services because they know how terrible it would be. Uber has been in a downward spiral for years but it is very evident that they do not want to get better.
title: Trash app

review: Used to be a simple straight forward app. Now they’ve shoved so many services into it that it’s generally impossible to do the things that uses to be easy… such as check on your scheduled rides. Now you have to go to a web page to check on rides past and future.. very nostalgic of 2004. Separate your apps as it’s now just easier to wait for a taxi.
title: Trying to do too much

review: I had to take an Uber to get to work the other morning and after getting my quote showing the trip would cost about 25 bucks I figured it wasn’t too big of a deal. The ride was about ten minutes and had zero issues. I thought nothing of it until later on when I received a notification showing me Uber tried charging me 150 dollars as an adjusted rate for the 10 minute ride. That’s absolutely ridiculous. The same ride on public transportation would have cost me 3.25
title: Uber is a hustler

review: Great drivers. However the GPS for the app is not great lately. Last week I would put in one address and the app kept changing it. Today I placed the pin to pick me up at my office and it sent the driver 4 offices down. Can someone please fix this. If not, Lyft here I come.
title: Why can’t he app not get directions right

review: I absolutely hate Uber. If I could give it negative five stars I would. Their algorithm is predatory and frustrating. I’ve literally watched the advertised fare go from $36 to $90 right in front of me as I was going to book a ride. And this crap happens all the time. The rates fluctuate so much that it should be illegal to inflate prices to such a degree. I hope Uber goes bankrupt and becomes obsolete. Also, they need to make their drivers actual employees instead of independent contractors and shirking responsibilities for benefits. Whoever runs Uber is literal trash. Greedy scum.
title: I HATE UBER!!!!!

review: Why am I being charged for a cancellation if the driver cancelled the trip because they were unable to find me, after I repeatedly tried to explain my location? As a result of this inconvenience, I wasted time and missed any other form of transportation I could have taken. AND I got charged for it. In addition, the customer service is awful. The site itself doesn’t help with removing the cancellation fee. Please work on this, so other customers like me won’t unjustly need to pay this fee.
title: Charging customer for driver’s cancellation

review:
This app is only used because it’s basically a monopoly at the moment.  I avoid using as much as possible but sometimes I have no choice.
Your driver may or may not be coming but you are late for work so you just have to wait and see.
There is no way to contact Uber if you have an issue, so you can get stranded just about anywhere.
Cannot tip drivers, sometimes you can and sometimes you can’t because the app just decides not to work.
Can’t change destination. Oh well drop me off on the side of a road.

Almost as bad as Uber eats. Where they may or may not be preparing your food, so you call the restaurant and find out they don’t even use Uber eats. 

Honestly hilarious, can someone please create a new app or show me how?
title: Someone should create a new riding app

review:
I am in a location where uber is not offered.
I am flying to a location where I know uber is offered, and I am trying to set a pickup for when I arrive.
If I set a location just for pick up, I can’t set a time.

The intended way is to set a pickup time, then click the current path to change it. However, because I’m not in a location that has uber, there is no start or end location, and I am *unable* to set the path I want in a different location, which I know is valid. I am therefore unable to schedule the pickup I need. 

This is extremely frustrating, and unintuitive, and I am forced onto another service app. 

My personal change would be to allow a user to set pickup time, start, and end location, *before* trying to initiate any pathfinding or service availability services.
title: QA test. Can’t set time & drive path

review: I’ve been using this application for a long time. Though the problem appeared in the end of December. I can’t plan the trips for several days ahead, I can’t make more than 1 reservation a day . I’m a regular customer I’ve been using your service for more than a year, making 2 trips per day. Though now I’m having big troubles with reserving. That’s why now I’m giving you only two stars. Once the problem is fixed I’ll return five starred assessment
title: Trobles with making several reservations ahead

review: I really am not one to write app reviews but the customer service associated with the uber app has been a nightmare. I have been trying to get an issue resolved that stemmed from an error with their app redeeming uber cash from uber credit card rewards. They just continuously send the same automated messages and they tried to mark my issue as resolved multiple times without ever doing anything about it. On top of it all I am an uber gold member so this is allegedly their “priority support”. Really the worst customer service I have ever dealt with.
title: Worst customer service of all time

review:
Had not used the Uber app in a handful of years- and only once back then. The app easily updated and was EASY to use! (I am not ‘intuitive’ as per tech- so it’s REALLY EASY.)

My driver, Patrick, was helpful, friendly, made me feel SAFE (as a Sr woman), and played wonderfully relaxing tunes! He’s in San Diego for only 3yrs, from Brazil originally. He’s living his dream!💕👍🥳
title: SHORT TRIP

review: If you ride Uber often you may have noticed they have started bate and switch. They show you a low price then end up changing your fare to significantly higher right before you accept. This is infuriating, like buying a car from a crooked used car dealership. Be honest, tell the truth, and let your service speak for itself. This unbridled greed and collapse of our moral fabric of society is destroying us. I will choose other options when possible for my rides until Uber decides that integrity matters.
title: Bate and Switch

review:
I travel for a living and use Uber in a jam personally and for business. I love everything about it.  I only wish they had MORE wheelchair accessible accommodations for when I’m
Travel with friends with varying access needs. 🤔 Besides that! A++ For this travel bunny 💕
title: The quick and easy!

review: Most features work as expected in the app. But with ride fraud on the rise in my community, I went to enable pin verification. The app crashes every time. This setting can only be configured in the app- that crashes. There’s no contact form for reporting, so this unfortunately has to be the forum to post in, as the app developers see it.
title: Great App, but some bugs to work on

review:
As a note to other Uber drivers, a clean car, and a personable driver equals a cash big tip. 
     Our latest driver was amazingly pleasant,  friendly, courteous, prompt!!, and polite. If there was someway, we could request his carriage every time we took an Uber,  we probably would sell our car!
title: Clean car, nice driver

review: I want to use Uber but wait times became extremely long and once I get a driver they cancel. This happed many times and many different locations that’s why I decided to write. I live in downtown, it is not a remote location and I had to wait 20mins today yet Uber couldn’t find a ride. Same for getting Uber to or from airport extremely long waits, cancels. Uber makes me use Lyft, I guess it’s the last thing they wanted but Uber helps Lyft to gain market share right now! Good Job…
title: Extremely long wait times in Dwntwn and Airport Locations

review: I remember when riding Uber was advantageous. It was better to call Uber this a taxi, but those days are no longer. The driver got 17$ from the 45$ ride and 40 minute drive. Gas is 6$ a gallon so it just cost him more money to drive than he just made. It just doesn’t make sense. It’s cheaper to get taxis, and the driver is able to make more from the ride. Doesn’t make sense to take advantage of people just trying to make ends meet. Me paying 44$ to the airport was just insane and extremely disappointing.
title: No longer a convenience

review: The Uber drivers are nice and helpful, others not so much. However, as much as I spend on rides, it would be nice to get some free rides here and there!! And it would be very customer service like if there’s an actual 1(800) phone number where you can call and speak to a customer service representative (an actual human being) if and when you have a issue and not get ran around the system and not get any resolution. Also, you get a rate for a ride of $6/$7 to $10 then get charged $14/$18 to $20! Totally very deceiving!!
title: Uber

review: Today was my first time ever using an Uber and I was nervous. I was lucky enough to have been picked up by Eric who kept the conversation going and helped me to feel comfortable the whole way home! I would not hesitate to use an Uber again for sure. thank you so much, Eric and thank you Uber.
title: My first Uber trip

review: Not sure maybe too many options on the app. Used to take Uber more in the past, but for some reason the app will not recognize my home address as a pick up location considering we are living in a populated area. Technical support is worthless since you can’t get anyone on the phone so ended up texting, they were suppose to gat back to me put didn’t. Lyft worked fine, no issues. That being said so far works in Hawaii.
title: Good

review: I ordered an Uber for 18 bucks. Drivers just kept not taking my route. I finally reset the app and found an Uber or so I thought. It literally drove 2blocks and stopped. He said this is your destination. I said no it’s not. He said this is it. I’m done. So I got out and tried to contact customer support and they said it was valid. $18 for 2 blocks??? Even though my history shows I tried MULTPLE times to go to a different address at that same time. A 2min car ride cost me money and they refuse to assist. I’m going to Lyft.
title: Ubers Glitch is my financial loss

review: I did not catch his last name but tony picked me up at the hospital in LR all the way to Cabot, we had great conversation although I was in pain, I was in a wreck earlier and broke my back and he offered to help me up the stairs once we got here but Tony is a great guy. If you’re in Little Rock and need a Uber. Holler at Tony!!!!! I even tipped him twice he was so good
title: Driver review

review: I don’t always receive this level of service but this one time I got a very nice Mercedes white SUV and for a low price from the Airport (was most likely due to my red eye flight). The driver helped me w putting my luggage in and out and was very friendly even at 6AM. I drove for Uber once so now I understand both sides.
title: Luxury SUV in white

review: My first time time to San Juan PR took a u we from the airport to our air bnb and couldn’t find the air bnb bryon in a silver Kia spot drove us around and didn’t want to leave us omg i finally told him to go ahead even though I knew he didn’t I just want to shout him out we found the Airbnb two hours later
title: Over and beyond

review:
More than above and beyond, he was a good conversationalist. He was a polite driver in traffic. Ten stars,he saved my phone.I wasn’t not head and left it in his car, and as soon as he picked up on it, he returned it post taste. 
     If everyone on earth was like him, it would be a perfect world. Thank you so very much.
title: Saved my Cellphone.

review: Chuda had the warmest smile and personality. He helped us with our luggage and when I left my phone in the car he answered immediately and delivered my phone right by home. He is a gem and I hope Uber takes the time to recognize him. He is an exceptional worker and human being. Thank you Chuda!!
title: Chuda is the sweetest driver in the world!!

review: A driver i had that was 10 minutes away dropped the ride with no reasoning & i had to wait forever to get another ride … just for it to be 21 minutes.. & they have charged me fee before for dropping rides but ive had to wait over an hour just for someone to actually get to me without dropping the ride & i get nothing.. yea i get my money back just to have to pay more because for some reason the rides have gone up.. on a tuesday afternoon.. where it is so dead where i stay …
title: i actually hate this app

review: Often i have an issue with Uber. I wait and wait for someone to accept my ride, when I finally give up, I try to cancel and it won’t let me, even though it’s still searching for a driver to accept my ride request. Then I get hit with a $5+ fee when I’m in a cab, having tried to cancel 6 times without success.  I should have taken a cab from the start. The app seems programmed to take your money even when it can’t provide you with adequate service.
title: Often a bad experience

review: Charging my card for a Uber pass for the first time ever for something that was a monthly subscription . It’s no longer a subscription option they were cancelled in 2021. I don’t use any of my Uber accounts ( last time I got a ride and only time was in 2018 ). Conveniently when contacting Uber support they are not able to handle it and just pass me along to someone else and they email me in a couple days. Which of course they never actually contact anyone back. Trash company. Trash service. Just Trash.
title: Scammers

review: I’ve had a few weird interactions with drivers on this app as well as with food delivery people on Uber eats. Sometimes they aren’t the same person as their profile indicates when they show up. Other times they cancel which is really inconvenient and there’s no easy way to get through to customer service for help. Sometimes they are downright strange to interact with or I feel unsafe in the car because it’s falling apart. I really don’t like using this app at all.
title: Uncomfortable Interactions and No Customer Service

review: I live on a military post and my last ride had to switch to five different drivers because the route Uber was making them take, took them to a part of post where they weren’t allowed to go to and they got stuck there for at least an hour just to switch to another driver for them to do the same thing.
title: Need to update the map directions

review: Richard was amazing! I just had a hip replacement two days ago and he was extremely patient with me trying to get into his vehicle with my mobility issues at the moment. As a matter of fact, I forgot my phone on his dashboard and just realized it when he walked into the church with it for me! I give him 1000% review!!!
title: Great

review: I experience semi-frequent issues with the app crashing or otherwise glitching while placing orders/requesting rides. What’s worse is that when I experience these issues and contact Uber Support, I receive no assistance and the “support agent” ends the chat without actually answering my questions. If employees have to operate off of some type of script to provide support and can’t deviate from that script to answer user questions, what’s the point of the service?
title: Unhelpful and glitchy

review: I was coming from JFK airport and the first Uber driver I assumed got lost and couldn’t navigate his way to me and I almost panicked because I had to get to Manhattan to catch a specific train. The next Uber driver Jose showed up in 7 minutes and as I write this review I am happy to report I made my train! Thank you Jose!
title: Made my train

review:
After picking up our luggage at the carousel, I notified Uber on the app that we were ready to be picked up at JFK. Our driver was there in literally 3 minutes. The drive home was smooth and a relief after a long travel day in/from Italy. 
A really great experience with Uber!
title: Uber is dependable & we had a great ride from JFK!

review:
First Uber App said my rider was going to pick me up in 4 minutes. Then, a few seconds later when I confirmed my ride, the pick up time when up to 13 minutes…. 
Fortunately the new driver pick it up quick,
But it was an inconvenience the extended waited time. 
It is not the first time that has happened.
title: Change in pick up time

review:
I accidentally dropped my phone on the floor when I got to the airport. I couldn’t check in without it. I was panicking because I have surgery in 3 days at Hopkins & my phone had all the info. 

 This wonderful Uber driver realized my phone was in the car, turned around & came into the airport to find me. He had given it to some cleaning ladies. After the TSA supervisor (Jennifer) found them it was recovered. If my phone had not been found they would of had to rescheduled my surgery to July!! 

 I’m a Colon Cancer Survivor with a number of issues, this young man went over & above to help me. He’s renewed my faith in mankind! 💕

Donna Daniels
title: Rider

review: This was my first Uber experience, and i was leery. After spending twelve hours at Fll airport and all flights were grounded, I thought it best to take a chance. I am so glad i did! My driver was so pleasant and made the ride most enjoyable! He was so helpful with my bags, prompt, and made me a believer in UBER! I will be a customer for life now!
title: First Uber Driver

review: It’s ridiculous so I ordered on here and out of nowhere it’s says my driver is making a stop along there way and that my ETA will be 20mins! Why on earth would I want to wait 20mins for fast food, that will get cold by the time I get my order and customer service didn’t help at all I felt like I was needing to cancel because why would I want cold food ? Would you!?  The lack of transparency that my driver had a order to do before mines I wouldn’t have ordered at all.. so no refund I got from customer support!
title: Terrible Uber eats customer service

review: Had a driver named Edwin accept the trip then canceled it when he was 7 miles away.  At 4:50 am I was worried about getting another ride in time to make my flight.  Uber found a great driver who was only 14 minutes late from my original pickup time.  Made flight with ease.  Thank you Uber and Bart.
title: Great job!

review: I wanted to report an issue with the map because when getting an Uber to my house it sends them to the exit which has tire puncture spikes and on two occasions they almost went through. The app is really good for reporting the driver, but not issues with the app to tell them about this issue. Otherwise great app!
title: Mapping issues / reporting issue

review:
They now only accept credit and debit card . When I was about to confirm pickup request they were asking payment method as debit or credit . 
Why did they take off the cash payment option ? 
I was in trouble and I needed ride but their payment method is now only for those who have debit and credit card not for those who want to pay in cash .
title: Payment Method Issues

review: First of all, he stood out from all the rest with his kindness. A once in a year “date night” was ended with a sweet conversation with our Uber driver, in which we found out he is a veteran, flies planes and is just the nicest person we have ever met. Thank you for your service and a very nice end to a great evening.
title: Wonderful gentleman

review: We’ve had a few generally positive rides, and one horrible one. Our driver never showed up and we still got charged. Uber claims they still need to pay for their drivers time even if they abandon the ride. He stopped responding to messages and would not answer calls. Ridiculous that I was forced to pay for a ride that never happened, and then pay again for the replacement driver. Next time I’ll just be taking a taxi.
title: Hit or Miss

review: We definitely did. Raymond was talkative and friendly. He went well beyond his job description of getting us from point a to point B. He made a tough situation with our vehicle into a good experience hanging out with all my God a good down to earth person. Ramen appreciate you have a good one. You did what
title: Everybody loves Raymond

review:
Dalvys, was amazing, my car wouldn’t start and at first I thought it was an issue with the key with the battery so we drove to batteries plus and then we went back. Then he saw that my car wouldn’t start and he jumped the car.

I can’t thank him enough for all that he’s done.
title: Top Notch

review: Eventually got the app to work after installing on my new Apple phone but it took 2 of us to figure out that the destination address had to be typed in rather than allow me to use the auto fill. This was the biggest of a couple issues that made the initial use of the app less friendly.
title: App difficulties

review:
I was having a very hard time finding a ride to my pet friendly hotel. There weren’t any Uber Pets available. So, I booked a regular ride with Christina. I explained my situation and asked her if I could bring my dog along. She assured me she loves dogs. 
It was a great experience and a great ride. 
Thanks, Christina!  You’re the best!!!
title: Broke down trucker in need of a ride

review: Driver was very courteous and respectful. It has been a long time since having such a driver  Lately driver are driving dirty cars. constantly on phone and no obeying basic driving rules.  There needs to be someone checking the conditions of the vehicles.  Cracked windows, children tops and dog hair has become the new norm.
title: Excellent advice

review: I am unable to drive because of a fractured R wrist. After 2 weeks of taking cabs and only having 2 nice drivers I switched to Uber. Am I glad I did. Being driven around by polite, safe drivers in nice smelling cars makes me wonder why I took so long to switch. I will recommend Uber to everyone I know.
title: Tired of cabs

review:
Daryush the great. You’re my king of uber drivers of the year. My wife and I visited beautiful laquna beach Californian to see our children and family.
And today was returned to our home in Dallas Texas. We used Uber and here was a young handsome driver Daryus the great arrived in prompt
Time. He was pleasant, curtesy .sociable. we chat all away to John Wayne airport. Thank you Darius.
Mark Masoud Modares
title: Promos time arrived.

review: I appreciate her early availability. I request a ride at 3:50am from Uber and Lyft, Balwinder was the only driver out at the time in my area. Friendly driver! The service was awesome. I’d like to thank her for the early morning long drive. I was too hammered to drive myself home and she got me home safely! I hope to get her again as a driver
title: Balwinder the early bird

review: Both of our rides first with John, and then returning home with Carl were excellent Uber rides. Courteous, safe, driving, and interesting conversation summarized each leg of our evening out and back. Thank you Uber drivers for keeping us safe. Will definitely ride again with Uber.
title: How could it be better?

review: It was lovely being able to relax and let somebody else drive us through  the rain and wind of a horrible day in Northern California. Iquana was so friendly, and we had such a pleasant conversation that we were at our destination before we knew it. One of the best Uber drivers I’ve ever had.
title: So pleasant

review: My driver Imal arrived early. He drives safely, is nice, friendly, a good conversationalist, and gives good customer service. I would book him again if there’s a way to request a specific driver. I got to my appointment just in time (which also depends on traffic in the area). If you’re in the DMV - that’s DC, Maryland and (Northern) VA- I recommend Imal.
title: 1st Time using Uber in the DMV

review: I live in West Palm Beach, FL.  Since COVID began every time we order an Uber we have atleast one driver cancel on us before he/she arrives.  This has meant that we cannot rely on Uber as a service and have started using it less frequently.  Additionally, I have not found a way to leave a negative rating for a driver that cancels, wastes your time and causes you to be late.  Obviously we are in a tight labor market, but Uber needs to find a way to make their service more reliable and to allow customers to rate drivers based on reliability.
title: Frequent Cancellations

review: Now as we all know, everyone is different and because of this each interaction will be different. Today is my first time using the app and the experience was very pleasant! My particular driver is not only sociable, but personable as well. I felt like I was riding with a friend of long time. This was a rare occasion, but was good!
title: Clarity!

review: I would like the option to set two pickups and one drop off. Earlier than same day. If I am going to the airport and communicating with someone from a different address. I would like the option to set that up the night before. Not the day of.
title: Options

review: Flew into Jacksonville with no checked luggage and immediately requested an Uber. The rate seemed high, but it was Friday evening. Confirmed a price of $53, then kept waiting until finally after maybe 10 minutes it said no rides are available please check later. So I immediately requested for the same trip and the price went up to over $82. Extremely disappointing. I normally use Uber in Latam and I’ve never had a problem like this.
title: Confirmed rated then raised in more 50%

review: Due to health reasons my license was revoked. Thank god for UBER. I like to talk to the diverse drivers and have always looked forward to that. My only complaint is that some drivers smoke in their cars and my hair smells like I just got home from a club. I’ve had to wash my hair twice. Other than that everyone’s been great 😊
title: Drivers License Revoked

review: We requested a car that should have been large enough to carry 6 passengers because we were a party of 5. The car that came had only 4 available seats but with room for more luggage. The app needs to allow you to specify number of passengers as an option so customers don’t waste time with a car that doesn’t work for the ride!
title: Uber XL with 5 passengers didn’t work for us

review: I had rated the driver 4 stars, which was a fair rating. It app wouldn’t let me close it unless I reported an issue. I did want to tip, and almost avoided the tip when the app wouldn’t let me close until I gave the driver 5 stars. This lands on me like you are trying to artificially boost the ratings for the drivers. Not cool!
title: Can’t close the rating if there are less than 5 stars

review: I am a user of yours for years in the Dominican Republic and I ask you to intervene Dominican uber, illegal things are being done that go against their rules, the drivers leave the trips open so that the user pays a separate cancellation when one rides with them, they force you to pay another amount to the user or else they kidnap him and do not let you out and if you are going to pay with a card they will cancel the trip I have 4.92 with you and I think I will be one less user of your application
title: Dominican Republic Please!

review: I live in a small town. I checked Uber last night to see if we had service here. There was not. This morning I wanted to check again, I was required to update the app. I updated. I went through the process of seeing if there was an Uber available in my small town (about 5,000 in population but on a major U.S. Highway). The app tried to charge my credit card and didn’t give me any indication as to whether or not I would have a driver pick me up. I canceled out and now I’m checking LYFT.
title: Update was a backward move

review: I’m not sure why, but for some reason my Uber application is in Spanish and English. I do not speak Spanish and I’m unable to translate. In addition, I cannot find any type of contact information to report and resolve my issue. Who do you speak with? Who do you contact to resolve my issue?
title: Need help

review: Most of the time when I pay the extra $5 for tolls, the driver avoids them anyway and I’m still charged the same. For priority pickup, it will usually add time once the driver is confirmed, making the pickup time just as long as a normal priced ride, but you are still charged.
title: Never pay for tolls/priority pickup

review:
I had an appointment, I ordered an uber drive, when I arrived and get off the car I turned back to get my paper(for my appointment )and he was gone, I tried to contact with him no respond, talked with the Uber agent, they just don’t care about they are happy that you lost item in the car so they will make money and get advantage of your situation, don’t relays on Uber for your appointment or jobs, they don’t care about you l, and this is  my personal dealings with Uber!!! 

I hate Uber never will use it again
title: They just don’t care about you

review: I have been experiencing technical difficulties with my app for over a week and no one has responded so tried to help me. Also, every time I request a ride the app says,  “There was an error processing your request and etc.” I personally don’t believe that I will ever use this app again. Uber’s support team takes to long to resolve ongoing issues and don’t reply as quickly as they should. If your looking for a app to use when your trying to get some where, do not use Uber! I repeat, “Do Not Use Uber.”
title: Poor Support Team 👎

review: My last trip I paid the driver 200 taka in cash and my fare was 161 taka so needed 40 taka change. The driver didn’t have any change so I brought change from a shop nearby and paid him IN FULL. Now I see that the driver reported I didn’t pay him which is absolutely wrong and Uber is asking me to pay the due on my next trip. This is absurd. I am a very old user of the app. Resolve the issue !! There is no reason for me to not pay the driver !! He reported wrong or is just willing to get some extra !!
title: Paying twice

review:
I recently changed phone numbers, and it’s not like Uber was particularly good, as a customer or driver well prior to this particular moment.

So there’s zero resources to migrate an account, and even when you set up an account with a different (valid) debit card, and or (valid) credit card- it’s a seemingly endless nightmare of problems, which is always fun to discover- on a night out on the town! 

I hear you folks have like 18 months of runway left. Well- V1 has been called. Them trees are tall.
title: Just a completely haywire experience

review: There is fees added on that are not included is their quote….. booking fee, wait fee, long distant fee and others. With this being said we felt we still saved money then paying the parking fee at the event center. Please, do not stiff your driver on their tip because of the additional fees you see- it is NOT their doing. A good driver deserves appropriate tip. Both drivers we had were outstanding hard working people!
title: Quote is low, beware!

review:
I am usually pleased with Uber service. Today, however, I had to cross the street to get in the car, there was no message that the car was there, and then I was dropped off at the wrong location. 
I walk with a cane and I was in pain by the time I got to the party one block away from drop off. 

For the return home/the driver got lost and the time for pickup went from 6 to 15 minutes. Despite being far from my gps pickup spot, the driver kept calling and saying he’d arrived.

I was forced to accept a fee for cancelling. 
The subsequent driver had no problem finding me. 

I object to paying a cancellation fee for a lost driver. 

There is no way to contact Uber with this dispute. 

I hope this is not a trend.
title: Lost drivers

review:
Oftentimes when you book a ride, the driver will not move from their current location because they want another rider.

You have no choice in this situation but to cancel the trip and be charged a $6 cancellation fee.

It is currently impossible to recover this cancellation fee because when you try to do so, the app does not allow you to select and proceed with the trip in question. When you try to dispute it on Uber’s website, you are always led to an error 404 page.
title: Will try to steal extra money

review: Drivers accept pickups but most use multiple Uber/Lyft accounts. If someone is closer they will cancel your ride without notice for the closer call. Uber gave me $5 credit because 3 drivers accept and canceled my trip in one night. I have a 5 star rating and always over tip. I saw a driver with SIX phones and he accepted every request while I was still in the car and then canceled the 5 that were further from my drop off location. If you MUST be somewhere call a cab and give a local business a boost.
title: Not reliable.

review: Overall the service is good but when drivers cancel it is kinda of irritating because drivers can be a few minutes away from picking me up and just out of nowhere cancel and then I end up with a driver who is over 10 minutes away from where I am and then have end up waiting longer but other than that it’s a great service
title: Driver cancellation

review: Zero real customer support for riders. When they made duplicate charges to my credit card there was no way for me to reach customer service except via email having to wait 24 hours for each message response where they continuously ignored the actual issue of duplicate charges and tried to claim it was about the tip (it was not) and that it therefore couldn’t be refunded because it is released to drivers. LOL don’t blame the drivers for your fraudulent charges and trash customer service. Absolute trash
title: Absolute trash

review: Could not reach an Uber Rep to report my 16 yo opened an account and was ordering rides. Tried reporting this so they can close the account but there are no humans to reach and automated chats do not understand the issue written. Then it sends me to another chat service for me to spend a refundable dollar to use this higher chat service! So Ridiculous why can’t you afford a real help desk with real people like most other service businesses! Have never used Uber and Will Never ever use Uber !
title: Uber needs better chat service & age verification process

review:
I’ve waited at my driveway for an Uber car as they say one will be there in 5 min. then they’ll say 10 min. then 20 and by then it’s an hour as I’ve watched them drive my neighborhood, by then I’ve missed my Dr appointment and I have to cancel it all. It takes months to get the Dr. appointment and it’s a waste of time money and energy.  Also I’ll be fined by Uber for canceling a ride.  This is unfair and poor business practice.  It’s happened several times or more to me.  Doctors don’t wait.
 This is the first time I’ve written a report.
title: Uber merry go round.

review: In order to really utilize the app you need to enable notifications but the app spams you. I got a notification that literally told me to tap the app to start my next trip. Out of nowhere I got this notification. I’ve used Uber before, I know how it works. The app is simply begging for attention. I’m sorry Uber but you are a tool. When I need the tool I will use the tool. The tool should not beg to be used when it is not needed. I am deleting the app. I don’t need this.
title: Spammy notifications

review: I ordered a meal and it came to me with no soup in the cup only in the bag provided an my sandwich was a mess. The driver failed to even bring me the food but instead made me go get the food..( which normally wouldn’t be an issue if I wasn’t at work an can’t even leave my job for a moment) tried to contact Uber an they claimed to have answered me but I never got a email or nothing. So I wasted my money on a service that fails to do a job… no refund nothing just silence.
title: Horrible service

review:
Uber dominance in the ride app is clear, it works great until you have a problem.    

My driver failed to show up 15 days ago and since then the app is locked up.   Uber has a very frustrating robo help chat that leads to an endless circle of tasks.  However they never actually look at your account.   I have tried everything updates, uninstalled 12 times, logged on to a different device. All with the same results.  Waiting for a ride 15 days ago that can not be canceled
title: Customer Support

review:
It appears that there is no longer a family sharing option (feature)
I tried to request a ride for another rider (my daughter) and it appears that you can’t schedule a pickup for another rider. (Bug)
Not integrated to Apple Pay so I have to manually type in credit card info (feature)
At this point would have expected the app to be more user friendly.
title: Key features missing and bugs to report

review: I don’t know how Uber is still in business. They are a complete sham. Drivers routinely accept rides and then drive around until you cancel. Uber gives NO RECOURSE for riders and then charges the riders a cancellation fee. For example: I ordered an Uber 1 hour and 39 minutes ago but it was supposed to be here in 2 minutes. Driver is refusing to come and isn’t answering calls or messages via the app. Uber has no support line for riders and does not offer us to rate or reports drivers who never show up.
title: Uber is only here for drivers, no respect for passengers

review: I had not one, not two, but three drivers cancel on me after waiting 10+ minutes for each ride, so by the time the “4th driver” (whether he planned on cancelling or not) was en route, I decided to scrap my night out. On a night where I’m trying to catch a late night ride to the bar, “unreliable” isn’t even the word. Ended up staying in and paying $ for cancelling my last “ride” (which, as mentioned, may or may not have ever arrived with no warning/compensation to me).
title: I hope you dock the drivers points for cancelling rides.
userName: Music Is Like Candy, Trash The Rappers

review: I’ve been really disappointed in Uber over the past year as I feel like they prioritize profits over safety. I’ve been riding with them since they started and it seems like the safety of their passengers is no longer a priority for them. I had a safety incident a few weeks back and sent multiple messages and asked for Uber customer support to call me. Their representatives totally blew me off and kept asking me to resubmit the same info with the same canned responses.
title: Safety Concerns

review: I am not sure if this is just me, but even when I have great service and every other app is running smoothly every time I open the app the dreadful message, “We can’t reach our network right now. Please check your connection,” pops up. I have been wanting to share my ride status with my mom for this long uber trip I am taking, but I can’t even do that because my service is “bad”. I’m living 30 minutes outside of Denver.
title: servers always down

review: My Uber has been hacked now 3 times and there’s absolutely no way to get in touch with anyone except an automated chat. I live in Florida and had my Uber hacked twice now, once in Texas, once in Illinois. One was for about $70 in charges and the other one about $160. They say there’s nothing they can do because the app was used near the location of the trip, well obviously if my account was hacked into. There’s no way of getting in touch with someone on the phone. This company is terrible and should be sued for their negligence!!
title: DO NOT USE!!!

review: I reserved a ride 1 day prior to my flight and once my Uber was close, driver stated Uber app wasn’t working and couldn’t pull the airport address. Then attempted to have me pay cash for the ride which was more than what the app had me pay. Then I was charged for the ride cancellation when the driver refused my ride. I almost missed my whole flight because there were no other drivers in the area. So I had no choice but to come out of pocket. This will be my last time riding with Uber. Not professional whatsoever.
title: Horrible service

review:
After 10 years of Uber, I’m signing off.  It’s too bad.  It’s a great idea, and in many ways, they are a great company.

They don’t however, do enough to discipline and weed out their bad drivers.  Their pool of drivers is a transient lot, to say the least, and the rating system does not always reveal the problem.  It takes very little to become and Uber driver, and less to stay one.

It’s really like playing Russian Roulette.  5/6 times, you will have a great experience.  It’s that one bad one you have to worry about.
title: 10 years of Uber

review: Just saw the video on what happened to the man being strangled. Ubers response was so pathetic and devoid of any care for their driver; more so that the person was removed from the app. It was a PR statement to act like they responded appropriately. They did not. Nothing was offered to that driver. Y’all have to compensate the dude somehow he was injured working for you. You’re responsible enough to not ignore the guy. That’s just awful and makes Uber my least favorite app on here. I will not be using Uber for my next ride back to the airport
title: They don’t care about their drivers

review: I would have left 5 stars because when I get an Uber, they’re wonderful. But lately I’ve been needing a ride to work at 8 in the morning and there are ever rides available for me. It doesn’t matter if I wake up earlier or not because even waking up an hour prior to when I need to, and searching, there still aren’t any available to me. I wanted to use this app as a reliable source to get to my job but it turns out that isn’t the case. It’s frustrating and disappointing.
title: Never available

review: I use to prefer Uber over Lyft. Now neither seem reliable in getting any rides at all. Either they boost their prices way too high just for a 10 minute trip (I'm talking 40$ just to get somewhere that usually cost 15$) as well as whenever I really need an Uber, like an urgent need cause I have no transportation they never have any drivers available. The app say anywhere at anytime, yet they need to change it to anywhere depending on the distance and anytime that isn't late night cause they really blowing minds
title: Messy Messy

review:
Nicole was the best Uber driver I have ever had, she was kind and prompt and patient with superior customer service

She deserves recognition and any financial bonuses that are available

She really helped me be positive on a difficult day and I am thankful for her today, and recommend she be recognized for that and to know she is appreciated
title: Best Uber Driver - Nicole

review: Janis was very pleasant and an excellent driver. We were impressed, as she was interesting to talk with, making our somewhat lengthy drive go smoothly. It was actually quite relaxing, as she easily negotiated the rush hour traffic. Also, her car was very comfortable. Hope to have her again sometime!
title: Joyce

review: Love getting picked up in two minutes. But renting a car from Uber is futile. Me, day of car rental: thank you for the confirmation of the car rental. This was the only car I could find. Uber: Did you fill out the background check? It was due 10 days ago. Me: What? That is weird. I never got a request for a background check… for a car rental? And, I initiated the rental five days ago. Uber: Then you cannot rent from us.
title: Good for spur of the moment but NOT car rental

review:
I am so lucky that Uber is here. I had to stop driving because of medical reasons. Sold my car. Paid my medical bills etc. 
I started taken Uber over 13 months.
I find it very convenient, very safe and the drivers treat me with respect and help when I need it.
Of course Uber is not 100% perfect.
However when it comes to needing a service and Uber is just a couple of taps on my phone. Well I find it nearly perfect. I don’t have to look any farther. My driving needs are met.
I will always respect those who have a difficult job and make it look so easy. 
Thanks for being here.
title: Customer

review: It’s OK to have a hard day at work but if someone is busy, can’t pick you up it’s OK to call a Uber ride.  I just had a peaceful ride by sitting back letting your mind to wander but if the radio was playing gentle, peaceful music to close your eyes to be relaxed with , until you arrived at your destination.
title: Relaxing ride

review: The driver was kind and considerate from the beginning of the ride. He asked how I was doing, how was my flight, and if I wanted the temperature adjusted. He also took my bag to the sidewalk in front of my home. No other driver has ever done this. He is a first class representative of the company! I would recommend him to everyone!
title: L Hood

review: I got out of his car and I didn’t realize my phone fell out of my pocket until I started working ! Then I got in touch it’s my phone by calling it from my co- workers phone and he picked up right away! And said he will bring it to me as soon as he can and he did exactly that ! 💯🤙Real Human !
title: Honest guy !!

review: I hadn’t used Uber, in years! I re-download the app and to my surprise it was SO user friendly!! I requested my ride for my co-workers and I. Kimberly showed up a few minutes early, which was greatly appreciated! She was awesome! Had a great personality and was just awesome!!! I’m so glad I chose for us to Uber to our meeting!
title: Uber to our Annual Meeting

review:
The ride with Lizardo was excellent. Clean car, safe driving, agreeable conversation. But I accidentally hit only one star . I want to give Lizardo a 5 star rating! I couldn’t find a way to correct my mistake. Please update my rating to a a 5 Star. Please let Lizardo know that I’m happy and totally satisfied with the rude. 
Thank you.
title: Ride with Lizardo:

review:
I had surgery. Went home the next day. Was told by my surgeon to come back to Emergency where that would help me control the pain better. 

So I booked a ride to the ER. Waited 20 minutes and my driver had not moved on the map, then he cancelled. I had to wait another 10 minutes for a new driver. 

The app gives me the ability to tip the driver and rate the driver, but there is no way to report the <horrible> guy who strung me along and wasted my time. While I has in serious pain and trying to get to the ER.
title: No way to contact them.

review:
Our driver was very efficient, but has the wrong license plate number. His first digit should be an 8, not 9.  
He said he has made several attempts to have it fixed on the app but to no avail. 
Please assist him in fixing his license plate number so to not raise any suspect when he picks someone up. 
  Putting in effort to support a good UBER driver. Thank you!
title: IBE

review: I need a new driver to pick me up to head to the airport at 5 AM in the morning and Shirley was there early in a good mood, uplifting positive. It was truly a blessing at that time in the morning. She is a great asset to your company and if I had to pick one driver that I would ride with exclusively for the rest of my life, it would be her. Thanks Shirley
title: Shirley the best

review: Christopher was excellent. He went above and beyond the call of duty and even got her two tacos to eat the garbage and pull the garbage can up to the garage door for us because she was too weak to do it. He was absolutely excellent.
title: Never used Uber before. How do use Uber to pick my mom up from hospital and drive her home.

review: Our driver, Levi, arrived a little early and was very kind and helpful. We enjoyed our ride to the airport & conversation with Levi. Everything went smoothly and it made our trip more relaxed. We will definitely use Uber again! The app made everything simple and effective.
title: Exceptional service

review: Am I the only being false denied if I happen to cancel a ride that’s too far ? I don’t want that person to drive 24 minutes for a 5 minute $4 profit ride. They make it look like my bank or card is the problem but they just dropped me off five min ago. I canceled the first choice and they deny me for being mindful and patient. It’s happened twice before in the past four weeks. I’ve rode with Uber 2048 times but eff me for thinking of the drivers pocket book and gas
title: Card Declined? You just took it 10’min ago…

review: This was our first time scheduling a ride with Uber. I can’t believe how easy it was! A friend told me to wait until we left the ride & went inside our destination to rate our driver & tip him. No exchange of cash was necessary. We felt safe & secure with him personally & with his driving skill.
title: So easy to set up

review: Well mannered and greeted me before I could say gd morning to him. Car was clean and air conditioner flowing. Treats and an Ipad to play games as well. Appropriate conversation during ride this Uber driver is the best I’ve rode with. Thank you for being so amazing, after such a horrible shift at work last night. Definitely recommend!!
title: Best Uber Driver Ever

review: I was a long term customer until one day they charged me twice for 1 of my rides. I contacted my bank and they told me to reach out to Uber first. I sent in screenshots with time stamps for proof. The charge was literally 1 minute apart! They told me they would not refund me though. I had to dispute it through my bank which took 7 days. My car was in the shop and I did not want to be charged twice but they still denied me of my refund that I was entitled too. I use Lyft now and have 0 complaints so far.
title: Charged Twice

review: Our Driver Dorin showed up right on time and was so nice and professional. He was so good to explain where we needed to go at the airport and dropped us off at the door we would need to enter. Thank you Dorin and Uber for making the entire experience so easy and pleasant for us.
title: Our experience was seamless

review: My 80 year old father got lost and ran out of gas 2 hours away from home. I was away on vacation, I contacted Uber and Orlando was phenomenal. He understood my dilemma, picked up my Dad, drove him home and made sure he went inside home before leaving.  He was extremely professional, caring and very sympathetic.
title: Above and Beyond Great

review: Terrible application. The service great but the application terrible. Liked the previous versions I want back my old application. I paid for that and wants that and not this freaking terrible application that occupy so much memory of my cellphone
title: Terrible application, takes so much memory of iPhone
developerResponse: {'id': 5330659, 'body': "Hi, this sounds like something we'll need to take a closer look into. Send us the details of your issue at t.uber.com/contact so we can take it further from there.", 'modified': '2018-10-02T15:57:39Z'}

review:
I logged into reserve a ride and was asked to update credit card info.  I did so & received message that change was accepted.  I then tried to reserve a ride & received a message that request was not accepted due to problem with personal info.  

So I deleted  the app, I was told that ALL if my info would be deleted - which is what I wanted.  BUT when I tried to upload again to re-join and provide current info -NOTHING WAS DELETED!!! 
It retained ALL of my personal info - which is a privacy violation!
title: UBER App Is Horrible!!!!

review:
