Requested an UberXl for 6 people. First driver showed up and could only take 5 people, send another vehicle who could only accommodate 4 people, sent another vehicle who never showed up. Finally got this last driver who was very pleasant and got us where we were going. 
More disappointing was that we were charged for each vehicle and so far only been refunded for the first one. 😞
title: Disappointed

review: My first time using Uber was with Riyad,I was so nervous that I wouldn’t know what I was doing,but Riyad was so kind,so friendly,such a good driver…because of Riyad,I will not have to call unreputable Taxi companies who are nasty,unreliable,and many times,not safe drivers…thank you for employing Riyad,and I will now be a Uber customer,Thank you, Patti Chattman
title: Positive review

review:
I decided I wanted to have a few drinks at the ATL ball game last night. So being responsible I decided to get a Uber. It cost $22 from my house to Truist Park. After the game I walked a mile away from the por and went to the mall for pick up. (The driver who took me to the park recommended it so it would be easier for the driver to pick me up and not have to deal with crowds) Uber increased its rates for the ride back to the SAME place I came from to $67!!!!! I could t believe it. 

I swear that I will NEVER utilize Uber or Uber eats again after that. What a bait and switch SCAM.
title: Over priced

review: We had a quick pickup and a very entertaining driver. Traffic was light and the driver led us quickly to our destination. This service was a replacement for our train ride, which was delayed. I would use this service again for a very reliable ride.
title: Great Transportation

review: I’m trying to wrap my head around how dropping $2 off of a $30 ride is saving me anything, especially when I’m taking ten minutes out of my way to drive back in the direction I came just to pick them up. If that was bad enough, the majority of the time, I have to them ride another 5 minutes out of my way to drop them off first. Am I missing something here?
title: Saving where??

review: Me and my friends decided to go to the club Friday night and we took a Uber there and back by the end of night we ended up getting the same driver that picked us up not only was he funny but even offered us all water and took us home safely
title: Sorry about my drunk friends

review: So it worked well but was not sure about hitting accept ride. Had another in our party Google how to use Uber and once I hit accept ride the app used my apple account to bill and send the driver. He was understanding and was parked nearby watching us getting a chuckle out of inexperience. :)
title: New to using Uber app

review:
I called for an Uber and was to be picked up by driver named Adrian, he got lost called him gave him the address again, called him twice, he never showed up. Would not answer his phone. Then charged me for canceling, what’s that about.

I got another driver who came, found where I was and drove me to the airport . His name was Sandro, very good driver.
I don’t know what happened to Adrian??
title: Bad and good experience

review: I requested a ride with Uber from hard Rock Stadium and I was lucky that the Uber driver was right there his name is Ruben a very pleasant person and he drive very well he make me feel that I was a VIP  person with a nice conversation make my ride shorter than it was Thank you Uber for having person like Ruben working in your company
title: Eduardo

review: I made an appointment the day before for a half hour trip and 15 minutes before the scheduled pickup time, she canceled. This drop off trip was for a medical procedure for which I’d be incapable of driving, so I was fairly stressed out to see cancellation. The driver who picked me up, Zakariah, was on time and got me there safely. So grateful that he picked up the ride! 🥰
title: My driver canceled 15 min before my trip.

review: Got in the vehicle with a driver that started heading in the wrong direction. I attempted to correct the situation by letting the driver know and they spoke zero English. Could not even understand that they were going in the wrong direction. I reached out to Uber and they never even responded to me. I will never use Uber again. Their business model and support system puts me in extreme danger. Beware of sending your children, girlfriends and wives. If you want them alive anyway. This is unacceptable from a major company. Boycott Uber now!!!
title: I thought I was being kidnapped.

review: I feel like some drivers will intentionally refuse going to some areas if they can’t get another passenger from that same area. Some drivers are willing to take you where you need though even if it is a slightly undesirable destination.  Short rides can be costly. I do question there cost structure at times. Drivers drive nicer vehicles. This app has been hit and miss for me.
title: Selective drivers - mix of good/bad fares

review: Uber came thru getting us home from PDX during the snow storm of February 23. Taxis weren’t serving general public but our excellent Uber driver found routes through blocked streets and freeways. Drove very responsibly through the treacherous, icy roads, and got us safely home following an arduous airline return from a Mexican vacation.
title: Our Uber driver came through!

review: I remember when you could pay for a subscription and you would feel like it was worth it, too bad Uber delivery drivers and almost idiotic customer service is no help, how does your delivery guy get away with trying to make me refund and order, then he opens my food thinking I will and when I don’t he drops the bag off with the seal broken and everything. When I ask for help customer service  is as incompetent as the delivery drivers. I don’t need to scam y’all i just wanted my food untouched and unbothered.!!!
title: Gilded egg

review:
I ran outta gas and called an Uber ..not only did she inform me about the round trip options and due to me leaving me bank card in my car, she bout my gas and didn’t think twice about it. 
My mother and I deeply appreciate her kind heart and genuine care for another human she didn’t know at all.
Thank you Queen ❤️‍🔥💯
title: This is an Angel 🙏🏾🙏🏾

review: Enrique was extremely professional, polite & since this was my first time using Uber took the time to explain how your system works. If all of your drivers are as professional & personable I’ll not only use your service but recommend it to associates.  Thanks for a very pleasant experience
title: Driver, Enrique

review: I ordered a meal and paid for the priority delivery. My food NEVER came. The delivery driver never attempted to contact me, which let’s me know they didn’t even attempt to reach my door. I let Uber know I never received my food. They still CHARGED ME. My card was charged for the food and all fees. I contacted customer support and they were of no help whatsoever, telling me “I hope you understand.” I have never had any difficulties receiving food or package deliveries to my door. This is absolutely unacceptable. NO RESPECT for us customers.
title: Do NOT use the Uber eats option!!!

review:
I confirmed location of 6B and then walked across the street to the designated spot

I was then asked again to confirm and as a rare Uber customer didn’t realise my location had moved many miles away.  After 20 minutes the driver told me I was at the wrong spot, wouldn’t help me and forced me to pay penalty.

The next Uber who arrived helped me out but by now I was 25 minutes late to my appointment and my return to SLC after 15 years was off to a very bad start
title: Bad experience at SLC airport

review: Jennifer was right on time, kind, courteous, professional. When I told her I was interested in possibly purchasing a vehicle like hers, she told me all about its features. Above and beyond! It’s sometimes difficult to find a ride in Corvallis, and I am so thankful I was able to connect with Jennifer.
title: Late night lifesaver in Corvallis

review: My very first ride. And in a Tesla! After spending 8 hours in Einstein’s ER without being helped, my driver was there in less than 10 minutes & had me home just as quickly. He understood my situation & was very nice to me after a horrible day. I’d call him back every time if I could.
title: Michael- quick & very nice.

review: Perhaps I’m lucky. But every Uber driver I’ve gotten is very nice. I’m a chatter. My drivers chat with me on the trip. It makes the trip very pleasant. Osluahua, my driver today, (I butchered the name) was very personable. He was attentive to his driving. At the same time, he chatted with me. I so enjoyed chatting with him. He’s very smart. I hope I get him again.
title: Uber drivers are great

review: This is one of the very best Waze I have to get around town they’re always quick and friendly and very accommodating for whatever my need s have been I would recommend them to anybody that needs a ride in a quick fix. They are the best. Thank you, Uber…
title: Uber rides

review: God forbid you should lose something on one of your rides, Uber and it’s lost and found team will be useless to you. They do not help you get in contact with the driver. They will keep giving you an automated message about them sending your contact info to the driver and then they’ll ask you to wait 24 hours for a response. All their phone lines lead to more prerecorded automated messages. And they aren’t even for customers. I was just trying to get a hold of anybody.
title: The worst customer service imaginable.

review: Ally went above and beyond because I thought I had left my belongings in his car after he dropped me off at the office. Instead I left it at home. I called him and he had the patience and even picked up the call. What an honest guy. Keep up the great work you do in the community.
title: Great Service

review: Used Uber successfully for multiple days in London. At a critical point in the trip it totally failed us. App kept saying a driver is 2 mins away, but wouldn’t confirm. Just kept spinning the wheels. We tried walking to  different locations. The app on my wife’s phone did the same thing. Walked over a mile and stood around in the cold for over 45 minutes. Finally found a que for London taxis to make it where we needed to go, but we arrived very late and frustrated.
title: Trouble in London

review: The service is horrible half of the time the wait time is grossly misrepresented if they show up at all!  And the app is not up to speed when they do show up the app will say something like their 5 minutes away!! Talk about a waste of time!!
title: Unreliable service!!

review:
When the Request ride button is tapped, it goes through INSTANTLY.

However, when the Cancel button is tapped within 20 secs, the app just bogs down.

Looks like Uber's system is designed to let ride requests go through instantly but make it hard to cancel rides. I had to tap the Cancel button over 7 times before the cancellation went through. By that time, of course, over 2  minutes had passed just waiting for the app to cancel.
title: Cancellation seems to be intentionally deprioritized

review:
Both recent updates of the app have not respected my chosen preferences to opt-out of "optional" notifications; they have, in fact, reverse those choices after each update.

I discovered this only after receiving a push notification advertisement from Uber.

I had hoped to file a bug on this in the app, but found no obvious place to do so - so, I'm writing this review instead.

Congratulations, Uber: you've encouraged me to disable all permissions in iOS for your app, whenever I'm not actively using it...and I'm debating whether you're enough of a lost cause to simply delete your app.

Seems like you're circling the drain anyway, if you have to stoop to shoving advertising in people's faces to get money.
title: Advertising via push notifications will push me to your competition

review: I had a reservation for a 4:00 AM ride to the airport. At 3:45, I checked to see where my driver was, only to find that my reservation had been canceled! I received an email at 2AM saying that my payment method failed (which was a lie). Fortunately, I was able to get another Uber close to my original time. And yes, it successfully used the same payment method that originally “failed”.  However, it was just $20 more than the original reservation.
title: Unreliable & Not Trustworthy

review: It’s all become greed for Uber. No humans, just robots. Uber Rewards program is in 6 month chunks. Managed to make top tier Diamond, spending heavily in last 2 months to make sure I make it - and gain the benefit for the next 6 months. I did, but Uber decided in my new benefits window, they’d eliminate the program in 2 weeks and I’d have 45 days to use whatever points I’ve earned. Also, they removed what rewards can be redeemed, so you don’t get that value either. Honestly should have a class action lawsuit.
title: No Human Support and false promise rewards
developerResponse: {'id': 12662071, 'body': "Hi, we're sorry to hear that your concern was not addressed by our support team. The feedback from our riders is vitally important to us, and we always want their expectations to be met. Let us know more about it by dropping the details at t.uber.com/contact and we'll connect.   ", 'modified': '2019-12-31T09:53:51Z'}

review: They have Uber and Uber priority but they both take the same time to get to your pick up location Uber needs to update how much time it really takes to pick up because drivers take longer than what the app says. And your paying extra for no reason idk what’s the point of even paying for their program doesn’t seem like I’m saving any money
title: Stop scamming people

review: Today driver Weiye arrived after 2 other Drivers never showed up.  Got in the Uber with Weiye he said he’s sorry but can’t take me because he has a reserved customer he needs to take to the Airport.  He refused to take me to my destination claimed he thought he had time to take me but he had to pickup other airport customer.  He added I should have ordered a small car.  I did order a small car that didn’t show.  Weiye charged me a cancellation fee.  I never canceled he did.  I want my money back.
title: Drivers wouldn’t take me to destination

review: After getting all those bad rating I don’t know how come it’s still showing 4.6.  This is the worst app I have ever used. They take too much time to accept the request and if they accept the request they’ll make you wait for long time so that you cancel the request on your own and they get the money.  Also made me late for so many times even though the drop off showed me I’ll be 10 minutes earlier. So many they get the wrong location and blame on customer.
title: Worst app ever
developerResponse: {'id': 32007897, 'body': "Hi, we're extremely sorry to hear about your concern regarding your recent experience. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve your recent interaction with us, fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343HNsE. We shall get back to you at the earliest.", 'modified': '2022-09-14T06:14:51Z'}

review:
know that if your ride gets caught in traffic, uber will surprise you with an extra charge of unknown amount. (+$45 to my credit card with NO alert about a fare increase from uber, original fare I agreed to was $75) the up front pricing is apparently just a suggestion. 

they also intentionally make it impossible to find contact information for customer support. even the phone number my bank had on file is a dead end telling you to check their help center.
title: beware of surprise charges

review:
BEWARE: I stopped using uber because one driver decided to not take toll roads even though the route that he accepted required toll roads to be used to reach the destination quicker and with a smoother ride, I paid more for the toll roads and the driver made his own decision and went through a different route that was agreed upon when I booked this uber drive.

Contacting Uber customer service is a nightmare I was offered only 5$ credit and that’s it. (The ride was over 35$) As a result of this poor customer service I am now no longer an Uber rider.
title: Deceptive practices

review: I recently took a trip where not only was I charged over double the amount that I was shown the ride would be, but the driver took an incredulous amount of wrong turns which turned a 20 minute ride to 50. Since then, I have submit many claims for assistance through both the app and website, and I have received no help. 3 different people have responded to me, asked for more details, and then never responded again. Horrible customer service that is costing me triple digits.
title: Unresponsive Customer Service

review:
I signed up on the Uber driver app to drive people. After waiting 3 weeks waiting for a background approval or denial I called Uber, the agent was helpful, she escalated the background check, A couple of days later I was approved.
A couple of days after that I logged into the app, received leads for Uber eats, but all of the onboarding e-mails led me to believe I was signed up for ride share. (Which was my intent for signing up.)
Once I received the leads I continued Thru the process, so that I could learn the process. Immediate problems with the app, Between communicating with costumer support , texting & phone conversations with the 2 costumers that I delivered food to. “I was exhausted!”
Costumer service was nice but not Helpful! I was transferred several times on multiple occasions. 
Still have not completed the business in question.
COMPANY NEEDS TOO WORK ON THERE PROCESSES!!!
title: Needs Work

review: I am an Uber driver as well as rider when I am traveling, and I must say that it is the BEST ride-share company thus far. Unlike other companies I’ve worked for that I won’t name, Uber cares about their drivers and truly does all they can for us. I feel appreciated and valued. The pay is great, the riders are great. Just top notch all around!
title: LOVE THIS COMPANY AS EMPLOYEE AND RIDER

review:
The app is not user friendly. There is no number to reach customer support, there is only one for drivers but no chat function or number to call for riders. My driver cancelled the trip last minute causing me to miss my appointment and I could not get another driver. The prices are also crazy right now!
The help section in the app is absolutely useless. Very disappointing experience and it keeps happening over and over again. I’d rather use Lyft, it’s better and cheaper.
title: Not able to contact customer support

review: I generally do not leave reviews on the App Store, but I feel like Uber needs to fix the tipping option. I was charged 2 times in the tip option and there is no help for this area. If there’s already one option to tip, the screen should not pop up with another tip. Maybe they are just trying to make more money, but I did not need to be charged $6 extra for tip for a $14 ride. This is just ridiculous, will not be using Uber for a while I guess.
title: Tip

review: Every. Single. Time. I open the app it opens a screen that ask me to accept guidelines, which i honestly don’t mind, the problem is it opens another screen which I assume is asking me for my feedback for a previous ride ( I ride every week just about as it’s how I get home from work ) and it won’t load the trip info AND the convenient button that says “skip” is just completely useless it doesn’t do anything at all, this is a REALLY frustrating experience every time I use this app
title: My app is broken

review: I love Uber, but i think that Uber should follow lyft in being able to schedule rides with stops. Currently if you want to make a future ride you can not add a stop, but if you were able to it would improve the overall app experience. I even once scheduled a ride then when I got in and tried to add a stop it wouldnt allow it because my driver had another ride afterwards.
title: One Issue

review: I would prefer Uber instead of Lyft and the prices were reasonable but lately the prices are so high they charge double what Lyft does and not only that but I would get so many drivers cancel on me and when I did get a driver they would complain about not making enough and that the rides were crappy. I understand that at the moment it’s not the best for business but keeping the prices high is not making up for it
title: My personal opinion

review: Used to be amazing!!! Now in Cali it’s virtually impossible to get a ride anywhere. Rides are always surging and you can never get an accurate quote on arrival and price. The worst is it will say your driver will arrive in 5 minutes so I accept the ride. But in actuality they haven’t dropped off their last passenger and still have 10 minutes before they completed that mission THEN they still have to drive to me. Makes zero sense. Then they will cancel sometimes after I’m waiting outside forever. Get it together Uber.
title: Sooo bad

review: Uber seems to think that it’s my bank’s responsibility to store multi factor authentication data for them.  It isn’t.  Asking for information from a cancelled credit card account to log in is insane.  There is no way to contact support without providing a specific (cancelled) credit card number.  My account is effectively locked and all of their services are worthless because someone thought this third layer of authentication was a clever idea.  It’s not clever or more secure — it’s useless and absurd.
title: No Support, No Sane Security

review: I have used the service many times, which have always been great. The app it’s self however, is a disaster. I am constantly getting signed out of my account, and I cannot update my account with new information. Absolute waste of time. Moving over to Lyft!
title: Unreliable

review: I scheduled my UBER pickup a few days before my morning flight. The quoted fare was $25. The morning of my flight, I woke up to a message saying my UBER pickup was cancelled because it claims I didn’t set a form of payment. First of all, I set up two forms of payment: my credit card and PayPal. Second, to arrange for a pickup in 30-40 minutes, the price jumped to $75! I call shenanigans… I promptly scheduled a pickup with LYFT, which was reliable and cost $30 less. When in doubt (or when it’s important), choose LYFT!!!
title: Cancelled 5:20 AM pickup to airport without warning

review: Ever since covid uber has been beyond un reliable. Wait times for a car are over 10 minutes, drivers cancel on you after you have been waiting for some time, drivers go to the wrong pick up locations and call you and yell at you to walk to them, drivers even begin the trips before getting to you to see where you are going and cancel on you. Will not be using this service till they get their act together and become professional again.
title: Avoid

review: I’ve never really had a problem with Uber until now. What’s the point of allowing me to schedule a ride for a certain time if you’re going to send drivers to me over 30 minutes earlier than my scheduled time? Then they cancel because they don’t want to wait and the cycle restarts. Please fix this
title: Early drivers

review: Uber is okay, I have it on my phone but I have never used Uber eats nor have that app downloaded on my phone and Uber sends me a notification every few days about Uber Eats. It’s been months and I’m finally so fed up about this stupid alert about a service I have absolutely no use for that I searched within the app how to edit the notifications. Could not find out a way so I just deleted this app as a permanent solution. Annoying and unnecessary for it to be going off that much.
title: Uber Eats Notifications

review: I tried to call an Uber last night, when I was finally connected to a driver the driver contacted me and told me to cancel the trip because it was too far out of his way. I said that if he needed to cancel that was fine but that I was uncomfortable doing so because it would charge me. He assured me I wouldn’t get a cancellation fee, but of course I did get the fee. The Uber app does not have any way in which to submit a reimbursement via the app or website for this situation so instead I’ve resorted to the app review.
title: Charged inappropriately

review: Rolando was scheduled to pick me up at 5am but showed up 10 min early which is fantastic.  He was a perfect gentleman, he opened the car door for me & put my luggage in the back.  His driving was very good & he got me to the airport at the correct time.  I hope I get the pleasure of Rolando driving me again. Penny
title: Trip to the airport

review: Uber will get you in for a ride by saying they’ll get you to your location in “10-15 minutes” just to end up changing as soon as you pay for the ride. A ride that should have been finished (according to the original time given) within 15 minutes turned into a 30 minute wait and an even later drop off time. Ridiculous and there wasn’t a way to contact support without cancelling the ride entirely. Be upfront about the time because this was absurd.
title: Poor App

review:
I enjoyed my ride with Kathy. She is fun and happy pleasant person to ride with. She is knowledgeable with wide variety of things. She is very respectful. I forgot my glasses in her car within few minutes she brought them back. 
Way to go Kathy! I will see you soon when I need Uber again.
title: My ride

review:
This is the first time that I called Uber using my cellphone.  A bit of confusion is the address of my house was not correctly put.  I was a little concerned until I got on the car.

I saw a message that there will be 6% of discount  for this ride.  Will it be applicable to the case?
title: As the first time user

review: The driver was fine, no problem. The Uber app is ridiculous. It has way too much to text at least for me who has some visual impairment. It is just too, too busy and I found it somewhat confusing. It told me a drivers name and a car that would show up and then next thing I knew it was a different car and a different drivers name. Not real happy with Uber at the moment. The price seemed pretty high for a proximately 3 mile trip.
title: Thoughts about Uber

review: Great app but needs to add additional options that tells drivers such as asking them not to have music playing and asking them to have the ac or heater or on. This way riders would have the best ride possible. Also it would help to allow riders to request drivers by gender as some of us prefer women drivers over men this way we can be matched to a driver who meet our preferences.
title: App needs inprovments

review:
So everyday I use Uber to get to and from school. At first, it was fine. My wait time would be about 5 minutes max. NOW? It seems like I have to ask for a ride SEVERAL TIMES before I get a driver and they’ll be like 15 minutes away. I’ll order one car and it’ll be $8 but as I continue to wait for Uber to find me a driver it doubles? 

How is this possible? How it more expensive after being denied a ride 3x? 

Uber is trash. Utter trash.
title: Gets worse as you use it

review:
I was delighted about how easy the app makes it & how responsive it is. The alerts on time, driver, car all excellent! Even the little map showing where ( in a mall parking area) to meet him. Our driver Hussein was excellent. Professional, pleasant & has a nice clean car.
Will Uber again!
title: My first time I arranged for Uber!

review:
There should be the option for riders to choose their driver based on star rating.
Like an option for only 4+ ⭐️ or above 80% drivers can accept my fair.  I’m so tired of people with low percentage ratings taking forever to drive to me after they’ve accepted, or accepting my fair, then adding other stops before they come to me.
title: Missing…

review: Uber charged me about $25 for a ride out about 7 miles. When I tried to book a ride back a couple hours later the ride was $81. My friend then immediately tried to book the same ride and it was the same $25 I paid initially. I can only conclude that Uber knew I was dependent on them and decided to take advantage in their knowledge that I would need a ride and tripled the fee for me personally. I will not be depending on Uber for two-way rides again and I recommend no one else does either.
title: Uber Taking Advantage

review: First driver Joao  I booked this morning for airport never showed up nor answered calls or text.  His car showed not moving for more than 5 mins tho it continuously said on app 3 mins .  I had to cancel after about  10 mins and the next driver is great . Left him a 5 star review n tip. Gave me assistance n tips on how to navigate my entry to airport
title: First driver didn’t communicate

review: I have worked for Uber and have rode in Ubers but I have never experienced quite as remarkable driver as has been displayed tonight with Noah. He exemplified courtesy professionalism at its highest level.. in fact he went above and beyond to assured that a highly intoxicated friend was located and brought home safely .. Thank you so much kind Sir God Bless you
title: Noah

review:
Hi Uber team, there is no way to contact customer support on your uber app via call and it keeps you hanging on chats no response for hours.. i have been charged way above the upfront price shown and even though there was no sudden changes in distance or time and this has happened twice but nobody ready to listen, i guess that is why people are switching to other apps as Uber is looting people by charging whatever they want at the end of trip and showing false fares at starting. 

DO NOT USE UBER!!!! PATHETIC SERVICE!!!!
title: Pathetic service

review: I live just outside Raleigh area and when i tried to reserve the ride, option it’s not available to the address. Probably should have a * like conditions apply, depending on the location.
title: Reserve feature isn’t available at my location

review:
I did forget my phone when I took Uber ride to London Heathrow airport. Our driver was amazing. He contacted me later and he did put enormous effort to deliver my phone were I did request.
There are wonderful people in this world and great stories to tell. Thank you so much to driver Ali for his terrific help.
title: Lost phone in Uber car.

review: Thank you Dante for being a fantastic driver, your driving skills are always at the top. You have made sure to take us everywhere safely. Driving can be as complicated as a crossword puzzle, but being a good driver, you knew the shortest and correct direction. You became invincible.
title: private contractor.

review:
I’m so glad Nancy was my Uber driver from LAX Marriott Hotel dropped off at my home residence Pasadena! She was very professional customer care genuine personality and exceptional safe driver! I appreciate her kindness upmost first class driving experience ride with her!  Nancy’s valuable asset w your Uber drivers team she’s excellent! Thank you! 
Respectfully yours, 
Bill Moore
title: Uber driver Nancy

review: Such a kind and friendly driver. She saved our family when our flight got canceled. She was a very safe and excellent driver. Her car was very clean and comfortable. She even helped us with our bags when we were all so tired. I wish there was an extra star to rate Raffelina.
title: Super Star Driver!

review:
This was My first time using Uber and I must say it was a very nice experience. The app was easy to use. My ride came within 3 or 4 minutes. My driver was really nice and we had an easy conversation on my trip home and The price was reasonable. 
Will definitely use Uber again!
title: First  time using Uber

review:
Uber used to have a user friendly interface when an issue came up.  For instance, I double tipped because the app didn’t instantly post my tip the first time until a day later.  I hit the tip button again bc thought it didn’t go through and now I have a double tip.  There is no feature on the app to fix this anymore.

Back in the day, the app was designed to easily fix issues like this.  Now, it just takes you on a circular cluster of q&a. 

 I think I’m going to use Lyft from now on.
title: Terrible

review: We made it back in great time. Driver was very helpful, nice , polite, and friendly too. Enjoyed the conversation with him. He picked up fast even with high volume CMA Fest. Saved me parking my car dealing with traffic. We are from Fl so not knowing our way around it was really easy to use. So much cheaper too.
title: Great drivers !

review: Uber charged extra after Each trip I took today and there were no issues nor changes made. When you try and reach out, there’s no response and far from convenient to rectify the issue. I have taken trips before but never more than 1 per day. Each trip was changed on my bank card and I wouldn't have known if I didn’t pay through Apple Pay which shows the original charge shown at the time of request.
title: Uber changes the prices after ride.

review: I ordered groceries. 3 items for $35. I wouldn’t of minded the cost due the convenience factor. However, 2 of the 3 items I received were wrong and didn’t match the order. The delivery person never told me this, never called, just picked whatever they wanted. Uber didn’t issue a refund, simply said take your issue to the store where it came from. Overall a terrible service. The service is far better on Seamless. They own the satisfaction of their customers without kicking it to other vendors.
title: Uber Groceries

review:
I have used Uber twice in the last week after a bit of a hiatus.
I have to say quality, efficiency and punctuality struck me as areas of great improvement.
I send very high ratings to Zach (Volvo S60) and Michael in the Santa Fe who both pragmatically model the “improved” Uber product delivery I have noticed.
Strong work!, Des Moines Uber!!
title: Uber Satisfaction

review: Uber is HORRIBLE with mapping. It takes you the scenic route and then charge you extra for it. I’ve been taking Ubers while my car is being fixed and every time the driver tries to take the route that puts me in traffic or the long way. If you’re going to charge me extra let it be for you taking the easiest route and not wasting my time going completely out of my direction of travel. I’ve had it with Uber.
title: Disappointed

review: I just today learned how to access UBER and have already used it 4 times today. For an elderly person at 81 with mobility problems it is a blessing to be able to punch a couple of buttons and to get transportation with minimal walking and in a very few minutes. 🤙
title: Don Lee

review: Our Uber driver that we had taking us to the Freemont Experience from the Venetian hotel did not know where to pick us up and kept asking questions.  She made excuses saying she was confused.  She hardly spoke English so she didn't speak with us.  We waited almost 20 minutes when it should have been a 6 minute wait.  Not a very nice ride.
title: Bad driver

review: Having first used Uber yesterday and then again today both the driver and the ride was ver pleasant as opposed to taking very expensive cab ride.   I will need another ride to pick up my truck and looking forward to it now. Thank you Uber Bob1vision3
title: Easy and quick

review: Very pleased with my Uber driver. He was safe and kind and masked which I felt was a bonus. I would definitely use Uber again. Saved my family a drive to union station. A bit pricey—actually cost more than one-way train ticket to Grover Beach, but much convenience for all. Thank you
title: Great ride

review: Being miles apart in the military isn’t easy, but having Uber around is security! I was able to schedule a ride while I was in a different state for my husband!! Awesome to have Uber!!! I will keep using this service, because you just never know what life brings.
title: Miles apart

review: Wilbur was a safe driver. My only complaint was he doesn’t speak or understand English. I had spend the day at the airport only to learn my flight was canceled. Would have love to have him pull into a conveniently located Dairy Queen drive thru (I would have treated him ) as I hadn’t ate all day. But he didn’t seem to understand me.
title: My ride.

review: This is my first interaction while visiting Indy and she was amazing. She gave me so many awesome pointers from local eateries and restaurants, things to do and places to visit! You don't know how much that means to someone like me visiting and trying to make the most out of it. Thank you.
title: Outstanding ride from the airport to my hotel.

review: The problem l have had over many years due illness you don’t have enough drivers in port Salerno fla Stuart . Confirm the ride give a time of 10 minutes? Goes to 15 , so due I cancel or not. You attempt to cancel at times you run into a problem! I request another ride cars not available. Don’t have this problem with left? Contact me if you’re interested in keeping my business
title: Ratting

review: I wish Uber knew what they had in this man personally. An Absolute gem. Polite, funny, relatable. I left my phone- I flew in to pick up my new car and he brought it back. Saved the day with a big hug. Literally want to be his buddy for the rest of my life. You just don’t find personalities like this anymore. So refreshing!!!
title: WHAT A DRIVER

review: Please bring back the Apple Watch app for Uber because it might make my life easier if I use cellular feature on my Apple Watch. Also please add a samsung galaxy version for the Uber app so that it can be used as a separate app so I don’t have to pull my phone out of my pocket when it rains or snows out.
title: Uber app

review:
All of my drivers were very personable and very safe.
At the airport in Atlanta there are multiple individuals claiming to be Uber drivers who are soliciting passengers at the curbside and charging high rates.
I think this should be cleaned up as there is no way of determining who is safe and by riding with these individuals there is no insurance coverage if there is an accident.
title: Uber Reviews

review: Uber is an absolute scam of your money, I’ve been using it for years cause I don’t have a choice and the amount of money that has been stolen from me that to this day I haven’t gotten back because people stole my card info is crazy, the prices they have on there sometimes is ridiculous and the drivers I heard barley even make any of that money I spend on the Uber itself, there is a whoooollllee lot that needs to be fixed and there needs to be a better support to get ahold of for all the money stolen
title: It’s a scam

review:
I was sleep-deprived and in a total panic when my Uber arrived at 6AM this morning. Trying to leave town for an intense 13 day work project and could not find vital documents. However the excellent drive provided by an incredibly kind and understanding Carlos absolutely transformed my day.  Thank you SO much Carlos. You are an angel!
🙏🤗🙌🙏🤗🙌
title: Driving Angel

review: I placed 5 different credit cards but it always say there is a problem. No problem with my banks when i checked. They always say its not on their sude amd check with your bank. My bank is ok, they never declined when I checked with them.
title: Payment always declined

review: The biggest problem I have with this app is that your driver could be 16-20 minutes away and you could be waiting all that time and they can just cancel on you. Then they will just find another driver WITHOUT lowering the price or WITHOUT a shorter time. The next driver could be 16 minutes away also causing you to wait even longer. This app is terrible. And there’s no type of customer service to report this type of issue whatsoever.
title: Will waste your time if you need to get somewhere asap

review: I’ve used Uber for years and it always feels like a coin flip. Some drivers are great and deserve top percent tip. Others make me question if I ever want to get into a car again because of how reckless the driver is. Some drivers are amazing and will book you ahead of time to get you safely to your red eye flight while others cancel your ride home from the airport 3 times while they wait for the rate to go up so they can get the busy rate.
title: Can be good or terrible

review: My car is in the shop for brake work, and I didn’t want to wait four hours for it to be completed. This is the first time I called Uber since moving to Florida two years ago. I got Nadia, who arrived in 2 min. Her car was immaculate and her driving skills were excellent! Great experience!
title: Great Ride With Nadia

review: If you ever have an issue, good luck getting in touch with anyone who can help you. I have the same issue when I enter my address and the app changes it to another address. So now I have to walk down the block to get to my meeting area due to the glitch in the app. After clicking through the endless help menu and getting nowhere my issue is still not resolved. Don’t waste your time and energy using Uber.
title: Zero Customer Support

review: I’ve had Uber for years and yesterday we needed it for an emergency trip but it started tos at my phone number was taken! How can that be? Deleted the app and uploaded again and still showing my number is taken. Is this a joke?
title: My phone number was taken?
developerResponse: {'id': 33318662, 'body': "Hi, We're extremely sorry to hear about your concern regarding your recent experience. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve your concern, fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343HNsE. We shall get back to you at the earliest.", 'modified': '2022-11-23T04:22:32Z'}

review:
Cab drivers, specifically in Italy, contracted out by Uber. I had two of them overcharge me. When I reached out to Uber, the powers that be split the difference with me. I still appreciate the service by almost 100% of every private driver I’ve ever used. 
5 star service in Portugal, Ireland, etc.
title: Great service but watch those…..

review:
Uber often uses the phone’s notification system to send unwanted advertisements, interrupting my work and other activities.

Also, the app provides estimates of when a driver will arrive. These estimates are often much, much shorter than the actual wait times. I understand that estimates are uncertain by their nature, but Uber’s estimates appear far too optimistic. (I do not recall a driver ever arriving noticeably sooner than Uber’s estimate.)
title: Spam notifications and inaccurate pickup times

review:
I contacted Uber about fraudulent subscription charges on my card. They said it came from an account with my name but a different device. I told them I didn’t sign up for a subscription and I only have one device which doesn’t show a subscription, and I’m the cardholder so please stop charging me. 

They basically said, tough luck. I had to dispute through my credit card and get a new card number to stop them charging it. Awful service from an awful company.
title: Won’t deal with fraudulent charges
developerResponse: {'id': 32876837, 'body': "Hi, We're extremely sorry to hear about your concern regarding your recent experience. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve your concern, fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343HNsE. We shall get back to you at the earliest.", 'modified': '2022-10-31T08:11:18Z'}

review: I’ve been using Uber every day for years so far. It was working perfectly, until suddenly I have a new issue where it offers a “free cancellation” thing for scheduling in advance. For some reason that brought my price of Uber from $15 to $43. Why am I being charged so much? Well I looked at the description for this update and see that they charge a $33 cancellation fee and don’t even refund it if you don’t cancel which is absolutely ridiculous.
title: Be careful

review:
Randomly uber stopped allowing me to use location services. Location service do not appear in the menu of items I can turn on and off for the app. They work fine for everything else. 

Uber gives you no way to contact support as a rider, either through the app, website, or phone. Therefore I cannot fix the issue and have switched to using Lyft exclusively. Just a little customer support could so easily have solved this problem.
title: Location Services Unavailable

review: I left a bag of items from a store, and I noticed right when I got out and tried to wave down the driver but they took off.  I tried to call and text and everything and got no response. I tried to contact Uber and got no responses. This is so dangerous! What if someone left an ID or something else extremely important of value?! You’re telling me that they have a chance to contact the driver to get their stuff back, but when they do call, Uber immediately hangs up?! This is so horrible.
title: Lost Items GONE FOREVER…

review: The customer service is terrible. He rushed me off the phone before my issue was solved. Overcharged me and on top of that an extra charge for wait time even though I was there waiting on him. When he got there he said he was for someone else. When in fact he was my driver. I’m deleting this app. Other options available….nowyouknow100Customer service told me they’re only there for driver support. Anything you need has to be done through the app. So disappointed in this service.
title: Terrible!!! USE AT YOUR RISK!!

review:
Turns out, they don’t allow drivers to refuse people entry if they have a Service dog, normally I would be fine, unless the driver is allergic, in fact, some dog allergies can be severe enough to cause anaphylactic shock, which leads to death… aren’t laws fun? As somebody with dog allergies, this is very unsettling to me, and I will no longer be using this service. 

That’s like telling somebody with a peanut allergy, “you have to eat this peanut butter sandwich or else we’re calling the police on you for not wanting to kill your self.”
title: You can legally kill your driver, that’s not a joke

review: I have missed several important things because the wait time is so long. Additionally the cost for each ride makes Uber only useful for RICH people. Has not been very useful in my life and drives me crazy. I hate the feeling every time I open it up for a ride and the time of drop off is well past whatever deadline I need to meet despite looking for a ride at least 15 minutes ahead of time. Note, may still be useful to some people, and take this with a grain of salt. Don’t tell me I didn’t warn you.
title: HORRIBLE: DO NOT DOWNLOAD 😩

review: Had a friend never get picked up. App showed car sitting idle for long time  even asked if was ok!  B/c sitting for so long!! Then showed car in route but surprise def wasn’t full with the passenger no place to air grievances on point site. Want a refund. Ride was over $20!!!
title: Chrrged for ride that wasn’t taken and driver lied and said on way !!!!!!

review: I just bought an Apple Watch SE and was excited to use the Uber app on my watch but I am getting a message saying the app is not supported on Apple Watch. I have tried for two days to find an email or phone number for Uber… SOMETHING to contact Uber about this, to no avail. It’s impossible to get in contact with anyone. I do really enjoy this app on my iPhone but when there is a problem … good luck with that ! I am leaving this review in the hope someone from Uber will answer me.
title: No way to contact Uber/ a live person

review: I would recommend Lyft over Uber. Uber’s “surcharge” pricing is predatory and, while it’s not something that occurs every day, it’s enough to turn me off from the app. After taking a ride, I was informed via my receipt that the price was actually doubled from what I was originally told when I ordered the ride. The fact that the surcharge pricing is not immediately up-front and can change mid-ride is easily the most deceptive thing about this business.
title: Deceptive Surcharges

review: I used to like Uber, even on the pricier rides bc of the good driver service. Until recently, I noticed I’ve been getting charged $25 a month for absolutely nothing, for I have no idea how long, as far as I can remember I never signed up for it, I have maybe had 1 or 2 rides in six months. The subscription doesn’t show up on Apple subs, and it doesn’t show up on services that do bank expense tracking , so I’ve essentially thrown away 100s for a service that I’ve never benefited from. Lovely.
title: Terrible Payment Visibility

review: on top of being twice as expensive as lyft, uber now takes even longer to find you a ride and when they do it’s usually someone with very little people skills. Uber has to do something about the way the handle the mask situation because I lost my mask after work and had to walk 3 miles because no one would give me a ride even if I had my face covered, on top of that uber wouldn’t refund the money I spent on a $40 uber.. Terrible service.
title: ridiculous app & don’t offer refunds for bad service

review:
Search button clears the search field. The options to schedule a ride move around (sometimes next to the schedule button, sometimes at the top). I can’t use any payment options (tried two credit cards and Apple Pay. Error messages about needing to verify the card but no options to do so, or saying my financial institution blocked it??!?)

In short, 45 min trying to get a ride to the airport tomorrow morning and just not able to do it. I give up.
title: Incredibly glitchy / useless

review: I ordered an Uber from ROC airport (Rochester, NY) using the app. Trip from airport to area hotel $24…sold! Booked knowing that I needed to wait 13 minutes for the cat to arrive (for a 15 minute drive). All of the sudden the app drops my ride and when I go to rebook it has doubled in $ to more than $50. After booking a Lyft at the original $24, I checked the $ on Uber again because curiosity was getting the best of me. The same ride was almost $70. Shame on you, Uber!!!
title: Low stars based on dropping passenger and then trying to charge triple not functionality

review: I’ve been using Uber for years and it’s very convenient to order and track trips. However when I sign into my account, whether through browser or app, I don’t have the option to make an Uber rewards account. I’m not sure how to get help with gaining the rewards option in my Uber account, but I hope someone can contact me back and help me out
title: I can’t access Uber Rewards

review:
Uber has rejected 3 of my cards
I be tried to update the card info per the instructions but to no avail!
What are you supposed to do if you can’t contact them!
Very frustrating 
I guess I will delete the app and go with,who has never rejected my cards for payment!
title: Payment

review: Uber taking too much money without your confirmation, at the end of the ride instead of 50$ as you confirmed you get a total of 130$ including the tip that you never gave and the best they can do is 20% return smh they stealing money I bet the Uber drivers don’t get more them 5% of that ride. Also saying the ride will arrive in 10 minutes which turned into a whole 30 minutes wait! I’m done with Uber. They a big company who are that selfish and ignorant to the problem and do not help with nothing
title: Bad ride

review: I was quite disappointed that my Uber driver did not wait until I got inside safely before pulling off.  As a service provider as well as a gentleman, I would expect to not be left outside fumbling with packages while searching for my keys at a dark house on a dark street.  Then once I looked back on my transaction, I see I have tipped $5 that I truly would not and did not authorize.  The ride itself was very pleasant but I was also charged a waiting fee and there was no waiting done.
title: My first time review

review: There is a bug when your card gets declined or you're allowing the ride to go through even though the card was declined and you're allowing us to fix it later. If you put in a location other than your current location, and the destination and the card gets declined and you choose another card or decide to fix it later its using the current location instead of the location you inputted before. Basically I am calling a cab for friend/parent and its not my location they are at.
title: BUG

review: It was a very pleasant trip. I must say the best part of the trip was the peasant manner in which Richard (the driver) conducted. He was extremely friendly from the very beginning .He exhibited his core good nature to offer help in even loading up your baggage. Thanks Richard. Hope to see you again
title: The Ride

review: Thanks for helping me navigate the airport Uber location on my first Uber ride. You checked on my parents car battery in the cell lot (the reason I needed an Uber) and you were so thoughtful to wish my mom a happy birthday too! This is the beginnings of a great book! Thanks!
title: Jamal saved the day!

review: When I ordered Uber for my relatives to go to the airport, later on, I need to order Uber for myself to go to the same airport, for the same flight, but I was unable to. Uber apparently does not allow a second  ride simultaneously. This so stupid .
title: Unable to get a second ride

review: Iam always getting a payment alert after each ride which is not to be shown as Iam regularly paying the rides payments please remove such double payment alerts
title: Double time payment alerts appearing at each ride

review: I just want to say that I’m very happy about the driver who picked me up today. He was outstanding. He was pleasant and patient. I’m disabled and he helped me with the utmost care and respect. We had great conversation during the ride and I would recommend him to anyone who uses the Uber app. I give him six stars 😊⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
title: My Uber driver

review: Great service for me but some glitching with the map, but should be an easy fix. Reach out to The GMan if there is interest in a larger partnership opportunity to do the ride share a little differently as we move forward. Think Ride Share will be the terminator to the rental car businesses
title: Love Uber

review:
I requested a $125 dollar ride After arriving at my location I was charged $187 for the trip an additional $60 dollars. And I can’t get any more customer support then the AI in the app. 

If you go through the steps the AI will eventually resolve the issue..Uber seems fair. 
Uber corrected my issue within 10 min
title: THE UPCHARGE THEY DONT TELL YOU ABOUT

review: Locked myself out of my car at Lowe’s. Nice Lowes guy helped me download Uber app and talked me through asking for a driver.  Quick response. Kind and patient driver. Showed me how to adjust to round trip after taking me home for my spare key.   I’m seriously considering selling my car and relying on Uber henceforth!
title: My first Uber trip

review: Terrible, will have you waiting for hours paying $10 to go up the street. Drivers cancelled i minutes away with no warning. Leaving you refreshing over and over until your 30min late for work.  Back to Lyft.
title: Terrible Service

review: It can be very pricey and it say you get this and that deal but you don’t get them all. I love the convenience of the app that is the best part. The cancel fees and so forth is ridiculous especially when they don’t show up or it takes an hour or more to come. I pay a membership and you still have to charge us so high I think it’s a little much.
title: Uber is best for convenience

review:
I had surgery done and used Uber for going back and forth to physical therapy, pharmacy, doctor appointments and finally to the airport. I’m impressed with the patience, kindness and politeness of the Uber drivers in this area.
The last ride, with Ismaila, provided also a very interesting conversation on current international affairs. Wow!
title: Great service in the Baltimore area!

review: Saved us from a long night trying to get home.  Kids father was in the hospital dying and we took kids to fire works to cheer them up, kids were tired and he came and rescued us.  Was so helpful, and friendly a true God send.  He sets a high standard for other drivers… so awesome
title: Our hero

review:
Far too often lately I’ve been having my rides canceled after already having been assigned a driver and estimated arrival. I just waited for 10 minutes for a driver who was 3 miles away and their car never moved. Then I receive a cancellation notice and an update that I’ve been reassigned to a new driver who is even further away. I also believe the ETAs have been very misleading. 

I have a good Uber rating and the rides I request are typically short. Not sure what has been going on.
title: Rides Keep getting canceled

review: I just find it so disappointing a huge company like Uber doesn’t have timely, easily accessible customer service. There are no direct phone numbers, only through a chat. Within that chat I had like 2-3 different people respond with generic responses. Waiting more than 3 hours to have a customer service issue resolved is just out of control for a company like Uber. My issue still hasn’t been resolved.
title: Customer service

review: My Spirit flight from Ft Lauderdale to Newark NJ got canceled and I had to fly into Atlantic City NJ. When I arrived I was tired, stressed, and almost 3 hours from my home. He was happy and courteous to drive me and told me he was well rested and to not worry. He didn’t talk my ear off and I slept. Thank you Ali for getting me home safe to my family.
title: Ali saved the day

review: Your app got Brian close but across a 4 lane road from the pickup address. I had to walk across to get his attention so that we could get on our way to the airport. Brian was polite and friendly. His car was clean except for the trunk, but he made it work. We would ride with Brian again.
title: So Near

review: Misleading wait times when you open the app, inaccurate wait times when you order a ride, often  4 - 7 minutes discrepancies and not infrequently 10+ minutes, drivers canceling at the last minute with no explanation. Plus constant 'bait and switch' emails about Uber eats. Experience is becoming more and more frustrating.
title: Uber is not what it used to be....

review: I’ve been using Uber for several day now and I would like to note that Clyde was by far the best driver I have had the pleasure of driving with,, he was extremely professional and made me feel extremely comfortable and I hope he will be recognized for his exceptional work palmagain
title: Best driver

review: He did no effort to get down from the car and offer no help. He didn’t even offer to help me with anything and especially as I was trying to fit my luggage in his compact area for luggage. The luggage was suspended and on my leg to try to maneuver it inside and my back hurt badly after that.
title: Driver

review:
I hired Uber service for the first time today and was pleasantly surprised by the ease with which I was able to request the ride. I liked how interactive the app is. 😊
My driver, Bruno was super! He arrived on time with a pleasant smile, clean and fresh car and a business like approach. It was a refreshing experience!
title: Excellent Service

review: So on Saturday I needed a ride. Only about 4 miles from my house. Uber initially assigned me to a driver, and it kept saying “seven minutes away“, this was about 15 minutes, then the driver dropped me. Then I got assigned to a new driver. Way too long of a wait. I don’t understand why they initially give you a driver, and then that driver can just, what? Pick up a different ride if it’s more convenient? I really hate that you drove all the taxi cabs out of business in Chicago, and then we’re stuck with this shoddy service
title: Not reliable

review: I was trying to book my Uber for my ride home from the airport & the app just froze on me. It kept asking me to update my phone number then when I tried it would get stuck or say “bad gateway, trying again later” (or something of that sort). I kept trying for about 15 mins, finally uninstalled & reinstalled the app & then still had to wait for the Uber. After working a 10 hour flight, I thought a Uber home would have been the least of my worries SMH.
title: Stuck at the airport

review: I was at a location I could easily walk home from...theoretically.  But I had just spent 2 1/2 hours engaged in a physical activity and I had nothing left.  The ride arrived in minutes snd in another five minutes I was home, much relieved.  Thank you!
title: Distance didn't matter.

review: The Uber app has improved lately and hopefully that will continue. In particular the trip monitoring for a family member on the account is glitchy. It especially doesn’t work if the family member canceled a ride (because the driver didn’t move after accepting) and then requested another one — the only one that shows up on the app is the canceled one.
title: Good but could be great

review: Usually I sit as most people do and stare at my phone the whole ride which actually if you think about it pretty fricking rude. Do we really expect someone to drive around for an entire work day not saying a word to the person they are helping? Great driver, great chat, 10 stars!
title: Nice Conversation!

review: We were stranded in Hershey on Easter and live near Philadelphia. We got Ayon as our driver to take us home when our car broke down. He was amazingly friendly, a great driver and we enjoyed fascinating conversation to pass the time on our trip. If you get Ayon as your driver, consider yourself lucky!
title: Fantastic

review: I just want to thank the ubber who picked me up, he appeared like an angel I was late for my flight and he was calming me down talking to me the whole time and was very helpful, driving super well trying to do the best he could for me.  may God bless his goodness and may God prosper him.  Thank you, thank you, thank you
title: Thank you

review:
Sure would love to be able to use this app. It wont allow me to search for the destination unless I go through the reservation screen, which doesn’t allow me to pick a slot 30 minutes from now. If i pick farther than 30 minutes, the price jumps from $13 to $40. 

Whoever designed this app is incompetent and is overcharging for it. Thank you Uber for encouraging people to go back to standard taxi services and not drink as much at the location they are going to.
title: Can’t schedule a ride

review: I was returning my friends, food stamp card and sent her card back to her via Uber. My driver was so professional that he even called me back so that I would have the peace of mind to know that the food stamp car had been delivered so I tipped them a total of $15. I love this guy give him a raise.
title: Uber driver all star!!!!!

review: This guy was not only the best driver. I had the best personality an awesome car hooked up with the most technological equipment available I was blown away. This guy is incredible. I would hope to get him every single time I’ll be paying soon. I apologize I’ll be getting money on cash app. Thank you so much.
title: Ray

review: Uber is a okay service but I often find myself experiencing small acts of prejudice. Like when I am in a predominantly black neighborhood how my drivers lock the door on me upon reaching for it, only to verify my name. Even though I keep an updated photo of myself on the app. I’m appalled because I experienced this countless times, even during extreme weather. Uber needs to crack down on this with some sort of verification process.
title: Uber Experience due to black skin

review: I don’t know what is going on with app… but for the last week- no matter what cc I have tried to use the app keeps telling me it can’t accept…then can’t tip..… I have used the same cc for YEARS….. not expired….. I haven’t changed address……. EVERY CARD?????????? Hopefully fixed soon as I can find other ride apps if necessary- love love love my Uber rides!!!!! Hope they fix the “glitch” in system!!!!!!!!!
title: For a week now- not so good

review: Impossible to get help from the app. Greedy companies like this one only care about scale, scale, scale. They want more dollars from more people and they don’t care about individuals. I ordered a product for delivery the next day—a scheduled order—through the app, and there was no way to cancel it after I later changed my mind. Even though the order hadn’t been accepted yet by the merchant. Luckily I thought to try using the website, where I was able to cancel it.
title: Terrible company, terrible app, terrible service

review:
It is extremely difficult to get in touch with your customer service if the problem is not in Q and A.
Also, the app has lost my credit card information multiple times.
The morning trip could end up really bad. I pressed the Home button. Luckily, I wasn’t sleeping and was controlling the trip. I could woke up in downtown Brooklyn instead of Sheepshead Bay.
title: Customer service

review:
Although I like Uber 
I had a bad experience twice now in two consecutive months the drivers would cancel on me and not arrive to the destination after I waste my time waiting for them they don’t show up and report to Uber that I’m the one who canceled on them 
And of course I’ll be charged , the problem there is no option in Uber app for my situation, no place to write a complain or number to call , it’s amazing to protect the drivers but you need to protect the riders too 
I’m so disappointed
title: Bad experience

review: Just wanted to leave a great review to my Uber driver who was awesome and very personable. There’s not a lot of services around my area because it is rural and very limited. He was very professional, as well as personable and I enjoyed the ride very much. If there was a way to give him six stars, I certainly would!!!
title: Limited Uber in my area

review:
Thank you very much for you o people’s survey. Yeah it’s okay, very nice behaviour your ride sharing guys, well mannered, polite people. But one thing is very important for us, fare issues. It’s too high for our countries middle class families and lower middle class families. So I think Uber must have some immediate plans for this problem, Shukran.

Shan Chowdhury
title: Hello

review: I get done work and it don’t matter if it’s 830pm or 530 am, so can’t get a ride and don’t have a way home so this service is horrible, and I pay for the special program, I see no pint, this is a horrible service I’m a 5.0 , been trying all night this is uneealiaw
title: No service

review:
The app will spam you with notifications every day reminding you of its existence. The only option is to either disable notifications or uninstall the app. Either will need to be undone the next time you need to use the app, so the only realistic solution is to just deal with it. But we really shouldn’t have to. 

I already own the app Uber! I already use your service! Must you really continue to advertise to me!? As if there’s not already enough ads shoved in my face every second of every day!
title: Spams ads

review: Honestly In my opinion Uber needs a lot of work done. With starters, the waiting time. I or anyone in general shouldn’t have to wait 12-15 minutes for a Uber to come pick up customers. Especially if people are on a schedule, or have work they gotta be at. Second issue the drivers, Uber needs to make sure they pick quality drivers instead of anyone. I had too many times where drivers would miss routes and talk about things off topic and uncomfortable. Do better Uber
title: Do Better

review:
Very TERRIBLE! 

The app or the driver went detour 2 times the same route and I have to wait nearly for 15mins while the app say it is away 3 mins. When I called the driver he told it is because the app and then he kept going detour again while I was away from him 0.5 miles. Omg, when I called him to go backward, it was just 0.5 miles from my location, and he canceled without any word.

I am using the uber one because I have to use it everyday. Have to think about not renewing it anymore and going to Lyft.
title: Terrible app

review: This is my first time of writing, I took Uber today and a guy named jarrell with Toyota Camry picked me up and I put a box of chicken inside his booth and when he dropped me I forgot that I had something inside his booth, immediately I started contacting the support team I was told that the driver said he didn’t see my stuff please for the sake of integrity why not check your camera? I feel so disappointed and disgusted, Uber? I am writing from Chicago and I will keep telling everyone that Uber drivers is not to trusted
title: Disappointment with Uber driver

review: It is way better and cheaper then Lyft! Plus everything has discounts. I will forever be a person of Uber now. All the rides are cheaper, the drivers are nice, and the food too. And when doing Uber 1 u get a lot of discounts. I will forever be with Uber. Please don’t change or raise prices 🥰🥰💜
title: Love it!

review: Your App is so un-user-friendly. When people are hungry and an order gets cancelled for no reason and you can’t get a hold of anyone to assist, it says a lot about how much you value your customers. Literally why does anyone use this app? It’s so expensive and the quality of service is garbage. The drivers don’t get compensated enough. I will never use this or another app system again for ordering food. Over promise, charge out the wazoo and grotesquely under perform. Don’t waste your time or money.
title: Uber Doesn’t Care

review: Terrible app, drivers immediately force rider to ride immediately. No choice to schedule a ride. No round trips possible. Really bad. Once driver clicks on rider, if rider decides they would like to choose a different driver, and cancels, driver can charge a cancellation fee, it’s aweful. Use as a last resource to go somewhere only, not recommended. The web version is no better. Call for a real cab or take a bus. I would like to rate this app a negative 1 million stars but it’s not an available choice so I gave it 1 star.
title: Terrible app, Rider does not have any choice

review: I haven’t my touched address settings since  I got the app and I see there a promo for food today and I use it but it doesn’t show where it’s delivering to through the Uber app which why would I have to download another app to see where my my food is going if I can order it through here. So it delivered to the wrong location because it didn’t let me double check my address and I  wasted 20 dollars that’s and hour and some work. Never again bro why have my data if it’s wrong?
title: I’m so mad

review: I take an Uber every day for my job and have to wait until the hour benefits run out or I’d have to pay more than triple the amount to go 7 minutes down the road! When I try to order an Uber before the hour benefits run out, it tries to make me pay $32!!! When I wait for them to run out, I usually pay $10-$11. It’s ridiculous and it’s obvious they’re just greedy and wanna make you wait until they can squeeze you for possible cancellation fees in case something comes up.
title: Nice price gouging!

review: I would give the app zero stars if possible. I stopped using Uber as soon as I got my license because I’ve had nothing but horrible experiences with Uber drivers and their customer service team. I tried two years later for a quick ride to the airport and was reminded all over again why I never wanted to use Uber again. The whole team from drivers to behind the scenes of customer service is unprofessional and scammers. They are unreachable and unaccountable.
title: Horrible Drivers and Customer Service

review: Usually love Uber but I updated and the new version doesn’t load well, the car icon spins endlessly on the map, it updates inconsistently (says your driver is X minutes away but still says trying to find a driver for another two minutes). I don’t have confidence in the new version that I’ll be able to get an Uber. Hopefully the next update fixes this, otherwise I’ll be back to taking the bus.
title: New version doesn’t work as well

review: Uber was so good to me until they decided to flag my account for no reason at all. I’ve been calling Uber and checker for the past 2 months and they keep giving me the run around. I have nothing bad on my account. Not even a bad review. All positive reviews etc.  Checkr tells me I’m clear and Uber tells me theirs still a problem. If it’s not 1 thing it’s another, just last week they both told me something different. I’m going back to Doordash, it has never given me any problems.
title: Flagged my account for no reason

review: Stupid to charge a cancellation fee when you can’t even get a driver found for 20 minutes , I logged out of this app and canceled trip just to find out the driver still was in transit. You’re not paying your drivers enough and that’s why they are leaving and not enough anymore. Anyways now trying to make up from losing drivers by not canceling the users trips when they select cancel and log out. A very bad company that I’ll never use again . Lyft all the way!
title: Uber cancellation fee

review: Regarding the app, please do not send useless notifications when I am not using the app. Unfortunately, there is no way to switch off ride-unrelated notifications only. Instead, I have to switch off all Uber notifications and then remember to switch them back on when I do need a ride. Putting your marketing before service is a sure way to get me to try Lyft.
title: Uber is ok

review: I’ve been a longtime Uber user and happy with the service.  However, the app sends daily marketing push notifications that are a total annoyance, and the app provides no way to turn them off.  This my only recourse is to turn off Uber notifications in iOS, then re-enable them when I need to use the service again.
title: Good service, lots of junk notifications

review: i have used the uber app for around 4 years and my first two years were pretty good, drivers using the app were mostly quick and efficient, the app had low prices too. fast forward to today, the app has been loaded with incompetent uber drivers that take the longest way possible to get to your destination, drivers that won’t take your calls or messages so you can give them advice on how to get to you quicker. on top of that, the gps sometimes marks the location in a weird way and uber drivers have to take detours for no reason whatsoever! completely outrageous. for the price that i’m paying them? no way.
title: gps issues and incompetent drivers, inflation of prices.

review: I’ve received horrendous customer service from Uber on two different occasions. They never understand what the actual problem is (though I explained it crystal clear several times) and proceeded to ignore my messages and mark them as resolved. The “supervisor” didn’t even understand the problem. The actual ride service they provide is great but I’m absolutely disgusted with my customer service experiences so much so that I never want to use the app again.
title: The worst customer service I’ve ever experienced

review:
I used to take dial a ride. It was convenient for me and each ticket was only 1.75$ per ticket both ways. It was nice for a while but I want to try something different as tdial a ride wants you to pay cash only when you purchase a book of tickets.
I’m disabled, but not physically disabled. Would love to try Uber but I’m on a fixed income. 
My suggestion would hopefully Uber would consider using this idea for disability and non physical disabled passengers and seniors.
I’m considering using the monthly card on the Uber app, but concord of the price for me. 
I hope that made sense. 
Stay safe
title: Feedback

review:
Good luck getting any kind of assistance in an emergency.

With Postmates (a company the own) I was locked out of my account with no help and it was impossible to get someone to contact me because I needed to be logged in to do just that. A simple public email would be nice.

I spend $7000+ a year on Uber products and I have diamond benefits and it still doesn’t matter so I can only imagine how terrible it is for everyone else.

My experience also reporting accidents has also been terrible.

The page to cancel my account also won’t load on multiple browsers.
title: Terrible Service

review: I’d like to know why everyone of your app updates always have to be so large. Depending where I am most of the time I need WiFi to download them and my 2nd question has to do with your verbiage in every update; I’m not a techy by any stretch of the imagination so what does it mean when you say the update among other things says “Improves localization across the app? What does that even mean?
title: Questions about the App

review: So I complained about a driver who stole our parcel, blocked our phone numbers and probably sitting issue free. Had a chat with the support for 2 days and then I get a call regarding the issue. The only thing they’re willing to do is take actions (which i don’t really think they would). I asked for compensation for our parcel which y’all’s driver stole but they said no they can’t compensate for the loss. I MEAN ITS YOUR DRIVER YOU GAVE HIM THE JOB AND NOW THAT HE STOLE FROM US SO BE THE INSURER OR MAYBE JUST STOP GIVING JOBS TO ANYBODY. DO A BACKGROUND CHECK WHAT A JOKE.
title: Uber was great but really seeing the downfall of their service now.

review:
I used to rely heavily on Uber in the Oklahoma City area.  A scheduled ride would always show up within 10 minutes of my requested pickup time.

Uber has seriously broken the trust with its riders.  The last two confirmed scheduled pickups were no-shows, leaving me to scramble to get to the airport on time.  This time, Uber gave my request to a driver currently on a multi-stop shopping trip.  Bad on the driver for accepting a new trip without any idea how long the current customer was going to take. Shame on Uber for giving him the option.

I’ve noticed that more junky cars have made it into circulation now as well.  Real gems: using the donut spare, maintenance lights lit up like a Christmas tree, cracked windshields, no bumpers … you name it.

I highly recommend using any other service.  Uber just isn’t reliable anymore.
title: Gotten much worse

review:
The title says it all. Cleveland to westside easy ride
I've done many times. Waited three hours after
game let out and the prices never went down. Walked around and enjoyed a meal but prices never went down to a reasonable rate.

Won't be relying on this service anytime soon. Sorting by recent review’s you can see it's been trash for a while. Uber already screwed us when they added tips because they are cheap and wanted the customers to pay for low wages while Uber makes millions. I see room for cabs to
make a comeback at these prices. What made Uber useful no longer exists…they forgot where they came from. Let's stop using this app. Its costs more for a ride than court-side seats! I'll skip this headache in the future now that I know the strand and gouge techniques they employ.
title: $150 for 20 minute ride, strand and gouge strategy!

review:
If your driver never shows, or is messing around for 20-30 minutes before picking you up, Uber charges the rider $5 for canceling.  This is not disclosed when canceling, but is probably in the fine print somewhere. Therefore Uber is adding insult to injury when they make you wait excessively for rides, don’t hold their drivers accountable for picking you up, and will assign you the same driver after you’ve canceled. 

In summary, when you're on vacation just rent a car and avoid this company.
title: They don’t disclose cancellation fees

review: Time estimates are most of the time are way off. App is hard to get answers and help. Rides go from $7 to almost $30 for same ride.
