Uber eats always deliver cold, apparently no one has a warming bag? Double check address or you’ll be buying from a store miles away. Saving for a car so I won’t have to rely on such an expensive service, that a company and drivers manipulate to take as much money from you as possible.
title: Misleading and Expensive

review: I was forced to use other competing and, as it turned out, the best applications.  uber cannot verify my mobile number.  my number doesn’t exist only milking uber ... everything else in the application confirms my number without any problem.  I spent a lot of time on Uber trying to call the car and get to the house at night when everything is closed.  uber is a very unreliable application ... I highly discourage hoping that your order will be fulfilled ...
title: my number doesn't exist?  Are you serious?

review:
Booked a ride one prior so that nothing goes wrong the next day. Had booked the ride for 1:30. Got message at 1:15 that driver was coming but at 1:30 git the message that driver could not come so another one was coming. As this was the first day for my job, I wanted to get to work on time and had been waiting outside. But no taxi came. At 2:00pm I got a message that I was charged a fee of $5.00 for cancellation because the driver had  come and waited and I didn’t show up.

Come on guys…. it’s not about the money. But about honesty. Why was I charged when the  driver didn’t even show up. Is this a way to make money off us? 

I had to make other arrangements to get to work. And almost got late for the first day to work. 

I would give you guys a negative rating if I could, seriously.
title: Totally frustrating and Undependable

review: Price gauging at its finest. Within a 30 second time frame my fare went up $30. What a joke of a company taking advantage of the pandemic to raise the prices. Absurd. I’ve been keeping track of this with screenshots and will report the company soon. I’ve been a customer for over 6 years and diamond status, but the level of service just keeps going downhill.
title: App getting worse every time

review:
First time using Uber.  We were quoted $50 and were charged $70.  In any other business this would be illegal (it might be here also, class action?).  Would you pick up an item in a store, buy something online or order a dinner off a menu that was priced at $50 and allow them to charge you almost 50% more?
The two star rating instead of a one star is because the driver (Jeremiah) was wonderful.
title: How does Uber stay in business??

review: Today I ran into a problem when the driver canceled the trip, when I wrote to him that the passenger who will go down to the exit with him, besides, the driver arrived very quickly two minutes after ordering, and it is physically impossible to come from the building.  My grandmother, at the age of 70, had to come to sit with her paralyzed aunt, but this did not happen, because the driver did not want to wait a couple of minutes, although he had every right to include the amount for waiting

Scheduled a black car in advance several days for an early morning trip to the airport. Driver hadn’t even left what appeared to be his home at pick up time. He arrived a half hour late and I had already left. Uber app has no way to call customer support or reach anyone to help. Even feedback on their website doesn’t give an option to report a late or no-show driver. This is supposedly for a “professional driver”. I will never use Uber again they are not reliable and they offer zero support.
title: Zero Customer Sevice

review: Honestly this company’s morals disgust me instead splitting a more fair percentage with their driver’s they choose to go with allowing them to price surge at a time when the world is suffering from unemployment and struggling to recover from the effects of the pandemic in general!!! I really hope you guy’s adjust your policies and correct your morals for the sake of your communities because I don’t care how big you are in life it’s about being humble and greed is one of the seven deadly sins that no human being has any business carrying 💯
title: Ridiculous Overcharged by Uber

review: They do take you to your destination, but it depending on the driver. I have had a person where they would pick up the ride then they right away cancel it, and I would be waiting another 20 mins for the next person. Now it is telling me that there no Uber driver available, if you are going to use it, you have put it in early so you won’t have to wait long
title: It’s reliable but have some issues

review:
Whatever changes have been made recently make for a very frustrating experience. After submitting for a ride, I keep getting notifications that the fare was increased by the driver. Even after selecting this deceitful option, the rides will not connect and drivers keep canceling. (This is in the westside of LA, so not a rural / difficult to reach destination)
Has happened for a couple weeks now. Can’t rely on Uber anymore...
title: New changes (Apr 2021) frustrating
developerResponse: {'id': 6584735, 'body': 'Hi, this certainly sounds frustrating. We can always look into this issue for you. Please send a quick note to t.uber.com/contact so we can follow up with you. Also, have you tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app? Be sure to do this for the best usage of the Uber app.', 'modified': '2018-12-28T06:31:56Z'}

review: Taking away phone support was the dumbest thing they could’ve done, whenever there’s an issue it’s a battle to get help to get my money back. The drivers will pull up to your house and not even say that they’re there, i was waiting for my driver just now and she ended up calling me to say she’s downstairs, I said okay and when we got off the phone and I tried to see how much time I have left to get downstairs, it said she was a minute away but she canceled as I was looking at it and I got charged for her weirdness
title: Sad

review: I am sick of waiting a long time then having drivers cancel for no reason, with no repercussions.  If I book and cancel I pay a fee, but my time is worthless to Uber, so when I spend 10 minutes waiting and have the driver cancel on me, I am just out of luck, and have to wait another who knows how long.  Drivers should have some kind of penalty if they cancel rides after excessive passenger wait times.
title: No real care for their riders

review: I was at a concert venue 10 minutes away from home, two ladies I met at the concert were trying to get a ride and they all kept canceling, I asked Steven if they could ride with us, and he was so gracious to help us adding a new ride for these mom and daughter. I appreciate your kindness and patience Steven.
title: Great

review: Thank you so much for getting me to my destination safe and waiting for me to get in the door before you drove off! If I had more money in my account I would have definitely given you a bigger tip. Maybe next time…. But THANKS AGAIN! Have a wonderful night 😊
title: Stephanie the Uber Driver

review: I was late to school because my Uber driver canceled as he was at my house. I told him in advance that I had forgotten to put my dog in the crate, would only take a minute as he was down the street I was in the process of putting my dog in the crate, and I had walked outside and he had canceled I had ordered the Uber at 7:15. They told me he was 10 minutes away. He came at 7: 30 this is more than once
title: It’s ok

review: This was my first Uber and I must say it was a WONDERFUL experience. A very nice, clean Benz picked me up with a young professional driver. My trip was almost 30 miles and we talked the entire distance. Should the opportunity present itself again in the future, I will certainly utilize their services.
title: First timer.

review: I was picked up in a timely manner by a driver named David m. I told him is was taking the bus to Philadelphia to cover the NLCS (D-Backs vs Phillies) Game-2. We talked about the 100-win Orioles of 2023, the 40th Anniversary of the 1983 World Champion O’s, and the 1979 Orioles that lost to the Pirates. It was a fun and engaging ride. That’s what makes Uber a great company! Thank you - The “Charm’tastic Mile” of Baltimore, Derrick E Vaughan.
title: Charm’tastic Mile Going to Philly for NLCS

review: Every time I Oder and under they sit there doing nothing and they are worthless sitting and doing nothing they should not be allowed to dive I still have not gotten someone to have idea how to dive don’t be and Uber diver if you don’t want to drive you wasting  my time by being lazy and incompetent
title: The drive who is lazy

review: I Love Uber so much ! Maybe these guys will sponsor me one day with how much i use this app 😂😂 HaHa… But its a Amazing app VERY CONVENIENT AND FAST! Also very simple to use.. just type in where your at and where you wanna go and boom your on your way and usually they get to you to pick you up withing 10 minutes or less ! 🫶
title: Love Uber ! 🫶

review: The maps always show me at a incorrect location making pickup difficult. Some drivers will acknowledge and respond to texts or phone calls when you tell them where you are and advise them to ignore the map. Many do not. Uber charges you a cancellation fee when the driver doesn’t show up. It is difficult to find the appropriate menus to ask for a refund.
title: Inaccurate maps and no avenue for feedback

review: I am staying at a large resort in Kissimmee and thought it would be easy to get around by Uber, using the same address to get back to our hotel the Uber maps take the driver to the wrong spots every time and it’s always somewhere different. One time it said we arrived and it was still 5 miles away and not even the right street address!
title: Maps are horrible

review: I ordered 40 dollars of food and after 1.5 hours it said it was completed but it never came. I called the help desk and they did not help at all, no we’re sorry, no explanation, no resolution, no refund. Use a different app if you actually want the food you paid for
title: Never arrived. Help desk no help

review: The app works for awhile then eventually it stops and keeps saying how payment isn’t possible with the payment method but it says that with every credit card I put on there. I looked it up and a lot of people says it has happened to them too and they couldn’t get in contact with support and when they did they didn’t fix the app or even help. It’s a great app at first but not for long.
title: App isn’t working anymore

review: This was the most pleasurable drive in the worst congested traffic. Our driver was not only prompt but very knowledgeable about this area and what a true professional in his field! Thank you for the great ride. If we are ever in LA again I can only hope we meet again!!
title: Our trip to Greek Theater

review:
The directions took the Uber to a deserted Road and said that was the Tweed airport. It was common sense to go around and we found the airport. The entrance to Arrivals was pretty deserted, there was no soul!
 so I came through departures and it smelled really bad. There was some leakage I don’t know what was all that? The smell was so bad.
The driver was very polite and courteous.
title: Ride to the Tweed airport

review: I left my computer in the car and the Uber driver met me within 18 hours to get my computer back. I understand I was charging additional $20. I gave the driver extra cash because I really wanted to thank him for a job well done. Thank you.
title: Thank you for your honesty

review: I finally deleted my account after having issue after issue with this company. I accepted an offer for a free trial period of UberOne, then attempted to cancel after. I was continuously charged over and over for the membership that I had cancelled multiple times. They would auto draft it out of my account without any notification prior or asking if I wanted to re-start the service. Very shady, sketchy business practices. I use Lyft regularly and have NEVER had an issue with them.
title: Horrible Company

review: Scott was very friendly and informative. He played upbeat music. He was also very patient as we were running a little behind. He appeared to be a very safe driver with two hands on the wheel and obeyed all traffic rules stopping on yellow. We were Super pleased with Scott’s service. Many thanks to Scott!
title: Thank you Scott!

review: Uber doesn’t do enough to protect their riders from sketchy drivers. If you happen to lose an item in an Uber, it’s almost impossible to get back. There is no customer service phone number, and the chat isn’t helpful. I had an issue with the driver and was told the “special services team” would take care of it, but I never received any email following up with my urgent safety request. Almost as if  the “special services”/ safety team doesn’t actually exist.
title: Horrible customer service

review: Extremely nice and helpful gentleman. We had trouble finding one of our locations to pickup the luggage. Our driver said no problem, he looked it up and found it. When we arrived at our apartment he also waited until we were inside. 👍🏻👍🏻
title: Great service

review: My driver made the ride an absolutely amazing experience. He was friendly, kind and very knowledgeable. I would recommend him to all of my friends and family. I can’t say enough about how wonderful he is as a driver and as a person! Uber is lucky to have him! Thank you!!!!
title: Amazing Ride

review: I’ve tried for several days now to try and get a ride home from work (it’s a 2 hour walk) and every single time I take a picture of my id to verify it’s me which is a problem for me separately and it says it’s blurry or out of focus. I have gone over every pixel to find this blurry spot or out of focus area to find nothing the images were always in focus no glare nothing! Yet I currently find myself walking him AGAIN after this stupid app once again has denied me a ride.
title: Wont verify ID

review: I think the Uber app is ridiculous that I must acknowledge five stars to not be subjected to choosing “an issue” with the ride.  I should be able to select however, many stars I want, and if an issue applies, and or I choose to acknowledge it, that should be my choice not the app requiring me to make a perfect rating or choose an issue. The upper executives should have this changed!
title: Uber app

review: I have my own car. But something came up tonight where I had to drive a friend home. And I didn’t want to stay the night so I Uber at home and it was my first ever ride ever. It was very convenient! My driver was amazing! Great app, easy to use, will definitely use at some more!
title: My first Uber ride ever.

review: This day is very important to us and we would not want to miss the opportunity of being US citizens. We are glad and appreciate that the driving makes us at ease and comfortably safe. Thank God we arrive just in time. No hassles, no discomforts and no disappointments. Uber made it all happen🌈🌺🌸🌼🙏❤️
title: Review

review: I made an order with the Uber eats and submitted, told me “something went wrong”. Okay, so I restarted the app and tried again with success. Turns out the original order I placed went through, but the app lied to me and said it failed. This wouldn’t be such a big deal if there was an at all useful customer support system, but it is not helpful at all. This app is designed to scam you and leave you with no recourse of action to correct their mistakes. Practices like this should be illegal
title: Slow app caused a double order

review:
This paraplegic Army war veteran is truly phenomenal !! He’s a hero to me. He’s made himself not only a successful and kind Uber driver, but an airplane and boat pilot, as well as a devoted father and inspirational  human being.
I’m so sorry, Tangelo, that I forgot to update my credit card history with Uber.  I tried to just now, and hoped it succeeded.  Please let me know!!
title: Tangelo

review: We were from out of town and thought we had dropped the right pin but turns out we were not at the proper pickup. I measgaed our driver and he was gracious enough to wait while we had to wind ourselves through the hotel to find him!! Super grateful!! Thank you 🙏🙏🙏
title: Patient pick up!

review: I was returning from my trip I’m Jameka a little excited but I was also observing the driver never rode in a Tesla before a great ride. Wonderful experience we laughed she has questions I asked questions about the car.
title: Kylee was excellent driver she was on time customer service was great and we had good conversation

review:
I once was on a trail and parked my car pretty far, it got late and phone almost dead, uber was my only way to get back home. 

My plane was cancelled in nyc and i lived in upstate, phone was also about to die anf it was late, without ubering home ai would have been on the streets
title: Uber is my life saver twice

review:
I need to get home to baby sit my roommates kids. He has a job interview. I just used the app… a $40 fair. I tipped the driver (very well, $30) in cash. In app, I entered no tip and left a 5 star review.

Immediately after I submitted this, the app deleted itself from my iPhone and started downloading it again automatically. I’m out of data, so I have to use Wi-Fi, I’m almost out of battery. Luckily I’m close to my job… but if the app worked properly, I wouldn’t have to worry about any of this!!!

Is this a punishment function because I entered no tip? Punishment because they thought I was cheap? Maybe because it indicated I tipped with cash, which can easily be omitted from tax records?

This app has worked perfectly for the last 1000 rides, why suddenly now?
title: App issues

review: I was thrilled Katina took my ride from Raleigh to Wilmington when I had to cancel my flight home to stay with my sister in Wilmington.  We had a great conversation on many topics and it passed the time quickly.  I would recommend her to everyone.
title: Last minute change.

review: As she arrived, she sought us and gently alerted others entering the car that she was there for us. Conversation was natural, pertinent and friendly. She added information about shopping areas and other options for getting around the city. For my (and my daughters’) first Uber ride, I am satisfied. Thanks.
title: Punctual/Careful/Social

review: We arrived at Ft Lauderdale airport tired and anxious to get home. Our driver Freddy arrived just a few minutes after we requested a ride with a friendly smile. He immediately got out of the van and placed our bags in the trunk. The ride home was smooth and stress free accompanied by good conversation.. thank you for a nice welcome back home Freddy! 🙂
title: Nice Ride Home

review:
You have the best user interface of any app or organization or government agency I have ever used. Nice job! 

You could (and should!) provide counsel and design services to every other company who engages with the public in any manner.

Seriously, whoever oversees your user interface deserves a Nobel!
title: User Interface

review: Uber is awful!!! They give you an ETA that is never fulfilled. And will also give you a price, literally DOIBLE IT if you wait a minute, not send a drive for over 20 minutes after they say they will and when you cancel, they charge you a $5 for for them making you later. PLUS they then will take the price of your ride and cut it back down to the origins quote after they take your $5. So they love taking your money on a regular basis and making you late.
title: Terrible service, bad price changes & ETAs

review: Nelson met us promptly and because I didn’t enter the address to drop us off at he helped me change it. Along the way he pointed out great sites and talked a lot of his wonderful nation. He also gave us some good tips on the area we are staying( where not to go). Thank you so much!
title: Trip in Portugal

review: I called for the first time your Uber line; I had the pleasure of speaking to Andrew who made it so easy. He confirm the service, sent me all the information and a car picked up my son from the hospital in less than 10 minutes. Thank you, they confirm they arrived.
title: Great Call Experience

review: Glad to have Sabine as our driver from the airport to our hotel. Had to change location. Mid route and she was grateful in accepting the new address.   Wonderful conversation. If you are looking for a way to recognize our veterans choose Sabine who served many years with the US Army.
title: Wonderful driver was Sabine

review: The long and short of it: incredibly wrong estimated pick-up times. Are you interested in waiting 4 minutes for a driver that is 0 minutes away? use uber. 0 stars for estimated pickup time, 1 star for drivers who are somehow worse than cab drivers? 0 stars for the cleanliness in cars when you order a standard ride - unless youre riding in a Lincoln Navigator/Uber Black, don’t be surprised at the stains all over car upholstery and shoddy exteriors. Do you want a working seatbelt only half the time?? Use Uber.
title: Uber ceo belongs in purgatory

review: When I left my house, three hours prior, there was an escapee in the area. I asked Sean if he would hang out for a minute so I could check the house before I came in. He even volunteered to come in and help. He hung out and waited till I came out safe. I really appreciated that. Thank you.
title: Above and beyond

review:
Neither forced small talk nor awkward silences. Easy to converse with.

Her driving was so smooth that I could have filled a mug of coffee to the brim and not spilled a drop.

If Uber ever begins vetting their new hires before employment, model it around this woman. If I knew how to, I would personally request her from now on
title: Most peace I’ve ever felt riding with a driver

review:
When the driver is playing head banging music the ride can be fast and bumpy
Our last driver played chill mellow music and drove carefully and slowly- and if course maybe it took a minute more but the tip was bugger because we got there with no stress or panic
Chill music =better ride
title: When the driver is mellow

review: This has been a constant problem with Uber. They have constantly charged me for toll ways I did not take. I’ve had check EVERY single ride after I was dropped off to make sure I wasn’t being overcharged cause I didn’t trust them anymore. After my most recent request, they said I had too many requests to take off the toll charges. “Too many”? How is it my fault you guys are the ones ripping people off. Use Lyft if you have to, Uber is a rip off.
title: BEWARE of toll charges that your route did NOT use!

review: My driver Orlando was right there to pick us up , he hopped right on out and helped grab ours things and put them into the trunk . He called when he was close to let me know . He was so kind and respectful . I had fun on our ride :) . Keep on being amazing Orlando . Thanks again .
title: Orlando was the best driver I’ve ever had

review: It always takes 15-30 mins to get an Uber in Little Rock no mater the time of day except for very late flights or early early morning flights when there is no Uber at all.  It appears the ratio of Uber drivers to riders is lacking. I travel a lot and most places I can get an Uber in 2-5 min all day long.  I would settle for 10-15 mins. The bottom line is more drivers needed in LR.
title: Little Rock Needs More Drivers

review: Our Car broke down and had to call Uber to take us home! Our driver, Syed was kind, down to earth and kept my kids entertained and had them laughing all the way here. He was so good with them that they forgot our issue. Thank you so much for brightening our day!
title: Awesome ride!

review:
I put in the wrong pick up location and the driver understood it was a mistake. He helped me correct the error then arrived at the new pick up location with a smile on his face ! 

It was a pleasure to ride this afternoon after a long day traveling. Thank you for the ride home !
title: Excellent service !

review: I use this app 2-3 times a week.  I live in the city and do not need my own vehicle. I would like to see the app go back to the feature to rate and tip the driver during the ride.  I find it cumbersome to do so after the ride has ended. I also find surge pricing makes no sense on occasion and most of the surge goes to Uber and not to the drivers.
title: Needed app

review:
Martin was a perfect driver. I had previously tried Lyft twice and I was at the pick up spot when I told the drivers I was inside in my wywith luggage I could not handle .
Martin showed up, cam inside the terminal to get my luggage and when I arrived at my hotel he got me and my luggage to the check in counter. Go Uber!Iowa Traveler
title: Ohare trip

review: Our driver who was supposed to pick us up couldn’t make it, so I called Uber last minute. David was there quickly. He was very friendly, helped with the luggage, and I would definitely like to use his services again for future trips
title: Trip to airport

review: If there is a feature on the app called live location sharing, then it should do a better job at sharing your live location. Either that or your drivers need a tutorial on how to read a map, even though it reads itself to you.
title: Location Sharing

review: My first Uber ride was a very pleasant experience. Downloaded the app and put in my location then driver came and picked me up. She was very nice and polite and engaging in conversation. Her name was Janet. I enjoyed being in her presence, the car was clean. Everything was very comfortable and relaxing for my first time riding with a Uber driver.
title: My first time

review: I asked for a ride in Reno. I was told to wait 10. Fine. It was freezing out. I'm a cripple and it's difficult to walk. When it showed 3 min I went outside to wait. After a few minutes,nothing! Sent a message.  On the way. Ok. Another few minutes. Told she cancelled. I'm outside freezing , cant walk. Tried again. Finally another Uber driver came by and got me. Wonderful guy. It's too bad that a cripple is blown off. It's ok since I'll use a cab from now on.
title: Review

review:
It can sometimes be an awkward silence when sharing a ride, but not this time! Not only was Joseph an excellent driver, but he was courteous, polite and so easy to talk with. I feel very fortunate to have had Joseph as my Uber driver today. Thanks for the lift to Auto Whiz, Joseph and for the enjoyable conversation. 
Libby
title: Joseph! All Uber drivers should be like him !!!

review: I tried to tip & rate my ride. Rated 4 stars. Would not let me submit tip & rating unless I did 5 star!!!  The issues listed did not pertain to why I rated 4 instead of 5.  The reason was the driver became somewhat upset when he was told the tip would be done online later. He said everyone always says that but they don’t.  Tips are a gratuity- not an obligation. I found that to be very inappropriate.
title: Uber App problem

review: The problem I have with this app is, I was hacked, and my password no longer worked, it wants a 2 step authentication number that was never set up. So now I have no way to get back into the app. No way to reset my password, no way to contact anyone, no email addresses no help sites , no phone calls , I did see where even if Someone has control over my act , they can not get any personal information from it. Their loss I’ll be using Lyft now I guess.
title: No contact information for assistance

review: My Uber ride with Elvis today was great!  He’s a very good driver and I felt very safe in the car with him.  He’s passionate with his job and customers and wants to make sure you have a pleasant experience with him. His customer service skills are great, very friendly with great conversation during my ride. Thank you Elvis!!
title: Elvis is Great!!

review: I think Uber is charging too much. This is becoming a common taxi ride. Then more and more Uber rides. I’ll take it. Seems like everyone feels the same way. Uber is the start calling their profits and letting Uber drivers make more of a profit. mark my words. Hello why won’t it? Let me press send.
title: My thoughts

review: Uber drivers have the opportunity to accept the job. after accepting the job, we also have the opportunity to cancel a job which intern delays my opportunity to get picked up and driven to my site in a timely manner. I had two drivers cancel on me while I waited both times for 15 minutes. I do understand the weather was terrible that day, but do not accept a job if you’re not gonna go through with it.
title: Uber Drivers Cancel Ride

review: I’ve been seeing Uber drivers getting robbed n killed but I think Uber should have tracking while the driver in service n make a button too alert the police when they in danger I see that as a good idea keeping the driver n the passenger safe at all time
title: Idea Uber should do

review:
I was supposed to go to Port Authority instead I was dropped at Grand Central Station. So I missed my bus to New Jersey. 
I have to take Taxi  from Grand Central to Port Authority .
I have used UBER in many cities  including New York  a few years ago. It  has never happen to me before. Very disappointed.
title: Drop  at the wrong location
developerResponse: {'id': 33795158, 'body': "Hi, We're extremely sorry to hear about your concern regarding your recent experience. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve your concern, fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343HNsE. We shall get back to you at the earliest.", 'modified': '2022-12-19T06:07:16Z'}

review: William arrived and my sister was sick and couldn’t leave the bathroom, he patiently waited for 3 minutes and was so understanding when I called him to explain he was so nice no attitude and wished her well !! Super customer service you need more Williams ! Wonderful Attitude and great personality..thank you so much
title: Such a Sweet driver compassionate and understanding

review: Unsafe driver left me out for dead. It was raining why should I have to pay ? A rude unsafe  driver . I asked about 5 times to please wait . I told I’d be a min. I  was still @ the door of my destination when I got a message if it d like to ship Sean. Unsafe rude l eft me in the road in the rain. I think y’all need to teach him again. I feel I need not paying for this COLD AWFUL RIDE. That’s why I rated a 4
title: Safety, unsafe, rude

review: Adrian was a fantastic driver who went well out of his way to be kind and courteous! He exemplifies the best in the human spirit!  He is not just  a  professional driver but an incredible human being! At this time of year he is another reason to be grateful  because we don’t see this very often!
title: A Fantastic Driver

review:
The drivers with 4.5 and more stars are really efficient. Overall I’ve only encountered  a few discourteous drivers who never acknowledged 
My saying hello when I entered the car- as an example. But overall, Uber is a great travel option.
I really love it!
title: My overall impression of Uber rides.

review:
Sometimes the matching process takes over 30 min. And much easier for drivers to cancel on riders who are waiting. I have had to use alternative ride solutions the last few trips in 2022.

Thanks
title: Getting much more difficult to find rides

review: I’ve experienced this on multiple occasions. The drives are starting to make me uncomfortable. They have been pushing Christian religions on customers. It’s okay to be religious but I’m just trying to go to work and home. Please can you ask the drivers to stop pushing their religions beliefs on to customers.
title: Update driver policy

review:
Please change your maps system!! please!! Less distance doesn’t always equal less time!! 
Uber will always show the way that has many signals and requires a car speed of 60km/h instead of the empty highway that’s 100km/h which is obviously faster.I am always late to class because of this and they always charge more money because the trip took more time.
title: Map

review: Hello, I'm Uber app just went completely black screen! Check for updates, nothing needed. Now if I delete app and start over I won't find out who my last driver was and lose all my info associated with the app. Never got to tip last driver and she was one of the best ones if had so far. Help me out please. djrobadams
title: Black screen

review:
The promise of Uber has fallen flat. Prepare yourself for long delays being picked up and expensive rides if you do happen to get a driver. 

Every recent ride I’ve taken has been delayed due to two or more drivers canceling while I waited. Uber recently charged me $5.50 for canceling a ride after I waited nearly 30 minutes. 

They will also charge you for the inaccuracy of their app and drivers - a driver supposedly waited for me one street away from my house despite me confirming my address and Uber charged me. Can I charge them for drivers canceling and making me wait?

This is an unreliable service. By they way, they have NO CUSTOMER SERVICE! They don’t want to listen to users or fix their problems, there is no way to contact them other than using a very limited menu of preselected topics.
title: Lower your expectations

review: My driver took an extra 20 min to get to me because she wanted to stop at the McDonald’s by my job they always have a long line it’s 11:30 at night my job is closed and I’m just a 20 year old female outside not to mention it took the app 20 min to find her gap 40 min then on top of that u get in the car and for a 22mile ride she’s literally eating the entire time didn’t say not 1 word was going 70 the speed limit is 55 she didn’t have a seat belt on or anything this isn’t even my first time with a bad driver
title: Bad and rude driver

review: The quality of Uber has gone down tremendously. Rides are very overpriced and drivers are not even compensated. No reason for a ride to cost a passenger $100 but the driver only receives $23. Makes you question who’s really being paid? Also, I’ve been trying to deactivate my account for some time because I am disgusted and cannot find that option. There’s no reason for a $10 ride to jump to $30 because it’s busy, and then the driver barely makes any money from it.
title: Horrible

review: lowkey uber, you scammed me and my friends. we was tryna turn up @ the club n be safe and y’all keep giving us bad ubers bc we ordered uber XL FOR 6 of us and they only fit 4 :(((((but i’m not mad but i feel kind of played bc we had to drive on our own when we were tryna make safety precautions. I will most likely take uber in the future, but i would rather have Uber XL fit 6 people rather than 4. ❤️
title: false advertisement

review:
Every driver I have ever had, whether I ordered the Uber or a friend did, has been absolutely fantastic. 

However, today I reached out to Uber because I was overcharged by $30. I pre-ordered an Uber the day before because it was a super early ride (~4 am) and was quoted about $46. When I went on the app the morning of my ride, the pricing was $16 for the exact same ride, and they refused to match their OWN price. Ridiculous waste of money. It’s reasons like this why I never use ride-sharing apps.
title: Drivers are great, representatives are terrible

review: Had no issues with Uber in America, but in Turkey app is awful, let's drivers manually input the price and they always attempt to charge a higher rate than is listed on the meter. Have had to contact support multiple times when they 'accidentally' charged two or three times what the ride was supposed to cost, and you should always take a picture of the meter because the price will come out higher than it should be 90% of the time...
title: Decent in the States, Awful Overseas.

review: I was forced to walk through a dangerous area in a big city alone as a small woman. I called a ride and it moved the pickup location half a mile from the well lit train station I had come from. I canceled immediately and was charged for the full ride! I didn't want to be charged when the app did this to me again so I had to explore this dangerous area alone at night. I hate this crappy company! Not to mention the way it treats its drivers, who literally make this company exist.
title: Awful! Price gouging and unreliable service.

review: the pin system set up for the uber rides needs more work, the second time in a row i’ve been late because my driver ask me for a pin that wasn’t sent to me. try to use the last 4 digits of my phone number which my uber is on nothing.
title: Uber pin system

review: I signed up for Uber with Earnings Guarantee of $2500. I’ve complete the trips with Gold Status, 87% acceptance rate, and 5.0 Star rating. When it came time to pay the difference, I can speak to ANYONE THAT UNDERSTANDS ENGLISH. 100% of customer service is outsourced. If you are reading this, get a wage attorney as they will only pay once a lawyer calls.
title: Earnings Guarantee Scam

review: I’m very upset I was charged for a ride and never asked for a Uber second I don’t even have the app because it’s been messing up but Uber charged me for a ride I didn’t receive a text from a driver plus how could I when I don’t have the app well this definitely made me suggest that I’m done with Uber scamming and stealing money no more and I will not recommend Uber to know one I’m going back to Lyft but I will get my money I don’t care how Uber will release my money and im reporting the site
title: Charge for a ride that I never asked for

review: They always have an outage that won’t let you get any orders. You’ll literally have to call support every single time you want to go online and actually receive orders if not you’ll be riding around wasting your gas. Sometimes they actually fix it for the day and sometimes they don't but thats only for that specific date because the next day after best believe you’ll have to make a call to support. Terrible job do not drive for them!
title: Theres always technical issues

review: More often than not, the drivers accept the request and then sit in a parking lot for 10+ minutes waiting for you to cancel. Or they drive in the opposite direction and you watch the pickup time go from 5 minutes to 10 minutes, to 15 minutes and you are forced to cancel. Uber needs to fix this because it’s becoming a continuous problem. Customers should not be the ones eating the cancellation fees when the driver won’t pick you up.
title: Drivers wait for cancellation fees

review: The app makes it impossible to find something as basic as past rides. Instead, Uber wastes front page space for Ukraine donations, vaccine information, Uber Eats, etc but nowhere anywhere in the app can the user find their ride history. Fine Uber wants to dip it’s fingers into all sorts of other areas. But as someone who travels frequently, I’m not wasting my time trying to find something basic that should be basic. I’ll use other service or forms of transportation whenever possible.
title: What a mess

review: The rides were fine but they signed me up for Uber Pass and charged me $25 without my knowledge. If you have an account, I'd recommend reviewing all options to ensure you're not automatically signed up. Fortunately, the support center was able to refund me the fee.
title: Beware of Uber Pass!

review:
My last Uber driver threatened to throw my out of his car on the freeway when I asked him to drive normally. Uber responded to my complaints with a $20 credit.

Just know in advance that your life and safety are worth $20 to them. I will never use this app again.
title: Uber doesn’t care about safety

review: Uber is getting worse on a daily basis. Probably also depending on local regulations, however drivers have been cancelling rides constantly and very frequently. This makes pick up times unpredictable and causes unnecessary frustration.
title: Too many cancelled rides

review: I’ve been with Uber since the beginning and they were amazing but then they started getting greedy and now a trip that’s 1.5 miles and 5 minutes away now costs me $20+ and we’ll over $40-$50 for a scheduled trip for the same distance this kind of treatment is not morally correct. I would love to continue using your app but when I use Uber to get to and from work your costing me over half my paycheck per week just to get to work. Not happy with this service
title: Used to be great not anymore

review: It’s the third straight day I’m using the app and for no reason it sends my driver far away just to make him drive for 25 minutes back ! That’s a waste of my time and drivers gas they need to improve their GPS or let drivers use other GPS apps it’s just ridiculous has to wait 25 minutes instead of 5 just because Uber GPS decide to do that stupid long U turn.
title: Why so many turns?

review:
Account placed on hold, no answer as to why. Only thing I can think of is I am brown and was wearing a rainbow equality shirt while on my short trip to Arizona. I took two uber rides there one from my friends house to the hotel and another from the hotel to my friend’s house. Nothing interesting happened in either ride. I said hello, sat quietly in the back and said thanks at the end. 

 Thanks to being placed on hold I can’t even order food on uber eats or postmates (since they own that too now). Stop hiring racist/homophobic drivers.
title: Placed on Hold

review: I use Uber eats and Uber all the time  I used my rewards points on Uber eats for 15% off 5 rides and every time I click see your promotion it brings me to Uber and the app crashes or it won’t show my promotion so now I just lost all my rewards points and I haven’t gotten an explanation on why I can’t use them and I don’t want them to expire at that point I’ll stop using Uber.
title: I love Uber but the promotion rewards

review:
“Driver shortage, fares may increase” every single time I use the service!

??? So pay your people a decent wage and maybe you won’t have a driver shortage! I’m tired of paying $40 for a 16 minute drive when the driver is making less than half of that. Absolutely ridiculous. Fares used to be reasonable and affordable and now the service is price gouging the consumers and the drivers. Where is all that extra money going? I’m not going to use this service any more.
title: Disappointed in what used to be a great service

review: I had too many issues with this app. The riders wouldn’t communicate and just leave the food wherever. Or the drivers would pick up your trip but stay in the same location for over 15minutes. I also got double charged for a trip because the app was having problems. And when you need a ride urgently, it will not be available or the app will have problems. Horrible.
title: So many problems

review: Having platinum status got me nowhere when the app incorrectly logged my ride boost as EWR to EWR. When I asked to have it corrected and the proper uber points credited, I was sent into an endless loop of bot replies telling me that they are working to resolve the issue, 5 days later same response. Also the priority airport pickup left me stranded for over an hour until I gave up and got a yellow cab. They sent me a sorry push notification saying I would get $5 uber cash, but that never happened either.
title: Premium Customer Service is a bot

review: I’m extremely frustrated I put my address as exactly what it is on the building and yet I constantly am having Ubers tell me that that is not the address on the pick up location and now I was charged a cancellation fee when the driver never even showed up to my location and refuse to answer my phone calls and it will tell me that it refuses to give me my money back and this is outrageous but yet can never actually get in contact with anybody from Uber to talk about it
title: Dispute cancellation fee

review: Uber use to be so reliable but lately the rides are being over charged and rides that are scheduled get canceled by drivers last minute. A lot has changed since they first started but in my opinion it’s gotten bad. I mainly use Uber for work and lately even scheduling my ride one hour prior they still can fulfill my request. Also being heavily over charged to go from Korea Town to Silverlake. I almost paid 40$ for a 10-8 minute drive with no traffic. Uber has really lost its way.
title: Losing its way

review: I paid extra for a ride to be quick and the person didn’t show up. I had to walk to work in the rain and I was late, only to find out that they charged me a cancellation fee. I specifically didn’t cancel it myself because it said I’d have to pay the $10 for a ride I didn’t get and when the driver canceled it, I still got charged. When I disputed it they said they’d apply it to my next ride. I’m not getting a next ride. I can walk in the rain for free. There are no customer help options.
title: Theft

review: This is the fourth time ive been cancelled midway through someone coming to pick me up for work, i have been late multiple times because drivers continue to cancel and be unreliable, not to mention theres nothing stopping them from doing so. Not only that but they also get paid for half of their cancelled ride attempt? Are you kidding me? Absolute worst. You cant even report the drivers doing so because the app prevents you from clicking on their profile after its cancelled. YOU cant even Report them! Im not using uber again.
title: Cancellations

review: I love Uber, great app! My only gripe is that Uber Pets aren’t available as much, but that’s not y’all’s fault just venting. There isn’t an option to schedule an Uber Pet Ride, like for dr appts, etc. and there is no way to leave a note unless the Uber driver is on the way and then they cancel when they read it’s a pet and Uber pets wasn’t available. Thank you!
title: Love it but ...

review: Selected a ride at $25ish. We completed the ride and got an email after the ride was over stating they were “adjusting” the price by an extra $11ish to account for a “vehicle upgrade” we didn’t agree to. The app told us they couldn’t do anything about it so we emailed them directly. Told me they couldn’t find the trip I was asking about and sent me back to the app that led me nowhere. I’ve used the app twice ever and never again. Absolute garbage experience. They stole from me. Save your money, ride with lyft...
title: You’ll be charged more than you agree to

review: We were in from out of town and had forgotten our meds so a trip to Walgreens had to be done. He was so super nice and patiently waiting for us to get our prescription. He could have said we needed to order another Uber but he didn’t and waited on us.
title: Reinaldo is amazing!!

review: Was on time actually early which was great as I was ready. Quiet small conversation learned some interesting facts about Gerald. Great person and professional. Car was clean and ride was smooth. I would recommend on my next trip or hopefully on my way back home. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
title: Uber driver Gerald

review: Was extremely professional, friendly and I would highly recommend her
title: Jennifer was extremely professional and friendly. Definitely would request her again!

review: I used UBER recently for a ride that was long due to rush hour traffic.  My driver, Ahmad, was the most friendly, pleasant driver I’ve had.  More importantly, he was a safe driver as he negotiated the traffic, and was considerate with others on the road even when they weren’t!  I was very impressed with him.
title: Great driver!

review:
First off let me say UBER and the idea behind it is the BEST 
However the games management play with their customers and drivers is HORRIBLE 
the prices fluctuate by the minute 
As I am usually loyal to 1 company 
I find at times I have to check prices at LYFT 
when the price of a ride from UBER is $89 and I check LYFT at the same time and it’s $65 then I have a problem spending my hard earned money with UBER 
Next the amount they pass on to the driver is kind of unfair 
When they started UBER drivers got a lot more and as time goes on now they give the drivers even less
Can it just be CORPORATE GREED ?
I do realize the Airports and municipalities are probably getting 
Their hands into UBERs pockets 
Which is really a HIDDEN THEFT
by politics 
Really a hidden TAX
because ultimately the end user 
Pays it indirectly 
Oh well just saying my thoughts
title: ROLLERCOASTER PRICES

review: I always have a car/truck to drive. My Challenger got totaled a couple of weeks ago. Don’t have a replacement yet, but I work from home, so no big deal, until I need to go somewhere. I checked, it was $10. Boom, 4 minutes later Philip was there. Life is good.
title: New to Uber

review: Dumb driver drove right passed me.  I was waving her down and everything.   Didn’t even respond to my many messages and notes.  Then canceled my ride cus she was too stupid to go where my correct address is.  Then drove right passed me on the way out.  She should NOT be allowed to represent you.  You’d better refund me like you said you would.  Why should we the customer get penalized because your Uber drivers have no brain and it’s their fault.
title: Horrible

review: Ralph greeted on time with a clean and comfortable car. The trip was flawless and his driving made us feel at ease. His tips regarding our upcoming trip were spot on and quite valuable. Ralph was super friendly and made my first Uber such a great experience. What a delight to have a fellow Parrothead as our driver.
title: Bubbles up…

review: I used to ride Uber a lot in the city and loved the convenience. It wasn’t until earlier this year when I decided to stop. I accidentally left my AirPods and case in a driver’s car. I contacted the driver who made it difficult to get them back. I then contacted customer service to see if they could be a mediator in the return process. Instead, they berated me and seemed really impatient. I decided to delete the app after that. It’s been 5 months and I still haven’t gotten my AirPods back.
title: Customer Service is Condescending

review: First time using Uber, setup account, flew to Minneapolis and the app gave me all the information I needed to navigate to my pickup location. The apps also gave me the car info , so I didn’t have any problems locating her. The driver was friendly and car was spotless .
title: First time user

review: I love that I could count on the UBER APP.. whether it's sending packages across town or ordering food or getting the kids to school or bball games while I'm working late I always know that I can just use my UBER APP... This app is great. Thank you UBER for always making it easy for working parents.. 😉
title: Love This App

review: Coco is a brilliant person. She wakes up early to be available for airport runs at 3am. I appreciate her for taking the time out of her morning to hold a meaningful conversation with a stranger. Thanks for making my life better for having met you. I hope life brings you joy and happiness.
title: Excellence above all

review: I’ve done business with Uber N Uber Eats N they will have drivers that will simply not look for you N drive pass you over and over again, vehicle descriptions don’t be accurate sometimes, when it comes to food if the person don’t deliver it Uber eats just keeps or takes your money and like Uber eats basically let’s the driver that want to keep peoples food get away with exactly that
title: Y’all be slick scamming people out they money sometimes

review:
Got a gift card to use with this app. Like other big tech companies, the true worth of Uber is harvesting consumer information and selling it. There is no reason they need to amount of personal info they require.

Be warned that they will require your state ID before you can book a ride, a requirement they do not advertise anywhere before you make your first payment.

Will be uninstalling after the gift money runs out, and I will never give them a cent of my own money.
title: Requires private info

review: Raphael made my stressful trip relaxing. This was the first time I took my three dogs in a car and he made us comfortable. He had no music playing instead we had a conversation which made the ride go by faster but I am sure he would have remained silent if it is what I preferred
title: Relax

review: This guy had just gotten out of jail. Needed a ride but didn’t have a phone that worked. He had cash and I downloaded it hoping there wasn’t gonna be a huge process. Boom! Had him a ride to his home within 5 minutes. 👍🏻
title: Better than I expected

review:
Above and beyond. She drove me and my wife from Dallas airport to college station. Lots of construction and obstacles but she was professional and very kind hearted. I am still worried about her long drive back to Dallas. That is how you feel like you know her and could be her friend. 
Shine on and God bless.
title: I love meeting old fashioned honest people.

review: Making the reservation was very easy and my ride was there waiting even though the flight was about 20 minutes late. When I hit the button I was ready, the App gave very clear instructions on where to go to get picked up.  Betania was great !
title: Portland to Boston

review: The app doesn’t even have a way to complain about a driver who cancels on you.  The one today was supposed to pick me up in 10 minutes.  20 minutes later he still hadn’t moved.  I messaged him (he read it with no response); then I called him…he hung up with not a word.  After I sent yet another message, he cancelled.  Very poor service.  I have his name and car tag number, but can’t even complain to the organization.
title: They excel at cancelling rides after making you wait

review: They boast that you can view and control your data but the truth is they only actually show you a small fraction of the data they collect and they make opting out difficult and even if you do opt out and delete your account they are still going to keep your data. I can’t wait for someone to make another ride share app that doesn’t cost you all your privacy and will pay its drivers enough that they don’t look for other creepier benefits.
title: Shady data collection

review: Honestly I’ve never deal with any issues from uber.  Whenever I’ve had an issue with anything pertaining uber drivers, Uber always handles everything perfectly and super fair! I’ve never had any big issues either or anything like that.
title: i love uber

review:
John was right on time, was kind and helpful. When I arrived at the airport I accidentally forgot my purse in his car. I tried to text him but couldn’t get any wifi signal. I was about to panic when I looked up to see John walking up to me with my purse. Wow! I’m so thankful for his kindness!
Amy Campbell
title: My Uber driver, John was exceptional!

review: We had problems finding our pickup spot but Sandeep was amazing. He waited extra long for us and did not criticize our delay. He was professional, courteous and extremely friendly. Thank you for a great new experience. We hope to improve our Uber skills
title: 1st Ride

review: Arriving at the airport and finding the Uber pick up was great. Wi-Fi was tricky but worked eventually.  Picking which Uber option was ok but the expected price changed twice, significantly to the point we were very tempted to take a taxi.  We were unsure if we had already paid.    The driver and his car were fine but the price ramped up after choosing Uber was not good.
title: Rate change is disconcerting

review: Andrew picked us up when lagoon closed. Cars everywhere. He did a good job of directing us to his car. The ride was much less then the quote I got from Lyft. That is what I usually use. From now on Uber will probably be my go to ride. Thanks Uber and Andrew. You have a good employee there for sure.
title: Our ride

review: When the driver doesn’t like your trip for whatever reason, they stop driving and wait in the road or go the wrong way on purpose instead of picking you up and wait for you to cancel. They don’t want to cancel you because it hurts their ratings. Be careful to not catch a cancellation fee or to not check your phone while waiting for you driver bc if you aren’t watching they might waste your time.
title: Driver not picking you up

review: This was my first time riding with Uber. I was very impressed. My driver, Derrick, was very prompt and friendly. He drove safely and sensibly at all times, which I appreciated. No bare-knuckle turns or stops. I also enjoyed his music choice (Country). Thank you, Derrick! I will definitely choose Uber again.
title: First Time Uber Customer

review:
This was the best experience.  My driver was the best.  If I could give him a triple 5 star review I would.  He arrived early to pick me up and was so very pleasant.  We shared good conversation and I have never been so relaxed in rush hour traffic.  His car was very clean and smelled good too.  
Thank you for a great experience!
title: My first Uber trip

review: Helped to ensure a patient made it safely to the destination and called me when they were not a able to enter the building. Thanks to her call I was able to make a call to the patients other provider who let her in the building.
title: Excellent service

review: The car was so fresh and clean, he got out to open my door and was so pleasant. The car smelled so nice and his conversation was awesome! This was literally the best uber ride I’ve experienced in a very long time. If I ever need Uber again I wish to get this same person! Keep up the great work!! UCity
title: Best car ride ever

review:
My driver was prompt and helpful. It was night time at a busy airport and she got out of the car to identify herself, which made it very easy to see her. The car was very clean and the ride was comfortable.
 I was very pleased and would use UBER again because of this experience.
title: Great ride home

review: I was a bit inebriated tonight.  However, because I feel that it is profoundly immoral to drive while intoxicated I left my car and called an Uber to take me home.   I truly believe that this service is a blessing for both myself and others on the road.
title: The blessing of Uber

review: Drive brought dog with her which took up full front seat.  Had to put 4 people in back.  We couldn’t use our seatbelts because we were crammed in the back seat.  Drive allowed dog to climb all over passenger.  Vehicle had terrible smell from dog. Windows dirty from dogs nose. Should have told us in app that the drive had an animal incase someone was allergic.
title: Animal in Car

review: He came in clutch last minute and swooped us up from the airport to our hotel. Very kind, informative, his car was very clean. We really like him! Thank you William for driving us and telling us your recommendations 💕 we hope you make a lot of money today and everyday🙌🏻🙏🏻🙌🏻
title: Officer William✨💪🏻✨

review: I am new to Arizona, got turned around looking for him at the airport and he waited for me a few minutes to find him.  Very friendly man, informed me and my step daughter of questions we had about Phoenix, and gave me a heads up about the type of area we were in.
title: Very Friendly!

review: So great to be able to schedule an Uber ahead of time and have one less thing to deal with when taking a flight.. no parking and waiting for shuttles and worrying about getting there in time. Uber drops you at the arrivals door and your good to go. Love this feature!!!!
title: Airport rides

review: Picked up both my children from baker middle school and dropped them off at our residence on weber and holly rd. Both my teens said it was a smooth ride and loved the vibe and music he had playing. Thank you Lawrence for taking care of my babies when I couldn’t. God bless you! 🙌🏽❤️
title: Smooth ride

review:
The service uber provides is always good and even when there’s any issues supports always try to resolve it. 
Despite all that the app itself is completely trash. I never had those problems with Uber App in Ukraine but in USA it always glitching. Readressing me to completely random pages, not letting me to contact drivers, freezing when trying to order something. The quality is terrible and it’s been like this for several months for me and all of my friends
title: App is trash

review:
Uber drivers only get 40 percent of the fair.  Uber is getting rich while the drivers starve.  The drivers have almost all the operating cost.
Come on Uber lower the ride cost and due the right thing and give your drivers a way to make a living wage. 70 percent should go to the driver
title: Drivers  pay

review: I pre ordered a ride from Downtown Nashville to BNA airport for Monday morning at 4am, and it was $50 ? Really ? It’s normally a $20-$25 ride. That’s more than double, so it’s not worth it to pre order when you could just wait and order it the morning and get a car just the same for half the price.
title: Costly

review: We put in the wrong destination. After about 20 minutes we said something to him. He pulled over and with google translator were able to communicate. He fixed it all and we arrived at our destination.  He was so gracious and kind.
title: Our driver Alexander Joel was awesome

review: Two Days ago I got off work and ordered an Uber multiple times the eventually I got a ride that was 21 minutes away . After a few minutes of waiting he sent me a message saying I’m too far I don’t go to there  please cancel . After I canceled I had to pay a 5 dollar cancellation fee I was so mad instead of ordering another Uber I ended up ordering A Ride From Lyft instead .
title: So Rude

review: Yusuf was very personable despite his limited ability to speak English.  My only complaint is that I had to wait 15 minutes for the ride.  According to my app, another driver was initially designated to pick me up and then he simply disappeared from the screen.  Hence the delay.  Curious.
title: Waiting Was Worth It

review: I will give this driver a 5+ stars  because he waited patiently for me plus was very accommodating and helping me with my bags. He  dropped me off in front of my house and waited until I got in. I will like everyone of my Uber drivers to be as courteous and patient and nice as Elvin. Thank you Elvin and good night!!
title: Very courteous and respectful  driver

review: My husband and I had the most delightful ride home from the San Francisco cruise terminal today!  Poonyan was such a friendly, engaging, and expert driver that before we knew it, our usually long and arduous journey to Livermore was over and we were delivered home safely … Thank you, Uber, for employing such great people!!😍👍
title: Great Ride Experience!

review:
Would have given a 5 star; but went through two other drivers before I got Oscar! 
He was excellent and I took care of him! 
The other two, their arrival time kept going up, then they disappeared? 
This was a last minute trip; so I didn’t book ahead very much. All worked out well!😎
title: Waiting for driver?

review: Danny was terrific! I’d give him a 10 star if I could! Danny was extremely professional, personable, and very knowledgeable in all facets of location (PR, of course, but also knowledgeable other countries, etc). He provided excellent  recommendations for restaurants and places to go / visit, and so much more! Thank you, Danny!
title: Best Uber Ride!!!! 10 STAR!

review: Mr. Sohel, our driver has a outstanding performance. I know Panchgar as a place of simplicity. So as a son of that soil he is very much simple which I like. He loves his area and within a short time with him he described about his native land to me. The Kanchanjangha is seen from his area very nice. I would like to travel again with him.
title: Sohel of Panchgar.

review: In Richmond to pick up my new car at Pearson Hyundai. When we arrived, we were not at Pearson Hyundai but at a Genesis dealership. The driver insisted it was the right place. It caused some tension for me AND the driver. This was NOT his fault. No it was Uber’s fault and I don’t appreciate it. Had I just gotten out there, which is what I usually do b/c I trust the Uber drivers, I would have been 3 miles from my destination. I had to book a second trip and pay another trip fee. Come on Uber! You can do way better than that.
title: Out of date Maps!

review:
James was unbelievable. My bag was late showing up but he was waiting for me. Had no trouble finding him. Helped me with my bag. Was a lovely conversationalist all the way from the airport. A bed all speed limits. It was an extremely smooth ride. I would highly recommend him. Thank you and safe travels.

Sue P
title: New Year’s Eve Uber

review:
The rating based on my experience with one driver today only would be a one star. On 1/8/23, I was assigned a driver named José [NO last name provided] driving a green Ford Escape license NM 59DEGL for a ride in SE Albuquerque. 

The ride was selected for 4:34 pm - the next notification said “7 minutes out “ shortening the arrival time by 20 plus minutes. 

Uber Driver José arrived in 5 min, not 7 minutes, and when I texted asking for his patience bc my mother was elderly w Dementia, his text response was “… we are not Caregivers- we are here to make money”. AND HE DROVE AWAY!!!! OMG.

 I was replying to his rude response when it bleeped off my screen - which a subsequent [competent and professional] Uber driver informed can happen mid-conversation if the Uber driver “turns off the app”. This purported driver [of the green Ford Escape license NN DEGL is an embarrassment to Uber at a minimum.
title: Uber driver w Worst Attitude EVER
developerResponse: {'id': 34246680, 'body': "Hi, We're extremely sorry to hear about your concern regarding your recent experience. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve your concern, fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343HNsE. We shall get back to you at the earliest.", 'modified': '2023-01-12T10:49:42Z'}

review: The app this morning said the pick up time was 7:10 AM. When I submitted the ride request it said he was coming in one minute which was 20 minutes prior to the time the app told me. We were then charged a wait time fee because we didn't get out to the car in that one minute, the app should be more accurate or truthful about pick up time
title: Pick time forced

review: I only use Uber when I travel. It has been very convenient in these instances. I’ve never had a bad experience. I appreciate the service and the usefulness of the app. Providing times that car will arrive to me as well as providing ETA’s to the destination is very helpful.
title: Convenient

review: A few times I tried to reserve a ride the night before and a trip that’s usually under $15 is at $40. Today I tried to get a ride that is usually under $10, the app said $30-40 at different times. After about 10 minutes, I changed the destination (which was farther away) and it said $11:50. I ordered the Uber. Not sure what the app problems are
title: Over priced

review:
Thank you to Jose for driving us home safely.  It was our very first time to UBER and best experience in it so far is Jose.  He reminded me of my grandfather and after the ride, I felt that I already know his family with all the inspiring stories about his family and etc.
Again,  thank you Jose.
title: Excellent Driver

review: You would think with all this technology you could locate the location of the rider accurately predict within 20% of the time you’re going to arrive to pick up the rider and actually drop them off where they want to go. None of that happened today. there’s no customer service. No dedication to client satisfaction. We are just forced to take what you get. SAD!!
title: Terrible

review: When considering to take an Uber I refer to the apps estimate of how close a driver is and the wait time.  These estimates seem to be false or highly erred.  Actual wait times are 2-3 times longer than initially provided by Uber. I assume that Uber is doing this to promote use of their app.  However, it is false and misleading and should be corrected by the company since after you schedule a ride you are charged if you cancel.
title: Uber gives false wait times

review: If you’re in a major city, also may apply otherwise, use the Curb app - supports local taxi drivers and from my experience it’s 1/4 to 1/3 of the cost of Uber, or Lyft. Since Uber went public they’ve increased rates significantly & from my past conversations with drivers it doesn’t trickle down (indicating the company is keeping most of the profits). It’s a shame that the former industry breaking company has become the monopoly (if you can even call it that) itself. Forget this app & this company.
title: Use the Curb App - Forget Uber/Lyft

review:
I work for the USPS. Been using Uber every day since the first year. I’ve giving everyone a 5 star review. 
My experience using your services in San Juan , Puerto Rico have been the best. The Woman and Men that work for you have been excellent drivers polite and go on and beyond to give the best service ever. 
Thanks for your service.
title: The Best!!!

review: So far I love it.  Drivers are a lot friendlier than cab drivers.   But please bring back the ordering the ride ahead of time.  It’s a hit or miss.  I rather get to work really early or a few minutes late.  I would pay extra if I can order ahead of time.
title: Overall.

review:
Uber keeps sending marketing notifications despite my preferred settings. Only way to silence the app is to disable all notifications in iOS settings.

Please don’t take advantage of notifications by spamming users with ads. Not cool.
title: App does not respect notification settings

review:
Excellent driver but minimal personality.

Never even said hello and was totally quiet entire trip of 25 minutes. 
But our safety plus driving on a rainy night could be the answer because weather conditions were horrible. 
She had excellent driving skills but teach drivers to greet their customers with a smile since they pay their earnings.
title: Driver very good

review: Worst experience with uber drivers in Bangladesh. Most of the uber drivers here are uneducated, bad mannered, uncultured, dirty. Uber has given all power to these stupid drivers and See there is no customer support solution here! When any issue arises uber authority take driver supports & make hassle for passengers. The drivers ask for extra charges, cancel ride as their wish, changes vehicles intentionally to hamper client’s privacy. So many bad vibes in Bangladesh with uber. Also the customer service employees are so lazy to handle any issue.
title: Stupid uber in Bangladesh

review:
I’ve tried to book a ride for 4 consecutive rides, 3 of them at a major LA area airport and never am able to get a driver.  I had the app searching for a driver 5 to 10 min  one time trying to get matched.  

The app then has nowhere to report whether this is a technical glitch or another problem. Just a flow chart of problems that never lead to either my problem, or anyone to talk to about a solution.

Thank god for public transit and local taxi companies
title: Unable to hail a ride, and junk customer support

review:
Drivers cancel the trip after pickup without the notice of the customer. System send another vehicle putting the customer in trouble. 
Drivers call to find out the drop location and cancel the trip if they do not like.
All this needs to stop.
title: Drivers taking customers and Uber for a ride

review: Would give 0 stars if possible! Spent over 4 hours on the phone to get a refund, got hung up on by Uber corporate, and was promised help through email, only to be told I would not receive a refund for a order that never went through for pickup!!! You can’t even call Uber back, the number doesn’t take calls!!! They also lowered my customer rating every time I complained!!! I will Never support this company again!
title: Scam!! They charged 60 dollars for a service they never delivered!!!

review: I don't understand why every time I ask for an uber it tells me a time and then when I accept the one that is closer, it changes for another uber that is even further away.  I am so tired of asking for this service and that they are so unpunctual
title: lateness

review:
Today took a ride with uber went pretty far from home. When i bought what I wanted I tried to get a ride from uber but the app glitched and wasn’t letting me order a ride back because of a “billing issue”. I tried changing my payment option but everything was correct so I eventually had to set up lyft and finally got home.

2 year later update: 
the first issue this week was a driver got very lost and we had to stop and look up directions because he didn’t trust his gps anymore so I was late for an appointment. The second I missed a doctors appointment because my rides kept getting cancelled. One after another at least 5 accepted and then declined. 

Used to be able to trust this app. But now I don’t trust it at all. It’s gotten me in more trouble than it has helped.
title: App glitches + update
developerResponse: {'id': 14162197, 'body': "Hey there, we are sorry to hear about your concern regarding the Uber Rider App. We request you to try and force close the Uber Rider App and launch it again to make this work. Please send a quick note to t.uber.com/contact and we'll connect.", 'modified': '2020-03-22T04:03:55Z'}

review: there’s no guarantee you’ll get a ride on time whether you set it up early or not. i just had a ride set about 30 minutes prior to when i should leave so i can get to my job nice and early but my driver just canceled on me when they were 6 minutes away and that’s it. just back to the main screen forced to search for another driver which also took more than 10 minutes of searching.
title: Unreliable

review: I have been an avid Uber rider but after my latest experience I decided not to use it again. I left my bag at a car after a ride and even though I called the driver within 2 minutes after the ride he refused to bring back my belongings. I called Uber customer service and they said they dont have any sort of help for this type of situation. Absolutely ridiculous. Bad customer service and bad ride experience. Highly recommend you to use taxi or Lyft instead
title: Use Lyft instead

review: This app is depressing, this is why taxis should still rule paid travel. I pay $5-$10 more to a priority then they give me a ride x6 the time and distance away. Then they won’t even pay you the difference btw, they will take your money and run. Pay for a 4 minute priority pickup? Have fun getting a ride 20 minutes away and still paying extra. Terrible app, terrible customer support aka little to no support. Use Lyft over this!!!! Way better and better support
title: Terrible accuracy/Will take your money

review: Whenever I’ve used the Uber service, I’ve had no issues. The drivers have been professional. One thing I will say is that I tip based on the driver’s assistance or lack of helping me with my luggage. Sometimes a female needs a little assistance getting her luggage UP into the trunk.
title: Service appreciated

review: Ok I’m gonna leave 4 stars but so many issues. “I’m connecting you to an Uber” like bruh I want to go home. Stop lying when there’s no Uber. It’s on its way. Sike it’s not. You have to cancel it like 5 times. So if you need to go home and you want Uber good luck. It’s finally on it’s way after 5 cancellations. Sure it’s on its way but is the hassle worth it. You let me know.
title: Ok

review: I’m a foreign student study in the US lost my wallet on the Uber in Mexico two days ago. The wallet has my passport ID cash and bank card. After I fail to contact to the driver through one phone call from Uber. I can never reach out to him again. Then I got an email from Uber it said that they will follow up. Then two days passed now no one respond! Uber customer please respond me? Can anyone see this. I’m desperate in a foreign country and I cannot go back to the US finish studying . HELP! HELP! HELP!
title: I need help from customer service!

review: I have an iPhone 13pro - I can run console games on my phone, it’s capable of live raytracing in games and has the best battery and processor I’ve ever had in any phone. The Uber driver app is so poorly and inefficiently designed that it heats up my phone until it shuts down. The only app that does anything like that, and it seems to be an extremely well known issue that every driver is sharing. Other driving apps don’t even come close to heating up my phone and killing the battery like this does
title: Terrible Overheating

review: Do not order food in this app!! Menu navigation is horribly glitchy in the food section of the app. I was about to place an order, but I decided to change from delivery to pickup. I hit the back button so I could go to an earlier page and make the change - the app then inexplicably submitted my order! And I can’t cancel it. So I’m stuck with delivery, which I don’t want. I would recommend downloading the Uber Eats app separately, though I cannot attest to whether it contains the same unacceptable bug.
title: DO NOT ORDER FOOD

review: Should have a feature where you can disable any ride that is longer than a 18 minute wait. I rather wait to find another driver than be stuck looking at some guy who accepted the ride 18 minutes away for a 5 minute trip.
title: SMH

review: Supposed to get points from rides to roll to my Bonvoy pints. Hasn’t worked in months. Removed both apps and reinstalled, logged out and back in.  Have gone in Circles with help desk. It worked fine for months and now nothing with no help.
title: Disappointed with this app and Bonvoy

review:
Got too much time on your hands? Well now the Uber app will keep you guessing which notifications on your phone and wrist are for legitimate things you need to know about or just some ad promoting the Uber service! 

 Hey devs, don’t give your marketing bozos access to your push notifications! Now I’m just turning off all notifications for this app since I can’t trust it. Which means I’ll be even less likely to use it. Way to go, marketeers! You just marketed your way to less revenue.
title: New! SPAMifications!

review: I ride with Uber fairly often. Lately, the driver will literally get 5 minutes or less away from my pickup, than cancel and I’ll have to wait another absurd amount of time for the next driver. It’s ridiculous, if a rider were to do something like that, we have to pay for the drivers time and I honestly feel something along the same lines should be in place for paying customers. They need to be held accountable for wasting our time.
title: Constantly canceling my ride

review: I love Uber but the thing I’m tired of is the drivers canceling rides if they are one the way to pick you up. Also what I don’t like is how y’all go from scheduling rides at a certain time and we have to wait for the price to go down.
title: Things I like and dislike about y’all

review: I think it’s ridiculous that Uber tries to charge me that much to grab a ride home. I usually ride the bus, but sometimes I’ll miss it and try to use Uber. I used to use it all the time, and it never used to be this expensive. I tested some things out, putting in an address that was a block away, and came out to $20. What the heck. I understand if it’s a busy road. But the main road that leads to my house, barely has any traffic.
title: $32 for a 5 min drive

review: Please update your app to add an export feature. Was on a group trip this past weekend where 6 of us were ordering lots of Ubers for the group. now we’re trying to figure out how to divide the totals.  Lyft has the export summary function .. it’s wonderful for moments like this!!
title: Export Rider History feature needed
