review: If you sign up for Uber pass be careful - they don’t let you cancel it if its 48 HOURS beforehand and they don’t give you a warning, I was charged $25 even though I tried to cancel before the trial date was over!  Please be more clear about this Uber 😩
title: Can’t cancel Uber pass

review: I was satisfied and happy with this app until the last update 1 day ago. I tried to order a ride today. I tried to pay via apple pay & it did not show my apple card & stated my other credit cards expired. My other credit cards did not expire. I ordered a lyft ride instead & was able to pay via apple card on apple pay
title: Feedback after last update

review:
Tried to fix my account since none of my payments are working , Uber app support simply ridiculous, they circle around same phrases and simply clicking “most relevant “ answer on their scripted support system, I been with support past 2 weeks and I received “solution” 6 times already asking me to reinstall my app or find my duplicate account that I don’t have 

I hope uber USA support reading this otherwise with this trend I can only see this company going bankrupt in 1-2 years or May be even sooner.
title: Zero support for my payment issues

review: I never had a problem before, but noticed today after the latest update that I can no longer tip the driver. It asks if you want to tip, but then it doesn’t place the charge, so it doesn’t go through. I tried multiple times, but no luck. I feel bad. Please fix ASAP
title: Cannot tip

review: I’ve been late to work more than a few times because of Ubers system allowing drivers to pick up scheduled rides even though it’s impossible for them to get there anywhere near the time for the ride. Why can they pick up a ride that they will be more than 30 minutes late to (keeping any other driver from being able to do it)? This system is a complete and total disservice to the customer. Who’s more important here? It’s apparently not the person paying for it.
title: Horrible system for scheduling rides

review:
Juan recently dropped me off at my house. I just had Back Surgery a week ago. My driveway was very slippery/icey He was extremely focused on my safety. he repeated over and over again “stay in the car until I can come over and help you”.  I hope he gets this message.  

Dan
title: Juan (Driver)

review: In Hurghada a “comfort class “ driver sent me a message asking how much I paid Uber then cancelled after making us wait.  Switched to Uber X and the the first driver cancelled then the replacement finally showed up.  App said 5 minute wait when we booked.  It became 15 minutes.  Uber is not reliable. And there is no recourse to give feedback on poor drivers that cancel on the customer when they are in route.
title: Drivers cancel then we get charged?

review: Mario is an amazing person and driver, he picked my family  up from west palm beach airport and dropped me off in Jupiter (30 minutes away).  My son left his air pods in his truck and he delivered them back to us the next day. Thank you again mario you are the best. Keep up the great work
title: Amazing driver

review: Jessica is friendly and just a people person. Not to mention her car is a Tesla! She was so kind to my daughter and I, despite a last minute family emergency from where we were heading too. She was accommodating. Book with her she’s great! Thank you Jessica.
title: Great experience with Jessica

review: I arrived at the CBX after midnight and the shuttle service where I parked my car, was closed for the night. So no choice but to Uber. My driver as kind, helped me with my luggage, in and out of the car. He was very nice on our way to my drop location. He made my Uber experience a good one. ~ Sally
title: CBX pick up

review: I used to enjoy using Uber, but lately the drivers have been acting as a cartel or something to refuse pickups at certain locations or to hold out and make me wait forever for someone really far away to accept my rides. I used to have so much trouble getting picked up at the train station for my normal $12 Uber until a driver told me why - because most drivers were refusing pickups from the station in hopes of $100+ airport rides instead. It’s been like this for a year and I’m sick of it.
title: Going Downhill

review: Missed driver 1 as O’Hare Int’l Terminal no longer has Uber pickups on site.  Have to ride tram to Terminal 2 to find your driver.  When I tried to communicate back with them, I could not reach anyone by text and they sent  me a text the driver was no longer a match, so I had to rebook everything.  Second driver worked out well.
title: Booking over the phone

review: My driver  this morning was Alexander- he  pick me up - he was so sweet and nice. We had a pleasant conversation. His car was super clean. He was very careful and used all his turning signals and looked over his shoulder. I couldn’t ask for a better Uber driver thank you Alexander. Hope to see you soon.
title: Alexander was so sweet and nice -

review:
Willing to help. I had luggage and he made it fit in the SUV.  I think description x The XL vehicle is incorrect. 7 people includes the driver. It should not. Anyhow. Pablo was very helpful and professional. I appreciated his help and time. 
Only thing I was not crazy bout is the smell of cigarette in the car. 
I was not aware of it. 
Thank you.
title: Excellent driver.

review:
The driver arrived minutes before the scheduled time and waited patiently.
He has good customer service- greeting, polite and inquired about how we were feeling. The ride was very smooth, paying attention to the speed limits without recklessly changing lanes. He played soft music to soothe the nerves.
title: Courteous service

review: I took a few rides today, however both rides charged me a lot more than what it showed. First one charged me around 6 bucks more and then the second one charged me 18 dollars more! There was no traffic at all for either one, and I didn’t make my Uber driver wait at all. It sounds like it’s taking away my money. Even though the second trip ended shorter by two minutes, they still overcharged me by 18 dollars. How is that possible? Might just delete it today
title: Stealing money

review: Uber is amazing I use it almost everyday . Sometimes I need extra sleep befor work but I have to get up early for work but with Uber i get to get a little extra rest . You guys help a lot with me getting that extra time with my family befor  work aswell thank you .
title: Thanks Uber

review: I drive for Lyft in the Placerville area, and cannot drive for Uber due to Lyft paying me almost twice as much. If Uber would raise pay rate in our area there would be many more Uber drivers (including me). Please consider raising the fares for Uber drivers and I will regularly drive for Uber in our area. Many try to find Uber drivers in this area but cannot because of hardly any drivers and Lyft paying much more to bro g drivers out.
title: Placerville Ca  (Lyft pays drivers twice as much)

review: Have not had to use Uber in years. We moved and we very happy about the response time of our request. Carlos was very cordial and got us to our destination in a timely manner. Will definitely call Uber again in the future.
title: First time in a long time

review: My recent trip from Connecticut to New York was very good although I couldn’t interact much with the driver because of language barrier,,, I several attempts to connect with Lyft was unsuccessful but within minutes there was a Uber driver on the way and with all this my trip was 👍🏾👍🏾,,
title: Reliable

review:
1. Uber has so many issues with the long wait time for rides it’s just terrible. As a student athlete who needs to get to school on time I almost got late to school by a second.
2. The prices are very expensive.
3. Some drives aren’t very respectful even though I have been riding with uber for 5 years I am disappointed in them.
4. It has bugs that need to be fixed such as the issue with finding your location on the map.
Fix the issue uber because I am unsatisfied. 😠👎🏼
title: Uber Issues

review: I have worked 27 and the half years with Walmart and I want to be catered by everyone because I deserve it! I don’t want to be bugged by anyone because I have to put up with them at Walmart for 27 and the half years . Enough is enough! I love the staff here and any where I am planning to go!
title: Retired Walmart associate!

review: We were picked up from MSY airport upon arrival Heidi communicated effectively I told her it was my daughter‘s birthday she immediately start playing birthday music to congratulate my daughter we had an amazing ride she was full of personality and very knowledgeable if you need a ride if you’re ever in new Orleans call Heidie
title: Heidie was Absolutely Amazing

review:
We had an almost midnight arrival at the Houston Bush airport. Hashim was our Uber driver. His car was immaculate, clean to a T, phone chargers available. Water bottles provided. A young man trying to make his life in this land of opportunities. 
Thank you for your service and To Uber for giving us all this amazing service.
title: Hashim’s service

review:
August 10, I was picked up by Ronald. Very nice gentleman but immediately asked me if I knew what "white boards" were. I said no and he started to hand me laminated pages of a chalkboard he had the patent on and said he wasn't going to be an Uber driver for long. 
I advised I didn't have time to read them and I wished hom luck and tipped him but this should be prohibited as a driver trying to sell something.
title: My ride from the airport

review:
This was our first time riding with Uber.  Ahmed was our driver and nobody could have been a better representative than he.
  Ahmed had a clean vehicle, and was a very good driver and a very friendly man.
   He was a pleasure to converse with and nobody could have made a better first impression in us than he did.  He is fantastic!
title: Great Driver!

review: I tried to reserve an Uber ahead of time. I was unable to because the “where from” function didn’t actually work. I entered in my home address and hit continue just for it to change it to my current location. I can only use this function from the location I want to be picked up from in the future.
title: Issues reserving a ride

review: Uber is a great app, when it’s drivers are.  But when a driver looks at you, and your partner, or just sees you are a different enough race and cancels and drives by you, it is not as helpful.  Add to that the fact that if they cancel you can not file a report on them as they do not come up in your trips.  This issue comes up with rating as well. Held hands, dropped to 4.8.
title: When it works

review: Was very tired. Coming home from our flight. Uber driver was right on time packed everything up for us and was very friendly. We enjoyed visiting with him and it made the trip home. Go very fast I would definitely use him again.
title: Very friendly driver

review: For some reason Uber is GPS can’t find my house even though I’ve lived here a year and a half. It always says I’m at the same house number, but around the block. I always have to text the driver and tell him the correct street.
title: Uber works well but!!!!

review: Our car broke down right when we got to our vacation destination. We had to have a tow etc. An Uber driver was never more than 5 minutes away. Wonderful customer service. Will continue to use in the future.
title: Vacation Saviors

review: Our car broke down. We had a carload of things to take to a vacation rental house. Matthew pulled up in a great truck that had plenty of room for all of our things. He was so helpful in loading and unloading. This was our first Uber ride on the app and it was great. Thank you, Matthew.
title: Super helpful

review: Driver Harpreet was AWESOME. Had to put car in shop night before for recall was going to ride motorcycle to work next day look before bed and big chance of rain before I got off work so reserved a ride witch was awesome driver there on time perfect got to work a few mins early gotta love it.
title: Top notch Service

review: Jacob was a pleasure to have as my driver. He & his car were professionally clean, calm & safe. Jacob was prompt to pickup & drop off because he knew the freeways & was focused. I added kind & strong as he easily lifted my heavy luggage for me and made me feel very comfortable on our long ride. Thank you!!!
title: Calm, kind, strong & safe

review:
Brian is professional very very comfortable to be around. His car is super clean and smells great.

 If I could request him every time I would any parents out there if your teenagers need an Uber I have daughters he is safe very respectful .
I would feel comfortable with my teenage daughters getting a ride from him. He was friendly, but not over talkative and I would now use Uber more often just because of him .

I appreciated his in real time communication. He responds if you have any request or if you have a question and can’t say enough good things..

Thank you again, Brian.
title: PERFECT RIDE HOME

review: Ian picked me up with my 2 littles and their car seats. Not only was his car extremely clean, he was also patient and so kind! He even played along and said hi to cows with us along the way! Too bad we can’t book him every time we need a ride! Best Uber experience to date!
title: amazing!!

review: I was on vacation and tried to use this app… Apparently I violated the terms of service and now cannot use Uber on my mobile device. Uber said that my mobile device will no longer be able to access Uber in anyway. To try and correct this I went through the text portal and was not helped in anyway, I just went into loops with a robot. It is impossible to get in touch with anyone that can actually help you if a problem occurs.
title: Horrible customer service

review: I was working on my car and Halfway through fixing my car I realized an auto parts store gave me the wrong parts. I used Uber Eats and set it to receive a package. The driver went to the store, picked up the parts I needed and had them here within 30 minutes. This is a game changer!
title: LIFE SAVER APP

review: Valdimer was on time to pick us up with a clean car, a smile on his face and knew his route. He was easy going while going above and beyond with offering to place our-luggage into his car and out of his car after arriving at the airport. Nice guy. Thank-you fir being our driver.
title: Our Driver

review: The driver was an ace and every aspect of being an Uber driver… nice friendly arrived before scheduled time was conversational and completely respectful with very professional attitude and conversation. He was also very aware of the area and very knowledgeable of the area and the directions that he needed to go for the for the shortest path.
title: Ace

review:
I was in a hurry to catch a flight when I ordered an Uber Black. The estimated time to pickup was 3 mi. But 15 min later no Uber. I tried contacting the driver by text and voice several times but no response. Worst of all there was no option anywhere on the app to cancel the ride and Uber customer support did not answer their telephone either.

Lyft, here I come, Uber obviously does not have the consumers needs at the top of the priorities list.
title: No Cancel Ride Button

review: I’ve had the worst time with Uber One, my drivers cancel deliveries, my food doesn’t arrive, or I’m always missing an item but told they are refusing  a refund because of the troubles I’ve had that warranted a refund in the past, this basically stealing when you don’t get the item you paid for  . I was told Drivers take your food and then cancel the order so when the next driver gets there the food has been picked up, yet the order was cancelled just really unprofessional.
title: The worst ever

review: The app needs to provide options to edit scheduled trips. I had one scheduled  for the next morning and needed to move it to an earlier time, but there was no obvious way to do so. This should not be a hidden feature but something that is front and center as travel plans do change. Also, getting customer support can be a real challenge.
title: Editing

review: It was very easy to download and get into. I appreciated that because when I needed to use it, of course it would be at a time that it was detrimental to having you there as fast as possible and they exceeded my expectations. Thank you so much Uber.
title: Excited to use Uber

review: We had a canceled flight because of thunderstorms from Chicago to Grand Rapids.  There were no rental cars available so I used UberX and our driver picked us up within ten minutes and drove us 4 hours home so we could wake up in our own bed 🤗 God bless him and thank you Lord!
title: Convenient…..

review: It’s so nice to be able to Uber to and from an event and not have to worry about driving after drinking. You should support universal healthcare in this country and until then, you should insure all your drivers, so they can be taken care of.
title: Excellent service

review:
This was one of the most pleasant overrides I have had. Compared to San Antonio. This guy is top notch. I have lotta trouble in San Antonio late arrivals cold food still have not got a refund from Uber on a order $140 order that the seafood was NOT edible by the time it arrived ,finding out the restaurant was only
300 feet away!…. Not happy with Uber .. but
Perry is top notch !
title: Good man

review: I had a wonderful Uber ride this morning. I had not taken it over in three years I experienced exceptional service. My Uber driver was professional and courteous. He took my bag out of the trunk and provided curbside service. I am very appreciative of this. Moreover, his car was meticulously cleaned and smelled nice.
title: Wonderful Uber Ride

review: Lately we have requested a ride and one driver will pick it up then drop it and it goes to another driver who is farther away. Then this keeps happening for 20 or more minutes. When the first drive was only 10-15 min away. Then we waste over 30 min waiting on someone to come get us. One time it was almost an hour.
title: Having trouble getting rides.

review: I love Uber. It keeps me safe, but one thing that I hate is the prices at times even though they have excellent prices but sometimes they’re outrageous there’s never anybody working, but Uber likes to charge so much when it doesn’t even have people to work.
title: The best..but!

review: I was charged twice for Uber rides. I haven’t used Uber in 2 years. I’m trying to get a hold of someone to refund me. They don’t have a customer service number and the one on the app says “we’re sorry, we’re unable to connect your call in this country” despite living in the US. I’ve been trying to use their chat feature. Someone responded once asking for details and the ghosted me. Once I get my money back, I’m terminating my account and deleting the app.
title: Customer Service? Never heard of her…

review:
Took close to an hour for the original driver to cancel the trip. Then had to wait for the next driver. Outside waiting all that time for what should not exist in the communications of any service industry. 

How can one hood a pick up and cancel almost an hour later and the the company not know about it? 

I hope this becomes a one time experience, going forward I will change my rating if the over complete experience is what I believe is intended to be and what is expected.
title: First time

review:
I enjoy knowing what a trip service will cost me beforehand. The days of taxis taking advantage of a passenger are gone. Uber should provide half off one day out of a month to honor their customers. I truly feel it will be a hit with loyal riders. 
    Uber is a billion dollar industry, so show the love.
title: Uber is great service

review: Very friendly. He navigated all the way back around to the Departures area after I incorrectly placed my location without a hitch. Gave us key points, places, and restaurants to visit while getting us to our AirB&B. Pleasant conversation and was a good touch to be welcomed into Rome for the first time. Thank you
title: Good Ride

review: Robert is a very very good driver how do you make you feel comfortable as soon as you get in the car it wasn’t like one of those long boring drive you should drive we don’t talk Robert did a good job excellent
title: A good person making sure other people are safe and not drive

review: Today was a hard night but my driver still made it too me and I appreciate what everyone in Uber does I don’t want to compare but you guys have the best prices and nicest driver. Very reliable and understanding you guys get 5 stars over all keep being great ❤️
title: The best things about Uber

review: Uber drivers constantly blocking my business/residence driveway to pick up & drop off other fares that go to many of the other businesses. They wait sometimes 20+ minutes for these people not moving from blocking my driveway when asked to do so! It’s against the law in the United States to block any driveway or side street! Law states you cannot load/unload passengers when blocking a driveway especially not theirs. I need this to change. Uber drivers need to learn & follow the safety & traffic laws!
title: Ubers not following driving laws

review: Originally from Cuba, our driver, Brian knew the streets of this area very very well. arrow streets heavy traffic but he did really well. Real happy with the service. Really happy with the pick up. Everything was wonderful. We’ll use your service to get back home.
title: Terrible traffic, but wonderful driver.

review:
Expensive rides tho
It would be good if there is feature with sharing a ride with stranger on the way .
Like calling a Uber then after that you get the chance to share the ride with someone who is going on same direction.
title: Experience

review: Uhh best fives for the best I’ve ever tried blind to the site but the volume was right chillin through the night and it’s been like that on site good looks took a drive with Tiffany thank God she got me cause the cold was chillin through the streets… stay blessed Uber one way better than any other service around Peace God 🧢💙😇😅
title: Best drive

review: Uber app has issues with payment method.   Randomly says need to update payment method.  Others have same issue.  Also location is sometimes wrong or is changed when using precise location.
title: UBER Issues

review: This man is on his game. First of all the energy this man has in his car is positive and refreshing. Very clean cut, handsome, confident and secure. You feel safe in his vehicle. His vehicle was spotless and very comfortable. In the back door he had complementary water, mouthwash, and germicide towelettes. I just couldn’t say enough about this young man!
title: The model Uber driver

review: It’s great to be able to give my kid access to call an Uber and see when the Uber arrives etc. Why can’t the same visibility of financial transactions on my shared account be visible on the app?  Happy to give 5 stars if I have more control of my shared account including seeing transactions, managing trip including cancel request etc that all impact my credit card . This should be an obvious feature
title: Disappointing share user function

review: I’ve mostly been using Uber for taxi rides. There prices are generally pretty reasonable. I also like the fact that there’s a 10% option for leaving a tip which is currently doesn’t automatically appear on the Lyft app after a ride.
title: Good prices for rides

review: I ordered the Uber, and then tried to cancel it because I thought my hotel shuttle was coming. But it’s not. He said ok without grudging at all. Then I had to use him again because my shuttle didn’t come. Use him if possible. He will provide the best service.
title: An example of a good driver

review: Despite the fact that we got a late start, and were anxious about getting to the airport on time, our driver was very reassuring, and made sure that we got to the airport early. He was conversant, polite, appreciative, and very professional. We thank you for the great ride to the airport. Happy to healthy New Year 😊
title: Excellent driver

review: If I could give this a lower rating I would. I needed an Uber to get to work but once the driver got here I explained that I have a medical condition and have a service animal he said he wouldn’t give me a ride because he doesn’t take pets. I told him it was my service animal a second time and tried explaining it again but he just shut the window and drove away. Do not use this app. Between this experience and the others I’ve had it is not worth it.
title: Refused my ride because of service animal.

review: It’s nice and all? People help you out and are nice but you do have the crazy ones. But when I go to pay 20$ for a 20 minute car ride that turns to 50+$ even besides the tip! Like I don’t mind paying that much to get where I need to be but I’m literally in debt now because your peoples app charges double to triple what the cost says before you buy it it’s ridiculous. Don’t use this app unless you want to blow through your $ like candy.
title: Don’t.

review:
There should be two buttons. One that reads pick up and the other one should read schedule a pick up and when you click those buttons it should be crystal clear when and where do you want to be picked up.   

Making changes to your original request should be easy. Instead, you have to cancel everything and start over. Such a waste of time. The software programmers came up with the interface are all idiots.
title: Bad interface

review:
Carol came to our rescue as soon as she was setting herself up to start working. I say “to our rescue” because my kids and I were waiting outside Walmart for almost an hour in the cold because the store was already closed. 
She was very pleasant and super nice. A very genuine person.
title: Excellent service!

review: Amazing job patient and really helped. My mom was getting drop off to dialysis and he got there at about 5:20AM and he waited with her until 5:30AM or she would been left outside in the cold because her dialysis center will not open the doors 🚪 until 5:30AM. Thank you 🙏🏽 so much
title: Customer service

review:
Uber should penalize drivers for cancelling trips with a credit to the rider, the same way they penalize riders for a cancellation. 

We ordered a Uber at the airport yesterday after traveling for close to 24 hours. After watching the car circle the airport and taking significantly longer than the original posted time to pickup, we received a notice that the ride was cancelled. 

When we went back in to request a new car, the price has increased 30%!!!
title: Driver canceled trips should give rider credit!

review: Too often the pick up point is not where you are, and the app is not helpful in assisting you identifying where you need to go. It doesn’t give a pick up point address, just hazy moving dots/arrows that are difficult to read if you don’t already know the neighborhood. This needs improvement: it’s caused me several times to miss my pick up, which made me late and Uber charged me for the non-pick up. Ugh
title: Feedback

review: You charge me to book a reservation for a specific time. Then you notify me that the driver will arrive early and wait for me. Then when he’s supposed to be arriving I look at the app and it says he’s 17 mins away on an airport trip!!! Then when I try to cancel you want to charge me full fare?? So I decide to try to text to let the driver know that I was expecting him at the reservation time and ask what happened, HE THEN CANCELS and I have to find another ride?!? And you do absolutely nothing else. RIDICULOUS….
title: This app is 🗑️

review: You guys provide a great service, shouldn’t be mixing things up with pride month and things like that ! Pride month has nothing to do with your business and that’s why i am deleting this app ! Stop shoving this agenda on peoples throats it’s getting ridiculous
title: Shouldn’t mix business with an agenda

review: I use uber every day to get to & from work and its caused me to be late numerous times. Ill be connected to a driver and will be waiting for them to be on their way, only to have them cancel after 5-10 min of already waiting on them. Uber should NOT allow drivers to cancel after a certain amount of minutes of already accepting the ride. Unreliable!!!
title: Unreliable

review:
Don’t waste ur time or money. If paying extra means not getting the vehicle described at booking (but of course it says or similar) or not being greeted by the sign u’ve requested for the person ur celebrating or the driver not even getting ur bags for u, waste away. 
Unacceptable.
They will offer u a 25% discount when they mess up plus an additional 25% for a future booking. Why would u use them again after they fail the first time (insert definition of insanity here)??
Again, unacceptable at this price point.
title: Things to NOT do in Vegas!

review: When i order a ride the car comes to my address. When i order to take me back it takes me to a different street and the same goes for my food. I emailed them about it and no reply and when you go the app for help nothing works. Customer service / support is wack. This is stressful to me and the drivers. How hard is it to fix your mistakes.
title: Make it make sense.

review: Used Uber for the first time to get from airport to hotel. $30 trip. Not only did I get the $30 charge, I got two other charges!! It took two months of back and forth with Uber to get the charges removed from my account. The app only showed one trip! I think maybe next time I will try to use a prepaid card. The drivers were awesome but having $200 tied up for 2 months is ridiculous!!
title: Watch your bank account!

review:
Uber started so good, though their costumer services was bad since the beginning, but at least I could find a ride everyday. 
For unknown reason, since 2020 until now 2022, it will take me not less than 20 minutes to find a car. 
The app is functioning slow
The cars always dirty and heavy smell of cigarettes, and when I complain, guess what?  No answer from costumer service. 
I will never use it again and always recommend the same to my friends.
title: The worse service since 2020

review: To I called Uber driver. He came and stopped 1 minute away from my location. I called him but found his phone is switched off. I tried many times to reach him but his phone was switched off for 27 minutes and I see in the map he drive away about 8 minutes far. At last I took another vehicle (not Uber). But sometimes later I found cut 418 taka from my Bikas. Actual fare was 148 taka. Without riding I had to pay 418 taka. This is very unfortunate and I don’t know what to do now.
title: Über cut riding charge without riding

review: It's the first time that use this application. I filled in an address in the blank but I didn't know that it changed my address by tracking or something. And I didn't get my food event I went to get it at the address they told me that the delivery man sent it there. The question is why the delivery man didn't call me or checked whether that is the place that he has to send or not. Because it has 2 addresses (1. I filled in the blank, 2. map that the added tracking.)
title: I did not get the food.

review: I just chose a more expensive Uber ride vs Lyft ride because it was supposed to arrive in half the time. So when I confirmed the ride it ended up being twice as long as the estimate and I’m paying more to get the exact same thing I could have had elsewhere.
title: You need to start giving more accurate time estimates

review: Why don’t we have the option to link our driver and rider apps together so the driver that picks us up can also see that we are drivers also and what level we are on? Would also be nice so if I wanted to take a ride and had money in my driver app, I could pay for the ride from my earnings.
title: Just curious…

review: It will work some days,  then other days it says there’s a network connection (there isn’t on my side) and it will not allow me to get a ride. It just shows an image of a map of the street, nothing else. There’s no way to get help either as they do not have an easy way for anyone to reach support. Unless it’s about a ride. I use the app because I have to, not because I think it’s a great tool.
title: Uber app doesn’t work at random

review: Had several back to back horrible experiences including using Uber Premier as drivers in Tampa refused to answer calls and drove around rather than cancel. Uber developed amazing algorithms to defeat regulation, maybe turn that towards policing behaviors every user has experienced.
title: Drivers play games

review: The share ride rarely there idk if it’s because of the update or whatever please fix it, screen shots along with going back and forth is frustrating
title: The share option isn’t always available????

review: Recently Uber gives you a price and then charges more at the end of the day. I got an uber for $15 and later on I see an extra charge of $1.60… Why give a quoted price if you’re just gonna charger more at the end? I prefer lyft for these reasons. Also most of the time it tells me no ubers available but all the lyfts I take are also uber drivers…
title: Gets me to where Im going sometimes…

review: I’m literally tired of making reservations for the next day and seeing my Uber driver sit in a random neighborhood doing nothing. Their are good ppl on this app good drivers but also terrible ones that speed, play inappropriate stuff or ones that see you wanna be picked up in 30 minutes and arrive nine minutes later like wayyy too early, don’t depend on this app just walk. Or ask a neighbor or you’ll just be waiting on this random dude in a random neighborhood doing nothing.
title: Honestly don’t download this app

review:
Unless you’re sure you will never forget something in the car. Uber won’t call their own driver. They won’t give you the number. They won’t even setup a 3 way call. 

Customer support will keep sending you the same link over and over. 

In short. Anything you forget in an Uber, consider it gone forever. 

The most shocking thing however in all these is how horribly poor the customer support is. You can’t believe it unless you witness it. I’ve not see a worse customer support. 

Again. Do not use this app.
title: Do not use Uber!!!

review: The Uber app had the wrong address for a movie theater I had bought tickets to so when I had put in the name of the theater thinking it would take me to THAT location, it unfortunately was a completely different theater at a different location and my group ended up missing the movie. When I requested for a refund for an issue caused by the Uber app, support wouldn’t give it to me. I wasted 62 dollars just to miss a movie my friends and I were looking forward to and just went home.
title: Awful

review: Does the dev team even do a poll to see how many users are running ios 13.7 like come on most of use are still running ios 13.4 cuz updates fry our phones...
title: Fire the whole ios team if they cant back the app backwards compatible

review: So you sent me a request to wonder why I have not been using you lately, it is because of the ETA. You say a driver will arrive in 10 minutes and at the last two minutes of arrival the driver does not come and you tell me to wait another 10 minutes. Then there is the times when I am need of a ride and you can not provide one.
title: Feedback

review: I scheduled a ride in the Uber app to the airport for 9 am. The app said “on time” the whole time, up until the precise moment that I was to be picked up. Rather the driver arriving at the schedule time, I was suddenly told the driver was now 40 minutes away. For an airport drop off!  Had the app been accurate, and had a I known I was to be picked up 40 minutes late, I would have tried to arrange alternate transportation. I missed my flight. I’m deleting this app. Uber, you’ve lost a customer for a lifetime.
title: Unreliable Scheduled Rides

review: I love it because I don’t drive. The only thing is that sometimes it takes too long to find a driver. It shouldn’t take so long to find a driver. Uber needs to fix it. Yesterday, I couldn’t get ride home from Hooters, so I had to call my neighbor, she came to pick me up
title: My Uber, love it

review: Each time I go on a plane the app has so many adds it does not function and I have to turn my phone off again to secure travel- sometimes it takes so long I just book a Taki. I had to download Lyft for last 2 returns to Nashville
title: App not performing

review: I now have to take a picture with the mask and my camera phone doesn’t work I had to call a taxi because Uber won’t come I have always had a mask in my pocket I’ve always asked to drive or do I need one and they say no I don’t do it an Uber driver said I got in without a mask and now I’m supposed to take a picture of myself with a mask my camera on my phone doesn’t work so Uber can’t pick me up it cost me$75 to take a taxi because Uber doesn’t have a phone number I’m looking for alternatives send
title: Help

review: It’s insanely difficult to use the app to contact Uber for any decent service. There is no customer service phone number to begin with. So the bare minimum expected would have been a decent functionality for customer service. Help requests get shut down automatically on the app and it’s impossible to get any relevant help. This is the primary reason I rely more on the Lyft app and service. Uber continues to be one of the worst companies with the worst apps.
title: Poorly designed app as far as contacting Uber goes
developerResponse: {'id': 9992079, 'body': "Hi there, we are sorry to hear about your unpleasant experience with customer support. We're always looking to improve your experience with Uber App. The feedback from our riders is vitally important to us. Let us know more about it by dropping the details at t.uber.com/contact and we'll connect.", 'modified': '2019-08-04T08:38:54Z'}

review: Unlike Lyft, which charges a single rate for a ride from the airport, Uber consistently jacks up the price of the rides when flights arrive. Uber ups the price to outrageous levels. For a 15 minute drive in a not-busy area, Uber is out here charging $50-70 when my flight arrives. On non-busy times, Uber charges around $15. This has happened time and time again to me and friends in the area. I’m tired of this company simply just taking advantage of people like this. It’s ridiculous.
title: Taking advantage of customers

review: This works fine until you try to switch payment methods. The app won’t accept Apple Pay or another credit card when using. I tried deleting and re-adding saved cards with no luck. Yes, the cards are still valid. Thought I could use Apple Pay to get around this issue but had 0 success as it kept saying “Unable to use this payment method.” Why even list the option. I guess we’ll see if Lyft can keep track of more than 1 card
title: Can’t Switch Payment

review:
The app is alright for getting a ride.  Have had the occasional issue here and there but mostly good experiences.

Uber as a company though is pretty awful.  You’ll want to adjust your privacy and notifications settings - last straw for me was receiving an alert at 12:20am trying to get me to join Uber One.  Sending marketing phone alerts in the middle of the night is completely unacceptable in my eyes and has me considering switching to Lyft.
title: Inconsiderate

review: Takes forever to find a driver even when it’s giving you a short wait time estimate on the screen before you request the ride. Then if you cancel and try again it magically finds a driver, at a higher rate.
title: The App Is Horrible Now

review:
I could not schedule a ride yesterday for an airport ride today

Clicked and clicked on the schedule icon and it would not respond 

On my way to airport the app showed my pickup was 9 minutes away then about 9 minutes later (after booking) I got an alert that my ride was nine minutes away   It appeared the app held my booking for nine minutes before sending my driver perhaps the driver did not accept for nine minutes eather way I almost missed my flight
title: Schedule a ride??? Then ride came late

review: Refund Request for driver refusing to come pick us up at our location.  He never came or called to give us any different instructions after me sending him 5 texts.  We had to wait another 20-25 minutes for Another Uber ride. 🤬
title: Refund Request

review: I switched over to Lyft 2 years ago because my pick up location was always off and you can’t change it. Now Uber is cheaper, so I took a chance. My pickup address AGAIN wasn’t even a real address, and despite two immediate texts with the real address, and a call with the driver insisting he was RIGHT THERE, I was still stranded, missed my kid’s game, AND charged for my inconvenience. Surely drivers can afford GPS?!
title: I don’t think drivers know how to use GPS

review: The log in verification for lost passwords and lost emails is terrible. Uber has an email listed for me that I’ve never used at any point in time. I only use one email. There’s no way for me to verify or log back into my account, because the email you have listed is incorrect. Your asshat team needs to polish up your website and customer service because this is incredibly infuriating.
title: Account Log-In Verification

review: Tried to schedule a ride for 3:30 am to go the airport almost 24 hrs in advance. Had a confirmed ride scheduled. Got up and ready so I would avoid using family to get a ride to the airport so early. Checked my trip the night before and even right when I woke up. It had a countdown to pick up. As I reached the bottom floor of the hotel I was left sitting and waiting for a ride, one never showed. I frantically called a sleeping family member and had to have them wake up and drive me to the airport.
title: Not reliable

review: My car is in the shop so I use Uber when I need to get to and from work even though it can be kinda expensive but the drivers are constantly canceling rides when they are only one minute away and now I’m 30 minutes late to work because they canceled it even though I schedule a time to get a ride this is so stupid I might as well take the bus at this point it’s cheaper and they follow a schedule
title: Unreliable

review: NEVER get an Uber for any sort of emergency, if that’s to get to work because your car broke down or if it’s because you have to get somewhere fast, you will wait at least 10 mins to get a ride accepted after you get accepted drivers will cancel when they are a couple blocks away. This happen to me in 4 different occasions, won’t be using this app any longer. I waited 30 minutes for a ride and got canceled 3 times after accepting to even pay a high fee.
title: Never get a ride

review: The drivers now do this thing where they can accept your trip , it will say “completing another trip nearby” and the driver can tale as long as they want to get to you but it will still show them “15 min away” the driver can cancel, or even be rude to you if you call or text them. Then when they cancel your ride, there is no way to write a review on the driver that never picked you up. I have had this problem the last 3 times i have taken uber. Im done uber. Took a yellow cab yesterday.
title: IM SICK OF UBER

review: What did you do to make every driver stop working in one of the busiest cities of Florida? I have lived in Orlando FL for quite sometime and now it is impossible to find a ride? We live right next to downtown where it is extremely busy even with the pandemic and there is never an Uber. Please get your stuff together because your company is falling apart. Thank god for lyft because for some unknown reason people drive on that app instead of this one. Save yourself the time if you live in a big city and need a ride because this ain’t it.
title: What did you do?

review:
Multiple times I’ve scheduled an Uber for an upcoming trip. And every time they never show up! Yesterday I scheduled one, received the confirmation email, but when the time came, nothing! I received no notification or warning that nobody was coming in the allotted time frame set by Uber. 

After the scheduled Uber failed, I tried to find another Uber. It initially said 10 minutes, then 20 minutes then continually was looking for a driver. I live in Orange County, a popular area, so I’m not sure why it’s so difficult finding a driver.
title: Completely Unreliable

review: So I really don’t have too many bad Uber experiences. They’re drivers are mostly weirdo who refuses to stop talking to you. Well this time was the limit. My Uber driver was not wearing a masks saying that the risks are lower now. (I live in pa) not only that but literally complained about the ride, about the job while ON the job. And f’n blasting music on a ride 1 am in the morning. Never complained tho Uber before nothing. You know what they gave me 5.00 dollars Uber credit. For a 40 dollar ride. Which I won’t even be using cause I will never use the app again
title: I HATE UBER!money hungry pigs, USE LYFT

review: Tried Ubers schedule a ride feature.  This was a mistake, they waited until after my scheduled pickup time to notify me that no drivers were available.  The point of having an option to schedule rides in advance is so that the customer is able to plan ahead.  Had Uber told us that no rides were available when I booked the trip 1 hour prior to departure it would not have been an issue but now our plans are ruined.  This service is unreliable at best.  I will never utilize this service again.
title: Cancelled ride

review: I drive Uber in the greater Boise ID.  This morning I had the pleasure of being on the receiving/riding side of Uber as a client.  I do my best to treat my Uber clients like I would like to be treated myself - polite - kind - professional.  That is exactly what I got this morning with Louis.  Louis is a credit and value added to the Uber Team.  Respectfully MMW
title: Louis was Super

review:
Normally I do not need fo cancel, but when I do it he been a nightmare. 
App keeps booking driver after driver and all 8 can di is text them and say I don’t need a ride. 
The last time i just deleted the app from my phone. I reloaded it today, but will avoid ecer doing so again if I have the same issue this time.
title: Canceling Trips issue

review: Then this morning when asking again was like never have a reservation and when enter 1030. Say you have to wait x 30. Minutes ending to get a ride x 11:15 instead of 10:30 please let me know
title: I was distressed i make a reservation last night

review: Wow! Steven was such a classy and pleasant driver! Once we started speaking, we shared the reason for our trip (my husband has cancer and is treated at MDAnderson so we fly here from Florida). He graciously asked if he could pray for us, and his words were so uplifting and reassuring! Thank you, Jesus, for precious Steven who is sharing Your love! ✝️✝️✝️😇😇😇
title: 😇😇Steven is an angel!

review: The Uber system I don’t have anything bad to say I’m very greatful I have the luxury of having someone dilevery me such a wonderful service we are so blessed by god to have you thank Uber and Uber drivers ex perience and all Uber drivers are completely professional and friendly
title: Thank you god for uber

review: I tried adding several different cards, several times each. Uber didn’t work for any of them for some unknown reason, now I’m late for work because no matter how many cards I tried and how many times I tried them it wouldn’t work. I checked the cards and they all have money, they’re not frozen, Uber is just stupid or something. (Yes I have wifi, yes I have data, the problem is the app is a failure. They wanted 30 dollars for a 20 minute ride too btw).
title: Seriously stressed

review:
Yavada was very kind, helpful, polite, friendly! 
We loved speaking with him and he knew his way around town to avoid traffic! He was the first Uber driver to offer us water!;) we wish we could have Yavada always help us! He’s the best.
We wish we could have Yavada help us always!
Lisa Bryant,
And Frances
title: Best Uber Driver ever!! A good human

review: Their system wants to be convenient and efficient. If you are waiting for driver to arrive, Uber app randomly assigns new trips to drivers WHILE YOU ARE WAITING, forcing you to allow the new pickup to be dropped off if accepted by driver, and today it added a half hour delay to an important meeting I flew across the country for. I immediately contacted support and they said there is not a setting I can change to protect myself from this. I immediately uninstalled the app and downloaded Lyft instead.
title: You Will Be Late

review:
Horrible service, why keep giving me the same ride over and over again even though I’ve selected every time I cancelled the ride that the wait time was too long? I’m literally late for an even now because your app kept selecting the same driver. And this isn’t the first time this has happened, it will be the last though if this happens again.
Your service proves itself unreliable and only convenient when nothing is at stake.
title: Horrible Experience

review: Uber is not one of the most scamming app ever build. You can’t have a transportation budget with using Uber because they rate changes every day and even inches apart. The app were build by scammers and thieves- less miles are often more expensive than more miles or just move a few changes away from your pick up location and watch your price rise all the way to the sky or it will drop a few seconds down. This is the most terrible transportation app ever build.
title: Scamming App

review: I just missed my flight this morning bc the scheduled Uber I arranged for pickup at my house this morning showed up and left as if he “picked me up” and I was riding in the car with him which I was not. I called multiple times and he blocked my phone number. I had to call another Uber after my scheduled pickup time which cost me another 45 minutes and I missed my flight for my vacation. This is absolutely unacceptable and quite a common occurrence/offense based on what I am reading online.
title: Unacceptable

review: I requested a ride from Kerrville to Boerne Tx about 30 miles. Uber took $60 from my account instantly and then I wasn’t able to book a ride and took over a week to get a refund. Unless you live in a major city don’t waste your time or money. Kerrville Tx is a large city and less than 50 miles from San Antonio and I still couldn’t get a ride so unless your living in one of the counties too 10 largest cities I wouldn’t waste my time. I called Uber and got no help whatsoever too.
title: Don’t use Uber in any small city

review: My husband’s phone fell out of his pocket without us seeing before Manuel drove away. My husband was worried, he called his phone and Manuel answered🙌🏾he turned around, and delivered it back to him. Great job, we truly thank you for  saving the day!!! Mississippi hospitality extended in Nevada, we need more ppl like Manuel🤩 The Goodson’s
title: So thankful

review:
Mustapha was prompt, courteous, and had excellent driving skills. The vehicle was clean and comfortable, making the ride enjoyable. Overall, it was a positive and hassle-free experience making a great start to our vacation. 

Thank you Mustapha! we appreciate the chat and could tell you love what you do.
title: Awesome!!!

review: Even though my departure from the plane was delayed because of gate availability, Luis was kind enough to wait for me. I was very thankful for that. Too bad he didn’t speak English. I couldn’t thank him properly. It was a good first experience with Uber. I hope all of your drivers are as thoughtful as Luis.
title: LUIS

review: Driver was very prompt. Communication was excellent from booking to the instructions on meeting point and he was very polite in helping us with our luggage and getting us to our destination. Thank you so much for making our first Uber experience a great one!
title: First experience and was great

review: This app, along with many others, does not offer the ability to silence unsolicited marketing and promotional notifications from the app developer. I get app notifications for all kinds of stuff that I don’t want from Uber; all I want is driver updates. Please stop sending me app notifications with your marketing department campaigns or Please give me a way to turn them off.
title: Another app that you can’t silence marketing notifications

review: Uber is by the worst when it comes to customer service. As of lately the app is having so many issues connecting users to drivers and finding rides. Not sure what’s going on but needs to get fixed or I can definitely take my business elsewhere. Not a fan of waiting over 30 mins and then being charged cancellation fees when drivers accept and cancel rides. Not acceptable Uber!
title: Crappy app and support

review: I would say Uber app has come along way since it’s first design when I was trying to use it a year and a half ago. It’s so much easier, what I would call user cavemen friendly. So keep up the good work , I am your biggest cheerleader now... Uber ‼️Uber‼️ Uber‼️
title: Rating the Uber app

review:
Super courteous and professional, and clean clean comfortable car! Thank you for the water I forgot to drink before leaving my house so early and for the much appreciated mint. Music was soft and low with great driving and an early arrival.  All rides  should be this stellar! Thank you! 
 💥💥💥💥💥
title: Just the 4:00 am wake up I needed!

review:
Uber kept us informed and the driver came a few minutes early. Very polite and helped with the bags. Careful driving too!
Only issue, too much scent in the car for my wife who is super sensitive and had to mask up to keep from having breathing issues
title: Reserved trip to airport

review: Above and Beyond to help us four bone weary (2 handicapped) people get some needed supplies and safely where we needed to go. Even realized hubby had money coming out back pocket and ran after him to alert him. Thank you Lucas and I hope we connect again while we are here. Bless You.
title: Lucas in Seattle is TEN STARS

review: Ordered rides from Target Burbank, CA this afternoon. It appears your app was hacked, cancelling our rides  both times and stranded for an hour, waiting on a taxi. No taxi so tried again an hour later. Assist driver came promptly after reporting to LAPD Hollywood Division.  First so call driver replied in Arabic or some language, when asking where he was. Thank you for wavering cancellation fees. Please check your “Request Ride” App.
title: Hacked pickups 6/5

review:
Nicholas is one of best Uber “pilots” for the season🙏🏽🙏🏽. He arrived on time. Pulled in at the right spot. Excellent driver, cool car, engaging and enlightening conversation, such a culturally sensitive gentleman. Nick is attentive to matters arising in conversation and defaults to the right fitting answer/s.
I would ride with him again!!
He deserves a promotion!!!
Wish Nick all “My blessings”.
Happy Customer. Agnes
title: Nick

review:
Some places are hard to reach, so can you highlight near by places where the driver can stop and ask questions.

The guidance dot cannot separate highway from on ramps. This is crucial for drivers to find riders and not get push by highway traffic.
title: Need to help drivers find riders

review: I just wanted to formally thank Damian for safely, transporting me to my grandson's birthday party at the Georgia Aquarium. Even though he has only been in Atlanta for 2 to 3 weeks, he navigated the streets and highways of Atlanta with ease and helped me to safely arrived at my event. I think he is a wonderful asset to Uber, and I am glad he is in Atlanta. Thanks again Damian.
title: Welcome to Atlanta Damian

review:
So annoying that Uber sends promotional garbage in the messages section of the app. And then it puts a number badge over the app icon. I keep thinking it’s some driver-related or account alert. 

I don’t want to turn this off because I want to make sure useful notifications reach me. This only started a few months ago. What a bone-headed move by the developer. 

Have to delete the app off my phone now to stop getting bothered by these useless promos.
title: Stop Putting Badge Notifications for Promos!!!!

review: I ordered an ride, I was sent a description of the vehicle.  I saw it at a red light where I asked to be picked up.  The driver rolled his window down and got really snarky and said he had a drop off before me. His windows were too dark to see anyone in the back!!!  He was very rude. He drives a red Ford F150. Looked new
title: Bad experience

review:
I had an emergency and I needed my 82 year old neighbor pickup because he was in a car accident and left his car at his body shop. The body shop was closing and I couldn’t get their in time.
So happy to get this wonderful driver and have him pickup my neighbor and deliver him home.. what a lifesaver.
title: Nicest driver ever

review: We have taken several Uber rides and must say this has been the smoothest ride and most professional. Drove balancing “get there in a good time with being a smooth and safe drive”. Immaculately clean inside and just straight up good vibes! - says Rebecca and Husband Patrick
title: Very clean and professional

review: The driver arrived timely and got me to my destination quickly. He helped me with my luggage. The price of the taxi was from $10 to $30 cheaper than regular uber. I chose taxi instead of traditional uber. I did not know you could reserve taxi on Uber App. It was great having a choice.
title: Trip From Downtown Seattle to Airport

review: Great deal of patience dealing with dropping my 4 children off at school. I was feeling down about having to do this driver made me feel better about my situation. Also went above & beyond to make it to our destination before the expected time.
title: Excellent driver

review: this is the third time that the uber app hasn’t let me put my actual location and chooses a location that’s 10 minutes away from my location. which confused the Uber driver and the passenger. and when i try to change the location it says, the area is outside my pickup location and i am unable to change it. am i supposed to walk 10 min away? pls fix it asap
title: Fix Location Pickup

review: During busy times fares will more than double. This is price gouging, and is sending me back to using cabs. Additionally, the app will suggest avoiding tolls to reduce the cost. It told me it would only add 2 minutes to my trip. In fact it added 20 minutes to my trip. Outside of these issues, the app Is pretty good. It tells you the fare and helps you find pickup zones.
title: Expensive and inaccurate.

review: Very nice and funny guy. He’s an up and coming comic so make sure to get out there and support him! BTW- Thanks for your patience on the tip and review Will. We got to the party and I accidentally started a small fire within the first 15 minutes I was there. Things got a tad out of hand from there. Cheers!
title: Will Williams

review:
Christina our driver was an excellent driver came right away to Port Everglades to pick us up ! 
Kept giving us notes on her arrival and was very friendly and we laughed all the way to our destination.  Gr8 job for my first Uber Experience !
Thank you ! Nice clean car !
title: My first Uber experience

review: Have used family account for my kids for yesrs.  Had problems with adding my son again.  I deleted the profile and now can’t add it.  Says error with card.  Lyft family works well, so I guess we will stick with Lyft.
title: No family account?

review: My experience as a first time Uber rider was excellent, although it was a short trip…less than 10 miles. My driver…Joseph…was courteous, respectful, and professional. I will start using Uber more often. The app is simple to use. So far it’s better than taking a taxi.
title: First Time Uber Rider

review: I priced checked a ride Home from the airport 4 different times on the day I was traveling. Each time the price jumped. It started at $35, then $45 then $60 but when I landed it finally settled on $65. What’s weird is no other business changes their menu prices just because it’s dinner time but Uber. My plane landed at midnight and I can’t help but notice the clearly predatory behavior. Uber thinks it’s good policy to jack up prices during the hours drunks are trying not to kill someone after the bar
title: Price change at random

review:
Hi. 

I have felt drawn to write a review about Muhammad at such late hours. This man portrayed nothing but kindness and professionalism throughout my riding experience. He is not only a great operator of the wheel, but also a great human being. He is someone who is selfless to a fault, providing for his family to the late hours of the night, regardless of his personal well-being. When it comes to discipline and hard work, Muhammad is the baseline. 

Men like him are the reason I feel comfortable riding at the late hours of the night. Give this man the credit he is due. 

Thank you. 

Mike
title: Muhammad: The Reason I Choose Uber

review: My very first Uber and it was a lovely experience! The app was simple and clear; Christopher was timely, helpful with my suitcase, and very friendly, making the ride go by quickly by his chatting with me when I’d brought up regional differences. I felt very at ease during the ride. Thank you, Christopher!
title: Christopher

review: I absolutely love Uber it has been a life saver, i only rated 4 stars because I wish uber would let u choose your driver… too many times have i been in cars with unwanted drivers, this could be avoided if we are given the choice of who we allow to accept our ride request…
title: Love Uber, 1 problem though…

review: First of all the drivers are always great. Unfortunately, now that Uber has corporatized their prices have skyrocketed and they no longer accept credit cards unless it’s one of their own. They seem to be forgetting why people moved away from taxi cabs to Uber in the first place - we were tired of being ripped off.
title: Uber is getting a little too big for their britches

review: my first experience with Uber. unfamiliar with it. and it is my pleasure to share that my driver far exceeded my expectations. he was kind, helpful, and a very good driver. being from Illinois and new to Connecticut Jason was familiar and knowledgeable about the area. and more than that I felt safe. I will use Uber again.
title: jason is amazing!!

review: When I wanted to book the app showed 5 min, then it took a couple of minutes to finalize the trip and showed wait time of 10 minutes. After waiting for 6 more minutes the driver just canceled and the app found another driver that was 10 minutes away. Drivers should not be able to cancel easily. Perhaps they should not be allowed to pick up another ride for a few hours.
title: Drivers should not be able to cancel so easily

review: The driver arrived quickly. Was extremely personable yet didn’t talk much (good thing for a short trip). He was also very accommodating. I hope I always get the same driver whenever I need one. I would choose this driver if we had the ability to do so.
title: Cottonwood to Thornton’s

review: Thanks to Jose, my recent experience with Uber was excellent and I got to ride in a most comfortable vehicle with plenty leg room.  Jose exhibited the qualities of a fine young man, extremely polite and respectful.  Never have had a bad experience with Uber.  Every ride gets better and better!!   Barbara James
title: Outstanding Service

review: We have our truck in the shop and was worried about making it to work on time.  If there was an option to reserve for the next couple of days, (same times) I would definitely select that box!
title: Great timing!

review: I left my ID in the car and he drove the entire way back to bring it to me so that I could carry on with my night. I truly appreciate the ride and the entire atmosphere he provided. 10/10 no other option!
title: There is no better!

review: Didn’t realize I was paying for an Uber Pass for months. No idea when they snuck that in. Worse, the price per pass changed month on month... And of course, when I go to contact Uber, it’s impossible to get a hold of anyone.
title: Shady billing around the Pass

review: The drivers are rude and feel as though a charge should be put towards the driver if they cancel rides last minute or at least give the customer a credit after the experience i have i will be deleting this app forever and will continue to post about how this company is horrible every day until the issues are fixed I've had walmart orders that were stollen by my drivers as well with no customer support numbers to call
title: Uber Should be shut down

review: Great safety feature! when Uber car stopped for long time and Uber checks in with you through app and then calling. We had traffic stop that let other side go 3 times while keeping our side waiting for lane to clear.
title: Safety

review:
I am so happy with Uber. 
Recently their prices have become better than Lyft, the customer support is 1000X times better and even the drivers are amazing. I have no complaints and without Uber I wouldn’t have 2 jobs or a way to get to appointments.
title: Without Uber I’d be at a loss

review: It really makes me so disappointed that the prices are so high sometimes.  A trip to the airport used to cost me $30 and now it’s $60.  It’s kind of ridiculous the price hike lately..  a trip to my church job used to cost around $15. This morning I paid $21 for a trip that was nowhere near rush hour.  The service for the most part is good but prices are out of control sometimes….
title: Costs!

review: We learned today that the Uber drivers at the Westchester airport did not like to drive to LaGuardia airport because of going into the queens area so we had 2 rejections from Uber drivers until the third guy who was great Mohammed took us to LaGuardia happily. Just a note for anyone traveling this route.
title: Westchester airport to LaGuardia airport

review: Drivers constantly canceling and wait times are horribly unpredictable. Also, seems if driver does not get more than a $5 tip, they rate riders poorly. Rates are also much higher than they used to be.  Uber needs take a lower share to incentivize more drivers.
title: Used to be good

review: This app definitely can be a life saver but it’s not reliable. They will tell you that they are connecting you to a driver but they aren’t. I’ve used this app to get to and from work and let me tell you it’s a real pain. Dealing with driver’s attitudes and different personalities is hard enough but having to be lied to by and app is another thing. I know with the pandemic going on and less drivers being out it’s hard but it’s ridiculous.
title: Inconsistent

review: I have been using Uber for about 3 months now to have my boyfriend visit me and go home about every two weeks. Ever since the update yesterday I can’t schedule a ride in advance because it is telling me that “Uber is currently unavailable in your area.” I used it two days ago with absolutely no problem. Please fix your poor update ASAP so that thousands of people do not quit using your services permanently because you do not want to provide it anymore.
title: Latest update broke the app.

review: Since one can’t rate Uber while using Uber, I will rate them here. BEWARE, the more you use Uber the worse it gets. I just had a driver make me wait 11 minutes only to cancel the trip while they were on my block about to pick me up. I am now late for work and find it disgusting that Uber allows this type of treatment of customers. So YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED, use Uber at your own risk.
title: Not allowed to Rate Uber

review: I’ve been using Uber for about a year now to get from home to college and back, and it has been fine outside from the outrageous fees to return home sometimes, but on August 29th I Uber wouldn’t allow me to schedule a ride from my house to the school when I was able to do it perfectly fine the previous day. My mother has to drop my little brother off at his school as well as work her own job, so I don’t want to bother her, but I have no choice, thanks to you.
title: Unable to schedule rides

review: My problem is which i feel like uber should incorporate when allowing people to be drivers. Cigarettes smells in peoples car I understand that I am in there car but I do not want to smell that like it stinks and i should not be paying full fair if I’m attempting to hold my breathethe entire   time orrr stop myself from wanting to puke
title: Its okay but

review: Uber charges 3x more for scheduling a ride and it’s honestly disgusting and makes no sense. Why would an $8 ride suddenly cost over $35 because I schedule it for the next day or even 30 minutes ahead of time the same day?? Wouldn’t scheduling rides ahead of time be cheaper as it’s not last minute? All of the drivers were very sweet but the app is very money hungry.
title: Do not schedule rides

review:
Every time I try to request a ride from the airport I get forced to use the “reserve” feature. However, my flight was scheduled to come in last night. It is now 3am (after hours of delays) so I cannot use my flight number to request the ride. I just need to request a ride the same way I used to before the silly reserve feature was implemented. 

Please bring back the normal ride request option so it does not default to the airport reserve feature.
title: Unable to get a ride from the airport

review:
The app  sometimes makes inexcusable errors. Yesterday I set my default payment to Apple Pay. Today I took a ride and in the middle of the ride discovered that the app was instead going to charge to another credit card. It wouldn’t let me switch to Apple Pay and after the ride still wouldn’t let me switch. Apple says Uber never tried the payment. Effectively, Uber is, without notifying me,  making an unauthorized charge, and then refusing to fix it. 
At best, sketchy. At worst, illegal.
title: Flaky financial

review: I don’t have transportation atm so I depend on Uber and as of right now everytime I order a ride the drivers keep canceling why have drivers who are not willing to pick someone up. I will not be using this app ever again this is total crap I missed work cause of this. This company really needs to lower prices since the drivers do not want to drive or pick anyone up and every Uber driver i did get always complained that the ride was to far to pick me up and all that so this app and company is trash
title: Uber

review: I installed this app specifically for a hospital procedure that I wouldn’t be able to drive back. Appointment was at 7am so I made a reservation at 6:10am the day before. Plenty of time to reach destination. That morning I received like 3 cancelations from drivers. Last one was scheduled to arrive 6:50am, way too late for my appointment. I sent him message begging not to cancel on me. We arrived a my appointment 30 min late. Not the drivers fault, he did good. So the reservation fee of $16 was good for nothing. Don’t trust reservations.
title: Reservation was no good

review:
I have repeatedly experienced unreliable service. Schedule a ride for a certain pick up to guarantee I arrive where and when I want and then driver shows up or their estimated pick up time is very late like 40 minutes late or doesn’t show up or cancel all together.
Very hard to reach a human being in their customer service and when u write emails and they do reply you get a standard reply and no one resolves your issue
title: Unreliable service horrible customer experience

review:
I use to think Uber was the perfect solution to stop drinking and driving and now it’s the perfect trap for women to be assaulted in the privacy of a random vehicle. 
Too many women are coming forward with their stories about being SA’d while using or working for Uber and the company does nothing. 
Why would I want to use a company that doesn’t keep people safe? 
There’s also complaints of Uber charging peoples cards for no reason so I made sure to delete my account as well as the app.
title: No longer safe.

review: App is very very annoying to use. Tapping on the nav bar on bottom can bring up an entirely new page without the nav bar (Explore page). No way to exit without reaching to the top of a large phone as it doesn’t support back-swipe gestures. No dark mode. No settings for notifications. Keeps spamming me with marketing notifications for no reason. I’m not going to use the app when I don’t need to. It keeps notifying me to order a ride when I’m not even going anywhere.
title: Good service poor app

review:
I am now 12 hours into a help request to find out how to request a ride for someone else.
I have been told:
What is your problem?
Make sure your app is up to date.
Your account seems to be in order - give me screenshots.
AND NO RESPONSE TO MY REQUEST after 3 clear requests. Pretty sure their customer service doesn’t know how English works. Or how customer service works. Having it delayed means their reps can’t even clarify in real time what they don’t understand.

The FAQ does not match the current app- and as far as I can tell sending rides for others is no longer supported. But CS doesn’t know how to answer that question so maybe they do and they just don’t want anyone else to know about it.

If there was an option to choose zero stars I’d take it.
title: Most frustrating ride share app and CS ever

review: Uber finally added a pet-friendly ride option, which is great! However, that’s still not an option for booking ahead, which is a big miss. When riding with a pet, you’re more likely to book ahead (especially for airport trips, vet appts, etc.). Please add those vehicles to the options for scheduling ahead of time.
title: Rides with pets: need to add to book ahead options

review: Everytime I log in I keep getting middle eastern letters or fonts that I obviously don’t understand at least make it in Spanish for me if your going to using all my data and what not. Seriously and I still haven’t gotten my refund and canceled my ride way before the no refund policy.
title: Why does the language keep changing to some type of Arabic or middle eastern when I sign on the app

review:
Added ur app again, doesn’t recognize my tel number or email address (used Uber dozens of times) & sends messages in Spanish. I think I’ve again cleared this the Spanish messages now.  But now the screen is stuck showing a map of my nearby location & I cannot clear it. Guess I’ll be using Lyft again for my next ride. 🤦‍♀️ 
Would love to clear this screen from my phone though of course!
Love how u can’t post a message without a nickname & of course they’re all taken 🙄
title: What’s Wrong??

review:
Been charged twice a few different times on rides or orders with UberEats, actually trying to get help from support is a nightmare, and they’ll just juggle you like a hot potato.
Had like 910 rewards points, and just saw that I only have 400 and something now after trying to get help from support. I thought it would get better but it’s not so I’m pretty much ready to delete this app and suggest to my friends and family that they use Lyft instead. Never had these problems with them
title: Scammy

review: I’ve been using Uber everyday for the last few years. A year ago it told me to join Uber rewards snd I did, however the Uber rewards is not even an option on the menu for me. Even with the app updated …. Reconsidering ….
title: Where are my Uber rewards ?

review: Whenever you look up a trip, to see the price and timing, it bring the price up after a few minutes. Local cab services are don’t do stuff like that, I personally recommend those. Also every few days I do the same trip and they randomly triple the price. And when it rained they quadrupled it. I honestly have no words this is disgusting, it’s a 7 minute trip, definitely using an ordinary car service whenever I have an extra 10 minutes or so
title: Scheme

review: Scheduled a 7:00 pm pickup to go to my best friends surprise party. Uber was running late so I tried to call which went straight to voicemail. Tried to cancel the ride they wanted to charge me almost 30$ to do so. Finally at 40 minutes after the arrival time and me trying to reach Uber they cancel the ride. No phone number to call or way to contact the company. Writing this review waiting for the next Uber to arrive if it does. The surprise happened about 10 minutes ago.
title: First review I’ve ever written.

review: So ive submitted four seperate inquiries about fraudulent charges to my uber account , i couldnt even get a call back! Im so furious over this whole idea of ignoring your customers. its over $200 spread out over a whole month in uber cash charges which ive never once used and they tell me its someone with an account connected to mine with a nickname who i dont know , no real first name or last name ! Terrible customer service and im boycotting UBER and flooding bad reviews until i speak to someone!!!!
title: is this really how Uber conducts business?!

review: Absolutely AWFUL. they stopped allowing me to use my BANK CARD and wouldn’t give me a reason why even though there’s enough funds on the card and i’ve used it before. support would NOT help me at all. the app is slow itself. takes forever to find drivers EVEN if you schedule the ride. also if you schedule a ride & your driver shows up early, they’ll charge you a wait or cancellation fee (even tho you literally SCHEDULED it for a specific time). Drivers show up with passengers. smh
title: HORRIBLE

review: I heard someone (who does not use the service) say that Uber as a company is trash and probably the second worst company on the planet behind Tyson meats, which I sort of agree with. You have the absolute worst service, and even Uber eats is a challenge to get food any more. You might as well close down service as recent numbers show you have 15% less service because the word is out: Lyft is superior and everyone should choose them over you guys any day
title: Literally the worst business on the planet

review: The estimated time of arrival shown before agreeing to purchase a ride is consistently far less than what actually happens. Tonight I made a cost / benefit decision to pay $20 for a ride because the app reported that i would be home by 10:02 pm. After purchasing the ride the PICKUP time was immediately updated to 10:15. I didn't arrive home until after 10:30. I could easily have walked home less time. It’s false advertising plain and simple.
title: False advertising. ETAs are wildly underestimated.

review: I’ve used Uber many many times over the past few years but recently their prices have gotten astronomical!!! Sometimes my 2 mile ride is $8 and other times I’ve paid for the same ride up to $40!!! Recently, I was quoted a $40 ride and after checking a few minutes later I had checked it went all the way up to $180!!! I do not understand this!!! NOT okay, Uber! 🤬
title: Prices are insane!!

review: I have been using Uber since basically the FIRST day, I believed in it when other people thought it was less safe than cabs. Recently, they have really dropped the ball. I have had like close to 10 Uber’s drive aimlessly around for 20 minutes, making me extremely late, along with driving in the compete wrong direction and cancelling. I was going to write a private message to customer support to express my issues in a less public matter, but they don’t have that option. So maybe by posting in here they will!
title: Lol @ Uber
