review: I’ve had my share of good an bad with delivery service within this app. For the most part I’ve always had the opportunity to have been given the best customer service hands down. The individual within uber support operations are call of duty make sure everyone is insured with best care. Thank you for all you do an times we need you the most.
title: RATE!!!

review:
Ive been a good client with 4.89 score for the last 6 years. 
Why 4*? 
Starting Recently, I’ve been monthly charged for Pass subscription that I don’t remember signing up for. Spent 40 min trying to figure out how. 
Here is the problem: “Help” you click doesn’t bring you anywhere. It would be great to make an Uber website menu more user-friendly, e.g, to provide links instead of confusing instructions. Also, an immediate access to a list of subscriptions would be helpful. 
It would solve problems and save time.
Hope the Uber will take this comment  for consideration.
title: Good service, surprisingly not a user-friendly menu (subscriptions issues)

review: Doesn’t even deserve the one star but not allowed to go lower. I’ve never wrote a review before today but at this point I feel like my hand was forced. So it’s write this then complain to the BBB. My card was charged twice even though they tried three times. Of course there is no one to call so you can cancel the transaction. Also while trying to go online to find out if I had any other options I found other people who were taken advantage of the same way for all different amounts. TOTALLY NOT WORTH IT!!!!!!!!
title: NOT TO BE TRUSTED!!!!!! SCAMMERS!!!!!

review:
This is as very professional driver
Picked us up on time at my hotel and we dropped off my girl friend at home 
Did a round trip back to the hotel 
While having a great conversation in English and Spanish 
As a bonus he played some smooth jazz music during the trip
title: Maclyn in Ft. Lauderdale FL

review:
I wholeheartedly feel as if the buyers should have the power to force a person who is not going to pick up their food yet still has the on their way section open. 

I should not have to wait a literal hour after my food has been made and sitting cold, because the driver wants to drop off something else.
title: Slight problem with this app

review: This was our first Uber experience, our driver was extremely friendly, his car was spotless and the experience as a whole was so easy.  All my worries were for naught.  Our driver was very compassionate about my daughter being carsick (or just worried she’d throw up in his car - lol)
title: Great Ride & Driver

review:
My driver yesterday no showed. Did not cancel. Did not call me or answer his phone. I did not have time to get another driver. I missed my flight. It cost me more money to rebook another flight which was only available the next day. I allowed two hours before my flight. After waiting 30 minutes, I canceled. I don’t know if I’m getting a refund. I was getting updates the entire time, letting me know my driver was on the way. 
EXTREMELY FRUSTRATING. No way to contact driver or Uber.
title: No show

review: Fabio was terrific. He helped me by putting my Rollator into his trunk. I really needed this to walk into my doctor’s office. Also his car was immaculate and smelled really good. I gave him a $10 cash tip. I didn’t know I would be able to tip after using the app. Thanks again for a great day.
title: Uber Driver Fabio on 1/2/23

review: Raul went above and beyond to locate me even though app directed him wrong and I couldn’t figure out how to correct it. He called me and we finally figured it out. I was frantic cuz I was late for flight check in. Answer your phone if waiting for Uber and you get a call!
title: Grateful

review: Driver was on time. Car was clean, Driver was very nice and I arrived at my destination with absolutely no problems. This was my very first time using UBER and although I wasn’t sure because of the late night hour I had called, but I honestly will say that I WILL and RECOMMEND using UBER again!
title: Review

review: I had a very good experience using Uber. The App had good instructions with pictures on how to find the pick up point. The driver was polite and put my luggage in the trunk and took it out for me at my destination. This was so easy! And a lot cheaper than a taxi.
title: First time using Uber

review: Driver’s car was very comfortable and clean. I especially loved the picture of his dog! We had a nice conversations from Boston to Hanover, he was great, and I felt totally safe. I would totally recommend him again! Oh, also, I believe he said, he was a new driver too, extra bonus points!
title: Great driver

review: The estimated wait time for a ride provided prior to confirming a ride is totally broken and infuriating.   It routinely claims a ride is 2 or 3 or 5 minutes away, only to take 5 min to actually confirm a ride that is then 10 min away.  This has made me late so often I’ve reduced my use of Uber.  It’s unacceptable.  Uber started because people in SF were sick of unreliable taxis.  Your App is now just as unreliable.  Users can’t trust that the time estimates provided have any basis in reality.
title: Time estimates prior to ordering ride is broken

review: Robert was very professional. His car was clean. He didn’t have any problem finding the hotel. I was stuck in the city after two flight delays then 7 hours later a cancellation. Robert assured me tomorrow would be a better day.
title: Stuck at the airport

review: I scheduled a Lyft Ride and then decided to see what Uber offered went ahead and scheduled Uber as well to see who would be faster. While Lyft was looking for a driver the driver from Uber had already picked me up. So I cancelled the Lyft ride. The driver was prompt and very courteous and his ride was immaculate. Thank you Uber..
title: Quickest

review: Uber drivers are usually fine but Ubereats is the worst experience. I contacted support and the agent cancelled my food order when I didn’t say I wanted my order cancelled. I said I wanted a credit bc the driver had the app tell her the wrong dropoff locations for the food. I had just signed up for UberOne so they gave me literally the worst experience possible causing me to immediately cancel my promo. I can’t believe I’m going hungry bc the customer support rep cancelled my order without my consent.
title: Terrible experience with Ubereats

review: Our first time using Uber.  Everything was fine, but was not aware of the gratuity feature that came afterwards.  I asked the driver (Gabriel) about leaving a gratuity, but he doesn’t speak English, so he couldn’t answer my question.  I then gave him a cash gratuity.
title: Good experience.

review: Ordered a Uber Driver for a family member to get from point A to point B late hour to go home safe and one did not hesitate to the calling, lol funny because he was awesome and very conversation for what my family members stated. Car smelled great and amazingly cleaned.  Thank you 🤝Bryan 5 * from us. Oh , and cool car!!😉
title: The Uber driver Bryan

review:
It takes roughly 20 minutes to get to work taking the most direct route. When I catch an Uber to work, the maps always recommend a route that takes 10 extra minutes that is also less direct. It’s nonsensical. Unless this app is intentionally designed to extend rides & profits. 

This app needs a smarter system for choosing routes.
title: Suboptimal

review: Uber service was elegant, respectful and friendly! My family and I did not have to wait for a long period of time! Actually the Uber arrived within two minutes after I booked the ride! Karel was friendly and very helpful with the luggage!
title: To and from Miami Cruise Port

review:
👍 Joseph is the best Uber driver, I have to say I would have not given 5 stars to Uber if it wasn’t for him👍
You’re stuck and need a ride and or too drunk to drive request Joseph, You will not be disappointed.
title: Overall great experience when I’m stuck without a ride

review: I wasn’t even sure there round be an Uber available in Mobile, Al. He was 1 minute away. He got there quickly. Got me to my destination quickly. And the conversation was easy and light!
title: Great conversation! Picked me up very quickly…straight to my destination! Awesome experience

review: We were picked up at Urgent Care and taken to a pharmacy which needed time to fill the new prescription. Our driver was so understanding and waited for us, then drove us back to our hotel- all the while reassuring us that things would work out. Thank You!
title: Angel Uber Driver Extraordinaire!

review: I don’t use Uber often , but needing a long ride back to my car, I was fortunate to have Anthony arrive precisely at the time I requested , dressed professional , car was immaculate and Anthony was great company, and I learned a faster route . So thank you Anthony for great service all the way around !
title: Thanks Anthony

review: Moises picked me up at SFO after a long day of traveling. He was so kind and courteous. We had a wonderful ride. I loved the Tesla too. The car was clean and smelled fresh. Pre pandemic I used Uber and kept having bad experiences so I deleted my app. I was desperate to get a ride tonight so I reinstalled it. Moises restored my Faith in Uber
title: Moises restored my faith in Uber

review: Love the app always have a great experience with having nice drivers who are helpful and talk with me or with anyone I’m with. Always on time and always presentable with a cleanliness as a driver and their vehicles. Will keep using this app for any kind of service when needed.
title: Great service

review: Such a nice ride! Fun to chat with, saved our lives in a horrible area to get us where we needed to be safely over an hour away! Beautiful car too-my family was super comfortable and look forward to riding again! Thanks so much! 🙌🏻
title: Best driver we’ve had!

review: For first since using Uber rides I received a $20 bonus towards Uber cash. My ride from Aldi, about 2 miles from my house, doubled when I requested with the bonus Uber cash. I’m single, have health issues and depend on decent prices rude services. Normally, that ride is $4-6. So maybe not doubled, but definitely gouging me pocket book.
title: Disappointed

review: I was very impressed with my driver. She was very understanding since I have never used the app for distances and helped me and was so kind. I just really appreciate it. Thank you so much. I only left a dollar tip because I gave her money when we were finished
title: My Uber experience

review: Recently signed up last month and was given the promotion of doing 210 rides within 30 days. Finished the promotion before the 30 days which was great but then suddenly the app started slowing down my ride requests all of a sudden even in busy areas i have to wait 30 mins before i get a request for a ride. For any new drivers be wary uber purposely slows down your requests after you complete certain promotions.
title: Ubers Shady App

review: I was very impressed at the way he kept his car so clean very professionally dressed, and I was very impressed. Felt like I had a safe professional person driving I will save his name and can connect with him again if someone can count on reliable.
title: My Uber experience

review: Upon our arrival at CDG, someone in our party left a luggage bag at the airport.  We requested an Urber to take us s back to airport.  Bernard picked us up and was a delight to have.  It was an hour ride to get back to the airport.  We speak English and he speaks French.  We would request Bernard again if we us Uber again in Paris.
title: Welcome to Paris

review: Dexter was so nice he insisted on dropping me off door to door even when I said I can walk and find it.  He was so calm about it too.  I really appreciated it.  The car was vey clean and neat and he had a very cool charging station for cell phones with all types of wires. Very comfortable ride. Thank guy, Dexter!
title: Such a helpful nice man

review:
I've been an Uber driver for 5yrs and it’s pathetic how they treat their drivers. The app will sometimes charge $50 for a 3-5mile and passengers will report us to get a free ride! I have gotten reports such as: fake accident, stranger in the car other than pax, stealing UberEats order etc. 

My uberEats is already deactivated even after I delivered around 3k orders with a 4.99 rating. I wish Uber listened to our side of the story before firing us. Customer is “NOT ALWAYS” Right!
title: Drivers being victims of FAKE REPORTS

review: The wait time messed this app up. It used to be great now i have to wait 10 minutes for uber to find a driver and then have to wait a few more minutes for the driver to come. So if u need to go to work or school just order the uber 40 minutes-1 hour before🤷🏾‍♂️ because 30 minutes before is still not good enough
title: wait time

review: The sox pulled out a win in the 10th at Fenway and we stopped to celebrate in the way back to the garage. When we went to retrieve the car from the overpriced garage, we found that they had closed up locked us out. Our driver zipped us home to NH in his beautiful gull wing Tesla. Thank you Uber!
title: Red Sox Win Turns Into Parking Garage Fiasco

review: I love when I’m paired with an Uber driver that goes above and beyond to make sure that my needs are met and that I am comfortable doing my ride but recently I’ve been come in contact with Uber drivers that call me as they’re approaching to ask me where I’m going. I’ve been stranded plenty of times because I do not want to explain to an Uber driver where I’m going. Simply do not take the ride if you have a problem with the destination.
title: Uber drivers

review: He was great! He came to us in 2 minutes confirmed how many luggage and people we are to make sure that he can serve us. he also got us to the airport just under the expected time. he is terrific, and I highly Recommend him as a driver
title: Reliable & Friendly

review: Where else but in the US could I ask for a ride to LGA and 10 minutes later have a driver appear at my business door. Every driver is different and so are their stories. It’s always more than a ride, it’s a journey.
title: Amazing Platform & Experience

review: I should be able to use the Uber Voucher from Tesla Service without needing to add my credit card.  Also, please allow the use of Citi Virtual Account Numbers as that is safer than using my actual credit card number.
title: Should be able to just use Uber Voucher from Telsa and not need credit card

review:
Driver was accommodating despite speaking NO English. Took awhile to get where I needed to go. But that was partly my fault as I had to change destination as soon as I got in. 
Car was clean, driving was great and eventually got to my destination. 
Would’ve given 5 stars but had to give 4 due to no English. Thank goodness for translate app!
title: Mostly Excellent

review: Graeme was so kind to help me verify the pickup spot and pick up my niece, who walks with a cane. He stayed in communication with me, and made sure that he had her I verified with her that she was comfortable and her ride went well. We met him at the drop off location, and we just want to give him five stars.
title: Good Driver

review: Anthony arrived within 5 minutes and I had a stop before destination and made it within 15 minutes. He was very nice and would highly recommend. Thank you for doing what you do, you are appreciated!
title: Car in shop

review: I used their package delivery service. The driver got to within a couple miles of the drop off destination, turned around, kept the trip running and never delivered the package. All support is in the app or website but no actual person. Their generic response is that they aren’t responsible for items left in the rideshare but they hope the driver contacts me soon. In the meantime, I was charged double for a service that was never provided.
title: Impossible to contact customer support

review: My first use of Uber from airport to my home. Had previously registered my profile and  payment. Used Ap.  Got my ride in less than 5 minutes. Painless way to travel. I’m an octogenarian finally catching up with my grandchildren. Very positive experience.
title: Fantastic first Uber trip

review: This has been a big nuisance. If I am paying my hard earned money for a ride I would expect for  my driver to be coming directly to ME. I would like the option as the customer to opt out of drivers who are currently on a trip. I would also not like to be charged MORE for that option. This is incredibly inconsiderate of the customer and the incentive is for the driver here.
title: Stop forcing us to accept drivers completing a trip near by

review: We were being picked up at the airport and got lost trying to find the Uber pick up spot. I expected the car to be gone and would have to call another but Alvin was still there waiting for us. It was really appreciated
title: Above and Beyond

review:
This driver was so nice and so safe. Her truck is immaculate and the truck smells so good. I work at a hotel on Mass street and it’s
Always crazy busy in q good way! It’s just nice at the end of a long night to have a really safe clean pleasant ride home….
I give this driver 10 Stars and I take Ubers 4 nights a week! :)
title: Awesome safe driver

review: Thomas was super accommodating, considerate, sweet, & even made a stop for me to get pizza, wings, & drinks. I had no groceries to last me the next few days through this ice storm. Thomas was compassionate enough to make the stop on his busy day. His Mom was super sweet too. Her flight had been canceled due to the cold front/snow. God bless you Thomas & Mom! 💕😊🙏🏾
title: Best Uber Ride EVER!!

review: I waited today for 2 different drivers. One hardly moved, stayed on his spot and tried to make me cancel. The other waited at a different place, the app showed he’s still 0.6 miles away, and when I got in he told me he canceled and to get out of his car in freezing temperature, after waiting for him for about 12 min instead of the 7 that the app originally showed. I was freezing, very poor service and bad experience!!!
title: Drivers canceling after a long wait due to short ride
userName: GG so full full to do

review:
I needed a ride to take me home from Mayo. Anthony was outstanding. He had bottled water available and a game available if you were interested. I was in bad shape and Anthony was very sympathetic. He even offered to help escort me up my steps. He is by far the best Uber driver I have ever had. 
Thank you Anthony!
title: My driver was Anthony

review: I had two Uber rides today - my first experience. My drivers were the best people and could be my BFF’s. They drove me to and from the doctor. I left my keys in the first driver’s car and he drove back to my house to return the keys. That’s what I call going the extra mile. ❤️
title: The Uber Shuffle

review: I don’t use Uber very often when I need a ride from Love Field in Dallas. It is always chaos out front. It’s also confusing where to meet the Uber rep so I called the drivers number to verify where to meet but it went to v/m immediately. Now that I’m home and see my charges, I’m charged $2.43 for a “late charge” ?? The driver never mentioned this and I had send him 3 text and 1 call ( unanswered) to find him. Pretty shady business practice and have now downloaded the Lyft app for all future use.
title: Wait time charges

review: I’ve never had any problem using Uber, I like it , the drivers are very professional … and if you see “no tip” in my reviews it’s not really true, I like to give cash to the driver, and I never forget that! I will always use Uber with confidence for my trips, thanks!
title: My Uber rides

review: App not really user friendly for non tech savvy. It forces you into things you don’t really want but you don’t have any options to speak with someone or simpler. I was tapping a photo of a vehicle to see if there were other options available and the system made a reservation for twice the amount I normally pay. I think that kills Uber for me.
title: Upcharging on ride

review: Generally, I think Uber is amazing but today it took them a long time to find me a ride. I had to cancel five times in order to finally find somebody who would pick me up. Could be just the bad weather, but when the driver right he was great, so I got really need to go just took longer than expected.
title: Uh…

review: The Uber app is easy to use. The car service is quick and the cars are clean. However, if the driver does not have a T on their license plate they often complain about taking me into the city.  Overall it is a good service.
title: Uber is so convenient

review: I have an issue with the service that paid for my meal then rescinded the payment and the discount coupon upon which I was forced to pay $33 to Uber to use the app again when this had all been taken care of previously….
title: I was charged for Uber eats that had been previously paid for

review: I use very often uber and lyft. Whenever i use Uber, it is a regretion. The driver is cancel it at last minutes after waiting 16-20 min. Then i should wait another 15-20 min in outside. Sometimes, my trip is given a driver, i am not sure they have a punish when they are cancel it, the car is not moved for long time and i should cancel it a fee. I have written it as improvement to Uber , no reply. I hope more competitors with better. They should work much.
title: Public Transportation has better timing

review: I ordered a meal from a restaurant, and unfortunately I did not receive the order, and it was late. One of the employees in the Uber eating program was contacted, and I was not helped, so I told him to call the person who took everything from the restaurant. The driver did not help me.  bad
title: Uber eating

review: After standing in the rain today for 45 min, when my Uber was suppose to be there in 11 min. And he never showed, answered my text or phone call, I cancelled my ride ! I then ordered another Uber and this guy was prompt, courteous and nice! Uber needs to vet some of these people better. Rodrigo was excellent! A asset to being a driver in the Dallas metro area.
title: Helpful

review:
Very pleasant, knowledgeable driver. Clean beautiful car. Carried on a nice conversation.

When I land at SFO I usually check the rates between Uber and Lyft and the last two travels Uber has had better choices for me! I appreciate your ability to offer tiered rates based on pick up times. Thank you!
title: Driver

review: Thank you for providing me with your wonderful service!  I have a traumatic brain injury (TBI) & due to some side effects of my TBI including varying degrees of double vision caused by fatigue, etc (not going to go into all of my TBI related problems….).  Just know that I am disabled due to my TBI) & I am not legally allowed to drive.
title: Uber has been my SAVING GRACE

review: My Uber driver, ABDILADIF, was outstanding. I had a 12:45 AM pickup from Ohare, and he was available to pick me up  when my plane arrived 25 minutes early. His Lincoln vehicle was immaculate and so comfortable. He was very friendly, helpful, and professional. Definitely a 10 out of 10.
title: Outstanding Service

review: My destination point is only about 1 mile from my house. There’s a very direct and quick route that goes down a quiet residential area, yet Uber always directs drivers to take a longer and more dangerous route that takes us to the freeway. It’s completely idiotic, and as I said, dangerous, as it forces driver to merge into fast paced rush hour traffic, only to quickly exit immediately after entering the freeway. Please fix this!
title: Flawed Uber Navigation

review: The service itself is still good. However the rates for the rides is getting out of hand. I use the service to get to and from work and my regular ride has increased by almost $4. People who use the service like I do should have an incentive or some type of better reward system.
title: Review

review: I am happy with using Uber.  I don’t like that Uber has an authorization hold on my card whenever I  request a ride and also can cancel the ride request several times before actually getting a ride.
title: Customer Service

review: I think you guys are fantastic and what you are doing there is great work as long as you keep on the common courtesy and the humble attitude within these drivers you were sending to us I will always appreciate the courtesy that they give day in and day out
title: Crew

review:
So I’ve used uber since its debut and I can’t really complain much.. 

Over the years the quality of food and delivery people has declined — I dont think you should go into service jobs if you don’t care about people or know how to use common sense — that’s not Uber’s fault and Uber has always resolved any issues I have encountered oretty fairly. 

As long as there are humans to reach out to easily they should continue to be a good option when it comes to food delivery. 

Also, they need to add pizza hut and jollibee. crazy there’s no delivery to all parts of manhattan for these restaurants yet.
title: Not bad after all these years

review: We were waiting in the rain for an Uber after going shopping at the mal and multiple cancellations for no apparent reason. I was traveling with a baby. The drivers saw us and still decided to cancel… the Uber drivers would start our drive with someone still in the car. Need better control of this. And for them to cancel knowing that we were right in front of them seems crazy to me. Terrible service in Balneriu Camboriú. Needs much  improvement.
title: Balneriu Camboriú cancelled rides
developerResponse: {'id': 33424473, 'body': "Hi, We're extremely sorry to hear about your concern regarding your recent experience. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve your concern, fill in your details here:\xa0https://bit.ly/343HNsE. We shall get back to you at the earliest.", 'modified': '2022-11-29T08:11:18Z'}

review: I have use Uber multiple times a week, their prices are decent but more importantly the most of my drivers perform excellent service. I will continue to only use Uber as needed. Thank you for continuing to have an amazing staff and prices!
title: Uber has been nothing but Great to me.

review: They steal your money and plus on top of that they track your personal information no matter what. They keep digging your data for their own purposes and to also sell your data without your consent.
title: They steal your money and

review: I was recently charged a tip that I did not give. It is next to impossible to report this to Uber, nor does their EDIT choice show on trip details. The tip came out of my account TWO WEEKS AFTER when the funds were available and it was a tip I normally leave. This is a predatory move on Ubers part as they have all your info. I terminated my account and would rather pay more for a cab and not allow them my personal info any more. This was not the first time this happened!
title: Vinny

review:
We all have to come to terms that Uber is no longer the greatest ride app in the world. 

It’s number 1 in surges. 
Number 48 in support. 
Number 98 in reliability 

The only things Uber is good at is the amount of money they squeeze out of users through surges that are perpetuated by drivers intentionally. Like the driver who cancelled and I could see him across the street after driving for 18 minutes. He started the ride because he wanted to see where I was going and then cancelled. 

2 the amount of time users waste waiting for surges to fall and the off chance a driver takes a ride at the normal rate. 

And how quick they are to get your money. 

When someone says Uber is the greatest, I have no f:&(47ing idea what they mean, the user interface? 

It sure could have been.
title: The truth about Uber from a user.

review: This company disgusts me honestly. They purposely make it so you can’t directly contact them so they don’t have to deal with the horrific drivers they employ. Oh, I’m sorry, don’t employ. I was informed by my driver that she “doesn’t work for Uber” and can “make any personal choices” she wants. That’s disgusting. So sick of these big corporations taking advantage of their own customers. Going back to using a cab at this point. At least they can hole their EMPLOYEES accountable for their actions unlike your band of clowns you pay in pennies.
title: DISGUSTING CUSTOMER SERVICE

review: I reserved a car for my early morning flight. Without notification, my car cancelled within 5 minutes of my scheduled departure. Uber made no attempt to find another car and offered a new fare at 1.6x the original price with an additional 15 minute wait. If I had cancelled as a rider, Uber would have charged me a fee. I can't consider this a reliable option for time sensitive transportation.
title: Don't count on the reserve option

review: I use to be able to order food for people in another country while I am in the US. Now it just loops me to Uber ride app from Eats. I get options for groceries but not restaurants. Wants me to download corner shop but i can’t from the US
title: Can not order food international address

review: I started using Uber because I have heard great reviews about it. After the first time I used the app to get a ride somewhere, my payments no longer went through to receive another ride. I had no issues with my ride and my driver gave me a 5 star review. When I contacted support, they said my account was deactivated for some suspicious activity and couldn’t say why specifically. Be prepared to mysteriously getting kicked off the plat form for doing nothing wrong if you use this app.
title: Unfair

review: Worked well the times that I used it, but in the last couple of weeks it started sending me ads as push notifications, which annoyed the cr*p out of me. It was several notifications every day. So I decided to delete it.
title: Too many push notifications ads

review: Uber used to be great….now the app has issues. I cannot even look at my Uber profile or settings on the app. I was using it for work and in the past they would email receipt's or I could look at past trips on the app, but no such luck anymore. Not sure if this is an issue with the latest version or if I am missing something.
title: Past trips

review: Somewhere along the line, the app started pushing “tips” to my watch notifications. They don’t seem to have a way to switch back to just critical (IE-your ride is here) notifications without uninstalling. Guess this another one of those apps I install right when I need it. Except I don’t need to worry about this with Lyft. Guess who I’m gonna try first in a pinch.
title: Pushing ads to my watch :(

review: This is really unprofessional that Much big company charged me for double times , I was going from my home and I confirm the Uber in my app and when I went to my bank account recent activates , it’s was showing that I was charged two different prices for one ride. Which made my morning worst
title: Uber charged me twice
developerResponse: {'id': 29143147, 'body': "Hi Mohammad! Sorry to hear about your concern regarding the charges incirred. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve your recent interaction with us, fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343HNsE . We shall get back to you at the earliest.", 'modified': '2022-04-13T08:19:14Z'}

review: Why are you sending me multiple text messages about my ride arriving soon when I have already taken my ride, paid and tipped the driver over 2 hours ago?
title: Why are you sending me texts 2 hours after my ride?
developerResponse: {'id': 28105284, 'body': "Hi, we are sorry to hear about your experience with text messages regarding the ride. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve to your recent interaction with us, fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343hnse . We shall get back to you at the earliest.", 'modified': '2022-02-17T11:12:13Z'}

review: Absolutely INSANE and highly frustrating! These prices used to be affordable but now it’s literally breaking my pockets! Why am I paying $24 if I literally live 5 minutes away? Bring back the old Uber to when the prices were actually decent. I know there’s a world wide shortage but come on $20 for not even a full mile ??? Fix this cause it’s bad business.
title: $20 for a 5 min drive

review: I have absolutely had it with ordering Uber accidentally on my business card and getting my hand slapped by our accounting department. Uber makes it way too easy to make mistakes when charging your personal vs business card and I’m fed up with it. I’m using Lyft as much as I can from now on just to avoid making a silly mistake and getting in trouble at work.
title: Business travel vs personal is way too easy to mix up

review: Resolving any issue with Uber is a teeth pulling awful experience as they have NO support team, only automated messages, NO number to call, nothing but generic replies to messages not resolving issues. So, good luck if you have any issues with their second rate app. My account doesn’t let me make any modifications to my payment methods, and I am on message 20 to the “support team” hoping that one of their generic responses will help. I’m just giving up and choosing another service.
title: Horrible Customer Service

review: It’s raining badly in my area and i tried to get an uber for what was priced at $8 to go up literally just 2 hills. Price is now $30 to go up 2 hills, complete ripoff and inexcusable. I get charging for convenience, but this is ridiculous. Also noticed there seems to be no way to contact uber about anything but already paid for services, so very shady business model on top of the outrageous pricing. If i want to file a complaint, i should be able to without paying money first.
title: Terrible pricing

review: Uber owes me $35 Uber Cash and is refusing to respond to any of my messages now (for weeks) because they don’t want to honor their own policy about late drivers for rides that are reserved in advance. I’m confused why I can’t even get a response from anyone about this when I have followed up once a week for the past 3 weeks, and why all the responses I got initially only addressed the refund policy (when I was asking about the RESERVE POLICY - I linked to it in multiple emails I sent).
title: Does Uber have customer service?

review:
I’ve been unable to order anything on the app for the past two weeks, getting stuck at the payment screen. I’ve been in contact with Uber support on Twitter and through email and they give me the same 6 steps to fix it, I do all of them multiple times and the issue is not fixed. Instead of collaborating on this issue, they ignored my follow up emails saying their fixes didn’t work. 

Use Lyft or call a taxi.
title: Uber support doesn’t care about its customers

review:
The final charge on the card is mostly higher than what is shown at the time of booking. 
All issues such as below will cost the rider-  Incorrect drop off by drivers who don't follow GPS, promo codes and vouchers applied at time of ride booking will not be honored and drivers will always take the toll routes unlike competition.
 But the app will not show the amount upfront, it will increase the charge at the end of the trip even if there was no traffic or rider related change to trip.
title: Incorrect charges

review: why does it cost 40$ to take me 3 minutes to another place that’s actually insane it’s in the negatives and i don’t want to walk to try to get a uber to go 3 minutes away from my house and it’s 40$? seriously what is that
title: Why is it so expensive

review: I’m so sick of my Uber rating going down because I don’t entertain the disgusting flirtatious ways of my drivers. I was a personal driver for clients for years, I know how to be respectful, generous, kind, and I even tip every driver. I greet them and ask them how their day is, gently close the door, click my seat belt etc. Yet my rating continues to go down when I don’t flirt back with my drivers. Screw this disgusting app don’t use it. Use Lyft instead. I’ve never had an issue with their drivers.
title: Sexual harassment impacting my rating

review: I use Uber to and from work every day. It’s like these drivers are given the longer routes all the time. I’m trying to make it to work on time so I schedule to be picked up at a certain time. Not 30 minutes after said time. Not blaming the drivers I just think the Uber navigation has been the worst. It’s always having my drivers take the street over and through and alley to my drop off rather than the actual street I live on…doesn’t make any sense.
title: Bad routing

review:
Covid did a number on Uber. So many of my trips have been sketchy lately. For instance, here is a recent example on my most recent night out. 

My First driver arrived and called me. I said I’d be outside in under 45 seconds. I’m outside 15 seconds later and he drove off when I was less than 10 feet away. (Nothing here exaggerated.)

Then, my second uber driver was driving in a broken Prius (could see from the dash blinking orange plus it was incredibly loud) that couldn’t even get up to speed on the freeway. Even better, she was putting on and taking off reading glasses every 30 seconds to see the map. On the freeway, in Los Angeles, at 9:30 at night. Incredibly unsafe experience. 

This app has gone down the trash can. (Would be 0 stars but it used to be really great.)
title: Mostly Bad Drivers

review: Scheduled an early morning ride to the airport two days in advance so that we knew there would be an available ride. Waited until 10 minutes after the scheduled pickup time before having to cancel and find alternate arraignments. Especially when you schedule that far in advance, a driver should have been confirmed by Uber the day before instead of hoping to find one the day off.
title: Frustrating

review: It should be no reason why it takes drivers 1+ hours to accept a rides under 10 dollars then as soon as the rate go up to 30+ dollars it get sucked up in a minute just for them to be on the other side of town and you waiting for them to drop someone else off. Uber fix that or your going to lose a lot of customers
title: System

review: I was in desperate need of a ride with a low battery, was connected to WIFI, tried disconnecting and was still not able to put in my request as the app was not picking up my location after entering it in several times. This is not the first time this has happened to me and I need an app that is reliable every time. I downloaded Lyft and was able to schedule a ride immediately. I’ll be using their services going forward.
title: App doesn’t work when I need it to

review: I booked a trip to the airport about a week in advance. Calculated a 15 minute delay for my Uber driver and added another 30 minutes for good measure in case we hit extraordinary traffic. Got a notification from Uber 20 minutes before my ride was supposed to be here that the driver is on the way and needs 56 minutes! Cancelled trip. Uber charged me $36 for a ride that was going to be approximately 40 minutes late. Horrible experience. I will disputing the charge.
title: Trip to airport missed. Booked in advance

review:
I asked for help after a driver started and ended a ride within a minute. Therefore stealing my money and I missed my appointment. I messaged and got 3 charges one for $8.75 resulting in the first call. I was told I’d get my refund, then I emailed in regards to the incident and got a charge of $3.00 
I responded to the email and received a charge of $5.78. All charges I didn’t know I was going to receive and found nothing for on the website. It’s extremely petty as the OG amount was $8.75 and the refund I was going to receive was $5.78.
title: Charged for Help

review: Went on vacation to Puerto Rico for a week, I ordered an Uber when we landed. But from there, nothing but problems. First I get signed out of my account and then I can’t access my account. Then when I regain access I can’t add any payment methods, went through Uber support and they pretty much told me they can’t help me and just referred me to their terms of service. So now I’m stuck in Puerto Rico with no way of getting around. Since Uber is the only ride share option down here
title: Worst customer service

review:
$32 for a 4 mile ride???

Update:
I scheduled a ride for 1:50am and paid for it 6 hours earlier and got a message 30 minutes before that there are “no drivers available”! I lost a days pay of work because that! Uber will give you hope when you schedule a ride and pay for it but they won’t deliver the service!! Very disappointed in this service!! I guess I’ll start using the old fashion Taxi service because they’re more reliable!!!
title: Too expensive

review: James is very professional and on time he goes out of his way to get you where you need to be in a very safe and comfortable ride. I couldn’t walk I was limping in pain and he saw that and pulled in the driveway to pick me up and I am very thankful for that. I was pleased. My experience with Uber so far has been excellent
title: Best Uber experience

review: I always have this problem that when i put a place to go, it tells me aprox the price amd then when i accept it, it tells me price is higher and increases $20 or $30 more, it's ridiculous because i see drivers nearby and i only need a ride 1 mile from where i am from and the price increases from 8 to 30 dollars. Also, when i accept a higher price say $2 more, it only makes me accept an even higher price later to $20 dollars more.
title: terrible, pricing way too high

review: I think Uber is great and all and i have nothing to complain about of the drivers. However I find it annoying and money wasting that I can’t cancel a ride immediately without being fined. If the driver is hella far and I want to try to find another ride I can’t cancel right away without being charged. Lyft actually lets me cancel immediately if I didn’t want it. Lyft is more of a money saving than uber.
title: Uber is pricey

review: We were very impressed with our driver, exceptionally courteous and professional.  His vehicle, a Toyota Highlander, is the nicest Highlander I’ve ever been in, with second row bucket seats and usb charging cords, also the cleanest Uber vehicle we’ve ever been in. Just a very enjoyable ride, even with all the challenges that the constructionalLas Vegas
title: Driver review

review: My driver was extremely pleasant and professional. Obviously his driving is the first thing you look at.  While unsustainable (and it was up to expectations) his personality and music selection truly made the difference.  Wish I could secure him every time.
title: Good music

review: The driver, Gustavo, arrived ahead of time, in a very clean vehicle, nicely dressed and helped us with our luggage. His driving was at an appropriate speed and no road rage, even with other cars cutting in front of us. He was easy to converse with and our trip went by fast for an hours drive.
title: Uber ride

review: My ride arrived very soon after requesting and the car was clean and comfortable. He took me home by the most direct route and it was easily worth the fee. I handed the driver a $5 tip at end of ride. Not sure how much was customary - this my first Uber. But he did a great job.
title: Ride well worth the money!

review: I had the privilege of getting a ride from Stephen this evening. He is so knowledgeable of the area and made the 5 o'clock Atlanta traffic look like a cake walk while navigating and bypassing several miles of standstill traffic. I wish I could have tipped more but this is on the company bill. 👍👍
title: Nice ride.

review: We enjoy Uber in all the times we have used it but we were not informed nowhere on the app that we would be charged for the three tolls that we  went over.  Unhappy with not knowing I would be charged with $20 then 20$ and 5$ for them
title: Tolls

review:
I spent most of my adult life 27 years working / living in 4 different countries . Only today UBER makes international transport in countries safe, accessible and timely. From a veteran globetrotter do NOT travel to a foreign country without UBER app on your phone
Serious advice to stay put of trouble!
JACK ann arbor
title: Punctuality and convenience YES Uber !

review: so my son totally enjoyed being taken by this veteran... he came home excited about his future after visiting with this wonderful man! He has been kinda unmotivated to do much with himself lately but this trip changed that! Nice job!!
title: thanks for giving my son a ride!

review: Short ride, but everything was perfect. Cameron picked me up in an immaculate Tesla and greeted me in a friendly manner. We had a great conversation and he dropped me off at my hotel. I don’t usually write reviews for Uber drivers, but this guy is awesome and I think you should know it.
title: Best Uber ride if my life!

review: Carlton had to deal with me having a small issue. Like locking my phone in an office I can’t get back into so he knew there would be no tip for a while, like 2+ days. I appreciate your kindest Carlton!!! I hope to ride with you again!!!
title: Very professional! Clean car nicest guy.

review:
Yum was wonderful! My entire experience was so nice, professional and prompt! My only regret is that I did not realize to add a tip and the end and hit the button prior to doing so. 😢 I look forward to using Uber again in the next several days. 
Sincerely, Angel McRae 😇
title: United and first ride with Uber!

review: Yesterday we had a scheduled ride from our home to Reagan airport at 2 pm . At 2:15 I got a text that Khwaja  was on his way . At 2:25 I used that app to call again and found out that he was not coming . Apparently the pickup was canceled and the ride given to Sani , who arrived at 2: 35 . Fortunately there was no traffic tie up and Saniwas very professional so we got to the airport in time to catch our flight . Very poor performance by Uber . Gave Sani 5 stars and Khwaja 0.
title: Canceled pickup

review: I use the app a few times a year and it works fine. Every now and then Uber will start sending daily messages trying to get me to use the app. I looked for 5 minutes to find a way to turn off promotional notifications and couldn’t figure it out so I have deleted the app. There should be a way to easily turn off promotional notifications while leaving the other notifications on so you know when your ride is on the way.
title: Stop spamming me!

review:
So I got deactivated from my driver app to be able to drive because some rider assumed I had a child in my front seat which was not true but of course Uber always believes the customer….

Now the big issue is they also won’t let me request a ride due to deactivation to my driver app that should not affect anyone that still needs to get around do better uber this is ridiculous I can see if I had someone in my car but u have absolutely no proof other then hear say
title: Terrible app

review: I have used Uber a total of 4 times.  Twice for Uber eats and once for Uber rides.  The service was fine.  The drivers were awesome and got big tips.  My problem is 3 out of the 4 times I’ve used them there is a fraudulent charge on my account.  A day or 2 after I use them there’s a $4 or $5 charge on my account.  It’s like they give them selves an extra tip hoping that I won’t notice.  I’m never using them again.  Do not recommend.
title: Fraudulent CHARGES even when you don’t use them!

review: I ordered an Uber ride this morning and waited and waited for the driver to arrive. Finally, the app said he had arrived which wasn’t the case. I messaged the driver asking where he was and if he couldn’t or wouldn’t show up, I would need to cancel and get another ride. The next thing I saw was that the driver had cancelled on me and now I’m being charged $5* for being ghosted by the driver. I was very upset as I needed to go to the hospital to see my husband. This whole experience was like a kick in the teeth.
title: Ghosted by driver

review:
It is unfair to rider, if the driver’s pickup location is too far, and waiting at the wrong location, rider can’t get get by walking. It also unfair if the driver cancels the rides and rider has the pay the cancellation fees. 

It’s unfair that, I was charged on my credit card cancellation fee, when I mentioned unfairly charged the cancellation fee, why did I get fee refunded on Uber cash as credit. I was supposed get the refund on my credit card not credit to my account credit to Uber cash. 

Lastly The driver should be able to locate the exact location of the rider. In Order not to have issues picking up the riders. 

Drivers shouldn’t be compensated, if the driver is at wrong pickup spot, also if the driver cancels the rides.
title: Unfairly charged, no email info available to contact customer support

review: Driver stole two of my items. Postmates/Uber eats (they're the same app and customer service under two different listings) refuses to refund me because apparently I've received refunds in the past...uh, yeah, because drivers have terrible work ethic and constantly steal items or give up on delivering them because they know they'll get paid anyway! This app is truly shameful and I will never be using it again -- at least Doordash cares about their customers...
title: Drivers steal my food, Uber steals my money

review: Stewart was a great conversationalist, a very safe driver, and so easy to talk to! We wish we had had another hour to ride with him because the conversation flowed so freely! In today’s time, it was so great to be relaxed while traveling in a car! God bless you and may you have a great week!  😎🇺🇸😎
title: Great ride!
userName: God dropped him into my lap!

review: My family has, unfortunately, had a history of severe drinking and driving accidents (resulting in human death and extreme property damage). I introduced them to this app and none of them have driven drunk since. This app saves lives and I can’t thank it enough!
title: Uber saved my life

review: Been doing Uber package  the drivers  are on point follows direction and communicate with me during the trip! I love this Uber package deliveries I will only use them for sending and receiving packages when I need it!  Professional Uber drivers! Thank you so much drivers!
title: Professional

review:
Everything was great but I was talking with Brett (driver) and the new maps are not very useful. It’s distracting for the drivers and honestly unsafe because the maps don’t show good directions. Streets are not legible. Sometimes the driving instructions are abrupt and wrong (like make a left over a median) 

Brett was great. His car was nice and we had a good conversation.
title: Maps are not as good as Google maps

review: I was having a medical emergency and needed a Uber right away to get my daughter home and the Uber made sure he was at place of pickup in time before the paramedics got to my apartment ! I couldn’t have been more grateful !! Thank you 🙏 and God bless . The app is easy to use thanks !!
title: Just in time !

review:
Thank you for waiting for us while we figured out where to find the Uber pickup. SO HOT and soooo not wanting to walk the hour back down the strip. You truly saved us and we felt much more relaxed when we reached our car. 
Thank you 🙏🏻
title: So patient, so kind

review: Lucas was an excellent driver & I was amazed when he arrived to pick me up within 5 minutes after I made the request.  I tipped him in cash rather than put it on my credit card. Lucas is a very good representative of your company.
title: My experience today using an Uber driver

review: I just want to say that Charles, “Charlie” is very personable, professional, knowledgeable and all around a wonderful person.  I just met him today, but feel like we've been friends for a long time.  He truly brings and represents a good image to your company.  Thank you, Charlie!
title: Charles, your best driver.

review: I thought I had submitted my acceptance for a ride, but the APP had a question for me about updates. I only figured out that my ride wasn’t accepted about 5 minutes later. I answered the question , and then the ride could actually be accepted. The APP should tell you that the ride isn’t accepted until you state that you’ve read and accepted the updates .
title: APP confusing

review:
Big thank you to a Terri for helping out a new college student who locked her keys in her car and was unable to get into her apartment and not to mention her cell phone was dying. 
Today you restored my faith in humanity sir! 

Her concerned mother cannot begin to express her gratitude to you in this very stressful situation!
title: Uber hero

review: I just completed a ride.  The driver dropped his phone  and in so doing made it seem as if he was waiting on me yet had not yet arrived to me.  Therefore, I was charged an extra 2.06.  I am trying to contact support impossible it seems.  He contacted someone on our way to state his blooper, but connection was really bad.  He was Ted to make sure I wasn’t overcharged yet I was.  I would really like it rectified.  I use Uber often and this is the 1st time something like this has happened.
title: Dropped phone by my driver

review: Natalie was my driver and I would give her 10 stars if I could!  She was very professional and safe!  We had great conversation and she’s an excellent listener.  I also found her to be compassionate.  I will ask for her again if I’m in Orlando and will recommend her without hesitation!  She’s the best!
title: Driver Natalie

review:
Both of my trips today, were great. Very nice drivers, and very good drivers. 

I don’t know how to send. Send does not work. 
I will put my nickname as Bambi. But u must tell me my nickname when I write a review again. Thanks
They won’t accept 3 of my choices, so whatever I choose, please remind me.
title: Uber

review: Having only used Uber once before in NYC I wasn’t sure about a long ride but due to car problems I had no choice. Victor is a friendly driver we had a nice conversation and I felt very safe with his driving. I would request him again 100% !
title: Great Ride

review:
I did not write review much but I need to write this review. I use uber in Mexico and there are many double charge and price increase after driving. Customer assistances usually copies and pastes the previous answer like a robot and did not provide proper answer. 

Especially,Samuel Hernandez did not recognize my trip and provide strange answers and keep copying and pasting answers. Camila just ignored the question. I highly recommend the customer representative provides proper education to these two employees.
title: Uber in Mexico

review: Tarik was able to wait while I checked a building for safety.  I was able then to turn off an alarm that might have had the police alerted and they would have had to make a trip out to the building for safety.  So I thank Tarik and Uber very much.
title: Saving

review: I never leave a review but the lack of customer service access is really annoying. I used to be able to use Apple Pay without any issues but suddenly, Uber would not accept my Apple Pay, requiring me to use a different method of payment. Part of the reason I use Uber is for ease of use with Apple Pay but that is no longer the case if I need to pull out a credit card to enter in it’s info every time I need to book a ride.
title: Apple Pay doesn’t work

review: This man adjusted my drop off after my tech challenged brain had the wrong address entered. For us to the wedding we were running late to ON TIME. Then, I forget my phone in his car and he drives back to meet up with and get me my phone back. Truly the PCB angel of my vacation.
title: Bruce, my man!

review: Lets drivers cancel on me with no compensation and no ability to review them! Also much more expensive than Lyft. And the app claims high demand even when scheduling in advance for not busy periods so they seem to lie to abuse of surge pricing. In fact they charge an arm and a leg to drive around the block! Plus they allegedly keep most of the money and underpay the drivers. Maps are not optimized for best route but rather to charge more. Oligopolistic app with poor engineering quality.
title: Awful, in need of regulation or competition

review:
Thank you for a safe and enjoyable ride! Smoke free✅, polite reminder to “buckle up,”✅and great conversation! I have started reading a very insightful book! The verbiage is clear and true. I’ve only just begun to read, but feel the words are “spot on,” and the message is clear. 
It was a pleasure to meet you! Safe travels.
title: To:  Thomas L. B.

review: Scott was very professional and pleasant especially when we had to make him go the long way around just to miss the tolls. We wish we would’ve known better how to do the app for the first time in this area. Thank you Scott great job!
title: Professional

review: I rarely use Uber and didn’t mine the app on my phone for those rare times I use it but when I start getting ad notifications pop up, that’s an immediate delete. How desperate of a company is this that they think it’s ok to bomb someone with notification ads. I fear this will become the new normal. Every time you hear your phone ding, you won’t know if it’s a legit alert or just some greedy company trying to take profits. It’s an absolute invasion of privacy.
title: I don’t want to hear from you

review: He guided us through the confusion of SFO airport. My United flight was leaving from Terminal 2 and he told us that we should check in our baggage at Terminal 3 as that’s United terminal. Had he not guided us, we would have been in chaotic situation. Thank you so much!! You are an excellent human being!!
title: Excellent

review: Wasn’t as user-friendly as I had hoped. We had luggage and there was no way to tell which options could accommodate large suitcases so we thought that a van was the only safe option. Had to try a couple of times to get one and don’t know what we would have done if that option didn’t work out. However, our driver was AWESOME!
title: Vehicle capacity not shown

review: Mr Mohammad was the most respectful Uber drive I have ever had. It’s so comforting to know that there are great people living in our world who take the time to get to know someone. He really made my day, and I will appreciate my ride to the auto dealership today for the rest of my life.
title: What a great experience

review: Very great with children I had my year and a half old granddaughter with me I had to put the car seat in and he was very patient and very understanding. The conversation was great the trip was short but it was a very enjoyable ride much compliments to Scott thank you
title: Deserves more than 5 stars

review:
Phillip was a good driver. We did get stuck in the traffic on the beltway. He might want to consider getting a transponder that can switch to carpool mode to avoid all the traffic on the beltway. This would also free up his time to take more fares.

We enjoyed the ride with Phillip.
title: Trip to Dulles Airport

review: I needed a ride from garage since it was going to be hours until my car is fixed. So needed a ride home decided to try Uber since cabs in area are pretty nonexistent. I am very happy I did very nice driver and very fast to pick me up. I will also do Uber if I need to in future!
title: First & Best Uber ride

review: Made me smile and had a good laugh, it’s been a rough weekend for me with my car breaking down last night and he really helped give me a boost of energy and the professionalism was outstanding. Felt very safe. 5/5 easily, wish I could give more stars
title: Amazing service

review: Tried getting a ride home last night, and there weren’t any available drivers at the time. The order was cancelled after I waited for 10 minutes. So I tried again. And again. And again. Each time, the ride was confirmed, then cancelled ten or so minutes later when there were no drivers available. Today I have a Venmo receipt for each of those cancelled rides! They charged me for each of the rides that they cancelled 🤯🤬
title: Waited for an hour
developerResponse: {'id': 35137302, 'body': "Hi, we're extremely sorry to hear about your concern regarding your recent experience. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve your concern, fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343HNsE. We shall get back to you at the earliest.", 'modified': '2023-03-01T09:14:58Z'}

review: Professional but approachable with questions and he gives honest feedback on the area. Ride was clean and he was patient waiting on us to get to the car. If you had the ability to pick your driver this would be the go-to.
title: Best driver in the land.

review: Luis saved me a half hour additional waiting by bypassing a mob of cars. Over the phone he directed me to another location just three minutes away walking. His car has blue lights underneath so it was easy to identify his car. He had the Super Bowl game on the t.v., as I rode in his vehicle. Five Stars!
title: Time

review: This driver is amazing he really went above and beyond, I switch my ride 2 times because I was going to miss my flight. He drove me all the way to San Francisco Airport and he got me to the airport on time. Thank you very much Fernando for your amazing customer service and great conversation
title: Thank you

review:
1. I can't find a way to submit feedback. You have multiple blog posts talking about accountability both ways, but then offer feedback on drivers not yourself or your app. That's a bit dishonest to me.

2. Right now I've had repeated drivers that are five minutes way, then cancel. That's a pattern and your system should be able to note some characteristic and give a better indication of the realistic time. Or offer some mechanism to mark a trip as important and possibly pay more.

I appreciate you can't control the drivers but in both situations the company is using drivers as scapegoats.

In general though, a great system that for a passenger tends to work faster and safer than taxis.
title: Pickup estimate of 5 min closer to 30 min

review:
I had use this App in several countries and is efficient, it has help me to transport myself even when places are hard to find
There is no communication issue with the drivers as is quite clear
title: So Far has been useful

review: Drivers always picking me up at the wrong address not sure why I have to put an address for the pick up its annoying I have to walk across the street they are claiming it’s the app this needs to be fixed
title: Wrong address

review:
This was my 1st time using Uber, and our driver, Hector was wonderful.  He safely brought us to our destination, his vehicle was spotless, and he was very welcoming, professional and knew the area very well.

If Uber is as good as Hector, we will be using Uber in the future.

Happy New Year to all, may it be filled with love, joy and peace.  God bless.
title: Hector was GREAT

review: This was my first time using Uber. I didn’t know the location I was at and trying to find his car out of 50 other cars was not easy. Keith came out of his car and looked around for me. That made him stand out literally!
title: Very Friendly!

review: It has been a very bad experience in booking Uber for a cab in Hyderabad. I am surprised to see that multiple times I got a cancellation from the drivers. Why is it happening? If I, as a Uber customer cancels any trip, I get charged. But why not to those drivers, who are assigned and cancel such trips. Please let me know whether I should continue using Uber in Hyderabad or not.
title: Experience with Uber in Hyderabad, India

review: He picked me up close to me sitting in driveway, knowing that I was disabled and brought me back after picking up my son at a stop. He was the best and most considerate driver I’ve seen since I’ve become disabled with helping with my son getting him from the bus stop to home! :)
title: Thank you!!

review: This was my first time using Uber and it was. Very pleasant and enjoyable experience. My driver Mitchell was polite and courteous and excellent to talk with. He made me feel safe and comfortable while under his care. His car was very clean and smelled nice. 5 star service from a 5 star driver. Would recommend.
title: Mitchell was a rock star

review: Uber is getting so greedy. Takes money from drivers that make them money. The reason you a driver who will have an attitude or drive you like you’re a sack of potatoes is because of Uber’s over exploitation and manipulation. If you’re a rider, you would that driver a huge favor by getting into the car, and ask them if you can pay them the full fair for the ride instead of having your money go to greedy uber.
title: Stop taking money from drivers that make you money…!

review: Three times and counting the driver has use the Uber navigation app and attempted to drop me off in the warehouse District next to the Brooklyn Queens Expressway on 49th Ave. in Queens. I live three blocks away at 30th Ave. and 49th St. One driver didn’t believe I knew what I was talking about and insisted that I did live at the warehouse he was trying to drop me off that! I managed to get him to take me to my apartment instead.
title: Can’t find y apartment in NYC

review: Yesterday I called Uber. The trip going was fine. Then time to go back home. Uber driver cancelled the trip.  Uber has now charged me for a cancellation trip that I did not cancel. I got a message saying the driver had to cancel. So I walked further down camp Bowie. Called Uber. This Uber driver finally showed up.  Arrived home safely. Then I get these emails. Where I been charged for canceling a ride. Then emails where Uber is charging me for rides I did not take. Help me Uber take these charges off my account. Please thank u
title: Over charging

review: This is very convenient for me and my mom we have to walk a long time to get to our local stores we just do a few taps and we can get a taxi in less then an hour and gives us people with good rating and it finds Uber drivers near ur location
title: BETTER THEN HAILING A CAB

review: Some of the worst customer service I have ever experienced. I left my phone in the back of an Uber, and am trying to receive help with it, but they keep saying they can’t find my account and then refuse to respond to me. To top it off there’s no phone number or anything, so you’re stuck waiting for someone to reply. I am able to give them all of the information about my account, and they simply refuse to respond or do anything about it.
title: Customer service

review: I am not a talker, and when I use Uber early in the morning I really don’t won’t to even think about holding conversations. I put in my headphones or just don’t really answer back, but that doesn’t seem to work. I really don’t won’t to come off as rude by telling people to please stop. I really need an option for a quite ride.
title: I really need a quite ride button.

review: Twice had a bad experience with Uber once the driver after I got into the car and drove off two hundred yards decided to stop and told me to get out for no reason and told me to call for another car to pick me up though I didn’t do anything wrong. Second I planned to go to new cairo but instead the driver took me to madinaty instead and the fare was triple what I should have been charged for.
title: Uber need good training for their drivers

review: Have tried to schedule a ride several times and a usual $10 Uber ride is showing up as $50 fare. There is definitely something wrong w/ the app as others have complained too. Fix it please!
title: Problem with scheduling rides

review: I’ve woken up this morning to discover that Uber won’t allow me to schedule any rides 30 minutes in advance for a much more affordable price. My $15 ride turned into a $42 no matter when I tried to schedule it. And when I did try to time it EXACTLY at 30 minutes later I was warned I CAN’T do that. But when I got a minute more, it’s $42 again. I can’t believe after almost half a year of service the app decided to do this. I’m switching to Lyft.
title: Awful schedule time issues

review:
Can't turn off spam ad notifications while having useful ones on, which means I either have to uninstall the app each time I'm not traveling or I have to dive through nine menus to shut notifications off. If they can't see a world where I want to know when my driver is approaching but not get spammed with ads then I'm just permanently deleting it.

Can't believe I'm saying this but I'll just call a cab.
title: Can't turn off spam ad notifications while having useful ones on

review: I had another bad experience with Über, big surprise (sarcasm).  This time a driver in San Juan, PR, canceled my ride because the fare was too low.  He actually texted me in the app saying so.  Do you think corporate review texts within the app?   It was 11:30pm and most the restaurants and bars were already closed, if I were a woman this would have been particularly unsafe.  I NEVER use Uber in CONUS and wish there were other options in PR.  Next time I’m just going to plan ahead and call a Cab.
title: Über underpays Drivers on short trips

review: I’m stranded with two kids, my car broken down, desperately trying to navigate Uber and there so called “easy interface” but I cant seem to get a ride when it comes to updating my cell phone/contact info. I just get a service error message and nothing else on what to do. Twice this has happened when stranded with my two children. What is suppose to be easy about using this app or business? It’s made my life extremely more difficult
title: Horrible!!

review: My app won’t allow me to add a credit card.  It simply says “unknown error” try again later.  I tried to find someone to help and I found that they have nobody to help.  Crappy company.
title: No customer service available

review: I’ve been using Uber for years & have gone through ups & downs with using it. Lately I was having good luck by scheduling my rides and paying less than if I ordered last minute… but it seems like the pas week the price is ridiculously high. I get there’s an extra charge for gas which I guess is fair, but it’s crazy overpriced. For 2 miles $30?? And comparing those prices to Lyft, I can get a ride for $10-12, they definitely need to stay more consistent on their prices.
title: Lately it’s been BAD

review:
Beware to other users: I placed an order and attempted to cancel the order within the 5 min time frame. You are not able to cancel an order from the Uber app or website. 
I was still charged for the order when I called customer service to cancel because the process ended up taking over 5 minutes. 
It feels a bit misleading to have a 5 minute time frame to cancel but no easy way to access a cancellation option.
title: Cancellation time frame

review: In the morning I got two ubers getting a drinks orders and other a food orders . One came and the second call me rudely that he can't come he didn't knew and he didn't came he was fighting at the phone with me and the lady from costumer services he was as worst as him didn't fix anything   I didn't receive my drinks order and they took my money i see that as they still my money I will never again gonna order here
title: Bad service from the drivers to the costumer service phone number

review: Drivers can have you wait 30 minutes and then cancel on you and you get nothing in return. Drivers ask you if you’re paying cash or card and sometimes if you say card they will cancel because they need the cash for the gas. The app should let the drivers know if the payment is in cash or card so they can not accept rides they don’t want to take. I hate uber so much I’m never using it again. Such a waste of time
title: Uber is absolute trash in Ecuador

review: I have tried 8 different times, different days, different time to get an Uber. Every single time they have canceled. One time they called ahead and side the price will be at least 5 times higher than when you booked, the ride was already 26 dollars for a 2 mile ride to work im not going to pay 130$ for a ride. I asked why so much, the driver mumbled something and he hung up, cue my 8th and finally attempt at getting a Uber ride.
title: Never show up when they do they want me to pay more

review: Been using Uber for a while now, never been disappointed before, but service in San Juan, Puerto Rico was terrible. We ubered to the Bad Bunny concert with no mayor problem, where uber even had a separate area for drop off/ pick up. Then when the show was over, no drivers available, waited over 40 minutes and nothing. Ended up walking over a mile and a half in the rain. Extremely disappointed in Uber PR.
title: Left stranded

review: Letting driver charge me 5 times of $35 payments with me never getting my item back. This is basically Uber stealing from my bank account. You guys have no reliable customer service line and currently going to the bank to report fraudulent behavior on my card charged by this company. Been a user of this app for many years but this is happening to often and they struggle to help customers that need assistance with things like this.
title: Poor service and fraud activity on my card

review:
I hate how they confirm that you have scheduled a ride. Then you find out right before you’re supposed to leave that the payment isn’t working. Then you go onto the app to add another credit card to your payment options. And then it keeps saying “unknown error” and won’t even ADD THE NEW PAYMENT OPTION! 
Ugh!
Literally this has been happening to me for a year straight with no resolve.
title: Can’t ever ADD payment so rides keep getting cancelled

review: So I signed up for Uber Driver. I uploaded all of my information they asked for. They asked for my previous drivers license history since I just got a renewal. I uploaded my old license plus obtained my record from DMV. I took photos of both over 12 times, it kept saying each time I log in that I still needed to take photos. I have since canceled my Uber account. Their cheap foreign customer service is disgusting and this company is cheap. Stay away from Uber!!
title: Horrible Driver experience

review: I’ve been a customer for 5+ years, but I’ve been unable to login to my account or request a new ride for the last few weeks and I’m very frustrated with the support. I’ve tried reaching out in the app, over email, on Twitter, etc. and I no longer have any hope that I’ll be a customer due to the unhelpful support from the Uber team. I will be using Lyft and DoorDash moving forward until this issue has been resolved
title: Horrible support, unable to access account

review: I am satisfied with using Uber but we should be able to send a picture of our location in the message to the driver that way we can easily find each a whole lot faster.
title: Overall great

review: Uber has done a great job of making its service as safe as possible! I think it would also be a good idea to have a button for the rider to confirm they made it to their destination. That way, the driver is accountable in the chance that a tragedy does occur.
title: Great service!

review: After Landing At Our Airport From A Vacation-Property Search, We Found Out Our Son Couldn’t Pick Us Up. So We Added The Uber App For The First Time. Was Very Easy To Do, And Only Had A Waiting Time Of 10 Minutes. The Driver, Brandi, Was Very Nice, And Very Talkative. Got Us Home Safe And Secure. Would Diffinatly Use Uber Again!!!
title: First Time User

review: Do not use Uber. They are trying to charge me and $80 cleaning fee when I got in the car with no food or drinks and clean shoes. How did I cause $80 worth of mess by just sitting there? It’s impossible to reach a customer service representative which is insane. At this point they are scamming people and I suggest using any other app to get where you need to go. I’m a broke college student about to pay for textbooks and a total of $112 for a 15 mile ride is really going to set me back and Uber does not care.
title: Horrible

review: Its a shame, really.   Uber used to be ground breaking and the perfect way to travel.  Now it can’t be trusted.  I used to be able to hop an Uber and go join my friends for dinner or a drink for $5 each way.  Now that same ride is like $11…and don’t try and get a ride home during ‘the busy period’ because they’ll jack up the price to $25-30…for a 1.5 mile ride. Cant tell you how many times I’ve been stranded at the bar frantically calling friends when Uber has done this to me.
title: No longer trusted.

review: I tried to order a ride ahead of time to save money, but I got an error message. So I waited and ordered a ride as soon as I arrived in Phoenix. I ended up paying more than double what I would’ve paid for the trip had I been able to preorder it. The ride ended up costing more than the bus ride from Tucson to Phoenix! I don’t know if it was a software glitch or what, but I’m not happy.
title: Expensive

review:
This company can go jump off a cliff . 

If your drivers are vaccinated why do you still force passengers to were a mask ??   Control and power is why and nothing more .   It’s time to cancel Uber and any other companies that makes up there own medical rules about wearing mask when A there not required and B zero of the paper CHINA Made mask worn were actually effective.      I will never under any circumstance use Uber again .  Let’s make taxis great again .   Uber is a job killing industry killing evil company .   Bye Felicia
title: Really ?

review: We’ve only needed to use Uber once a few years ago. Therefore, I forgot how to go about setting it up. So I essentially started fresh with this ride. The whole process was easy and the driver “very professional. “ Getting to the airport was never easier.
title: Uber Transport to Dulles Int. Airport

review: First my rides were $21-24 at LEAST but for some reason I do not know why but now the rides are $36-46 and MORE! Uber CLAIMS there’s limited riders around but EVERYDAY? It has NEVER and has NOT ever been over $24 to get a location less then 25 minutes
title: Had to download Lyft again, charges rises yet again
developerResponse: {'id': 12333184, 'body': "Hi there, sorry to hear that you have concerns about getting charged extra after every ride. We'll look into this issue for you. We request you to reach out to us with specific details at t.uber.com/contact or via the in-app Help section and we'll follow up. ", 'modified': '2019-12-11T08:21:57Z'}

review: A few times I have had drivers add tolls to trips for extra money even though they did not take the tolls on my trip and also I have had Uber charge me a cancellation fee after they tried to charge me 200$ instead of the 44$ that was originally priced. I disputed it every time and was refunded my money but I imagine they profit a lot of money from people not paying attention to receipts
title: Always check your receipts

review: I left an item in a Uber driver’s car. Two seconds after he pulled off we went to Uber app to inform driver. I am traveling and had important travel documents inside. I still have not heard from driver and it’s been over 12 hours. I know he has the item because it was only seconds that I tried contacting him. This is in Miami Florida. He is driving a white Audi. I haven’t been able to speak to anyone from Uber except through the app from which the driver was requested. I need help and no one is there to help
title: Left item in car
