review: This latest update evidently has a fatal flaw. If you are using a PIN, the PIN no longer appears where you expect it, and without the PIN, you cannot ride. Me and the driver tried to find it for several minutes before he told me to leave the car, charged me a cancellation fee, and I had to stand out in the freezing cold for 15 minutes until I could get a Lyft to come. No place on the app is a HELP button - the help menus just take you to other places other than “I need help from a person now”.
title: Beware - no PIN - no ride

review: It was perfect because I had to utilize all my time and I was on a tight schedule and I was able to book it within 10 to 15 minutes arrival the driver was super nice and help my wife unload heavy luggage, I was in an accident, and I couldn't lift it. This beats the normal taxicab experience.
title: Great Experience

review: I was beyond impressed with Francisco’s driving skills, professionalism, appropriate conversation when I asked him questions, and overall incredibly important trip that he enhanced in every possible way today! Uber does well to hire drivers like Francisco!
title: Francisco is a gift from God

review: A few weeks ago the app just stopped even being able to book rides. When I call customer service they said why don’t you try using the browser, and so I did and that work since then the app became a waste of space on my phone  only thing that work is just tipping, rating and see where the Uber is at nothing else. Not even canceling or booking that can only happen in the browser for some unknown reason.
title: The app refuse to book

review: It’s 9 pm and I need to head back to school, but my school’s busses aren’t running due to being understaffed. The only way I planned on using uber to get back, back after putting in my verification, email, and phone number, it still won’t let me book a ride. It keeps saying my phone number isn’t valid and giving me some random phone number that I don’t even recognize. Now I’m using Lyft to get back. It’s cheaper and actually lets me book a ride.
title: Doesn’t let me book a ride

review:
Apparently the new definition of near by is; in the same state as you.
If I don’t click the wait and save option, I shouldn’t be waiting for a driver to pick me up from 5 towns over.
This app also tried to rob me of over 100$ - I immediately called my bank to file a claim against them. 
Lyft is superior- they don’t charge you until you get the ride, I’ve never had surcharges or issues with getting a close by ride, and they keep you notified.
title: “Near by” and money scams

review: Driver was great I was being canceled because the app had the wrong address. I put my home address in and I was going to a dierent locating. I corrected after driver said what you got off at the wrong airlines. Please correct any over charges on this trip.
title: Owner of business

review: Uber used to be great. Quick response from drivers, available at all times, and generally clean cars. Now, it can take 3-4 attempts to get a car because after drivers accept, the arrival time shifts from 2-3 minutes to 15-20 minutes. Or, drivers just cancel mid way through the wait. I realize that the app relies on independent drivers, but it also creates the ecosystem in which the individual drivers operate. Has the era of reliable ride sharing passed?
title: What Happened to Uber?

review: The Bolt app was recommended but, I chose Uber instead and am glad because of its accuracy and ease of use. Arrived at the airport in Lisbon and saw that they even have a dedicated collection spot for the passengers. Definitely an easier option than driving.
title: Portugal Uber

review:
Our driver Abdullah was prompt and exactly where he said he would be. The car was clean and spacious with a nice touch of air freshener. The ride felt safe and appropriately fast and efficient. He was clear about where he was going. 

My husband and I were tired at the end of an eleven hour flight. We arrived late at night into SFO, and it felt good to be in such confident hands.
title: Prompt and Professional

review: The Uber service continues to degrade over time. Drivers don’t accept, resulting in wildly inaccurate pickup and drop off estimates. Surge pricing constantly hits after drivers cancel on you. Even pre-scheduled trips such as trips to the airport booked 2 days early have canceled (not been late, actually CANCELED) on me resulting in me having to rebook the trip at a much higher price AND run late to a flight. I live in Los Angeles. It’s about as urban and car-centric as you can get. How this app has fallen so far is beyond me.
title: Service Continues to Degrade

review: Time and time again , Uber has come through with ensuring I get home safe . Weather I could cover the immediate trip or it. Uber values it’s customers100% to even consider such a policy. Let alone implement it! Thank you Uber!! I’ll never ride with anyone else…:
title: The best thing going.

review: Carlos was fantastic, friendly and polite.  I broke down in the 405 and had to tow my car.  Next, I had to make a stop to pick up things for work the next morning and he was so friendly and patient.  Added bonus, he was great to talk with …
title: Excellent !

review: I live 6 minutes from the airport.  Why did it cost me $32 for a 6 minute drive with no traffic?  I need a response so I can decide if it is more economical to take a taxi on my return trip and in the future. Thank you in advance for your prompt attention.
title: Costly trip

review: I know I live in Florida but drivers should be able to speak English Fluently I was being driven to a medical center for surgery and was nervous enough then when I questioned the driver about the direction he was taking he didn’t understand a word I said that was very frustrating
title: Nice But!

review: So helpful that Uber asked for my flight information and kept up with my arrival time as my flight was delayed several times. It was so nice to know they were watching and I didn’t have to keep them informed!
title: Airport pickup - keeps up with delays!

review: Card expired, new card had same number, and I couldn’t easily update the expiration date on the existing entry while I was trying to order my trip to the airport. I was ready to abandon the experience, then finally found the Wallet and was able to do it. Frustrating and anxiety-producing with a soon-departing flight.
title: Works fine, but renewing CC info was a pain

review: After a loooong day of delayed flights and unhelpful airline assistance, it was so good to get in a nice clean, cool, and comfy car and arrive safely at my hotel for the night! Haruna, was kind and the ride was smooth and stress free! Thank you Haruna, my heart is grateful you decided to make ONE LAST stop before heading home for the night!
title: Grateful Heart

review: I had a fantastic driver. Both were polite and conversational. However, I’m not understanding why you charged me one price to get to the airport and then doubled it to get me back when I returned. It was only a 4 mile trip. I expected to pay the same.
title: Price difference

review: I have been using Uber for years. How about drivers are finally able to see the dropoff address once they accept the ride to deter drivers from canceling on customers based on where they live or are going? This is ridiculous. Cancellations should not be allowed once a driver arrives to pick up the customer. They already know the time it will take to drive someone - how about care about the customers AND the drivers and be transparent?
title: Constantly getting canceled on

review: Luis saved the day! After waiting 9 hours only to have our flight cancelled we called Uber to take us an hr and a half home. Luis answered the call. He drove us safely , avoided a lot of traffic to get us home quicker and took our bags to the door. He was wonderful !!
title: Luis saves the day

review: I was very impressed with the professional greeting and service that he provided me with he was very helpful with my friend rollator he was very friendly and funny we had good conversation I rate him the best urber I have ever encountered thank you so much for making me and my friend ride enjoyable and pleasant.
title: Great driver

review: I use Uber to get to specific appointments on time and they have yet to let me down. I also ride with him from the airport to home, which is a long ride and they are always patient and kind.
title: Uber always gets me where I'm going on time

review: This would have been a 5-star review except for my frustration setting a pick up time. I thought it made sense to reserve a pickup  except the price was always the same—$43! To go 1.2 miles!  I later learned this outrageous amount was due to RESERVING the pickup time. I went with the NOW option for just over $7.  DRIVER WAS GREAT and car was clean. I was picked up on time.
title: Never Use Reserve Option

review: He is the best Uber driver I’ve ever had. So patient dealing with a family who is crazed  with a wedding rehearsal and being out of town. Went over and above stopping to pick up items for me as we went to next destination. So kind and patient!
title: Kind and professional

review: 90% of drivers lie and say someone vomited in their car. Why? Because Uber will pay them the cleaning fee and the driver just pockets it. They do it over and over. Meanwhile the customer gets charged an absorbent amount for something they didn’t even do. I’ve heard of drivers just saving old photos or using old screenshots to scam for a payout. This type of thing is all over the internet. There’s a reason why the stereotype  cab driver drives for Uber instead of say Lyft or the equivalent.
title: Don’t use Uber…

review:
Edwin, my Uber driver today, was wonderful. He was prompt, courteous, found route short cuts, and went out of his way to make my ride a smooth, easy one.

He’s super, and a real asset to the company. I couldn’t recommend him more highly.

Thank you Edwin! The best of luck to you.
title: Trip to Burbank Airport

review: We used Uber for 2 days getting work done on our Land Rover. So convenient ,easy and pleasant and safe . I felt like we were in New York or in a small city going out on the town ;) Nice to have the options that Uber has available from basic to deluxe ride.
title: New York

review: The hoops they will make you jump through with flight numbers etc. is extremely frustrating and unnecessary. They will not let you book a ride from the airport without this information and in my case forcing me to book it on the spot make it much more expensive. I don’t know what the executives at Uber were thinking but a big flaw on their part.
title: Don’t order an Uber to or from the airport

review:
Our driver, Kevin, professionally and successfully negotiated a very recent accident on the interstate that could have been very serious with a less attentive driver. 
We got to the airport in great time. The driver was courteous to us and other drivers which we appreciated very much. 
Thank you Uber!
title: Great first trip!

review: Uber needs better drivers, not all of my experiences are bad but majority of them aren’t good. I understand that they don’t have to accept the ride, but the ones who do complain about how far the drive is.. um, you didn’t have to accept it! I just had a man who was in front of my apartment cancel the ride after I waited 20 minutes. What was the point? Or you’ll get a driver who’ll cancel the ride and ask you to pay them what uber charged the rider. It’s ridiculous!!!!
title: Hit or miss

review: Five Lyft drivers wouldn’t drive to the designated pick up canopy at Fairplex. I called your driver crying because my 93 yr old father was home alone. Your driver told me  I’m going to go get you. It’s going to be alright!  My dad was alright just very hungry. I was out there waiting for two hours!  Thank you Uber
title: Great driver

review: Driver was super considerate when I dropped my phone in the rain. He offered to return to pickup address to find it, called the phone and went to pick it up from person who found it nearby. Many many thanks and God’s richest blessings on his life.
title: Excellent

review: Christopher is a Worldly agreeable person.  Our long trip to the airport after a family tragedy was incredibly easy due to his positive attitude and comfortable car environment.  You don’t get service like this anymore.  So glad to know people like this are out there.
title: Christopher

review: Daryl greeted me with a smile, opened the door and ask if I had enough leg room and ask how my day was going thus far!  He suggested food and attraction venues along the way as well as tour info.  I felt as if he was my personal chauffeur for the hour!  Hats off to a great Uber experience!;)
title: Best Uber experience ever!

review: I was traveling with my wheelchair bound, stroke-disabled, elderly mother with 4 large suitcases. Armin, was patient, pleasant, very accommodating and helpful, thinking outside of the box, when we had difficulty getting her into the vehicle. The ride was incredibly comfortable, and spacious. I highly recommend this driver.
title: Excellent, accommodating & polite

review: My UBER driver Fernando was awesome. He picked me up in his Tesla model Y - what a great ride!! Fernando was friendly, polite, courteous and helpful. He loaded my bags when he picked me up and unloaded them when he dropped me off at the airport. UBER was very convenient for me getting tot the airport - loved it. I recommend UBER and I recommend my UBER driver!!
title: Great UBER Ride to PHL Airport

review: We needed a ride from Fort Lauderdale cruise terminal to west palm beach airport. Gerson was there in 10 min on Easter Sunday to get us there. I can’t thank him enough. He was truly professional and courteous. When we come across someone like this I wish we can request him. Thank you Gerson. Many blessings to you.
title: Gerson is the best

review: My son was dropped off at the wrong location.  It was an emergency situation to pick him up from the location.  You were there in one minute to pick him up!! Thank you for being there!!! You were an angel today!!
title: Thank you!

review: My driver was a gentleman from Honduras who made my ride present and he was the perfect chauffeur good guy that's why he's rated 4.97.... the only problem was the trip was too short I didn't want it to end but it ended quickly because that was my destination.
title: Perfect chauffeur

review: We will be forever be  indebted to Jonathan for generously returning to the airport to return the iPhone we left in his backseat.  He not only returned amidst heavy traffic but patiently waited until we could find him looking for US inside the airport.  Jonathan is a saint, and we can’t recommend him highly enough.  Obrigada, Jonathan💕💕
title: St. Jonathan😇

review: I was so glad Aleksandar was the Uber driver who picked me up. He arrived early and was very patient when I asked him to stop after we drove off, to make sure I had my wallet. Luckily, I did have it. He was knowledgeable about the trip and gave me pointers about my destination.
title: Caring and efficient

review: It's ridiculously frustrating that the drivers are always canceling rides just before pickups to create a surge. Literally the system thinks there are not enough drivers and more requests than normal because drivers manipulate the system
title: Drivers scam the algorithm

review: The first driver assigned did not show up … then the Universe sent me Sterling! Not only did he show up in record time, he was such a blessing and helped me feel so much better about the stressful appointment I was headed to…. and he wished me a Happy Valentines Day, to boot! Thank you, Mr. Sterling!
title: Perfect Driver! Sterling better than gold …

review: Had a disappointing experience with Uber at SF airport. Waited for 10 minutes for a ride that did not arrive. Looked like an App problem. On a second attempt the app was not able to identify a driver. On the third attempt a driver arrived within 4 minutes. Never had this problem before.
title: Unresponsive

review: Was impressed with how fluid the app is to use, but in 24 hours of having it on my phone, I’ve received 4 notifications “reminding” me to book my next ride or order my next meal. No option to customize what kind of notifications I get, so I uninstalled it (all or nothing means I won’t get notifications from drivers if I don’t want to get ads). I don’t want to be solicited like this.
title: Easy to use, but incessant notifications

review:
We can get an Uber ride to get home from the airport, but Uber is not available to pick us up from our house to take us to the airport.  Your software doesn’t recognize our address or any streets in our sub.  Please update your software!!! These streets have been here for a few years now!!
PA Safety
title: Map Updates Needed

review: this has nothing to do with the driver and onnly the safty of the rider. I was picked up on the blvd and was unable to add the apartment number and there is no place to call to get the exact location on the blvd that I would get picked up I was on my way to the airport so timing is everything this could have been way worse if it was a night or early morning pickup I know for certain I would not stand on the side of the road like a hitchhiker waiting for some random person to pick me up
title: Joan

review: My husband sent me food for Valentine’s Day but he had to be in a meeting so when the Uber driver came, he asked for a “PIN number” I didn’t have to pin and my husband was in a meeting so I couldn’t get it. The Uber driver was irritated so I told him to take it back cause I can’t get it for an hour at least. Then the Uber driver told me he was going to call Uber, after a few minutes he said he just said he did an override and gave me the food but I’m not going to use this app again
title: Never using again

review:
Our truck broke down and Isaac was kind enough to follow  as we tried to see if it would run while rest of party was in Uber 

Patiently waited as it broke down again and we had to pick up driver.  Great service after an lane delays and a 14 hour travel day
title: Issac

review: This was my first experience where I had difficulty finding a driver. I tried to set a ride the night before and could not. Then I was unable to match with a Driver in my area three times before I could set up my ride. It was about 7:15 and I was very surprised at the lack of availability. I had an hour and a half and was still  late for work.
title: Availability

review: Need to go somewhere?  Business or pleasure, Uber app gets you there.  It can separate the business rides and pleasure ones on how it’s charged, has great maps and excellent timing notifications to get you a ride where and when you need it.
title: Great travel app!

review: Jennifer was amazing. We enjoyed having such a long ride with a great driver and very nice person. The car was super clean and comfortable and she made sure we had the temperature set to make us comfortable and even had water for us after our long flight .
title: Review

review: Omar was on time and the ride was enjoyable.   He was respectful and asked me if I was preferred a specific music style - offered me water.  He also suggested great places to dine on my next trip and much more.     I would highly recommend him.  One of the best Uber drivers I’ve experienced
title: Great Experience

review: Julio was on time, actually a little early.  However, he was on a personal call for a portion of the ride.  I think he needs to wait till he drops off the client to have personal conversations.  But other than that, I have no complaints.  He was actually a good driver and would recommend him.
title: Airport transportation

review: I always have excellent service with the Uber drivers and App!  I have  used Uber service in different locations and I am always pleased with the friendly drivers, clean vehicles, accurate routes and immediate access!!
title: Efficient and Reliable

review: Our hotel that offered a shuttle online fell thru and unbeknownst to us they did not even have a shuttle at all! We used Uber and Ebony showed up within 3 minutes and got us to the airport quickly and efficiently. So much appreciated and so professional. Thank you Ebony!!
title: Stranded in Dallas

review: I was running late for class and called an Uber. The driver showed up in 4 minutes, and got me there more the train in 3.  Hopefully I’ll make it on time but at the very least the driver made it so where I’m only a little late. Awesome work Ahmed, thank you!!
title: Driver today was awesome

review: Mumtaz saved the day!!!!! Our first driver was taking my son and husband to school, got next to our house (we could see him out front) and he cancelled our entire trip!!! Luckily, Mumtaz was close and my son was only five minutes late.
title: Grateful that he was close by!!!

review:
Thank you Rashid. It was a pleasure having him take care if me!!!
Rashid was a very nice person who clearly demonstrated a desire to ensure I was completely satisfied. It was a pleasure having him take me back to my home. I was absolutely welcome him to take me to other places should the need arise. Thank you Rashid.
title: Thank you Rashid.

review: It was a wonderful ride in a brand new Tesla with a sunroof looking at the moon. Our driver is super friendly and he doesn’t need to know how to drive since the machine drives it for him. We enjoy our friendly conversation and watching the sleight on the screen.  What an awesome experience.
title: A Great Experience

review: Very pleasant experience.  Flawless experience using app. App said driver would be at my location in 10 mins and he actually arrived exactly in 10 minutes.  Driver was so pleasant to talk with.  I without a doubt use this service again.
title: First time rider

review: The tremendous bargains of the early days are gone, but the convenience and the efficiency are still there. Sadly, there are places where they are not allowed to operate or cannot operate anymore but where are you can find them they’re great.
title: Great where available

review: We tried a half dozen payment methods: multiple credit card, debit card, pay pal, off multiple devises and all were rejected. This was a huge problem with older parents trying to get a ride home from an airport. Took an hour and a half in 30 degree weather!! Finally got the  app to accept Apple Pay with the same credit card previously rejected- this has happened multiple times lately- what is going on with the app?
title: Payment problems

review: I love Uber. I find most of the drivers to be interesting to talk with because they are, at heart, entrepreneurial people who work extremely hard. Uber should market off the interesting quality of their drivers.
title: Market off the Interesting Drivers

review: Defining advancement of our generation. Need something, want to go somewhere, want someone to come to you? Cmon they make it easy to be lazy and also spontaneous. Happy to see they’ve grown and have only advanced their user ability since
title: You’re looking at it. Innovation.

review: She was an absolute delight. She helped me into her car since I’m in a wheelchair and it has to be taken apart(back off seat foley up placed in trunk) she did it for me and helped me into the car! I can’t thank her enough …. I wish I could request her every time!
title: My diver today was Michelle

review: Is my car out of service today and I was using Uber to find that the app is amazing. Drivers friendly and courteous and maps that show you exactly how far away they are on their way to pick you up. Thank you Uber for a great app.
title: Uber is Very Good

review:
Thanks Bobby for keeping me informed of the very slight delay.  You were extremely professional & informative on how I was to expedite the trip back home!  I felt very safe riding w you & the Conversation was a breath of fresh air : )  You’re warm Professionalism is a Wonderful Attribute to have!!!
Thanks Again  & Be Safe…
title: Trip to Extreme Smoke & Vape

review: Sitting at a location needing an Uber after terrifying Lyft experience and can’t even order one because can’t even change my payment to updated debit card! Found instructions on how to delete old card, and add new one but when I tried this it would not even open the option to add payment! Now no choice but to get another Lyft-also they are more expensive that’s why I prefer Uber!
title: Why???

review: I don’t know how many times I will write on here but I will keep on till I am heard. Uber stop allowing people that are out of the way come to pick up at the agreed location. I shouldn’t have to wait on someone who is 25mins away when there are people 5 or 10mins away. Fix this soon or Lyft will out shine you guys. I don’t like being late and don’t like waiting 25mins for a ride and I want to request a different ride it doesn’t give me the option and it’s not fair! Fix asap!!
title: Caution!!!

review: This was my first time scheduling an Uber for my son and I’ve never had an Uber either. I was naturally very nervous for a stranger to transport my son. It was an awesome experience and my son had a great trip. I appreciate him making my son feel comfortable at 16 years old. Thanks again.
title: Great experience

review: I ordered an Uber and at first it said 4 minutes of waiting, then changed to 9 then to 17. This is not acceptable in any way. I canceled it and called for another one but it also said 4 minutes at first then changed to 7 then to 6 back to 7 then it changed to 11. I canceled it also but when I went in my bank account it said that it charged for both ride even though I canceled them. This is so stupid and unbelievable. Never using under again.
title: scam and disrespect.
developerResponse: {'id': 33423346, 'body': "Hi, we're extremely sorry to hear about your concern regarding your recent experience. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve your recent interaction with us, fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343HNsE. We shall get back to you at the earliest", 'modified': '2022-11-29T07:24:10Z'}

review: I have no way of giving my driver a compliment but so very many ways to complain. Can’t Uber make a category to actually compliment my driver same way there’s too many options to complain. None to compliment. That’s an issue with me
title: Plz read

review: The prices have been jacked up way too high, and it takes forever for your ride to even be picked up. When it does get picked up, the driver is more than 10 minutes away. And sometimes they cancel a minute or two before they arrive, wasting your time. I pay a lot to use uber and lots of times the cars  are dirty on the inside, or the driver is unsafe, or even rude. For what I pay, this should not be the case.
title: Prices too  high and takes forever to get a ride!
developerResponse: {'id': 13575248, 'body': "Hi! We understand your concern here. The ETA times are estimates and not guaranteed. A variety of external factors like heavy traffic or road construction can impact travel time. To know more about ETA, please visit http://ubr.to/2hCbWFd . For any further queries, send in a note to t.uber.com/contact and we'll follow up.", 'modified': '2020-02-19T07:43:22Z'}

review: Uber used to be so reliable and affordable but now they will get you to leave your house for cheap and then to get home the price is 4x or more, and often Ubers aren’t available unless you pay even more for uberBlack/Luxury. The pandemic has allowed them to raise prices that never want back down, and they should be incentivizing drivers to join so that prices are reasonable. Will not use again unless I literally must, my usual $20 Uber from the airport is almost $100
title: They will strand you

review: More than 50% of my recent rides have aborted because, while promising picks ups in a short 4-5 minutes, no drivers were found after many minutes of wait.  I live in New York City, so clearly many drivers in the area.  Another sad example of a company way overextended that now cannot live up to their promise.  Too bad they had to take down with them the entire NYC taxi industry.   Hate Uber!
title: Uber has gone downhill

review: My car broke down after a Uber Eats Delivery and I wasn’t sure I needed a tow so I called an Uber home. I ended up not needing a tow. Anyways it would be cool if you offered a discount to your drivers if they found themselves in the same situation.  I did leave comment on my UE app. But more eyes the better.  Thanks
title: UE Driver

review: It takes forever to get a ride. I get it, it can be busy but to wait 10 mins to maybe get a conformation just to have to do it again. Then I have to wait about 20 minutes for the driver. By the time I do get a ride it can be 30-40 min, in that time if possible I could’ve just walked to the destination or maybe gotten a taxi instead. It always seems like there’s only 1 driver in all of Montreal. This app only works well in cities like San Francisco.
title: Get a taxi if you’re in Montreal

review: I use Uber about once or twice a year. I used it about 6 weeks ago and ever since have been getting spam alerts several times a week even though I’ve opted out of every alert in my settings under Notifications. This is irrelevant to any ride because I haven’t used the app in over a month, and it feels like a violation of notification settings. Turned off all notifications and will be avoiding app in the future.
title: Spamming with promotions

review: The app keeps sending me push notifications advertising Uber Eats, a service I have never even used. I turned off all notifications except those pertaining to rides -- in both the standard app settings and the "privacy center" settings. And about 5 minutes later got ANOTHER push notification marketing Uber Eats. This app is just a giant commercial for their other services now. I've uninstalled and will use Lyft instead.
title: Advertising push notifications

review:
I was sent with the driver by the GPS to the wrong address even though both the driver and I checked again and even tested it directly on Google maps and Waze.

The driver was nice enough to take me twice as far so I can make it to my destination.

When trying to check options to report the issue I can’t to realize the Uber now don’t have any option for their users to contact them or to report an issue unless it is one of *their common issues*.

Not sure how Uber got to such low level of customer service. But at the end of the day the company that always wins will be the one with better customer service.
I am now going 100% Lyft instead of the 50-50 I was doing up until now.

Shame on you.
title: Today was the last time I will ever use Uber

review: I wanted to cancel my membership many times and it would not let me no matter how many times I tried and I did try to contact Uber but that didn’t work (the phone number the site had listed). And then today I am able to cancel it only because it found a problem with my membership. I don’t see why it wants to work only when it wants me to fix an issue and not when I want to change my membership. It’s very upsetting.
title: Poor App

review:
Almost missed a flight the other day. Requested an Uber to the airport and the driver started out really close to my pickup spot, then did a 180 and drove a few miles away where he parked in an apartment complex for several minutes and didn't respond to my messages.

I have no idea if he was taking a Lyft passenger, trying to collect cancellation fees, or some other shenanigans. Honestly I don't care. Fortunately my husband was able to request a Lyft on his phone so I waited it out until my Uber driver cancelled the ride himself.

I have no way to leave bad feedback for the driver, and when I reported him to Uber I just got some kind of canned response.

Uber needs to figure this out! Drivers are playing blatant games with passengers and it's really frustrating.
title: Drivers playing games... I'm done!

review: Excuses, excuses. I stopped using Uber for 2 years after a terrible customer service experience. Tried to get a refund for a ride when the driver could not pay for toll and I had to pay the toll. Ended up calling my CC to get refund. Used Uber again to see if things changed. NOPE. To be Uber driver I guess you just need the app and sign up. Feedback and ratings are a joke for drivers; Uber’s policy is offering something cheap for customer service; an excuse and then a cheap apology.
title: User beware if you love life

review: I travel a lot and I have several phone numbers. I use uber eats internationally and in order for me to communicate with the drivers I need to change the phone number or they won’t be able to communicate with me. There should be a solution for this because apparently I’m blocked from changing my personal information.
title: Great app, need some changes

review: I’ve tried several times to put in an address or a name of a place, and when I press search it tells me to move the map, how am I to do that when I can’t see to move the map? I did all trouble shooting steps the Uber app is updated as of today, I’ve reached out to Uber support several times regarding this issue but they aren’t doing anything to fix this issue! I am a voice over user, I never had this issue before with Uber until now!
title: I am visually Impaired

review: Not a fan of this new update. If my Uber driver shows up early, the main page won’t show me that they're there but will show me a welcome screen telling me the time my Uber is scheduled to be there. It’s extremely frustrating not knowing where they are especially if you don’t know the area too well and aren’t able to see the map or if you’re trying to go home earlier than scheduled.
title: New update 2/25

review: Tonight I took an Uber and my driver had no plastic divider and was wearing his mask improperly down below his nose for the entire ride. I tried to report this in the app, but the app only allows you to report “no mask” not wearing the mask wrong. This really surprised me since people wearing the mask wrong is very common, like below the nose or on the chin. I’m disappointed that Uber doesn’t care about safeguarding their riders being exposed to poor driver behavior like this.
title: Needs better safety reporting

review:
DO NOT USE!!!! They will steal your money with this and Uber eats. Ordered something worth 55$, never arrived, app says it still is coming to be delivered (really? Trash app) and Uber will not refund me anything. If you love giving your money to a garbage corporation all the time with no benefit, Uber is for you!! If you would like to receive product for your money like a normal citizen of this country, I recommend DoorDash. Uber as a company is unreliable, unhelpful, and are out to screw you over. DO NOT USE!!! 

DO NOT TOUCH THIS DISGUSTING BUSINESS AT ALL!!!
title: USE IF YOU WANT MONEY TO BE STOLEN
developerResponse: {'id': 27957136, 'body': "Hi, we are sorry to hear about your experience with the order not delivered. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve to your recent interaction with us, fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343hnse . We shall get back to you at the earliest.", 'modified': '2022-02-10T05:03:42Z'}

review: The app was glitching. I was trying to get a ride from an airport and the app kept getting stuck where I couldn’t get past the payment part(even though I had already saved my credit card info). Then the price kept going up each time I tried again until it became double the initial quote. Finally I got a cab for a cheaper fare than the last quote. Since I tried a few more times and Lyft was always cheaper and actually worked!
title: Not impressed

review: My Uber driver picked me up right on time at 5am in Indianapolis to take me to airport. He was very nice, congenial and knowledgeable of quickest route to take. He was courteous, had a good sense of humor and reliable. Car was ok, could have been a little cleaner, but didn’t smell. Very nice overall first time experience.
title: Ride and driver review

review: Uber services, great! Junk spam ads from the app, RIDICULOUS!!! I keep the notifications turned on for rides but with the uptick in junk notifications for ads that Uber sends all hours of the days and nights, I’ve turned notifications off and will just use Lyft, keeping Uber only as a necessary backup. If they somehow keep notifying me spam ads, I’m deleting the app.
title: The amount of junk notifications is ridiculous!

review: I kept getting an error message after a ride when trying to add a tip. It was a longer trip so it was especially important that the driver get their tip. There is no phone number or contact email ANYWHERE on the internet. I sent a request to edit tip through the app and they refused to do it and just directed me back to the app that was giving me the error. Any company that willingly refuses to pay their employee a tip should be ashamed of theirselves. Last Uber ride for me, I’d rather walk.
title: Terrible Company

review:
I have been trying to gain access to my account for a week, I emailed and have received NO RESPONSE! 
Crazy thing is that I don’t use Uber enough to have really any reason that my app won’t load. 
Uber let’s make me add 4 stars to this review and change my mind!
title: No tech supply

review: The concept of Uber is great. It’s such a convenient way to find a ride. Don’t make the mistake of relying on Uber for an important event or appointment though. It’s definitely not a reliable way to get around. I reserved rides to a wedding and airport in advance. I received a confirmation email for both reservations. For neither did a driver show up! I almost missed my flight. It was very stressful.
title: Don’t rely on Uber

review: The app was easy to use. The driver was excellent. The taxi came quicker than a regular taxi could but cost a little more. I was disappointed that the cost was more since I had heard that using Uber was less expensive. But it was nice to know when the taxi would arrive. No complaints about the ride.
title: Good information and quick response

review: It's unbelievable that a during what they wanna call is a busy time they wanna up charge the service to nearly triple the cost of the ride for you to still have to wait nearly 20 minutes for someone's  even come and get you not to mention the drivers will cancel on you if ur ride isn't going to make them enough money this app has gotten worse and worse and I'm extremely pisses and will never use Uber again
title: Horrible and unreliable

review:
Uber does not care about your safety!!! At all!!! If your driver refuses to take you to your destination, then Uber will not help you in the slightest way. Uber only cares about your money. Nothing else!

This exact thing happened to me. I marked a bus stop as my destination, when I was last month in  Doha, Qatar. The driver refused to take me there. He said that he will take me “somewhere else”. He did not say where and I clearly did not want to take a chance. I got out of the car in the middle of the road at a traffic light. 

I then canceled the ride, gave a 1 star rating and filed a complaint. Uber responded by saying that I put in an invalid destination. What’s “invalid” with a bus stop, where I had been dropped about 20 times by other drivers over the course of my stay in Qatar?

Uber is not interested in the safety of their customers!
title: Safety? FAIL!

review:
This is a terrible app. I can’t get a phone number to talk to them first. Secondly, having to navigate thru the help section is a waste of time.  They give you instructions how to do things and it is totally different in the app. Finally, no clue why but cannot see the family profile in the app, which they state I have to go to the app to edit anything.  

Finally, find the family profile on a laptop but can’t even access it. 

Uber you are a waste and frankly you need new ownership because you are garbage.
title: Terrible.

review: We had our car break down a long way away from home and we were  struggling to get a tow home. Daviti came through and got us home. This was our first Uber ride. We highly recommend Daviti. We will use Uber again.
title: Stranded but rescued by Daviti

review: This app is great yes, but there are also one downfall. There are a lot of people who are 18 or older who can’t drive. People who can’t afford to go for a license, and so much more. I have a permit at 18 due to personal reasons. I am 18 but I can’t ride all because I don’t have a license. I feel like there should be a more helpful option for people who can’t gain a license but is the appropriate age.
title: Age Verification

review: Most importantly driver was extremely helpful and courteous also engaged in pleasant respectful conversation which made the long drive enjoyable. I highly recommend him and would definitely use this driver again for my future Uber rides.
title: Uber driver review

review: I was stressed because I needed to get my car to the repair shop and from there to a hair appt and by the time I was able to schedule my ride, Jason arrived 3 minutes later and got me where I needed to be promptly in a nice clean car with a smooth ride.
title: Saved the day!

review: Drivers are always nice and efficient. Once on a trip to the airport my driver had a tire problem. She immediately cancelled my ride which allowed me to request another. In five minutes I was back in my way and arrived in plenty of time
title: Great experience

review: I pre ordered my trips going to the pHL airport was great getting home from PHL WAS  very disappointing & scary.  2 Ubers cancelled on the spot when my delayed flight arrived I luckily was abbe to re order an Uber  but it took  about 1 hr   .  Then Jared took my  request (an Angel  for me) & took me to my hour long ride). He was kind & courteous and I arrived home safely!!  How can Uber cancel  a pre paid pre-arranged drive & at 10 pm ?? By myself at PHL airport  1 hr away from home.
title: Disappointed experience

review: We’re on vacation and this is my first experience using Uber.  I think it’s great and the drivers have all been very courteous and friendly.  The app is easy to use, even for this old man, and its fun, too.  Should have discovered this long ago!
title: Amazing!

review: My driver was actually a little bit early. It’s very helpful. I had some large packages and he picked them up and put them in the trunk and help me when I got to my destinations. He’s very kind and very professional. Next time I need an Uber ride I’m going to request Moises.
title: Driver Moises

review: For some reason the app sends cars to the street behind my house.  I guess I am supposed to knock down my fence and walk through my neighbor’s yard.  I have tried to report this multiple time and there is no way to reach customer service.  Uber is the only mapping technology that gets the address wrong. All others also have an option to fix the address. Get your act together Uber.  I am about yo stop using the app permanently.
title: GPS mapping is poor/customer service worst

review: Alejandro was quick to arrive, loaded our luggage and was a very safe driver. I have always used Uber when traveling out of state and everyone of them have been professional, dependable and quick to respond. Thanks y’all
title: Dependable

review:
Our driver was on time, actually a little early.  We received texts from him thru Uber as to how far he was from our pick up location, his name, photo, make and model of car and license plate.
Second time using Uber and it was seamless!!!  Nice drivers.
title: On time

review:
Sometimes when I order it gives the driver wrong location 
Which is very bad 
I have to call the driver and direct him to my  current location 
But the app should do all of this
title: Fix the location

review:
Uber can’t seem to estimate time to arrival in London. While visiting for a wedding several people had trips 20min over the estimated time duration. We missed our train even though their ETA suggested plenty of time. 
Separately, for trips >45min I had 4-5 drivers cancel outright so don’t count on getting anywhere far outside of central London.
title: Unreliable in London

review: Today had to walk 3 minutes carrying my cat rushing to not miss the car because Uber again refused to believe my attempt to set the pin to my actual pickup location and sent the car to the wrong (very crowded) block, just so we could sit in a traffic jam for 7 minutes… there was no traffic at the correct block. Things like this happen often.
title: Pickup often at wrong place

review: Such a kind personable man. I was dealing with the loss of a family member and he was so sweet and really caring and I was so lucky to have him as a driver at such a vulnerable time for me and i thank him for his time and service and getting me back to my family safe when they needed me.
title: Thank you

review: This was my first time using Uber, my car broke down and I was stressing bad because I didn’t want to miss work and my daughter was like dad just Uber, I did, I’m here on time, thank you to Uber and my driver for getting a father to work so I can feed my family
title: Grateful

review: There’s no way to contact a person in customer service regarding rides. I am always connected to Uber Eats!! I didn’t order food! I have a voucher on file and when I schedule a ride, it charges my credit card instead of the voucher. Why they can’t fix this inconvenience/problem is ridiculous. At least if I was able to speak to someone it ‘might’ be resolved.
title: Customer service mess

review: It’s been a while since we could count on getting a pickup for short runs in and from CAPITOLA for some time now.  I heard they were back, and today was the test.  Shawn was a 5+-star driver, and came within 15 minutes.  PERFECT for a Saturday lunch at Hideout!!  We’re happy happy!
title: UBER IS BACK!

review: The app is usually very good but there’s been probably 5 times now where I’ll see a local car nearby and get assigned to a car that’s 20+ minutes farther than the original option. i’m not sure if this is because the uber drivers are declining it themselves but it’d be really cool to see faster pick up time especially when it’s so clear that there are nearby drivers.
title: Slow to show up

review: After an amazing golf vacation, used Uber to pick my family of 3 up from BART. Scott showed up in his brand new Hyundai Ioniq, saw that the golf clubs wouldn’t fit in his trunk, said, “Sorry guys, this is a new car and those aren’t going in the back seat”, and drove off. Leaving us and our clubs and luggage in the street.  Interestingly, there is no record of his cancellation in my Trips. He was so unnecessarily arrogant and rude. Turned out his cancellation summoned another Uber that I promptly canceled.  Wasn’t feeling Uber in that moment.
title: Speechless

review: I haven’t used Uber since I bought my car in 2020 and I’m getting charged everything month for “Uber One Technologies” idk what it is or why I’m being charged. I had to redownload uber recently to try to dispute it but it hasn’t worked. There are no cards linked only my PayPal was years ago and it hasn’t been reset so I’m not sure how I’m being charged.
title: No refund.

review:
First time user, For first time user is there any discount for next up coming rides? 
Why I ask because I see on line for first time user coupons this whole Uber ride it's worked for me and I will be using the service again
title: So far So Good

review: We were stuck at the airport without a ride home. Donald was there in just about 5 minutes. Loaded the car with our luggage and we were on our way. Donald was friendly, professional and  helpful.
title: A great ride

review:
The App gave a 35-50 minute window for food to be delivered. When I completed the order an ENTIRELY DIFFERENT amount of time was shown. 

I IMMEDIATELY tried to cancel the order and was informed that I would still have to pay for the entire order because it was already “being prepared”. However, that was clearly wrong because Uber was still telling me the same thing 90 minutes later (through the “help” feature.)

An absolutely shameful experience from beginning to end. 

Message to Uber - require your vendors to give the customer a five minute window of time to cancel an order after placing it. Vendors are clearly marking orders as “being prepared” when they haven’t actually been started in order to avoid cancellations.
title: Food order times change

review: I just requested an Uber to go from Nobu Chicago to The Newport Theater and the App was telling the driver to go to a different location several blocks away from the destination. We tried changing the address to the corner of Clark and Newport and the App kept sending the driver to a different address more than 15 minutes away walking from the location.
title: Terrible App

review: My driver, Dan showed up early and was waiting. There’s nothing worse than looking outside for your ride when you have a flight and they’re not there. He was friendly and personable, and just said it to the enjoyment.
title: On time & dependable

review: But driver waited about 20 minutes to pick us up.  Perhaps it was user error, but I could not find a way for us to communicate with her.  Also, could not find the description of her car or her name on my Uber app.
title: Flight delayed

review: Thank you for going above and beyond to ensure we had a safe ride home after a packed concert downtown. We had no idea streets would be blocked off and Ubers would have trouble accessing riders. We truly appreciate you calling to navigate us thru it. Many thanks to Jordan!
title: Grateful for Jordan
userName: Best game in hole wide world!

review: App very convenient easy to use and very strategic forward, and Roberto my driver was extremely very friendly, and right on time, I got to the spot and he pulled up right as I got there right as he was scheduled, very nice to talk to and very safe drive and very vigilant when driving.
title: Uber, review

review: Many of the worst experiences I’ve ever had using iPhone apps have happened on Uber. A driver can take your ride and then sit in a parking lot for half and hour and there is nothing you can do about it. If you want to cancel they tell you, you will be charged a fee. A driver can literally take your trip hostage by driving fifteen minutes in the wrong direction and not canceling and it’s your bad luck if you get one of these drivers.
title: An awful app use Lyft if it’s not more expensive

review:
I needed a pet friendly Uber vehicle. I
Got the friendliest driver ever. I could not figure out how to make trip  a round-trip. My driver did it for me. It was a short drive but he was a great driver. I think his name is Brandon. When I need a ride back to pick Rosie up I hope he is available.
title: Happy Uber customer.

review: We had a wonderful day at the Wharf area. Enjoyed a dinner cruise. Requested an Uber and it arrived 3 minutes later. Driver was very cordial and informative. He was a great end to a wonderful evening. First time using your app. It was super easy to understand and do. Will definitely utilize Uber again in the future.
title: Lahaina visit

review:
This driver arrives late and when I jumped in the car he asked me who I was and responded if he wasn’t the Uber driver and se said very angry NO.  Then I get out the car very confused. 
After a few minutes he backed up and confirmed he was indeed the Uber driver. 
Very awkward situation. For all the rest he was IK.
title: Driver was confused

review: I would just like to say that my driver, Hamza is amazing! He went above and beyond for me, drove me from the airport to my home safely. Help jumpstart my car for it has been sitting for a while. Just a really, really great guy and I am very very appreciative for all that he has done for me. Thank you Hamza, Robert.
title: Hamza

review: It was so easy takeing Uber at 3:30 in the morning to get to the airport it was cost efficient and I thought I was going to terminal four but actually she pointed out that my airline which terminal three so I got to the right terminal because of Uber.    We are on our way
title: Easy

review: Greatest driver I’ve ever had. The driver was amazing and made you feel secure. Imagine having someone trustworthy like a parent driving you home. Great person all around. Any ride rated less then 5 stars must be a mistake. Stepped out of the car a better person.
title: Greatest driver ever

review:
Amazing! Very friendly and got us home safely! 

She was very kind and understanding!! 
Our first parents night out in a very long time and did not one make us feel bad. Wish we could have an Uber like her every time we need one. Thank you so much!!!
title: Amazing!

review:
This was my first Uber trip ever. And what a delight to get Andres, who was very  courteous, professional, yet  also made me feel very comfortable riding in his vehicle!!

I will enjoy taking Uber from now on and hopefully maybe I’ll get him again someday. He gets 10 stars from me  not five!!
title: Andres was stellar!

review: I had the best experience with this driver. He made it his goal to get us to our destination while still having to go through the hurtles of traffic. Very respectful and kind, I highly recommend! 5 stars across the board.
title: Outstanding

review: I can always depend on a ride. Sometimes, I  might have to wait  It’s worth it, when  no one can take me. Most of the drivers are friendly. They will ask me how’s my day going. Sometimes, I may get the same driver. The prices are not too. ~Cecilia~
title: Appreciate, Rider!

review: Scheduling and Uber is hassle free. All of my drivers have been professional and kind. Always picked up on time as well as always getting to my destination on time. Just sit back and enjoy the ride
title: Getting where you need to be worry free.

review:
This is a frequent event 
The first driver is very close 
But never arrives
No messages, excuses or explanations 
Just no show 
Until a second driver suddenly appears from the cloud 
And normally arrives after 5 to 15 min 
Also no explanations, because apparently they don’t know what happened to the first driver 

I opted out LYFT, because the first driver never showed up and also refused to give up on the trip 
Because the knew that the client will  call it off and will be charged with not waiting for the driver 

Hope this will not be the future of Uber 

I appreciate a feedback of this message 
Thanks 
Thomas
title: First Driver Syndrome

review: My driver showed up at my house a few minutes early for my 4:15 a.m. airport run. He helped me load my luggage, his car was clean, the cabin temp was perfect, and he made polite and interesting conversation on the drive. I arrived at the airport with plenty of time to spare. Perfect trip all around.
title: Perfect trip

review: Driver Maria is an outstanding defensive, extremely alert, and composed safe driver which I absolutely appreciated especially when an idiot made an illegal left hand turn into oncoming traffic that could have caused an accident for us, if Maria hadn’t swerved to avoid collision. Thanks Maria for saving me from harm and injury!
title: Driver Maria is the BEST!

review: It works well depending on three things 1.) what time you use the app. 2.) how much you’re willing to spend. 3.)How far you need to travel. I recommend that if you need to get somewhere by a certain time call your Uber a hour ahead and just get there early because more likely than not you’ll end up being late or almost late
title: It’s okay

review: I live in Seattle and got a call from a very afraid granddaughter in Spokane who missed the bus and was walking at night in a remote area. A car had passed her more than once and I called her an Uber. Nathan found her and was texting me to find her and safely got her home. Thank you!
title: Urgent Pickup

review: We had the nicest man pick us up with plenty of time to spare. He had the perfect vehicle. He was friendly and courteous and helped us load our luggage from our house to the airport. I would definitely recommend him to anyone wanting a great experience!
title: Best driver ever!

review:
Hello, I had prearranged a pick up a day before my flight.  Someone accepted the ride and were supposed to show up at 12:15 in Park City to pick me up.  Never happened.  This has been the 2nd time this has happened to me.  Fortunately I have a car and drove down to SLC and had another driver pick me up and get me to the airport.  He was kind, on time and very professional.  
Uber need to have a better system in place to let customers know that the driver canceled the ride.
title: Never showed up

review: I would highly recommend Berlinda.  I have not taken an Uber trip In years and she made it easy and enjoyable since she was so kind.  She was there and I did not have to wait.  It was snowing all morning and she was the safest driver and made me feel at ease!  Thank you Berlinda!
title: Berlinda

review: Only  problem I had was not able to change time of pick up though it says clearly on your help choose cancel or change time but could not find any where to change time for pick up.
title: to change time for pick up.

review: This was my first Uber ride and I enjoyed it very much! Edward was very professional and friendly in a respectful way. I felt safe and made me want to Uber a lot more. Thank u Edward for the trust you’ve earned from me as a customer. Off to many more.
title: Excellent, smooth and friendly ride

review: This was my first Uber ride and Laura was very friendly. She is also a safe driver which is a factor that I considered when choosing to use Uber. I highly recommend Laura and will use her again for our return trip to the airport.
title: Laura made my first Uber ride a great experience!

review: So many times I’ve tried to order an Uber without being able to find one. What’s the point of this app if you can’t find a ride when you need one. Multiple times I’ve been left outside freezing now, because no one wants to work and pick me up. You can see, I have 5 stars as a customer, because I’m a good tipper and treat them well. But what’s the point if I can’t get a ride half the time. I’ll switch to a different company from now on.
title: So tired of no rides

review: First driver never showed up in after 10 minutes to drop me and I was handed off to another driver, which made me later than I wanted to be. I tried to take Uber, but today a cab would have been much faster.
title: First driver never showed up, after 10 minutes that driver dropped me

review:
Freddie in the Red Tesla was an outstanding driver. He arrived on time, asked me my musical preferences, responded to questions with poise and professionalism, and inspired me to be mindful, useful, kind, caring and use my skill sets to their fullest and to
encourage others to do the same. He will continue to do great things!! It was a joyful ride!
title: Morning inspiration

review: My husband and I took a ride from our home to LAX, in the middle of the ride I discovered that I left a backpack behind at home. Driver instructed me to make a change on the Uber app so that she could turn back and drive us back home. Driver was very patient and we arrived at LAX in good time.
title: Top Driver

review: Robert provided a wonderful experience. We were frustrated after waiting an hour for our Big Bus Miami ride. We gave up and checked Uber's fees. Robert picked us up shortly after and we had a nice conversation about Miami on the drive to our hotel. Thanks Robert and keep up the good work.
title: Great!

review: My first ride was awesome! There’s value in being able to “work” while riding! The gentleman was very kind and accommodating. He let me ride in the back seat so I could work on my laptop. Very skilled driver, good energy, great ride! I hope I get the same driver again next time!
title: Charlotte to Winston-Salem , NC

review: My experience with Tammi was beyond exceptional! Her car was immaculately clean!  Not only was she a safe and careful driver but her personality was amazing and friendly! The trip was made more enjoyable because she was there! Whenever I or anyone I know is in Atlanta, I will make sure to request to her!
title: My driver

review: I was nervous as I have not used Uber since before the pandemic. I was coming in with my granddaughter to an airport and secured an Uber driver immediately. He was there in the time promised, and immediately took our luggage to the back of his vehicle. He was very courteous, and a very safe driver. Thank you.
title: Great Experience

review: I exclusively use Uber to get around everywhere. It’s easy. It’s painless. The app has 1 flaw that drives me nuts….I am constantly being asked via notification “you need a ride?” I would like to see an option to turn that particular notification off, while still keeping relevant notifications like my ride status, etc…
title: Stop asking me if I need a ride
developerResponse: {'id': 34037945, 'body': "Hi, We're extremely sorry to hear about your concern regarding your recent experience. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve your concern, fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343HNsE. We shall get back to you at the earliest.", 'modified': '2023-01-02T06:57:52Z'}

review: My account is disabled but no email has been sent on why. I have contacted support via the chatbot, which is a chore in itself, and they offered no solution. Just stated my account is being handled by the safety department…. Well, the fact that I’ve been locked out for over 72 hours, stranded and unable to log into find a ride home, is more of a safety concern then whatever could possibly be Uber’s reasoning for locking my account. So I had to download Lyft to finally get home.
title: Beware of Uber lockouts

review:
Traffic in NYC is awful to say the least and this trip was no different but with one exception, our driver!

This man made the trip comfortable and fun. It was that long he offered us snacks. I’ve been on commuter flights that don’t offer me snacks!

A one of a kind experience!
title: Amazing Trip!

review:
Attempted to schedule a ride from Nashville airport, but when it required a flight number, it did not recognize my correct flight number.  No way to proceed

Forced to used Lyft, who did not have the problem because I was allowed to only select a time
title: If you force us to report a flight number, make sure you have the complete list

review: I went searching for two hours to review a solution only find me texting a robot. I tried finding a number I can call but I did not find no phone number I could call. I was charged for a Uber ride I did not take. I even showed screenshots of the dates and times of the unauthorized charges. I showed them my last ride also. No solution was find very disappointed and unprofessional. I still have not gotten my money back. Very unfortunate.
title: Unauthorized charges

review: This user interface is not customer friendly at all when needing to contact customer support for any concerns/issues. It is almost next to impossible to find where to find the chat support and extremely frustrating. Also, when trying to cancel the Uber one membership, it’s frustrating because you click on manage membership and no option is provided to cancel it.
title: If I could give the App a Zero I would…

review:
Very satisfied with this trip
Mr. Curtis was a gentleman I had a surgery, and I told him that I need him to be careful on the bumps and he took care of it. He made sure the ride was smooth. He made sure he waited for me to bring me back home.I think he is not just gold but platinum
title: Very respectful and professional

review: Hekmat was so helpful in our ride this morning for we were not familiar with the place we went . She was so patient and did not leave until we met the person we are meeting.  I will be so happy if she will be the driver on my Uber trip next time.
title: Hekmat

review:
At rest an National yesterday the Iner app arranged a driver about five minutes away. The app showed the driver is what appears to be the cell phone lot.  
Driver didn’t move for ten minutes. No response to text messages and call went to voicemail. 
My understanding is that if a rider cancels a trip it won’t go against the driver. For whatever reason I got ghosted   Frustrating.
title: Pick up delay
developerResponse: {'id': 33600529, 'body': "Hi, We're extremely sorry to hear about your concern regarding your recent experience. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve your concern, fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343HNsE. We shall get back to you at the earliest.", 'modified': '2022-12-08T03:40:21Z'}

review: It a good app to gets ride the only bad things is sometimes when you ready to leave it takes forever to find ride sometimes and it he prices can go high but it a good app still for you to travel when you don’t have someone to drop you off.
title: Uber

review: I like Uber except for the price gouging. I’ve noticed that sometimes when I try to reserve a ride at a certain price, it will act as if it’s loading in hopes that I refresh so that it can gouge the price. I usually just cancel and go to Lyft when this happens. Just stop it already. It’s so obvious what you’re doing.
title: Ok sans the price gouging

review: I was particularly disappointed with my last ride. Albeit a very pleasant driver, my driver’s car was dirty on the outside & particularly smelly & unclean on the inside. The seat was dirty and had dog hair on it. The floor had a lot of dry grass & debris on both sides. I almost felt embarrassed for our country because of the 1st impression a tourist would get of the U.S. I had just flown back from a 40-day overseas trip and rode in very clean cars each time. I caught this particular ride at the L.A. international Airport.
title: Unclean cars

review:
Every single time I have tried to use Uber, I get irate. Whether it’s never accepting any forms of payment, resetting your bookings until the price goes up, impossibility of contacting any customer support services, or even giving a crap that they just stranded you out in the middle of nowhere, you, too, will discover how this company is absolute garbage and fleecing people. 

The drivers have always been great but they get screwed by the company too
title: Proof that everyday people get screwed. Worthless company

review:
Ive been using uber for years. At some point they merged uber eats into this app too its been very convenient. 

There are a ton of UI/UX issues that makes this application so hard to use, specifically related to uber eats. 

There are no loading indicators. 

If you select a product & navigate back it sits on a blank page. If you try to navigate back again after a few seconds it'll send you to the wrong page. Or say something went wrong. Or it will clear your search & return to home.  

When you select an item it does not update your cart until you navigate to a different page so its not possible to confirm if its selected. 

When trying to add delivery instructions the incorrect modal is being displayed
title: A lot of UX issues try another delivery app

review: Been using Uber for years since it was introduced to our market in 2015.  As many rides as I’ve done with Uber it’s not free of issues but overall I am satisfied to use the app and invite others to do use it as well.
title: Good use of technology

review: Stopped using the app and switched to a competitor three years ago because a driver never came to pick me up. Last night, gave the app another chance. The driver arrived, saw us walking to the car, let a different party into the car, cancelled our ride, and took off leaving us stranded at 11:00 at night. Never had anything close to similar experiences with competitors. Uber is one step above hitch-hiking in terms of reliability. Deleting the app again.
title: Multiple Terrible Experiences

review:
I called for a ride.  I was at the pick up  point standing outside.  The App said driver was 3 minutes away.  After 10 minutes longer, I called driver twice and texted once when App showed 0 minutes.
Driver arrived after I gave him landmark directions,
He pulled up 10-15 minutes after watched the car stationary at 3 minutes away.
When he arrived I got into the car when he pulled up.
His tardy explanation was the GPS sent him to wrong address.
The wait was on my side, NOT the driver’s!!!

Charge is inappropriate and an inflated charge.  If the driver is the person Addis the wait charge, there may be an issue with this driver’s actions!
title: Over charged for Wait time

review: Don’t know if the app is intentionally doing this or what, but your actual travel time will *always* be _significantly_ later than whatever the app estimates before you book the ride. Today for what should have been a 25 min trip my actual arrival time was almost 15 min after the original estimate, thanks to being matched to a far-away driver (who also took longer to arrive than estimated) and a non-traffic-avoiding route.
title: Always underestimates the travel time

review: Consistently I get my ride cancelled multiple times a night. I’m a bar tender and try to take taxis to work and unfortunately Uber is sometimes a necessary evil. I get cancelled so many times post shift and there have been nights where my 2 hour walk home would have almost been faster. If a driver commits to my ride then cancels I should get a credit to my account just as if I cancelled a ride. I miss the old yellow cabs. Uber and Lyft need to do better
title: Drivers should get charged if they cancel

review: Reaching customer care after misplacing items is a hodge problem! Today I accidentally left my phone in a drivers car. I couldn’t gain access to my account for help. I was stuck at work, with no access to a computer to log into my email for any information! There should be a system set in place for situation like this! Luckily the driver realized that my phone was there and brought it back to me!
title: ZERO CARE FOR CUSTOMERS

review: I take Uber rides to and from work daily and never paid more than $10 per ride because it is only a 5 minute drive to work from my house but I just tried to schedule a ride for work today and it was going to charge me $38, that’s highway rubbery!!! I think I’m going to walk to work today thankfully it’s nice weather today, please fix this!! The ride rates should not be so high for such a short drive
title: Unfair prices

review:
I have taken 30+ rides on Uber. I’m convinced that the algorithms prioritize having drivers always busy and not on time for customers. Once I had two assigned drivers cancel, one after 15 minutes of being assigned to me.

Today we booked a ride to the airport the day before and yet they were still 21 minutes late. And there was a $36 cancel fee for a LATE driver. A taxi would have been 10 minutes early and let you cancel if they are late.
title: Drivers always late

review: Every time I take Uber it feels as if they have their drivers take the longest way possible. I always map the directions to make sure they go the right way. Last Uber I took, I got in and it said arrival time was 40 mins. Over an hour later and they took the wrong way several times, but the Uber app told them to go that way.
title: Wrong turns

review:
As a new user of Uber I was looking forward to everyone’s great  reviews of their services.  Not only were we highly disappointed in Uber but actually left stranded by them and had no recourse due to the fact that they have no one to call to report problems.  
Then being solicited by their teams for Money for Afghan refugees was enough to say BYE BYE TO UBER
They should help move them  to  their new homes for FREE and drive them anywhere for a year FOR FREE.   Of course they won’t 
DONT BOTHER WITH THEM. THEY HATE AMERICA .
title: Not at all reliable

review: I scheduled a ride to LAX airport from my home in San Diego and everything was confirmed and all set for an 8am pickup. Around 7:55 I got a notification saying be ready, the driver is arriving soon. A few minutes later, another notification saying sorry, the driver canceled the trip, and sorry, we can’t find another driver but good luck getting to the airport! Completely unacceptable to have such a low level of reliability. This service is a joke compared to a regular taxi company!
title: Don’t use for airport rides!

review:
In Los Angeles, it’s a complete mess. Getting out of the airport is ridiculous when using the app as it continues to go through drivers for a long time, each of whom have a preference for rides and decide to reject yours if it doesn’t fit their itinerary. 

Elsewhere trying to catch a ride, I see cancellations are frequent. Today I was trying to get to an Airport and 45 minutes later wasn’t even able to get a car because each were canceling on me. This isn’t the first time this happened either. Cancellation are rampant, and 20 minutes into the wait, really make it for an unreliable service.

There should be ramifications for canceled rides for no good reason. 

My user rating is 4.9 stars FYI.
title: Used to be good, not anymore!

review: We booked an Uber to the airport and got half way there and our flight was cancelled. Our driver was patient, he pulled over and waited until we booked another flight. He then took us back. Thank you for your kindness. Will use again.
title: Very understanding driver

review: I live in Pittsburg, CA, since I use to have a car because someone rear ended me & im awaiting to purchase another one, I take Uber as an alternative to get myself to work since my job is 12 mins away driving (Oakley, CA). I use to pay $15-18 going to work & sometimes coming back now they’re talm bout I have to pay $40!!!! Uber is buggin out!
title: When does it cost so much for a short distance ride!!??

review: My experience with Uber has been fine so far until today. I tried getting a ride from the airport today. What would normally cost $25 to $30 was going to cost me $50!!! The explanation in the app was that since it was busy, prices were much higher than usual. No thanks, I don’t appreciate price gouging. We used Lyft instead and got a ride for $24.
title: Price Gouging

review: They cancelled trip after trip on me. I tried setting up a trip an hour an advance. When I arrived at my destination waiting for my Uber driver, they cancelled again. They no longer have a customer service phone number so you have to navigate through a poorly developed app that doesn’t even list all the issues you may have and no option to call or text with anyone. Use literally anyone else
title: They’re terrible. Call literally anyone else

review: He picked my mother up in his van loaded her wheelchair and brought her to hit her granddaughters party. When he got there he helped her out of the van and into her wheelchair and push the wheelchair up to the sidewalk since I was going to push her to the party. He was very very nice sincere and helpful thank you so much
title: Uber Driver

review: I am unable to access my account due to the inability to change items on the account. I made a mistake by allowing a person in my life to use and abuse my account and changed many items not making it able for me to access my account and I can’t call anyone to help because Uber does not have a number for me to be able to call. I refuse to now use this app until this issue is fixed.
title: Needs a customer service Phone Number

review: You guys have ZERO business charging my care twice my bank had to put a block on you guys after the first charge then decline the ride cuz ya wanna charge me again and make me wait 5-9 days for my money no people have that money for other businesses not for uber to put you in a deeper hole than you are already in! And to top it off i was never refunded for that ride ya charged me you making me wait the 5 days!
title: Always happens

review: I use to love Uber it helped me a lot but now I can barely ever get a ride when I need it most. That’s not ok. Uber drivers have told me a lot have quit because they’re not making as much money anymore. Please do something. I’m not able to drive and Uber was so helpful to me now it’s rare if I can ever get a ride
title: Why

review: I had a surgery recently and so I couldn’t drive with the medication I am currently on. So I set up a scheduled pick up to go to work. 5 minutes after my scheduled pick up the drive canceled on me and so I immediately set another ride. I got a drive pretty fast and it looked like they were turning around to come my way but within a min they canceled too. I may have lost my job now because I tried to rely on Uber so thanks Uber you employ the laziest people on earth don’t give this company your money!!!!!!!!!
title: Terrible service

review: I’m so happy with Uber. I had no clue what I was doing on the app. However a schedule my ride. Picked me up at the Atlanta airport to Midtown. My drive was so patient and got me to my destination safe. When getting an Uber at the airport slow down be patient and read all signs you will be ok.
title: Newbie to Ubur

review:
Terrible company. Tried to charge almost $100 when reserving a ride before arriving at airport with a black car service I didn’t need.  When I arrived at my destination airportI had multiple cheaper choices offered on the app. While authorizing the ride it changed the price on me raising it. $5.00. 
Then seeming double billed me. I will haul a taxi whenever possible in the future.  There is no support for problems.  It’s a hot stinking mess designed to rip off consumers.
title: Changes rate while authorizing

review: I've been using the Uber app for a while now, but lately, it's been quite frustrating. It's become really hard to get in touch with their customer support, and when you finally do, reaching a human support agent feels like searching for a needle in a haystack. I miss the days when getting assistance was more straightforward.
title: Not east to reach customer support

review: Driver was right on time, actually a few minutes early which was great. Good driver and spoke English much better than we speak Spanish. Our first time to use Uber in Mexico and everything was fine.
title: Ride from one resort to another.

review: This was my first time using Uber, as a 64-year-old grandmother. Digbo picked me up at the airport to take me to my daughter’s house. He was right where he said he would be, his car was clean, and he drove carefully.  He made a scary experience comfortable and safe. Yes, I’ll use Uber again!
title: A Safe Ride

review: I booked a ride that was just a couple of miles away!! But then that driver went 25 miles in the opposite direction and was at that same location for almost an hour before I finally cancelled and booked a different driver!! I don’t appreciate waiting almost 2 hours for someone who apparently wasn’t going to show!!!
title: Waiting for a Uber driver

review: Melissa was 5 star but I will be switching to Lyft unless Uber gets rid of the thugs hanging around as soon as you walk out and in the pick up areas soliciting rides without using the app, it’s offensive, unfair to the app drivers and very intimidating and dangerous. Uber needs to end it NOW!!!
title: Melissa was 5 star!!!

review: Loaded the trip while waiting for our bags, confirmed the trip on the way to the pickup spot. It just sat there with the loading bars looking for a driver for 15 minutes. Ridiculous.
