Walked across the street, got in a taxi immediately and only paid a few dollars more than under quoted. Sorry Uber, you lost my business yet again. So tired of these crappy apps that don’t even work and end up wasting my time.
title: Doesn’t work. I just ended up getting a taxi.

review: I had a terrible experience with this company. I used to be a driver until 5 minutes ago where I just quit. I was in a hospital going through the worst time of my life, I ordered a 60 dollar charger, the driver stole it, and they refused to refund it. Don’t get me started on driving, they only match your gas, your money is based on tips, you are basically working for free. Don’t give in to this greedy company. They are not for their customers or drivers; only for your pockets.
title: No integrity

review: I use Uber as my day to day commute to work and other thi n a… lately I’ve seen the price on my regular trips go up 2/3 dollars for the past few weeks. It’s hard paying 15 as it is but $20 to not even get to half way of the city is absurd… I wish Uber thought more about the poor community than the rich.
title: I would give it 5 stars but the pricing

review: We chose the Premier option and Vincent was our driver. Great personality!  He was knowledgeable about the city and the places we wanted to see! Helped with our luggage and brought us right to the front door of our resort!  He was the epitome of what you want your Uber driver to be!
title: Vincent was amazing

review: I have no idea why Uber changes the rate as quickly as they do. Very frustrating when I am leaving for an airport check rates and 5 min later the rate has gone up not just a few dollars but in some cases $20-$40 for the same pick up drop off and only 5-10 minutes later.
title: Prices change very quickly

review: Can you PLEASE add a way to tell your driver you have a pet with you and how many passengers there are? It wastes everyone’s time without these options. I need to know Uber will be reliable and not decline the ride after waiting for them to assign a driver. Let the drivers know I’m advance so everyone can make better decisions and not run into any issues.
title: Need Options

review:
From the app to the driver, Thomas, everything was simple, safe, on time and pleasant. This was our first time using Uber and we’re almost 70. So we tend to be slower with technology and trying new things. 

Thank you Thomas for being so pleasant and efficient.
title: Hassle Free

review: My Uber driver who just picked me up at Henry Mayo ER is very honest man. I got back to my hotel not knowing that I did not have my iPhone. Within 10 minutes he came back at the hotel and return my phone. That tells me there we still have good honest people. Thank you James.
title: James

review: We got back from vacation very late and really tired. Ivan was a gentleman and picked us me and my girlfriend at the airport. Open the doors for us and put our bags in the trunk. On the way home we had a great conversation. Very polite and educated driver. It’s a pleasure getting a ride from someone like Ivan!
title: Excellent ride

review: We have had more then 10 rides through UBER while visiting Vegas and we must say that Michele was the best driver of all . Sociable, funny, clean vehicle, with snacks, and gracious enough to be hospitable with her snacks , breath mints and water for intoxicated people . As for me I do not drink but my party does meaning I’m sober and writing this review

I don’t use Uber very often at all, but needed to when traveling to see my son my experience with my driver Nicolas was absolutely amazing and so stress-free very relaxing. He made good conversation. It was a very safe driver and the Uber app was super easy to use. Thank you.
title: Ride from Olympia Amtrak station

review: I avoid Uber as much as possible because of Uber price gauging. I checked the price of a pretty long trip (from an airport), and when I came back 30 min later to book, the fare was $15 dollars higher (nearly $100). I couldn’t afford much tip, so Uber’s computerized “market driven” “computerized” price gouging hurts the driver. I was booking the trip long distance for my teenager. In DC Uber has gotten so expensive it’s now cheaper to use an old fashioned cab from the airport. I use regular taxis now instead of Uber!
title: Price gauging

review:
Good evening, what a hot Me. Ali is as I have my cart on wheel, 2 bags on top and a backpack crossing Peoria and 6th Ave to catch #6 bus 

And I’m handicapped w/my Access-a-ride card and the wheel comes off the cart. OMG and my two sons: one doesn’t answer his phone and ones at work what to do

Uber and mr. Ali saves my life, frozen foods and blessed is he. He helps me load bags and my broken cart in his trunk, so wonderful, not one complaint as traffic was held a few minutes.

It’s wonderful, safe, caring drivers like this that make world good place. Thank you Jesus for this man. Lord have mercy

Kay Hayden-Summerton (Katie)
title: Blessing

review:
Excellent response by Uber. The rider immediately got in touch with me and reached quicker than expected to pick a parcel from me to deliver. The second phase was also as efficient as the first. The recipient was obliged for the quick delivery as was informed. 
Thank you Uber for being so caring.
title: Response review

review: My car is in the shop so I’ve been using Uber and it’s super disappointing when you’re trying to get to work and the app showed the Uber is 5 minutes away but when you book it, it charges my card the fee, then updates and shows 15 minutes away. Wth?! Doesn’t work so well when you’re on  a 30 min lunch break too. It’s inconvenient and false info.
title: False time expectations

review: I’m very happy to have this service. For the most part everything goes well. I had a couple of situations that were rectified immediately so for that I am pleased. I also thank you for the occasional discounts, it really helps.
title: Pleasedim pleased to have Uber available and the metro.   So far I have met some nice people

review: Where I grew up in Detroit Michigan there were jitneys that usually stood outside grocery stores and assisted the neighbors with bringing their groceries home. Uber reminds me of those old timey days. I appreciate the kindness extended by each driver I’ve encountered. Thank you for providing this much needed service!
title: Jitney 2.0

review: I had scheduled a ride two days before using Lyft. I had to fly from SF , Lyft kept switching drivers constantly I had to wait more than two hours , almost list my flight . I switched to Uber and within 10 minute I got my ride. NO MORE LYFT FOR ME
title: Switching from Lyft to Uber

review: Encountered severe traffic which driver calmly and smoothly circumnavigated and got us to our destination on time. His clean new Cadillac Escalade was much more comfortable than the Suburbans and other large SUVs I’ve ridden in previously. Overall a luxurious experience and a very professional driver.
title: Excellent VIP experience

review: He was incredibly kind and friendly! Got us to our location safely, as well.  I wished Uber would let us request a particular driver all the time because we would request him our whole stay!
title: Very good!!

review: I’m so impressed and grateful the only problem is sometimes on those rainy days they constantly cancel but when they come it is superb and since I’m wheelchair dependent it’s important.  Never treated rudely or unkind always very helpful and friendly.
title: Exceptional service

review: All the negative things they say about Uber ! Never had any problem with Uber ! I have been using Uber for 5-years + and NEVER any problem ! Because of the excellent experience - I always TIP their service ! Keep at it ! More power to Uber !
title: Easy Ride

review:
Thank you Frank for coming to our rescue. Blew 2 tires at 11 pm in Charleston SC. 

Frank was the only person that would drive us to our house at midnight after our car was dropped off at the auto repair place. ABOVE AND BEYOND THE CALL OF DUTY. Thank you sir. Thank you Uber. 

— kris
title: You saved us from a fate worse than death!

review: The app is useful BUT over the last several months especially I’m getting pop-up alerts advertising various crap they offer. If you turn off the alerts, then you don’t know when your drivers coming. So it’s basically forces you into their advertising. It’s bad enough in the app itself, but sending random notifications to people is absolutely wrong. See ya Uber , it’s not worth my time being interrupted by your greed!
title: Popup Notifications Advertising

review: The Uber app has always been my go to but this trip has been riddled with issues.  The live location feature is consistently inaccurate and drivers are waiting  up to 2 blocks away. Annoying glitch that needs to improved quickly.
title: D.C.

review: Driver took us to baseball park and we got stuck on RED traffic, he was patient and even we ask to get out the car and walk, he insisted on finishing even though it took us about 20 minutes more.. great service.
title: Excellent 5 star service

review: App is super easy to use and provides great communication features. Love that you can see where your driver is, share their info with others, send driver notes to help with pickup, leave a tip on the app, etc.
title: User-friendly app with great features

review: My driver was on time and helpful. He went out of his way to make me feel comfortable.  He was interesting to talk with and helped me feel comfortable as an older woman riding alone at night in a strange city.  His car was spotless. I would highly recommend him.
title: Kind and Personable Driver

review: When I’m going to catch a plane, reserved time of arrival is critically important. The ride today was early: no problem. My ride to the airport last month arrived 20 minutes past the agreed time. That is very stress inducing, and your software allows no place to comment or rate timeliness.
title: Your Software needs capacity to comment on timeliness.

review: We had excellent service with Verdetta. She was on time, early in fact. I reserved our ride 4 hours early. Her car was clean. She was friendly and with our luggage. I would highly recommend asking for her and using Uber!
title: Efficient service

review:
Uber got the incorrect address for my pick up location and I was unable to change.
I decided to cancel and reschedule correctly however Uber wanted to charge me $5 for their mistake so I called driver and walked to Uber’s designated pick up

I could change the destination but not the pick up
title: Pick up

review:
First things first
I am fully aware that there are some costs associated with running Iber by Uber.
There is a problem when a client pays for service $34 and driver gets $19
Why?  Because that is 55% driver / 45% uber split
That is INSANE and a robbery of both a client and a driver, so the Uber can fill their pockets.
Not sure what else Uner offers other than the car ride app platform, as the drivers have their own insurance, and im fairly sure that both prties are left on their own in case of soemthing going wrong.
Im not bitter, just a bit dissapointed that uber used to collect 20% fee for their service, which i thought was very fair, and yet the corporate greed won again with time

Ill be sure to use uber only as a last resort and support the taxi and local drivers communities.
title: Drivers drive, Uber gets rich

review:
My husband’s plan to pick me up at airport changed, so Uber to the rescue! Barbara was right on time for pick up, safe, and very courteous. Uber app is easy for same day, time use but I  couldn’t find how to reserve yesterday for today’s pick up.

Thanks, again!
Sherry
title: Huge thank you!

review: My wife and I had the pleasure of getting Robert for our Uber driver this morning and we can honestly say Ted of all the Uber trips we’ve ever taken he was the most personal, and impacting driver we’ve ever had. What a great way to start a long day of travel back to Florida! Thanks, Robert.
title: Awesome

review: Kevin was our driver in Louisiana for our trip. Not only was he amazing very early. Even though I was late and still agreed to stay he took extreme care of us and I would ride with him any day and recommend him always..thank you and I’m sorry we were late Kevin!
title: Kevin

review:
For as long as this app has been out, despite updates, reinstalls, new phones, and different types of phones, the app has constantly crashed and/or forgotten to save updated information.

I can watch my favorites ‘unfave’ themselves in real time. The bugs and constant crashes have cost me additional time and money - the worst sins.

Somehow, somewhere along the way, the app began to think I’m also an Uber driver - something I’ve never signed up for.
I’ve contacted support over the years to rectify this driver flag on my account, but am always told it can’t be fixed due to the limitations of the technology. 

Still in 2023? Right …

And Uber has the gall to keep pitching subscriptions to me. Pa-lease! After costing me time, money, and heartache? The app can Uber Eat it!
title: The app can Uber Eat it!

review: Came into the country for a quick trip and on a budget. Didn’t have time for renting and returning cars, but this has saved me so much on trips. One car and I was able to add destinations in route where needed. This was a great investment and invention. #UberEverywhere
title: Uber Everywhere

review: The app is fine, honestly. However, automatically opting users into marketing notifications is a scummy business practice.  While I understand these notifications can be disabled, I’d argue that the 2 spam notifications I’ve received from Uber is 2 too many. As a sole user, a review like this one is the only tool for change I have at my disposal. Please, make marketing notifications opt-in rather than the default. Your business will be okay, I promise.
title: Notification Spam

review: Rode a little over a mile from my house w/CJ. She was very personable & not reckless, which I have had in the past. She shared a fair amount about herself at a casual level. A great experience, especially compared to the surge rate, however I’m sure CJ would’ve been no different.
title: Short ride

review: Normally, I would use a different sim card based on the location US/Europe. Uber doesn't let me chenge the number within 2 weeks of changing. Calls cannot be made to the driver if the number is not associated with the account. I need to wait two weeks until I can start using uber in the new location without problems with calls.
title: Doesn't work well if you travel

review: My driver canceled my pickup 3 minutes after order and said he was here, but he was not in front or near my house then canceled the ride and charged me $5.00, that is wrong.  He didn’t make it to my pick destination, he didn’t wait for me! The called it an inconvenience fee.  We’ll it was an inconvenience for me and caused stress to have to order another ride… as we were trying to catch a flight.
title: My driver canceled my pickup then charged me

review:
I’m never able to share my ride status using the copy share link feature. It never works. It shows up and says copy share link, but the button is always broken. This is a major safety concern for people with minor children.

The most sickening part is that Uber doesn’t even let you contact them over safety concerns like this. They make it literally impossible to reach out for support over safety issues.
title: Copy share link never works

review: Last night I tried over and over to get home and several drivers accepted the job and then canceled. I waited for 30 minutes and watched all the cancellations done by the drivers. The app would immediately find another driver. Even drivers who were 2 minutes or 3 minutes away canceled. Yet, I am charged for all these cancellations that they did. Not me. These cancellations seemed very deliberate. Their intent is to steal from clients. This is extremely upsetting.
title: Worst conduct by Drivers

review: Our first time ever using Uber will be hard to beat. I could have ridden around the entire state of CO with Billy as our driver. He blessed us and I’m eternally grateful for his kind customer service and you don’t find that type of customer service anymore. So thankful!!!!
title: Billy the Blessing

review: The Uber Eats payment section needs update. Most of the time it is going to the payment method as a next step and doesn’t load. I’ve spent long times just waiting for it to finish the step but no progress. I have my card already on file so I don’t understand why it doesn’t auto fill. I had to go to other food delivery apps because this is a frequent occurrence. I’ve tried taking off WiFi, refreshing and so forth. Please update.
title: Needs an update

review: I’ve had several Uber drivers but Marvin was my most recent and I am here to tell you he was a breath of fresh air. Kindness is so rare these days but above being kind he was very personable and he definitely deserves to be recognized
title: Some Uber drivers seriously need to be recognized

review: The app allows drivers to pick up jobs during another trip. It would make sense if the driver was about to drop off. However, I have had to wait way too long while I watch the map show me the driver making circles. The feature is definitely wasting time for users. Uber should optimize the feature and provide the option to cancel if the arrival estimate timing becomes inaccurate and too long.
title: Inaccurate Timing for Driver to Finish Another Trip

review: It’s hard to contact customer service when you have issues, there no phone number to call. Gets frustrating.
title: Customer service

review: I just had a great ride with Germanico (not sure about the spelling sorry). I had to go straight back home after getting off the train due to personal issues.  My driver was extremely kind and very professional.  Thanks again
title: Great review!

review: This man, let sit  me  in front, let me bear my soul while waiting for the owner of my heart to show up for me. Let me be me, to the fullest!! Thank you!!! For allowing that magical being to grace your reality. It was a powerful healing journey to ride with you. Thanks for sharing space and strength and stories with me!!
title: Custom love -

review: As a woman traveling alone in Paris it is so comforting to know I can call an UBER when needed…. Drivers are always nice and sometimes even offer Wi-Fi. I wish the prices didn’t get so very high during busy times but otherwise a great service 👍🏼
title: Travel safe!

review: Used to be so much better. Now you can’t get a ride to save your life.. 5 minutes away means 3 cancellations and 15 mins away minimum. There so crappy now. Uber used to be good.  Ow they treat everyone like 2nd rate. If there was another service. I’d use it
title: What happened?

review:
Wish I could give them zero 
Requested a ride with the same address info that I’ve been using and the driver was sent somewhere else thanks to urber I was late to work and looking at possible write I will be deleting this app and downloading Lyft
title: Requested ride

review: Driver shows up and say I requested a ride, but he did not match my Uber driver I ordered.  The driver was rude, and would not leave me alone. Super scary, especially because I was at the airport at 2am with my daughter just trying to get to our hotel.  Then I just received a cancellation fee.  The app was terrible and I have no idea where to get help.  I really don’t know if I accidentally ordered 2 Ubers, is that possible?  Either way I should not be charged for not getting in car I didn’t feel safe in.
title: Scary

review:
We took a ride at the beginning of august from Walmart back home and were charged 150$ two weeks later by the driver. There’s no way we made a mess or left anything behind since all we had was a few bags of groceries and a stroller; but of course Uber doesn’t have any type of customer service or ways to dispute it. 

So yea we’re no longer using Uber since that money was for our newborns diapers and other essentials.
title: 150$ charge nearly two weeks AFTER we rode
userName: im not putting in a name

review: The app lags too much. Although it is consistent on recent topics, it needs to improve on the essential features (sending trip rides to multiple social media platforms). Please focus more on the important features!
title: Please Fix Bugs

review: The tip section when u r riding has no submit button and no confirmation that you tipped. When you get notified for a tip at the end you tip twice because you are confused whether you really tipped. There should be a confirmation that you tipped during your ride, AND a notification when it again asks for a tip at the end that you have ALREADY TIPPED.
title: Tip Layout tricks Users

review: I have family members attached to my account and it’s on there phone but not on my phone. So i can’t tell if they are able to use
title: The family option is no longer available on my app

review: Constantly paying more for driver route errors which is not fare to the customer. Every time a fare is booked for one price when you get to the destination that was put in Uber charges more than the initial booking rate. There is no way to dispute the charge in fare and I’m not blind so I know what I saw. Lyft does not have such bad practices. Drivers should not expect a tip because the company is taking advantage of hard working people.
title: Feel cheated

review: I was charged a cancellation fee because a driver couldn’t get to the pick up location. How was that my fault? I’ve been trying to get a refund and it’s been past 24 hours and still no help. What’s the point of having a customer service help chat if no one is available to respond? It still says they’re waiting for someone to become available. How many days does it take to get someone to answer a question?
title: Horrible customer service

review: Somehow if you disable ad notifications in the app, they can still push ads to you. If you disable notifications all together via IOS to stop the spam, you can’t be notified when your ride arrives. They’ve somehow squeezed Ad spam into critical notifications through a loophole apple hasn’t closed yet. This along with charging users in CA to pay for drivers health insurance make me question this company a great deal…
title: App sneaks past privacy settings to spam with ads

review:
Careful when scheduling rides and canceling rides.  Uber charged me $25 for a ride that never happened and is refusing to settle the dispute.  

One night I had scheduled a ride to the airport for the following morning.  The driver showed up in front of my apartment complex, outside the gates and in the wrong spot.  Took me a minute to walk over to the car.  As soon as I got to the car, the driver drove off as I stood there with my bags in hand.  

I disputed the charge through the app, but the support continues to insist that they charged me correctly $25.  The ride never happened.  I ended up driving myself to the airport, parking in short term parking.  

I’ve been using taxis and Lyft in the meantime, no complaints.  In my experience, other ride share apps have a better dispute process and refund policy.
title: Money-Hungry Policy

review: Uber charges for a service fee, delivery fee and now a “temporary fuel fee”. Then you have the audacity to say at the end of a trip “leave a tip to show your support.” YOU show your employees the support. How much do they get of the service and delivery fee? Does the fuel gas fee goes directly to the driver? How about you compensate your drivers for the fuel instead of your customers who are already paying the service fee, delivery and tip. Now you want to add a fuel fee? You guys are ridiculous!
title: Pay your employees better!

review: If you plan on using this app make sure you schedule the ride way before you need to go. I remember a few years ago I would get drivers who were relatively close but now it seems to only get drivers who are 20+ minutes away and still completing another ride. Oh and btw that 20 minute wait is just a horrible underestimation uber gives (blatant lies seem to be the company motto) and most times it will be 30-40 mins
title: Better off asking your blind dog for a ride

review: Newest version is not compatible with my ios. Popup states that an older version that is compatible with my level of ios is available for download. Clicking the download button leads only to the same popup. Loop does me no good. ios is at the level I want for other compatibility. Is there a fix?
title: Older version download not available

review: An uber driver stopped at a convenience store, made us late, was disrespectful and Uber support was impossible to contact, and when I was finally contacted, they were worse than useless and beyond patronizing. I will never use this service again, and I will make sure that all my friends and family understand that Uber doesn’t care about their customers. I feel as if Uber has stolen my time and my money with their continually lackluster service.
title: Unprofessional Thieves

review:
I worked for Uber for years i every time I go home to check my rides half of rides gone.
the company didn’t count it when I called to check I received an message that doesn’t make any sense, for the people who pays for Uber think about the drivers who comes to pick you up and don’t get paid.
You only pay money to the company the drivers don’t get any money from you, I only receive tips from costumers.
Uber are stealing money from us
title: Stealing money

review: You have been extremely difficult to reach. I do not wish to continue my membership and you have not assisted me in canceling my membership. How do I do this. If you can not assist me I will be forced to call my bank to not accept your payment on membership. I do NOT choose to continue my membership. It is impossible to reach anyone to do the cancellation. I’m very frustrated with your company to cancel my membership. Please advice!
title: Assistance with cancellation of my charges for membership

review:
I requested an Über Black SUV for my best friend and his bride to take from their wedding to their hotel. I booked a few days in advance and everything looked good. 
When it came time to be picked up, I stood outside waiting for my driver. The driver never showed up. I had to be the one to tell my friends that Über screwed up. When the 10 minute waiting time passed, Über deleted my request, so I could not follow up with the company.
Looks like I’ll be sticking to Lyft for now on.
title: Über black de not show up n wedding day

review:
I haven’t used Uber in more than a year and also Uber eats due to bad experience with their service. I recently realized they have been charging me for Uber pass that I have not enrolled in and I have been charged 120$ for the year and I used Uber zero times and Uber eats may be twice 

The practice seems very sneaky n trying to find how it got activated and their number simply says go to app and the app just has FAQs and trying to make the phone call difficult
title: Sneaky charges

review:
Uber needs to penalize drivers who cancel trips. I am traveling and have now been waiting 20 minutes for an Uber. I have had 2 drivers cancel AFTER I had been waiting for them for more than 5 minutes, only to be given to another driver that cancels. I have a nearly 5 star Uber rating. Uber is ok, I guess, as long as you can waste half an hour on driver cancellations. 

Booo. Terrible management of your workforce.
title: Driver cancellations

review:
For such a large/successful company, their support is absolutely ridiculous. 
Someone set up an Uber account using my email address. Every time I report it to Uber they ask for the name, phone number, etc etc used with the account. Lol, how stupid! I’ve explained NUMEROUS times that someone else signed up using my email address. But, they still ask for everything else associated with the “my” uber account. I have no uber account. That seems pretty clear to me. But not these idiots.
title: Unreal

review: This was the first time that I ever used Uber. The car was meticulously clean and the driver was very respectful. He drove safely and followed the rules of the road. He arrived on time and got me to my medical appointment on time. I was very impressed by my experience and scheduled another ride for tomorrow morning.
title: Excellent Uber Experience

review: If you lose something in an Uber don’t expect to get it back. I left a wallet recently and no matter how many times I contacted the driver the call would never connect. The app has serious problems that I hope they can fix. Most of the drivers aren’t friendly or drive pretty bad. Would not recommend and always pay attention to belongings, just use Lyft.
title: Not customer friendly

review: I had a flight at 6:30 from a medium sized city in FL. The night before I scheduled my Uber, and when I woke up I saw a driver had been assigned for my trip. At my selected pickup time I waited ten minutes with the app saying ‘pickup soon’. Then abruptly my ride was cancelled. There’s no reason to have this feature or use Uber when they will cancel on you ten minutes late. Next time I’ll use a cab, at least when there is an issue someone will pick up the phone.
title: Why bother scheduling?

review: Its a rip you’re better off calling the restaurant itself and see if they deliver! you usually get free delivery off a min $10 or $2 and the restaurant itself can hold its driver accountable with deliveries also PRIORITY DELIVERY IS FAKE YOU PAY EXTRA FOR 2mins FASTER ITS STILL IN BATCH ORDERS MEANING YOU GET WHEN ITS CONVENIENT TO THE DRIVER ROUTE AS NORMAL ORDERS ARE INCLUDED AND THEY CAN GET IT SOONER! Also restaurants will ACTUALLY refund your money immediately instead of crediting! Its more hands on when you order with restaurant directly and faster more helpful response than one of Ubers automatic bots.
title: Worst overrated delivery app

review:
Since COVID, prices have been through the room. $70 for a 14 minutes drive for surge prices all throughout the day. Would be fine if the cost went to drivers, but they get a paltry $12 out of this. 

Out that surge pricing… not based on availability of drivers by the way. My driver said he was waiting 15 minutes for a request with dozens of other Uber drivers at LAX.

After this ride I’m deleting this app and sticking to taxis. Way to rob your customers and drivers Uber
title: Insane Prices, None for Drivers

review:
I have been using Uber and it’s always the same thing 🙄I reserve a ride for 6 am because I have to work and when it’s 6:15 they tell me Ubers cars are not available at this time, not gonna lie Uber is a good services they should be responsible with the reservations also Uber is never available and sometimes drivers are so far like 30 minutes 
I have to be at work and it’s not posible for ubers not to be working at 7

I’ve been using Uber for a year now and it’s a good  reliable app, only problem I have with it is when it’s busy so they make the fares higher. Most of my destinations are about 10-15 min away it’s the prices that would normally be $8-$10 become $40-$50. Other than that very affordable and helpful.
title: G8

review: I understand with covid and increasing demand for rides, prices will go up. However, I’ve gone through my past rides to locations I travel to now and prices have gone up way too much. For a 5 minute ride that’s no more than 1 mile from me, it cost me over 20 dollars. Back in August of 2019, that same trip ranged from 4 to 6 dollars. How could it go up that much in price? I think y’all are selfish and only care about the money. I’ll be taking cabs from here on out.
title: Prices too high

review: For one how is Uber going to let me use my cash app card for Uber eats but I want to tell me that he’s not able to use on Uber rides that is outrageous it lets me take out Uber cash from my cash app card but it doesn’t let me use it how does that work. That was already one issue I had and now I have another one I’m trying to go in Uber to a 10 minute location and it’s charging me $36 that is out rages over what is going on with you you guys are becoming a horrible at service
title: Uber is becoming horrible by the updated

review: Okay let me start off by saying I know there not a lot of drivers and I know that and understand but this happened to many time this morning I ordered a ride and wait 25 + minutes for them just to cancel the ride 3 minutes away but I let that go but then it happened again so I end up waiting 46 minutes and still didn’t get a ride and had to use Lyft what I’m saying is what the point of charging high amount because of little drivers when they just going to cancel.
title: Wait time

review:
I’m not really sure what the issues with Uber is lately. I can’t tell if it’s due to Uber being a terrible company or because of Covid but for the last like 6 months I’ve had absolutely zero luck with finding a ride. Every once in a blue moon I’ll find a driver that I have to wait 25+ mins for to come and just hope and pray that they don’t cancel on me. 

However MOST of the time it says there are no drivers available. I have completely given up on using this app because it is pointless.
title: Very Disappointed

review: Our first vacation in over a year because of the pandemic, we decided to use the schedule ahead feature for a ride to the airport. Scheduled ride two days ago, received multiple confirmations. At our scheduled pickup time, it suddenly said driver will arrive in 45 minutes. We had to catch a flight!  Needless to say, we had to drive ourselves and incur major parking fees since we would be gone for 10 days. Extremely disappointing!
title: Disappointing

review: We were blessed with the absolute BEST driver with Kevin! He was the most kind and respectful driver I have had in 30+ years of traveling. Very pleasant to talk with, too! Followed the same route we would have followed if we had our car this time!
title: First Time Uber

review: Uber might cost more but it is well worth it. We waited over 15 minutes for an XL taxi in Rome to only discover that the foldable wheelchair wouldn’t fit in it. We ordered an Uber van and it met us in only 4 minutes and was very roomy. The driver was excellent with my disabled father.
title: Very Accommodating for a Wheelchair

review: My driver was the sweetest kindest woman I’ve met outside of my family in Texas. She made me feel so comfortable like e we one each other for years!  Her name is torie and when I take an Uber again I wish I could request her!!! Treat her right Uber she made you guys look very good!!!!
title: My driver

review: LOVED my trip with Rene! The music was a vibe, she provided exceptional service to ensure that the ride was comfortable and smooth. Rene’s profile definitely reflects her genuine personality and style. I’ll definitely book with Rene again if at all possible. Trust me she won’t disappoint you.
title: Exceptional Service

review: I ordered an Uber for one location and the driver showed up at a different spot.  We were trying to make a reservation at a restaurant. So my husband ordered an Uber for the correct location I am being charged a 10 cancellation fee…
title: Nancy

review: I left my pocketbook in the back of the Uber. Luckily Bonnie noticed it while we were both trying to contact each other. She drove back to the airport and gave me my pocketbook. Without it, I would’ve missed my flight.
title: Great person!

review: Great experience. Very easy to use app. Am almost 74 yrs old & was able to sign up for ride & had great experience for being my 1st time using the Uber app. Vehicle very clean & in great shape. . Very good driver. Very social & respectful….. and I used the 1st advised rate/selection. Thank you!!!
title: 1st time using Uber- great experience

review: We were a quartet of senior citizens trying to figure out how we were going to dine in the Old Market then find a parking place within walking distance of BLUEBARN. Uber to the rescue! The drivers both to and fro were on time and great. Dinner, show, and drive we’re all exceptional.
title: Perfect!

review: this man helped me get the drunk girl i was with under control and was considerate the entire time. ANYONE who needs him should go with him. he is amazing and went above and beyond to help me and make me feel safe. extremely well rounded human! thank you!
title: Dealt with more than he needed to

review: Of the many Uber rides I’ve had over the years, Patrick was the friendliest and most sincere driver. I can remember. Really enjoyed the time spent in his vehicle visiting. It’s not often you wish a ride would last longer!
title: Outstanding service!

review: Once got assigned to someone whose license plate was different from info give. I didn’t have the option to change drivers until I waited for the driver left the location to be assigned to another driver. Another Time, just when the driver arrived, the license plate number and driver info in the phone screen disappeared and instead asked for option of joining uber one (an uber ad) I couldn’t cross check the license plate by and the driver was waiting.
title: Weird navigation system

review: Uber App really makes the entire process perfect. Finds the ride and allows you to track the arrival, find out a bit about the driver and easily complete the “business”. Nothing better!!
title: Always perfect. Love the Reservation process. No worries.

review: I don’t Uber hardly ever but met an awesome Uber driver James. Needed a quick ride while car was being fixed and he arrived promptly.  Safe driver and knowledgeable of the area. It was a pleasure to ride in his vehicle.  My only regret is I can’t request him each time I need an Uber Ride.
title: Great Uber Experience

review:
TL;DR: STOP CHARGING CUSTOMERS $80  TO GO SOMEWHERE 30 MINS AWAY WHILE GIVING DRIVERS $25 OF THAT MONEY! IT’S SICKENING!

It’s insane to me how uber manages to screw over people with these godforsaken insane prices. As a former driver for uber and a customer how do you manage to burn wallets and shorten them at the same time. Overpricing rides for the smallest circumstances that lyft has beaten in a heartbeat more times than i could count. Yet, still, give a small percentage to the drivers that are so dedicated and hard working. This is the last time for me and Uber i swear
title: Uber is still at it

review:
Robert, our driver was polite, friendly and kind. 
He went out of his way, without request to return a cell phone that we dropped in his car to us at our hotel.
I wish my daughter would find someone like Robert to marry.

👍👍👍👍
title: Robert our driver in Seattle

review: Landed at BWI and called for Uber as taxis were more expensive. Our driver was there innless than 5 minutes. He was a true professional with impeccable manners. He was friendly - yet respectful and got us to our destination in a most timely manner
title: Uber is the best way to go

review: Uber is convenient to use almost any time of day or night, but the price of rides can be very expensive depending on where the destination is and the amount of traffic. Overall, Uber has been helpful, but it would be nice if there were more opportunities for bigger discounts.
title: Uber Review

review: Driver was a hard working semi retired gentleman who was prompt, professional and a great guy. The service itself was well priced for the trip and for a first time user extremely easy to book and quick to operate. I'm very pleased all around.
title: Couldn't be happier

review: This was the first time that I used Uber after I got the app and I can’t think of a better driver than a manual to give me my first ride very polite courteous and nice I would definitely use him again and I will also be using YouTuber again
title: First ride

review: Driver was good enough to drop me at my destination even though I don’t know technical issue why my drop off address was just 5 block away from pick up. But driver was nice to drop me till destination.
title: Great customer experience

review: I wasn’t able to catch our drivers name however, he was extremely punctual with the pick up and also delivering my family safely to our event! Five star rating for sure! I highly recommend!
title: Excellent trip

review: I just got pulled over and the cop said I need license in order to drive. Which in its self was stressful. So I parked my car and decided to try Uber to go and get my license copie at dmv. My Uber driver was there in 2 minutes and friendly great guy! It was more than a ride for me
title: My Uber driver was amazing

review: I left my phone in the car he drive it back no problem! Very curious, professional, and very and great customer service. Even offered to help me with my child and belongings to get in the house, definitely recommend!
title: Very helpful

review: The app is confusing because it keeps upcoming rides and past rides in two separate areas and the customer service staff did not know that.  This caused a lot of stress for this inexperienced user.  I finally figured it out on my own.
title: The App

review: It works well and is very convenient, it is a little bit expensive in some ways he wouldn’t think it would be – it is also inexpensive in some ways are very helpful and convenient
title: A pretty good thing

review:
Great service ! Donald was extremely professional , friendly and knowledgeable about the route. He came in little earlier  prior to his allotted time , which was helpful. I will definitely recommend him. 
Uber app was very user friendly.
title: Great service !

review: Our Uber driver was fantastic! We enjoyed talking to him. He was extremely punctual, perfect timing with what we expected. He was a great driver, we felt very confident in his driving and knowledge of area. The fee was great as well. Mudane was so polite and accommodating that I would HIGHLY recommend him as your next Uber driver!!! 👌😃
title: Fun-tastic!

review: This was my first time using Uber. My driver was timely and very easy to find once he arrived. My driver was absolutely professional. If I had a question he responded in a very polite, relaxed, and professional manner. 5 star experience. I will use Uber again.
title: 1st experience with Uber

review: Aries was the best driver we’ve ever had!! She was a great communicator, early to arrive at our home, let us know what she was doing every step of the way, polite, positive, courteous, genuinely kind, very knowledgeable and a very safe driver. IF we could request her again, we WOULD!!!
title: Our wonderful driver

review: You can tell immediately when a driver takes pride in his work. Punctuality, a clean vehicle, professional presentation and personable conversation were a solid package in Vivian Curtis and and thoroughly enjoyed my round trip excursion with this gentleman. Any passenger will be blessed to enter his car!
title: Uber Trip with Vivian Curtis

review:
Wow! What a driver! I didn’t think I was gonna make it out of downtown Nashville Alive, but then….BAM!…Shatequa!!! Totally called me an told me where to meet her in that sea of people. Made pickup a breeze and got me to
My destination as quickly as possible. If I could give her a 100 stars I would!
title: Shatequa Infiniti 60

review: Michael was on time and we so enjoyed our visit with him driving from the airport to the Hyatt house hotel. We love meeting new people and certainly enjoyed talking to Michael. The car was clean and it was probably one of the best Uber rides we have ever had.
title: Excellent and friendly driver

review: Pulled the address from google maps and the app sent the driver 2 miles away … the app got us both frustrated and I needed that right to be on time and I spent more than 30 minutes sitting at the account setting up the ride and I kept on trying to fix the right in the app and change the pick up location and it kept on sending me to different spot. When I needed the app, the most it did not work.
title: Don’t work when most needed

review: I have tried four or five times to contact Uber support about my ride on April 22, where they have charged me twice for a tip. The ride was $19 and change, and I’ve been charged twice five dollars, making the total price $29 and change, in other words, a 50% tip. Uber makes it next to impossible to contact their customer support. It is unprofessional and frustrating when I am charged for something that I did not authorize.
title: Unauthorized charge to my account

review: Overall easy to use app and widely available ride choices most anywhere you want to go.  Would give it 5 stars but the Uber Cash wouldn’t work no matter what app help advised.  So gave up and turned off Uber Cash and used credit card.  Super frustrating.
title: Uber Cash Crash

review: I use Uber infrequently - usually drive myself. But really pleased with every Uber experience. On time, nice vehicle, friendly but not at all intrusive driver. My trip with Michael today was no exception. Always good to know that Uber is available when I need a ride.
title: Another Perfect Ride

review: I had an Uber driver come get me after I was stranded. The driver was really helpful and offered words of encouragement.  Again Uber saved the day I was two hours from home. We drove through bad weather and the driver was great!! Uber is a lifesaver
title: The Uber drivers angels and friends

review: We were desperate for help as we needed to use the app to get a ride, but were unable to add a payment method.  We tried every option offered in their lame faqs.  Uber boasts everywhere about 24/7 help.  ITS A LIE.  There is ZERO support!  I got on a chat for drivers and they said they fixed it, but I guess they just lied?  I went to the chat again and they refused to even point me in the right direction.  Sure it’s good if nothing goes wrong, but if there’s a problem, Uber gives zero fks.   Hooray for LYFT!
title: ZERO SUPPORT!!

review: We were broke down on the side of a highway in a difficult area to get to. 3 drivers canceled on us because they didn’t want to be bothered. But this driver kept hunting and trying until she found us. So professional and sweet. What a blessing!
title: Saved us!

review: I like that drivers are open to local knowledge and instead of the AP they have from maps telling them where to turn, they will go the side road quicker way!
title: Following Directions

review: I only needed a short trip . Amal was the driver and her car was perfect. She was very professional, courteous and enjoyable to talk to. I would recommend Amal to anyone and hope I am blessed with the good fortune to have Amal and her beautiful car again the next time I need Uber. Thank you, Amal!
title: Ride with Amal

review: Found it hard how to get onto the site to change and cancel a prearranged trip and change the time of pick up. It should have a simple place to modify or change reservation. That’s obvious to the viewer.
title: Site

review: This was my first Uber experience and Cameron will be a challenge for anyone else to follow! He arrived in less than 5 minutes and had us to our destination in less than 5 minutes.  I will use Uber again.
title: Cameron

review: I really like the functionally to reserve a ride in advance. In the process I realized my address doesn't offer the option but didn't get an alternative location. Would be great if the app could show alternative location to pick up passenger when doing a reservation.
title: Alternatives reserve ride

review: Got a ride to a destination from my home with Uber for $16. After the event the return ride home was $62. I hate price gouging. I understand if the price will go up a little bit in the evening but that is ridiculous. I’ll find another way home next time.
title: Price gouging

review:
Made reservation for my wife and Tri Rail was delayed due to a vehicle accident so train late by some 45 minutes.  Initial driver left so made a second reservation. My wife told me to rate her a 100 based on driving and communication after a long day of travel
Well done
title: Uber to Codo

review: Nice truck, great attitude, good conversation and a real genuine guy, just wish I could reserve my driver and get him all the time. 5 stars ain’t enough. Ain’t too often u meet a layer back hardworking person that’s really about family, Definitely a great experience.
title: Uber ride rating for Jesus

review:
I just received an advert from you about faster, more reliable service.  I live in a seasonal town.  During the high season Uber is always too busy to pick me up and in the low season responses to my rides requests are fewer and farther between. 
Worse than no rides is the number of times a ride is confirmed and the driver is 17,15,12,9,16,14,8,5,3 minutes away…..and then cancels after I’ve been watching the vehicle approach my destination for a solid 25 minutes.
title: Faster and More Reliable?

review: Corey is an exceptional person. We loved getting to know him.  One day soon he’s going to be a famous musician and we hope to get backstage passes to one of his concerts.  If you are in the music business, get Corey connected so he can carry out his talents and go for his dreams.
title: Fantastic!!!

review: My driver ( I am really sorry bc I didn’t get his name) was excellent! He was very kind, super polite and even though I KNOW (lol) I talked wayyy too much, he listened attentively. His entire demeanor was simply refreshing and I thank him greatly for that. I wish for him a beautiful day and great customers!!😊
title: Larissa to Fas Mart & back home

review: I travel a lot and use this app slot. It’s so annoying that after the 335th time of me saying, “No I don’t want to try the 1 month trial subscription,” it still asks me if I want to try it. Plus the spammy advertising-laden interface is getting cheesy, classless, and desperate-looking (I’ve heard they are desperate for revenue growth, but slowly, but surely the user experience is degrading and people like me don’t want to use this app as much). So much for putting riders and driver first.
title: Keeps asking if I want 1 month trial

review: I used to love this app and have been using it for years since my accident. Over the time they took points away I was a soon to be diamond member they took that away and the prices have gotten RIDICULOUS they have you playing 3 times the cost of the regular trip it’s starting to get unaffordable because of how often I have to use it. I’ll have to look for another way because this app has gotten terrible and really money hungry.
title: Dissatisfied & Disappointed!!

review: Justin was great!  I highly recommend him!  He was friendly, drove safe, his car was clean, he provided hand sanitizer, and he positioned his car to make it convenient for me to hand him my suitcase and get into the car.  That’s Service!!!!
title: Great Way to Start Off the Week!

review: We have always had great service from Uber as a company. Years of experience with only two unsatisfactory drivers and both times Uber made it right when brought to their attention…
title: Satisfied rider

review:
Uber app has a huge bug, that prevents you from using Uber in any foreign country, since you no longer may change the country - it gives you blank screen.
UBER - PAY ATTENTION AND FIX IT IMMEDIATELY! Yesterday, I spent 45 minutes with an idiot at your customer service to change the country & the phone number. It used to take few seconds without any help.
title: Can’t change number when travel outside USA

review: Arrived promptly, helped me with my luggage, and once we talked about where I was headed, we had a good conversation about where he was from, his family and mine. One of the nice features of Uber is the chance to connect during the drive.
title: Good driver, calm, courteous and friendly.

review:
I have been using Uber for years in many different countries when available.
Always quick, easy, trusted, efficient service.
It’s nice to see Uber all over the world. I hope it can connect us all one day!!
title: Uber user review

review:
This app was fine for several years. Jan 2023 they started pushing ads via notifications. This is not ok. I don’t want the ads, so I am forced to turn off notifications from Uber. 

This means I now won’t get useful notifications from the app regarding rides. If I’m forced to endure ads to have a usable app, I’ll delete the app and use a competitor. 

Whoever made that business decision should be fired.
title: Pushing ads via notifications is bad

review: Trying to get uber after the Raiders Chiefs game and two of the drivers canceled on me. I had an hour wait to get back to the cosmopolitan! I think I could’ve walked here faster! I guess I should’ve, but I’m watching the charges carefully because a lot of times I end up with charges that are from canceled trips! Not enjoying that aspect of Uber! I will say all the drivers that did pick us up were very respectful, adamant. Nice!
title: Vegas cancellations

review:
Like to thank Alhosin for taking good care of my 86 year old father.  He was delayed in MSP  for 2 days due to weather and never experience a Uber service.  Alhosin was “very professional’ to my father and made his day much better.
Thanks Alhosin, may the days ahead bring you Health & Happiness!
title: Christmas Day

review:
Very difficult/impossible to get handicapped accessible vehicles at different times during the day
My $13 rate today to pick up my car was almost $80, on an Uber large enough to accommodate me and my walker during surge and no accessible vehicles available for over 90 min of trying, when I dropped the car off to be fixed.  A friend came to pick me up.
title: Incredibly high intermittent rates

review: My first Uber couldn’t find us and after a half hour he canceled on us while I was in the cold with my 7 yr old granddaughter. Thank goodness this driver picked up the drive and was there in 15 minutes, I was so grateful.
title: Picked up my drive after First Uber cancelled us.

review: I just wanna give a shout out to one of the most positive vibes driver so far I came in contact with! I am very pleased with the prices especially during the holidays!!!* Thank You UBER you Rock!!!! Awesome Customer Sery I wish I could behave Alex all the time as my driver!* Happy Holidays Uber Be Blessed 🌻✌🏾♥️
title: Rates and customer service

review:
I can’t say enough about my driver, Michael. He is a true professional and his service was tremendous on a trip that I was very concerned about making due to a temporary health condition.
He is a top notch driver and I only wish I could get him again somehow. 
Thank you
title: First trip

review: Had my car towed and the address sent to me by the police was wrong. Pedro came to my rescue and volunteered to take me to the right place and in time to pick up my daughter from school. I would have never made it without him.
title: Saved my day

review: Jeffrey was very pleasant and friendly. He took us for some cheesesteaks on the way to the hotel…delicious. We had a few requested pit stops and he accommodated graciously. He helped with our bags and also knew the best traffic routes.  Would highly recommend him.
title: Great Driver!

review: In all of my Uber experiences, rarely have I discovered a person so humble, kind, and authentically genuine. In my humble opinion, he is what Uber was designed to do. IF I were running Uber, I would promote this man and allow him to teach others. Nevertheless, he was amazing to my wife and I.
title: Ride with Matt

review: Today I took an Uber I usually rather walk but it was so far away and this kind and humble man made my day we were in a tuff position and he was very calm and kind I am very grateful that I had the experience of being on the car with him.
title: Made my day

review: I callecilla an Uber driver when we landed last Saturday. The driver texted me and asked where I am going and then said sorry. That was if. Waited 5 minutes but he clearly was not coming. Did not cancel so I was left stranded. Can’t say that I am happy al since I had no options to report him. Ended up calling a cab
title: No accountability

review: They have a problem fixing things on the app and lie about fixing the problem that wasn’t an issue fixing my instant cash out which I still have enough to but support lies and blames it on me but it’s their fault why I can’t instant cash out I need it for gas so I can drive for them. Other then that I like driving for them.
title: Problems with them

review: So Uber has changed its policy to only allow Uber Cash to be used if you have more than the amount of the trip. Since certain reward credit cards only provide $15 a month for Uber credits, this benefit has become MUCH less valuable! In effect, Uber cash can now only be used for tips. No more split payments. Uber changed its policies to make the user experience much suckier. Way to go Uber. Way to give a crap about your customers.
title: Uber Cash only available for tip!

review:
Price aside, this app is fantastic at connecting riders with driver in most markets and providing safe/reliable transportation. Price considered, it is absurdly expensive to get a ride anytime Uber is “busy.” It would be one thing if the money went to the drivers, but it doesn’t. I have been charged $25+ to go less than 2 miles and the driver might see $5 of that fee. 

Great service. Greedy app. Truly a monopoly in practice.
title: Great service/drivers, greedy app.

review: While I order was confirmed, and while we were able to follow Iissa to within a block of our hotel, he never arrived.  He was scheduled to arrive between 6P and 6:10P.  At 6:20, with no contact from Issa, we had the hotel’s valet bring our car down so we could make our 6:30 reservations.  Uber services failed us on this attempt.  We are staying at a major hotel that has been here for a number of years.  Evidently, Issa couldn’t find our hotel.
title: Missing driver

review: Uber gets exceedingly more expensive, all while the drivers remain rude. After 4 years, Uber still allows drivers to accept a ride, and then not drive at all for 15 minutes, only to get YOU to cancel the ride so they get the 5$ fee. Make all this money selling the data of me going to the pet store after work but can’t keep rides from going into the 20 dollar price range… If Lyft wasn’t even more ridiculous we’d all be using that still
title: Use at your own risk

review: Can’t order food because the promotion that they had doesn’t apply to my account. I didn’t sign up for any promotion and the app forced the promotion on me. Tried to google search a way to remove the promotion, but I could not. So I could not order anything from Uber eats because of the buggy app. Sitting here for 30 minutes trying to make this work. This review does not apply to rideshare.
title: App is so buggy

review: These drivers are so entitled. Literally they keep charging my card with an extra charge for no reason. It could be just $1-$3 (granted, that’s not a lot), but it gets annoying to be charged extra for no reason multiple times. I’ve been a customer for almost 5 years. Customer service refused to answer after an entire day, which was unusual by the way. I just decided to delete the app altogether. That $2.38 was worth getting rid of them for good.
title: I’m tired.

review: The app won’t allow me to change the pick up location. It auto reverts to my current location. Before the last update, it allowed changing only if I type out the pickup address. It was annoying not to be able to type in a name or saved address, but now it’s become impossible to order or even price an Uber from anywhere else.
title: Maddening

review: If you set a time for pick up expect to be picked up 30+ minutes after your schedule time. It would be different if it happened once but multiple times is ridiculous. Scheduled pick up isnt anything special they still give ridiculous drivers who cancel and cause you to wait even longer. They really need to figure out a better system im very disappointed. I think ill be switching over to lyft after this horrible NORMAL occurrence.
title: Beware!

review: Don’t know if it’s a California thing but Uber just loves to constantly raise its ride fare. Not only are the pickup times ridiculous recently but the cost to go a couple miles are so high. $40 to go less than 10 miles during no traffic hours. Sometimes it quotes me up to $80 and fluctuates price for no reason. Garbage company doesn’t care for its users anymore. All they want is more of our hard earned money without giving us anything.
title: Stupid expensive ride fare

review: We have been visiting Puerto Vallarta during the PHE and Uber is a wonderful service while away from home. Clean, friendly, reliable, convenient, and far more economical than renting a car while in Mexico. Uber is indispensable.
title: Better than renting a car in Puerto Vallarta

review: This is the 3rd to 4th time I’ve taken Uber with an extra stop I stock at the grocery store today to pick up some milk after exiting the vehicle and entering a grocery store I witnessed my driver driving off and canceling the rest of my trip I indicated to him on multiple occasionsThat there was more stops to this trip I’ve also been charged the full amount for this Uber you guys really need to fix this I’m on the verge of canceling my subscription lift never does this
title: Non-completed trip

review: The algorithm poorly promises drop off times… my original drop of time has passed and it’s still looking for a driver.  Be ware and Uber, please work to improve these estimates even if it’s not what the customer wants to hear, trust me we’d rather get an accurate time the first time around.
title: Bad estimates - keeps you waiting

review: I had been using Uber for AT LEAST 5-6 years now and have been loyal to them and their business. Recently the past few experiences have been the worst of my life and to top it off they didn’t do anything or even offer something to make up for the inconveniences. This app and it’s support are always a process and impossible to get what you actually deserve. Lyft is better, cheaper, and consistently on top of their stuff so do yourself a favor and download Lyft.
title: Trash

review: My driver picked up someone else and when I tried calling him to tell him he’s got the wrong person he wouldn’t answer I texted him multiple times I ended up canceling the ride and was still charged for a ride that I wasn’t even on I tried to find a way to report to issue to Uber and get my money back but I couldn’t find an option for it I’m done using Uber I’m now late to work for it
title: He left me behind

review: Would rate ZERO stars if I could . This app is awful ! I was scammed by TWO Uber drivers, and ended up STRANDED after the drivers charged me more than the price shown on the Uber app . When I sought customer support, UBER DID NOTHING , and explained that the original amount was the only amount charged . My card statement says otherwise, my card declined when trying to use it because I was not aware of the ADDITIONAL CHARGES made from the app . Will never use AGAIN .
title: What an awful experience !

review:
Most of captains are not professional and take so much time to arrive! And it’s not smart as when um cancelling a driver because he’s so late and re-request again the same driver takes the trip!!! Thus um cancelling him many times!
And they are requesting all visa-customers which insane!!!
title: WORSET APPLICATION EVER!

review: Skip the hassle and just use rental cars… Very poor customer service for refunds. A car owner canceled on me to no fault of my own and I didn’t receive a full refund initially. So I spent 30min on the phone with an agent all for them to tell me I have to chat with the billing department (can’t talk to billing on the phone) and the person chatting chatted extremely slow. Whole process took an hour of my time to do. Very inefficient and very frustrating experience.
title: Poor Customer Service Refunds

review: I really did not appreciate waiting for so long while I was waiting for a very important event that my daughter was getting married at. I lost out on a very important family memory and I will NEVER get that back. my daughter has since decided never to speak to me again because she thinks I abandoned her. She now has daddy issues and it’s probably going to cheat on her husband. I am the cause of a broken family because of Uber. Thank god Lyft got me to the divorce court.
title: Uber is too slow

review: I’m beyond frustrated . I recently scheduled a ride in advance to LAX airport as I had an early international flight. I received  the confirmation via email the night prior, and in the morning the app sent updates with how soon the driver would arrive. Never arrived and there was not even a cancellation nor a link to a driver. Tried to rebook and no drivers were available . Never again Uber! And unprofessional to not have anyway to contact your company directly!
title: No way to contact directly !

review: They charge me 10% more on rides than my bf. They’ve gotten so expensive it’s ridiculous. They want to charge over $100 for a 33 mile drive sometimes, but if you keep refreshing it, you’ll eventually get to a somewhat doable price. Like that doesn’t even seem right. It’s a scam. They charge you what they know you are willing to pay. Many drivers have switched to lyft because Uber is even unfair to them. A lot of times no drivers are available.
title: Expensive and biased

review:
Had a driver who was initially 20 minutes away, then decided to drive past me, he clearly had no intention of ever picking me up but did not cancel. I couldn’t cancel without incurring a fee. App doesn’t let you review drivers that don’t pick you up so I couldn’t give this rude driver the 0 star review he deserves or give feedback or critique on his poor etiquette. Glad he gets paid less than sweat shop workers in 3rd world countries. Uber fix your app and get better drivers. 

Sincerely,
Karen
title: Horrible

review: I’ve used this app for the longest and I loved it! It’s very reliable and efficient. Need a ride? Uber got you! However recently with the charges going up 10x at least on my app, the prices just for me to go to work is 64$ compare to how it was back then 20$. I don’t mind getting charged more since the pandemic however that’s way to much for one trip that I could have gone spend for groceries at my house! Anyways dissatisfied and switched to Lyft.
title: Switch if this happens to you.

review: I’ve liked Uber for years and never had a problem until they started charging me and my other family members for “Uber pass”. I have never purchased this pass, neither has anyone in my family, but it seems I have been charged for an Uber pass. This also happened to my mother and was hard to resolve. So if anyone downloads Uber I recommend checking your bank account regularly to make sure they don’t charge you, apparently this is common.
title: Charged me for Uber pass

review: It was a rainy night in Austin when Jessica scooped me up at my hotel. She was super courteous and professional … and very sweetly waited for me to enter the venue she dropped me off at before departing. She has great energy, positive vibes, and a wide smile. Can’t thank her enough for looking out for me.
title: Fantastic service!

review: Jose was an amazing driver!  He took us from Norfolk to Hampton’s Homecoming!  The traffic was insane and at a complete standstill!  Jose remained cool, calm, and collective!   A trip that was supposed to take 15 min took an hour!  We were in great hands and wish every Uber driver could be as kind and friendly as Jose!
title: Best Uber Ride!

review:
Drivers are getting screwed, riders are getting screwed, meanwhile Uber is laughing their way to the bank. Try to reserve a ride only to get an error that there are no drivers then re-reserve for twice the price - common occurrence. 
Nobody will help customers fix any problem in real time . My driver do not show up and do not cancel the trip either. Uber chat live support never answer the chat .and if I cancel the ride they will charge you a fee . What a joke .
title: Poor app and service

review: Our Uber driver was so friendly and so nice to be so accommodating! He went out of his way to make sure we’re taken care of in every way. Top notch driver and professional. Thank you so much for the Taco Bell and McDonalds attempt! You’re the best! Very much appreciated!!
title: My best Uber driver ever!

review: This was only the 2nd time I have used a uber but it was a pleasure. Martin was quick to pick me up and very personable. He and I chatted the whole way home. I would call him again for sure! Excellent customer service and very helpful!
title: Martin is Incredible

review: It was our very first time using Uber. Regina was friendly informative and kind. She cares about the customers and she is a hard working woman that loves what she does. We had a very nice and wonderful conversations. Highly recommended her she is very service oriented .
title: Regina was amazing

review: Marie was quick to arrive at the airport and then engaged in interesting conversation along the way. She also gave me tips on when to leave for my return flight in order to not get stuck in traffic.
title: Marie was a wonderful guide

review:
Just because you don’t have any workers at 6am doesn’t mean it’s busy, it just means you don’t pay your workers enough to wake up early. Stop doubling my price to get to school in the morning while my truck is getting repaired.
Also, why can’t I take a round trip? Sorry but I would Ike to go to the grocery store and back. Oh but it’s fine to add multiple stops and have the last one be your house where you got picked up? Totally makes sense.
title: Higher Fares Is Disgusting

review: Welcoming, very professional. Went out of his way to give me a little mini tour while we were driving to the hotel, and explaining where were at. He is truly an asset to Uber and you are could use 20 more Gabrielsen. He was wonderful and put me at ease.
title: L yea

review: Leon was an excellent Uber driver. He was very courteous and polite. He helped us with our baggage and we had a nice conversation during the trip. We shared several stories about our several decades of married life and enjoyed Leon’s company very much. Thank you for the very nice drive.
title: Excellent Uber Driver

review: WARNING. They advertise a competitive rate. You accept the booking. You arrive at destination and they take on: Surge fee, booking fee, access for all fee, CA drivers benefits fee, LAX Surcharge fee. And the worst part is they then ask you to pay % tip to the driver before they send you all these fees AND they base the tip off the final price of everything. STATED AND AGREED PRICE SHOULD BE FINAL PRICE……PREDATORY BAIT AND SWITCH tactics. This company should be reported to the FEDERAL TRADE  COMMISSION. Unethical and just strait up abusive! Long time user now using Lyft from now on. Disgusting,
title: HIDDEN FEES!!! BEWARE!! Uber is going down hill!

review: Completely inaccurate etas, after a rediculous bait and switch tactic where your tide fails to book at a reasonable price then triples when you retry.  The stupid ride scheduling doesn’t work especially if you fly… you can’t select a time you just are at the mercy of whatever stupid time it decides to pick with no regard to the time your plane lands.  I wish I could give zero stars I honestly can’t believe I am saying cabs are better at this point…
title: The biggest scam next to airlines

review: Our driver Juan was very polite. Showed up ahead of time and is  a safe driver. The only thing I did not like in the app I added a charge card and did not know there was going to be s $5.00 fee. No where does if tell you in the app .
title: New customer

review: This was my first UBER ride and I was very impressed. Did a cash tip because didn’t know I could do it after the drop off on the app. Will definitely use UBER again. Cost was acceptable and service was timely.
title: Fast Friendly Service

review: She was very engaging with us as passengers.. She was also sharing her life story with us from her children and her life journey.. I was impressed at her calm demeanor in driving us to our destination which was 40 minutes.. It was very pleasant experience ^^
title: Very pleasant experience !!

review: So I was thinking in 10 to 15 minutes because he picked up. He literally arrive in two minutes which made me early which never happens at any event I ever go to. Cassie was great comfortable and car was super clean. Thank you.
title: So quick

review:
We saw a bear! Totally safe. Chase is the best Uber driver in Missoula hands down. Can’t imagine any other drivers could say that!  

Also it’s not letting me click 5 stars but if there were 6 as an option that would be my choice
title: Excellent ride

review: Christopher was professional and kind, and best of all on time and dependable. We had a nice relaxing ride to the airport thanks to him. He is a great guy that is friendly and makes you feel safe on the way to where you are going.
title: Dependable and safe

review: I thoroughly enjoyed the ride with Matthew. His car was clean. He recognized me immediately he helped with my luggage. He knew the route. He was open to some direction and we arrived safely at my destination, and I appreciated him very much very gentlemanly. I would love to have him again.
title: Matthew

review:
When users pay for priority pickup, it’s no longer priority if you let my ride cycle through 15 drivers and I wait 15 minutes when there’s plenty of drivers around.

Both drivers and riders should have quotas on how many cancels they can perform and my ride receives. Especially if I’m paying more for “preferred” it makes that tier of ride worthless when I am cancelled simply because my ride isn’t “valuable” enough to the pool of drivers.
title: Limit cancelling rides

review: I don’t know the reason for changing of the price ? I choose 57 pounds to the location after he change it to 83 why that’s too much
title: The price change because of where he went to pass very bad driver

review: I wish I would have known that there was an extra fee to reserve a ride. It would be helpful if it were more clear in the app that you were being charged more than double to use that feature. If you are reading this review, now you know.
title: Reserving a ride

review:
For unknown reasons (Construction) Broadway road to 40th street is closed for the second weekend in a row. 
 Restricting bus service to and from the hotels in the middle of that location.
 I think that I will call Uber for my transportation needs from now on.
 Thank you.
title: Long Live Uber!

review: Tanisha was a great Uber driver. It was late, and we were tired. She picked us up from the airport with no delays. Her car was cool, clean and her conversation was great. I would  use her again if I could select a driver and would highly recommend her.
title: Excellent Service All Around

review: Customer service basically nonexistent. No phone number available. Generic response to request for help. Simplest question cannot be taken care of. Was billed for a ride on a date when I hadn’t used the service in a month.  American Express agreed with me and reversed the charge on my bill. Uber gave me the option to pay the charge or have my service blocked from being able to get a ride
title: Better hope you don’t need customer service

review: Wonderful service coming into Jacksonville airport. After a full day of flying with several connections, I really didn’t want to deal with waiting long for a ride home. Service was quick and my driver was very personable.
title: Great experience

review: He came to pick up my sis super late she found a cell in his back seat and turned it in. Hope then phone found his owner. My sis forgot her diaper bag at my place and he was kind enough to turn back for it. Got her home quick and safely. Thank you!!!!!!
title: Thankful

review: He was very prompt, jumped out to assist me with my luggage, called me by name so I knew it was for me.  He car was immaculate.  He made pleasant conversation and got me home in the most expedient and direct route.  I would highly recommend him and I hope I get  him again.
title: Very nice experience:

review: I love how my app was so easily adaptable when I came to Qatar. And the Qatar drivers are better than anyone I’ve seen around the world. Anywhere you go they’re always there to pick you up in less than two minutes.
title: Qatar

review: Such an amazing and sweet person. I would love to get Uber people like him all the time. A sweet soul. An amazing driver. Took my feelings in consideration while driving. Asked me was I comfortable great conversation. Amazing person. I love Uber drivers like this give me more
title: Amazing Driver if I can give him 10 stars I would

review: I use to drive for Uber, today I decided to download the app to drive 12 miles to the airport , they charged me $35 and then added 5 fees which came out to $75 , why are you guys making so much money off of vehicles that aren’t yours? I never got paid that much when I was doing ride share I would get less than half of what you charge customers, this app is a rip off, NY state black car fund? TNC assessment fee? Reservation fee and booking fee and an airport fee, complete garbage
title: Rip off

review: Kevin was the absolute best!!!!! I have not used Uber for quite a while. He was so wonderful great driver great personality great everything I really hope I see him again and I hope he gets home safely. Thank you so much Kevin, you turn the big day into a good one. All the best, Debra Bader
title: Kevin was the Best!!!!!

review: I use Uber a lot to get to work and I like it, but there is one problem that I find annoying. Sometimes it takes FOREVER to find a ride or it says it found one but it has to “finalize driver details” which takes like 20 minutes.
title: Only one problem

review:
Our driver, Lawrence showed up quickly and on time. He was friendly and informative. We asked him questions about the city, weather, etc., and he was happy to accommodate us with great info. 
This was a very pleasant Uber experience!
title: Unered in Austin: it wasn’t weird.

review:
Outside of a phone problem at the get go with our driver, Arthur did a very fine job. Helped with all the luggage at both ends & got us safely to our hotel from LAX through some very busy rush hour traffic. Much Appreciated. 
Thank You
title: Excellent Service

review:
Every time I order Uber Eats something goes wrong. 

This last time they forgot my drink, I contacted support for a refund on the drink and delivery fee so that I could order my drink again and THREE CUSTOMER SERVICE AGENTS HUNG UP ON ME. Their responses were slow, unbelievably rude and unprofessional. I shouldn’t have to pay $10 for a $3 drink that was left out on your end. I’ve been a loyal customer for nearly 5 years and will no longer be using Uber eats after this experience, neither should you.
title: HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE

review: First time ever Uber   from Oakland airport to the city of Matika. I had to pick up a car and I’m here in business for three days. The driver made it very pleasant. Easy to talk to good head on your shoulders. I recommend this driver to anybody just pleasant thank you again.
title: A Good all around young man

review: I have a family of 5 and went on a vacation we ordered an Uber at the airport to get to our hotel. The driver showed up and said he couldn’t fit us.
