This cancellation cost me $5 because he didn’t have enough room. The next day we wanted to get from the hotel to the carnival port for our cruise and the same thing happen this time it cost me $15. If your going to advertise you fit 6 people you should be able to fit 6 people and luggage.
title: False advertising

review: I believe the Uber algorithm has changed. I take it every day some days they only charge me higher on places it knows  I go to every day. For instants, I’ll put in my job at 5 AM and Uber will say it’s busy at the time so rates are higher-but if I put in a location maybe a mile away or even less the price will be cheaper seems a bit sketchy
title: Shady algorithm

review: I have a credit card through which I get benefits on Uber. I can’t add this credit card on Uber. I have been contacting Uber since weeks to resolve this issue. They are not solving this issue and now they are just telling me that they are unable to add my payment method. They keep giving similar unhelpful answers without actually telling me what the real issue is. Extremely unhelpful customer service and a waste of time!
title: Refusing to add my payment method and associated benefits

review: Thank you for being patient and finding us though we were a little further from the corner. He went the extra mile and we are grateful. Thank you again!
title: Thank you for being awesome!

review: I messaged multiple times to the help center. No one has replied. It does not show in my ride history the charge amount but it shows in my banking account that it was charged over 250$. I never took a ride that cost that much. Especially in the area I’m in. I’ve used Uber for so long and I haven’t had any problems until now. It’s been over 2 days without a message from them.
title: Charged my account for a ride I never asked or input to the app.

review: I requested a ride paid $60 the driver drove past the pick up location never sat and waited although my people were outside driver never called or communicated anything you cant call Uber the number is only for drivers and it took 20+ tries to log into app just to find there is no live support agent and although driver cancelled on me i was still charged $6.25 and your bank holds the money for the ride you didn't receive for a week what gives Uber?
title: HORRIBLE SERVICE

review: I booked a friend a ride home. Now I can’t book myself a separate ride home. Maybe I can, but the interface isn’t easy enough to figure out how.. The only thing I can figure out how to do is cancel my friend’s ride or wait until they get home and then book myself another ride.. that’s poor functionality. Figure it out Uber, you’re supposed to be the app w this stuff
title: Poor functionality

review:
John was an amazing driver! Friendly, courteous and just a genuine pleasure 😁.  The music was perfect.  Not loud and annoying.  His car was CLEAN (most important). He offered water, candy mints and a cell phone charger 🔌, which was very helpful after getting off the plane.  

Wonderful experience.
title: Review

review: What a great ride to the airport.  I was here on business and did not get to see much.   However on the ride to the airport Maria made sure to point out some great locations on what's to come.   I will come back to do the tourist stuff one day.    Than you Maria for a great ride.
title: Maria was amazing

review: After spending over 1,000 dollars in Uber they banned me for no reason and never gave me a actually reason I’m here in Brazil traveling the world and they banned me because “the driver said I lied and that I didn’t speak they’re language!” Uber still hasn’t lifted my account and I hope that they shut down and know how racist and discriminating they are to majority of they’re customers same thing happened to 2 friends of mine ! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND YOU DONT USE UBER PLEASE !
title: Uber is a app go racism and discrimination

review: I took the train from Detroit to Milwaukee. My hotel was extremely close from the train station and I thought no one would want to take the route but Joseph did. He was very professional and accommodating considering it was six of us with lots of luggage 😂😂
title: Joseph

review: Mohammad was absolutely amazing… His conversation was perfect, his driving was perfect, and he didn’t have any music on which was an added bonus, because we had just landed at the airport, and we really wanted some peace…Thanks for sharing your best driver with US!!
title: Mohammed

review: Jonathan was great. This was my first Uber ride, from the hospital no less. He was prompt, super friendly, and definitely patient with me in explaining the app and Uber’s service, even after I accidentally logged in the wrong return address. Thank you Jonathan!! God Bless!
title: My first ever Uber!

review: 6 miles, $42. I didn’t have another option so fine. It tells me my driver will be 7 minutes away. After confirming purchase, it spend 2 minutes “searching” for a driver. Then it gave me one 18 mins away. After that driver stayed in the same spot for 6 minutes I messaged him “Hi, when can I expect you to be on your way? I’m already running late.” He canceled the ride. Then got another one 22 mins away. This was very frustrating.
title: Worst experience with transportation
developerResponse: {'id': 15151659, 'body': "Hi, we understand your trouble with the Uber credits. Let's make sure we follow up with you regarding this. Send in a quick note to t.uber.com/contact and we'll connect.", 'modified': '2020-05-07T06:56:56Z'}

review: Driver was prompt and an excellent driver.  Only problem was the evening before I noticed that the wrong pick-up address was listed.  No customer service number to be found!  The driver found me however
title: My Uber ride today!

review: I left my phone in the car and the driver was very kind and drove back to the airport where he dropped me off and returned my phone. I had no way to contact him, but he saw it and came back to return it. Thank You
title: Great special Service

review: I love the different options under the Uber umbrella (i.e. Uber Eats, Uber Travel, Uber Rental, Uber Reserve, etc.)—no complaints! I like this app better than Lyft—I’ve found that the prices are more competitive [less expressive rides] as well, so that’s obviously a HUGE PLUS! Lol
title: Easy to navigate & Functional!

review: Uber is pretty good over all just make sure you’re at the correct pickup spot before you request , sometimes the app will automatically put you at the wrong pickup spot and it won’t allow you to change it once you request
title: Over all pretty good and useful

review:
Flight was delayed and it was almost midnight. Thanks much to courteous drivers like Lamin as he was available to bring us to our destination post flight. I had a mask on, coughing on and off and Lamin showed concern on how he could help. 
Keep safe and keep driving Lamin!
title: Bless u Laminnn

review:
Carlos was an amazing driver and very friendly. On the way to the airport he was almost like a tour guide . We talked about different areas we were passing by, explains the history of the country. He gets a gold medal and ten stars
Thank you Carlos from our group
👍👍👍👍👍
title: Trip to the airport

review: Two issues - (1) can’t change destination within a trip even if just a 1/2 mile away. (2) new version of app makes it so you end up double tipping! After you rate and tip next time app starts it asks you to rate and tip again without checking if you already did so. Who knows how much Uber skims off of this. Would rather hand money to drivers directly.
title: App service options are poor
developerResponse: {'id': 8473692, 'body': 'Hi, we can always look into this issue for you. Please send a quick note to t.uber.com/contact so we can follow up with you. Also, have you tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app? Be sure to do this for the best usage of the uber app.', 'modified': '2019-05-02T08:50:08Z'}

review: Just arrive last week on my boat in the marina del rey harbor so not familiar with surface streets. He came to Trader Joes to get me and a whole lot of groceries, including a case of wine. He knew just what back street to cut into to get me closest to my gate. Then carried the heavy stuff all the way to my gate. Great driver!
title: Super extra helpful

review: I don’t think Uber is giving the drivers a fair shake. I paid $12. in fees, and you’re still wanting me to give the driver a tip! I paid a Booking Fee, and I’m the one who is doing the booking? All the extra charges that go directly to the company, should go to the one who is actually doing the work who is driving for you because they have a family to feed! I’m definitely going to be looking for another way to travel. I don’t like your business practices.
title: Rider

review: Our driver was one of a kind … we were going to union station and he made sure to drop  us next to our grayhound bus so that we wouldn’t walk 10 minutes. He saved us time and energy thanks to Fredies… gracias … happy new year
title: Best and considerate Uber driver

review: Thank you! For getting me home safely. Best Uber driver I’ve had. He was showed up pretty fast. He made leg room for me ( I am 6’5) in the back seat, by pulling the passenger seat forward. His music was perfect and not crazy loud. His car is very spacious and clean. Thank you again.
title: Amazing Driver

review: The ride share has changed our lifestyle and made it turn key! As a consumer I get to socialize with various drivers from different places, countries, and unique life experiences. It goes beyond understanding daily challenges!
title: How Uber has changed consumer experience!

review:
I used Uber very often and I cannot believe how little your drivers earn compare to what we, the users, paid for the ride!
If you want your company to keep going, keep your employees happy!
Eva Canovas
title: Uber should pay their drivers more

review: My driver, Ronald was only five minutes away. I got to my destination in about 15 minutes and the price was reasonable. He was very pleasant and the ride was very good. He was a very safe driver. I would recommend him to anyone. Thank you for your good service.
title: First Uber ride

review: What a nice man!  We had gotten in very late from Boston, and we were completely exhausted. Mohamadou quickly observed how weary we were as we approached his car.  He immediately got out of his car, greeted us, and GENTLY placed our luggage in his car.  Thanks!
title: Friendly and Very Courteous!!!!!

review: I love when Uber is true to price and distance. My driver was perfect in all aspect. And luckily he didn’t try to con the system by charging me wait time that never occurred. That’s the only thing I despise from the change. But all in all Uber is on point.
title: Quickness

review: Took an Uber to my mechanic that has been in the same location for years. Address shown was correct and then showed differently once picked up. Off by 5 miles and different part of town. Then ordered the same Uber to the same place and it took me to the right place. The automated help won’t let you report such issues. It only lets you complain about their drivers. Typical modern day exploitation of the poor.
title: Wrong addresses for business

review: I ordered an Uber for my mom.  My mom is a senior, a lady who is not tech or cell phone savvy.  The driver send me a message on behalf of her and I couldn’t get to it immediately.   When I finally had the opportunity to read my message, I couldn’t find the message. The ride was still on transit.  I feel these messages should remain active while the duration of the ride the very least! Very disappointed at Uber!
title: Messages erased

review:
In the span of four minutes, while trying to understand how Uber works, I apparently booked and then cancelled a trip from home to the airport.  I was simply trying to understand the app.  It had already allowed me to schedule the date and time to support my actual need (10:40am, Dec 5, 2022).  This had been verified by my driver.  So…the charge isn’t fair.
Please, remove this charge/hold on my card.  I’m 70 years young; I’m not the smartest tool, but clearly this is a mistake.

Thanks!
title: Crazy Charge

review:
My address is entered correctly in the app.
Thank goodness I can track drivers!
They are never sent to my address !
Last week driver was sent to southeast instead of northeast! I even txted please please double 
My address and sent my correct address and my correct address shows up in your gps and my account . Your gps is never correct 🤷🏻‍♀️
title: GPS

review: I am mad at how Uber ride is allowed to go back into your account and take other amount . Off your card. I was struggling to get to work , I did Uber three days earlier. You all take my last 4 dollars . I couldn’t get home , I don’t like it ! I am struggling! F
title: Cash App

review: Uber is great for quick trips, the drivers are 99% of the time friendly & accomodating! My #1 issue with Uber is paying the drivers 20% of the trip and Uber being greedy and taking 80%. The drivers are literally putting the miles on they're vehicles, insuring them, maintaining them & risking one's life daily with driving crazies around.  We won't even talk about gas price increases. Uber DO BETTER for your drivers.
title: Uber in general

review: Their drivers would purposefully go to the wrong pick up spot, and wait until he or you cancel so they can get the cancellation fee. Even when you are lucky enough to get credited back the cancellation fee, they give you store credit, NOT real cash. Their customer service is also horrible there is no way to reach out to them directly. It’s also quite dangerous especially if there is an emergency situation.
title: Uber takes advantages of unwanted cancellation fees

review: I recently went on a trip where unfortunately I had to use Uber to get around. My bank statement showed multiple charges from Uber. As a result, my card was locked because of apparent fraud. Uber is an inconvenience if you are traveling. I couldn’t use my card since the available balance was low. The only nice experience I had using Uber were the drivers. Very nice and compassionate.
title: Never again

review: Overall a good app in terms of getting a ride and completing the transaction. Recently it’s started sending annoying advertising notifications. I don’t really need reminded that Uber exists because I use it regularly. Unfortunately there is no way to keep useful notifications and disable the ads.
title: Annoying notifications
developerResponse: {'id': 32788765, 'body': "Hi, We're extremely sorry to hear about your concern regarding your recent experience. This is certainly something we'd want to deep dive into. For us to be able to resolve your concern, fill in your details here: https://bit.ly/343HNsE. We shall get back to you at the earliest.", 'modified': '2022-10-26T04:50:11Z'}

review:
I have been trying to post a review and it won’t even show up after trying to post multiple times. Uber knows they are being hacked and compromised and have done NOTHING.

My account was hacked. Uber after 5 days of sending them emails and trying to get help HAS NOT RESPONDED TO ANY REQUESTS. The hacker is still using my account and now my credit card has been compromised because of their lack of action. Terrible company with terrible customer service.
title: Uber is scamming

review: I don’t suggest ever driving for this trash company. They are extremely cheap. & one day you might wake up and all your promotions are gone & replaced with a 1.1x boost. Absolutely garbage service this company provides to both its drivers & customers.
title: Rip-Off Artists

review: Received a receipt after Uber updated my trip 10 weeks after I took the ride. I’ve used Uber for years and never had this experience. They claim it’s from a booth used in route and the driver is able to manually enter at any time with verification. I don’t like that they are able to update my charge at any time without notice or approval. Will only be using Lyft from now on.
title: Deleted

review: I ordered my food and it said it was going to come at a reasonable time. It said it came but i never got the food, also took a long time too figure out how too get my money back. Lucky a very nice representative helped us and finally got my money back. I highly suggest not using the app.
title: Do not use

review: Can’t disable Uber eats promo notifications without turning off all Uber notifications. This is not user friendly. Also, there is no way to contact support about this.
title: No way to disable promo notifications

review: I had two Uber drivers keep me waiting 15 minutes before cancelling on me. I totally get unexpected events come up or they don’t want to drive out to my destination but don’t keep me waiting and then cancel when I have an appointment I need to get to. The key issue is there’s no real disincentive for them to do this, no hard penalty while I’m charged 5 dollars if I do this from my side. Uber isn’t keeping things equal that’s their choice and their problem.
title: Two canceled rides

review: I dislike rating of customer or driver. We are all imperfect human beings. I dislike price surging- give one price and don’t play games. I have been exploring other ride options, although I will use Uber as a last resort.
title: Stop ratings and price surging.

review: I removed 1 payment method so that I could put my new card on the account, and when I go to do so it never lets me back? The payment method screen is blank. I can’t put a new form of card on there or even my old one that was on there before. Now the app is completely useless untill I can put a new card on there. I deleted the app, reinstalled it and signed back in, and it still doesn’t work
title: Wow!

review: Been using Uber for almost 6 years now, I’ve noticed the company steadily increases their cost to use the service, while your local taxi business is probably a better option. I noticed Uber drivers manipulate the wait time fee by the time they arrive, the company should take away this fee for diamond and up memberships.
title: Overall

review: Normally I give Uber five stars. But not today. It is my best friends birthday and he invited me to go to dinner with him and his family. We are supposed to meet AT 5! I ordered an Uber who was three minutes away and he canceled. Three more Ubers canceled on me. And now I’m going to be late! I have never had this problem with Uber before. But I am very disappointed with my experience.
title: Pickup time

review: I ordered Uber eats late at night and we waited 40 minutes as our order was “on the way.” After 40 minutes the order got cancelled and we received no text or notification that it was somehow cancelled. So not only did we wait and did not receive food, no other places were open to order from because of the wait. Ridiculously unreliable. I sent a complaint to Uber. If they fix it I’ll change the review.
title: Uber eats is not reliable

review: They never tell us about the Uber drivers who have kidnapped and murdered their passengers. I just spent watching a case were the driver modified his vehicle to when you get in all of the doors and windows remotely lock and the passenger can’t get out. He stabbed his passenger 100 times and dumped her body in a forest. Uber does a lousy job doing a criminal background check on their drivers. It’s definitely clear sign that women are not safe when it comes to Uber, Lyft or any other ride services.
title: Be careful

review: I’ve had to cancel Ubers multiple times because they take to long to arrive, I can wait 10-20 min but usually it’s longer than what it says. They charge you a fee if you cancel and I cancel within 1-3 min and it still ends up charging me. In my opinion Lyft is better, they’re cheaper, more convenient and get here on time. Also Uber takes 50% of what you pay and the other 50% goes towards the driver. All in all it’s good maybe a quarter of the time.
title: Garbage
developerResponse: {'id': 14772585, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about your experience with the ETA and cancelation. To look into this further, please contact our support team at t.uber.com/contact and we'll take it up from there.", 'modified': '2020-04-20T06:40:53Z'}

review: On October 22nd I tried use a discount from the points I had gotten for 20% a comfort ride I never got to use the discount it took my points but have no discount so I contacted support about it they just said “well according to our servers you did get it” then ended the chat so I couldn’t respond, but that was my problem that the app said I had the discount but didn’t give it to me not only did they not help they stopped me from even asking for help. I’d give zero if I could
title: Don’t use Uber

review: Used an uber gift card and they also charged my card for the same amount ended up spending 160 dollars on a 25 minute drive! Please use at ur own risk because uber won’t respond to my ticket nor will the driver! Be safe out there
title: Use lyft

review: So we was stuck at Hershey park and we could not find an oober so we downloaded this app and we was happy because we could get back hime it was cheap so download this app if you have no car or if you get stuck and they are very nice so thank you!
title: Hershey park

review: I had no idea Uber was still searching for drivers after I shut the app down. There was no way to stop the app from searching for drivers so I thought closing it would stop it. So a driver got matched meanwhile I was using another service to find a driver.
title: Matched me after I closed the app

review:
I was stood up twice this week by Uber. I was at the Spa and called for a ride and the driver was coming , and giving me regular updates, until all of a sudden he canceled the pickup. The Spa was quite crowded so all the clients watched me, sitting on the sofa, waiting for my ride, so the cancellation was witnessed by many women and men. A neighbor brought me home.
I’m currently looking for alternate transportation and guarantee that your reputation was damaged. 
You pretend to be the answer to transportation but that is only “window dressing” you are a joke
title: A joke

review: I ordered a car to pick me up and after being texted that he was on his way he canceled out and I still had to pay almost $9 and order another car. This was the first time ever doing Uber, I live on the 21st floor, so I have to wait for an elevator I am a senior with cancer, wasn’t feeling well on my way for treatment and Driver just cancels. He couldn’t wait 5 freaking minutes. Never again. I want a refund. Very disappointed. How do I go about getting a refund??
title: Didn’t wait

review: After using Ubers in emergencies I find that it's not a affordable trips with just one person in  the vehicle it should be added if you can set the number of passengers traveling with you so you can have more affordable prices however I understand Uber needs to pay it's drivers but we have to be aware of prices and different times of the day. I would be ok if $10 per passengers makes sense
title: Not affordable

review:
The app has issues. Occasionally, the application puts the wrong pick-up location. Yesterday, I encountered another problem. I scheduled a drive for 3:35 pm, however, a driver was coming to pick me up at 3:04 pm.
 Besides, it's a good service, which I use for getting to my job.
title: Reliable transportation for getting to my job

review: Customer said we vomited in his car which we did not, and uber charged me $150 on his claim alone and no way to get a refund, his word against mine. They showed me a wet seat with a wet rag on it, no vomit, no cleaning receipt, and it was daylight when we rode at night.  Customer service said it’s nothing they can do, all they require are photos from the driver.  Found out It happens often because drivers know uber aides with them. Go save your money.
title: Made to protect the drivers not the customers
developerResponse: {'id': 5658155, 'body': "Hi, this certainly sounds frustrating. The feedback from our riders is vitally important to us, and we always want their expectations to be met. Let us know more about it by dropping the details at t.uber.com/contact and we'll connect.", 'modified': '2018-10-25T09:05:28Z'}

review:
Even when wearing a mask, drivers take off and cancel rides, then Uber emails me that I wasn’t wearing a mask, BUT:

“If your trip was canceled when you were in fact wearing a face cover or mask, we are sorry for that inconvenience. Please contact us through Help and let us know”

So you go to Help and find there’s actually no way to do that! However, I could claim the driver wasn’t wearing a mask, delete the app and use Lyft to get to where I need to go instead.
title: Wear a mask, drivers still cancel rides

review: I am debating of giving drivers a bad rating because of the app, which would be unfair to the drivers but it might be necessary for the app developers to fix GPS discrepancies between driver and customer. The app insists that my location is somewhere where I am not and even if I change it on my end the driver picking me up has me at the location of the app, again not where I am physically located. This is a reoccurring issue.
title: Fix your GPS so it matches the driver and the customer

review: And oftentimes the rides are expensive even when  there’s no traffic, I’ve been late to work multiple times already because of bad driver practices like accepting while finishing a ride and the canceling 20 minutes later when it’s my turn or canceling right when they get to my location. There’s always higher than normal prices now too which means it’s inaccessible most of the time to even get a ride.
title: Drivers can cancel too often
developerResponse: {'id': 12313094, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about your experience. We want to look into this for you. Mind sharing more details about it with a specific incident? It'll help us investigate further.", 'modified': '2019-12-10T09:26:51Z'}

review: It’s not fair how, that if a driver passes you because he wasn’t paying attention and then cancels the trip. How they don’t get penalized! But  if passengers cancel, we get penalized! This is absolutely not fair! This practice implies that Uber drivers time is more valuable than the passengers! Especially when the passengers have to wait another 12min for another driver to arrive! This happened to me today!
title: Why we get penalized but drivers don’t??

review: Uber has disappointed me so many times. Terrible customer service, rude and unsafe drivers , and not to mention that I once received a very rude phone call from them asking me strange questions with some accusations of misbehavior that were completely false. When they realized that they had made a mistake they never even apologized for that phone call and how they handled this. I use other ride share apps now and I’m so much happier even if they are only a few dollars more.
title: Very disappointing and unprofessional

review: Uber has a habit of having prices fluctuate between $8-$20 for a 10 minute drive. Now while I can see that as some what reasonable due to a fluctuating number of drivers and times of high activity, I cannot accept the fact that there are often times that beyond that after confirming pickup and drop off, it decides to drop a “Due to high activity” with the fee being multiplied by between 3 to 6 times. Now again I’d understand if they hadn’t already increased the price for that reason.
title: Prices unreasonably variable

review: Used Uber for the first time in a while, and no exaggeration, 75% of the map screen was covered with Uber boxes that are utterly useless and you have no ability to hide. How am I supposed to see where my driver is and when they’ll be arriving when you guys cover my screen in all this nonsense? Your designers should actually try to catch a ride using their UX before they push it live.
title: Fix the UI

review: Thank you Noe for taking me home even though my phone was dead and I change the address at the last minute, and for it being my first ride, ( which was very hectic) I am glad you got me home. Thank you
title: Thank you

review: You also cannot change the destination of your ride after the fact if you have an iPhone. And if you try to find a number to talk to a human, you will be out of luck. Just what service exactly does Uber provide? It’s an algorithm, and there is no customer service. I’m done with Uber until these things change.
title: Customer service does not exist on iphone

review: Drivers are getting less and less polite every time, they forget about the fact they providing a transportation service and then they start making demands as if they were the passenger paying for the service, they’re taking to a total different level “being their own boss”.
title: Drivers

review:
This was my first time getting a ride from Uber 
The driver was very knowledgeable of how things worked and answered my questions that I had about Uber.
I didn’t know what to expect but I was pleased with the driver she was very pleasant and made me feel welcomed
title: Excellent driver

review: Driver Omar provides his clients with outstanding customer service. He is very respectful and  professional. He drives safely and caters to his customers needs. I give Omar a 5 star review. Book with Omar of you want to have a safe ride to your destination
title: Outstanding Customer Service

review: Very professional, polite, & safe driver. Luis had very positive energy and a maintains a very professional appearance both as a person and his vehicle. He takes pride in the service he provides to customers. Would ride with again!
title: Excellent Service

review: i’ve been using uber for over 5 years, uber used to be an amazing experience back in the day. now every uber ride, I have to wait more than 5 minutes to find a driver and another 5+ minutes for them to arrive. They they don’t even lower the price or refund some money back considering the wait time but if we take more than a minute to go outside and meet the driver then we get charged extra wait time. crazy
title: terrible wait time

review: This was my first experience with Uber & wasn’t sure what to expect. My driver Buruzie was great! He came early & waited for me. Also God sent me a driver who was very careful & had my radio station on before I got in the car! I will definitely use Uber again.
title: Great Service!

review: I called an Uber share the other day. The driver picked me up and there were no other riders. The fare I had agreed to pay was a little over $10 and the fare I actually paid was over $27!!! We did get stuck in traffic and the ride was a little longer than normal, same distance and route about 2 miles. This price discrepancy is ridiculous and Uber help is impossible to get a hold of.
title: How is it okay to charge more than twice the price of the fare I accepted!?

review: You guys need to implement a new policy where the moment the driver arrives at the pick up destination they indicate so or the system automatically sends a message to the person who requested the ride. It’s hard sometimes to distinguish if they’ve arrived because some won’t say anything and it’s a street full of cars. I have had rides canceled because on the map it says there still reaching destination and the driver won’t say anything. It’s frustrating.
title: Arrival Policy

review:
The first driver that we got it said it would cost $37. + then it came across canceled 
The next driver was at a different location 
The next driver we called, he said the address was different than where we lived, I don’t know who notified these drivers of the address but it was wrong and he said we put in the wrong address.  We do know where we live.
Well we did make it to our destination but not without much pressure to make our flight.
Then instead of the cost being &37. + it cost is $66. +
Charlie Dugan
title: Drivers

review: I read a little bit about John and it says he picked up and dropped of 3000🙀 ppl in 13 yrs his rate was a 4⭐️🌟 he drove a van/ cute van. I was on the phone the whole 7 mins! And he got me their quick and fast and picked me up quick and fast as well.
title: John ( Uber driver )

review: This Uber driver that picked me up was so nice and so friendly and drove very nicely. He was just a very very good person and it was a pleasure to ride in his vehicle to be his 10,000 ride. Please give him a raise he deserves it. I wish him good luck and good fortune, and good health in his life and many more happy rides.
title: Very nice driver

review:
With a professional and conscientious driver- Uber is simply GREAT.
On time, efficient and safe.
I only wish Uber would weed-out those drivers who say they would come and the cancel at the last minute!
Remember- reliability is paramount in this line of business.🌷
title: Great choice

review: After my 1st driver cancelled. I thought I was going to be late being my first ride I panicked. But the app guided me through scheduling another ride. My driver came. He was so friendly. Nicholas made me feel comfortable being in the car with a Stranger.
title: My first ride with Uber.

review: I was planning a pick up for the airport and was told nothing available now. I canceled ss i needed a ride at that time  You charged me For cancelation. This is wrong. I dont know where else to go to vent. You make communication about these things difficult
title: Judith Rowley

review: This was a very wonderful driver my dog was super anxious.  He did his best and I was so appreciative of his kindness and his service. We had a long 2 and half hour drive  from the Bay Area. He stopped a few time to help me with the dog. He was great and I can not thank him enough!
title: Long drive

review: Jose was very respectful towards my wife. He helped us with our bags and put them in the back of his vehicle and we conversated and all the way back to my destination. You guys need more like Jose, and I wish they had some more Jose’s in Tennessee, where I currently reside.
title: Excellent driver

review: I had a wonderful conversation with my driver me made me feel comfortable, it’s almost like I’ve known him since high school! All around great experience will definitely recommend Uber to all my friends and family, thanks Daniel
title: My trip home

review: Awesome experience. I put in the wrong destination. Took care of me didn’t leave. Took me to the correct location and was very polite and professional through everything. Can’t say thank you enough.
title: Best service

review:
What a wonderful way to start the day❤️Gil was amazing and calm and help you calm down and relax and enjoy the ride to the airport. Light conversation, nice, clean comfortable vehicle ride. He arrived early and waited patiently and I was able to get off promptly.
When I return, I would love to request Gil.
Thank you.
Karen Fletcher
title: Uber driver Gil

review: I spent 40 minutes waiting on a ride to work this morning. One driver accepted and sat still for 20 minutes. I texted her to ask what was going on and she said that she had a flat tire. I then asked why wouldn’t she cancel the ride in that case, which she did 5 minutes later. After that, I was unable to get any driver. My account searched for 40 minutes. I called Uber, the reps were extremely rude and unhelpful and hung up on me three times.
title: Service is declining

review: Do not sign up for membership with Uber! They will downright make it impossible for you to cancel your membership when you want to especially because the membership isn’t even worth it. There’s supposed to be an “end subscription “ button but it doesn’t appear and a lot of people are facing the same problem. It’s even more difficult because they don’t have realible customer care that’s why I’m writing this review!
title: Membership Scam

review: My sister and I are traveling with our 80 year old parents… after landing at the airport in Denver we were waited on and catered to in a family style fashion. The SUV is clean and he is a very safe driver! Greatly appreciate his patience with our group! Blessings 💜💙🙏🏽
title: Wonderful experience!

review: Thank you for being so kind and considerate of my feelings I was very nervous after having a horrible lift experience… He was even so kind as to take me the route the other driver was possibly going to show me it is safe and faster
title: Calmed my nerves

review: The driver was very polite , and kind. I went up the road for something so simple and he was patient and didn’t make me feel uncomfortable, definitely would book again thanks again
title: Very kind

review: Today was great. I know that some days are better than others. I’ve been dealing with Uber for about four or five years however, my ride today with Stevon was very wholesome, and I appreciate that thank you Uber. In the name of our Lord and Savior, Jesus Christ, God bless glory be to God.
title: Greatest

review: In the past few years I’ve been using the app, it’s never been this bad before, and it’s only getting worse. Matching with a driver can take up to 30 minutes at this point, and reserving a ride still costs over 400% more than a regular ride. Support alternative apps at this point. Uber is unsustainable and so is Lyft. All they do is overcharge passengers and underpay drivers, and the cut they take only gets bigger and bigger.
title: Wait times more inaccurate than ever

review:
Pedro was a pleasure to have as our driver to the airport after a big family reunion here in NC. He was early and told us to take our time saying goodbye to everyone before we left He was respectful and very pleasant on our hour ride to RDU.
Thank you Pedro and thank you Uber!
title: P Day, therapist

review: Tried to cancel reservation trip, app wouldn’t let me do it, next day reservation came, airport I wasn’t at no longer at because Uber ride was yesterday to my destination, not the next day, so I was charged for two trips, one they gave me and one that app wouldn’t let me cancel, they need to set up phone number to talk to someone to assure this problem doesn’t happen, technology is great but not perfect, sometimes a discussion is required
title: App wasn’t working properly

review: Khaled was amazing! I’ve never used Uber before and had a lot of anxiety about getting into a stranger’s car. Khaled was so friendly, kind, & caring he instantly put me at ease. The ride was safe and conversation flowed naturally. I’m so grateful Khaled chose to pick me up and help me in my travels! Thank you!
title: Tampa, FL - Khaled

review: My driver started taking me to my destination and I was tired so I fell asleep well we hit a bump in the road and I woke up realizing that we weren’t going to my destination we were going to an a abandoned house i asked him where we were and he said shut up and be quiet well I got scared I’m a 15 year old girl and I didn’t have service so I unlocked the door jumped out the car and run as fast as I could go I got way but don’t get lifts for strangers NEVER using Uber again !!!!!!!
title: Kidnapping

review:
Had car emergency and it was imperative that I get to work a very short distance from my house
Sherries was very pleasant and got me there, even though the trip was not of high value. Thanks for making a stressful moment, less so.
title: Car emergency-

review: After cataract surgery my eye pressure reached a dangerous level. I couldn’t drive to get my emergency eye drops. Mark picked me up in less than 15 minutes and took me to my pharmacy to get my emergency eye drops. Mark was very kind and listened to my frightening problem. Thank you
title: Medical emergency medicine

review: I know this is Uber and everything but I had to share my experience of perfection. Never better. Were there when I counted on them and kind and courteous on the way home. God bless you and all you do.
title: Excellent service

review: Our driver was helpful when at the last minute we lost our bag and he was patient with us as we looked . We found it and we’re only behind schedule 10 minutes. Thanks
title: Helpful

review: Love the ability to schedule a pick up the night before a very early flight.  And appreciated the accuracy of the app in allowing me to choose my exact pick up location. Thanks!
title: Scheduled pick up super easy

review:
He made me feel comfortable and welcomed.
I would use Jerry again if I could figure out how to request him. 
If you would let him know that Charles (my husband) said thank you and he was so happy to see me.
Thank you so much Jerry!!!!
title: Jerry is a pleasure to have as driver

review: UberX says 6 minutes away…not bad. So you click on it.  Then, your ride is 12 minutes away and getting further away.   Fix the algorithm—you can’t seriously be wrong by double?!?! This happens all the time.  I end up canceling more than riding. The other app’s wait times are reliable.
title: Wait times are rarely accurate

review: Great service with a smile and personality!!!  Left a cell phone and didn’t realize it, but few minutes later, Ana showed up bringing the phone after parking and finding us in the food court to return the phone, Hallelujah!!!
title: Above & Beyond!!!

review: Absolutely sweet and generous guy. I have an injury to my knee so I can’t do much and he made sure my luggage 🧳 was in the vehicle he got me to my destination and went inside the hotel and tried to find a push buggy for my luggage. Highly recommended for a future Driver.
title: Generous

review:
Honestly what the heck Uber?! You guys need to connect with Waze app since they have more updates that you guys do on what’s going on around the cities. You guys just make directions for the drivers meanwhile the drivers don’t know what’s going on around them on what street has a parade going on, what street is closed and etc. 
You guys need to have more update on that so people can get to the places that they’re heading to on time
title: You guys need to connect with Waze app

review: I really like Uber. I’m a very quiet person and I don’t like to socialize much but the drivers I get they do talk and they keep you entertained while you are with them and I like that. There aren’t that many nice people in the world anymore. Thanks Uber for picking nice people.
title: Quiet rides

review: I was in a very desolate area and was creeped out walking alone.  Fortunately I saw a shop that was getting ready to close, but was able to duck inside for enough time to download the Uber app and locate a ride.  Very thankful for my Uber ride - I was safely delivered to my door.
title: So grateful for Carlos

review:
My only complaint was the strong smell of smoke in the Uber.  That’s a problem for me and many others.  
I’m sure there’s nothing you can do about that - but perhaps when one signs up for an Uber, mention can be made on “the contract”.
title: Review:

review: Be careful not reliable at all, you will be at the mercy of the drivers move and driving route he is planning to take for his personal agendas! Not only that but also your things will be stolen and will never be returned never. Stay away you have way way better options in Abu Dhabi. There is Careem and abu dhabi taxi who can make sure whatever urgent drive or thing you want to deliver or buy are done for you just like your personal drivers.
title: Uber never again in UAE

review: I couldn’t have picked a better Uber driver.  Kia was wonderful to talk to.  She helped when I had a long distance drop off.  We had a lot to talk about.  I told her all about AZ we had a lot to talk about & I was very satisfied with her service. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
title: Best Uber I’ve Had The Pleasure Of Riding With

review: Danny in a blue Nissan Versa in Jackson, Tn is awesome! He’s friendly, polite, had a clean car and is a safe driver. His car, as soon as I got in, was a delightful experience for my nose. He’s got the cleanest looking and smelling car East of the Mississippi. I hope I get him next time I order an Uber. He’s delightfully kind.
title: Danny in Jackson, TN is awesome

review: Driver was supposed to be 4 minutes away. Waited 15, then had to call only to be told to cancel the trip. Second driver deployed 11 more minutes wait, but Clifford was fantastic in saving me time once he was able to rescue things for me. Should have a way to cancel trips if they’re a no show sooner.
title: Challenges with getting to airport on time

review: I scheduled an Uber from the airport after a long haul flight. I used the travel schedule feature well in advance because it’s a 2.5 - 3 hour drive to my home and no driver would pick that ride up at random. When I arrived (on time), I went to collect my bag and discovered the driver had canceled the ride 5 minutes before I landed. There was no explanation, no one else was there instead, I was just left at 9pm in a random city hours away from home.
title: Left stranded

review: We use Uber with our child and use a car seat. Many drivers cancel but we always find one. When I use it by myself no problem at all
title: Car seats. You have to wait for that and that’s ok?

review: I gave them one star just because I couldn’t go lower. I requested a ride to an airport. After waiting 20 mins pass the scheduled pick up time the driver never showed. Had to cancel and request new driver. Uber then proceeds to charge me a cancellation fee for the first driver who never showed up. So I had to pay for another ride plus the fee for cancellation. Will never use their service again. Also will never recommend to anyone.
title: Wont use them again.

review: My Driver this evening ( JEFF) , was very nice!! I sparked a conversation and we went back and forth the entire ride!!! He from my town growing up and went to the same high school as I.  It’s nice. That Uber has drivers working that are entirely familiar with the old and new area!
title: Familiar with the area

review: There are two rental car areas in the airport, and newcomers will not know where the “ride-share” area is. Uber users should be clearly directed to make a right out of the airport and directly towards the lower rental car area.
title: Confusion over pick-up spot

review: Love clicking on something, expecting it to operate properly and it work as it’s suppose to. That is exactly what took place today with this app. What a nice thing to have Uber exist. Thank you Uber for another successful trip. 5 ⭐️’s
title: Tech when it works is such joy

review: This was the first time I used Uber in over six years, so I didn’t know what to expect. I could not have been happier with my entire experience. The driver was very professional, polite, and drove exceptionally well. I am thrilled with my experience!
title: Great experience!

review: My husband and I use Uber everywhere we go. The drivers and vehicles are great. My only issue is when you book a reserved ride, the passenger doesn’t get notification until driver is in their way. It would be nice if passengers were notified when the ride was accepted by the driver.
title: Reserved ride

review: What a wonderful Christian man who picked up my niece to go to Orlando airport. He was extremely polite and very helpful with your luggage. We were very worried as to whom would pick her up. We put it in Gods hands. She had a wonderful trip to the airport. She was in Gods hands for the entire trip.
title: Drive to airport

review: The driver on the way to 5 Neponset Street drove slower than the other traffic. I missed the closure time of 5:00 PM. I mentioned to him my deadline of that time. I missed it by only 5 minutes. The driver on the way back was cordial and even played my favorite music on his stereo system.
title: Thank you for help on short notice

review: We had a great visit with our relatives in Naples. We had to get up so early to go to the airport. We did not want to bother them so we called an Uber. And we got James. He was a great guy. Had a nice conversation all the way to the airport. (An hour away).  Thank you James ❤️
title: My trip to the airport

review: As a female passenger I don’t feel comfortable answering a bunch of personal questions from my driver. Answering any personal questions can make you are target. I also despise being locked in the car and unable to escape. Policy should be for drivers to leave the door unlocked especially when transporting a female traveling alone.
title: I Hope someone reads this.

review: I’m older now and don’t drive anymore, and I meet soooo many new people by taking Uber. Many drivers have great stories to tell, are hilariously funny, and genuinely good people. I’m always delighted to see some of my favorites another time!
title: Uber has great drivers!

review:
This guy was awesome!!! Good dude! Very patient as I was not expecting a pick up from my distant and off the beaten path pick up location. Especially within 8 minutes. He waited patiently for me. Best Uber guy I’ve ever gotten a ride from. These are the guys that make Uber look good!! Thanks Mikey!
Aloha. Kimo.
title: Mikey the glass blower

review: Edward was not only an incredibly tolerant driver but in addition he was an amazing singer. In fact we are starting a new reality show called Taxicabs Contessass - I’m gonna hide in the floorboard and jump up and surprise them and start singing when they least suspect it
title: Review

review: I am so appreciative of the amazing service of this driver. I asked him beforehand before he picked up my children to just turn the heater on and he graciously did it. I am so grateful for the service. I was returning my family home from the emergency room home. ❤️🙏💯
title: Amazing Service

review:
I have a company credit card with the same card number but a different expiration date.  The previous card expired but I have tried several times to update the card Info with a new expiration and the Uber app will NOT UPDATE the expiration.  
😤 howannoying!! what aninconvenience!!! 
Unfortunately there is no customer service number to call to have this corrected!!! 
I guess will have to look for another vendor soon 😌
title: Unsuccessful credit card update

review:
I am currently traveling in a region where Uber operates (Tokyo) and all of a sudden, my Uber account locks me out, with no explanation. It's such bad timing to be in a foreign country with no back-up transportation solution for when the subway doesn't make sense or you're feeling unsafe and want to take a car.

I've contacted support and have also submitted requests multiple times now to have my account reinstated, but they've done absolutely nothing. No one reaches out or follows up with you, whatsoever.

I will not attempt to use Uber again. I now remember why I originally stopped using it the first time I deleted the app years back. Shouldn't have given it another chance, but here we are with more disappointment.

Uber is trash.
title: Crap timing and bad customer service

review: It’s been a long time since I used the service as I haven’t been traveling.  First time I ‘scheduled’ a pick up and it was flawless.  The overall experience was perfect- timely, clean, pleasant.  Will be using again tomorrow! Thank you!
title: Excellent

review: I left my Bose earbuds and case in the car when exiting J’s vehicle. When I called J answered the phone and he very little English so he asked his passenger to help facilitate the call and I we were able to come up with a plan to get the items back to me. Thanks J and Eva!
title: Finding Lost Item

review: This man was so nice I left my phone in his car and he drove right back to drop it off at my work. There was no hassle or anything. Me and my father were so happy with his service. I couldn’t ask for a better ride.
title: Kind and concentrate

review:
Had a bad morning starting at 6 am and having my car towed to the dealership my driver got me to work for our company Christmas party and he passed on some kind words to get me in a better mood Thank you that I appreciate it!! 
Have a great day!!!
title: Fabulous driver

review: Great driver in every way--appreciate having an excellent ride to my Kona flight--she's a great asset to Uber--professional & personable--I was comfortable & confident in her driving skills & people skills.  Thank her👍🤙😎
title: Outstanding Uber driver ... could not have been better!  She is a home run for the Uber brand!

review: I have been with Uber since  it started in Florida approx. 10 years and I am a Platinum Rider and proud of it! Unbelievable service and always as close  to a 10 as possible!! Thank you, thank you, Michael Brandeis a special needs person and very grateful!❤️👍
title: Thank you, UBER!

review: I generally think the app is great, but I think the maps in my area need to be updated, especially near my apartment complex since it is not recognized by the app and I have to tell each driver or find them nearby.
title: Update maps please

review: Walter was amazing, he knew the city inside and out. We arrive to a thanksgiving parade, and a major football event. Majority of the streets were closed off, but he was able to ride us around the outskirts and finally got us to our destination. Thank you, Walter!
title: Review: New Orleans

review: It took me WAY too much time out of my day to get my fare fixed from last night. I won’t go into too much detail but after my first driver cancelled on me after 10 minutes of waiting for him, Uber then saying they were finding me another driver, my fare DOUBLED. They did fix this, but again it took WAY too long to finally get ahold of someone to do so.
title: Customer service needs a better system!

review: I feel like a small fish hitching a ride on the currents that are the drivers crisscrossing New York. I hop in here and hop out there, but you’ll keep going far beyond me - weaving, honking, blinking, until finally, you reach the end of the shift and get out to stretch and rest. Thanks for the ride.
title: Currents

review: Overall, the app is great and very useful; however, there have been times when the app freezes and is generally really slow when loading pages. Sometimes have to restart orders more than once. When it does work, it’s great and provides excellent service.
title: Keeps freezing and very slow

review: I think I’ve finally gotten to the last straw with Uber. I decided to give them another chance after years of using another service due to being let down twice before but was reminded of why it’s just not worth it. How is it possible to get quoted for a $43 REGULAR ride but I locked my phone for less than a minute and when I opened it again, not even closing the app, it had jumped to $65 for that same exact ride?
title: Feels a lot like a scam

review:
I do like the app as a whole however when I have to update my phone number, email address and add a payment method (in a different country) I always run into issues. I am a traveller so I frequently update my details and payment methods. Even trying to get in touch with the customer support has been torturous. 

I wish the app had an in built chat support with a real time staff assisting with update requests and other enquiries.

Also the payment methods page turns blank and there’s no way to add a method, kindly fix this glitches and bluffs for the seamless use for riders. 

Thanks Uber team!
title: Bugs and glitches - Issues with Payment Methods

review: If I can give Uber zero stars I would. But the app wouldn’t let me. Now in day 4 I have not been able to access my funds, change out my bank account number nor my new debt card. I did depend on Uber as my full time job. A Gold Star member with 354 rides, in over 3 months. My family depends on my me. And UBER was helping me do this. But it’s been a horrible week. Be aware of the glitches on unable to get paid, and horrible map directions.
title: Day 4 and still no funds.

review: I have to use Uber due to that fact of having to work but the prices are ridiculous I remember when I first started out using Uber or Lyft it wasn’t so expensive as it is now I literally can request a ride for just down the street and it’s literally like almost 20 bucks we are in a recession people are having hard times and to be charged so much is ridiculous,
title: Expensive

review: I’ve been using Uber for years, but I won’t be going forward. I have a 4.99 star rating and over 50 rides, but I’m done getting cancelled on by drivers at the last minute. I don’t mind waiting 15-20 minutes, but it is absolutely infuriating to wait 15 minutes on a 20 minute wait time and have the driver cancel when they are almost there. Recently, This has happened to me about a half dozen times. I’m over it. Going with Lyft in the future.
title: Unreliable

review: I had a driver cancel on me after having to wait 20min for them just to tell me they couldn’t take me to my destination. After I had to order a new Uber that was double the price (an additional $18) and when I told Uber about the situation it took me following up after not hearing from them for half a day and even after following up they only gave me a $5 credit…terrible customer service and business practices!
title: Terrible Customer Service

review: The space for promotions while I’m waiting for the driver is ridiculous.  I couldn’t find the drivers info to check when he was there.  If they are so big in safety they should prioritize the screen with needed info until you get moving.  It also takes up half the screen while I’m trying to look at the map.  I have a Pro Max to boot!
title: Would be great except for one flaw.

review: I use Uber several times a month for business travel.  Wait times are usually longer than promised when confirming a ride and I have had drivers cancel several times which starts the wait over.  Costs are also no longer a bargain.  It is time to try Lyft.
title: Drivers better than Uber?

review: This app works as intended, no problems. However it keeps reactivating marketing notifications that I keep opting out of, every few weeks. Not sure if it does this on a schedule or every time the app is updated, but it’s extremely annoying. Stop doing that and I’ll upgrade the rating.
title: Marketing notifications

review: I took an Uber on Saturday. I entered the restaurant’s name but was taken to a wrong location. The other side of Paris wrong. The driver told me this happened all the time. We had to use google maps to find the right address. In the end I was charged a lot more than if the Uber map  had taken us to the right location in the first place. I combed through the app « help » section where it’s impossible to reach customer service. Please advise.
title: Beware, the Uber map is wrong

review: Tried a couple times to use Uber, both times failed to provide a driver. Perhaps an hours of operation is needed. The appeared to function without error, just connecting with a driver missed, hence the "meh" rating. May try once more, unsure. I think it might be easier to pay more for guaranteed service.
title: No service during off hours

review:
Driver trip cancellation is out of control…. Of 10 rides i get cancelled about 8 of them…. Uber is horrible….

And most of them make you cancel by not cancelling and not picking you up either…….

First time in years, im preferring taxis over ubers
title: Trip cancellations is out of control

review: I feel like they shouldn’t be able to take a ride while they’re in the process of dropping someone off but other than that I have had no problems
title: Uber drivers

review: TLDR: Use Lyft, no sign if intelligent life here.  Have you ever wanted to take $300 and light it on fire? Have you ever wanted to talk to 9 different customer service agents to resolve a simple issue only to get nowhere? Have you ever wanted to spend $110 for a ride home from the airport in a Toyota Prius? If you answered “Yes” to one or more of these questions, you may be in the right place. If you answered “No” to all questions, you may be entitled to a ride share app that wasn’t developed by Satan himself.
title: Money Scammers - Abysmal Customer Service

review:
I ordered a special meal for a friend’s birthday.   The delivery guy said, “sorry that it took so long…” I replied, no problem as long as it’s warm.  It was cold.

Finding a phone number was interesting -and when you get through the customer section, which takes awhile -you get told that they can not take customer calls and you get dropped.

Finding a way to complain through their app - close to impossible. Then when you finally figure out how - all is aimed at the restaurant and not Uber.

The restaurant manager at Outback Steakhouse listened to me and used his phone number to call and request a refund.  Uber denied his request.  So, bad customer service for me - and bad customer service to the restaurant. 

This was my first Uber Eats try - I’ll use DoorDash.
title: Uber Eats

review:
Uber unknowingly charges users with uber one membership; it’s a scam and a sham
uber, your methods are deceptive. Users unknowingly click purchase when they’re ordering a ride service. This happened to me it charged me 10 dollars for a monthly membership (which only saves you a few cents). I warned my friends a few weeks later about it and it ended up happening to her too!!! Uber please change your app this is so deceptive!!!
title: Uber deceptive tactics with uber one membership

review: If you want a good quality ride this is the app. But if u want to use it for food you better have a very open schedule. EVERY time I order my food is well over the estimated delivery time, that is if it even gets here. Multiple times my food doesn’t get delivered and I get charged for it even after I ask for a refund. Very frustrating and will not be using it again.
title: Good for rides but not food

review: I Uber quite often, but something I’ve noticed is that prices keep changing. I’m not talking about when the app says fares are higher due to high demand. It’ll say $13 dollars for a quick trip. Then when you log out and try again the trip will go down $7. I don’t feel like Uber is honest with rates at times.
title: Prices Keep Changing

review:
I flew in from Denver to Milwaukee at 2:30 am. I needed to be in Appleton. Kevin my Uber driver made the hour & 45 minute trip seem like 30 minutes. Great Guy what a Blessing for me at 2:30 in the morning. Kevin got me to Appleton in time for a Busy Monday I had scheduled for. Kevin I Really Appreciate You! Take Care & God Bless🙏🏽
Emiliano
title: Great Guy!

review: I rather give this 0 stars than 1. I arranged a ride that only takes 15 minutes to get to and i was charged not once but twice in less than an hour. It charges you $5 for you to cancel the ride and if the driver cancels on you then it’s more than $10 which the driver keeps along with whatever amount you pay to get to your destination. Honestly it was very unbelievable and i hate the fact it kept charging me.
title: Absolutely Terrible

review: It would be very advantageous that you show future programmed rides on the opening window. The confirmation I received was through email and I did NOT know I was successful in actually scheduling a ride until, by chance, I looked at my mail Inbox. Why not send a confirmation through the Uber  App???!!! By the time I noticed the email confirmation , I had called a cab...
title: Difficulty finding future ride info

review: I was picked up by a guy smoking a cigarette in his car. The backseat was so full of garbage I had to sit in front. Literally garbage. The whole car smelled of it.  Given the clear instructions to west a mask via the app. I had my mask ready. My driver had no mask and I was forced to sit 2 feet from him given the condition of the backseat. No social distancing here. He then got lost and I was charged more for his incompetence. I’m sticking to Lyft trim now in. Uber doesn’t hold their drivers responsible for their own incompetence.
title: Horrible service

review: Whenever I most need a ride, there isn’t ever any drivers available. 30 minutes ago I requested a ride, since there was finally one available, and he must’ve seen the ride request, accepted it, then maybe went to get shopping done. He just forgot about me and left town. If I’d have needed him to take me to work, I’d be in serious trouble being almost an hour late…
title: Never any drivers

review: i honestly cannot wait to get my car in a month so that i can stop using this. drivers cannot drive, they drive like they do not care. prices are high for no reason. why do you want 15$ to go 5 mins away? makes no sense. cars smell terrible, drivers don’t wear mask. i use this app everyday unfortunately and uber does not give those who use them everyday any discounts i simply hate that i give them my money. not worth it. buy a car!
title: One of the worst apps

review: Why do drivers accept the ride, make you wait over 20 minutes only to cancel?  My time is just as valuable as the drivers.  It is rude and inconsiderate and should have sone sort of penalty associated with it like a credit in the amount of the ride we would have paid.  It happens more with Uber so I prefer Lyft. Thank God for our local taxis.
title: Sane story different day

review: I’m livid.  I had the worst driver ever last night, and my only options for doing anything about it were to dispute charges.  I want to be able to describe what he did & I want Uber to be aware! I took photos, and cannot even show anyone.   The only phone numbers for help are for drivers, and the only option in the app is to request a refund of certain fees.
title: Absolutely Zero Customer Support Options
developerResponse: {'id': 11297021, 'body': "Hi, we are sorry to hear that you are facing an issue with the pickup location. Let's make sure we follow up with you on this. Please send a quick note to t.uber.com/contact so we can connect.", 'modified': '2019-10-17T04:00:07Z'}

review: You lost a customer because I am unable to switch my account to my new email. Lyft cars are newer and cleaner anyway. Get your act together because you are just another BFC (Big F....n’ Company with no customer service.
title: Can not switch Uber to my new email

review:
I need to manage rides for family
Members but my family settings just disappeared and I cannot get family profiles in my App settings no matter how many times I’ve deleted and then downloaded again. No one at Uber seems to be able to or want to? help?
title: Not as good or convenient as in past. Communication Poor.

review: Uber is becoming worse and worse. Most of the drivers are rude untidy and cars are filled with dust. We refused to step into the couple of times and were charged a fee for canceling. Drivers refuse to drop of at the location because they have to take a u turn after drop off. I don’t know why they even have the option to review, they have not given back the money once and we are using Uber everyday.
title: Uber is becoming worse and worse

review: So I was coming from the hospital and usually I’m charged a normal about for it . This time I was charged a lot more then that I will just taken a car service but I didn’t have Cash on me so I had to go with Uber I don’t know why they’re always double the price from a normal car service service I wish I can get back the difference between Uber and any price I or Uber even can check up on any different car service
title: Crazy expensive

review: I had car trouble recently so I figured, that I would try to get a ride from Uber. However even though I scheduled the ride well in advance, nobody ever came, I even waited in the pickup spot that was designated for my address, and nobody ever showed up. It gave the message “no available drivers near by.” If that was the case then why should you offer it in my area? On top of that it still charged me 16 dollars for a ride I never received! Worst service I have ever used.
title: Scheduled a ride several hours ago and they never arrived.

review:
Times it takes to pick you up varies from 8 minutes to 30 minutes. Twice now (in a weeks span) I’ve had drivers that were 20+ minutes away cancel their trip after heading my way for 10-15 minutes, which ended up making me wait another 15-20 minutes and being late for work.
Great service when the drivers are within 15 minutes and do not cancel, but too many times it seems like your time is not respected.
title: Too Inconsistent, Too Many Cancels

review: Jill is a great driver, I felt very safe with her after being concerned about calling an Uber at such a late night/early morning hour. Super friendly, great music, excellent driver! If I could pick my driver every time, it would always be Jill!
title: Safe and Friendly

review: This app is the worst I have ever used. Their update is a disaster. I took 40 uber rides last year using their app, now I can’t find anything — my balance, how to pay. I literally don’t know how to use an app I have previously used a hundred times before. Hey, I could figure it out in five minutes, but I shouldn’t have to. Their update is comparable to Chevy switching the positions of the brake and gas pedals just for aesthetics. Ugh. I am going back to using taxis.
title: Worst Update in history

review: I have had multiple drivers cancel with no explanation after keep me waiting for so long. Today I had to wait almost 30 minutes because a driver cancelled and I was late for an important appointment. Uber often charges you if you cancel but there is no consequence for drivers or compensation for the customer. Really frustrated about this. Not reliable
title: Drivers cancel w/no discount

review:
I can always count in getting here in a very 
timely fashion with Uber. I have not ever have any issues, although prices have risen along with everything else. Uber drivers are always friendly and polite.
title: My trips to The Meadows

review:
I was hesitant to use Uber, but Amy was very accommodating.  Ashton was the first driver I was told would arrive, so confused as to how Amy got the call.  I think it would be good to have receipts available, since I can’t print out emails.

It was a great first experience with Uber!
title: First Uber trip.

review: Bill is awesome!! He was so patient. There was so much traffic and so much construction. He had to get back to the drop off point and he was so patient, even though he ran into road closures. We finally got there. Thank you Billl.
title: Thank you Bill.

review: Mung was so very kind. My car broke down and I had my dog and my grandson with me. I had never use the Uber app on my own, and I had a lot of extra luggage…  he was calm, patient, and amazing and helped me a lot. I would highly recommend Mung!
title: So kind and helpful

review: They are laying trap by quoting lower fare. Upon accepting… there is a long pause and say no one around. Bumps up fare and blames it on traffic. My fare went up by 50%. Upon checking with the driver, he said he is getting only 50% of Uber’s charge.  There is a limit to Greed Uber! I’ll share at work and discourage people from opting for Uber. Besides… they net seems to work when you want to book but when you try to cancel it doesn’t. Messed up app…
title: Uber is becoming a rip-off! Greedy!

review: Don’t choose Uber in case you accidentally leave an item in the drivers car because Uber will do nothing to help you retrieve it besides saying just wait. Expect when you down town and leave a phone and ID in the car Uber choose to say we can’t do anything and leave you helpless to retrieve your items. Absolutely useless in terms of customer support
title: Lost items

review: Wassim was wonderful!  Kept us informed.  Timely and we arrived at airport earlier than expected.  Friendly, professional and courteous.  Would highly recommend and would definitely try to book with him on upcoming trips.
title: Super experience!  Great driver!

review: Driver was excellent very professional and respectful. We were running late for an appointment and needed to expedite our service or the appointment was going to get canceled. He did his best and got us there sooner than expected. Awesome customer service
title: Excellent service

review: Left my cell phone in the car and he was able to come all the way back and drop it off in a quick timely manner! 5 star service
title: Great customer service

review: This was my first time using Uber. I was somewhat nervous since I have not utilized these services before. My driver Darlene, was exceptional, very professional, and a beautiful soul indeed. I hope to have her again. I highly recommend Uber!
title: So easy and convenient!

review: When you arrive late to a city where you don’t know your way around, how nice it is to get a ride to where you need to go. And to have it quickly and comfortably. Thank you very much!
title: Excellent service snd friendly driver.

review: The driver was very helpful. This was our very first Uber ride. After being picked up, about halfway to our destination we learned we needed to go back to the pick up point. The driver was very understanding and polite and helped us out. Thank you
title: George

review: I’m so lucky I got sweet DaeJhanae. Very prompt, professional and pleasant. I left my phone in her car, and as soon as she realized it, she came back and brought me my phone. I would pay extra to have her give me a ride next time. Thanks again, DaeJhanae.
title: Daejhanae is awesome

review: I have been using Uber for a few years now and never had any problems with any drivers, most drivers are very friendly and have nice conversations. Prices are pretty reasonable as well.
title: Very convenient!!!

review: I’ve met a lot of drivers - NYC cabbies & Lyfters, to Chicago busses. I’ve never enjoyed a 45-minute airport ride as much as this one. We shared experiences, philosophies, and mutual good will. It reinforced my hope for the future … more than one usually gets in a ride. 😀
title: Steven: Excellent all-around service!

review: The driver was very diligent and arrived early , the only thing that I have to say is that we were 3 adults and we have all three to fit in the back of the seat , because the driver says he has some things in the front of the seat , that was the only complaint that I have
title: Good

review: Uber always sends me my ride, in under 10 minutes. The rides I get their always clean and have FREE games in the back that entertain my 5 kids. 3 of them are young and love them, but it always entertains my older daughters too. Thank you Uber❣️
title: 5 Stars

review: I called for a driver to go from the Boston cruise terminal to an urgent care downtown. The driver went to the design center instead of the cruise terminal. I was already late for my appointment due to other reasons and could no longer wait for the driver to come to my location. So I had to cancel and grab a cab. I disagree that Uber charged me a cancellation charge anyway for the driver’s time. I think they should eat that cost since I had no other choice.
title: Driver went to wrong location

review: My Uber driver went above and beyond when he picked up my teenagers from school! When the driver realized my daughter left behind my son, he turned back and said that he didn’t mind going back. Drove my kids safely back home! 😉
title: Big High Five

review: I happened to be looking through reviews and I see a lot about poor customer service but not much else. I was assaulted by an Uber driver in 2019, and I reported it to Uber and other than the initial phone call I never received an update or any other follow-up. Don’t worry though, they refunded my ride fare!!! Thank goodness for that!!!!! Uber, do better in vetting your drivers. Patrons, don’t ever ride alone unless you feel absolutely safe. Intuition is a very real thing.
title: Don’t EVER ride alone

review: I hope I’m doing this, right, yesterday was my first Uber and I guess it was corn that picked me up, he was a very, very nice guy, we had a nice conversation, and his car was perfectly spotless. It was a nice experience, in fact, I’m getting ready to use Uber again.
title: Corbin

review: I got out of the car juggling lots of stuff. Made it through the luggage check in and turned around. There was my night in shining armed waving my phone that I had forgotten in the back seat! Thank you thank you!
title: Saved the day

review: Miss was very nice and helpful. My car was stolen and she took me to the police station and then to work. She told me how her car was stolen and what happened. She reassured me put it in Gods hands! Thank you very much Miss. From Sandra Swoboda you are an Angel!
title: Thank you,  I have graditude for your kindness

review: There should be a way for passengers to give specific positive feedback to a driver. That would help them. Why does Uber not do that?  Stars are not enough. Would make better drivers for you and morale would improve
title: Positive reviews

review: Went to NYC for a Wedding and relied on Uber for my transport.  As a first time Uber user, I was skeptic, but after the first ride, I was so impressed, I highly recommend this service!!! I tipped every driver as they were courteous and got me to my destinations quickly, comfortably and safely!!!
title: Smooth Ride

review:
Car was clean and the driver was very professional and friendly. I really need to get home from a place I didn’t need and I think I
He understood. I would definitely ride with him again!  Thank you for your service.
title: Good ride

review:
I have always had a positive experience with the drivers. 

Howver, the new, to me, look of the app is very distracting and confusing. I miss the older version that clearly showed the car, the license plate, in the whole screen and I could sweep to the next screen to see the map with the movement my car. 

Now the screen is so busy, it was annoying to look at.
title: Confusing interface

review:
Kenny was clutch! Beyond being prompt, friendly, with a clean vehicle… I noted that AFTER drop off - I had left my iPhone in his vehicle. I called Kenny with my wife’s phone and he immediately answered and brought me the phone in less than 5min.

Great guy! Great Service!
Thank you!!
title: SuperStar

review: Driver Gregory was very patient and helpful with me during a little address issue.. he above and beyond to make sure that the persons he was picking up were safe in a timely and professional way.. he is a absolute positive reason why you should Uber.. ty Greg
title: Professionalism

review: She was such a gem  ouf A/C was on the blink it was95+ in our house, my car was elsewhere and we had to leave , it was 4th of July and didn't wait 20 min  she made a Otherwise Horrible night a lot more bearable  the A/C in her car was AMAZING!! Will look for her to ride with her again!! Thanks Tiana!! U DESERVE a RAISE!!
title: Tiana was Great!!!

review: Uber is only useful if it’s working. I updated my Uber and I still couldn’t get a ride and missed my flight. When talking to customer service they did not care and couldn’t even offer me credit for making me lose a $80 ticket. I wouldn’t use it, start using other ride sharing apps because Uber is ghetto. They don’t care about their customers they only care about taking your money and saying “call your bank”.
title: Needs 0

review: When selecting vehicle type, the app gives consistently inaccurate estimates of how far away their vehicles are. It’ll tell you vehicles are only three minutes away, but then after you select that option it connects you to a driver 20 minutes away with no options to switch without canceling the ride. Uber needs to provide a better user experience to its customers than this.
title: Room For Improvement
