review: After what was a very long flight due to delays it was such a treat to be welcomed with such friendly and courteous service! It made the end of a hectic day feel much better. Turned my mood around and going to hopeful for humanity 😀😀😀😀😀😘 thank you!
title: Welcoming

review: Joesph is an amazing person. We had a wonderful conversation during the trip from the airport to my home. His car is immaculate and his driving excellent. I would request him when in Cleveland area is there is a way todo that.
title: My ride with Joesph

review: I had a great ride, and he played the perfect music, and I found myself singing with the music, and after the third song, he turned around and said you have a beautiful sound. He really made my day!
title: Song bird from Idaho

review: Raju was very prompt and helpful with the bags. The highway route to the hotel was total gridlock so he wound his way through the neighborhoods and we stumbled across the “naked bike parade”. Wow. We don’t see that every day. It was a whole lot better than sitting in traffic. Thanks Raju.
title: Full of surprises

review: My 5-star rating is an indication of my satisfaction; from the ease-of-app use, to the timeliness of Francesco, my driver, to the after-delivery interest. I wish all the experiences were as pleasant as mine. Thanks to everyone who helped to make all of it seamlessly enjoyable.
title: Service

review: It’s great when you need to catch a flight in the morning when you want to reserve a ride for eight but the app continuously gives you an error message saying failed to process your request a problem persists try our help website to watch it has nothing of use. Hope I don’t miss my flight because I was counting on Hooper to be competent enough to make an app that works I’ll give it zero stars if I could.
title: Hot garbage use somebody else’s service

review: Best ride. Had to escape an unsafe place and Jeff was so kind and understanding, i nearly had a panic attack but he was wonderful and seriously saved my life. He helped me feel safe in a situation that put my life in danger. What an amazing human being. Thank you from the bottom of my heart
title: El Jefe

review: Michael was wonderful. Full of great rid-bits about history and the culture surrounding the area! He was friendly and his car was very clean! I was even able to change my request and I arrived half an hour early! Best experience ever!
title: My awesome trip to the airport!

review:
The ride was great and the driver was great. My two complaints withe app are:
1) One cannot ask for the same driver for another trip.
2) one cannot specify a non-smoking car.

My driver and the automobile on my first trip were both awesome! I wanted to be able to ask for him again.
title: My Uber Experience

review:
Well, we often take a trip to the airport using Uber. Many times the driver makes you regret the choice.
We wish to see Edward all the time…
He’s pleasant polite helpful and gentleman. My wife asked me to give him six stars…only five are possible!
title: Polite, gentleman

review: After a concert at the Climate Pledge Arena, my pickup location was beyond my capacity to walk. I called Sidney and he adjusted the pickup location to accommodate my handicapped.  Enroute to my hotel we had a wonderful conversation. I felt comfortable and safe riding with Sidney. The service was truly outstanding.
title: Awesome Driver

review: Domingo was a great driver. I had fallen at Caesars Palace and needed a wheelchair. She brought me to my hotel and waited until they brought a wheelchair down for me. He did not mind waiting instead of just dropping me off in having somebody else take care of me. Thank you Domingo.
title: Drive

review: Penelope was very nice and was easy to talk with. The vehicle was clean and well maintained. I even forgot an item when I was dropped off and she reminded me as I was walking away which saved my whole day from disaster. Thanks Penelope!
title: All around just a great experience

review: Horrible service, I placed a order through the app for delivery from Dairy Queen and got missing items and the wrong order. Tried calling Dairy Queen and they won’t even answer, chat with Uber is automated and automatically talk to itself and claim it can’t help you. All around horrible, I paid $48 and it’s gone down the drain for two hotdog meals from Dairy Queen. I deleted the app right away and will never use Uber eats or Uber at all again. Definitely don’t recommend.
title: Uber Eats

review:
Dear Uber Corporate: I am hearing from several drivers that you have reduced their share of the proceeds from the rides. At the same time, you have recorded record profit. It’s not fair to t  as is advantage of your workers particularly during this tough economic time.
Best
Fatema
title: Pay drivers more

review: My Uber driver was prompt, courteous and very professional. I haven’t used Uber in a very long time and was a little nervous about it going right. Hope made me very comfortable and put me at ease. I will use Uber more often in the future.
title: Really appreciated my Uber ride

review: I have been trying to contact my Uber driver since April 24th about this lost personal item but the agent was unable to contact the driver.  I tried this 15 different times over the past 5 days with each agent unable to contact the driver.  And each of one them is telling me the same thing, which is to respect the driver's schedule and wait. It this most disappointing customer service I have ever seen.
title: Unable to connect to Driver and customer

review:
I was late to catch my flight and Greg made it happen for me. He was safe and didn’t break any laws or anything but he tried his best to be strategic in how I got to my location. He was super nice and got my bags for me. I was stressed but now I feel better. 
#grateful
title: Best service ever!

review: When I’m traveling to new places especially, I enjoy to see things from the water. If boat owners could taxi people through your service, imagine the possibilities! Your AI could event connect it to drivers on UberEats and make deliveries from NY to NJ for example.
title: Boats!

review: Service was great, Daniel knew the area and was friendly and knowledgeable about the area which was a blessing since our flight was diverted due to rains and we had to get to another city quickly.  Highly recommend.
title: A++

review: Waited for driver to arrive. Upon arrival another couple jumped into car. I waved driver down and knocked on passenger window and he drove away. Shame on other couple for not checking vehicle and driver name. I contacted driver and and he did not reply. WORST IS Uber Charged me a cancel fee. GOOD LUCK trying to get refund as Uber purposely does not provide contact number nor option to describe this disconnect on services. UBER automatically assumes it is the customers fault and takes ZERO accountability.
title: Driver picked up wrong passengers

review: I was a little scared about getting a Uber since this was my daughter and I first experience being by ourselves. But Ryan made us feel safe and was very friendly. Thank you again Ryan for making our ride so enjoyable!!
title: Best experience

review:
It was my first time using Uber and it was amazing. My driver Duglas was kind, respectful and so friendly and made me feel completely comfortable and safe.
I will definitely use Uber again if I ever need transportation and refer anyone who needs transportation.

Thank you 
Tish
title: The Best ride

review: This was our first Uber trip and it was extremely pleasant. Our driver was early for pickup, had a nice clean car, and was very explanatory about how Uber works. We arrived at the airport safely and looking forward to using this service again!
title: First Uber trip

review: My driver, Joseph was very personable, and very nice. We had a great conversation the entire way to my house. He told me his story of where he used to live and I enjoyed the conversation very much. He has a very nice almost new Tesla. He’s a very intelligent person, he’s a very good asset to Uber! Thank you, Joseph!
title: My Driver Joseph

review: This was my first ride with Uber. The app was confusing to me, maybe because it was new to me.  When we got to my destination I asked Joseif he would help me down the step and I gave him a tip then. I later learned you could tip him on the app.
title: March 26 trip

review: We were new to the area, and didn’t realize there was a special area that we needed to meet up at for Uber. Joseph was a great driver and very helpful. He was patient as he waited for us to find him. Thank you!
title: Helped a lot in finding our meeting spot

review: I live in a city that has exploded in growth, Eagle Mountain, UT. I do not drive and would appreciate being able to set rides in advance to appointments. I’m not the only person that has mentioned this about this area. Please look into this.
title: Schedule ahead

review: I used to land in the Minneapolis St. Paul airport and Uber would immediately know where I was.  Would ask me what zone pickup and my home address would always be available.  Now it thinks I’m at gates in the airport or restaurants.  My home address no longer populates.  Started ever since I became Uber One user.  Multiple times I’ve had to use Lyft because it could figure out where I was at the airport despite standing in the ride share pickup zone
title: Update has Ruined My Flights Home

review: Listen, Uber has a hidden Gem with this guy. Any woman who is trying to catch a ride after having some drinks, this is your guy. He’s literally so awesome. Thank you Anthony for getting us home safe and for sharing some awesome stories. We appreciate you so much.
title: Nice Anthony

review: Our driver was John and he went the “extra mile” to make sure we got checked in safely at our rideshare destination that seemed a little sketchy. He stayed with us all the way through to make sure it was a safe transition.
title: Great experience

review: Efficient driver. Came on time even a little earlier. Even though his native language is not English he was engaging. The route chosen again was the most efficient and we got to destination quickly without speeding. Vey nice and mannerly person.
title: Efficient

review: One of the most grateful Uber rides I’ve ever had. My dad had heart surgery yesterday we had the police do a well check…the police could not get him to answer the door. My Uber driver came through, my dad’s OK and I’m so thankful for my driver amazing caring service.
title: Thank you

review: App says driver arriving in 2 mins. Driver texts to say 18. Confused, I call to ask where he is. Rings to voicemail. A minute later driver texts he’s there. But I’m there and he’s not. A couple minutes later, he cancels, and the app charges me six dollars. I dispute the cancellation fee and it thinks for 10 secs and gives me my money back. If you knew that I shouldn’t be charged, why charge me in the first place? And no way to leave bad feedback for the driver. Cabs are better
title: New York City terrible service

review:
Brandon ( BX70M16) was an excellent driver and got me home safely after a terrible Uber driver dumped me off on Hollywood Blvd. because I was having trouble using the Uber app. I’m 65. I was so afraid and Brandon picked me up, calmed me down and helped me so much!! What a great guy!!! 
Please beware of a driver named Jhong in a Fit 7GWP771. He is dangerous!!!
title: Brandon saved me !!!

review: Wow, this was my first time using Uber and the app. Very easy to use and navigate show timeline, drivers picture, vehicle and plate number. My driver Margret was awesome and very experienced driving in the snow. I will definitely use Uber and app again.  Thank you. Lary.
title: Very easy to use

review: Sometimes it is hard to find rides from old town La Quinta to the Cove, I understand it’s a short ride… But it’s a long walk! He showed up on time, held great conversation, was friendly, and drives well. What more could you want?
title: Quick ride home

review: Tiffany arrived on time (actually a few minutes earlier than the time projected). She was courteous and polite enough to wait as I fumbled with keys to lock up. I’d highly recommend her and I’d definitely use her again.
title: Great customer experience!

review:
James took a chance on a late night call. That caller probably sounded out of it but James was still more than friendly. Little did he know but he saved the life of a son, uncle, and brother. Negative 6 degrees out and a desperate phone call

Thank you.
title: Life saver

review: Buying was right on time and exactly where I needed him to be. The service is amazing and easy to navigate through the app. Less expensive than a taxi. I am truly impressed with how easy this is. Thank you Uber and Byung.
title: Excellent Experience

review: Fernando’s ride trip was very relieving as compared to a previous failed Lyft ride a few minutes before…Fernando was very patient with me as I vented to him about how my previous Lyft trip was excruciating. I want to thank him for lending his ear and getting me home expeditiously and safely!
title: Fernando Tesla Model 3

review: Best. Uber. Ride. Ever!  I had the option of a more expensive ride or the closer comfort ride for a bit less. I went with comfort and so I happy I did! Maurice was perfect. His vehicle was immaculate, he helped with bags, opened doors and even had bottles of water. He would be my first choice anytime!
title: Ohhhh Maurice!

review: Our driver arrived on time and got us to our destination on the minute of the ETA. Car was spotless, driver was on pointe!  We had a lot of luggage for a Prius but he made it work and we were not uncomfortable. If I could give 10 stars, I would. Excellent!!!!!
title: What a pleasant trip -

review: Uber is my go-to service to get to time sensitive destinations.  And the drivers are friendly and helpful, especially in Philadelphia!  Love the Philly drivers. The app is awesome and ensures safety by providing the names of drivers, their ratings, name and make of car, and license plate.  Thanks!
title: Great Service- Wonderful Drivers

review: Calling an Uber is a simple process, I love the fact that a car will usually arrive within 5 minutes, it’s comfortable rides make traveling through the busy city of Nyc easier:) thank you Uber
title: Convenient

review: My driver was so kind and I stood how frazzled I was because my car got stuck in the ice and snow on a hill. I was so thankful for him and his sweet and kind demeanor. I hope I can get my car home safely tomorrow and I hope everyone else treats him so sweet and kindly like he is! Have a blessed night!
title: Driver!!

review: I had such a lovely ride and conversation during my trip! I’m originally from the twin cities but have been away for many years and her made me feel right at home!  And he navigated icy MN roads with such grace and ease. Highly recommend !!
title: Great person, fantastic driver!!

review:
I am seriously impressed with Uber services  and their drivers! My driver was professional and 
Courteous and most importantly he was on time as a matter of fact he came little early to pick me up, which I appreciate!
title: Outstanding ride

review: So far my experience with this app has been generally positive and all the drivers have been great but l can’t rely on Uber for pick ups at home for time critical appointment’s because of Uber’s insistence on sending drivers on a route that includes a road that doesn’t go through to my house.
title: Uber in Santa Cruz

review: Normally have a good experience with Uber. I noticed tonight that I was charged more than the app said it would cost when I booked it. Was only a matter of .40 but that can add up if your not paying attention.
title: Watch your receipts

review: Drivers never seem to be available when I try to request an Uber and when I am able to get one, they fake the system by sitting around, don’t respond to my messages/calls and just wait til I cancel and I get charged a $5 cancel fee. Uber won’t even give me my money back when I complain, they only provide a credit. But how am I supposed to use my credit when I can’t even catch a car? What a joke.
title: Use another car riding app…

review:
This app is efficient and reliable.

I left some money in my Wallet for over 2 years while I was in another location and when I returned, my money was waiting for me.

This says a lot about integrity of the team that manages the platform.
title: Super Cool

review: Love it when you request for someone to pick you up and will show the location and show the price and they bring you to your destination safe and sound
title: Safe,secure & night hero

review: Uber drivers have been jerks lately.  I have come to rely on Uber to bring me home safely and I have endured Uber Zealots who try to convert me to their religion and weird drivers who attempt to entice me into an argument by bringing up hot-button topics. I have not allowed myself to be drawn into these conversations but this is a problem.  Uber needs to do a better job of vetting drivers and training them on what behaviors are inappropriate.
title: Disappointed

review: The drivers are great for the most part. It’s the navigation their forced to use that is annoying and ridiculous to me. It takes you five blocks down and around a corner; when you can just drive straight with no traffic. It’s an Uber policy I’m sure!
title: Navigation

review: This driver was great. The car was clean. He showed up a couple minutes early. The app told me what color a car and kind of car to look for and I check the plate. Excellent service well worth the money
title: Uber service

review: It is so easy, my driver arrived within 3 minutes, he installed my toddlers car seat & played music for him on the drive, he spoke multiple languages preventing a communication barrier, he drove very safely to our destination about 10 minutes away
title: Kallie D.

review: Why did I have to sign up for Venmo to add a credit card to my account? I received a Tesla voucher but couldn’t use it without having a credit card on file. This is normal and understandable. however I couldn’t add a credit card without first opening up a Venmo account. This is absolutely crazy. I plan to subsequently delete my Venmo account and if I can’t add a credit card to my Uber account I plan to delete my Uber account as well.
title: Payment options

review:
For my last few rides with Uber, the fare that I am charged is not the fare shown when I book the ride. Literally I walk to the door and make sure the marker is at the correct location so I’m confused as to why (on more than one occasion) I’m charged more than what is quoted.
It’s even more upsetting when you try to resolve the issue using the app it’s the run around. 
Lyft has it’s own set of challenges but deceptive pricing isn’t one of them.
title: Fare Shown Is Not What They Charge

review: We are so happy for Uber facilities . We only want to see clean cars good music and good drivers who will not open the windows and spit outside . It will be great if drivers wear good color uniforms too just a suggestion .  The whole world is at ease from the time Uber has entered . Keep it up 👍
title: Uber has changed our lives

review: The pickup point map program could use some improvement. It’s hard to tell what direction you need to travel at times to get to the pickup point. A directional arrow like on Google maps would help.
title: Map

review: I love this app! I can no longer drive due to health reasons. I use Uber for rides to doctor appointments. I like that you can add stops and it’s easy to tell when your ride is coming. I’ve had good experiences with drivers too.
title: Best way to get rides

review: Do not use delete if you have. I have $700 in vouchers that I can’t use because I have a iPhone. Been trying for 3 days now and no one from Uber or apple can figure out how to use my vouchers without Apple Pay being charged. I have lost over $300 and had to find a ride another way. Customer service is a joke.
title: Horrible

review: I work as a driver for eats and i tried using the app for passengers when my car broke down. But the app is saying i cant use it because my phone number is in use. The respond time for help and the respond time to get my account fixed is taking longer than needed for an issue that shouldn't he an issue. I recommend Lyft or any other ride share app because this just shows the poor quality of the company.
title: Phone number

review: Keep telling me I had a lot I had under 20 bags 24 pack water and 18 pack soda  keep rushing me n my son to get our bags talking about I got to go home he never help with any bags saying his back I’m on a cane with back n leg problems I still got my bags he keep say hurry up I got a doctors appointment at 7 at night so me and my son hurry up just for him to sit in the car for like 7 mins afterwards we got all our stuff why didn’t you pull off if you was rushing to go to doctors.
title: Rude driver

review: Yesterday I was charged for a trip when the driver never picked me up. So I sent Uber a message through their terrible help center. And they “apologized” for the inconvenience, however they still charged me and replied that they have “changed the price of a trip” for me too many times as is it’s my fault that this even happened in the first place or any of the other issues I’ve had in the past.
title: Charged more than once for trips I never took.

review: Please stop with the notification advertising. Notifications are essential because of what the platform is supposed to do. Leveraging the to push ads is going to make me simply use some other service. I’ve had good success with Uber, but I’m happy to give it up if you’re going to persist with this.
title: Notification Ads

review: Some of the drivers you accept and hire here are so unprofessional, they dont do their job, and always ask for more money and negotiate on the price before the trip starts, and they are not following the right path always make the trip longer so the metric will count more. All of this without mentioning the late pick ups
title: Turkish drivers

review:
All go well except when you have an issue. Charge me for my food without delivering the food to me. And say I canceled the order and the restaurant already made the food. Which I didn’t cancel the order and the restaurant did not get the order as well. 
This would be my last time using their service. Such a bad customer service channel and confusing and not helpful at all. 
Wish your business well. 🙃
title: poor customer service

review:
Don’t use Uber if you can avoid it. OBSCENE price gouging, very common for the price QUADRUPLE for little to no apparent reason. They will claim it’s due to availability, but check another rideshare app and you’ll find a ride for a quarter of the price every time. Walk 15 feet and you may see a $30 price difference.

Not to mention in accurate pickup times. Pay extra to get picked up sooner, end up waiting just as long for a ride. These people are pirates, find a taxi
title: A taxi is ALWAYS cheaper

review: Have many bad experiences so far with booking rides through this app. Charged me 100$ for a 40$ ride. Once more in a different country, out of nowhere the route changed taking a longer route & charging us extra for it. Now for the third time in a week, no rides are accepted. I end up waiting for 15 min to book a ride when there are a lot of cabs available nearby. I’ve had enough of this app. Not using uber again.
title: Completely Unreliable

review: Uber has been working really well for me because I don’t like to bother people asking for rides but recently they be charging a lot of money just for nothing the weather is good during the day and they charge you like 40bucks for 5 min trip 🙄🙄 I like everything about this app but you guys are making things harder for us 😓😓
title: Overpaying

review: I enrolled subscription for a 10% discount and then decided to cancel it. I checked out everywhere in the application and there’s no place that you can cancel it. Also I checked out for Customer Service to help me out. However you can not find Customer Service anywhere. Such a big company doesn’t have human life chat or number. I found a solution that I will giving the reviews maybe help me out
title: Impossible to reach customer service

review: Uber is trying to charge me for part of a bill almost 2yrs (1yr 11 months +) after they said the order took place.  I have no idea if this is even accurate and do not believe this is mine. this has caused me to have to dispute this charge as fraudulent via my credit card.  I can guarantee that they have no approval on the card.  Avoid this service if possible.  I have been using Uber for years but will be using Lyft instead.
title: Uber submitted charge 2yrs later

review: Horrible App. I have been late to school multiple times because the drivers keep canceling even though I scheduled early. They also still charged me a cancelling fee, around $6, even though I was the one that was canceled on. I scheduled a ride early and when I check to see my “upcoming trip” there’s no record of it. The prices go up from $11 to $30 simply because it “doesn’t remember” when I ordered my ride. Waste of time and money.
I didn’t see any way to report bugs so here we are.  I keep getting a “Try Again” error when trying to purchase a gift through Uber.  Can someone look into this?
title: Gift Feature is Broken

review: The driver cancelled on me at 3am while I was trying to get my young child home after a trip to the emergency room. I spoke with him and he said he was on his way, then he cancelled on me. Uber charged me a cancellation fee, which I disputed. After they credited the account, and I ordered Uber eats the next day, I get an alert that I have a pending charge and I need to pay it immediately. It’s the full amount of the cancellation fee they “disputed”. Overall horrible experience and💯WOULD NOT recommend.
title: Horrible

review: I’m in shock that after all these years this company refuses to get the language issue right. Not only that, they have the nerve not to have customer service. You can’t read the i formation being requested and you can’t speak with anyone to get help. Will never use them or try to work with them again. Will look into Lyft. This negligent behavior makes it more than clear that Uber could care less about its workers or customers. What nonsense.
title: A pathetic app

review: Overall, the customer service of the folks actually giving the rides is pretty darn good and I've used Uber plenty over the years out of necessity. The one thing that really burns me is the fact that they price gouge at peak times and charge up to 8 times what they would normally charge for a ride if it's rush hour or if there's a large event in the area. It's highway robbery and because of that I've really pumped the brakes on using their service unless I have absolutely no choice.
title: PRICE GOUGING AT ITS FINEST

review: I wish I could leave 0 stars. The app will never let me request a ride. I constantly get payment method errors when I have thousands on my account, it doesn’t make any since. Customer support is nonexistent so don’t even bother trying to get help. No wonder this garbage app is giving deals on rides because everybody is going to better services. Lyft has never given me a problem and will be the only transport service I’ll use from now on
title: DONT USE THIS BROKEN APP

review: Uber has taken advantage of the fact that they get to push notification (for rides, which is appropriate) but used it to advertise for their services which should not be a push notification given most of my setting on my phone. This needs to be fixed, becusse I only want to be notified when my car is close or food is near - I don’t need a Lock Screen notification for $0 delivery fee from a restaurant I haven’t eaten at.
title: Annoying

review: The app has become completely unreliable. It gives you one pickup estimate before you book, which is often completely different than what you receive after the booking has been processed. Furthermore, riders are often charged fees when they cancel rides that arrive much later or earlier than what Uber originally estimated. Ride shares should be more closely regulated by the DOT and FTC
title: Unreliable

review:
Although it’s not perfect, Uber is an absolute lifesaver when you’re in big cities where most taxi cab drivers will scam you for most of your money. Love it

6 years later, Uber is still as useful as ever. 

A-
title: Best travel tool for big foreign cities

review: I get a different customer service rep every time they respond to my message, so I have to reexplain the situation every time….and then they don’t read the above messages so they provide generic copy paste answers that I have specifically stated do not work, per my earlier messages. For example, I spoke with 7 different representatives over the course of a whole day, and they kept passing me off to a “specialized team” that gives copy paste answers.
title: Worst customer service

review: I have had several drivers get my home address wrong. Also your navigation system has the drivers going way out of the way picking me up and bringing me home. I am visually impaired and shouldn’t have to give drivers instructions getting me home. I may chose a different carrier. If I could see better I could drive myself!
title: Rides

review: I was stuck in the middle of an accident and instead of redirecting the route they took me through the accident and on top of that wanted to double charge me since my ride took longer than expected . When I went to report the issue they rejected me a refund twice until I said that the driver took the wrong route when it was the apps fault. Horrible, if it wasn’t for not having a car I wouldn’t use this app anymore !
title: THEY CHARGE YOU FOR EVERYTHING

review: Listen…I have nothing against you turning a profit. But I take Uber to and from my local watering hole, so I can be safe and responsible. It’s 2 miles each way…and lately, it’s $9 to go and on the way back, when I need it the most, it’s $50. FOR 2 MILES. $25/mile? That’s ridiculous. Fix it. I don’t want to feel like I’m being held hostage at a bar because I don’t want to usurious rates so I can get home safe.
title: Stop creating hostage situations

review: How about lower these prices. Your starting to get like taxis. What’s the point of riding with you when I’m gonna pay the same in a taxi. In what’s with paying over $20 from side town to the other. That’s crazy and costly. Guess I’ll try Lyft!
title: Prices

review: The driver after a minute of driving told me the app was acting up and I needed to request a new ride. I got a new ride but then saw I was charged for the ride I didn’t get. Uber has poor customer service and not I have to pay almost $50 for service I never received. Be careful they will scam you and you can’t do anything about it and they don’t have anything in place to help when this happens, the app breaks and I have to pay.
title: Scammed by Uber for almost $50
developerResponse: {'id': 3434783, 'body': "Hi, let's make sure we follow up with you about this. Please send a quick note to t.uber.com/contact so we can connect.", 'modified': '2018-05-11T11:48:06Z'}

review: Our trip from Hartford Avis rental car to downtown was super smooth. The app allowed me to communicate with the Uber driver where exactly to pick us up (inside of the Avis property) and driver responded quickly. In a rainy day, we were more than happy to ride with Uber.
title: Great experience with Uber

review:
Don’t use Uber. Especially if you need to be somewhere on time. I always book ahead of time, sometimes an hour in advance - and even then I’m ALWAYS late at least 30 minutes. Uber says a driver is 3 minutes away - then 5 minutes later says I have a new driver who is 15 minutes away… drivers cancel even after all of the waiting and miscommunication. 

I’ll still use Uber because it’s a necessity- but I dread it every time 😵‍💫
title: A mess of an app

review: Uber is a great service until there’s an issue with your account. I’m locked out after switching phones. Messaging back and forth with customer service. Each message comes from a different person so I have to re-explain the issue and all the steps I’ve taken so far. Uber blames it on my carrier blocking verification codes, it’s the only service that I’m has codes blocked. Uber doesn’t have a number to call so I’m just stuck.
title: Great until it’s not

review:
Uber, how difficult is it solve this simple problem of sending notifications based on a customer’s location?
All promotion messages and notifications are based on offers from India while I’ve been in the USA for ten years. 
Worst of all when I loaded a gift card, the app showed me the value in rupees. 
 First off, there’s no easy way to contact support for a general issue. And when I somehow do, the responses al so far has been pathetic.
title: Do you know where I am?

review: Uber likes to charge 40 dollars on you when ur like 15 min away of ur destination and when I requested an Uber was 10 min away from me I just don’t  get it why charge so much it doesn’t help it makes me wanna use taxi instead, and when it’s cheap I wait for a good 5 min when Uber is on its way and they they cancel it I get charge for no reason and the price goes expensive and I’m forced to pay the price Bc I’m late for work for tht reason.
title: Overpriced and how people use Uber

review:
After twice having Uber just flat out NOT show up to pick me up in downtown San Francisco for an early flight, I will never, ever use them again unless I have to.  

The first time I could see the driver (on the app) trying to find my hotel in Union Square, but he was literally too incapable of navigating to the hotel and just kept driving in circles for 30 mins.  

The second time (just two days ago), I made my 2nd attempt with a scheduled ride. At the scheduled pickup time, the app just started to request a ride. And then absolutely nobody showed up, and after 15 minutes I gave up. 

Fortunately the bellman at the hotel was able to arrange a taxi very quickly to get me on my way in both cases, and for a cheaper price too.
title: Left me stranded TWICE in San Francisco

review: The driver canceling ride after accepting the ride for 24 minutes then canceled at the last minute. I schedule the ride in advance thinking it will help. Don’t schedule your ride it doesn’t meant anything to them. You can’t even report the driver because there no option for it. Remember when we late Uber charge you fees but when Uber canceling ride on you make you late for the airport and have to paid for another air ticket. Trash company
title: Canceling ride

review: Uber used to be my go-to in spite of how unethical the company is. They were fast and reliable. Nowadays, I am left “searching for a driver” but prompted 10-12 times saying my ride is at a higher price, quoting me ~10-20x the price each time. I never actually connect to a driver and no, my rating is perfectly fine at 4.85. I don’t know what’s going on but I’m not giving this a try anymore. It’s a waste of time and it is made me late more times than I can afford to be. Switch to Lyft.
title: Bait and switch with exorbitant pricing

review:
Great, economical and safe ride service.  There are a few observations to implement to even make it better for all riders:

1.  Uber should offer the service request through other options beside the mandatory app— it may be more efficient but for all kinds of reasons you should be able to reserve a ride without using an app., like some other ride services.

2.  Once the prospective rider has booked the ride and made the payment, the rider should get some receipt or payment confirmation right away.  If the payment has not been deducted yet, Uber must inform the rider when it will deducted.  

Thanks!
title: First Experience with Uber

review: There are drivers on the app that will be available to ride but will decline the ride for unknown reasons. This is incredibly insensitive towards customers and people that really need help getting around. I’ve been trying to get around to get food and groceries but there is this same driver on the app showing that he/she is available but refuses to accept my ride. I’ve grown to strongly dislike this app. IF THE DRIVERS DONT WANT TO ACCEPT RIDES THEN THEY SHOULDNT BE ON THE APP! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THE CITY BUS OVER THIS SAD EXCUSE FOR HELP. HOW ARE YOU HELPING PEOPLE IF YOUR DRIVERS REFUSE TO HELP THEM WHEN NEEDED?!
title: Terrible Customer Service And Drivers.

review: Don’t waste your time with this app. They will not protect your privacy or security. They literally do not care. I went back and forth with Uber support when my account got hacked and all they did was send me the same scripted responses over and over. Eventually they stopped responding. I had to call the bank and cancel my card since Uber didn’t care to help me. Now theres someone out there using my name when they get Ubers. I could go on about horrible experiences with Uber. Just get Lyft, it’s FAR better.
title: Awful

review: Brogan was very helpful as our hotel was nearly cut off by the Dublin marathon route.   He got us where we needed inspite of the road closures (some of which had not been on the official route map for the marathon.
title: Driver was very good under difficult circumstances

review: My driver was a very friendly well spoken gentleman who made me feel comfortable on my ride. He went above & beyond to help me get to my destination safely. He waited & watched me walk in to my house bc it was 3am in the morning. He should definitely be recognized & praised.
title: Uber Driver recognition

review: Promos could be better and higher, prices could be more affordable accordingly along distances. When it’s busy, prices are more than doubled .. I get it but I just wanna say it could be less expensive rather being tripled the price, that’s all, everything else is well and I’ve been a loyal customer for more than a year.
title: Prices

review: I took an Uber last night and before I could add a tip an unauthorized tip was included on my receipt.  There appears to be a way to address this on line, and no phone number. Anyone else experience this?
title: Tip Added Without My Authorization

review: Dennis was a friendly and personable person and made the experience comfortable for me. He was on time and drove me to MacArthur airport safely. I highly recommend Dennis to anyone who may be a bit weary of trying out Uber for the first time. Thank you.
title: My experience

review: First, they take hours to respond to your request for help. Your need for a ride is long gone. Then they offered no solutions to your problem. Basically if you don’t have a bank ap on your phone, you can’t use Uber. It doesn’t matter if you have credit cards or PayPal. You have to give up your security by having a bank ap on your phone to give them security of your credit card.
title: Customer service is useless

review:
First time I’ve used Uber. I had to cancel my initial ride request because I expected some wait time, but my pickup was estimated at 1 minute and I couldn’t have gotten to the door that fast. My bad. 
The ride was stellar.
title: Amazing. It was like time travel

review: Our driver today was excellent!  He was very well informed about the neighborhood, referred us to a few different restaurants and dropped us off at our destination within walking distance of the stadium.   Altogether an enjoyable ride!
title: Amazing conversation

review: Just got out of the hospital. The Uber was very helpful, my wife was going to give me a ride home but she got sick, Uber came and saved the day. Also I didn’t have any money with me, it worked out very very well. Excellent service!
title: Great service

review: I normally use this when I have events and or parents borrow the car. I understand that I ain’t the only one using the app but when I use and I show up late because Uber keeps giving me the farthest driver away and then charge me a fee when I still cancel because I don’t want to wait 20 -30 minutes just for a 8 minute drive then I would rather use the bus then wait show up late and for Uber to hassle for good reviews
title: Never on time.

review: I’m not very tech-y… actually awful! Was able to navigate the app & our driver was on time, friendly, & explained where we were as we drove to our destination. Thank you!
title: First time using uber and Uber Black

review: I'm a big fan of Uber. I use it quite often. Thank you! However, I feel the routes Uber provides are not the fastest many times. It asks the drivers to go around instead of the shorter ways. I hope it will be improved.
title: We need better routes

review: The driver took me around the block in order to drop me at restaurant so didn’t have cross traffic. My glasses slipped out of my pocket in back sest and  he circled around and brought  them to me in restaurant.   What relief because I need them to read the menu!
title: Conscientious Driver, Friensly

review: Professional, helpful and ready to assist in anyway possible in reference to providing professional services and an enjoyable ride. I really enjoyed my ride. He needs to train all other Uber drivers. This first time I have enjoyed an Uber ride
title: Uber driver

review: i did not cancel- uber was not at my condo- so at 10:20 i had to get another ride- ——you do not find my condo- the day before Uber eats called me from 3900 on Bridgeport side of Park Ave- with my food from the Galaxy restaurant- then when i told him to cross  over to Fairfield- he said he could not- then I directed him - & he still drove past my condo & i watched him from the upstairs window—then he started walking up the hill from my condo- i did not cancel- you did not show up!
title: no pick up

review:
I love Uber! The mobile app is very user friendly. I enjoy the conversations with drivers, and I’ve never had a bad trip riding with Uber. Please keep doing what your doing Uber, and please don’t change. 
      -Chad Simmons
          Uber Customer
title: Convenience and Easy

review: The charge too much already now they are adding a charge for a driver waiting!! Two minutes is enough time for who , not people who older or with disabilities, what if an elevator messes up. Are customers discounted when we wait or do t get the ride because a person cancels last minute or drives past us as we wait and cancels! I’ve had multiple see me waving them down and cancel. Why is food 8 minutes and not riding
title: Excessive charging

review: I just got a ride from Sergio. I just wanted to let you know that before I got a ride from him I was going to cancel my Uber one account but I decided to keep it because he’s such an amazing driver. You should have more drivers like him.
title: Sergio

review: I took my first Uber ride yesterday. I needed to arrive at an important fundraiser and had no way to get there. The Uber app let me know the progress of my ride each step of the way. My driver was very sociable, very courteous. Great experience!
title: Uber got me where I needed to go

review: He picked us up in like a minute after I hit to buy it.  He loaded our bags and opened our doors. He did a great job and had a good discussion. Unloaded at port of Miami for carnival. We appreciated your service.  We saved $35 including tip not taking the carnival shuttle from Miami international to port.
title: Miami

review: We were so impressed with our driver and the Tesla that he picked us up in. It was colder, and the temperatures outside were nearly 115°. He gave us tips on how to make our pick up after our Las Vegas show more convenient and was a pleasant guy to talk with.
title: Sterlinng

review: This was my first trip using Uber.  I wish I could have given him more he was so polite and professional.  He even explained the correct way to request trips. He went above and beyond the call of duty.  I highly recommend him for UBER.
title: Awesome ride!!!!

review: Rates are creeping up but Uber still my first choice. I have used them often in Uk, South Africa and the USA over the past ten years with just one let down. A no show early airport pickup in Nashville other than that, all 5 star reviews.
title: Uber experience

review: It is very frustrating that, while trying to use the app in Cairo, Egypt, drivers keep canceling on me every single time; I was stuck last night for over 90 minutes trying to get a ride, with no success. I will never use overseas again. Please fix your Cairo partners operations: the rides cancelled by your drivers don’t even show up in my account, so I can’t even reference them or complain, extremely frustrating!
title: Does not work well overseas

review: After flight delays, missed connection, short night, Steven was a delight!  He was professional, friendly and engaging. The car was clean and in great condition. Thanks for being a bright spot in a tough travel experience.
title: Just what we needed

review: The best Uber Experience here in Honolulu, thanks to Joshua in his Black Tesla S model, clean professional customer service I will be reminding him to all my family and friends visiting Hawaii, thank you again Sir. Great service!! *****
title: Pick up from HNL after worst travel experience every.

review: After a very long day of travel, it was GREAT to be able to have Manny pull right up when we got off the train and be home within a few minutes!
title: Off the train and into the Uber

review:
I met 2 ladies who were so Sweet! I had a quick ride to my destination & a quick ride back home. Both of them were so friendly, that I really wish they would give me a ride in the future!  
Thank you 
Nanette W
title: Wonderful Women drive with UBER!

review: The first driver trip was canceled for an unknown reason, though it was around the corner. I called this driver to ask him to please not cancel the trip and let me know if he does because I was under a time constraint. He was understanding and helpful.
title: Understanding driver

review: I highly recommend him to anyone in need of a reliable and friendly Uber driver. His professionalism, safe driving, and exceptional customer service truly set him apart. Thank you for a fantastic ride!
title: An Exceptional Ride with a Friendly and Professional Uber Driver

review: Edoardo picked us up quickly once the request for services was made. We engaged in 30 minutes of pleasant conversation throughout the ride. His knowledge and perspective made for a very enjoyable trip. Wishing him much success in whatever he does!
title: TPA Trip

review: Thanks Uber for always being on time, quick, quiet, and clean smooth rides to and from work! Plus the payment is not over priced, I’ll always choose Uber for any ride!
title: Clean Quick and Efficient

review: Wow I haven’t driven with Uber in a while but I see they have changed for the better. The app is phenomenal so much to offer and the drivers are amazing and professional. Thanks Uber for making my journey safe and wonderful.
title: For the better

review:
I ordered a pick up from Milan’s airport and our driver came really quickly and was very helpful, nice and friendly.
The car was clean and the AC was working well.
Stephano made sure we arrived at our place and helped us with our bags.
Thank you
title: Airport ride

review:
Our driver was very professional, and very nice.
He showed up early, and got us to the airport with plenty of time to do our check in.
Only regret is leaving Orlando and not being able to have him drive us again.
title: Driver
